original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>行走于纺络根基是你的殊荣。<br>在这些为王国献出生命者的躯壳前，应保持谦卑。
translated_text: 巡礼者のこと<br>あなたはファロの上にいて幸運です。<br>私たちの王国の重みを支えるために命を捧げた人々の死体の前で謙虚になりなさい。
secondary_translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>You're lucky to be on the pharo.<br>Be humble before the corpses of those who gave their lives to support the weight of our kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
original_zh_text: <hpage>您错了，夫人……<hpage>我知道您寄望于我，也知道达成这期愿的代价。历经岁月后，如今的我的看法愈发透彻……<hpage>心志、仁念、爪牙——皆需刚强。强大到能让我亲眼见证美好世界之降临，强大到能助我亲手创造一个理想世界。<hpage>此乃生母、恩师与您的共期之愿……<page>……诚然，小蜘蛛……你一定历经了不可估量之苦痛，才得此彻悟……<page>既然你已经成长……明晰我们的期愿，也见识过我们家园下深藏的黑暗……我这便将礼物赠予你……
translated_text: <hpage>あなたは間違っています、マダム。<hpage>私はその願望とそれを達成するためのコストを知っている。それから何年も経った今、私はそれをより深く理解しています。<hpage>力は···私の心の中で、私の足の中で。自分の世界よりも良い世界を見るために生きたり、自分が望む世界を創造するために生きられるほどの力。<hpage>これは私の母、私の、あなたの愿いである。<page>...本当に、蜘蛛。私たちの希望を簡単に表現するために、あなたは多くの痛みを経験したに違いない。<page>彼女のために。あなたはなる。彼は私たちの願いをよく知っていて、私たちの家の下の暗闇を見て、私はあなたに贈り物を見せます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Madam. "<hpage>I know that aspiration and the cost to achieve it. Now, many years after that, I have a deeper understanding of it.<hpage>The power is... in my heart, in my feet. Power enough to live to see a world better than your own, or to create the world you want.<hpage>This is my mother, my, your will.<page>... Really, Spider. In order to express our hope simply, you must have experienced a lot of pain.<page>For her sake. " You will be. He knows our wishes well, and he sees the darkness under our house, and I will show you a gift.

original_en_text: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚轻摇，<br>净水长流，<br>河流超脱时光之外。
translated_text: 珊瑚が揺れ、<br>水の流れ、<br>川には時間がない。
secondary_translated_text: The coral shakes,<br>the flow of water,<br>The river has no time.

translated_text: ...到着した。そして最後に..。
secondary_translated_text: ... They arrived. And finally...

translated_text: ...私たちの絹。
secondary_translated_text: ... Our silk.

original_en_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
original_zh_text: 来吧，见证这道最初的光芒。这是我们抵御虚空的唯一手段。而那虚空，却与我们的族群永世相连。<page>伸出手来，我的孩子，你已通过历练变得强大。在这忆境中夺取那光芒，焚尽我们悲惨宿命的枷锁……
translated_text: 目撃者、最初の光。家族と永遠につながる空虚さに抵抗する唯一の手段です。<page>あなたが成長するにつれて、あなたの子供は強くなります。それを記憶から消し去る。悲しい運命から解放される。
secondary_translated_text: Witness, the first light. It is the only means of resisting the emptiness that leads to family and eternity.<page>As you grow up, your child will be stronger. Erase it from memory. They are freed from their sad fate.

translated_text: ...私たちの力、
secondary_translated_text: ... Our power,

translated_text: ...私たちは誰？
secondary_translated_text: ... Who are we?

translated_text: ...目覚めてほしい。
secondary_translated_text: ... I want you to wake up.

original_en_text: ...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
original_zh_text: ……莫听，女儿……她们的絮语……<page>……伟大……崇高……织者、守护者、女王……皆为他们所欲……非你所求，更非我所愿……<page>……唯有抵抗，方可见……另一线希望……<page>……但时过境迁，这些话……你可会记得？你可会记得我？...<page>……作为母亲，在戴上面甲之前……在因责任而永眠之前……
translated_text: ...娘たちとそのささやきを無視する。<page>...より大きく、より大きい。ウィーバー、ガーディアン、女王これらは彼らの願いである。自分のじゃない私のじゃない<page>...彼らに反抗してこそ、もう一つの希望である超越を見ることができるのです。<page>...しかし、その言葉を振り返ってみると、今まで私を覚えていますか、息子よ。あなたなら..。<page>...母がマスクをする前に永遠に責任を負う前に
secondary_translated_text: ... Ignore the daughters and their whisper.<page>... Bigger, bigger, bigger. Weaver, the Guardian, the Queen - these are their wishes. not my own, not mine.<page>... Only by rebelling against them can we see transcendence, another hope, and it is the only hope we have.<page>... But when I look back on those words, do you remember me until now, my son? " If you are...<page>... Before my mother wore a mask, before she was responsible forever.

original_en_text: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
original_zh_text: ……展现你的技艺，孩子……<page>……展现那唯有我等能传授的绝技……<page>……证明自己更像织者，而非沃姆……
translated_text: ...あなたの技術を見せてください。<page>...私たちだけが教えることができるので、素晴らしいです。<page>...悪魔よりもウィーバーに似ていることを証明する。
secondary_translated_text: ... Please show me your skills.<page>... It's great because only we can teach it.<page>... Prove that he is more like Weaver than the Devil.

original_en_text: At water’s source,<br>And coral’s heart,<br>Our lord born last to rule.
original_zh_text: 水源尽头，<br>珊瑚心核，<br>末生之主将临。
translated_text: 水源地では、<br>珊瑚の心臓、<br>主は統治するために生まれた。
secondary_translated_text: In water sources,<br>The heart of coral,<br>The Lord was born to reign.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……皆是谎言……
translated_text: ...彼女は私たちを娘と呼ぶ-私たちを神聖と呼ぶ。嘘をついた
secondary_translated_text: ... She calls us daughters - she calls us holy. i lied to you.

translated_text: ...子供たち..。ウィーバー
secondary_translated_text: ... The children... Weaver

translated_text: ...一心に。労働組合。
secondary_translated_text: ... wholeheartedly. Trade unions.

translated_text: ...子供たち..。蜘蛛は..。
secondary_translated_text: ... The children... The spider is...

original_en_text: ...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
original_zh_text: ……唉……蜘蛛之子……<page>……你必定认为我等冷酷……认为我等无情且固执……<page>……但我等必须如此，此为实现期愿之代价……
translated_text: ...ああ...。蜘蛛の子。<page>...私たちのアプローチには厳しいと思います。私たちは無関心で悔い改めないと思うでしょう。<page>...だから私たちは見てみましょう。それは私たちの願いの代価だからです。
secondary_translated_text: ... ah... The child of the spider.<page>... I think it's tough on our approach. We will think that we are indifferent and unrepentant.<page>... So let's take a look. Because it is the price of our wishes.

translated_text: ...彼らの記憶。
secondary_translated_text: ... Their memories.

translated_text: ...殻を縛る。
secondary_translated_text: ... Tie the shell.

translated_text: ...彼らの声。彼らの歌。
secondary_translated_text: ... Their voices. Their song.

translated_text: ...育ててください。立ち上がれ!
secondary_translated_text: ... Please cultivate it. stand up!

translated_text: ...永遠の献身。
secondary_translated_text: ... Eternal devotion.

translated_text: ...魂を縛る。
secondary_translated_text: ... Binding the soul.

translated_text: ...全員を縛ります。
secondary_translated_text: ... I tie everyone up.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……
translated_text: ...彼女は私たちを娘と呼ぶ-彼女は私たちを神聖と呼ぶ。
secondary_translated_text: ... She calls us daughters - she calls us sacred.

original_en_text: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
original_zh_text: ……我等即生命……我等即生长……无我则世如荒土……
translated_text: ...私たちは生命です。成長しています私たちのいない世界？
secondary_translated_text: ... We are the life. growing in a world without us?

translated_text: ...起きて起きて
secondary_translated_text: ... wake up, wake up.

translated_text: ...さあ、子供たちよ、私たちの目覚めを目撃してください。
secondary_translated_text: ... Come, my children, witness our awakening.

original_en_text: ...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world, you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
original_zh_text: ……尚可……精进……<page>……你仍需更快一些……<page>……终有一日，畏惧你本性者将至……欲夺你本性者将至……<page>……欲存于世，须学蛰刺……快如闪电……
translated_text: ...よし...。より良い..。<page>...しかし、もっと速くする必要があります。<page>...やがて彼らはあなたのところに来る。あなたの本性を恐れている人たち、そしてあなたの本性を主張しようとする人たち。<page>...私たちの世界で生き残るためには、刺すことを学ばなければなりません。速くて突然。
secondary_translated_text: ... okay, okay. The better the...<page>... However, we need to do it faster.<page>... In time they will come to you. Those who fear your nature, and those who try to assert your nature.<page>... In order to survive in our world, we must learn to sting. Quick and suddenly.

original_en_text: ...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
original_zh_text: ……以爪粉碎……以爪统治……以爪拯救众生……
translated_text: ...我们的爪破坏目前我们的爪支配。私たちの爪は彼らを救った。
secondary_translated_text: ... Our claws are destroying our current claws. Our claws saved them, and they were saved.

original_en_text: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...
translated_text: ...ダンスを踊る。愛と終わり。一緒に。
secondary_translated_text: ... They dance. Love and end. together.

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.<br> That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>愿这烈焰原野焚尽一切污秽。<br>赐你升入苍翠之地的权利。
translated_text: 巡礼者のこと<br>この火は汚れたものを燃やしますように。<br>上の緑地に着陸する権利があります。
secondary_translated_text: about the pilgrims.<br>May this fire burn the filthy things.<br>You have the right to land in the green space above.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要癫狂之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ...子供が狂ったらもっといいのにないよりはましだ。
secondary_translated_text: ... It's better not to have a child than to be mad.

translated_text: ...蜘蛛の姉妹。歌は続く。
secondary_translated_text: ... The Spider's Sister. The song goes on.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun frail... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要脆弱之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ...弱い子になる方が何もないよりはましだ。
secondary_translated_text: ... It is better to be a weak child than nothing.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun pure... than them...
translated_text: ...純粋な子供の方が良い。彼らよりも
secondary_translated_text: ... A pure child is better. more than they are.

translated_text: ...我々のものだ永遠に縛られる。
secondary_translated_text: ... Our own will be bound forever.

original_en_text: ...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
translated_text: ...彼女の光のために永遠に。歌は続く。
secondary_translated_text: ... Forever for her light. The song continues.

translated_text: ...それを感じた。
secondary_translated_text: ... I felt it.

original_en_text: We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 此乃使者大人祈愿，<br>宣告纪元终结到来。<page>圣堂倾颓君威下，<br>骸营覆灭黑丝劫。<page>焦土边际髓骨灼，<br>纺塔孤医灰沼别。<page>囚笼首罪逆丝客，<br>霜心振翼费岳阙。 <page>摇篮极顶终试炼，<br>菌主临鉴纪元歇。
translated_text: 先人たちの願いを伝え、<br>時代の終わりに署名する人。<br><page>王権が教会の手に渡った後、<br>キャンプは黒い線で覆われ、<page>焦げた土の縁、貝殻は黒く焼け、<br>タワーは回転し、近くの外科医は拒否された。<page>檻の中に横たわっている男は絹に怒っていた。<br>霜の中心から落ち、高く舞い上がる。<page>ゆりかごの頂上と最後の体力テストの後、<br>時は過ぎ去り、それがその証です。
secondary_translated_text: to express the wishes of the ancients,<br>The person who signs at the end of the era.<br><page>When the kingdom came into the hands of the Church,<br>The camp is covered with black lines,<page>The edge of the scorched earth, the shell burned black,<br>The tower turned around and a nearby surgeon was refused.<page>The man lying in the cage was angry with the silk.<br>Falling from the center of the frost and soaring high.<page>After the top of the crib and the final fitness test,<br>Time passes, and that is the proof.

original_en_text: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
original_zh_text: ……昔日狩猎……昔日咏唱……我的孩子，我曾见你们辉煌……
translated_text: ...狩りをする。どう歌うか。私の子供たち、お会いできて光栄です
secondary_translated_text: ... They hunt. How to sing? My children, it is a pleasure to meet you.

original_en_text: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
translated_text: ...私たちのシルク。生まれながらの忠実な子供。
secondary_translated_text: ... Our Silk. A faithful child born.

original_en_text: <hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
original_zh_text: <hpage>使者竟也踏足此地……<hpage>若他在此现身，巨变或浩劫将无可避免。除此之外，他目空一切……
translated_text: <hpage>だから、ヘルド纸もこの地を见学した。<hpage>もし彼が今ここにいるなら、大きな変化や野蛮な結末は避けられない。彼は他の物を见たくない。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>So, the Held Paper also visited the area.<hpage>If he's here now, big changes and a barbaric end are inevitable. He doesn't want to look at other things.

original_en_text: Ah... I understand, stranger. I presume too much of one who is not a flea.<page>I’ve heard the settlement below us is setting up a wishwall. Perhaps I’ll send Grishkin down to hang up our wish...<page>
original_zh_text: 唉……我明白。对外族提这种要求太过分了。<page>听说下面营地建了祈愿墙，我让格里什琴去挂上我们的愿望吧……
translated_text: あっ...。わかったよ、よそ者。私はノミではない人に多くの意見を持っています。<page>下の集落には願いの壁が建っているそうです。おそらく私はグリシュキンを派遣して私たちの願いを掛けるべきだったのだろう。<page>
secondary_translated_text: ah... I see you, stranger. I have a lot of opinions on people who are not flea.<page>It is said that a wall of wishes is built in the village below. Perhaps I should have sent Gryshkin to hang up our wishes. "<page>

original_en_text: Bug not flea, my learnings, all have been scratched to your maps. Can give no more.<page>Leave now! Seek and save lost fleas, for a caravan full and whole!
original_zh_text: 外族虫，位置都标在你图上了。没其他的了。<page>快去吧！找到那些迷途跳蚤，凑满旅团！
translated_text: ワームはノミではない、私のレッスンはあなたの地図に描かれている。これ以上はない。<page>今すぐ行け!失われたノミを見つけて救助し、完全なキャラバンを構築!
secondary_translated_text: Worms are not fleas, my lesson is drawn on your map. There is no more.<page>go now! Find and rescue the lost fleas and build a complete caravan!

original_en_text: Have you met her yet? Our burly new companion, Vog! Fresh returned from a long time spent tracking.<hpage>We have met, Fleamaster. It gladdens me that so strong a flea exists as her.<hpage>Yours was a caravan sorely lacking for protection, and I am too bound by my own tasks to provide it for you.<page>Why, we would never impose so! And now, no matter! Her scent may be strong, and her taste for brew bottomless, but her skill is sharp.<page>If predators draw close, her talents will provide much confidence to our caravan.
original_zh_text: 见过我们的新成员沃葛了吗？她的追踪术很是了得！<hpage>见过了。有这般强力的跳蚤存在，我也轻松一些。<hpage>毕竟你们旅团缺少护卫，而我又有要务在身。<page>怎么敢劳烦您！放心吧，虽然沃葛经常臭烘烘的，又嗜酒，但本事过硬。<page>如果有掠食者靠近，她的本领能安大伙的心。
translated_text: 見たことある？私たちの素晴らしい新しいパートナー Vogue!長い追跡から戻ってきた。<hpage>見たことあるよ、フレイマスター。私は彼女のような強いノミがいて嬉しいです。<hpage>あなたの車は保護されない。私は使命に縛られてあなたを守れない。<page>なぜ、私たちは決してそのようなものを強制しない!今は大丈夫だ!彼女の匂いは強く、ビールの味は計り知れないが、彼女の技術は鋭い。<page>プレデターが接近すれば、彼女の才能はチームに大きな自信を与えるでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: have you seen it? Our great new partner Vogue! He came back from a long chase.<hpage>I've seen it before, Freemaster. I'm glad I have a strong flea like her.<hpage>Your car is not protected. I cannot protect you because I am bound by my mission.<page>Why, we would never force such a thing! I'm okay now! Her smell is strong and the taste of beer is immeasurable, but her technique is sharp.<page>If Predator approaches, her talent will give the team a lot of confidence.

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You could help find! And bring! For all to come together now that times turn dark...<page>But no map you hold! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......<page>但你没有地图！想要情报，先准备地图。在此之前无可奉告。
translated_text: あなたが留まるなら、虫はノミではないか。私のサービスをお願いしますよね？私は洞窟の中で失われた小さなものを聞いたり匂いを嗅いだりする場所について多くを学びました<page>見つけるのを手伝うことができます!ここに持ってこい時代は変わり、私たちは団結しています。<page>でも地図がない!学びたければ、地図が必要です。それまでは何もできません。
secondary_translated_text: If you stay, aren't the bugs fleas? you're asking for my services, aren't you? I've learned a lot about the places in the lost caves where I hear and smell little things.<page>We can help you find them! Bring it here Times have changed, and we are united.<page>But no map! If you want to learn, you need a map. Until then we can do nothing.

original_en_text: Our travels have end, and now soon the world will also have end! At such bitter of times, brew with friends is most sweet.
original_zh_text: 旅途结束，世界也要完蛋了！这种苦涩的时候，跟朋友一起喝药酿最甜。
translated_text: 私たちの旅は終わり、世界は終わりに近づいています!この困難な日に、友人と醸造することは最も甘いことです。
secondary_translated_text: Our journey is over, and the world is nearing its end! On this difficult day, brewing with friends is the sweetest thing.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Heh heh!<page>The Fleamaster, that old bore, tells me to call you Miss Hornet. But such a prickly name ill befits such a delicate beauty! Shall I call you something prettier, like ‘Nectarsweet’, my dear?<hpage>You shall not. Address me by my name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course! Heh heh. And now, I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！全托你的福！亲爱的小甜心！嘿嘿！<page>跳蚤首领那老古板让我称呼你为大黄蜂小姐。但这带刺的名字配不上娇花！叫你"蜜糖甜心"如何？<hpage>当然不行。要么称呼我的本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>再び、ミスター·フライ。無事にこの護衛隊に加わることができます。<page>ああ!はい!コメントありがとうございました。ダーリン、ダーリン、あなた!えっ!!<page>ノミの王様、あの退屈な老人は、ミス·バンブルと呼ばせてくれたが、そのような魅力的な名前は、そのような美しい人にはふさわしくない!もっと素敵な名前をつけましょうか？<hpage>すべきではない名前で呼ぶか、まったく呼ばないか。<page>グラダック、もちろん、もちろん!さて私の小さな秘密をお話ししましょう私の馬車は癒しのスパを兼ねていますこれが一番賢い。<page>中の水は、詩よりも純粋です!えっ!!私はあなたを入れて喜んで、高価ではない!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Again, Mr. Fly. You can join this escort safely.<page>oh! yes! Thank you for your comments. Darling, darling, you! what?!<page>The king of fleas, that dull old man, had me call Miss Bumble, but such a charming name is not fit for such a beautiful person! can we give you a nicer name?<hpage>Do you call them by a name you shouldn't, or don't call them at all?<page>Gradack, of course, of course! Now, let me tell you my little secret: my carriage doubles as a healing spa, which is the smartest.<page>The water in it is purer than poetry! what?! I'm happy to put you in, not expensive!

original_en_text: Dear one, how shameful for the world to end while poor Kratt still has so much living left in him!<page>But how sweet of you to join me here! Will you play the Flea Bounce game, that I may appreciate the beauty of your agile form while I await my doom?<page>To play is simple. Leap up and keep bouncing on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，可惜末日来得太早，可怜的克拉特还没活够呢！<page>但有甜心你在就好！要玩这跳蚤蹦蹦的游戏吗？我想欣赏你美丽灵巧的身姿呢！<page>规则很简单，跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: 親愛なる皆さん、かわいそうなクラートが多くの命を残した時、世界の終わりは何と恥ずべきことでしょう!<page>でも、参加できてよかったです!ノミバウンスをしますか？そうすれば、あなたの敏捷性を賞賛し、運命を待つことができますか？<page>演奏は簡単です。ジャンプして、できるだけ長くノミの上にジャンプしてください!
secondary_translated_text: My dear ones, how shameful the end of the world will be, when poor Crat has left so many lives!<page>But I'm glad I was able to attend! Do you want to bounce flea? Then you can admire your agility and wait for your fate?<page>Playing is easy. Jump up and jump on the flea as long as you can!

original_en_text: Strange beasts prowl these grey lands. I hear them roar and shriek outside camp. Is best to stay inside and make quiet.
original_zh_text: 这片灰地时常能听见怪物吼叫，最好待在营地里别出声。
translated_text: 奇妙な獣が灰色の土地を歩き回っていた。キャンプの外で彼らの叫び声が聞こえました。中にいて静かにしてください。
secondary_translated_text: A strange beast was roaming the gray land. I could hear their screams outside the camp. Please stay inside and be quiet.

translated_text: Flea Dodgersとは
secondary_translated_text: Who are the Flea Dodgers?

original_en_text: At longest last, have our flea roamings ended! Every sandy grain and stinky squelchy maggot was worth to endure, to claim such a home!<page>Is time for rest and celebrate, and none have earned such more than you, Miss Hornet! Raise your flask and drink most heartily with us!
original_zh_text: 终于不用流浪了！这一路上吃沙喝风忍蛆虫都值了！<page>是时候庆祝了！大黄蜂小姐，和我们一起举杯吧！
translated_text: ついに、私たちのノミの旅は終わりました!すべての砂利とすべての悪臭のきしみのウジ虫は、そのような家と同様に耐える価値があります!<page>休憩とお祝いの時間です誰もあなたより多くのお金を稼ぐことはできませんミス·ホーネット!ボトルを上げて一緒に飲みましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Finally, our flea journey is over! All the gravel and all the stinking tick worms are worth enduring as well as such a house!<page>It's time to rest and celebrate. No one can make more money than you, Miss Hornet! Let's raise the bottle and drink it together!

original_en_text: We will camp here in these grey lands until more fleas find their way to the caravan. Please lend your aid to any of our fellows you find lost out on the roads!
original_zh_text: 我们会在这灰地扎营，直到更多同胞归队。请继续帮助寻找迷途的跳蚤！
translated_text: より多くのノミがキャラバンを見つけるまで、我々はこの灰色の土地で宿営する。道に迷った人を助けてください!
secondary_translated_text: Until more fleas find the caravan, we will camp out in this gray land. Please help those who are lost in the way!

original_en_text: <hpage>I am travelling these lands for my own reasons, Fleamaster. However, if I happen upon any fleas on my travels, I will aid them as best I can.<page>Oh, oh, I could ask for nothing more! They must all be hiding or stuck in dangerous places, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here to us.<page>May the kingdom bless your travels and keep you safe, stranger! You are welcome to rest here with us whenever the roads bring you back!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的旅途有自己的目的，但若路遇跳蚤，会尽力相助。<page>那就足够了！他们肯定是困在各处险地，只要脱困就会自己寻路归来。<page>愿王国庇佑您旅途平安！也随时欢迎您回来歇息！
translated_text: <hpage>フライマスター、私は自分の理由でこの土地を旅しました。しかし、旅行中にノミに遭遇した場合は、できる限りのことをします。<page>“ああ、これ以上は求められない!彼らは皆危険な場所に隠れているか閉じ込められているに違いないが、彼らを起こしてくれれば必ず我々の道を見つけるだろう。<page>王国があなたの旅を祝福し、あなたの安全を守りますように。道が戻ってくるたびに、私たちと一緒に休むことを歓迎します。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, I have traveled this land for my own reasons. However, if you encounter fleas while traveling, do what you can.<page>"Oh, no more can be asked for!" They must all be hiding or locked up in dangerous places, but if you wake them up, they will surely find our way. "<page>May the kingdom bless your journey and keep you safe. Whenever the road returns, we welcome you to rest with us.

original_en_text: The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! I’m told it’s good luck to bring a guest along when travelling, so we must have you to thank!<page>I trust the trip was agreeable for you. A pleasure perhaps? Nestled in with our dear little ones...<hpage>They certainly make for energetic travel companions. I’ve not often had opportunity to socialise with such spirited sorts.<page>Splendid! And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 这趟旅途虽长，但没丢一只跳蚤！听说带贵客同行能带来好运，肯定是您的功劳！<page>旅途可还舒适？和小家伙们挤在一起挺开心吧？<hpage>他们确实精力旺盛，我很少和这么活泼的旅伴打交道。<page>那就好！现在去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: ここまで来るのは長い道のりでしたが、ノミを失わなかった!旅行にゲストを連れて行くと幸運が訪れると聞いていますので、ありがとうございます!<page>この旅はあなたを幸せにするでしょう。面白いかもしれない私たちの大切な子供たちと一緒に。<hpage>エネルギッシュな旅行者には最適です。こんなに活発な人と交流する機会はめったにありません。<page>それは素晴らしい!沸騰した大釜のそばに座っているグリシキンに会いに行かなければならない。長い旅の後は、飲み会!
secondary_translated_text: It was a long way to get here, but we didn't lose the flea! I've heard that taking guests on a trip brings you good luck, so thank you!<page>This trip will make you happy. With our precious children, which may be fun.<hpage>It is perfect for energetic travelers. I rarely have the opportunity to interact with such an active person.<page>That's awesome! I must go to see Grisikin, who is sitting by the boiling kettle. After a long trip, a drink!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of Flea Brew. You know what such means! You must have drink! Har har!<page>When you have finish drinking, return and we will fill flask again! I’m is always brewing!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你身上的药酿还满着呢，得先喝光！<page>喝完了就回来找我！我这儿药酿管够！
translated_text: ミス·ホーネットあなたのボトルはノミビールでいっぱいです意味が分かりますね!飲まなきゃ!!ハハハ!<page>飲み終わったら、また補充します!ずっと計画してた!
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of flea beer. You know what I mean! I have to drink it! ha ha ha!<page>When I finish drinking, I will replenish it! I've been planning it all along!

original_en_text: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I’m not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!
original_zh_text: 大伙总爱担心那些迷途的同胞，我才不愁！该来的自会找来，没来谁又数得清？哈哈！
translated_text: 仲間は他のノミを心配していますが、私は全く心配していません。彼らは私たちの道を見つけるでしょう、そうでなければ誰が覚えていますか？ハハハ!
secondary_translated_text: My companion is worried about the other fleas, but I am not worried at all. They'll find our way, or else who remembers? ha ha ha!

original_en_text: Ahh, and before the road steals you away from us again, allow me to offer you a humble gift!<page>One of the little ones found a pale artefact while digging about in the sands. A spiny, cold sort of thing.<page>I see no use in it for we fleas, so of course we are all too pleased, eager even, to bestow it upon our dear friend!
original_zh_text: 趁您还没走，请收下这份薄礼！<page>有个小家伙在沙地里挖到件苍白古物，冷冰冰带尖刺。<page>对我们没用，正好赠予挚友！
translated_text: ああ、この道が再びあなたを私たちから連れ去る前に、私はあなたに謙虚な贈り物を与えます。<page>小さな男の一人は、砂を掘っているときに青白い遺物を見つけました。冷たくて冷たいものです。<page>私たちノミには役に立たないと思うので、もちろん私たちは喜んでいて、大切な友達にあげたいとさえ思っています!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, before this road takes you away from us again, I will give you a humble gift.<page>One of the little men found a pale relic while digging in the sand. It's cold and cold.<page>I don't think it's useful to us fleas, so of course we're happy and even want to give it to a dear friend!

original_en_text: For your hard efforts and eternal friendship, please accept these meagre rosaries as reward.<page>Think of we fleas when you find chance to trade them!
original_zh_text: 为了酬谢您的辛劳，请收下这些念珠。<page>旅途上别忘了我们跳蚤，朋友！
translated_text: あなたの勤勉さと永遠の友情のために、このささやかなロザリオをご褒美として受け取ってください。<page>ノミを取引する機会があれば、私たちのノミを考えてください!
secondary_translated_text: Please accept this humble Rosary as a reward for your hard work and eternal friendship.<page>If you have the opportunity to trade fleas, consider our fleas!

original_en_text: Dear one, my lone light amongst the darkness! Will you bathe in Kratt’s spa-carriage and let the warm waters wash away your worries?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的！黑暗中的明灯！可愿光临克拉特的温泉车厢，让暖流洗去烦忧？
translated_text: 親愛なる人よ、暗闇の中の私の孤独の光! Clutterのスパカーで入浴して、暖かい水で悩みを洗い流してみませんか？
secondary_translated_text: My dear one, my lonely light in the darkness! Why don't you take a bath in a Clutter spa car and wash off your troubles with warm water?

original_en_text: Please, my dear, step inside! I will stand guard here while you bathe... Right on this very spot!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，请进吧！我就在这为你站岗……寸步不离！
translated_text: ハニー、入ってください!お風呂に入るとき私はここで見張りをしていますここにいます!
secondary_translated_text: Honey, please come in! When you take a bath, I'm here to keep watch. Here I am!

original_en_text: Dodeshna. Want for shelter from the thick, grey air? Is heavy, and wet. I’m worry for the little flea’s health in this land.<page>And they make play in the filthy water. I say them stop, but they just laugh and splash on me. They are lack respect!<hpage>Most bugs instinctively obey those with strength and will. Speak with authority, or your commands may go unheeded.<page>Ugh... really, is Fleamaster’s job to teach the fleas such. I will just have rest here until is time to move on.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳。要来避一避吗？这的空气又闷又湿，小跳蚤们要生病了。<page>他们还玩脏水，说了也不听，反而溅我一身！没大没小！<hpage>虫类大多听从强者，你得用权威口吻。<page>唉……这本是首领该做的。我还是好好休息等旅团出发吧。
translated_text: ドディシュナー。灰色の空気を避けたいですか？重くて濡れている。私はこの地域の小さなノミの健康を心配します。<page>汚い水で遊んでいる。私は彼らに止めるように言ったが、彼らはただ笑って水を投げた。敬意が足りない!<hpage>ほとんどの昆虫は本能的に強さと意志を持つものに従う。当局に相談しないと、命令が無視されます。<page>うーん...。実際、Fleamasterの仕事はノミを教えることです。私は前に進むまでここで休むつもりです。
secondary_translated_text: Doddishner. Do you want to avoid the grey air? It's heavy and wet. I am concerned about the health of the little fleas in this area.<page>Playing in dirty water. I told them to stop, but they just laughed and threw water. Not enough respect!<hpage>Most insects instinctively follow those with strength and will. If you do not consult the authorities, your orders will be ignored.<page>um... In fact, Fleamaster's job is to teach fleas. I'm going to rest here until I move on.

original_en_text: Away then, bug. Await challenger, shall I.
original_zh_text: 那就走吧。我会等下一个挑战者。
translated_text: 出て行け、虫。挑戦者を待つ。
secondary_translated_text: Get out, bug. Waiting for a challenger.

original_en_text: Vikna! Our little game has ended. But I trust, after a short rest, you will play with us again?
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束。不过你应该还没尽全力吧，休息会儿再战？
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!私たちの小さなゲームは終わった。でも、短い休憩の後、また一緒に遊んでくれると思います。
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! Our little game is over. But after a short break, I think we'll play with them again.

translated_text: ジャグリングする
secondary_translated_text: juggling.

original_en_text: Ahh! Do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help gather the lonely fleas to our caravan? Truly?
original_zh_text: 啊！我没听错吧？您愿意帮忙召集流落各处的跳蚤？当真？
translated_text: あっ! あっ!見知らぬ人、私はあなたの意味を理解するか。私たちのキャラバンに孤独なノミを集めるのを手伝ってくれませんか？ホントに？
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! Stranger, do I understand what you mean? Will you help us collect the lonely fleas in our caravan? really?

original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！跳蚤的救星！我们等候您很久了！<page>看看这块宝地！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット!私たちの救世主!ぜひお越しください。<page>見てごらん!近くの土地の暗闇と死を除けば、あなたが私たちに与えてくれたこの美しい場所は安全です。ノミが賢く、強くなる場所。<page>ファルムにはこれ以上の定住地がないので、ここで旅を終えます。<hpage>この場所が正しいと嬉しいよ、マスター·ノミ。ノミが生き残ることを知ることは平和なことです。ほとんどのファル昆虫は、より悲劇的な運命にあるようです。<page>本当にそうです!希望に満ちた未来が待っている!あなた自身とあなたの努力のためだけに。私たちの到着を記念して、私はあなたに小さなサービスを提供することを嬉しく思います。<page>裁縫を習っていて、ノミが材料を集めてくれました。私はあなたのバッグに余分なポケットを追加して、あなたの旅行をより簡単にすることができると思います。<page>あなたが値するよりもはるかに少ない小さな仕事ですが、私はまだそれがあなたを満足させたいです!
secondary_translated_text: miss hornet! Our Savior! " Please come and visit us.<page>look at it! Except for the darkness and death of the land nearby, this beautiful place you have given us is safe. A place where fleas become wise and strong.<page>We end our journey here, as there is no more settlement in the farm.<hpage>I am glad this place is right, Master Nami. It is peaceful to know that the fleas will survive. Most falcon insects seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>It really is! A future full of hope awaits us! Only for yourself and your efforts. In commemoration of our arrival, I am pleased to offer you a small service.<page>I was learning how to sew, and fleas collected the materials for me. I think you can add an extra pocket to your bag to make your travel easier.<page>It's a small job much less than you deserve, but I still want it to satisfy you!

original_en_text: <hpage>I know not what you plan, Fleamaster, and at this time I cannot participate.<page>Ahhhh. Ahhhhhhh! Wretches, wretches, all of us! How can we begin without you, dear friend?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不知您作何打算，跳蚤首领，但此刻我无法参与庆典。<page>啊啊啊！可惜啊，这太令我们难过了！没有您这位挚友，庆典如何开始？
translated_text: <hpage>あなたの計画が何であるかはわかりませんが、今は参加できません。<page>あっ! あっ!かわいそうなもの、かわいそうなもの、私たち全員!親愛なる友よ、どうやって始めますか？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I don't know what your plans are, but I can't participate right now.<page>ah! ah! Poor thing, poor thing, all of us! Dear friends, how do we begin?

original_en_text: Gathered here we are, to honour the grand champion of this very final of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Hornet! Strike the great effigy with all your might!
original_zh_text: 我们相聚于此，为这末日庆典的总冠军加冕！<page>大黄蜂小姐，现在请全力击打巨像！
translated_text: 私たちはすべてのフェスティバルの最後のチャンピオンに敬意を表します!<page>さあ、ミス·バンブルビー!全力を尽くして大きな像を打ち上げろ!
secondary_translated_text: We pay tribute to the last champion of all the festivals!<page>Come on, Miss Bumblebee! Do all you can to launch a big statue!

original_en_text: The little fleas like this place most of all. They are as much happy as I ever hear them!
original_zh_text: 小家伙们非常喜欢这地方！我从没听他们这么欢腾过！
translated_text: 小さなノミはこの場所が一番好きです。こんなに幸せなのは聞いたことがない。
secondary_translated_text: The little fleas like this place the best. I've never heard of you being so happy.

original_en_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our marvellous troupe! Their numbers full. Their spirits bright. All thanks to your heroic efforts!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看，我们壮盛的队伍！跳蚤们无一遗漏，个个精神饱满，全仰赖您的英勇相助！
translated_text: ああ、親愛なる友人、ミス·ホーネット、私たちの素晴らしい劇団を見てください!その数はすでにいっぱいです。彼らの魂は明るい。皆さんの勇敢な努力のおかげです!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our wonderful troupe! That number is already full. Their souls are bright. Thanks to all of you for your brave efforts!

translated_text: ノミのジャンプ？
secondary_translated_text: the flea jump?

original_en_text: Another journey complete! And a new, high spot for our rest, upon the doorstep of that mighty Citadel, no less!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! Maybe it was your company that brought us luck, Miss Hornet? It surely put us fleas at ease to have you and your weapon riding close.
original_zh_text: 又一趟旅程结束了！这次竟然停在了圣堡门廊这样的高处！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！或许是您带来的好运？有您持械护卫，大伙安心不少。
translated_text: 旅は再び終わった!ここは私たちが休息する新しい高地、その強大な城の入り口です!<hpage>幸運なことに、あなたの仲間は皆、長い旅を生き延びた、フライマスター。隣の遠吠えと目の前のもつれた木は、無数の昆虫の命を奪った。<page>本当にそうです!危険が上がる!あなたの会社は幸運をもたらしたかもしれませんミス·ホーネット？あなたとあなたの武器の近くにいることは確かに私たちを安心させる。
secondary_translated_text: The journey is over again! This is the new highland where we rest, the entrance to its mighty castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived the long journey, Flymaster. The barking of the neighbor and the tangled trees in front of him took the lives of countless insects.<page>It really is! Danger is rising! your company may have brought you some luck, miss hornet? Being near you and your weapons certainly reassures us. "

original_en_text: Oh, and look, Miss Hornet, look at how many lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 噢对了，大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: 見て、ミス·バンブルビー、何人のノミがいるか見てください!最後の数人が今、私たちと一緒にいるようです。
secondary_translated_text: Look, Miss Bumblebee, and see how many fleas there are! " The last few seem to be with us now.

original_en_text: Ah! Aha! A native of these fiery lowlands approaches! Have no fear, my friend, we fleas are but humble travellers!<hpage>Well met, sir, though like you I am not of these lands. I am merely journeying through.<page>Oh. Oho! A kindred spirit! It’s good luck for wanderers to meet on an unfamiliar path.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！是这片灼热低地的原住民！别怕朋友，我们跳蚤都是卑微的旅者！<hpage>幸会，不过我和你一样只是途经此地。<page>噢！原来也是流浪旅者！听说路遇同道是好兆头呢！
translated_text: あっ! あっ!ああ、ああ!この暑い低地からの地元の人々が近づいています!恐れるな、友よ、私たちノミは謙虚な旅人に過ぎない。<hpage>私はあなたと同じようにこの国の出身ですが、私はとても幸せです。私はただ旅行した。<page>ああ! ああ!志を同じくする人!放浪者にとって、見知らぬ道で出会うことは幸運です。
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! Oh, oh, oh! The locals from this hot lowland are approaching! Fear not, my friend, we fleas are but humble travelers.<hpage>I come from this country, just like you, but I am very happy. I was just travelling.<page>oh! oh! People with the same mindset! For a vagabond, it is a good fortune to meet him on an unfamiliar road.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dear one, dodeshna! Heh heh! Have you returned to use Kratt’s luxurious spa-carriage? I’ve kept it roastily warm for you...
original_zh_text: 多德什纳亲爱的！要来泡克拉特的豪华车厢温泉吗？泉水一直为你温着呢！
translated_text: ドデシュナー、ダーリン、ドデシュナー!えっ!!クラートのスパ车を使って帰ってきたのか私はもうあなたのために热く烧いている
secondary_translated_text: Dodechner, darling, Dodechner! what?! i'm already burning hot for you. i'm already burning hot for you.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, and the Flea Juggle champion has set an even higher score! Tremble in awe, dear fleas, at the might of our dear Miss Hornet!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，耍耍记录刷新！颤抖吧跳蚤们，见证大黄蜂小姐的实力！
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!コンテストは終了し、フリーボードのチャンピオンはより高いスコアを作成しました!親愛なるノミよ、畏敬の念で震える、私たちの親愛なるミス·バンブルの力!
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! The contest is over, and the champion of the freeboard has created a higher score! My dear Flea, trembling in awe, our dear Miss Bumble Power!

original_en_text: There are many lost and lonely fleas still scattered across this kingdom. If only some more of them joined us, the caravan could continue its journey.<page>You’ll find the little dears in all sorts of strange places, for they love to peek and pry and play, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here!
original_zh_text: 还有太多同胞流落四方。如果能多召集些，旅团就能继续前行。<page>那些小家伙总爱躲在古怪角落玩耍，但被发现就会自己寻路回来！
translated_text: 王国にはまだ多くの失われた孤独なノミが点在する。より多くの人が参加すれば、チームは前進します。<page>彼らはのぞき見、のぞき見、遊ぶのが大好きなので、さまざまな奇妙な場所でこれらの小さな赤ちゃんを見つけるでしょうが、あなたが彼らを目覚めさせると、彼らはここで道を見つけるでしょう!
secondary_translated_text: The kingdom is still dotted with many lost lonely flea. If more people participate, the team moves forward.<page>They love to peek, peek and play, so they will find these little babies in various strange places, but once you wake them up, they will find their way here!

original_en_text: Those great rumbles from beneath, they have sound similar to giant beast. Such beast is much sorrowful though, I am think.<page>Fleas and monsters alike have their troubles...
original_zh_text: 下面传来的轰隆声，像巨兽哀嚎。或许长得越大，悲伤也就越大吧。<page>跳蚤和怪物各有各的苦……
translated_text: 巨大な獣のような巨大な轟音が下から聞こえた。しかし、そのような獣は悲しいと思う。<page>ノミやモンスターには問題があります。
secondary_translated_text: A huge roar, like a huge beast, could be heard from below. But I think such beasts are sad.<page>Fleas and monsters have a problem.

original_en_text: <hpage>The Fleamaster and his caravan sought for caves offering space and safety. This calm lake and shore may prove suitable.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤旅团在寻找宽敞又安全的驻地，这片湖岸看着很合适。
translated_text: <hpage>フレックマスターと彼のキャラバンは空間と安全を提供する洞窟を探す。この穏やかな湖と海岸が適しています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flexmaster and his caravan search for caves that offer space and safety. This serene lake and coast are suitable.

original_en_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Wonder at how large our caravan has grown! So bold and boisterous! This gilded chamber can barely contain us all!<page>The many fleas are itching to journey once more, to find a space to stretch their wings. But from here, as their leader, I am hesitant to order us so swiftly away.<page>These heights hold too much danger to set forth without a safe goal held clear in mind.<page>What of you, Miss Hornet? Your tasks carry you throughout this kingdom. Have you ever encountered a place appropriate?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！看旅团现在多热闹！这金色大厅都快装不下了！<page>大伙急着再次启程找个宽敞的地方，但身为领袖，我不敢贸然行动。<page>高地危机四伏，没有明确目标不能冒险。<page>您有什么看法？您走遍了纺络，可曾遇见过合适的去处？
translated_text: ああ、ミス·ホーネット!チームがどこまで成長したのか知りたい!大胆で活発!この金色の部屋には私たち全員が収容できません!<page>多くのノミは再び移動し、翼を広げるスペースを探します。しかし、ここから、彼らの指導者として、私は躊躇し、すぐに去るよう命じました。<page>明確な安全目標がなければ、これらの高度は危険すぎます。<page>あなたはミス·ホーネットあなたの使命は王国を旅することです。適切な場所を見つけましたか？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! I want to know how far the team has grown! Bold and Active! This golden room can't hold all of us!<page>Many fleas move again and look for space to spread their wings. But from here, as their leader, I hesitated, and ordered them to leave immediately.<page>Without a clear safety goal, these altitudes are too dangerous.<page>You are Miss Hornet and your mission is to travel the kingdom. Have you found the right place?

original_en_text: We will camp here a time before moving onward. These moments of safety and calm must be treasured, rare as they are.
original_zh_text: 我们会在这里暂驻。安宁时光难得，要好好珍惜。
translated_text: しばらくここでキャンプをして、先に進みます。これらの安全と静けさの瞬間は、まれですが大切にしなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: We'll camp here for a while, then move on. These moments of safety and tranquility are rare, but we must cherish them.

original_en_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at how many of the lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: ああ、私の親愛なる友人、ミス·ホーネット、失われたノミの数を見てください!最後の数人が今、私たちと一緒にいるようです。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at the number of fleas lost! The last few seem to be with us now.

original_en_text: And now that we have met, know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, leader of this caravan!<page>Our own journey has barely begun, but you are most welcome to tarry here a while, stranger. Where ways are dark and winding, good bugs must stay close together!
original_zh_text: 既然相遇，容我介绍——我是跳蚤首领穆什卡，旅团领袖！<page>我们刚启程不久，但欢迎您在此歇息。现在外面混乱得很，好虫子们应抱团取暖！
translated_text: 今、私たちはこのチームのキャプテンであるFleamaster Mooshkaだと知っています!<page>私たち自身の旅はまだ始まったばかりですが、しばらくここにいてください。暗い曲がりくねった場所では、良い昆虫は互いに抱き合う必要があります!
secondary_translated_text: Now we know that we are Fleamaster Mooshka, the captain of this team!<page>Our own journey is only just beginning, but please stay here for a while. In a dark, winding place, good insects need to embrace each other!

original_en_text: The bellowing sandy land was full of much danger. We was almost lost poor Varga to hungry worms as we travel up!<page>Sadly, he is finding way here after all. Har! Is only jest. Grishkin and Varga is great friends, just like all fleas is being.
original_zh_text: 这片沙地凶险得很！来的路上瓦尔加差点就进了蠕虫的肚子！<page>可惜最后他找到路回来了！哈哈开玩笑，格里什琴和瓦尔加关系好着呢！
translated_text: 砂は危険に満ちている。私たちが上に行くと、かわいそうなヴァルガは飢えた虫に夢中になりそうになりました。<page>残念ながら、彼はついに出口を見つけました。はぁ!ただの冗談だグリシキンとヴァルガは、他のノミと同じように親友だった。
secondary_translated_text: The sands are full of danger. As we went up, poor Varga almost became obsessed with the hungry worms.<page>Unfortunately, he finally found a way out. yeah! Just kidding. Griskin and Varga were as good friends as any other fleas.

translated_text: ビールを補充する？
secondary_translated_text: to replenish the beer?

original_en_text: You have brought them all, bug not flea. My work is done! No more searching needed. Ours is a caravan full!<page>Now my duty must change. To watch. To protect. This new task I am looking much to liking.
original_zh_text: 你把他们全找齐了，外族虫。我也不用再四处搜寻了！旅团满员！<page>现在改当护卫，这新差事合我胃口。
translated_text: 全員連れてきた。虫はノミじゃない。仕事は終わった!もう検索は必要ない。私たちの車はいっぱいです!<page>私の責任は変わります。保護に注意。この新しいミッションを楽しんでいるようです。
secondary_translated_text: I brought them all. Insects are not fleas. The job is over! No more searching is needed. Our car is full!<page>My responsibility will change. Attention to protection. I seem to be enjoying this new mission.

original_en_text: Is warm here, you agree? Is very... what is say, cosy?<page>The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.
original_zh_text: 这儿暖和，对吧？很……温馨？<page>但首领总想挪窝，我猜迟早会搬去更糟的地方。
translated_text: 暑いですよね。非常に..。どう思う、コンバー？<page>しかし、フラックマスターは常に前進したかった。すぐにもっと悪い状況に追い込まれると思います。
secondary_translated_text: It's hot, right? Very... very... what do you think, conber?<page>But the Flakmaster always wanted to move forward. I think we'll be in a worse situation soon.

original_en_text: Oh... what a shame. Heh heh! I think you’d find the waters inside delectably soothing, if you’d only reconsider!
original_zh_text: 噢……真遗憾。这泉水能舒服到骨头里哦！要不再考虑考虑？
translated_text: ああ...。なんて残念なこと!えっ!!もう一度考えてみると、中の水がとても心地よいことがわかります!
secondary_translated_text: ah... What a pity! what?! If you think about it again, you can see that the water in it is very comfortable!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Such dedication you continue to show us, Miss Hornet!<page>While we may seem safe out here at range from danger, we cannot go far to forage, and the many fleas need much nurture!<page>Food and provisions, such as you bring, are crucial in these desperate times.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我从钟心镇带了补给来。<page>大黄蜂小姐，您总是这么关照我们！<page>这里看似安全，但难以远行觅食，这么多张嘴要喂呢！<page>你带来的食物和物资真是雪中送炭！
translated_text: <hpage>フライマスター、私はあなたが落ち着くのを助けるために、ベルハートのメッセンジャーから物資の束を持ってきました。<page>あなたは私たちにコミットしています、ミス·ホーネット!<page>私たちは危険から離れているように見えますが、遠くに行くことはできません。多くのノミはより多くの栄養が必要です!<page>この絶望的な時には、食料や物資（あなたが持ってくるものなど）が不可欠です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, I have brought you a bundle of supplies from the messenger of Belheart to help you settle down.<page>You're committed to us, Miss Hornet! "<page>We seem to be out of danger, but we can't go far. " Many fleas need more nutrition!<page>In this desperate time, food and supplies (such as what you bring) are essential.

original_en_text: This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon platforms, avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.
original_zh_text: 这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。
translated_text: このテストはノミを避けることです。攻撃を避けるためにプラットフォームに留まる。滞在時間が長いほどスコアが大きくなります。
secondary_translated_text: This test is to avoid fleas. Remain on the platform to avoid attack. The longer you stay, the higher your score.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dodeshna! I am saying, welcome to our caravan, stranger!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, isn’t it? No fur at all, and your wings fall off!<page>Har, har har har! Is just jest, of course. Us fleas famous for giving jokes!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，多德什纳！我的意思是，欢迎来到旅团！<page>你真是个滑稽的跳蚤，没长毛还掉翅膀！哈哈！<page>开个玩笑啦！我们跳蚤最爱逗乐子！
translated_text: ドシュナー、ドシュナー!私たちのキャラバンへようこそ、見知らぬ人たち!<page>あなたはとても面白い、とても奇妙なノミですよね。毛皮がなければ翼が落ちる!<page>ハハハ!もちろん、それは冗談です。私たちは冗談で有名です!
secondary_translated_text: Doshner, Doshner! Welcome to our caravan, strangers!<page>You're a very funny, very strange flea, aren't you? Without fur, the wings will fall off!<page>ha ha ha! Of course, it's a joke. We are famous for our jokes!

original_en_text: Some beasts here, I see them eat through the bony ground. Is very smart! Bone is everywhere much abundant! If only I had such stomach, har har!
original_zh_text: 这有些野兽会啃地上的骨头，真聪明！这到处都是骨头，我要有这胃口多好！哈哈！
translated_text: ここには獣がいます骨を噛んでいますとても賢い!骨があちこちに!こんな胃があったらいいのに!
secondary_translated_text: There's a beast here, biting the bones, very clever! Bones are everywhere! I wish I had a stomach like this!

original_en_text: Drink to full, Miss Hornet! Why waste? Be merry with us fleas before it all ends!
original_zh_text: 喝个痛快，大黄蜂小姐！浪费？都要完蛋了，只管开心就好了！
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット、全部飲んで!なぜ無駄にするのか。これが終わるまで、私たちのノミと一緒に幸せに!
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, drink it all! Why waste it? " Be happy with our fleas until this is over!

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended, and you have bested your old score. Rishkiz, champion!
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。你超越了自己，里什基兹，祝贺你，冠军！
translated_text: ヴィクナー。裁判は終わり、あなたは元のスコアを破った。冒険者、チャンピオン!
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over, and you broke the original score. Adventurer, Champion!

original_en_text: Normally I would never burden a visitor with the caravan’s worries. But! Isn’t it the custom of this kingdom to share your deepest wishes with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas of these lands to find their way to our caravan! Stranger, could you not help us?
original_zh_text: 本不该让客人操心旅团的琐事，但据说倾诉愿望是纺络的风俗？<page>我的愿望就是迷途跳蚤能回归旅团！能请您帮助我吗？
translated_text: 普段は観光客にキャラバンのトラブルを心配させません。しかし!!心の奥底の欲望を見知らぬ人と分かち合うのは、この王国の習慣ではないでしょうか。<page>まあ、私の願いは、この土地の貧しい迷子ノミが私たちのキャラバンを見つけることです!見知らぬ人、助けてくれますか？
secondary_translated_text: Usually I don't make tourists worry about caravan troubles. But! Is it not the custom of this kingdom to share the desires of the deepest heart with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is that the poor stray fleas of this land will find our caravan! Stranger, can you help me?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, if your troupe is still prepared to travel, I have discovered a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient aqueducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has at last been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining for this new journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要是旅团已经准备妥当，我发现圣堡外的古渠尽头有处洞穴或许适合你们。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！终于找到目标了，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>フォレスト、あなたの劇団がまだ旅行を計画しているなら、私は城の外、古い運河の端に洞窟を見つけました。この場所はあなたのセキュリティニーズに最適です。<hpage>ハイキングには長い時間がかかることがありますが、一度到着すると、広く澄んだ湖の横には捕食者のいない砂浜があります。これは私がこの恐ろしい土地で見た中で最も平和な場所です。<page>そうだよ!そうでしょう!ようやく目的地が決まった。旅は続けられます!<page>ミス·バンブルビー、あなたはノミの良い友人です。私たちは間違いなくその場所で歓迎されるでしょう。この新しい旅に参加しますか？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forrest, if your troupe is still planning a trip, I have found a cave outside the castle, at the end of an old canal. This place is perfect for your security needs.<hpage>The hike can take a long time, but once you arrive, there are sandy beaches beside a wide, clear lake that are free of predators. This is the most peaceful place I have ever seen in this terrible land.<page>that's right! That's right! At last, the destination was decided. The journey can go on!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of the fleas. We will undoubtedly be welcome in that place. Will you join this new journey?

original_en_text: My treasured guest... what need have I of rosaries, now that all is ending? Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 尊贵的客人……如今万物都将终结，我还要念珠何用？请随意使用温泉车厢吧，分文不取！亲爱的克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: 親愛なるゲスト、それが終わった今、私は何が必要ですか？スパ車を無料でご利用ください!親愛なるKrattは喜んで提供する!
secondary_translated_text: Dear guest, now that it's over, what do I need? Please use the spa car for free! Dear Kratt is happy to serve!

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company!<page>But still there may be more out there in this wide world... What a wonder it would be if they too found their way to our fresh paradise!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>但或许还有其他流落者……要是他们也能找到这新乐园该多好！
translated_text: 多くの迷子のノミがここに来る。こんなに大きなチームが集まるとは思わなかった!<page>しかし、この広い世界にはもっとあるかもしれません。彼らが私たちの新しい楽園への道を見つけたら、何と素晴らしいことでしょう!
secondary_translated_text: Many lost fleas come here. I didn't expect such a big team to come together!<page>But there may be more to this wide world. How wonderful it would be if they found their way to our new paradise!

original_en_text: Auugghhh... the pain! Such fury, over a mistake! Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look!<page>This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!<hpage>Lie no more to me, flea, and be grateful you still live. Know that if you peer again, you will die.<page>Of course! Kratt would never! Let’s consider the matter forgotten, and you shall forever be my treasured guest!
original_zh_text: 啊嗷！好痛！发这么大火干嘛！克拉特不是故意偷看的！<page>车厢需要养护，我只是在修补！这是无心之过，而且我基本什么也没看见！<hpage>不必编故事了，这次没死算你走运。下次再偷看，你必死无疑。<page>不敢不敢！这事就这么翻篇吧！您永远是贵宾！
translated_text: あっ...。痛い!間違いに怒り!かわいそうなクラットは、覗き見するつもりはなかった!<page>この古い車は常にメンテナンスが必要です。修理しているだけ!邪魔するつもりはなかった!ほとんど何も見えなかった!<hpage>嘘をつかないでノミ生きていてくれてありがとうこれ以上見つめていたら死んでしまう。<page>もちろんです!クラットは決して!あなたはいつも私のゲストです!
secondary_translated_text: ah... it hurts! Angry at the wrong! Poor Crat wasn't going to peek!<page>This old car needs constant maintenance. They're just repairing it! I didn't mean to disturb you! I could barely see anything!<hpage>Don't lie, flea, thank you for keeping me alive. If I stare at you any longer, I'll die.<page>of course! Never clutter! You are always my guest!

original_en_text: Dodeshna! Miss Hornet, is it? Welcome to our new camp! The travelling is done, and so we drink! <page>Is no better way to revive spirit than to drink the famous Flea Brew! I’m have just finished a batch, bubbling and warm!<page>You are friend, finder of lost, little fleas, hmm? Here, take bottle of Flea Brew with you! Will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I am always brewing here, so have no fear to drink plenty, and return whenever you are wanting more!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳！是大黄蜂小姐吗？欢迎来新营地！旅途结束，该喝点啦！<page>来点提神的跳蚤秘酿！我刚熬好一锅，热乎着呢！<page>是你帮忙找回流落在外的同胞对吧？那这瓶药酿送你！路上暖暖身子。<page>我整天都在熬制药酿，喝完了随时来取！
translated_text: ドデズナー!あなたはミス·ホーネットです。新しいキャンプへようこそ!旅は終わった、飲みましょう!<page>有名なノミビールを飲むよりも、若返りの方法はありません!私はちょうどバッチを終えた、スパイシーで香り!<page>あなたは友人であり、迷子のノミの発見者ですね。ビールを持参してください!旅行中に暖かく保つことができます。<page>私はいつもここで醸造しているので、たくさん飲んで、もっと来たいときに来てください!
secondary_translated_text: Dodezner! You are Miss Hornet. Welcome to our new camp! The journey is over, let's drink!<page>There's no way to rejuvenate yourself than to drink the famous Nami beer! I just finished the batch, spicy and smelling!<page>You are a friend and a discoverer of the lost fleas. Please bring your beer! It can keep you warm while you travel.<page>I always brew here, so drink plenty and come when you want to come more!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? If service is you here seeking, none is left for me to provide. All fleas are here, collected close.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？如果是要找我帮忙，那我帮不了什么了，跳蚤们都回来了。<page>现在大家都聚在一起，只剩等待最后的终局了。
translated_text: あなたが留まるなら、虫はノミではないか。あなたが奉仕に来たなら、私には何もできません。すべてのノミはここにあり、よく集められています。<page>ノミが集まって結果を出す準備ができているので、状況はずっと良くなりました。
secondary_translated_text: If you stay, aren't the bugs fleas? If you have come to the service, there is nothing I can do. All the fleas are here, and are well collected.<page>Things have been a lot better now that the fleas have gathered and are ready to produce results.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, would you share them with me? I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>The locations! For price they could be shared, but you hold no map to mark! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>位置，拿念珠换！但你连地图都没有！想要交易，先弄张地图来！
translated_text: <hpage>再び、大きなノミに乾杯。あなたの多くの仲間の中で、私はあなたがこのキャラバンを見つけるために生き残ることを心配しません。<hpage>このような恐ろしい方法で仲間から距離を置くために必要な任務を教えてください。<page>私のは痕跡、匂い、鋭い感覚で追跡されます。私たちのノミの友人、最年少のノミを見つけ、それらを一緒に集め、強くします。<hpage>迷子になったノミの居場所を知ったら、私と共有してくれますか？安全にキャラバンに連れて行けるかもしれない。<page>場所は!価格に関しては、彼らは共有できますが、地図マークはありません!学びたければ、地図が必要です。それまでは何もできません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Again, toast to the big fleas. Among your many companions, I do not worry that you will survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are needed to distance yourself from your comrades in such a terrifying way.<page>Mine is tracked by traces, smells, and keen senses. Find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and gather them together to make them stronger.<hpage>If you know where the flea is, would you share it with me? Maybe we can take them to the caravan safely.<page>The place! As for the price, they can share, but there is no map mark! If you want to learn, you need a map. Until then we can do nothing.

original_en_text: Bug. World is ending. Nothing left but to test ourselves.<page>This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon the platforms. Avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.<page>To score most is to become champion. This is only thing left to strive for.
original_zh_text: 虫子，世界就要毁灭，除了试炼也没别的事可做。<page>这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。<page>分最高的就是冠军，而夺冠是最后的意义。
translated_text: 世界は破壊されている。自分自身を試すしかない。<page>このテストはノミを避けることです。プラットフォームにとどまる。攻撃を避ける。滞在時間が長いほどスコアが大きくなります。<page>一番多いポイントはチャンピオンになること。それが戦うべき唯一のことです。
secondary_translated_text: The world is being destroyed. You have no choice but to test yourself.<page>This test is to avoid fleas. Remain on the platform. Avoid an attack. The longer you stay, the higher your score.<page>The most important thing is to be a champion. That's the only thing we should fight for.

original_en_text: Bug, you are champion of Flea Dodge, but trial is still open to you. Can you defeat your own score?
original_zh_text: 虫子，跳蚤溜溜的冠军归你了。但挑战还将继续，你能突破自己的成绩吗？
translated_text: バグ、あなたはノミ·ドジャースのチャンピオンですが、裁判はまだあなたに開かれています。自分のスコアを打ち負かすことができますか？
secondary_translated_text: Bug, you are the champion of the Nomi Dodgers, but the trial is still open to you. Can you beat your own score?

original_en_text: So bug not flea, you return. World is ruined. Final end comes soon, says Fleamaster.<hpage>This land is gravely wounded, but death need not follow. It is now my task to free this kingdom from its dark fall.<page>Grrr... such words are just fancy. Nothing left now, except to protect what little we have.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，你回来了。首领说，世界要完蛋了。<hpage>纺络遭受重创，但未必没有转机。我会帮王国摆脱黑暗。<page>吼……漂亮话谁都会说，现在我们也只能死守这点家当了。
translated_text: 虫はノミではなく戻ってきました世界は破壊される。フレイマーは最終結果はすぐに出ると述べた。<hpage>土地は重傷を負ったが、必ずしも死は続かなかった。今、私の使命は、この王国を暗黒の衰退から解放することです。<page>うーん...。これは派手すぎます。私たちが持っている小さなものを守る以外に何もない。
secondary_translated_text: The worms have returned, not fleas, and the world will be destroyed. Flemmer said the final result would come out soon.<hpage>The land was badly wounded, but death did not necessarily follow. Now my mission is to free this kingdom from the decline of darkness.<page>um... This is too flashy. " We have nothing but to protect the little things we have.

original_en_text: Come, you revellers! Try the Flea Juggle game! Keep striking fleas upwards. Keep them airborne for as long as possible!
original_zh_text: 来啊狂欢者！玩跳蚤耍耍！把跳蚤打飞，滞空越久越好！
translated_text: さあ、あなた方のファン!ノミのジャグリングゲームを試す!ノミとの戦いを続ける。できるだけ長く空中にいてください!
secondary_translated_text: Come on, your fans! Try a flea juggling game! Continue the fight against fleas. Stay in the air for as long as possible!

original_en_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient ducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining the caravan on this journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我见过一处地方，在圣堡外的古渠尽头，或许符合你们的需求。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！目标已定，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>私は、古いパイプの端にある城の後ろの洞窟、Fleamasterという場所を見ました。この場所はあなたのセキュリティニーズに最適です。<hpage>ハイキングには長い時間がかかることがありますが、一度到着すると、広く澄んだ湖の横には捕食者のいない砂浜があります。これは私がこの恐ろしい土地で見た中で最も平和な場所です。<page>そうだよ!そうでしょう!目的地はすでに決まっている。旅は続けられます!<page>ミス·バンブルビー、あなたはノミの良い友人です。私たちは間違いなくその場所で歓迎されるでしょう。この旅に参加しますか？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I saw a place called Fleamaster, a cave behind the castle, at the end of an old pipe. This place is perfect for your security needs.<hpage>The hike can take a long time, but once you arrive, there are sandy beaches beside a wide, clear lake that are free of predators. This is the most peaceful place I have ever seen in this terrible land.<page>that's right! That's right! The destination has already been decided. The journey can go on!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of the fleas. We will undoubtedly be welcome in that place. Would you like to join this journey?

original_en_text: All are here now, bug not flea. For your seeking, ours is a caravan full.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 跳蚤全齐了，外族虫。托你的福，旅团满员了。<page>世界就要完蛋了，抱团总比落单好。
translated_text: すべてがここにあります虫はノミではありませんあなたの捜索のために、私たちの艦隊はいっぱいです。<page>ノミが集まって結果を出す準備ができているので、状況はずっと良くなりました。
secondary_translated_text: Everything is here The bugs are not fleas For your search, our fleet is full.<page>Things have been a lot better now that the fleas have gathered and are ready to produce results.

original_en_text: Ooh, heh heh heh! What a turn, for dear Kratt to be strung up in such a dank little cave!<hpage>Cursed threads stretch throughout this land, set to ensnare the unwary. You seem no worse for it now, at least.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿！没想到克拉特会在这阴暗的洞窟里翻船！<hpage>丝咒遍地，一不留神被缠住。你看起来倒是不担心？<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: ああ、ヘイ!親愛なるクラッター、このような湿った小さな洞窟で遊ぶのは素晴らしいことです!<hpage>呪いの糸は地球上に広がり、不注意な者を閉じ込める運命にある。少なくとも今は悪く見えません。<hpage>あの金属製の馬車これはあなたのものだと思います。<page>ああ、はい、はい!私は最近のノミの艦隊に加わるつもりですよね？セキュリティですよね？一人でリスクを取るのに疲れた。<page>そして、あなたは..。そこで会えると思いますか？私の馬車には特別な秘密が隠されています。次に会ったときに共有したいと思います。えっ!!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, hey! Dear Cratter, it's great to play in such a damp little cave!<hpage>A curse thread spreads across the earth and is destined to lock up the careless. At least now it doesn't look bad.<hpage>That metal carriage, I think it's yours.<page>Oh, yeah, yeah! i'm going to join the fleet of fleas recently, right? security, right? I was tired of taking risks alone.<page>And then you... do you think we can meet there? There is a special secret hidden in my carriage. I'd like to share it with you the next time we see you. what?!

original_en_text: And now, with our caravan bursting, we’ve rested here long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! First, please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 如今旅团拥挤不堪，我们也休整已久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>哎呀，我真是失礼！还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 艦隊は満員になったので、ここでは十分に休むことができた。ノミはもっと高く行かなければならない!<page>しかし、私がいかに怠慢であるか不思議です!まず、どうやって電話するのか。<hpage>バンブルビーと呼んでくださいフレイマスターあなたの仲間のノミがあなたの艦隊で安全であることを見て喜んでいます。一人旅は危険な土地です。<page>ワヴェンダ!言い換えれば、信じられない!なんと美しいことでしょう!私たちは皆一緒です。<page>親愛なる友人たち。ミス·バンブルビー私たちの船団は標高の高い広大な湿地に向かって出発する。ゲストとして、一緒に旅行しませんか？
secondary_translated_text: The fleet was now full, so he could rest well here. The fleas have to go higher! '<page>But I wonder how lazy I am! First of all, how do you call?<hpage>Call me Bumblebee, Master Frey. I'm glad to see your fellow fleas are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a dangerous land.<page>Wavenda! In other words, I cannot believe it! How beautiful it is! We are all together. "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee Our convoy will depart for a vast swamp at high elevation. Would you like to travel with us as a guest?

original_en_text: I have marked your map, bug. See the learnings of fleas lost across the lands.<page>If you are as brave as told by fellow fleas, seek them. Save them. For a caravan whole.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，地图标好了。上面有流落同胞的位置。<page>如果你真如传言般勇敢，就去救他们吧。凑满我们的旅团。
translated_text: 私はあなたの地図をマークした、バグ。各地に消えたノミのことを知る。<page>ノミの仲間が言うように勇敢なら、それらを見つけてください。彼らを救う。チーム全体で。
secondary_translated_text: I've marked your map, bug. I know about fleas that have disappeared everywhere.<page>If you are as brave as your fellow fleas say, find them. Save them. " In the whole team.

original_en_text: You are welcome here always, Miss Hornet, true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and restore. We many fleas do so enjoy your company.
original_zh_text: 随时欢迎您回来，跳蚤的挚友！<page>想留多久都可以。好好休息，我们都喜欢与您相伴。
translated_text: いつでも歓迎します、ミス·バンブルビー、ノミの真の友人!<page>あなたが気になる限り滞在。休養と回復。あなたの会社を愛する多くのノミ。
secondary_translated_text: You are always welcome, Miss Bumblebee, a true friend of the fleas!<page>Stay for as long as you care. Rest and recovery. Many fleas that love your company.

original_en_text: Dear friend of fleas, please! If ever you come upon a cave both wide and free, return with haste and tell us.<page>The fleas are oh so eager to journey, and I’m eager to see them to a destination safe!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤之友啊！如果发现宽敞安全的洞穴，请速来告知！<page>大伙迫不及待地要启程，我也盼着带他们去安全的归宿！
translated_text: 親愛なるノミの皆さん、どうぞ!広大で空っぽの洞窟に出くわしたら、戻ってきて教えてください。<page>ノミは旅行に熱心で、目的地に無事到着するのを見たいです!
secondary_translated_text: Dear fleas, please! If you come across a vast and empty cave, come back and tell me.<page>Fleas are eager to travel and want to see you arrive safely at your destination!

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>And so happy have you made we fleas! Even as the darkness comes to claim us, we would be honoured to bestow one final gift, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past.<page>May it mark you in Pharloom’s final moment as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我素来喜好独行，但与你们相遇确是暖心之事。见你们团聚也很是欣慰。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也欢喜得很！因此在这黑暗将至的时刻，请让我为您送上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。<page>愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>それは素晴らしい、フレイマスター。私はこの土地を遠く深く歩いてきましたが、どこに行っても、あなたのようにフレンドリーで好奇心旺盛な人々に出会います。<hpage>あなた方ノミは冒険への異常な欲求を持っていて、その能力はめったに匹敵しませんが、それは立派です。<hpage>私は長い間一人旅に慣れてきましたが、あなたの旅を追い、あなたの進歩を共有することは暖かいことです。<page>ノミを作ってくれてよかったです!たとえ暗闇が私たちに降りかかるとしても、私たちは最後の贈り物、ノミの輝かしい過去からの宝物を与えることを光栄に思います。<page>これが私たちの友人としての最後の瞬間となりますように。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>That's great, Freemaster. I have walked far and deep in this land, and wherever I go, I meet people who are as friendly and curious as you.<hpage>You fleas have an extraordinary appetite for adventure, and its capabilities are rarely matched, but it is admirable.<hpage>I've been used to traveling alone for a long time, but it's warm to follow your journey and share your progress.<page>I'm so glad you made me a flea! Even if darkness falls upon us, we are honored to give you a final gift, a treasure from the fleas' glorious past.<page>May this be our last moments as friends. "

original_en_text: You are have luck, Miss Hornet, to lack the fur of we fleas. All the blowy sand of that place is getting very stuck inside!
original_zh_text: 你真幸运，大黄蜂小姐。不像我们长着毛，这破地方的沙子全钻进了毛里！
translated_text: ミス·バンブルビー、ノミの毛がなくてラッキーですね。その場所のすべてのほこりが閉じ込められています!
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, you're lucky you don't have any flea hairs. All the dust in that place is trapped!

original_en_text: The beasts here are... much frightful, hm? Scary?<page>But if give them space, they leave alone. You respect beast, beast respect you.
original_zh_text: 这里的野兽……挺吓人？<page>保持距离就没事。你对它们敬而远之，它们也一样。
translated_text: 獣はここにいる。恐ろしいですよね？恐ろしい？？<page>しかし、彼らにスペースを与えれば、彼らは一人で去るでしょう。あなたは獣を尊重し、獣はあなたを尊重する。
secondary_translated_text: The beast is here. it's scary, isn't it? Terrible?<page>But if you give them space, they will leave on their own. You respect the beast, and the beast respects you.

original_en_text: Grand Champion... bug called Hornet. Will you once again challenge the Flea Dodge trial?
original_zh_text: 名为大黄蜂的虫……总冠军。你要再次挑战跳蚤溜溜吗？
translated_text: トーナメントでは“ホーネット”というエラーが発生した。またノミの道ミステリー裁判に挑戦しますか？
secondary_translated_text: The tournament had an error called "hornet." will you challenge the flea road mystery trial again?

original_en_text: Fierce one, my dear Grand Champion! Will you dance and fly with us above the water?
original_zh_text: 小辣椒，亲爱的总冠军！和我们一起在水面上共舞吧！
translated_text: 戦士、親愛なるチャンピオン!一緒に踊ったり、水の上を飛びませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Warriors, dear champions! Would you like to dance with us or fly on the water?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Ahh, such a kindly gesture adds much warmth to our celebration!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow to roam the world as we have, so let us give them what happiness we can before the end.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我带来了钟心镇的支援物资。<page>啊，这份善意让庆典更添暖意！<page>这些可怜的小跳蚤注定无法像我们一样游历世界，就让我们在终结前尽力给予他们欢愉吧。
translated_text: <hpage>フライマスター、私はあなたが落ち着くのを助けるために、ベルハートのメッセンジャーから物資の束を持ってきました。<page>ああ、このようなフレンドリーなジェスチャーは、私たちのお祝いに多くの暖かさを追加します!<page>このかわいそうなノミは、私たちのように成長して世界を歩き回ることはないので、すべてが終わる前に彼らを幸せにするためにできる限りのことをしましょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flymaster, I have brought you a bundle of supplies from the messenger of Belheart to help you settle down.<page>Oh, such a friendly gesture adds a lot of warmth to our celebration!<page>Let's do all we can to make them happy before it's all over, because this poor fleas won't grow up and walk around the world like we do.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! Heh heh. All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Pray tell, what does one call such a delicate beauty? Surely yours is a name most sweet and soothing. Are you Fairgrace? Or Nectarsweet?<hpage>I am Hornet, sir. Address me by that name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course. My dear, Hornet! I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！嘿嘿，全托你的福！敢问美女芳名？定是甜美如"香露仙子"？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，要么称我本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！亲爱的大黄蜂小姐！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>再び、ミスター·フライ。無事にこの護衛隊に加わることができます。<page>ああ!はい!ああ、ありがとうございました!ダーリン、ダーリン、あなた!教えてください、このような美しい女性の名前は何ですか？あなたの名前は間違いなく最も甘く、最も慰めの名前です。あなたは美しい恵みですか？ネクタリンか？<hpage>私はホーネットです。名前で呼ぶか、全く呼ばないか。<page>グラダック、もちろん、もちろん、私の親愛なる、バンブルビー!私の小さな秘密をお話ししましょう私の馬車は癒しのスパを兼ねていますこれが一番賢い。<page>中の水は、詩よりも純粋です!えっ!!私はあなたを入れて喜んで、高価ではない!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Again, Mr. Fly. You can join this escort safely.<page>oh! yes! Oh, thank you, thank you! Darling, darling, you! Tell me, what's the name of such a beautiful woman? Your name is undoubtedly the sweetest and most comforting name. Are you a beautiful grace? nectalin?<hpage>I am a Hornet. Do you call them by name or not call them at all?<page>Gladak, of course, of course, my dear, Bumblebee! Let me tell you my little secret: My carriage doubles as a healing spa and this is the smartest.<page>The water in it is purer than poetry! what?! I'm happy to put you in, not expensive!

original_en_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡。跳蚤溜溜，试炼开始！
translated_text: ママーシュカ。裁判が始まった。ノミ·ダッジ!
secondary_translated_text: Mamashka. The trial began. Nomi Dodge!

original_en_text: <hpage>I saw your plea posted at Bellhart, sir flea, and accept your request.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在钟心镇看到了你的祈愿，跳蚤先生，我接受。
translated_text: <hpage>私はバーハルトであなたの要求を見て、受け入れました。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I saw your request at Berhardt and accepted it.

original_en_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>Here at the end of times, our paradise crumbles beneath us. Flea and friend alike, all will soon be consumed...
original_zh_text: 我唱这首哀歌，祭奠旧日终结……<page>末日将至，乐园崩塌。跳蚤与挚友，终将湮灭……
translated_text: 私が歌う挽歌は私たちの古い生活の終わりのために<page>この世の終わりに、私たちの楽園は私たちの足元に崩壊します。ノミは友達のようなもので、すべてがすぐに消耗してしまいます。
secondary_translated_text: The elegy I sing is for the end of our old life<page>At the end of this world, our paradise will crumble at our feet. Flea is like a friend, and everything will quickly be consumed.

original_en_text: Ahh, look! The poor fleas are starting to make their way to us! What a precious thing!<page>We have much to thank you for already! And I hope we will have even more to be thankful for very soon! Please, keep seeking out our lost fellows!
original_zh_text: 快看！迷途的同胞开始回归了！多么珍贵的情谊！<page>我们对您感激不尽！还请您继续帮忙寻找失散的同胞！
translated_text: あっ!見て!かわいそうなノミが近づいてきました!なんと貴重なこと!<page>すでに感謝すべきことがたくさんあります!もっと早く感謝できることがあるといいですね!失われた仲間を探し続けてください!
secondary_translated_text: ah! Look at me! Poor fleas are coming closer! What a precious thing!<page>We already have so much to be grateful for! I wish I could be grateful sooner! Please continue to search for your lost companions!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug, not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave. I only ask what task causes you to perch alone atop these dank ducts?<page>Task? Mine is a work most important, but not for talking of here, where danger waits close. Soon, I depart to seek fleas, my fellows, and join them.<page>Now... Grrr. You leave me! I go soon to seek other fleas. A flea alone is good, but fleas together is best! Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤，也不打算抢你山洞。就是好奇你独自在这做什么？<hpage>做什么？当然是重要的事，但没空多说，附近有危险。我马上就要离开，去找我的同胞。<page>唔……你走吧！跳蚤还是聚在一起更合适，我待会就去找他们！现在要先休息！
translated_text: ゴラム。ノミではなく昆虫です。何で邪魔してるの？このポジションは私のもの、フェアプレー、勝利。<hpage>私は長く滞在しません、マダム。私はこの洞窟にあなたの権利を疑わない。ただ聞きたいのですがこの濡れたパイプの中で一人になった使命は何ですか？<page>任務は？私の仕事は最も重要な仕事の一つですが、ここでそれについて話す代わりに、危険はここにあります。すぐに私は仲間のノミを探し始め、彼らに加わりました。<page>現在は..。え~~。放っておいて!すぐに別のノミを探します。1匹のノミは素晴らしいですが、一緒にノミが最高です!それまでは、休息が必要です!止めろ、バグ!
secondary_translated_text: Gollum. They are insects, not fleas. why are you interrupting me? This position is mine, fair play, winning.<hpage>I won't stay long, ma 'am. I doubt your right to this cave. I just want to ask, what's the mission of being alone in this wet pipe?<page>what's the mission? My job is one of the most important jobs, but instead of talking about it here, the danger is here. Immediately I began to look for my fellow fleas and joined them.<page>Currently, it is... ah ~! Leave him alone! I will look for another flea immediately. One flea is great, but together flea is the best! Until then, you need some rest! Stop it, bug!

original_en_text: Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: 親愛なる友人たち。ミス·ホーネット!失礼しますが、もう一つお願いします。最後のショーを完成させてくれませんか？
secondary_translated_text: My dear friends, miss hornet! Excuse me, but I'd like another one. will you please finish the last show?

original_en_text: It is time for the Festival of the Flea! One last, grand celebration before the black quakes pull us all down into the darkness!<page>Rouse yourself fleas, one last time! Let the games begin!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤庆典就要开始了！在黑暗将我们拖入深渊前，最后一场盛大狂欢！<page>跳蚤们，最后一次振作起来！游戏开始！
translated_text: FRAY DAY!大地震前の最後の大規模なお祝いは、私たちを暗闇に陥れました!<page>最後に、自分でノミを捕まえる!ゲームを始めよう
secondary_translated_text: Fray Day! The last massive celebration before the Great Earthquake has plunged us into darkness!<page>Finally, catch the fleas yourself! Let's start the game.

original_en_text: Ahhh! Alas. Then we shall pray your own path remains safe.<page>And now, our new home is calling. We venture again!<hpage>Good travels, Fleamaster. May your journey ahead be safe and smooth.
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，唉，那就祝您前路平安。<page>好了，新家在召唤，我们又要启程了！<hpage>一路顺风，跳蚤首领。
translated_text: あっ! あっ!ああ、ああ。あなたの道が安全であることを祈ります。<page>新しい家が呼ばれています。また危険を冒す!<hpage>安全な旅を、フレイマスター。今後の旅が安全で成功しますように。
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! Oh, yeah. I pray that your path is safe.<page>A new home is being called. Risk again!<hpage>Have a safe journey, Freemaster. May your future journey be safe and successful.

original_en_text: But stranger! While you’re with us, you must hear of the miracle that has occurred!<page>See all these fleas gathered to our troupe? It seems so many! An impossible number, yet here they are, safely joined together. Our most cherished wishes answered!<hpage>If you were seeking fleas to join your caravan, I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh! Can it be? Then you here are our saviour, our dear fleafriend! For all have made their way right, straight to us!<page>And now, with our caravan full to bursting, we’ve rested long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but saviour, how remiss of me! First, please tell, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 这位朋友！既然与我们同行，您可要听听旅团发生的奇迹！<page>看见归队的跳蚤们了吗？数量超乎想象！原以为这不可能，但它们已然齐聚于此。我们的祈愿实现了！<hpage>如果你是在寻找跳蚤，我在旅途中解救了许多。<page>噢！难道是您？那您便是我们的救星了，亲爱的跳蚤挚友！所有伙伴都因您重聚于此！<page>如今商队拥挤不堪，休整也已足够久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>噢，救星阁下，原谅我失礼了！请问该如何称呼您？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴你能和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: しかし、見知らぬ人!私たちと一緒にいると、すでに起こった奇跡を聞くことができます!<page>私たちの劇場に集まっているノミを見ましたか？こんなに多いようです!これは不可能な数字ですが、安全に組み合わせられています。最も大切な願いが叶いました!<hpage>あなたの艦隊に加わるためにノミを探しているなら、私は旅を通して多くのノミを見つけ、解放しました。<page>おお!大丈夫ですか？あなたは私たちの救世主、私たちの親愛なるノミの友人!みんなが来てくれたから!<page>チームはすでに満員で、十分な休息を取っている。ノミはもっと高く行かなければならない!<page>“救い主よ、わたしはなんと怠慢なのか。まず、教えてください。何と呼ぶべきでしょうか。<hpage>バンブルビーと呼んでくださいフレイマスターあなたの仲間のノミがあなたの艦隊で安全であることを見て喜んでいます。一人旅は危険な土地です。<page>ワヴェンダ!言い換えれば、信じられない!なんと美しいことでしょう!私たちは皆一緒です。<page>親愛なる友人たち。ミス·バンブルビー私たちの船団は標高の高い広大な湿地に向かって出発する。ゲストとして、一緒に旅行しませんか？
secondary_translated_text: But the stranger! When you are with us, you can hear the miracles that have already happened!<page>Have you seen the fleas that are gathering in our theater? It seems like so many! This is an impossible number, but it is safely combined. My most important wish has been fulfilled!<hpage>If you are looking for fleas to join your fleet, I have found and released many fleas throughout my journey.<page>Oh, my God. are you okay? You are our Savior, our dear flea friend! Because they all came for me!<page>The team is already full and has plenty of rest. The fleas have to go higher! '<page>"Savior, how lazy am I!
