First of all, tell me. What should we call it? "<hpage>Call me Bumblebee, Master Frey. I'm glad to see your fellow fleas are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a dangerous land.<page>Wavenda! In other words, I cannot believe it! How beautiful it is! We are all together. "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee Our convoy will depart for a vast swamp at high elevation. Would you like to travel with us as a guest?

original_en_text: Welcome back, my fierce one. Dodeshna! Heh heh! I’m sure your travels have wearied you.<page>Oh no, I wouldn’t dare take rosaries from such a treasured guest! Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来小辣椒！嘿嘿，旅途累了吧？<page>哦不，我哪敢收您钱！随便泡！克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: お帰りなさい、私の勇敢な男。ドシュナー!えっ!!きっとあなたの旅は退屈になるでしょう。<page>ああ、私はそのような貴重なゲストからロザリオを取る勇気がない!スパ車を無料でご利用ください!親愛なるKrattは喜んで提供する!
secondary_translated_text: Welcome home, my brave man. Doshner! what?! Surely your journey will be boring.<page>Oh, I dare not take the Rosary from such a precious guest! Please use the spa car for free! Dear Kratt is happy to serve!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet! You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，您包揽了所有跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我宣布，您是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット!あなたは私たちが獲得したすべてのノミコンテストのチャンピオンであることを証明しました!<page>音楽祭の総合優勝者が出てきました。もちろんそうだ!<page>最後の儀式が始まりました。ノミ、準備完了!
secondary_translated_text: miss hornet! You've proven to be the champion of every flea contest we've won!<page>The overall winner of the music festival came out. Of course you do!<page>The final ceremony began. Flea, ready to go!

original_en_text: Good friend of fleas is you, Miss Hornet. Now must join and drink much. Be merry before all ends. Brew is made, enough for all!<page>No charge for you if needing more. Why waste when future is final?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我们跳蚤的挚友，快来喝！末日临头该及时行乐！药酿管够！<page>尽管喝吧！都要完蛋了还留着干嘛？
translated_text: ノミの親友はあなたです、ミス·バンブルビー。今すぐ入って、もっとワインを飲むべきです。すべてが終わるまで幸せになる。ビールはみんなで楽しめます!<page>もっと必要な場合は、支払う必要はありません。未来が決まっているのに、なぜ未来を無駄にするのか。
secondary_translated_text: A flea's best friend is you, Miss Bumblebee. You should go in now and drink more wine. You will be happy until it all ends. Beer is for everyone to enjoy!<page>If you need more, you don't have to pay for it. Why waste the future when the future is fixed?

original_en_text: A strange flea has joined our troupe. All are welcome, but something about this one sets my fur to raise.<page>His carriage offers a steaming service, but the charge in rosaries is stiff, especially for us fleas who carry few.<page>For the companionship we provide, and the safety of our numbers, surely some discount is deserved?
original_zh_text: 有个怪跳蚤入伙了。虽然我们来者不拒，但这家伙让我寒毛直竖。<page>他提供蒸疗服务，但要价高昂，我们跳蚤哪有这么多念珠？<page>看在我们提供庇护的份上，总该打个折吧？
translated_text: 変なノミが劇団に加わった。皆さん歓迎しますが、これは私のコートをさらに悪化させます。<page>彼の馬車は蒸気サービスを提供したが、ロザリオの費用は、特にノミを運ぶことが少ない私たちにとっては高かった。<page>我々が提供する友情と我々の数の安全のために、我々は確かに割引すべきである。
secondary_translated_text: A strange fleas joined the troupe. You're welcome, but this will make my coat worse.<page>His carriage provided steam services, but the cost of the rosary was high, especially for us who carried little fleas.<page>For the friendship we offer and the security of our numbers, we should certainly discount. "

original_en_text: Vikna! Dear one, you outdo yourself! To beat your previous high score is a marvel indeed!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！亲爱的，你又破了自己的记录！太神奇了！
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!あなたは自分自身を超えている!前のスコアを破ることは本当に奇跡です!
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! You are beyond yourself! " Breaking the previous score is truly a miracle!

original_en_text: You still here, bug not flea? Is rest I need before I leave for caravan. Not chat. You feel trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again at the caravan, amongst your fellows.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就去找旅团。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们旅团再见。
translated_text: まだここにいるの？虫はノミじゃないの？キャラバンに行く前に休憩が必要です。チャットはなし。困っていると思っている。殻を緊張させる。<hpage>もう行かないと、お嬢さん。旅の中で強くなりなさい。また車でお会いできるといいですね。
secondary_translated_text: you're still here? aren't bugs fleas? We need a break before going to the caravan. There is no chat. They think they're in trouble. It strains the shell.<hpage>I have to go now, miss. Be strong in the journey. I hope I can see you in the car again.

original_en_text: Ah, of course. Perhaps you will be trying one of the other games?
original_zh_text: 啊，好的，想玩其他游戏吗？
translated_text: ああ、もちろん。他のゲームを試してみませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, sure. Why don't you try other games?

original_en_text: Grrr... bug not flea. Still wishing for knowings of my work? But you hold no map to mark! Until a map is owned, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，还惦记我的情报？但你连地图都没有！先弄到地图再来。
translated_text: うーん...。昆虫はノミではない。私の仕事を知りたいですか？マークする地図がありません!地図がある前は、やることはほとんどなかった。
secondary_translated_text: um... Insects are not fleas. Do you want to know what I do? There is no map to mark! Before the map, there was little to do.

original_en_text: Thank you. Thank you! I’ll treasure these sweet-smelling rosaries dearly! Now, don’t be shy. Step inside!
original_zh_text: 多谢惠顾！这些香香的念珠我会珍藏的！别害羞，快请进！
translated_text: ありがとうございます!私はこれらの香りをとても大切にします!恥ずかしがらないでください。中に入って
secondary_translated_text: Thank you very much! I really care about these scents! Do not be ashamed. go in.

original_en_text: Vikna! My dear one, my dancer, the game has ended and you have proven yourself the champion!<page>None can best your score. You have shamed us all with your fearsome grace! But you will keep playing for me, yes?<page>The end of the world need not be a lonely thing... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，我的亲爱的舞王！你已加冕冠军！<page>无法超越的优雅身姿！但你还会继续玩吧？<page>末日狂欢可不该独自度过，嘿嘿……
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!私の親愛なるダンサー、コンテストは終わり、あなたはチャンピオンであることを証明しました!<page>誰もあなたより優れていない。あなたは恐ろしい恵みで私たち全員を侮辱しました!私のために働き続けますよね？<page>世界の終わりは孤独なことではありません。ああ、ああ。
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! My dear dancer, the contest is over and you have proven to be a champion!<page>No one is better than you. You have insulted us all with a terrible grace! " you're going to keep working for me, right?<page>The end of the world is not a lonely thing. Oh, yeah.

original_en_text: Excellent, excellent! Let us make preparations and be off without delay! Rouse yourself fleas, for the caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 太好了！即刻整装出发！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: すごい!すごい!すごい!準備をして、すぐに出発しましょう!元気を出して、再び車を走らせましょう!
secondary_translated_text: great! great! great! Get ready and let's go right away! Let's cheer up and get the car running again!

original_en_text: My dear, will you play Flea Bounce for me once more? Leap up and bounce on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，再玩一次蹦蹦游戏嘛！只需跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: ハニー、またノミバウンスをしてくれる？できるだけ長く飛び上がって、空飛ぶノミに飛びつきましょう!
secondary_translated_text: honey, can you do a flea bounce again? Hop up as long as you can and jump on the flying fleas!

original_en_text: Say you dodeshna to the new flea sitting there? Is quiet one, but is very good at games!<page>Have no worry for him, Grishkin will look after. Will fill him with brew and meet him to all the other fleas.
original_zh_text: 看见新来的安静跳蚤没？他玩游戏可厉害了！<page>别担心，格里什琴会照顾他的。先灌他药酿再介绍给大家！
translated_text: 新しいノミのドデシュナについて正しいと仮定しますか？これは静かなゲームですが、非常に良い!<page>心配するな、グリシキンが面倒を見てくれる。彼はビールでいっぱいになり、他のすべてのノミを見ました。
secondary_translated_text: Do you assume you're right about the new flea dodeshna? This is a quiet game, but very good!<page>Don't worry, Glycine will take care of you. He filled it with beer and looked at all the other fleas.

original_en_text: Here we shall remain, for a time, Miss Hornet, and pray that more lost fleas find their way to us.<hpage>What others I encounter, I shall send your way, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 我们会暂驻此地，祈祷更多迷途同胞能够找来。<hpage>如果在路上遇到跳蚤，我会让他们来找你。
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット、私たちはしばらくここにいて、より多くの迷子のノミが道を見つけることを祈ります。<hpage>他の人に会ったら、あなたに送りますよ、マスター·ノミ。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, we pray that we will be here for a while, and that more lost fleas will find their way.<hpage>When I see others, I will send them to you, Master Noomi. "

translated_text: ノミビールが欲しい？
secondary_translated_text: you want a flea beer?

translated_text: バウンスバック
secondary_translated_text: Bounceback

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>Ahh, and so happy too have you made we fleas!<page>I would be honoured to bestow one final gift unto you, Miss Hornet, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past. May it mark you forever as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我向来独来独往，但与你们相遇也令我感到暖心。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也高兴得很！<page>请允许我献上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>非常に良い、人々。私はこの土地を遠く深く歩いてきましたが、どこに行っても、あなたのようにフレンドリーで好奇心旺盛な人々に出会います。<hpage>あなた方ノミは冒険への異常な欲求を持っていますたとえその欲求がそれにマッチしないとしてもそれは立派です<hpage>私は長い間一人旅に慣れてきましたが、あなたの旅を追い、あなたの進歩を共有することは暖かいことです。<page>ああ、私たちにノミを作ってくれて嬉しい!<page>ミス·ホーネット、私はあなたに私の最後の贈り物を与えることを光栄に思います。ノミの輝かしい過去からの宝物です。あなたが永遠に私たち全員の友人でありますように。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Very good, folks. I have walked far and deep in this land, and wherever I go, I meet people who are as friendly and curious as you.<hpage>You fleas have an unusual desire for adventure, and even if that desire doesn't match it, it's admirable.<hpage>I've been used to traveling alone for a long time, but it's warm to follow your journey and share your progress.<page>Oh, glad you made us a flea!<page>Miss Hornet, it is my honour to give you my last present. A treasure from the fleas' glorious past. May you be a friend to us all forever.

original_en_text: The spa is yours, dear guest! And always open for one so considerate and kindly as yourself... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 请享受温泉吧，亲爱的顾客！这里随时向您这样贴心又善良的客人开放，嘿嘿嘿……
translated_text: お客さん、スパはあなたのものです!あなたのような思慮深く親切な人に常に心を開いてください。ああ、ああ。
secondary_translated_text: Guests, the Spa is yours! Always open your heart to a thoughtful and kind person like yourself. Oh, yeah.

original_en_text: With luck, my dear, we will meet again when I have joined the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly to share with you when next we meet!
original_zh_text: 运气好的话，我们在旅团再见。<page>我的车厢里给你留了一份惊喜呢，下次见面再为你揭晓！
translated_text: 運が良ければ、私がノミのキャラバンに加わったらまた会えるでしょう。<page>私の馬車には特別な秘密が隠されています。次に会ったときに共有したいと思います。
secondary_translated_text: If you're lucky, you'll see me again when I join the fleas' caravan.<page>There is a special secret hidden in my carriage. I'd like to share it with you the next time we see you.

original_en_text: The pact is made then. Fellows! Steel yourself! It is time, it is time!
original_zh_text: 那么契约达成！伙计们！打起精神！时候到了，时候到了！
translated_text: 合意が成立した。お前ら!強くなれ! It's Time Is Timeシングル
secondary_translated_text: The agreement was reached. you guys! Be strong! It's Time is Time Single

original_en_text: This long lake... Space is much more big here. Finally I have some quiet from the little fleas.
original_zh_text: 这片湖……真宽敞。终于能躲开小跳蚤们清净会儿了。
translated_text: この長い湖。ここはもっと広い空間です。やっと落ち着くことができた。
secondary_translated_text: This long lake. This is a much wider space. I could finally calm down.

original_en_text: Ahh, that is a shame, but I understand. I’m sure our roads will cross each other soon enough.<page>And now, we must be off! Rouse yourself, fleas. The caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 唉，虽然遗憾，但能理解。相信我们很快会重逢的。<page>现在，我们该出发了！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: ごめんね、分かってる。私たちの道はすぐに交差するでしょう。<page>もう行かないと元気を出してノミ。キャラバンがまた走り始めた!
secondary_translated_text: I'm sorry, I know. Our paths will soon be crossed. "<page>I have to go now and get better, Flea. The caravan started running again!

original_en_text: The grand ceremony has ended, but still we play! Will you honour us with a display of Flea Juggle, Miss Grand Champion Hornet?
original_zh_text: 庆典虽已落幕，但游戏不止！冠军大人愿意赏脸继续玩跳蚤耍耍吗？
translated_text: イベントは終わったが、まだ遊んでいる!ノミのジャグラー、チャンピオンのミス·バンブルビーを見せてくれませんか？
secondary_translated_text: The event is over, but we're still playing! will you show me the flea juggler, the champion miss bumblebee?

original_en_text: Wonderful! Wonderful! The fleas will be overjoyed to share this next journey with our favoured companion! Let us away!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会因为有贵客同行而欢欣雀跃！我们这就出发！
translated_text: それは素晴らしい!それは素晴らしい!私たちのお気に入りの仲間と次の旅行を共有して喜んでいます!行こうぜ!
secondary_translated_text: That's awesome! That's awesome! We're excited to share our next trip with our favorite companions! let's go!

original_en_text: Mamashka! Let our beautiful game begin! Flea Bounce!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！蹦蹦游戏开始！
translated_text: おめでとう、ママ!美しいゲームを始めましょう!ノミのバウンス!
secondary_translated_text: Congratulations, Mom! Let's start a beautiful game! Flea bounce!

original_en_text: <hpage>Unfortunately not, Fleamaster. I have visited many of this kingdom’s caves, and none would offer the safety and space you require.<hpage>If ever I come upon such a place, I will let you know.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，并没有。我去过的洞窟都不符合你们的需求。<hpage>但若将来遇到，肯定前来告诉你们。
translated_text: <hpage>残念ながら、フライマスター。私は王国の多くの洞窟を訪れましたが、どれもあなたが必要とする安全とスペースを提供しません。<hpage>こんな場所に来たら教えてあげるよ。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Unfortunately, Flymaster. I have visited many caves in the kingdom, and none of them offer the safety and space you need.<hpage>If you come to a place like this, I'll tell you.

translated_text: ノミのこと。
secondary_translated_text: About fleas.

original_en_text: How do you like our festival, Miss Hornet? While the world crumbles around us, we will laugh and dance and frolick!<page>Make merry with us, and play some of the games of old!<hpage>My time is slim, Fleamaster. If I am to join your games, know it will be only to hone my skills for the greater trial I must soon face below.<page>Of course! Of course! Joy or learnings! Any reason is fine by us, Miss Hornet!<page>And look here, we have Flea Juggle, where the challenge is to strike fleas upwards and keep them airborne for as long as possible.<page>To have our treasured guest challenge this humble game would be an honour for us, truly!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐觉得我们的庆典如何？就算外面世界崩塌，我们照样欢欣起舞！<page>开心点，来陪我们玩玩老游戏吧！<hpage>我时间紧迫。参加游戏只是为了磨练技艺，应对接下来的恶战。<page>都行都行！不管是玩乐或修行都可以！<page>看这里，这是跳蚤耍耍——把跳蚤打上天，滞空越久越好！<page>贵客肯赏脸挑战，我们荣幸之至！
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット、私たちの休暇をどう思いますか？私たちの周りの世界が崩壊するとき、私たちは笑い、踊り、遊ぶ!<page>私たちと一緒に楽しんで、古いゲームをしてください!<hpage>私の時間は短い、フレイマスター。もし私があなたのゲームに参加するなら、それは私が直面するより大きな試練に対処するために私のスキルを磨くためだけです。<page>もちろんです!もちろんです!幸せはまだ学ぶ!理由は何でも、ミス·ホーネット!<page>ここを見てくださいノミのジャグリングがあります課題はノミに当たってできるだけ長く空中に飛ばせることです<page>大切なお客様をお迎えして、このささやかなコンテストに挑戦できることを大変光栄に思います。
secondary_translated_text: miss hornet, what do you think of our vacation? When the world around us collapses, we laugh, dance and play!<page>Have fun with us and play an old game!<hpage>My time is short, Freymaster. If I participate in your game, it is only to hone my skills to deal with the greater trials that I face.<page>of course! of course! Happiness is still learning! Whatever the reason, Miss Hornet! "<page>Look here, there's a flea juggling, and the challenge is to get it to fly in the air as long as possible per flea.<page>It is a great honor to welcome our valued guests to take on this humble contest.

original_en_text: A mistake, treasured guest! Never again! Ohhh. Never again!
original_zh_text: 一场误会啊贵客！绝不再犯！我保证！
translated_text: それは間違いです、親愛なるゲスト!もうだめだ!もう二度と!
secondary_translated_text: That's a mistake, dear guest! not anymore! Not again!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Amongst all of your troupe, I had little doubt you would survive to reach this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Bug not flea! Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, share them with me. I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>My learnings? Not free for you, bug not flea. Rosaries! Give those and I shall say of what I have sensed. Work like mine... much long, and hard. For that, I deserve some riches held.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。你能平安到达这里倒是不令我意外。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>我的发现？外族虫，不白给，拿念珠来！我这行当又苦又累，理应拿点报酬。
translated_text: <hpage>再び、大きなノミに乾杯。皆さんのチームの中で、皆さんがこのチームにたどり着くことは間違いありません。<hpage>このような恐ろしい方法で仲間から距離を置くために必要な任務を教えてください。<page>咕噜……昆虫不是跳蚤!私のものは痕跡、匂い、鋭い感覚で追跡されます。私たちのノミの友人、最年少のノミを見つけ、それらを一緒に集め、強くします。<hpage>他のノミの場所を見つけたら、私と共有してください。キャラバンまで安全に運ぶことができるかもしれません。<page>私の研究？それはあなたのために無料ではなく、虫はノミではない。ロザリオだ!それを念頭に置いて、私の気持ちをお伝えします。私のように働く。長くて難しい。そのためには富が必要です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Again, toast to the big fleas. Within your team, there is no doubt that you will arrive at this team.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are needed to distance yourself from your comrades in such a terrifying way.<page>Gollum... Insects are not fleas! Mine is tracked by traces, smells, and sharp senses. Find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and gather them together to make them stronger.<hpage>If you find any other flea locations, please share with me. You may be able to safely transport them to the caravan.<page>my research? It's not free for you, and the bug is not a flea. Rosario! With that in mind, I will convey my feelings. Work like me. Long and hard. To do this, we need wealth.

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company.<page>But, oh! The world has grown so dangerous, and there may be more lost fleas out there. I do so hope they can find their way to us!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>如今外面更凶险了，可能还有其他流落的同胞。真希望他们能找到我们！
translated_text: 多くの迷子のノミがここに来る。まさか、こんな大企業が集まるとは思わなかった。<page>しかし、Oh!世界は危険になり、より多くのノミが消えるかもしれません。私たちの道を見つけてほしいです!
secondary_translated_text: Many lost fleas come here. I didn't expect such a big company to come together.<page>But, oh! The world could be dangerous and more fleas could disappear. We hope you find our way!

original_en_text: We fleas are all gathered, but now the world has loudly marked its ending! As great as our numbers grew, it seems our caravan will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but the preparations require time. If your travels wind their way back to us, dear friend, you yourself are welcome to participate...
original_zh_text: 跳蚤们虽已团聚，但世界即将毁灭！恐怕我们是最后的旅团了…….<page>只剩最后一事可做……但需时间准备。亲爱的朋友，如果再来，欢迎参与……
translated_text: 私たちノミは皆一緒に集まったが、今、世界は大声でその終わりを告げている。私たちの数は増え続けていますが、私たちのチームは最後のようです。<page>やるべきことはただ一つ残っているしかし準備には時間がかかる。親愛なる友人たち、あなたの旅行が私たちに戻ったら、個人的に参加することを歓迎します。
secondary_translated_text: We fleas have all gathered together, but now the world is loudly announcing its end. Our numbers continue to grow, but our team seems to be the last.<page>There 's only one thing left to do, but it takes time to prepare. Dear friends, when your trip returns to us, we welcome you to join in person.

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, I must tell, we’ve seen evidence nearby of a hunter of our tribe, a flea that seeks fleas!<page>As pungent and gruff as their sort often are, they’re still useful to have around a caravan.<page>A flea of their rare skill, settled among us, could offer defence and more.<page>If you’re still to be helping grow our town, search them out, up atop the muck choked ducts.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！附近有我们族群的猎手出没的迹象，那是位专逮跳蚤的跳蚤！<page>虽然那家伙臭烘烘的又粗鲁，但对旅团很有用。<page>这样的好手要是能入伙，既能当护卫又有大用。<page>如果您还愿意帮忙壮大我们的旅团，就去腐殖渠上面找找吧！
translated_text: ミス·バンブルビー、私はあなたに言わなければならない、私たちは近所で私たちの部族のハンターの証拠を見た、ノミを探しているノミ!<page>彼らは通常スパイシーで失礼ですが、キャラバンの周りではまだ非常に有用です。<page>レアスキルを持つノミが私たちの間に定着し、防御などを提供します。<page>それでも私たちの町の発展を手伝いたいなら、シルトで詰まったパイプの中を探してください。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, I must tell you, we have seen evidence of hunters of our tribe in the neighborhood, looking for fleas, fleas!<page>They are usually spicy and rude, but they are still very useful around the caravan.<page>Fleas with rare skills will settle among us, providing defense and more.<page>Still, if you want to help our town develop, look in the pipes that are clogged with silt.

original_en_text: A cauldron full of Flea Brew.
translated_text: ビールでいっぱいの鍋。
secondary_translated_text: Pot full of beer.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive safe to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine was to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together so strong they could grow.<page>A task once important, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. A rare many! Time for toasts, and brew to fill our bellies!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我以前负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<page>这差事曾经很重要，但不需要了！现在大伙都齐了！该喝酒庆祝！
translated_text: <hpage>再び、大きなノミに乾杯。あなたの多くの仲間の中で、私はあなたがこの船団を安全に見つけることを心配しません。<hpage>このような恐ろしい方法で仲間から距離を置くために必要な任務を教えてください。<page>私の目的は、痕跡、匂い、鋭い感覚でそれを追跡することでした。私たちのノミの友達、最年少のノミを見つけ、それらを一緒に集めて、より強く成長させましょう。<page>これは私の大きな仕事でした!でも今は違いますすべてのノミはここにあり安全です。もっと珍しい!グラスを持ち上げて、ワインでお腹を満たす時間です!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Again, toast to the big fleas. Among your many companions, I do not worry that you will find this convoy safe.<hpage>Tell me what tasks are needed to distance yourself from your comrades in such a terrifying way.<page>My aim was to track it down with traces, smells, and sharp sensations. Let's find our flea friend, the youngest flea, and gather them together to grow stronger.<page>This has been my big job! But now it's not. All the fleas are here and safe. More unusual! It's time to lift your glass and fill your stomach with wine!

original_en_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flocked to our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers grow grand. Mayhap, in time, we could grow to match even those caravans of our fabled past?<hpage>To see so many safe is a welcome sight, Fleamaster. Their playful cheer suggests you are a fine steward for the swelling troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 看！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。或许能重现当年先祖们的盛况？<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: ここを見ろ!これらの活発なノミはすべて私たちの艦隊に群がった。あなたとあなたの狩猟のおかげで、私たちの数は増えています。時間の経過とともに、伝説的な過去のキャラバンに匹敵するように成長するかもしれません。<hpage>多くの人々が安全に見えるのは歓迎すべき光景です、フレックマスター。彼らの遊び心のある歓声は、あなたが成長する劇団の素晴らしい執事であることを示します。<page>あなたはとても素敵です、ミス·ホーネット!こんな素敵な友達に出会えて本当にラッキーです!<page>しかし、今すぐ行かなければ!この土地は長い間私たちの主人でした。乾燥した洞窟に登る時間です!<page>ノミの良き友よ、次の旅に参加しませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Look here! " All of these active fleas swarmed into our fleet. Thanks to you and your hunting, our number is increasing. " Over time, it may grow to be comparable to the caravans of the legendary past.<hpage>It's a welcome sight that many people look safe, Fleckmaster. Their playful cheers show that you are a great butler of a growing troupe.<page>You are so lovely, Miss Hornet! I am so lucky to have such a lovely friend!<page>But you have to go now! This land was our master for a long time. It's time to climb the dry caves!<page>Good friend of the flea, do you want to join us on our next journey?

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended.<page>Bug not flea... impressive was your performance. Your score exceeds even my own.<page>To see skill so much, moments before everything ends, gives me unexpected joy.<page>Rishkiz... I congratulate you, champion.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。<page>虫子，你超越了我，没想到外族也有这种身手。<page>末日临近还能见识这般技艺，着实是意料之外的惊喜。<page>里什基兹……祝贺你，冠军。
translated_text: ヴィクナー。裁判は終わった<page>昆虫はノミではない。あなたの演技は印象的です。あなたのスコアは私よりも高いです。<page>すべてが終わる前の瞬間にたくさんのテクニックを見ることは、私に予想外の喜びを与えてくれました。<page>おめでとうございます、チャンピオン。
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over.<page>Insects are not fleas. Your acting is impressive. " Your score is higher than mine. "<page>Watching so many techniques in the moments before it all ended gave me an unexpected joy.<page>Congratulations, champion.

translated_text: ダッジは
secondary_translated_text: dodge said

original_en_text: Ahh, Miss Hornet! Greetings, and well met, once again!<page>The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! And now fate has brought us back together again... what a marvel!<hpage>It is good to see you safe, Fleamaster. The journey to this moor from the caverns below is long and dangerous.<page>Dangerous, certainly, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 啊！大黄蜂小姐！又见面真是太好了！<page>长途跋涉到这但没丢一只跳蚤！命运也让我们重逢……真是奇迹！<hpage>旅团平安就好，从下方洞窟到这沼地，路上肯定充满危险。<page>确实有不少危险，但跳蚤天生爱流浪！<page>现在，您去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: ああ、ミス·ホーネット!こんにちは、また会いました!<page>ここまで来るのは長い道のりでしたが、ノミを失わなかった!私たちを再会させた魔法の運命!<hpage>無事に会えてよかった、マスター·ノミ下の洞窟から沼への旅は長く危険な旅でした。<page>もちろん危険ですが、ノミは歩き回るために生まれました。<page>沸騰した大釜のそばに座っているグリシキンに会いに行かなければならない。長い旅の後は、飲み会!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Hi, we met again!<page>It was a long way to get here, but we didn't lose the flea! A magical destiny that brought us back together!<hpage>It was good to see you safely, Master Flea, the journey from the cave below to the swamp was a long and dangerous journey.<page>Of course it's dangerous, but fleas were born to walk around.<page>I must go to see Grisikin, who is sitting by the boiling kettle. After a long trip, a drink!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave.<hpage>I have encountered several of your fellow fleas, united in a caravan. Perhaps you would consider joining with them?<hpage>Yours seems a hardy hide, and I fear alone they lack the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.<page>Now... Grrr. Much talk I gave. You leave me! Meet again at caravan, amongst good fellows. There I share my learnings of fleas and Pharloom. Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤。也不打算抢你山洞。<hpage>我在一个旅团见过你的同胞。为何不加入他们？<hpage>你看着有些本事，他们也缺少护卫。<page>旅团？吼……感觉到了……是时候了。旅团出发，我在这的活也要结束了。<page>唔……不废话了。你走吧！在旅团再见，到时告诉你跳蚤位置的情报。现在我要休息！
translated_text: ゴラム。昆虫はノミではない。何で邪魔してるの？このポジションは私のもの、フェアプレー、勝利。<hpage>私は長く滞在しません、マダム。私はこの洞窟にあなたの権利を疑わない。<hpage>キャラバンに集まったあなたの仲間のノミに会いました。参加を検討しますか？<hpage>あなたの毛皮は丈夫に見えますが、それ自体はこの土地で長く生き残る力に欠けています。<page>Caravan？え~~。私の毛皮でそれを感じる。変化の時が来た。キャラバンが接近すれば、私の任務、この土地はほぼ完了するかもしれません。<page>現在は..。ゴラム。たくさん話したわ。放っておいて!親友のキャラバンで再会しました。そこで私はノミとファロについて知っていることを共有しましたそれまでは、休息が必要です!止めろ、バグ!
secondary_translated_text: Gollum. Insects are not fleas. why are you interrupting me? This position is mine, fair play, winning.<hpage>I won't stay long, ma 'am. I doubt your right to this cave.<hpage>I met your fellow fleas who had gathered in the caravan. Are you considering joining?<hpage>Your fur looks sturdy, but it itself lacks the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? ah ~! I feel it in my fur. The time for change has come. If the caravan approaches, my mission, this land, may be almost complete.<page>Currently, it is... Gollum. we talked a lot. Leave him alone! We met again in a best friend's caravan. So I shared what I know about fleas and pharo, until then, you need to rest! Stop it, bug!

original_en_text: Ohhhh! What other choice do we poor wretches have?! Cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 唉！我们这些可怜虫别无选择！残酷的命运只留下这一最后任务……<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: おお!貧乏人はどんな選択をするのか？残酷な命は私たちに最后のだけを残す。<page>親愛なる友人たち。ミス·ホーネット!失礼しますが、もう一つお願いします。最後のショーを完成させてくれませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God. What choices do the poor make? A cruel life leaves us only the last.<page>My dear friends, miss hornet! Excuse me, but I'd like another one. will you please finish the last show?

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>Miss Hornet, with your skill, I’m certain you could best all three of our games and become the grandest champion of them all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束！新的耍耍冠军诞生了！太强了！<page>以大黄蜂小姐的本事绝对能包揽我们三种游戏的冠军！
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!ゲームは終了し、新たなヴォイラーが登場しました!信じられない!<page>ミス·ホーネット、あなたのスキルで、私たちの3つのレースで最高の結果を出し、すべてのレースで最高のチャンピオンになると確信しています!
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! The game is over, and a new voiler has appeared! This is unbelievable!<page>Miss Hornet, I am sure that with your skills, you will be the best in our three races and the best champion in all races!

original_en_text: My, what a sweet face now emerges from the darkness! Poor Kratt has been hiding here from those blackened beasts for too long, all alone!<hpage>The beasts and bugs ensnared by the black thread are dangerous indeed. You have done right to hide yourself from them, sir.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 哇，没想到黑暗中竟出现这样一张美丽的脸！可怜的克拉特独自在这躲避黑丝好久了。<hpage>受丝咒侵蚀的虫兽确实危险，你躲起来是对的。<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: 暗闇の中になんと美しい顔が現れたのでしょう!かわいそうなクラートは、暗くなった獣から長い間一人でここに隠れていた!<hpage>黒い線に捕らわれた獣や昆虫は本当に危険です。彼らから身を隠すのは正しいことです。<hpage>あの金属製の馬車これはあなたのものだと思います。<page>ああ、はい、はい!私は最近のノミの艦隊に加わるつもりですよね？セキュリティですよね？一人でリスクを取るのに疲れた。<page>そして、あなたは..。そこで会えると思いますか？私の馬車には特別な秘密が隠されています。次に会ったときに共有したいと思います。えっ!!
secondary_translated_text: In the darkness, a beautiful face appeared! Poor Crat had been hiding here for a long time alone from the darkened beast!<hpage>Beasts and insects caught in the black line are really dangerous. It's right to hide from them.<hpage>That metal carriage, I think it's yours.<page>Oh, yeah, yeah! i'm going to join the fleet of fleas recently, right? security, right? I was tired of taking risks alone.<page>And then you... do you think we can meet there? There is a special secret hidden in my carriage. I'd like to share it with you the next time we see you. what?!

original_en_text: There are still many fleas for us to be united with though, and we’ve rested long enough. The caravan must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! I introduced myself earlier without ever asking for your own name. Forgive me! Please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<hpage>I still have a long journey ahead of me. If I come across any more fleas, I will assist where I am able.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing for me to hear!<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan must be away now, toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 虽然还有许多同胞未归，但我们休整太久了。旅团该向高处进发了！<page>哎呀我真是失礼！之前只顾自报家门，还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<hpage>我的旅途尚未结束，如果再遇见跳蚤，会尽力帮助他们的。<page>哎呀！这可太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: しかし、私たちが団結する必要があるノミはまだたくさんあり、私たちは十分に休んでいます。チームはもっと高くなるべき!<page>しかし、私がいかに怠慢であるか不思議です!前に自己紹介をしたが、名前は聞かなかった。許してくれ!さあ、何て呼べばいいの？<hpage>バンブルビーと呼んでくださいフレイマスターあなたの仲間のノミがあなたの艦隊で安全であることを見て喜んでいます。一人旅は危険な土地です。<hpage>私にはまだ長い道のりがありますもっとノミに遭遇したら、できる限りのことをします。<page>ワヴェンダ!言い換えれば、信じられない!このニュースを聞いてよかった!<page>親愛なる友人たち。ミス·バンブルビー私たちのキャラバンは今、高地の広大な沼に出発しなければならない。ゲストとして、一緒に旅行しませんか？
secondary_translated_text: However, there are still many fleas that we need to unite, and we are well rested. The team needs to be higher!<page>But I wonder how lazy I am! I introduced myself before, but I didn't ask her name. Please forgive me! come on, what should i call you?<hpage>Call me Bumblebee, Master Frey. I'm glad to see your fellow fleas are safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is a dangerous land.<hpage>I still have a long way to go and if I encounter more fleas, I will do my best.<page>Wavenda! In other words, I cannot believe it! Glad to hear this news! "<page>My dear friends, Miss Bumblebee, our caravan must now set out for the vast swamp of the Highlands. Would you like to travel with us as a guest?

original_en_text: So many awful places have us fleas travelled. Many times I almost die. But here is seems safe enough.<page>You will have rest too? Is space enough for us all now... friend.
original_zh_text: 旅团闯过了多少险地，好几回我都差点死了。但这里似乎很安全。<page>你也留下休息吧，朋友？现在地方够大。
translated_text: ノミは恐ろしい場所に行きました何度も死にそうになった。しかし、ここは十分に安全です。<page>あなたも休みたいですか。私たち全員のための十分なスペースがありますか？友達だよ
secondary_translated_text: The flea went to a terrifying place and almost died many times. But it's safe enough here.<page>Do you want to rest too? Is there enough space for all of us? we're friends.

original_en_text: Welcome again, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan has climbed, resting right on the doorstep of that mighty Citadel!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! We have seen the many husks in passing. A mighty luck must shine on us, to journey with such success.
original_zh_text: 欢迎您，大黄蜂小姐！看我们攀得多高啊，就在圣堡大门旁！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！沿途见到了无数空壳。我们定是受命运庇佑。
translated_text: ようこそ、ミス·ホーネット!私たちのキャラバンがいかに高く登り、強大な城の門で止まったか見てください!<hpage>幸運なことに、あなたの仲間は皆、長い旅を生き延びた、フライマスター。隣の遠吠えと目の前のもつれた木は、無数の昆虫の命を奪った。<page>本当にそうです!危険が上がる!過去にたくさんの貝殻を見ました。このような成功を収めることができて幸運です。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan climbed and stopped at the gates of the mighty castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived the long journey, Flymaster. The barking of the neighbor and the tangled trees in front of him took the lives of countless insects.<page>It really is! Danger is rising! I have seen many shells in the past. We are fortunate to have such a success.

original_en_text: Look, look! So many fleas have joined the caravan! What a miracle! We can not thank you enough for honouring our humble wish!
original_zh_text: 看呐！这么多跳蚤加入了旅团！真是奇迹！真不知该如何感激您实现愿望！
translated_text: 見て!見て!チームにはたくさんの人がいます!なんて奇跡だ!私たちの小さな願いを叶えてくれてありがとう!
secondary_translated_text: Look at me! Look at me! We have a lot of people on the team! what a miracle! Thank you for fulfilling our little wishes!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You help find! And bring! Best we come together, we fleas all... now that times turn dark...
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......
translated_text: あなたが留まるなら、虫はノミではないか。私のサービスをお願いしますよね？私は洞窟の中で失われた小さなものを聞いたり匂いを嗅いだりする場所について多くを学びました<page>見つけるのを手伝って!それを持ってきてみんなを殺した方がいい今は时代はもう暗くなって
secondary_translated_text: If you stay, aren't the bugs fleas? you're asking for my services, aren't you? I've learned a lot about the places in the lost caves where I hear and smell little things.<page>Help me find them! i'd better bring it and kill everyone. now the times are getting darker.

original_en_text: As you wish, sweet one. Shall we just rest here together on the shore of eternity instead?
original_zh_text: 如你所愿，甜心。要不就和我在这岸边静静地守望末日？
translated_text: 好きなように、ハニー。永遠の海岸で一緒に休むのでしょうか。
secondary_translated_text: Whatever you like, honey. Will we rest together on the shores of eternity?

translated_text: SPAへのアクセス？
secondary_translated_text: Access to the spa?

original_en_text: Mamashka! I am saying, let the game begin! Flea Juggle!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！我是说，游戏开始！跳蚤耍耍！
translated_text: おめでとう、ママ!つまり、ゲームを開始しましょう!ノミのトリック!
secondary_translated_text: Congratulations, Mom! In other words, let's start the game! Flea tricks!

original_en_text: What a beautiful spot you’ve gifted us, Miss Hornet! Safe apart from the dark and death of the lands beside. A place for fleas to grow smart and strong.<page>Here we shall see our travels end, for in Pharloom there could be no finer place to settle.<hpage>I am glad the location suits, Fleamaster. It is a calming thing to know these many fleas may survive. Most bugs of Pharloom seem destined for far bleaker fates.<page>Indeed! A hopeful future awaits! And only because of yourself and your efforts. To commemorate our arrival, it would be my pleasure to perform a small service for you.<page>I have been learning to sew, and the little fleas have been gathering materials for me. I thought I could add an extra pocket to your tool pouch, to make your travels just a little easier.<page>A trifling favour, much less than you deserve, but still I hope it meets to your satisfaction!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐选的地方太好了！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット、あなたは私たちに素晴らしい場所を与えてくれました!暗闇と死から離れてノミが賢く、強くなる場所。<page>ファルムにはこれ以上の定住地がないので、ここで旅を終えます。<hpage>この場所が正しいと嬉しいよ、マスター·ノミ。ノミが生き残ることを知ることは平和なことです。ほとんどのファル昆虫は、より悲劇的な運命にあるようです。<page>本当にそうです!希望に満ちた未来が待っている!あなた自身とあなたの努力のためだけに。私たちの到着を記念して、私はあなたに小さなサービスを提供することを嬉しく思います。<page>裁縫を習っていて、ノミが材料を集めてくれました。私はあなたのバッグに余分なポケットを追加して、あなたの旅行をより簡単にすることができると思います。<page>あなたが値するよりもはるかに少ない小さな仕事ですが、私はまだそれがあなたを満足させたいです!
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, you have given us a wonderful place! " A place where fleas become wise and stronger away from darkness and death.<page>We end our journey here, as there is no more settlement in the farm.<hpage>I am glad this place is right, Master Nami. It is peaceful to know that the fleas will survive. Most falcon insects seem to have a more tragic fate.<page>It really is! A future full of hope awaits us! Only for yourself and your efforts. In commemoration of our arrival, I am pleased to offer you a small service.<page>I was learning how to sew, and fleas collected the materials for me. I think you can add an extra pocket to your bag to make your travel easier.<page>It's a small job much less than you deserve, but I still want it to satisfy you!

original_en_text: My dear Flea Bounce champion, will you play with us again? Let us dance and fly above the waters until the world itself falls away!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的蹦蹦冠军，要再玩一次吗？在水面上飞舞直至世界崩塌吧！
translated_text: 私の親愛なるバウンスチャンピオン、あなたはまだ私たちと一緒にプレイしますか？世界が消えるまで、水の上で踊って飛びましょう。
secondary_translated_text: My dear bounce champion, will you still play with us? Let's dance and fly on the water until the world disappears.

original_en_text: Sweet one! What a delight to see you emerge from the horrible darkness now enveloping the world!<page>Poor Kratt feared he would have only his mangy fellow fleas for company at the end of everything. How kind of you to spend your last moments here with me!
original_zh_text: 甜心！没想到世界末日还能和你见面，真高兴！<page>可怜的克拉特本以为最后只能和脏跳蚤们作伴，多谢你在这最后时刻陪着我！
translated_text: ハニー!世界を覆う恐ろしい暗闇から出てきてくれて嬉しいです!<page>かわいそうなクラットは、最終的には汚れたノミの仲間だけになることを恐れた。最後の瞬間を一緒に過ごせてよかったです!
secondary_translated_text: honey! Glad you came out of the terrible darkness that covers the world!<page>Poor Crat was afraid that in the end he would only be a companion of the dirty fleas. I was so glad we spent the last few moments together!

translated_text: ワスプ
secondary_translated_text: WASP

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan? I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh yes, indeed! And look here, they all have made their way to us! So many gathered, it seems a miracle. Our wishes granted before even your promise was known!
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地祈愿墙接下你的委托。你在召集跳蚤加入旅团？我在旅途中已经解救了许多跳蚤。<page>没错！看啊，它们全都归队了！我们的祈愿尚未传达，就已然实现，真是个奇迹！
translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster、私は巡礼者キャンプのウィッシュウォールからあなたのリクエストを受け取りました。あなたの艦隊に加わるためにノミを探していますか？私は旅の中で多くの人々を見つけ、解放しました。<page>ああ、はい、はい!見て、みんなこっちに来てる!こんなにたくさんの人が集まったのは奇跡です。あなたの約束が知られる前に、私たちの願いは叶いました!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I have received your request from the wishwall of the Pilgrim Camp. Are you looking for fleas to join your fleet? I have found and released many people in my journey.<page>Oh, yeah, yeah! Look, they're all coming here! It's a miracle that so many people have gathered. Before your promise was known, our wish was fulfilled!

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, but you can play again, as much you wish... until the end of the world comes for us all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！我是说，游戏结束，但随时可以重玩……直到世界末日！
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!ゲームは終了しましたが、ご希望であればもう一度プレイできます。世界が終わるまで!
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! The game is over, but you can play it again if you wish. Until the world ends!

original_en_text: Stranger, will you hear my worry? The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>Would you, could you, help us find these poor, lost fleas? We daren’t continue our journey until some of the poor dears have found their way here to us!
original_zh_text: 旅者，愿意跟我聊聊么？我们跳蚤的祖辈曾相聚同行，现在我想是时候召集同胞了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>您……愿意帮忙寻找迷途的跳蚤们吗？同胞没有到齐我们不敢上路啊！
translated_text: 見知らぬ人、私の心配が聞こえますか？今こそ、私たちノミがお互いを探し、前の世代に起こったように、一緒に旅する時です。<page>王国の多くのノミが私たちのキャラバンに群がるはずですが、時代は危険になっています。あなたも感じますよね。私たちのかわいそうないとこが隠れています!<page>迷子のノミを見つけるのを手伝ってくれませんか？貧しい親戚に見つかるまで旅を続ける勇気はありません。
secondary_translated_text: stranger, can you hear my worries? Now is the time for us fleas to look for each other and travel together, as happened to previous generations.<page>Many fleas in the kingdom should swarm on our caravans, but the times are becoming dangerous. You feel it too, don't you? Our poor cousin is hiding out! "<page>will you help me find the lost flea? They have no courage to continue their journey until they are found by poor relatives.

translated_text: Flea Caravanとは？
secondary_translated_text: What is a Flea Caravan?

original_en_text: Alas, Miss Hornet! Until our paths cross again, our dearest wishes go with you.<hpage>Safe travels to you and your troupe, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 那好吧，大黄蜂小姐！愿好运常伴您左右，下次再见！<hpage>也祝你们一路平安。
translated_text: ああ、ミス·ホーネット!私たちの道が再び出会う前に、私たちの心よりもあなたと共にあることを願う。<hpage>Fleamaster、あなたとあなたの劇団の安全な旅をお祈りします。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! I wish we were more with you than our hearts before our paths meet again.<hpage>Fleamaster, we wish you and your troupe a safe journey.

original_en_text: And so the great ceremony has reached its climax and its grand champion has emerged!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Hornet.<page>Though the world will soon end, and our paradise will crumble, the memories of friendship we all shared shall surely echo through the oncoming void for all eternity!<hpage>Fleamaster, your sentiment is kind, but this world will not end.<page>Oh? How good of you to speak words of hope for our benefit, but we have accepted our fate. Come, let us forget the past and revel together!<hpage>It is not merely hope that I offer you, sir, but a promise. This kingdom’s suffering has a singular cause, and by my own claw will it be cleansed.<hpage>Perhaps not every flea will survive what is coming... but the world will not die, and your settlement may still see chance to prosper.<page>Ahh? You speak... with such conviction. But I cannot bring myself to hope such, I am sorry.<page>Come what may, we fleas will be here until the end. And the games will continue, of course! Celebrate with us for as long as you wish, dear friend.
original_zh_text: 加冕仪式结束，庆典高潮已过，总冠军诞生！<page>大黄蜂小姐，感谢您与我们共度最后的时光。<page>纵使世界即将毁灭，乐园即将倒塌，我们的友谊也会永存于虚空之间！<hpage>谢谢你，跳蚤首领。但世界不会终结的。<page>感谢您在这最后关头还给我们希望，但我们认命了。还是及时行乐吧！<hpage>我给的并非虚无缥缈的希望，而是承诺。纺络的苦难都有源头，而我一定会亲手将其终结。<hpage>或许不是所有跳蚤都能幸存……但只要世界不毁灭，旅团终将再次启程。<page>啊哈哈，您这话……信念坚定。但我已不敢奢望。<page>无论如何，跳蚤们会坚持到最后。游戏永不停止！您想在这里玩多久都行，朋友！
translated_text: 祭りはクライマックスに達し、偉大なチャンピオンが現れました!<page>最後の時間をここで過ごしてくれてありがとう、ミス·ホーネット。<page>世界が滅び、天国が崩壊するとしても、私たちの友情の記憶は、来るべき虚空に永遠に響き渡るでしょう。<hpage>Fleamaster、あなたの関係は素晴らしいですが、世界は終わらないでしょう。<page>え？ああ？あなたが私たちのために希望に満ちた言葉を言ってくれたのは素晴らしいことですが、私たちは運命を受け入れました。さあ、過去を忘れて、一緒に楽しみましょう!<hpage>私はあなたに希望だけでなく、約束も与えます。この王国の苦しみには独特の原因があり、私は私の爪でそれを浄化する。<hpage>すべてのノミが来るものを生き残ることはできません。しかし、世界は死なず、あなたの定住地はまだ繁栄するチャンスがあるかもしれません。<page>え？えっ？言ってみろよこの信念をもって。自分に希望が持てなくて、ごめんなさい。<page>何があっても、私たちは最後までここにいます。もちろん、ゲームは続きます!親愛なる友人たち、あなたが望むなら、私たちと一緒に祝うことができます。
secondary_translated_text: The festival has reached its climax and the great champion has appeared!<page>Thank you for spending your last hour here, Miss Hornet.<page>Even if the world perishes and the heavens fall apart, the memory of our friendship will echo forever in the void to come.<hpage>Fleamaster, your relationship is great, but the world won't end.<page>what? huh? It is wonderful that you have spoken words full of hope for us, but we have accepted our fate. Come on, let's forget the past and have fun together!<hpage>I give you not only hope, but also promise. The suffering of this kingdom has a unique cause, and I will cleanse it with my claws.<hpage>Not all fleas can survive what comes to them. However, the world will not die, and your settlement may still have a chance to thrive.<page>what? what? Tell me, with this belief. I'm sorry I didn't have hope for myself.<page>No matter what happens, we'll be here to the end. Of course, the game will continue! Dear friends, if you wish, you can celebrate with us.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，新的耍耍冠军诞生！太强了！<page>您已称霸所有跳蚤游戏！<page>是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: ヴィッカーナー!ゲームは終了し、新たなヴォイラーが登場しました!信じられない!<page>あなたは私たちが獲得したすべてのノミコンテストのチャンピオンであることを証明しました!<page>音楽祭の総合優勝者が出てきました。もちろんそうだ!<page>最後の儀式が始まりました。ノミ、準備完了!
secondary_translated_text: vicarner! The game is over, and a new voiler has appeared! This is unbelievable!<page>You've proven to be the champion of every flea contest we've won!<page>The overall winner of the music festival came out. Of course you do!<page>The final ceremony began. Flea, ready to go!

original_en_text: You not want my learnings, bug not flea? Rare it is we share such things with ones outside our own.
original_zh_text: 不想要我情报？我们可很少愿意和外族分享这些。
translated_text: 虫はノミではないという知識が欲しくないのか？私たちはめったに外の人と共有しません
secondary_translated_text: don't you want to know that bugs aren't fleas? We rarely share it with people outside.

translated_text: ノミのジャグリングコンテスト？
secondary_translated_text: a flea juggling contest?

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, you are the greatest of us all in the Flea Juggle! But will you challenge yourself to ever higher achievements?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐是耍耍之王！要挑战更高记录吗？
translated_text: ミス·ホーネット、あなたはノミの中で最高です!より高い結果を達成するために挑戦しますか？
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hornet, you are the best of the fleas! Do you challenge yourself to achieve higher results?

original_en_text: Dodeshna, stranger. You are looking a little... tired, is it? Unhealthy?<page>You can rest with us here, if wish. Is nice and dark, and warmth from below brings good health.<page>Still, you should make care not to stay much long. You are not flea, after all.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，旅者。你看着……有点累？<page>想休息可以留下。这儿又暗又暖，很适合休养。<page>但别待太久，毕竟你终究不是跳蚤。
translated_text: ドシュナー、見知らぬ人。あなたは少し見える。疲れたのか？不健康な？<page>ご希望であれば、ここで休憩してください。天気は明るく暗く、下の暖かさは健康をもたらします。<page>しかし、あまり長く滞在しないように注意してください。結局、あなたはノミではない。
secondary_translated_text: Doshner, the stranger. You look a little. are you tired? unhealthy?<page>If you wish, take a break here. The weather is bright and dark, and the warmth below brings health.<page>However, be careful not to stay too long. After all, you are not a flea.

original_en_text: You still here, bug? Is rest I need before I travel. Not chat. You is trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again in more hospitable surrounds.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就走。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们下次再见。
translated_text: まだここにいるのか、バグ？旅行前に必要な休息です。チャットはなし。あなたは困っている殻を緊張させる。<hpage>もう行かないと、お嬢さん。旅の中で強くなりなさい。また素敵な環境でお会いしましょう。
secondary_translated_text: are you still here, bug? It is a necessary rest before traveling. There is no chat. You strain the shell that is in trouble.<hpage>I have to go now, miss. Be strong in the journey. See you again in a lovely environment.

original_en_text: Look, Miss Hornet! See the many lively fleas that form our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, so many are here! And all are eager again to travel!<page>We had once wished to match the numbers of our fabled past, yet now, we may even have exceeded them!<hpage>It is a welcome sight, Fleamaster, and the playful cheer about the caravan suggests you are a fine steward to the troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 请看，大黄蜂小姐！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。大家都盼着再度启程！<page>我们曾奢望恢复传说中的旅团规模，而现在或许已经超越了传说！<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: 見て、ミス·ホーネット!私たちの艦隊を構成する多くの活発なノミを見なさい。たくさんの人に感謝します!たくさんの人がいます!誰もがまた旅行したい!<page>過去の伝説的な数字に追いつくことを望んでいましたが、今はそれを上回るかもしれません。<hpage>フリートマスター、それは人気のある光景であり、キャラバンの遊び心のある歓声は、あなたが劇団の優れた執事であることを示しています。<page>あなたはとても素敵です、ミス·ホーネット!こんな素敵な友達に出会えて本当にラッキーです!<page>しかし、今すぐ行かなければ!この土地は長い間私たちの主人でした。乾燥した洞窟に登る時間です!<page>ノミの良き友よ、次の旅に参加しませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Look, Miss Hornet! Look at the many active fleas that make up our fleet. Thank you so many people! There are so many people! Everybody wants to travel again!<page>We hoped to catch up with the legendary figures of the past, but now we may surpass them.<hpage>Fleetmaster, it is a popular sight, and the playful cheers of the caravan show that you are an excellent butler of the troupe.<page>You are so lovely, Miss Hornet! I am so lucky to have such a lovely friend!<page>But you have to go now! This land was our master for a long time. It's time to climb the dry caves!<page>Good friend of the flea, do you want to join us on our next journey?

original_en_text: Marvellous! We fleas shall be overjoyed to have your company on the road.<page>Now! Our new home is calling. We must travel!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会为与你同行而欢呼！<page>现在！该向着新家进发了！
translated_text: それは素晴らしい!私たちのクラブは喜んであなたと一緒にいます。<page>今だ!新しい家が呼ばれている。旅行しないと!
secondary_translated_text: That's awesome! Our club is happy to be with you.<page>now! A new home is being called. You have to travel!

original_en_text: I’m wonder at this land... Something heavy hangs above, like shadow. I’m hope the little fleas have not much danger here...
original_zh_text: 这地方不对劲……总觉得天上有黑影压着。但愿小家伙们别出事……
translated_text: 私はこの土地にとても興味がある。影のような重いものがぶら下がっている。小さなノミがあまり危険にさらされないことを願っています。
secondary_translated_text: I am very interested in this land. Something heavy, like a shadow, is hanging. Hopefully the little fleas won't be in too much danger.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan?<page>Oh, yes! The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>But... do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help find the poor, lost fleas? Truly?
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地看到了你的祈愿。你要召集跳蚤加入旅团？<page>正是！跳蚤们该像祖辈那样聚首同行了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>但……您真的愿帮忙寻找我们迷途的同胞？当真？
translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster、私は巡礼者キャンプのウィッシュウォールからあなたのリクエストを受け取りました。あなたの艦隊に加わるためにノミを探していますか？<page>ああ!はい!今こそ、私たちノミがお互いを探し、前の世代に起こったように、一緒に旅する時です。<page>王国の多くのノミが私たちのキャラバンに群がるはずですが、時代は危険になっています。あなたも感じますよね。私たちのかわいそうないとこが隠れています!<page>しかし...。見知らぬ人、私はあなたの意味を理解するか。迷子のノミを見つけるのを手伝ってくれませんか？ホントに？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I have received your request from the wishwall of the Pilgrim Camp. Are you looking for fleas to join your fleet?<page>oh! yes! Now is the time for us fleas to look for each other and travel together, as happened to previous generations.<page>Many fleas in the kingdom should swarm on our caravans, but the times are becoming dangerous. You feel it too, don't you? Our poor cousin is hiding out! "<page>but... Stranger, do I understand what you mean? will you help me find the lost flea? really?

original_en_text: That great vein of bells there... some of the fleas wanted to shelter inside, but I was not so sure. The whole creaking mass seems unstable! It makes me tremble!<hpage>You were wise not to head inside, Fleamaster. A silken curse has taken hold of the settlement within. Advise your fellows to avoid that place.<page>A curse, you say?! W-well then! Our thanks are owed again. I shall let all fleas know they must not venture closer.
original_zh_text: 那串巨钟……有些跳蚤想躲进去，但我总觉得不牢靠！看着就发颤！<hpage>不在里面扎营是明智之举。那里已被丝咒侵蚀，告诫同胞远离为妙。<page>丝咒？！那……那可要多谢提醒！我这就通知大伙别靠近。
translated_text: 巨大な時計のパルス。何人かのノミが中に隠れようとしましたが、よくわかりません。全体的な音が不安定です!震えている!<hpage>フレイマスター、入らない方がいい。シルクの呪いは集落の中を占領した。仲間にはその場所を避けるよう勧めます。<page>これを呪いと呼ぶのか？よし!よし!改めてありがとうございました。私はすべてのノミに近づかないことを知らせます。
secondary_translated_text: A huge clock pulse. A few fleas tried to hide inside, but I didn't know very well. The overall sound is unstable! They are trembling!<hpage>Freymaster, you better not go in. The curse of Silk took over the village. I would advise my friends to avoid that place.<page>do you call this a curse? okay! okay! Thank you again for your help. I will let you know not to approach all the fleas.

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended. Your score can be seen on the board beside me.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。成绩在我身旁的榜上。
translated_text: ヴィクナー。裁判は終わったあなたのスコアは私の隣の黒板にあります。
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over and your score is on the blackboard next to me.

original_en_text: Ah, miss! Course you’d be one to survive through all this! Capable as you seem and all. <page>It’s a sad thing, but I can’t say most folk down here’ve fared so fortunate. And our once fine camp below ain’t no longer safe for any bug, all crushed and consumed by this black calamity.<hpage>Nowhere is safe, sir, but I am glad you few remain. Know I shall work to fix this, as best I’m able.<page>Calming our raging world? That’s a lofty goal, miss. I’m not thinkin’ any one bug’d be able to stop these happenings, but it’s heartenin’ knowing you’ve still got fire enough to feel different.<page>Rest here with us, long as you like. A little company’s about the best thing we few’re wishin’ for now.
original_zh_text: 啊！小姐。就知道您能挺过来！看着就靠谱。<page>可惜底下多数虫没这运气。咱们的好营地也被黑灾碾碎吞没了，没一处安全。<hpage>无处安全，先生，但各位幸存值得庆幸。我必会竭力修补这残局。<page>平息这混乱世道？志向够远大的，小姐。我不信单凭一虫能办到，但您有这份心总是好的。<page>您想歇多久都行，眼下能期盼的也就是有个陪伴。
translated_text: ああ、お嬢さん!もちろん、それを乗り越えられるのはあなただけです!あなたは有能に見えます。<page>悲しいことですが、ここにいるほとんどの人が幸運だとは言えません。私たちの下のかつて美しかった野営地は、もはや虫には適しておらず、すべての虫はこの黒い大惨事に押しつぶされ、飲み込まれてしまった。<hpage>安全な場所はありませんが、あなたがほとんど滞在していないのは嬉しいです。私はこの問題を解決するために全力を尽くします。<page>怒りの世界を落ち着かせるために？それは高貴な目標です、お嬢さん。間違いが起こるのを防ぐことはできないと思いますが、あなたはまだ違いを感じさせるのに十分な熱意を持っていることを知って嬉しいです。<page>ここで休みたい場合。中小企業は、私たちが今望むことができない最善のものです。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my lady! Of course, you are the only one who can get over it! You look competent, I know.<page>Sadly, I can't say that most of us here are lucky. The formerly beautiful campground below us is no longer fit for worms, and all the worms have been crushed and swallowed up by this black catastrophe.<hpage>There's no safe place, but I'm glad you hardly stayed. I will do my best to solve this problem. "<page>to calm an angry world? That's a noble goal, miss. I don't think we can prevent mistakes from happening, but I'm glad to know that you're still enthusiastic enough to make a difference.<page>If you want to relax here. Small businesses are the best things we can't hope for right now.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring supplies from the town of bells up above, to aid your camp and its residents.<page>Ah! Mighty thankful these folks’ll be. Most arrive here with nothin’ but their shell. Your delivery there’ll make things a little easier on ‘em.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我从钟心镇带来物资支援此营地和住民。<page>啊！大伙会感激不尽的。多数虫来到这时就剩个空壳，你这趟可算解了燃眉之急。
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたのキャンプとその住民を助けるために、上のベルの町から物資を持ってきました。<page>あっ! あっ!ありがとうございました。ほとんどの人は貝殻以外何も持ってここに来る。あなたがそこに配達することは彼らの事を容易にする。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have brought supplies from the town of Upper Bell to help your camp and its inhabitants.<page>ah! ah! Thank you very much. Most people come here with nothing but shells. Having you deliver there will make things easier for them.

original_en_text: Mm. Mmm! Who is it? An intruder! Terrible! To interrupt a humble druid as they work!<hpage>I meant no intrusion, druid. The sound of your laughter drew me to investigate.<page>What? Laughter? No idea what you mean. Nonsense!
original_zh_text: 嗯。嗯嗯！谁在那儿？入侵者！可恶！竟敢打扰德鲁伊修行！<hpage>无心冒犯，德鲁伊。你的笑声引我前来探查。<page>什么？笑声？不知所云！荒唐！
translated_text: え~~。え~ん!誰なの？侵入者!それは恐ろしい!謙虚なドルイド仕事を中断!<hpage>つまり、邪魔するつもりはない、ドルイド。あなたの笑いは私を調査に導いた。<page>何だ？笑う？どういう意味か分からないナンセンスだ!
secondary_translated_text: ah ~! yeah! who are you? Intruder! That's terrible! Humble droid work interrupted!<hpage>I mean, I don't mean to interrupt you, droid. Your laughter led me to investigate.<page>what's that? laugh? I don't know what that means, nonsense!

original_en_text: May your travels bring you fortune, hunter. And may the Citadel come to fear your freedom in our land.
original_zh_text: 祝你一路顺风，猎手。愿圣堡因你在这片土地上行走而战栗。
translated_text: あなたの旅があなたに富をもたらしますように、ハンター。要塞は私たちの土地であなたの自由を恐れます。
secondary_translated_text: May your journey bring you wealth, Hunter. The fortress fears your freedom in our land.

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, it’s you again. Please, no more talk of bells or travel. I’m trying to stay hidden.<hpage>I mean no intrusion, ma’am. Are you composing yourself here before you leave on your own journey?<page>Like all the others, my brothers and sisters who trudged off to die? No, I think I’ll linger here a little longer with my thoughts...
original_zh_text: 什……又是你啊。别提钟啊路啊的了，我正躲清净呢。<hpage>无意打扰，女士。是在为启程做准备？<page>像其他送死的兄弟姐妹一样？我看还是在这多琢磨会儿……
translated_text: え？えっ？ああ、またお前だ。鐘や旅行の話はやめてください。隠れようとした。<hpage>“気にしないでください、お嬢さん。旅を始める前に準備はできていますか？<page>他の人と同じように、私の兄弟姉妹はひどく死んだ。いいえ、私はもう少しここにいると思います。
secondary_translated_text: what? what? Oh, you again. Please stop talking about bells and travel. He tried to hide.<hpage>"Don't mind, miss." Are you ready before you begin your journey?<page>Like everyone else, my brothers and sisters died terribly. No, I think I'll be here a little longer.

original_en_text: Must be terrifying out there, beyond the settlement. Nothing but monsters and madness lurking in the darkness.<page>I’ve heard tales of a safe place, though. Just up above here, where the moss paints the stones green, there’s an old village. Bit of a holy place, apparently, well protected.<hpage>I’ve visited the settlement you speak of. It was built around a burial spire, corpse-home to an ancient Weaver.<hpage>It is hardly safe though. The terrain is treacherous, and predators prowl its commons. I advise you avoid that place.<page>Oh... I see. Of course. Nowhere is really free of danger, is it? That’s just the way for us pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 外面肯定很可怕，黑暗里潜伏着怪物与疯狂。<page>不过听说上面有安身所。青苔覆石的地方有古村，据说是受庇护的圣地。<hpage>我到过那村落。它围着一座葬仪尖塔而建，是古代织者的安息之所。<hpage>那里并不安全。地势险恶，又有掠食者出没，劝你最好避开。<page>唉……果然。没有真正安全之处。朝圣者命该如此。
translated_text: 暗闇に潜む恐ろしい怪物や狂気があるに違いない。<page>安全な場所の話を聞きました。ここのすぐ上には苔が石を緑色に染め、古代の村があります。ここは神聖な場所であり、よく守られています。<hpage>あなたが言及した集落を訪れた。それは古代の織物職人の死体の家である墓地の尖塔の周りに建てられました。<hpage>しかし安全ではありません地形は険しく、捕食者は公共の場所に群がる。その場所を避けることをお勧めします。<page>ああ...。わかりました。もちろん、どこにでも危険がありますよね。巡礼者のために。
secondary_translated_text: There must be some terrifying monsters or madmen lurking in the darkness.<page>I heard about a safe place. Just above here, moss stains the stones green, and there is an ancient village. This is a sacred place and is well guarded. "<hpage>I visited the settlement you mentioned. It was built around the spire of the cemetery, home to the corpse of an ancient weaver.<hpage>But it's not safe The terrain is rugged, and predators flock to public places. We recommend you to avoid that place.<page>ah... I got it. Of course, there are dangers everywhere, right? For the Pilgrims.

original_en_text: For though, as pilgrims, we aim our sights high and never waver from our path, the loss of a brother or sister still stops our trembling limbs in place.
original_zh_text: 纵然身为朝圣者需心志坚定，但手足殒命仍令我等颤足难行。
translated_text: 巡礼者としての目標は高く、道は揺らぐことはありませんが、兄弟姉妹を失うことは手足を震わせます。
secondary_translated_text: As a pilgrim, our goals are high, and our paths are unwavering, but the loss of our brothers and sisters makes us tremble.

original_en_text: Few are as foreign as you, hunter dear. Visit me when you care.<page>I’ll look forward to hearing how your steps might shake our world. Oho. Yes!
original_zh_text: 鲜少有虫如你这般，俏丽的异乡猎手。有空的话不妨再来。<page>我期待听到你的针刃撼动这片土地的那天。嚯，定会如此！
translated_text: あなたのような外国人はほとんどいません。気になるときに会いに来てください。<page>あなたの足跡が私たちの世界をどのように揺さぶるか楽しみです。ああ、そうだ!
secondary_translated_text: There are few foreigners like you. Please come and see me whenever you care.<page>I look forward to seeing how your footsteps will shake our world. Oh, yes!

original_en_text: Ohh, the world trembles! But we can hear it... beating steady... beating free...
original_zh_text: 噢，大地战栗！但我们听见了……平稳的搏动……自由的搏动……
translated_text: 世界が震えている!でも聞こえますテンポは安定している。自由に踊る。
secondary_translated_text: The world is trembling! But I can hear the tempo is stable. They dance freely.

original_en_text: Granter refuses! I understand. Granter is petty, evil. Misguided! When your mind clears, return here. Return here and grant my wish!
original_zh_text: 授愿者拒绝！我懂。授愿者小气，邪恶。误入歧途！待你清醒，再来此地。应我祈愿！
translated_text: グラントが拒否!グラントは邪悪だと思う。誤解した!心が晴れたら、ここに戻ってください。私の願いを叶えるためにここに!
secondary_translated_text: Grant refused! I think Grant is evil. I misunderstood you! When your mind is cleared, come back here. Here to fulfill my wish!

original_en_text: Oh... you’ve come to hide down here too, then? ‘Tis a fearful world out there. If you can keep quiet, I don’t mind you joining me.<hpage>You’ve chosen a curious place to rest, ma’am. This pit of bells and the structure around it... they suggest a station for travel, though one long abandoned.<page>Aye. Rumours in the camp say these bells run throughout the lands, great veins of them, forged by our ancient kin.<page>And some even say bugs used to travel through them, in gilded carriages no less!<page>Surely such fanciful travel would be a sin for us pilgrims. We must walk and climb and crawl using only our own meagre claws... Only thus can we prove our devotion.
original_zh_text: 哦……这位小姐也来躲难？外头真是可怕。你不出声的话，可以一起躲藏。<hpage>女士，你选了个怪地方歇脚。这钟坑与周遭构造……似是废弃驿站。<page>是啊。营地传言说古虫铸就钟脉贯穿大地。<page>还有虫说以前能乘镀金车厢穿行其间！<page>这般奢靡行径对朝圣者可是大不敬！我们该用卑微虫爪攀爬跋涉……唯有如此方能证虔心。
translated_text: ああ...。あなたも隠れに来たの？外の世界は恐ろしい場所です。静かにしていただければ、私に加わっても構いません。<hpage>あなたは奇妙な場所を選びました。時計塔とその周辺の建物。彼らは長い間放棄された駅であったが、旅行駅の建設を提案した。<page>はい、キャンプでは、これらの時計が地球上に広がり、その巨大な線は私たちの古代の親戚によって鋳造されたという噂があります。<page>昆虫が通り過ぎたり、金色の馬車に乗ったりしたという人もいます。<page>私たち巡礼者にとって、この気まぐれな旅は間違いなく罪です。私たちは自分たちのわずかな爪だけで歩き、登り、這わなければなりませんそうしてこそ、私たちの献身を証明することができます。
secondary_translated_text: ah... did you come to hide, too? The world outside is a scary place. If you'll be quiet, you'll be fine if you join me.<hpage>You have chosen a strange place. The clock tower and surrounding buildings. They proposed the construction of a traveling station, although it had long been an abandoned station.<page>Yes, in the camp, there is a rumor that these clocks are spread across the earth, and that their huge lines were cast by our ancient relatives.<page>Some people said that the insects passed by, or rode in a golden carriage.<page>For us pilgrims this capricious journey is undoubtedly a sin. We must walk, climb, and crawl with only our own tiny claws, and only then can we prove our dedication.

original_en_text: Did you take a look at the wishwall? You might’ve noticed I added a cheeky little wish of my own.<page>Fair’s fair, I did build the thing. Seems like the kingdom should be granting my wish before anyone else’s.
original_zh_text: 看过许愿墙了？应该注意到我加的小私心了吧。<page>公平嘛，墙是我造的，圣堡该先实现我的愿望才对。
translated_text: 願いの壁を見ましたか？私自身の小さな生意気な願い事を追加したことに気づいたかもしれない。<page>正直、私はこれを構築しました。王国は私の願いを叶えてくれるようです。
secondary_translated_text: Have you seen the wall of wishes? You may have noticed that I've added my own little naughty wish.<page>To be honest, I built this. The kingdom seems to grant my wishes.

original_en_text: You keep the berries to yourself? All for you? Mmm. Promise breaker! Promise breaker!
original_zh_text: 私藏莓果？全归你？嗯。背信者！背信者！
translated_text: ベリーを独り占めしていますか？あなたのために？え~~。裏切り者!裏切り者!
secondary_translated_text: Are you keeping Berry to yourself? for you, huh? ah ~! The traitor! The traitor!

original_en_text: Never shared my name with you, did I? Awfully remiss of me.<page>It’s Pilby. Been nice spending time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, sir. It’s been some time since I had such ample opportunity for friendly conversation.<hpage>My name is Hornet. It is good to be properly acquainted at last.<page>Hornet, eh? Strong name, that. It certainly suits you, miss. Heh heh...
original_zh_text: 我还未说过姓名吧？真是失礼。<page>我叫皮尔比。和你相处很愉快，小姐。<hpage>我也是，先生。很久没有过友善交谈了。<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。幸会。<page>大黄蜂？好气魄的名字，和你很相配，哈哈……
translated_text: 私はあなたと私の名前を共有したことがないでしょう？私は怠慢でした。<page>Pilbyでした。一緒に時間を過ごせてよかった、お嬢さん。<hpage>同様に、ミスター。私は長い間、友好的な会話をする機会がありませんでした。<hpage>英名はBomble。やっと正式にお互いを知ることができて嬉しいです。<page>ホーネット、えっ？強力な名前、それ。本当にあなたにぴったりです、お嬢さん。ああ、ああ。
secondary_translated_text: I've never shared my name with you, have I? I was negligent.<page>It was Pilby. It was nice to spend time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, Mr. I haven't had a chance to have a friendly conversation for a long time.<hpage>His name is Bomble. I'm glad we finally got to know each other officially.<page>hornet, huh? A powerful name, it. It really suits you, little girl. Oh, yeah.

original_en_text: The Mossberries. Do you still hunt them, little you? My wish was granted, but clear now that more are needed! More!<page>Bring more Mossberries here. Mmm. Yes, we will trade. Precious rosaries for fresh berries!
original_zh_text: 苔莓。仍在猎取吗，小小虫？我祈愿已实现，但需要更多！更多！<page>带更多苔莓来。嗯。以念珠换鲜果！
translated_text: モス。まだ追いかけているのか、小僧？私の願いは叶いましたが、今はもっと必要です!もっと!<page>もっと苔を持ってきてえ~~。はい、私たちは取引します。新鮮なベリーの大切なロザリオ!
secondary_translated_text: Moss. are you still chasing me, boy? My wishes have been fulfilled, but now I need more! More!<page>Bring me more moss, please. Yes, we will make a deal. Precious Rosary of Fresh Berries!

original_en_text: <hpage>As promised, druid, I have your berries. What is your need for such common fruits?<page>Common!? No. No... Special. Cherished. Only a druid knows it! The berries bright! For my wish. My wish so dear!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如约而至，德鲁伊。莓果在此。要这寻常果实有何用？<page>寻常！？不，不……特别。珍贵。只有德鲁伊知晓！莓果明艳！为我祈愿。珍贵祈愿！
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたに約束する、ドルイド、私はあなたのベリーを持っている。この普通の果物から何が必要ですか？<page>普通に!？いいえ、いいえ。いいえ、いいえ。特に。大切にする。ドルイドだけが知る!ベリーは明るい!私の願いのために私の願いはとても貴重です!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I promise you, droid, I have your berry. " What do you need from this ordinary fruit?<page>what's normal? No, no, no. No, no, no. especially. I care. Only the droids know! Berry is bright! My wishes for my wishes are so precious!

original_en_text: I’ll soon be making my way up to the great Citadel. As holy as I am with rosaries, I’m sure my path will not be an arduous one...
original_zh_text: 很快要上圣堡了。揣着这么多念珠，肯定能一路顺畅……
translated_text: すぐに大きな城に向かいます。私はロザリオに対して神聖であるが、私の道は困難ではないと確信している。
secondary_translated_text: We will soon head to the big castle. I am holy to the Rosary, but I am convinced that my path will not be difficult.

original_en_text: Oh! And you can’t be leavin’ without some reward for your work. Take these beads for labour.<page>Rosaries ain’t provin’ much use to us lot anymore, but hopefully you in all your journeyin’ can still put ‘em to use.
original_zh_text: 噢！您可不能白忙活。这些念珠当工钱收下吧。<page>念珠对我们这群家伙早没用了，但您四处奔波说不定还用得上。
translated_text: おお!仕事が報われなければ、去ることはできません。これらのビーズを配達所に持参します。<page>バラはもはや私たちにはあまり役に立たないが、あなたの旅を通してそれらを使用できることを願っている。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God. If your work is not rewarding, you cannot leave. I will bring these beads to the delivery point.<page>The roses are no longer of much use to us, but we hope you can use them throughout your journey.

original_en_text: You’re here, in here, so why did you send you? Hm? Did you hear my wish? Granter of wishes? You?<hpage>Granter of wishes?<page>Wishes, yes! My wish! I need fruits of the world, three little darlings. I need them, so I wish! Does the kingdom not send you, little you, to grant my desire?
original_zh_text: 你在此处，在此处，为何派你来？嗯？听到我的祈愿了？授愿者？是你？<hpage>授愿者？<page>祈愿，对！我的祈愿！我要这世间的三枚果实，小宝贝果实。我需要，所以祈愿！小小虫，王国没派你来满足我的祈愿？
translated_text: 来た、来た、なぜ送ったの？え？えっ？私の願いを聞いた？願い事は叶う？あなたは？<hpage>願い事は叶う？<page>ホープ、Yes!私の願い!私は世界の果実、3人の赤ちゃんが必要です。私は彼らが欲しい、だから私は望む!王国は私の願いを叶えるためにあなたを遣わしたのですか？
secondary_translated_text: come on, come on, why did you send it? what? what? did you hear my wish? will your wish come true? what are you?<hpage>will your wish come true?<page>Hope, yes! My wish! I need the fruit of the world, three babies. I want them, so I want them! Did the kingdom send you to fulfill my wishes?

original_en_text: Your travels have taken you far, haven’t they? While I’m yet to even start my journey. Shameful behaviour for a pilgrim, really, to tarry here so long.<hpage>I see no shame in it, sir. Your life is your own, and need not be squandered at the ghostly call of the Citadel. Journey out for your own sake, or not at all.<page>Heh... you truly aren’t a pilgrim, that’s for certain. That’s blasphemy, spoken with friendly intentions or not.<page>And yet... I don’t recoil from what you say. Perhaps I’m not much of a pilgrim either.
original_zh_text: 你已去过许多地方，而我尚未启程。作为朝圣者却在此踌躇不前，实在可耻。<hpage>先生，我未见可耻之处。生命属于你，不必为了圣堡幽灵般的召唤虚掷。你可以为己而行，也可以就此止步。<page>呵……你确实不是朝圣者，这种亵渎之言，无论善意与否都不能说。<page>但……我不抗拒这话。或许我也不是合格的朝圣者。
translated_text: 旅は長い道のりでしたね。私の旅はまだ始まっていない。巡礼者がここに長くいることは、実に恥ずべきことです。<hpage>私はそれを恥じていません。あなたの人生はあなた自身のものであり、城の幽霊の呼び出しで無駄にする必要はありません。自分で旅行するか、全く旅行しない。<page>おい...。あなた方は巡礼者ではありません。真面目であろうと真面目であろうと、それは冒涜です。<page>しかし、..。私はあなたが言うことを恐れません。私も巡礼者ではない。
secondary_translated_text: The journey has been a long way, isn't it? My journey has not yet begun. It is indeed a shame that a pilgrim should stay here so long.<hpage>I'm not ashamed of it. Your life is your own, and you don't have to waste it on the call of the castle ghosts. Travel by yourself or not travel at all.<page>hey, hey... You are not a pilgrim, but you are a pilgrim. Whether you are serious or not, it is blasphemy.<page>However, the... I'm not afraid of what you say. I'm not a pilgrim either.

original_en_text: This stone’s a beauty, isn’t it? They say it’ll help you gather up rosaries on the road ahead. You’ll come back and share some with me, won’t you?
original_zh_text: 这石头美极了吧？据说能助你在路上收集念珠。等你回来可要分我一些！
translated_text: この石は美しいですよね。未来への道でロザリオを集めるのに役立つと言われています。戻ってきて私と共有しますよね？
secondary_translated_text: This stone is beautiful, isn't it? It is said that it helps to collect the Rosary on the road to the future. you'll come back and share it with me, right?

original_en_text: Ah, thank you for sharing, sister. For the honourable and steadfast Pilby, we will sing.
original_zh_text: 啊，多谢相告，姐妹。我们将为坚定可敬的皮尔比歌唱。
translated_text: 共有してくれてありがとうシスター。栄光ある堅固なピルビーのために歌いましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Thank you for sharing, sister. Let us sing for the glorious and solid Pilby.

original_en_text: Mmm. You can hear it, yes? Listen close. Weak, but precious. A pulse, a beat! Faint... Our very own...
original_zh_text: 嗯。听见了吗？……细听。微弱，但珍贵。搏动，节拍！但渐弱……吾等独有的……
translated_text: え~~。聞こえますよね？耳を傾けて、それは弱く聞こえるが、貴重です。1つの脈拍、1つのハートビート!私たち自身も気絶した。
secondary_translated_text: ah ~! you can hear me, right? Listen, it sounds weak, but it is precious. One pulse, one heartbeat! We fainted ourselves as well.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries filling your pockets? I can string ‘em up safe, so you won’t go losing them. Might seem a simple art, but it takes some talent to keep ‘em properly secure.
original_zh_text: 兜里念珠装满了？我可将其编织成串以防遗失。这手艺看着简单，没点天赋可编不牢靠。
translated_text: ポケットにはロザリオがいっぱい？私はあなたがそれらを失うことがないように安全に保つことができます。これは簡単な芸術のように見えるかもしれませんが、安全を確保するためには才能が必要です。
secondary_translated_text: do you have a rosary in your pocket? I can keep them safe so that you will never lose them. This may seem like an easy art, but it takes talent to ensure safety.

original_en_text: Hm? I recognise you. You’ve returned to the camp, then? Are you a pilgrim, or just a wanderer?<hpage>I am no pilgrim, sir, though I have travelled their paths.<page>Not a pilgrim? Well, it makes no difference, I suppose. We all must walk the roads, up and up, though most of us will fall long before we see the grand gates.<page>If you’re wise, you’ll stop here and rest a while before heading back out into that dangerous world...
original_zh_text: 嗯？我认得你。重返营地了？是朝圣者还是流浪者？<hpage>我并非朝圣者，先生，但走过他们路途。<page>不是？也罢。众生皆须行路攀爬，但大多未睹圣门便殒命。<page>你若明智，再入险地前应该在此休整……
translated_text: え？えっ？あなたを知っている。キャンプに戻りましたか？あなたは巡礼者か放浪者か？<hpage>私は巡礼者ではありませんが、彼らの道を歩きます。<page>巡礼者ではないか？まあ、違いはないと思う。私たちは皆道を歩かなければならなかったが、私たちのほとんどは壮大な門を見る前に倒れた。<page>もしあなたが賢ければ、ここで立ち止まってしばらく休んで、あの危険な世界に戻ってくるでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: what? what? I know you. " did you go back to camp? are you a pilgrim or a wanderer?<hpage>I'm not a pilgrim, but I walk their path.<page>aren't you a pilgrim? Well, I don't think there's any difference. We all had to walk the road, but most of us fell before we could see the magnificent gate.<page>If you're smart, you'll stop here and rest for a while and come back to that dangerous world.

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! Yes, fragrant and round. So round! For you, you who finds berries, a nice reward of rosaries!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！芬芳饱满，如此圆润！给你，寻果者，念珠回报！
translated_text: そして、貴重な果実!はい、香りと丸いです。このラウンド!果実を見つけた人には、大きなロザリオのご褒美!
secondary_translated_text: And the precious fruit! Yes, it's round and scented. This round! For those who find the fruit, a great rosary reward!

original_en_text: O-oh! Traveller! Destined for the Citadel, yes? Well, before you embark, won’t you stop and make trade with an old pilgrim?<hpage>I’d see your wares, madam, though I fear I may have nothing worthy to offer in return.<page>Oh, worry not! If you lack fine goods to trade, we can barter still. In this devout land, we deal in the currency of faith!<page>Rosaries! Those finely carved beads of prayer! If you will only share some with me, I will trade you something fair.
original_zh_text: 噢！旅者！要上圣堡吧？启程前不如和我这个老朝圣者做笔生意？<hpage>我确实想看看货品，女士，但恐怕没有等价之物。<page>没事！没有等价货物，仍可交易。虔信之地，信仰就是通货！<page>我是说念珠！为祈祷精雕细琢的念珠！要是愿意分享，我肯定给与公道的报酬。
translated_text: おお!旅行者たち!目的地はお城ですよね。さて、出発前に、古い巡礼者と取引をしてみませんか？<hpage>私はあなたの商品を見たいのですが、返済するものがないかもしれません。<page>ああ心配しないで!あなたが不足している高品質の商品貿易、私たちはまだ物々交換。この宗教の国で、私たちは信仰の通貨を交換します!<page>ロザリオだ!見事に彫刻されたロザリオ!もしあなたが私と共有したいなら、私はあなたに公正なものを与えます。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my God. Travelers! The destination is the castle, right? Now, before you leave, why don't you make a deal with the old pilgrims?<hpage>I'd like to see your goods, but I may not have anything to refund.<page>Oh, don't worry! Trade in high quality commodities you are lacking, we still barter. In this country of religion, we exchange the currency of faith!<page>Rosario! A beautifully sculpted rosary! If you want to share with me, I will give you what is fair.

original_en_text: Seems like just a key, but who knows what it’ll unlock? I reckon it’s come from the Citadel, so it must open the way to something holy!
original_zh_text: 看着是把普通钥匙，说不定能打开什么？这东西肯定是来自圣堡的，所以肯定也能开启通往圣物的道路！
translated_text: ただの鍵のように見えるかもしれませんが、何が開くかわかりません。お城から来たと思いますので、神聖なものへの道を開いたに違いありません!
secondary_translated_text: It may look like just a key, but you don't know what it will open. I think I came from the castle, so I must have opened the way to the sacred!

original_en_text: A rare find, this. Shinier than faith and harder than a Craggler’s hide. A skilled craftsbug could fashion something nice out of it, if they’ve got the knowledge.
original_zh_text: 这可是稀罕物。比信仰耀眼，比岩甲坚硬。要是有个懂得门道的巧匠，就能将其打造成宝物。
translated_text: これは稀な発見です。信仰よりも輝き、クラグラーの肌よりも硬い。知識があれば、熟練した宇宙飛行士はそこから美しいものを作ることができます。
secondary_translated_text: This is a rare finding. Glowing more than faith, harder than the skin of a crawler. With the knowledge, a skilled astronaut can make beautiful things out of it.

original_en_text: For comin’ all this way, take a few beads. You’ve well earned ‘em.
original_zh_text: 大老远跑来，拿几颗念珠走吧，这是你应得的。
translated_text: 途中でビーズを持参します。あなたはそれに値する
secondary_translated_text: Bring some beads along the way. You deserve it.

original_en_text: <hpage>Druid, I require a pitcher of your Mossberry Stew to satiate a gourmand of the Citadel. Will you pass some to me?<page>Mmmm! A bug who’ll consume my berry brew? Strong they’d be to bear a taste so sharp!<page>Here is a flavour so ripe! Searing! Flavour of pleasure and pain! They too may see the visions if they taste it strong. The visions, could they see?<page>Grant the stew! For your bug, mmmm... to share the visions. Yes! We shall pass it!
original_zh_text: <hpage>德鲁伊，我需要一些苔莓浓汤满足圣堡饕客。可否分享？<page>嗯嗯！有虫愿意喝我的莓酿？肯定是强者才能接受这等烈味！<page>这风味！炽烈！痛楚与愉悦交织！多喝可见幻象。他们能见得到吗？<page>拿好！给你那虫……分享幻象。对！应当分享！
translated_text: <hpage>ドルイド、私は城のニーズを満たすためにあなたのモズベリーシチューの鍋が必要です。何か渡してもらえますか？<page>え~ん!バグは私のベリー飲料を飲む？こんなに強い匂いに耐えられるほど強いはずです!<page>この味は熟しすぎ!燃え尽きた!幸福と苦しみの匂い!強烈な味を味わっていれば、これらのビジョンも見られるかもしれない。ビジョンが見えますか？<page>シチューに乾杯!あなたのバグのために、はい。ビジョンを共有する。はい!はい!私たちは通過する!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Droid, I need your pot of mooseberry stew to meet the needs of the castle. can you give me something?<page>yeah! do bugs drink my berry drink?
