I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！见过我导师的踪迹吗？感觉她刚来过！<hpage>我不确定。但她若是想找高手过招，这台阶的守卫正合适。<page>没错！这些守卫死守岗位，出手狠辣，不能小瞧。
translated_text: ボシャンカ!ピンボーイ、近くに師匠の足跡が見えますか？彼女は最近到着したようです!<hpage>シャクラ、私は確信していませんが、彼女が熟練した対戦相手を探しに行くなら、これらのステップは彼女にとって良いことです。彼らを守る兵士たちは強い。<page>本当に!!彼らは印象的な守護者であり、防衛戦を行い、ポストを離れることを望まない。彼らの武器の無慈悲さと残酷さは過小評価できない。
secondary_translated_text: boshanka! pinboy, do you see the master's footprints nearby? She seems to have recently arrived!<hpage>Shakra, I'm not sure, but if she's going to look for a skilled opponent, then these steps are good for her. The soldiers who guard them are strong.<page>Really!! They are impressive guardians, they fight defensively and do not want to leave the post. The ruthlessness and cruelty of their weapons cannot be underestimated.

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你来啦，使针的小姑娘！你叫大黄蜂，对吧？最近可名气不小呢。<page>希望你别推辞我的请求，现在的情况，需要你搭把手，我自己一个不够。<hpage>我不会推辞的，沙克拉。看这情景，要是我没猜错……这是你的导师吧？<page>这里躺着的是我们部落的最强者。我叫她导师，但她其实更像我母亲。<hpage>她挑了个好地方长眠呢……<page>她是老死的……部落会觉得这很丢脸吧，但我只看到不败的强者。<page>拖着老旧的甲壳丈量大地，是跟着她的足迹我才能见证许多。<page>使针的小姑娘，你也走过这些路。陪我给她唱首送魂曲吧。<page>该送她的灵魂离壳了……
translated_text: ポチャンカ、スズメバチは針を振った。それがあなたの名前ですよね？私はこの国でそれを聞き、敬意を払ってそれを言いました。<page>私の召喚状を受け取ってほしい。この時点では、1つは良いですが、2つが最高です。<hpage>私はその願いを拒否しない、シャカラ。道の終わりには陰鬱な儀式があるように見えましたが、残念ながら私は正しかったことがわかりました。これはあなたのマスター？<page>彼女は私の部族の中で最も凶暴な男であり、ここに横たわっている。私は彼女をマスターと呼んでいますが、彼女は母親でもあり、私の虫よりもはるかに優れています。<hpage>王国の多くの奇跡の中で、彼女は人生を終えるのに良い場所を見つけました。<page>年齢で終わる。私の部族はそれを恥と呼ぶでしょうが、私は無敵の力だけを見ます。<page>彼女の体は彼女を裏切ったが、彼女は王国を旅した。彼女の足跡は私に彼女の尊厳を証言させた。<page>バンブルビーは針を振って、私たちの前のマスターとして、あなたはたくさんここにいました。今すぐこの曲を送って。<page>彼女の魂が彼女の体から離れる時が来た...。
secondary_translated_text: Pochanka, the hornet waved its needle. that's your name, isn't it? I heard it in this country and I said it with respect.<page>I hope you receive my subpoena. At this point, one is good, but two are best.<hpage>I will not refuse that wish, Shakala. There seemed to be a gloomy ceremony at the end of the road, but unfortunately I found out I was right. is this your master?<page>She is the most ferocious man in my tribe, and she lies here. I call her Master, but she's also a mother, and she's far better than my worm.<hpage>Among the many miracles of the Kingdom, she found a good place to end her life.<page>It ends with age. My tribe will call it shame, but I see only invincible power. "<page>Her body betrayed her, but she traveled the kingdom. Her footsteps made me testify to her dignity. "<page>Bumblebee waved the needle, and as the master before us, you have been here a lot. Send me this song right now.<page>The time has come for her soul to leave her body....

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 这位置安全，能边干活边警戒。低处危险易碎，注意武器别离手。
translated_text: セキュリティの観点からは、職場での脅威を認識することができます。低地は脆弱で危険です。武器を近くに置く。
secondary_translated_text: From a security perspective, you can recognize threats in the workplace. The lowlands are fragile and dangerous. Keep your weapons nearby.

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩过游戏没？超有意思！<page>不知道我再试几次能不能刷新记录……
translated_text: ゲーム中に爪を試しましたか？面白いと思いませんか？<page>もし私がもう一度やってみると、点数がもっと高くなるのではないかな
secondary_translated_text: Did you try your fingernails during the game? don't you think that's funny?<page>If I try it again, I think my score will be higher.

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?
original_zh_text: 毕竟……她要的是你……不是吗？
translated_text: 結局..。彼女はあなたが欲しい。そうでしょう？
secondary_translated_text: In the end,... She wants you. yeah, right?

original_en_text: Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！太棒了！史诗对决即将开始！<page>最后提醒一下，要是跑岔道了或想集合，就随便来点音乐，我的跟班会带你回起点。<page>好了，等我布置条配得上咱们实力的赛道就开始！
translated_text: おい!壮大なもの!素晴らしいシェルレースが始まりますように。<page>そして最後に、間違いのスピード!トラックから外れたり、素早くセットアップしたい場合は、再生できる音楽を再生するだけで、私の仲間があなたをスタートラインに戻します。<page>今だ!歌が呼んでいる。私たちのスキルを試す価値のあるコースを整理する時間を取らせてください。<page>
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Great stuff! May the great shell race begin.<page>And finally, the speed of mistakes! If you want to get off track or set up quickly, just play the music you can play and my buddies will get you back to the starting line.<page>now! The song is calling. Let us take some time to organize a worthwhile course that will test our skills.<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
translated_text: <hpage>感謝を捨てなさい、小さな男、死者は沸騰しています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Throw away gratitude, little man, the dead are boiling.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时候到了，萨满们。三颗心已集齐，够施咒了吧？<page=B>足够了。唉，这几颗残心曾经承载何等伟力……如今却要为了救世燃尽。<page=S>我得提醒你，古老者。这法咒一开始可能不太舒服，但一定能把您送进记忆深处。<page=M>接下来就看你造化了。做好准备，躺在祭坛上，就可以开始了。
translated_text: <hpage>時間だよ、シャーマン。私はその意図を持っていて、要求に応じて十分です。呪文をかけるのに十分ですよね。<page=B>はい、私たちは準備ができていますが、あなたが持っているのは悲しいシーンです。ほんの少しの人が知っている力です。ファウルの贖いのために、すべてが燃え尽きそうになっています。<page=S>最初の部分は不快かもしれませんが、必要に応じて参加させてください。<page=M>次に起こることに備える必要があります。ステージに座って、始めました。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>It's time, Shaman. I have that intention, and I am sufficient upon request. That's enough to cast a spell, right?<page=B>Yes, we are ready, but what you have is a sad scene. It is a power that very few people know about. For the redemption of the foul, everything is about to burn out.<page=S>The first part may be uncomfortable, but please let them participate if necessary.<page=M>We need to be prepared for what happens next. I sat on stage and started.

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 测绘这大山是个不小的挑战。现在我只探了山脚。<page>等找到导师，一定要回来爬个痛快。
translated_text: 山の高さをマッピングすることは大きな挑戦です。今のところ、ベースしか見えません。<page>飼い主探しが終わったら、戻ってきて本格的に登りたいと思います。
secondary_translated_text: Mapping the height of a mountain is a big challenge. For now, I can only see the base.<page>When the search for owners is over, I want to come back and do a full-fledged climb.

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 被蠕虫所蛀的摇晃洞穴。隐约能看出朝圣者曾走过这窄路。
translated_text: 昆虫が出没する洞窟が揺れている。巡礼者がこの狭い道を歩いたというかすかな痕跡が残っている。
secondary_translated_text: The insect-infested cave is shaking. There is a faint trace of pilgrims walking this narrow path.

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 呼……点到为止。<page>我……呼……希望我没……呼……下手太重。<hpage>二位打得很好，但此地不宜久留，我们该上路了。<page>对、对，正事要紧，不能浪费时间，该走了！
translated_text: 呼び出し。そこでのデュエルはやめましょう。<page>私は..。ひづめ。興奮しないでほしい。ひづめ。シスター、私の槍をあなたの上に持ち上げるのは重すぎる。<hpage>諸君、これは栄光の戦いだ。しかし、今は先を見据える必要があります。ここは長く静かではない。<page>もちろん、私たちの善行は決して終わらないので、続けなければなりません。無駄にする時間はない!
secondary_translated_text: Calling. Let's stop the duel there.<page>I'm not... Feels. I don't want you to get excited. Feeling. Sister, it's too heavy to lift my spear over you.<hpage>Gentlemen, this is a battle of glory. But now we need to look ahead. This place is not long quiet.<page>Of course, our good deeds will never end, so we must continue to do so. No time to waste!

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 别灰心，输一次不算什么！振作起来再战！
translated_text: 失敗に負けないでください、敏捷な虫!挑戦に立ち向かう。また一緒に飛びましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Don't be defeated by failure, agile bugs! Face the challenge. Let's fly together again!

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们最初来圣堡要做什么？<page>我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们要为了村子，向圣堡的君主讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>ガモンド、初めてこの城に登った理由は何ですか？<page>シスター、私の追求は最も神聖な追求です!そのうちの一つは、私の最も信頼できる仲間、親愛なるザザと共有しました。<page>私たちは城を探し、その支配者の前に立ち、答えを求めます。必要なら力を使え!すべては私たちの大好きな村のためです。私たちは貝殻を約束します。<page>糸糸の恐ろしいトラブル、それは私たちの美しい人々を征服した-私たちは取り残された人々、彼らの記憶を残し、いくつかの正義がなされるのを見たいと願っています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>why did you climb this castle for the first time?<page>Sister, my pursuit is the most sacred pursuit! One of them I shared with my most trusted companion, my dear Zaza.<page>We look for the castle, we stand before its ruler, and we ask for answers. Use force if necessary! Everything is for our beloved village. We promise you a shell.<page>The terrible troubles of the yarn yarn, it has conquered our beautiful people - we want to leave behind the people, their memory, and see some justice done.

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: 啊，又一个朝圣者。我在这独自祈祷太久了，只有风声作伴。<page>快到终点了。朝圣之旅即将结束，只剩最后这段险途了对吧？<hpage>圣堡就在眼前。你本事不错，能走到这的朝圣者没几个。<page>是啊，这路越走越长，越往上爬同伴越少。<page>走到这需要运气和信念，不过你肯定懂。
translated_text: “巡礼者の皆さん。私は長い間一人でここで祈っていたが、風の音だけが私の声に加わった。<page>我々はすでに非常に近い。巡礼の旅は終わりに近づいている。これが最後の登山ですよね。<hpage>近くには巡礼者がいます。強さがあるはずです。あなたの仲間の中で、このレベルに到達できる人は少ないようです。<page>はい、道が長く、高く登るほど、道は孤独になります。<page>ここに来るには多くの運と多くの自信が必要ですが、言う必要はないと思います。
secondary_translated_text: "My fellow pilgrims, I prayed here alone for a long time, but only the sound of the wind joined my voice.<page>We're already very close. The pilgrimage journey is nearing its end. This is the last mountain climb, isn't it?<hpage>There are pilgrims nearby. There should be strength. It seems that few of your peers can reach this level.<page>Yes, the longer the road, the higher you climb, the more lonely the road becomes.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of confidence to come here, but I don't think I need to say.

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 呼……你赢了……呼……呼……<page>难以置信！纺络还存在这般疾速！简直是奇迹！<page>你做到了！实现了我的夙愿，突破了我的极限！
translated_text: 呼び出し。あなたはやった。呼び出し。呼び出し。ひづめ。<page>私は決してフルラムの弾丸がこんなに速いとは思わなかった!奇跡の奇跡!<page>あなたはそれを証明した、機敏なバグ、私の願いを叶え、私の足跡が再びマッチし、私の限界が破られるのを見た。
secondary_translated_text: Calling. You did it. Calling. Calling. Feeling.<page>I never thought that a Fulham bullet could be so fast! A miracle of miracles!<page>You've proved it, shrewd bug, you've seen my wishes come true, my footprints match again, and my limits break.

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！我有个提议，走之前要不要切磋切磋，来场友谊赛热热身？别担心，保证不打死你！
translated_text: ゴーラム!私はあなたのためのアイデアがある、シスター。ここで腕を組んで進めてみませんか？一緒に楽しい戦いをしましょうか？恐れるな、私は致命的な打撃を与えない!
secondary_translated_text: GORAM! I have an idea for you, sister. why don't we join hands and move forward here? Shall we have a fun fight together? Fear not, I will not give you a fatal blow!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: <hpage>骑士先生，对不起……只有这样才能斩断你身上的黑丝诅咒……<hpage>咳……别难过……小姑娘……<page>你很强大……应该骄傲……<page>扎扎……可以休息了……
translated_text: <hpage>ナイト卿、申し訳ありませんこれが呪われたスレッドからあなたを解放する唯一の方法です。<page>ああ...。その小さな男を心配するな。<page>誇りを持て。あなたはとても強くなった!<page>ザザ。少し休んで行きましょう
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Lord Knight, I'm sorry, this is the only way to free you from the cursed thread.<page>ah... Don't worry about that little man.<page>Take pride. You have become so strong!<page>Zaza. Let's get some rest and go.

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 努努的愿望达成了，但大姐姐会继续砍怪记录对吧？<hpage>会的。了解生物习性对战斗有帮助，值得记录。<page>超值得！要经常和努努分享新发现哦！<page>送你个狩猎礼物！给你的工具包加个口袋，多装点装备！
translated_text: ノアの願いは叶った。でも女性は生き物を切って日記に追加し続けるでしょうか？<hpage>生き物の形や習慣を知ることが戦闘の結果を左右する利点だと知っています。これらの詳細は記録に値する<page>ああ、そうだ!とても価値がある!あなたの新しい知識を頻繁に彼女と共有してください!<page>皆さん、狩りをお手伝いするプレゼントをお届けします! Nuuはあなたのキットにポケットを追加するので、狩猟中に多くのツールを運ぶことができます!<page>
secondary_translated_text: Noah's wish was granted. But will women keep cutting off creatures and adding them to their diaries?<hpage>We know that knowing the shapes and habits of living things is an advantage that determines the outcome of a battle. These details are worthy of the record.<page>Oh, yes! Very worth it! Share your new knowledge with her frequently!<page>We'll bring you a gift to help you hunt! The Neta adds pockets to your kit so you can carry many tools while hunting!<page>

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 只是一块面甲碎片。不知道剩下的在哪……自己找去！
translated_text: ただのマスクですよね？他の人がどこにいるか聞かないで自分で嗅ぎ分けてください!
secondary_translated_text: It's just a mask, right? Don't ask anyone else where they are, sniff it out for yourself!

translated_text: Faye山の地図
secondary_translated_text: Map of Faye Mountain.

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>努努，你要的生态记录完成了。<page>哇！快看这些奇虫异兽，记录得好详细！<page>大姐姐砍了好多生物！它们的精华都沾在你身上，味道混在一起了！<page>啧啧……努努好想尝一口！
translated_text: <hpage>ヌー、私はあなたの要求を満たし、ファルの多くの生き物を日記に記録しました。<page>ああ! ああ!ママ!ママ!これらのモンスターや昆虫を見てください!<page>大人も女性も、今、あなた方は多くの生き物を切り倒し、多くの人を殺してきました。彼らのエッセンスはあなたを悩ませ、彼らの香りはあなた自身と混ざり合う!<page>ああ、ママ。ヌーは自分で試してみてください!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>No, I have fulfilled your request and recorded many creatures in the fal in my diary.<page>oh! oh! Mommy! Mommy! Look at these monsters and insects!<page>Adults and women alike, you have now cut down many creatures and killed many. Their essence haunts you, and their scent mixes with your own!<page>Oh, Mama. Nooo, you should try it yourself!

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: さあ、ザザと私はここで見張りをし、後ろにいる者を逮捕する。
secondary_translated_text: Come on, Zaza and I will keep watch here and arrest whoever is behind.

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 对不起嘛……虽然掠食者的汁液很诱人……但这样不礼貌。<page>不过见识了这么多神奇生物……太感谢大姐姐了！
translated_text: わからないよ、ママ。そんな猛烈な捕食者のジュースを楽しむのは最高です。しかし、それは間違っている。この行動は友好的ではない。<page>良い獣をたくさん見たいですが、マスター、お嬢さん、あなたは同意するでしょう!ヌーがしてくれたことに感謝!
secondary_translated_text: I don't know, Mom. It's best to enjoy the juice of such a fierce predator. But it is wrong. " This behavior is not friendly.<page>I'd like to see a lot of good beasts, but Master, Miss, you'll agree! Thanks for what Nu did for me!

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我马上要离开这段破路了，但我常去下面的聚落交易，或许还会碰面。
translated_text: 私はすぐにこれらの不安定な道路を離れますが、あなたが下の集落で停止すれば、私たちは再び会うかもしれません。私は巡礼者との交易によく通った。
secondary_translated_text: I will leave these unstable roads at once, but if you stop at the settlement below, we may meet again. I went through well with the dealings with the pilgrims.

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里留有苍白苜鹿的痕迹……我们猎杀了无虫能及的传说……<page>这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: ここでは、鹿の痕跡が青白くなっています。私たちは彼女を追いかけて切り倒します。これまで誰もできなかったからです。<page>それが私たちの威厳です。神聖な権利の象徴。
secondary_translated_text: Here, the traces of the deer have turned pale. We will chase her and cut her down. Because no one has ever been able to do so.<page>That is our dignity. " Symbol of sacred right.

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的，漂亮的很！就是带着点难闻的织者味儿。危险货，快买走！
translated_text: とても美しく、輝く小さなものです。彼らは少し恐ろしい忍び寄るささやきの匂いがするので、危険です。受け入れるべきです!あなたのロザリオを私たちに与え、私の爪を照らしてください!
secondary_translated_text: It's so beautiful, it's a shining little thing. They smell a creeping whisper a little terrifying, so they are dangerous. You should accept it! Give us your rosary and light my nails! "

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 哈！又赢一场！圣堡的空壳子挡不住我们的正义之心！
translated_text: ああ、シスター!もう一つの大きな勝利。この場所の幽霊の力は私たちの純粋な心を止められない!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my sister! Another big victory. The ghost power of this place cannot stop our pure hearts!

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: <page=M>您需要明白……这方法需要夺取凡虫之心，也会耗尽它们最后一丝力气。<page=M>即便是我们也心有不忍。虽然渴望见识这份力量，但并不希望看到它燃尽。<hpage>让这片土地虚弱而存，总好过让虫族壳裂身死。
translated_text: <page=M>あなたの前にあるタスク。これが人間の力、昆虫の心と呼ばれるものです。土地を救うためには最後の力が必要です。<page=M>躊躇しても。私たちは彼らの力に触れたいと思いますが、それが完全に枯渇するのを見たくありません。<hpage>あなたとあなたの仲間の貝殻が無傷であることを意味するので、あなたの土地を脆弱にする方が良いです。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>The task before you. This is what is called human power, the mind of the insect. It takes one last force to save the land.<page=M>Even if you hesitate. We want to touch their power, but we don't want to see it completely depleted, "he said.<hpage>It's better to make your land vulnerable because it means you and your companion's shells are intact.

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
translated_text: ゴーラム!勇敢に答えなさい、シスター!武器を用意せよ!
secondary_translated_text: GORAM! Answer bravely, sister! Prepare your weapons!

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 啊啊啊！记录册要满出来了！绝对算完成了吧！<page>没想到真能做完！努努真聪明，找对帮手了！<hpage>这片大地生机勃勃，记录它们让我受益匪浅。以后我会保留这个习惯。<page>哇！这才是真正的饥渴！大姐姐和我都是合格的猎手！方法不同但胃口一样大！<page>送你一个象征努力的标记，沾着努努的体香哦！
translated_text: あっ! あっ!閣下、あなたの日記は生物学的漏洩でいっぱいです!完全と呼ぶことができます!<page>考えてみれば、こんな仕事はできる! Nuはこのような凶暴な捕食者を働かせるほど賢い!<hpage>この広大な土地には多くの生命が住んでおり、それらをカタログ化することはとても有益でした。王国を去っても、続ける価値があります。<page>空腹は価値がある!あなたと私は同じ大人の女性であり、両方ともハンターです。方法は違いますが、食欲はとても似ています。<page>Nuuは、あなたの努力とあなたの性質を象徴するこのトークンを用意しました。それは彼女の甘い!
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! Your Excellency, your diary is full of biological leaks! You can call it complete!<page>If you think about it, I can do this job! Nu's smart enough to work such a ferocious predator!<hpage>This vast land was inhabited by a lot of life, and it was very beneficial to catalog them. Even if you leave the kingdom, it is worth continuing on.<page>Hungry is worth it! You and I are the same adult women, and we are both hunters. The method is different, but the appetite is very similar.<page>"We have prepared this token to symbolize your efforts and your nature. It's her sweet!

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
translated_text: 皆が私たちの緑の王子にお辞儀をして
secondary_translated_text: and all of you bow down to our green prince

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们因何来到这里，莫非也是要去圣堡？<page>对，但我们可不是来朝圣的！我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们去那圣堡，是想为村子讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>ガモンド、なぜこの荒涼とした土地に来たのか。上の城を探していますか？<page>はい!はい!しかし、勇敢な冒険者を純粋な巡礼者と間違えないでください。私の任務は神聖な任務であり、私の最も信頼できる仲間、親愛なるザザによって遂行されます。<page>お城を探すのは贈り物ではありません。いいえ、妹!私たちはその支配者を探し、答えを求めます!必要なら力を使え!私たちの愛する村のために、私たちは貝殻を約束します。<page>糸糸の恐ろしいトラブル、それは私たちの美しい人々を征服した-私たちは取り残された人々、彼らの記憶を残し、いくつかの正義がなされるのを見たいと願っています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>"Gamond, why have you come to this desolate land? Are you looking for the castle above?<page>yes! yes! But don't mistake the brave adventurer for a pure pilgrim. My mission is a sacred mission, and it will be carried out by my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>Searching for a castle is not a gift. No, sister! We seek out its rulers and seek answers! " Use force if necessary! For the sake of our beloved village, we promise the shell.<page>The terrible troubles of the yarn yarn, it has conquered our beautiful people - we want to leave behind the people, their memory, and see some justice done.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。听到你喊声从塌方隧道传来很是惊喜。寻找导师有进展吗？<page>啵尚咔！虫子拱得这附近摇来晃去，追踪太难。<page>但她肯定来过这里，行踪诡异……猜不透意图。<page>无所谓。跟她重逢时自然就明白了。在此之前，先继续追。
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、シャクラ。あなたの声が揺れるトンネルに響くのを聞くのは驚きです。所有者の捜索はどうですか？<page>ボシャンカ!ワームが岩をかき混ぜ続けると、これらの洞窟の何かを追跡することは困難な作業になります。<page>主人がここに来るのが見えます。彼女はこの地の道を通った。彼女の意図を知りたい。<page>でも大丈夫よまた会ったら、励ましてくれるかもしれない。それまでは、私は彼女の影に隠れています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Shakra. It's amazing to hear your voice echoing through the swaying tunnels. How is the search for the owner?<page>boshanka! As the worms continue to stir the rocks, tracking anything in these caves can be a daunting task.<page>You can see the master coming here. She went through the paths of this land. I want to know her intentions.<page>But it's okay. Maybe when we see you again, you'll be encouraged. Until then, I'm hiding in her shadow.

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
original_zh_text: 把我们关在这种地方……太缺德了！
translated_text: 私たちをこんなところに閉じ込めるなんてなんて恥ずべき行为だ!
secondary_translated_text: it's a shame to keep us in this place!

original_en_text: Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: 来吧大块头，亮开嗓子，与我同唱！让洞窟共鸣，让圣道震颤！
translated_text: さあ、獣よ、あなたの声を聞かせてください。一緒に歌って、一緒に歌って!洞窟を反響させ、大通りを一周させよう!
secondary_translated_text: Come, beast, let your voice be heard. " Sing together, sing together! Let's make the caves reverberate and make them go around the avenue!

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: 好吧，姐妹。就在这歇会儿也行。
translated_text: よくやった、シスター。ここでもう少し休んだ方がいいかもしれない。
secondary_translated_text: Well done, sister. Maybe you'd better rest a little longer here.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛了？确实，有时为了身心健康，重头再来是必要的。<page>现在怎么说？你肯定渴望重返赛道，那就让我们再次一同飞驰吧！
translated_text: 賢い間違いだ!試合に負けたの？実際、リセットは心と殻の健康のために時々必要です。<page>でも今は何を言ってる？コースに戻りたいですね。また一緒に飛びましょう!
secondary_translated_text: That's a smart mistake! did you lose the game? In fact, a reset is sometimes necessary for the health of the heart and shell.<page>but what are you saying now? I would love to get back on course. Let's fly together again!

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 这些黑色丝线……向上的渴求如此强烈，难怪能穿透坚岩！
translated_text: この黒い線。そんな強い願いを込めて手を差し伸べた。岩を通り抜けることができるのも不思議!
secondary_translated_text: This black line. With such a strong desire, I extended my hand. No wonder you can get through the rocks!

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 我们虽然能钻进任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，像你这样的大块头也能开锁！
translated_text: 我々内部告発者はどこにでも登ることができるが、この鍵があれば、あなたのような大きな愚か者でも鍵のかかったドアを通り抜けることができる!
secondary_translated_text: We whistleblowers can climb anywhere, but with this key, even a big idiot like you can get through a locked door!

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: <page=M>穿越低地边境，寻找蚂蚁猎群最后的蚁后。虽然气息微弱，但我们仍能感知到……<page=B>年轻时她一声令下，野外部落群起反抗苍白君主……虽终究不敌。
translated_text: <page=M>彼らは最後の蟻狩りの女王を探して、これらの低地の辺境を横断します。今でも彼女を感じることができる。ただ、..。<page=B>彼女が若い頃、彼女の声は野生の部族を結びつけた。彼らに青白い君主の意志に抵抗する力を与える少なくともたいていの者よりも長い。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>They cross the edges of these lowlands in search of the last ant-hunting queen. I can still feel her, though. Just, uh...<page=B>When she was young, her voice united a wild tribe. Longer than most at least give them the power to resist the will of the pale monarch.

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 走吧姐妹！咱们一起跟着信仰进圣城！
translated_text: シスター、続けましょう!私たちは信仰に導かれます!
secondary_translated_text: Sisters, let's go on! We will be led by faith!

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘！哈克！附近钟心镇被邪丝罩着，居民全中招了。<page>像是某种没见过的掠食者设的陷阱，我躲着丝溜走了。<hpage>我也路过了那里。路上丝咒多是个例，但那镇子上的邪丝却不挑目标。<hpage>这等规模和冷血手段，显然受到操纵。<hpage>我会顺路追查其源头。
translated_text: 針だよ、小僧。ハックだ!私はここの近くに古代の鐘脈の中心にある集落を見つけました。昆虫は静かに網に閉じ込められている。<page>これは見えない捕食者の致命的な罠のようです私は点滅する糸を避けるために急いだ。<hpage>私はこの小さな町を歩いた。路上で見たことがあるが、差別はない。<hpage>町を攻撃する呪いは、駆り立てられ、集中しています。このサイズのシルクは風邪に使用されます。<hpage>ルートが許せば、私はソースを調べます。
secondary_translated_text: It's a needle, boy. hack it! I have found a settlement near here in the heart of an ancient bell ring. The insects are quietly trapped in their nets.<page>This is like a deadly trap of an invisible predator I hurried to avoid the twinkling thread.<hpage>I walked through this little town. I've seen it on the street, but there's no discrimination.<hpage>The curse that attacks the town is driven and concentrated. Silk of this size is used for colds.<hpage>If the route allows, I'll check the source.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 意下如何？虽然没有奖励可以赠予，但能再次与您一同疾驰，我仍乐意至极！
translated_text: 何を言っているのか、スピードエラー？報酬はありませんが、また一緒に飛べることを嬉しく思います!
secondary_translated_text: What are you talking about, speed error? There's no reward, but I'm happy to be flying with you again!

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: 呼噜噜……扎扎……呼噜噜……盯紧点……
translated_text: SNRKさんザザ。Snnnrnrrrk。それはとても美しく見える、私の息子。
secondary_translated_text: Mr. SNRK, Zaza. Snnnrnrrrk. It looks so beautiful, my son.

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 带的念珠不够？附近那些疯癫朝圣者身上多的是。<page>去抢点？让他们继续这么晃悠才是真残忍。
translated_text: 取引するためのロザリオが足りないのか？近くの生い茂った村の熱狂的な巡礼者はいつも何かを持っている。<page>彼らから必要なものを奪うでしょうか。彼らを無限にさまよわせるのは偽りの善意です。
secondary_translated_text: don't we have enough rosaries to trade with? The enthusiastic pilgrims of the nearby lush village always have something to offer.<page>Will you take away from them what you need? It is false goodwill that keeps them wandering endlessly.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的陷阱真是防不胜防！<page>你真厉害，挨了这么重的一击还能活，壳一定很厚！<hpage>厚归厚，但还是别中招为好。<hpage>吃一堑长一智，以后没敌人也得保持警惕。
translated_text: ああ、赤い貝殻が自分たちの土地を守るために仕掛けた巧妙な罠!<page>このような残忍な戦いを生き延びたことは印象的です。あなたの殻は厚いはずです!<hpage>私は完全にトラップを避けたいが、十分に厚い。<hpage>近くに敵がいなくても、警戒してください。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what an ingenious trap the red shells have set up to defend their land!<page>It's impressive to survive such a brutal battle. Your shell should be thick!<hpage>I want to avoid the trap completely, but thick enough.<hpage>Even if there are no enemies nearby, be alert.

translated_text: ...ごめんね。
secondary_translated_text: ... sorry.

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 真是有缘，又见面了。<page>既然如此，再玩几局骰子？还是老规矩，一奏念珠？想玩的话就坐我旁边吧。
translated_text: ああ、なんて光栄だ。道はあなたを私に連れ戻した。<page>ここでサイコロゲームをしましょうか？同じ賭けでロザリオを倒す？私の隣に座って、始めましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what an honor. The road has brought you back to me.<page>do you want to play a dice game here? beat rosario on the same bet? Sit next to me and let's get started.

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 原以为码头很小，结果熔岩湖下还藏着大家伙。
translated_text: 最初に訪れたときは、この港は小さいと思いました。溶岩湖の下に隠された構造物の本当のボリュームを感じました。
secondary_translated_text: When I first visited this port, I thought it was small. I felt the real volume of the structure hidden beneath the lava lake.

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 遍布各地的鎏金钟道，据说以前是交通线路？<br><br>这些图钉能够标记钟脉站点。
translated_text: 時計塔、地球上の金色の鉱脈。旅行に使われたことは？<br><br>これらのピンは地図上の駅をマークします。
secondary_translated_text: The clock tower, the golden vein on earth. have you ever used it for travel?<br><br>These pins mark the station on the map.

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 再次见证……故土荒废……王座空悬……独坐无味……<hpage>你们只是凡虫，屈身于苍白存在脚下……臣服或毁灭……是我的族群唯二的“恩赐”。
translated_text: 再び..。聞いてください。土地は放棄された。裏切られた。<page>...一人では座れない王座<hpage>あなたは青白く閉じ込められている。与えるか破壊するかこれはわが民が耐えられる唯一の運命である。
secondary_translated_text: Once again... Please listen to me. The land has been abandoned. He was betrayed.<page>... A throne that cannot be seated alone<hpage>You are palely locked up. Give or destroy, this is the only fate that our people can endure.

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变危险了，但研究不能停！大姐姐快斩断黑灾诅咒，把纺络的野兽全砍遍！
translated_text: 世界はますます危険になっていますが、学ぶ必要があります!黒い線を切り、神を慕い、ファロの獣をすべて追え!
secondary_translated_text: The world is getting more and more dangerous, but we need to learn! Cut the black line, worship the gods, and chase all the beasts of Pharaoh!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉也来闯沼泽？圣堡脚下可没好地方。<page>导师走过这，我只能跟上。但你说得对，这破地真不适合我。<page>圣堡的阴影笼罩着这里，走在路上都能感觉到它的存在。<page>把洞穴都憋得发霉了，但那堆又大又丑的石头可不会管脚下这片土地。
translated_text: <hpage>シャクラ、あなたはこの沼で勇敢すぎますか？ファルム高地は厳しい歓迎を受けた。<page>主人の道が曲がりくねっているので、私はそれに従う。本当にしゃべった!ここは私の場所じゃない<page>城の影が見えます。しかも、その大きさを実感できます。<page>湿った停滞した洞窟を窒息させるのは驚くべきことではない。モンスターの金属や石は、それが消費する土地を気にしません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakura, are you too brave in this swamp? The Farms Highlands received a stern welcome.<page>My master's way is crooked, so I follow it. You really spoke! This is not my place.<page>I can see the castle shadow. And you can feel its size.<page>It's not surprising to suffocate a damp, stagnant cave. The monster's metal or stone doesn't care about the land it consumes.

translated_text: クイルは
secondary_translated_text: Quill said

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 导师肯定来过这片荒野。她战斗直觉无虫能及，我快追上她了！
translated_text: 私の主人はこの荒野への道を見つけるでしょう。彼女の戦士意識は比類なき。きっと彼女に近づいてきたはずです!
secondary_translated_text: My master will find his way to this wilderness. Her warrior consciousness is unparalleled. Surely you should have come closer to her!

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 姐妹不必管我们！即便圣堡余孽众多，但来多少我们也能杀多少！
translated_text: お姉ちゃん、高貴な狩りを続けましょう!金色のホールには城のねじれた昆虫がまだ住んでいます。彼らはたくさんいますが、私たちは彼らの生活の糸が切られるのを見るでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, let's continue the noble hunt! The castle's twisted insects still live in the golden hall. There are many of them, but we will see the thread of their lives being cut.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用红猎手的壳做的标记，足够醒目。
translated_text: 地図上の重要な場所やリマインダーをマークするために使用できます。<br><br>赤いハンターの貝殻は、まさに鮮やかなシンボルです。
secondary_translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>The shell of a red hunter is a vivid symbol.

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 这破路又暗又臭！我的漂亮胡子都沾上味了！<page>像扎扎这样鼻子灵的，都快被熏坏了！<hpage>我见过不少腐朽崩塌的宏伟建筑，常沦为掠食者巢穴。当心雾里藏着的东西。
translated_text: シスター、これらの古い道路は、なんと湿って、なんと臭いでしょう!私の繊細なひげは、空気中の邪悪な悪臭でほとんどかき消されました。<page>残念ながら、感覚に敏感な人々は、ここの貧しいザザのように。あの恐ろしい城の影がここに落ちた!<hpage>私の時代、私は多くの壮大な建物の衰退を見ました。これらの場所はしばしば捕食者の本拠地です。皆さん、霧の中に潜むものに注目してください。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, how wet and how stinky these old roads are! My delicate beard was almost scratched out by the evil stench in the air.<page>Unfortunately, people sensitive to the senses, like poor Zaza here. The shadow of that terrible castle fell here!<hpage>In my time, I have seen the decline of many magnificent buildings. These locations are often home to predators. Everyone, pay attention to what lurks in the mist.

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 哟，你在这附近转悠了半天，捞到不少好东西吧？让我瞧瞧！
translated_text: ねえ、あなたはこの古いほこりだらけの場所に長い間登っていますか？あなたには良いものがたくさんあるはずです!かわいそうな情報提供者を素早く見てみましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Hey, have you been climbing this old, dusty place for a long time? You should have a lot of good stuff! Let's take a quick look at the poor informants!

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我叫谢尔玛，和你一样是朝圣者。路上需要帮忙就喊我！我和幸运铃铛随叫随到！
translated_text: ちなみに、私はシャーマンです。あなたのような謙虚な巡礼者です。もしあなたの道で助けが必要なら、私の名前を歌ってください。私と私の幸運の鐘はあなたのために働く!
secondary_translated_text: By the way, I'm a shaman. A humble pilgrim like you. If you need help on your way, sing my name. Me and my lucky bell work for you!

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 我才不走，还没偷够呢！怕死就自己跑！
translated_text: 盗むか逃げるか!そんなに怖いのなら、逃げなさい!
secondary_translated_text: Steal or run! " If you are so scared, run away!

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，请收下这些念珠吧！<page>虽然现在形势不好，但这些念珠装着我们最真诚的祝福！
translated_text: ホンさんロザリオを交換してください!<page>彼らの神聖な報酬の約束は、この暗い時代には決して果たされないかもしれませんが、私たちの最善の願いを運んでいます。
secondary_translated_text: Mr. Hong, please exchange the Rosary!<page>Their promises of divine rewards may never be fulfilled in this dark age, but they carry our best wishes.

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 骨门骨门最贴心！<br>骨门骨门真神迹！哈哈哈！
translated_text: ドア!ドア!ドア!今まで見た中で最高のドア!<br>ドア!ドア!ドア!今までで一番の奇跡!ハハハ!
secondary_translated_text: Door! door! door! The best door I've ever seen!<br>door! door! door! The greatest miracle ever! ha ha ha!

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: <page=M>熔岩湖上的深坞仍保有通往下层的手段，但长久以来无虫敢试。<hpage>前路已明，你们就守着圣所等我归来吧。若此地尚存生机，或许还用得上各位。
translated_text: <page=M>これらの桟橋はフレイム湖の頂上にあり、その下にはまだ通過する施設がありますが、あなたはこの時代の最初の挑戦者になります。<hpage>私の道は明らかです。あなたの避難所にいて、私が戻るまで待って。この土地を救うことができれば、まだ一部を使うことができます。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>These piers are at the top of Lake Flem, and below them there are still facilities to pass through, but you will be the first challenger of this era.<hpage>My way is clear. Be in your refuge and wait until I return. If we can save this land, we can still use some of it.

original_zh_text: 要挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特吗？
translated_text: スプリントマスター Swift？
secondary_translated_text: Sprint master Swift?

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 呀！红壳怪的陷阱真阴险！<page>我好几次都差点中招。调查工作有点刺激过头了……
translated_text: ああ、赤い貝殻が彼らの土地を守るために仕掛けた巧妙な罠!<page>死ぬところだったこれは私の研究に興奮を与えた。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what an ingenious trap the red shells have set up to defend their land!<page>I was almost dead and this gave me excitement in my research.

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 太精彩了！所有游戏你都破了我的记录！<page>能在这见证这么惊艳的表演，真是幸运。<hpage>破你纪录可不容易，但你达成记录时却挺轻松？<page>我自己都惊讶！很多技巧根本不记得学过……<page>但你的成就更能激励我！<page>为表敬意，请收下这枚勋章。不知从哪来的，但带着令人安心。<page>就当我们友谊的信物吧。<hpage>多谢，我会珍藏。
translated_text: よし!よし!なんと素晴らしいこと!これらの素晴らしいゲームのすべてで、あなたのスコアは私と同等かそれ以上です!<page>ここでこのような才能の発揮を目撃するのは不思議です。<hpage>セス、スコアを破ることは大きな挑戦でしたが、比較的簡単に自分で結果を出すことができたようです。<page>あなたは私を賞賛!しかし、自分の才能には驚かされます。こんなに多くのスキルを学んだ覚えはない。<page>しかし、あなたの業績を過小評価しないでください。<page>実際、私の敬意から、私はあなたがこの小さなメダルを保持することを主張します。私は自分のアイテムでそれを見つけました。どこで見つけたのか分かりませんが、それは私に最高の気分を与えました。<page>友情の印として、これは始まりに過ぎないと思います。<hpage>ありがとうございます、セス、私はそれを維持します。
secondary_translated_text: okay! okay! What a wonderful thing! In all of these great games, your score is equal to mine or better!<page>It is strange to witness such a display of talent here.<hpage>Seth, breaking the score was a big challenge, but it seems that I was able to get results on my own with relative ease.<page>You admire me! However, I am amazed at my talent. I don't remember learning so many skills.<page>But don't underestimate your accomplishments.<page>In fact, out of my respect, I insist that you keep this little medal. I found it on my own item. I don't know where I found it, but it gave me the best feeling.<page>As a sign of friendship, I think this is just the beginning.<hpage>Thank you, Seth, I'll keep it up.

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 休息时要来玩玩骰子吗？你应该知道规则吧？<hpage>我学得快，要赌什么？<page>每次押一奏念珠。公平吧？让骰子带走烦恼！
translated_text: 休憩中にサイコロを振って運を試してみませんか？遊び方を知っていますよね？<hpage>私はすぐにルールをマスターできると確信しています。何に賭ける？<page>各巻には数珠の拍子がある。何を言った？それは公正に聞こえるか。私たちの心配はサイコロと一緒に行きましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Why don't you try your luck by waving the dice during the break? you know how to play it, right?<hpage>I'm sure I can master the rules soon. what to bet on?<page>There are several beads in each volume. what did i say? Does that sound fair? Let our worries go with the dice!

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 哎呀！姐妹！走了这么远终于碰面了！<page>我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。能走到这儿太不容易了！<page>和这么多同袍登上圣堡……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？既已走到这里，想必你也看清了此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: え？えっ？ああ、そこだ!“長い旅の終わりにお会いできて光栄です。<page>私はシャーマン、あなたと同じように単純な巡礼者です。やっとここにたどり着いたのはすごいですよね。<page>やがて私は城の中で高く登り、多くの兄弟姉妹の一人になりました。これは本当に恵みです。そう、祝福です。<hpage>小さな巡礼者よ、あなたの声はこの信仰のためらいを隠しています。ここまで歩いてみると、この壊れた場所の現実が見えてきた。これについてどう思いますか？
secondary_translated_text: what? what? Oh, there it is! "It's an honor to meet you at the end of a long journey.<page>I am a shaman, a simple pilgrim like you. Isn't it amazing that we finally got here?<page>Eventually I climbed high in the castle and became one of many brothers and sisters. This is truly a blessing. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice, little pilgrim, hides this fear of faith. As I walked this far, I could see the reality of this broken place. what do you think about this?

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 喂！又是你？这地方本来安安静静的，现在连喘口气都难！
translated_text: おい!またあなたですか？かつてはとても静かでしたが、今は平和がありません。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! is it you again? It used to be very quiet, but now there is no peace.

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，姐妹，你醒啦？没打疼你吧？<page>你要还有力气想再打一轮，我们随时奉陪！
translated_text: あ ~お姉さん!我々の強力な攻撃があなたを弱くしないことを願って目を覚ます。<page>あなたがまだ力があるなら、私たちは再び戦います!
secondary_translated_text: ah, sister! I wake up hoping that our powerful attacks will not weaken you.<page>If you are still strong, we will fight again!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: <hpage>守卫者先生……没想到能再见。<page>抱歉朋友，我们见过吗？像你这样的虫我肯定忘不掉。<hpage>……抱歉，是我认错了。<hpage>你是……旅行者？<page>算是吧！我刚降生不久，就在湖边，身边还有这些武器。<page>我叫赛斯，但不知谁取的名。<page>新生儿就该探索世界对吧？我休息一会儿就继续上路。
translated_text: <hpage>守護者さん。会ってからは、また会えるとは思いませんでした。<page>え？えっ？ごめんなさい、私はあなたを知りません。私はこのような偉大な人を覚えている!<hpage>...無視してください、先生。私はあなたを別人のように見ている。<hpage>あなたは..。震える大地を旅する旅人だと思います。<page>私はそう思います!私がこの世に生まれる少し前、私は湖のそばでこの武器を持って目を覚ました。<page>誰がくれたのかはわからないが、セスは私の名前だ。<page>新生児の習慣は世界を探検することですよね。それが私が始めたことです!私はここでしばらく休んで、旅を続けます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Guardian, sir. Since we met, I never thought I'd see you again.<page>what? what? I'm sorry, I don't know you. I remember such a great man! "<hpage>... Ignore it, sir. I look at you like someone else.<hpage>You are a... I think you are a traveler who travels through the earth that trembles.<page>I think so! " Shortly before I was born into this world, I woke up by the lake with this weapon.<page>I don't know who gave it to me, but Seth is my name.<page>A newborn's habit is to explore the world, isn't it? That's what I started with! I will rest here for a while and continue my journey.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努好惊喜！世界在震颤，黑灾在蔓延。现在独自游荡可不安全。<page>但你！你是成虫对吧？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了，无惧黑暗？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？趁着一切还没有终结，收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: 陛下、お嬢さん!ヌーにとってなんて素敵なサプライズ!黒い線が広がる世界。今は歩くのが危険。<page>でもあなたは!あなたは大人ですか？完全に成長？暗闇や狩りの準備はできていますか？<hpage>もちろん、私は子供ではありません。<page>完璧だ!!ヌーは願い事をする必要がある!彼女のために、あなたはファラムの多くの素晴らしいバグを見つけ、それらを切り取るでしょう。<page>ナイフで切ってください!あなたの成熟した精神でそれらを破壊する!あなたの野生の大人の心でそれらをカット!<page>ヌーを助けますか？終わりの前に？あなたの編集知識でページを埋めるために彼女のリールを取ることができるか。
secondary_translated_text: Your Majesty, Miss! What a nice surprise for Nu! A world where the black line spreads. It's dangerous to walk now.<page>But you are! Are you an adult? Fully grown? Are you ready for the darkness or the hunt?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child.<page>perfect! Nu needs to make a wish! For her, you will find many wonderful bugs in pharam and cut them off.<page>Please cut them with a knife! Destroy them with your mature spirit! Cut them in your wild adult mind!<page>do you want to help nu? Before the end? Can you take her reels to fill the page with your editing knowledge?

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ……大变革撼动天地，但小细节亦不容忽视……<page>……谜题环环相扣。剖开事物本质方能解惑……<hpage>先生高论依旧晦涩，能否直言相告？<page>……信己信人。答案触手可及……
translated_text: ...大歩で世界に触れるが、小歩でも無視できない。<page>...謎は別の謎につながる。何かの腹部を注意深く調べると便利です。<hpage>瞑想の背後にある意味は相変わらず不透明です。私と直接話していただけますか？<page>... Believe in yourself.そしてお互いの答えはいつもコントロールの中にある
secondary_translated_text: ... You touch the world with big steps, but you can't ignore it with small steps.<page>... One mystery leads to another. It is convenient to carefully examine the abdomen of something.<hpage>The meaning behind meditation is as opaque as ever. can you speak to me directly?<page>... Believe in yourself, and each other 's answers are always in your control.

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 林子里虫子会伪装成树枝。注意周围动静，随时准备出手。
translated_text: この森の生き物は、多くの枝に身を隠すことができます。予期せぬ動きに注意し、攻撃に備える。
secondary_translated_text: This creature of the forest can hide itself in many branches. Beware of unexpected moves and prepare for attack.

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 小蜘蛛，你来啦！真高兴，独自在这世界之底，好寂寞呢~<hpage>我可高兴不起来，孩子。你那点小小的反叛就要毁灭上方的王国了。
translated_text: 蜘蛛さん、来てくれて本当に良かったです!世界の果てでは、孤独です。<hpage>私はあなたの幸せを共有できません。あなた方の上の小さな反乱が王国の崩壊につながったのです。
secondary_translated_text: Mr. Spider, I'm really glad you came! At the end of the world, you are lonely.<hpage>I can't share your happiness. It was a small rebellion above you that led to the collapse of the kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。看到那些打斗痕迹，我就知道能在附近碰上你。<page>啵尚咔！你直觉真准。那些红壳战士真够厉害，打得痛快！<page>真想多待会儿练练手，但任务要紧。你也别耽搁！
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、シャクラ。曲がりくねったトンネルの中で、戦いの痕跡が詰まっているので、あなたを見つけることができる気がする。<page>ボシャンカ!あなたの直感を正しく信頼する。これらの道をする红甲はな相手である。<page>私はここで多くの時間を過ごし、彼らの刃と狡猾な罠に対して自分自身を試すことを喜んでいますが、私は自分の使命に固執しなければなりません。あなたもそうすべきです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Shakra. I feel like I can find you, because the traces of the battle are crammed in the winding tunnels.<page>boshanka! Trust your intuition correctly. The Red Cross is the only one who can take these roads.<page>I'm happy to spend a lot of time here and test myself against their blades and crafty traps, but I must stick to my mission. " You should do that, too.

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 哈……哈……噢，姐妹。这架打得骨头都快散架了……等太平了可得好好睡一觉……<hpage>别把担子全压自己身上。<hpage>我也想终结诅咒，但该休息还是得休息。<page>休息？你也还在拼命，我们哪能躺下？<page>要是半途而废，村里的大伙会怎么想！别看我们一身旧壳，里头可有劲呢！
translated_text: ハァッ!ハァッ!お姉ちゃん。それは私たちに大きな損失をもたらしました。この果てしない戦い!もちろん、平和が訪れるとき、私たちは正しい心でそれを感謝します。<hpage>あなたは自分自身に多くの負担をかけている。<hpage>私はあなたと同じくらい野心的で、この国を呪いから解放したいと思っていますが、たとえ短い時間であっても、休息を取ることをお勧めします。<page>休憩しましょうか。お姉さん、どうしてそんなに勇敢に戦ったの？ハァッ!いいえ。<page>もし我々が突撃を諦めたら、古い村はどう思うだろうか。いいえ、あなたが何を信じても、これらの古い殻にはまだ十分な力があります!
secondary_translated_text: huh! ha ha! my sister. It has caused us a great loss. " This endless battle! Of course, when peace comes, we thank it with a right heart.<hpage>You put a lot of burden on yourself.<hpage>I'm as ambitious as you are, and I want to free this country from its curse, but I would advise you to take some rest, even if it's for a short time.<page>Shall we take a break? sister, why did you fight so bravely? ha ha! No, no.<page>What will the old village think if we give up the assault? No, no matter what you believe, these old shells still have enough power!

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下潜。我们再最后见一面，终结这黑暗吧。
translated_text: <hpage>息子よ、私は降りる方法がある。最後に会って、私たちが作り出した黒い廃墟を静めましょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>My son, I have a way to get down. Let's meet one last time and quiet the black ruins we have created.

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>研究生态是好事，努努。或许你比看起来要成熟。<page>呀！这么夸人家要害羞啦！快去打猎，开始我们的研究！
translated_text: <hpage>その国の人々を知ることは、やりがいのある仕事です。あなたは思っている以上に成熟しているのかもしれない。<page>ママ!このような素晴らしい賞賛はヌーを殺す!今すぐ行け!狩り、狩り、学び始めましょう!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Knowing the people of that country is a rewarding job. Maybe you are more mature than you think you are.<page>Mommy! Such a great compliment kills Nu! go now! Let's start hunting, hunting, and learning!

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so. They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，你怎么看这吱呀乱响的大家伙？<hpage>规模惊人。若这仅是圣堡的一处前哨，那主城的宏伟难以想象。<page>哟咔啦……或许吧。在这种险地修这么大工程，肯定费了不少劲。
translated_text: 子供たちは針を振る。この巨大でうめき声を上げる構造をどう思いますか？<hpage>すべての大きさに感銘を受けました。これが上の城の前哨基地であれば、彼らの首都は計り知れないほど大きかったに違いない。<page>ヨーカラ。このような危険な場所でこのような巨大なものを作ったことを大切にしているのかもしれない。
secondary_translated_text: The children are waving their needles. what do you think of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>I was impressed with all the sizes. If this was the outpost of the upper castle, their capital must have been immeasurably large.<page>Yokara. Perhaps he cherishes the fact that he has made such a huge thing in such a dangerous place.

translated_text: 狩猟の印
secondary_translated_text: Signs of hunting

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 快去平息纺络的哀嚎，使针的小姑娘。我会保护这里的虫民。
translated_text: スズメバチは針を振り、私たちの泣き声を素早く鎮めようとしました。私はここに残り、この黒い貝殻と戦うことを知っていた。
secondary_translated_text: The wasp waved a needle and tried to calm our crying quickly. I knew that I would stay here and fight this black shell.

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: 我这就把药送回去。<page>别担心我！大伙都在为我祈祷，不会有事的！
translated_text: レッドレディ、できるだけ早く治療用品をセットアップに持って行きます。<page>心配しないで私の巡礼者は私が傷つかないように祈っています。
secondary_translated_text: Red Lady, get the healing supplies to the setup as soon as you can.<page>Don't worry, my pilgrims are praying that I won't get hurt.

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: 现在我负责照顾大伙，包括你在内。有什么需要尽管说！
translated_text: “今の私の仕事は、あなたを含めてここに残っている人々の世話をすることです。何かお手伝いできることがありましたら、教えてください!
secondary_translated_text: "My job right now is to take care of the people who are left here, including you." If there's anything I can do to help you, let me know!

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 吓我一跳！又被发现了！跟刚破壳的小虫似的！<page>你要是想拿我当猎物练手，我可要升级伪装术了！
translated_text: ああ、ショックだ!再発見は簡単です!不運な子のように!<page>スポーツとして私をフォローしたいなら、私はそれを偽装するためにもっと努力しなければなりません!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, that's shock! Rediscovering is easy! Like an unlucky kid!<page>If you want to follow me as a sport, I have to work harder to disguise it! "

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 俯瞰纺络的尖峰，寒风能刺穿最坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: ギザギザの山がファロー島全体を覆っている。その強い風と鋭い寒さは、最も強い殻を突き刺します。
secondary_translated_text: The rugged mountains cover the entire Faroe Island. Its strong winds and sharp cold puncture the strongest shells.

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 看！圣椅为我们升起了！纺络永远眷顾朝圣者！<page>安心歇息吧，王国在庇护我们呢！
translated_text: ああ、輝くベンチが私たちのために立ち上がる!私たち巡礼者へのファロの善意は無限大です!<page>休んでくださいレッドガール怖がらないで私たちの王国は皆を守る!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, a shining bench stands up for us! The pharaoh's goodness to us pilgrims is infinite!<page>Rest, Red Girl, don't be afraid, our kingdom will protect us all!

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，快加入合唱！你我加上幸运铃铛，肯定能用歌声叩开大门！
translated_text: あなたと私の声に参加してください、赤い女の子!あなたと私と私の幸運の鐘は、扉が開くまで一緒に歌うでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Join you and my voice, red girl! You and I and my lucky bells will sing together until the door opens.

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！我正在找地方歇脚，这驿站多舒适啊！<hpage>此处很凶险，我担心你遭遇不测。<page>不测？要对圣途有信心！只要仰望圣堡，灾祸自会远离！<page>这景象多壮丽啊！巨大石阶，乘着风声，宛如圣歌，终点就在眼前了！
translated_text: え？えっ？こんにちは、疲れた体を休める場所を探していて、この居心地の良い駅を見つけました!<hpage>この土地は危険です。傷つくかもしれないと思った。<page>怪我？赤い女の子、自信を持って!この神聖な登山では、私たちは何も傷つけません!警戒する必要があります<page>これは壮大すぎませんか？風が聖歌隊の音のように私たちを持ち上げた巨大な石段の後、私たちの巡礼の旅は終わりました。ついに大城がやってきた!
secondary_translated_text: what? what? Hi, I was looking for a place to rest my tired body and found this cozy station!<hpage>This land is dangerous. I thought it might hurt. "<page>Blaming me? Red girl, be confident! In this sacred climb, we will not hurt anything! We need to be alert.<page>isn't this too grand? After a huge stone step, which the wind lifted us up like the sound of a choir, our pilgrimage journey was over. The castle is finally here!

translated_text: <hpage>リトル·ピルグリム、眠っている？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>little pilgrim, are you sleeping?

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 它们用红岩壳保护内部的软肉。里面超甜！但壳太难撬，最好等自然腐烂！
translated_text: 彼女と彼女の仲間は柔らかさを守るために赤い岩の殻を持っていた。中が甘い!しかし、それらを壊すのは難しいので、待つのが最善です。待った方がいい!
secondary_translated_text: She and her companions had a red rock shell to protect the softness. The inside is sweet! But it's best to wait, because they're hard to break. You'd better wait!

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。就在此石台上一较高下吧。
translated_text: <hpage>嬉しいよ、シャクラ。この石で、貝殻を試してみましょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm glad you are, Shakira. With this stone, let's try the shell.

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 又见面了，姐妹。圣堡祸根虽除，但下面的土地还在遭罪！<page>诅咒早已根植在纺络的各处，现在化作黑暗冒了出来。<hpage>这黑暗远比丝咒致命……来自最深的邪恶，一有机会就会吞噬一切。<page>哼……果然！只要邪恶还没除净，我们的长枪就放不下！
translated_text: こんにちは、シスター。獣のような城は最終的に虐殺されたが、その下の土地はまだ苦しんでいる!<page>長い間王国の基盤に埋もれていたこの呪われた土地の悪は、今や黒い病のように広がっている。<hpage>この闇は幽霊よりも致命的な呪いであり、その下から来る力であり、機会があればすべてを飲み込む。<page>うーん...。そうだ!悪がこの地を覆っている間、我々の憎しみは止まらない。
secondary_translated_text: Hello, sister. The beast-like castle is finally slaughtered, but the land beneath it is still suffering!<page>The evils of this cursed land, which had long been buried in the foundations of the kingdom, are now spreading like a black disease.<hpage>This darkness is a curse more deadly than a ghost, a force that comes from beneath it and swallows it all if it gets the chance.<page>um... yes, yes! Our hatred will not stop while evil covers this earth.

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 骨门呀骨门，不求你折断，<br>只要开条缝让咱过，我和高个姑娘谢你恩典！
translated_text: 私はあなたを壊すこともビープ音も求めません<br>私と私の背の高い処女の友人のためにそれを開く!
secondary_translated_text: I don't want to break you, I don't want a beep.<br>Open it up for me and my tall virgin friend!

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这片水岸……我们暂时远离王权的休憩……<page>那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: これらの水は陸地の縁にある。神社もあります。私たちは逃げ出しましたルールから少しだけ逃げ出しました<page>多くの瞬間はシンプルです。自由と喜び。
secondary_translated_text: These waters are at the edge of the land. There is also a shrine. We got away, we got away a little bit from the rules.<page>Many moments are simple. Freedom and Joy.

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
translated_text: シスター、何て言った？一緒に勇敢に戦うべきか？
secondary_translated_text: sister, what did i say? should we fight bravely together?

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，对不起把你卷进来！<page>那些被丝线控制的同伴……他们犯了什么错……<hpage>有怜悯之心固然好，但要先顾好自己。<page>对……我得把药送回聚落。他们等太久了。
translated_text: ああ、赤い女の子、あなたを危険な状況に置いてごめんなさい!<page>糸に執着している人たち。犯罪はそのような運命を保証しません。<hpage>あなたの慈悲は悪いことではないが、次回はもっと良い。今は自分自身の世話をしなければならない。<page>あっ...。はい、治療用品を上の巡礼者の集落に持ち帰るべきです。兄弟姉妹は十分に待っていた。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, red girl, I'm sorry to put you in a dangerous situation!<page>People who are obsessed with the thread. Crime does not guarantee such a fate.<hpage>Your mercy isn't a bad thing, but it's better next time. Now he has to take care of himself.<page>ah... Yes, healing supplies should be brought back to the pilgrim settlement above. The brothers and sisters had waited long enough.

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我壳里的寄生物极度抗拒虚空。<hpage>虽然有永绽花保护，但那些根须还是在阻止我下潜。<hpage>要斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>寄生虫は私の殻の中を歩き回り、虚空に強い嫌悪感を抱いた。<hpage>永遠の花の保護にもかかわらず、今でも貧しい根が私の衰退を防いでいるのを感じることができる。<hpage>もし私が飛び込んでこの土地を黒い線の呪いから切り離すなら、まず侵略者をそこから追い出す方法を見つけなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The parasites walked about in my shell, and held a strong aversion to the emptiness.<hpage>Despite the protection of the eternal flower, I can still feel the poor roots preventing my decline. "<hpage>If I'm going to jump in and cut this land off from the curse of the black line, I must first find a way to drive the invaders out of it.

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 前方有不少恶战等着，先来场热身赛？
translated_text: 多くの敵が待ち構えている。決闘して前進するのか？
secondary_translated_text: There are many enemies waiting for us. do we fight and move forward?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，努努。你跑得真远，没想到在低地遇见你。<page>大姐姐！努努虽然腿短，但跟着知识气味能走超远！<page>看努努发现了什么！这个被肢解的大家伙！慢慢研究肯定能学到好多！
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、NU。あなたは住んでいる場所から遠く離れており、この低地であなたに会うとは思わなかった。<page>こんにちは、私の主!はい、Nuuは最速ではありませんが、彼女は学習の息吹に従うために長い道のりを歩んできました。<page>ヌーが発見したものをご覧ください!巨大な獣が割れてバラバラ!彼から学ぶことがたくさんあるので、ヌーはゆっくりとそれを味わうでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello there, NU. You are far away from where you live, and I did not expect to meet you in this lowland.<page>Hello, my lord! Yes, Noo isn't the fastest, but she's come a long way to follow the breath of learning.<page>Take a look at what Noo has discovered! A giant beast is ripped apart! There's so much to learn from him, that Noo will slowly taste it.

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 用这羽毛笔能把新发现的区域补到地图上。羽毛是从我们部落猎的高尔佩尼鸟身上拔的，中空的羽管最适合拿来绘图。
translated_text: このペンを使用すると、発見した新しいエリアを所有するマップに追加できます。私の部族で狩りをしていたゲルパニーから羽根ペンを取った。中空軸は完璧な描画ツールです。
secondary_translated_text: With this pen, you can add to the map a new area you have discovered that owns. I took a feathered pen from the Gerpanies, who were hunting in my tribe. The hollow axis is a perfect drawing tool.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，咱们跑得真远！这里寒气刺骨，来灯笼边暖暖。<hpage>纺络环境真是极端，或许这也是朝圣者们测试信仰的一部分。<page>也许吧。当初觉得他们是群软蛋，连武器都不敢带！<page>但……咚嗒库！也算是我看走眼吧，他们有种我说不清的韧劲。
translated_text: 針を振り回す子供たちよ、私たちの放浪者はどこまで私たちを導いたのか!冷たい空気が私たちの殻を突き刺します電話をかけるときは、ランタンで温めます。<hpage>ファロは残酷さに満ちた土地です。巡礼者が文化を熱心に試す理由の一つかもしれません。<page>最初に見たとき、私はこの弱くてボロボロの昆虫に敬意を払わなかったのかもしれません。彼は武器を取るには弱すぎる!<page>しかし...。ドンダク。時には判断が早すぎる。微妙な力を持っていますが、本当に理解するのは難しいです。
secondary_translated_text: How far have our vagabonds led us, you children who wield the needle! The cold air pierces our shells When we call, we warm up with lanterns.<hpage>The Faro is a land full of cruelty. This may be one of the reasons why pilgrims are eager to try out the culture.<page>Maybe when I first saw it, I didn't respect this weak and rambling insect. He's too weak to take a weapon!<page>but... Dondak. Sometimes judgments are too fast. It has subtle powers, but it's hard to really understand.

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 泡着热水澡真舒服！比唱圣歌还解乏，哈哈！<page>要和我一起泡吗？边泡边唱歌更解乏！
translated_text: ああ、この暖かい水が私の疲れた手足に触れた。本当に人気がある。詩のようにリラックスしてください。<page>レッドガール、一緒に聖浴をしてくれませんか？一緒に歌って復興を助けましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, this warm water touched my tired limbs. It really is popular. Relax like a poem. "<page>red girl, will you take a holy bath with me? Let's sing together and help the recovery!

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 要把叮当响串稳当？格林德尔来帮你！抽点佣金就行！
translated_text: あなたのタッチが強くて良いことを望むか。古いグリンデルに直接報告させれば、彼は喜ぶだろう。
secondary_translated_text: Do you want your touch to be strong and good? If you let him report directly to old Grindell, he would be delighted.

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 别当我是叛信者！圣堡确实是圣地，比我想的还壮观！<page>可是……大殿里死气沉沉，角落里到处都藏着苦痛。<page>恐惧啊伤痛啊……为什么让这些脏东西进圣地？我们还不够虔诚吗？
translated_text: 私を懐疑的だと思うな!この城は本当に神聖な場所であり、私の野生の希望を超えて壮大で広大です!<page>しかし...。堂々としたホールは静けさに苦しみ、どんなに深く見つめても影に痛みが見えた。<page>恐怖、そして苦痛なぜこれらのものは私たちの天国に入ることを許されるのか。私の兄弟姉妹はまだ神の報酬を受け取っていませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Don't think I'm a skeptic! This castle is truly a sacred place, magnificent and vast beyond my wild hopes!<page>but... The majestic hall suffered from the stillness, and no matter how deeply he looked, he could see pain in the shadows.<page>Fear, and pain Why are these things allowed to enter our heaven? Have my brothers and sisters not yet received God 's reward?

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ……崇山深谷，却非你所熟知的形态……<page>……穿行地底是一回事，但翱翔天际需另种眼界……<hpage>使者大人……在这偏远之地重逢，是巧合还是您尾随而来？<page>……道途相逢并非吉兆。小家伙还是别多嘴了……
translated_text: ...確かに、クロスオーバー武器は眠るためのものですが、形は今まで見たことのない武器とは異なります。<page>...下を移動するのは一つのことですが、上を移動するには別の視点が必要です。<hpage>パイオニアの騎士。遠く離れた土地で出会ったのは、珍しい偶然の一致のようです。私について来ない限り。<page>...彼の道は確かに悪い前兆です。横から見た人なら誰でもわかる。<page>
secondary_translated_text: ... Sure, the crossover weapon is for sleeping, but the shape is different from the weapon you've never seen before.<page>... Moving down is one thing, but moving up requires a different perspective.<hpage>The Knight of Pioneers. Their meeting in a far-away land seems like an unusual coincidence. Unless you come after me.<page>... His path is certainly a bad omen. Anyone who saw from the side would know.<page>

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
translated_text: 素敵な小さなローラーがあります。これは、内部告発者の冒険に幸運をもたらすでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: There is a nice little roller. This will bring good luck to the whistleblower's adventure.

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ……万物并非与你为敌，它们自有渴求……<page>……望见高峰，攀爬便是本能……<page>……那个被遗弃的小家伙……你决定带他同行了？……
translated_text: ...これらの要素はあなたに対して陰謀しない。自分の欲望がある。<page>...人が山を見つけると、自然の傾向は登り始めることです。<page>...それで決めましたか？旅の仲間たち。
secondary_translated_text: ... These elements are not conspiring against you. They have their own desires.<page>... When a person finds a mountain, the tendency of nature is to start climbing.<page>... so did you decide? Companions of the journey.

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: <hpage>无需为自己的缺席感到愧疚，结局早已注定，无关你的去留。<page>少来安慰我……战士……这是我的回忆……容不得莽夫插嘴……<page>擅闯圣殿者……准备见证翠庭国双王的最强形态吧！
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたの不在に罪悪感を感じますが、あなたが留まるかどうかにかかわらず、結果は避けられず、運命的です。<page>私を慰めるな、兵士。この記憶は私だけのものです。私はあなたの野蛮な侵略に耐えられない。<page>この神聖な部屋に侵入する者のために準備しなさい。私たちを見て、私たちを知りなさい、ヴェルダニアの支配者は、私たちの最高の形で一緒にいます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I feel guilty about your absence, but whether you stay or not, the consequences are inevitable and fatal.<page>Don't comfort me, soldier. " These memories are mine alone. I cannot bear your barbaric aggression.<page>Prepare for anyone who trespasses into this sacred room. Look at us and know us, the rulers of Verdania are with us in our best form.

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 想休息的话，我给你放哨。我暂时不睡，还得多琢磨琢磨图纸。
translated_text: ここで休むことを選ぶなら、私があなたの世話をします。これらのチャートは長い注意を必要とし、私自身の睡眠はまだ遠いです。
