secondary_translated_text: If you choose to rest here, I'll take care of you. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is still far off.

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 大块头啊大块头，壮如磐石力无穷！与我合唱放你走！<page>红衣姑娘快看！这可怜家伙被白丝缠住了！你会解缚之歌吗？<hpage>这束缚并非歌唱能解。凭我现在的气力，也斩不断这些丝线。<page>不必担心！所需之物肯定就在圣途之上！
translated_text: 獣、獣、大きくて太った獣!岩のように強く、少なくとも岩のように強い!解放されるまで一緒に歌いましょう!<page>おぉ!見てください赤い少女このかわいそうな生き物は白い鎖につながれていますこの曲を演奏できることを知っていますか？<hpage>この束縛を破るには歌よりも力が必要だ。今の私の弱さでは、それらを切ることさえできません。<page>よし、心配しないで!必要なものがあれば、道は与えてくれる!
secondary_translated_text: Beast, beast, big, fat beast! Strong as a rock, or at least as strong as a rock! Let us sing together until we are set free!<page>oh! Look, red girl, this poor creature is tied to a white chain. Do you know that you can play this song?<hpage>Breaking this bondage requires more power than song. With my weakness now, I can't even cut them.<page>All right, don't worry! If you need anything, the road will give you!

translated_text: 時計針の針
secondary_translated_text: Clock Hands

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛？肯定是失误了对吧？<page>专注追求速度经常会忘记思考。<page>看来你已经调整好了，继续吧？<page>让我们一起继续冲刺！
translated_text: 賢い間違いだ!試合をあきらめたのか？これは単なる誤りではないか。<page>スピードの追求では、すべての理性は風に投げ込まれるように消えてしまいがちです。<page>少なくとも、あなたは間違いから回復しました。本当に今欲しいのか？<page>スプリントが必要です!一緒に飛ぼう!
secondary_translated_text: That's a smart mistake! did you give up on the game? Isn't this just a mistake?<page>In the pursuit of speed, all reason tends to vanish, as if thrown into the wind.<page>At least, you have recovered from your mistake. do you really want it now?<page>You need a sprint! Let's fly together!

translated_text: ベンチ·セールス
secondary_translated_text: Bench Sales

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘。这路太安稳了，配不上咱们战士。<page>打打蟑螂和饲者还行，但空气污浊，水里全是寄生虫。<hpage>环境糟糕，但生命总能适应。你觉得你的导师来过这儿？<page>本来觉得不会，结果在废墟里找到了些许踪迹。<page>难道她发现了什么我没注意到的东西？她的眼光总是比我毒辣。
translated_text: 子供たちは針を振る。道路は古く、我々のような兵士には適さない。<page>ゴキブリとその飼育員との戦いは公正ですが、空気は病気で、水は寄生虫でいっぱいです。<hpage>環境は確かに厳しいが、生活は多くの困難に適応しているようだ。ご主人様がこの道を歩んだと思いますか。<page>最初はそうは思いませんでしたが、よく探してみると、廃墟の悪臭の中を蛇行する道の破片が見つかりました。<page>私が見ていないものを見たのかもしれない。私の感覚が盲目の場所では、彼女の感覚はしばしば鋭いです。
secondary_translated_text: The children are waving their needles. The roads are old and not suitable for soldiers like us.<page>The fight against cockroaches and their keepers is fair, but the air is sick and the water is full of parasites.<hpage>The environment is indeed harsh, but life seems to have adapted to many difficulties. Do you think your master has taken this path?<page>At first I didn't think so, but when I searched carefully, I found a piece of a road that meanders through the stench of the ruins.<page>Maybe I saw something I didn't see. " Where my sense is blind, her sense is often sharp.

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 姐妹留步！附近藏着一只大家伙，俯冲尖啸，不好对付！<page>扎扎一路闻着它的味道呢，肯定就在附近！我的胡子都翘起来了！<page>那是个难得的好对手。怎么说，要不要联手干掉它？
translated_text: やめてシスター!巨大な獣が地面をさまよい、粗野な暴君のように急降下して叫んだ!<page>ザザはこの生き物の匂いを追っていて、もうすぐそこにいると確信している!私たちはあまりにも近くにいて、私のひげが立っている!<page>このような獣は勇敢な人が殺す価値がありますよね。一緒にこの生き物を狩ってどう思いますか？
secondary_translated_text: stop it, sister! A gigantic beast roamed the ground, descending like a rough tyrant and screaming!<page>Zaza is chasing the scent of this creature and is sure to be there soon! We're so close, my beard is standing!<page>A beast like this is worth a brave man to kill, right? what do you think about hunting these creatures together?

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 达罗穆有很多虫带着好货，最好记下他们的位置。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记商贩位置。
translated_text: Pharloomのバグの多くには便利な機器やアイテムがあります。このピンで位置を追跡するのは良いことです。<br><br>これらのピンは地図上のベンダーをマークします。
secondary_translated_text: Many of the bugs in Pharloom have useful equipment and items. It's good to track the location with this pin.<br><br>These pins mark the vendors on the map.

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 干我们这行的基础道具，直接从目标身上把宝贝钩下来！
translated_text: 基本的な作業ツールはこちらです。あなたの大きな針を投げて、ターゲットシェルから直接輝く光をキャッチ!
secondary_translated_text: Here are the basic working tools. Throw your big needle and catch the light shining directly from the target shell!

translated_text: 苔の地図
secondary_translated_text: Map of Moss

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ……哦。沃姆后裔。在此相遇倒也不意外。<page>尾随还是召唤？若非你在地底闹出大动静，我本不会来此。<page>如今游历四方，得见何等奇景……熔岩湖、缠藤林、冰封沙穴……<page>叹为观止，然虚空侵蚀之下，唯你我留存此间记忆。<hpage>我无法坐视，使者大人。此刻行动既为自救，也为庇佑残存生灵。<hpage>作为见证者，请您直言相告，我等努力是否为徒劳？<page>问我？答不上来。未来迷雾重重，我目光唯见当下。<page>唯有旅程……此时此刻。于我而言，此即意义，也即我目之能视。<page>沃姆之女，或许唯你能懂此心境……<page>也许尚非此时？待你功成之日再唤我来？<page>唉，该离开这震颤洞穴。前路漫漫，愿你亦能领略沿途风光……
translated_text: ...ああ、悪魔よ。ここで出会ったのも不思議。<page>ついてくるの？または私を呼ぶ？あなたの地上での壮大な行為がなければ、私は地上を求めなかったでしょう。<page>しかし今、私は彼らの広大な世界を横断しているとき、何と奇妙な光景を目にします熱い湖、もつれた森、砂と霜に飲み込まれた洞窟。<page>これらすべての驚くべきことは、空虚な状態であると主張しても、あなたと私がこれらの記憶を持つ最後の人かもしれないように見えます。<hpage>そんなことは許されない私は今、自分自身のために、そしてまだそこに生きている虫のために、この場所を救うために行動しています。<hpage>知識のある人として、私の努力が無駄だったと思いますか？<page>私は？質問することはできますが、良い答えはできません。結果はどうでもいい。私のビジョンはいつも今にだまされている。<page>たった1回の旅。私の知る限り、それが目的です。<page>もし誰かがこの状態を理解してくれるなら、ヴィロンの子、私はあなたかもしれないと疑う。<page>まだかもしれませんが、プレゼントじゃないですよね。遠い将来、あなたの行動が再び私に敬意を表してくれるかもしれない。<page>ああ、これらの震える洞窟から素早く脱出する時間は終わった。それぞれの道は長く曲がりくねっているかもしれませんが、その楽しさを理解していただければ幸いです。
secondary_translated_text: ... Oh, the devil. No wonder we met here.<page>are you following me? or call me? If it were not for your magnificent deeds on earth, I would not have sought the earth.<page>But now, when I am traversing their vast world, I see what strange sights: hot lakes, tangled woods, caves swallowed up in sand and frost.<page>All these surprising things, even if you claim to be in a state of emptiness, seem to me that you and I may be the last people to have these memories.<hpage>That's not allowed I'm acting now to save this place, for myself, and for the bugs that still live there.<hpage>Do you think my efforts as a person of knowledge were in vain?<page>what am i doing? You can ask questions, but you can't give them a good answer. No matter what the outcome is. My vision has always been deceived by the now.<page>Just one trip. As far as I know, that's the purpose.<page>If anyone could understand this state, son of Vyron, I suspect it might be you.<page>Maybe not yet, but it's not a gift, right? Perhaps in the distant future, your actions will once again honor me. "<page>Oh, the time is over for a quick escape from these trembling caves. Each road may be long and winding, but I hope you understand the fun of it.

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 你想单打独斗？有我和扎扎助阵肯定能百战百胜！需要帮忙就开口，我们的长枪自会跟上！
translated_text: お姉ちゃん一人で戦うの？私がそばにいれば、無敵になる!ザザも!私たちの憎しみはあなたのものです。
secondary_translated_text: sister, are you fighting alone? If I'm by your side, you'll be invincible! Zaza too! Our hatred is yours, and our hatred is yours.

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ……他们可知这只是开端？即使能得解脱，众生仍需寻觅新途……
translated_text: ...これは始まりに過ぎないことを理解するか。もし彼らが束縛から解放されたなら、彼らは再び道を見つける必要がある。
secondary_translated_text: ... Do you understand that this is only the beginning? If they have been freed from bondage, they need to find their way again.

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: 我的希望与您同在，红衣姑娘。它将随您深入至暗，直至彼岸！
translated_text: 私の希望はあなたと共にある、レッドガール。彼らはあなたを最も深い暗闇、さらに遠くまで追跡します!
secondary_translated_text: My hope is with you, Red Girl. They will follow you to the deepest darkness, even further!

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪占满荒野洞穴，它们是个好对手。这里的生物也比髓骨地更凶残。
translated_text: 燃える赤い貝殻が広い洞窟に巣を作る。彼らとの戦いは最も激しい。ファロの兵士は印象的です。
secondary_translated_text: The burning red shells make nests in the wide caves. The fight against them is fierce. The soldiers of Pharaoh are impressive.

translated_text: Deep Dockの地図
secondary_translated_text: Map of the Deep Dock

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>就算你只剩一道暗影，我也会斩断你母亲的丝线。<page>那还犹豫什么？难道你害怕了？<page>跳下来啊，小蜘蛛！和我一同沉溺，让虚无吞噬我们！<hpage>虚无或许能吞噬你，但我绝不献祭自己。<hpage>我熬过了纺络的无数荆棘，也在危机中见证过奇迹。<hpage>但我永远是圣巢之女。对万物之底的虚空……再无畏惧！
translated_text: <hpage>たとえ影だけが残っても、私の剣はそれを殺し、母の束縛を解き放つ。<page>なぜ今主張するのか。恐怖は突然あなたの冷たい心を奪うか？<page>最後の一発、クモ。私の溺れた宮殿に加わり、忘却が私たちを飲み込むように。<hpage>子供よ、あなたは私の命を忘れられるかもしれない、私はそれを犠牲にしない。<hpage>私はあなたの国の怒りを生き延びました。私はそのとげと刃に耐え、その危険の背後にある奇跡を見ました。<hpage>しかし、永遠に、息子よ、私はケネスの娘です。万物の下の空虚さ、私はもはや闇を恐れないであろう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Even if only the shadow remains, my sword will kill it and unleash the bondage of my mother.<page>Why do you insist now? Does fear suddenly take away your cold heart?<page>The last shot, Spider. Join me in my drowning palace, that oblivion may swallow us up.<hpage>My child, you may forget my life, I will not sacrifice it. "<hpage>I have survived the wrath of your nation. I endured its thorns and blades, and I saw the miracle behind its perils.<hpage>But forever, my son, I am Kenneth's daughter. The emptiness under all things, I shall no longer fear the darkness.

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 小气鬼！欺负老实虫？没我们的秘密帮衬你在外头活不过三天！
translated_text: おぉ!あなたは貪欲ですか？これは私たちのような小さなジャーナリストには悪いことでしょうか？秘密がなければ生きていけないよ。
secondary_translated_text: oh! Are you greedy? is this a bad thing for a small journalist like us? I can't live without a secret.

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 上回比赛还不错吧？但我还是低估你了！<page>原本只想跑个痛快，但你说不定能实现我突破速度极限的愿望！<page>灵巧的虫子，时候到了！准备好突破速度的桎梏了吗？
translated_text: 最後の試合は素晴らしかったですよね。しかし、私が提案した挑戦は、あなたのようなエネルギッシュな人にはあまりにも控えめすぎることがわかりました。<page>私はレースの準備をしていたが、あなたは運命をもたらした!あなたの中で、私の願いはついに叶い、スピードの壁は破られました!<page>準備はいいか？最終テストの時間です!
secondary_translated_text: The last game was great, wasn't it? However, I found that the challenge I suggested was too modest for an energetic person like you.<page>I was preparing for the race, but you brought my destiny! In you, my wish has finally come true, and the speed wall has been broken!<page>you ready? It's time for the final test!

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐这么能干，努努也该出门探险了！期待在荒野偶遇哦！
translated_text: 彼女は大人と若い女性がすでにたくさん狩りをしていると信じているので、すぐにヌーが冒険に出る時が来た。野生で会うのは楽しいことになるので、目を光らせてください!
secondary_translated_text: She believes that adults and young women are already hunting a lot, so soon it's time for Noo to go on an adventure. Keep an eye out, it will be fun to meet in the wild!

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你也被关起来了？我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: ああ、ホー!あなたは少し立ち往生しているようです!なんて残念なこと!<hpage>バグ君もここの囚人なのか？一緒になれば、逃げやすくなる。<page>えっ？冗談ですか？刑務所に味方はいない!私が匂いを嗅ぎに行くと、あなたは壁にぶつかった!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho! You seem to be a bit stuck! What a pity!<hpage>bug, are you a prisoner here too? Together, they make it easier to escape.<page>what? are you kidding me? We have no allies in prison! When I went to sniff, you hit the wall!

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 这本册子记录着纺络虫兽的气味与口感。
translated_text: ファルの様々な昆虫や獣の匂いや味を詳細に記述した巻物。
secondary_translated_text: A scroll detailing the smell and taste of various insects and beasts in the fallout.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！还以为你被地震或黑灾吃掉啦！<hpage>就差一点，不过我没事。<hpage>外面愈发混乱，但这还算安全。你暂时别出去。<page>努努才不出去！那些扭曲的丝线太讨厌了，毁了探险的兴致！<page>但大姐姐……现在不正是完善记录的好时机？<page>地震肯定把怪物都吓出洞了！快去打猎给努努开眼界吧！
translated_text: 陛下、お嬢さん! Nuは、世界の恐ろしい騒音や粘着性の黒い線が彼女からあなたを奪うことを恐れています!<hpage>俺は生きてる俺の力がある限り戦い続ける<hpage>王国はより危険になったが、暖炉はまだ安全を提供するように見えた。しばらくここにいることをお勧めします。<page>もちろんです!少年は中に留まる。歪んだ線の嫌な感覚が冒険の楽しさを台無しにした。<page>しかし、あなたは、閣下、お嬢様。日記を書くのに最適な時期ではないでしょうか。<page>世界の終わりは確かに多くの生き物を怖がらせ、隠れることができない!だから狩りに行って、かわいいヌーに学んだことを見せてください!
secondary_translated_text: Your Majesty, Miss! Nu is afraid that the terrible noise of the world and the black lines of stickyness will take you away from her!<hpage>i'm alive, i'll fight as long as i have my strength.<hpage>The kingdom had become more dangerous, but the fireplace still seemed to offer safety. I recommend you stay here for a while.<page>of course! The boy stays inside. An unpleasant feeling of distorted lines ruined the fun of the adventure.<page>But you, my lord, miss. Isn't it the best time to write a diary?<page>The end of the world will certainly scare many beings and cannot hide! So go hunting and show the cute Noo what you've learned!

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 干嘛拒绝呢，切磋下嘛！就当战前热身！<hpage>切磋的好处……对你更多。我没空陪你玩，告辞。
translated_text: なんで小さな戦いを拒否するの？これは将来のテストに役立ちます!<hpage>戦えば、きっと刺激的になるでしょう。残念ながら、そのような議論を議論する時間はありません。さようなら、諸君。
secondary_translated_text: why do you refuse a small fight? This will help for future tests!<hpage>If you fight, it will surely be exciting. Unfortunately, there is no time to discuss such an argument. Goodbye, gentlemen.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: <hpage>懦夫。你们亲手葬送自己的土地，却躲在此处。
translated_text: <hpage>臆病者自分の土地を破壊しても、ここに隠れている。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Cowards, even if they destroy their own land, they hide here.

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 咔呀！你的壳上爬满了恶心的蛆虫。在那些毒水池子里游泳真是太蠢了。<hpage>我也不想这样，沙克拉。你最好离远点。<hpage>我不会让这些蛆虫待太久的，靠灵丝或休整自会清除。
translated_text: やめて、WOW!あなたの殻は恐ろしいウジ虫でいっぱいです。彼らの病気のプールで泳ぐのは愚かな選択です。<hpage>それは私たちが望むものではない、シャクラ。今は距離を置いた方がいいと思う。<hpage>私はこの侵略に長く耐えられない。絹であろうと休息であろうと、すぐに浄化されるでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Stop it, wow! Your shell is full of horrible worms. Swimming in their sick pool is a foolish choice.<hpage>That's not what we want, Shakra. I think we'd better keep some distance now.<hpage>I cannot bear this aggression for long. Whether it is silk or rest, it will be cleansed at once.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 看来你迷路了，肯定是小失误！<page>调整好了？那就再比一次吧！
translated_text: 賢い間違いだ!コース中に迷ったようです。これは単なる誤りではないか。あなたは間違いから回復したようです。<page>また出馬したいですよね。一緒に飛ぼう!
secondary_translated_text: That's a smart mistake! I seem to get lost on the course. Isn't this just a mistake? You seem to have recovered from your mistake.<page>You want to run again, right? Let's fly together!

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ……即便往昔可以重访，但记忆终将悖逆……<page>……当唤声再起，你会让昔日的抉择蒙蔽双眼么？<page>……以爪为刃，以声为引……历史永远不会等候我们……
translated_text: ...人は振り返ることができるが、記憶は矛盾している。<page>...電話が再び鳴ったとき、あなたの前の行動にだまされますか？<page>...爪を通して、音を通して歴史は常に立ち上がり、私たちを歓迎する
secondary_translated_text: ... People can look back, but their memories are contradictory.<page>... When the phone rings again, will you be fooled by your previous actions?<page>... Through the claws, through the sound, history always stands up and welcomes us.

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，大姐姐拒绝努努？好狠心！<page>想想能从这些生物身上挖出多少美味的知识啊！
translated_text: ああ、ママ。主よ、かわいそうなヌーを否定しますか？酸が多い!<page>ここに住む生き物から学べる面白いことを考えてみてください!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Mama. Lord, will you deny poor Nu? Lots of acid!<page>Think of some interesting things you can learn from the creatures that live here!

translated_text: 爆発のステップ図
secondary_translated_text: Step diagram of explosion

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等，临走前再送个配得上你的宝贝！<page>这块远古面甲碎片归你了！谢谢你，希望你永远铭记这场较量！
translated_text: でも待って!あなたが去る前に優れたスキルには素晴らしい報酬が必要です!<page>この古代の仮面の破片はあなたのもの!それを受け入れなさい。大切にする。いつも感謝しています。
secondary_translated_text: But wait! Great skills need great rewards before you leave!<page>This piece of ancient mask is yours! Accept it, you know. I care. I will always be grateful.

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的小玩意！那些破烂朝圣者喜欢带这个，就从他们身上顺的！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: これは美しい光沢ですね。汚れた古いゴミはこれらを持ち歩くのが大好きで、可能な限り報告したいのです!ああ、ホー!
secondary_translated_text: This is a beautiful luster. The dirty old garbage loves to carry these around and wants to report them as much as possible! Oh, ho!

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 哇大姐姐你真好！猎杀这里的生物，把见闻记在本子上！
translated_text: ママ、あなたはヌーをとても幸せにしてくれた!この土地の生き物を追って、この巻物に記録しよう!
secondary_translated_text: Mom, you made Nu so happy! Follow the creatures of this land and record them in this scroll!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。这里已被沙岩吞没了。<hpage>洞穴虽然复归原貌，但岩层里似乎埋着宏伟建筑。<page>建造者的尸壳堆在上面的塔里呢。当年肯定是强盛部落，也有不少勇士。可惜都只剩下空壳了。<page>可惜啊，使针的小姑娘，我们生不逢时，无缘与他们较量。
translated_text: <hpage>地殻と砂に飲み込まれたこれらのドリフトの中で、サキアラに美しい挨拶があります。<hpage>洞窟は自然に戻りましたが、洞窟全体に隠された大胆な構造物の証拠が見えました。<page>建築家の殻は上の塔の上にあった。彼らは偉大な部族のように見え、私は彼らが強い戦士だと信じています。今はただの殻として存在している。<page>かわいそうな子針!私たちは彼らの爪には遅すぎた。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>In these drifting, swallowed up by the crust and sand, there is a beautiful greeting to the Sacchiara.<hpage>The cave has returned to nature, but we could see evidence of bold structures hidden throughout the cave.<page>The architect's shell was on top of the tower above. They look like a great tribe, and I believe they are strong warriors. " Now it exists as a mere shell.<page>Poor needle! We were too late for their nails.

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: 莫沮丧啊朝圣友，<br>昂首放歌莫踌躇！<page>别畏惧啊同道虫，<br>心怀信念最幸福！<page>看这原野多壮美啊！上方沼地还能让每个朝圣者饱腹！<hpage>原野虽好，长草中却有猎手潜伏。奏乐只会暴露行踪。<page>暴露又何妨！聚在一块，正好一起高歌！
translated_text: 絶望するな、巡礼者の友よ。<br>目を上げて声を上げる!<br>恐れるな、巡礼者Truuu @ uu<br>これは幸せな選択だと思います!<page>こんにちは、このエリアは素晴らしいですか？私たちの上には肥沃な荒野があり、巡礼者はここでお腹を満たすことができます。<hpage>暑い畑は本当に奇跡ですが、ハンターたちは長い草の中をさまよっています。楽器を演奏することは、あなたの存在を思い出させるだけです。<page>思い出させてあげる!大勢の人が集まる場所で、素晴らしい歌が歌われます!
secondary_translated_text: Do not despair, my friend of the pilgrim.<br>Lift your eyes and raise your voice!<br>Fear not, pilgrim Truuu @ uu<br>I think this is a happy choice!<page>Hello, is this area great? Above us there is a fertile wilderness, where the pilgrims can fill their stomachs.<hpage>The hot fields are truly a miracle, but the hunters wander among the long grass. Playing an instrument is only a reminder of your existence.<page>I'll remind you! A great song is sung in a place where a large number of people gather!

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: <hpage>圣堡另一边的高处，朝圣者们新建了安全营地。<hpage>你老实点的话，他们应该能留你。<page>朝圣者的营地？听着像个能偷光光的好地方！<page>这情报不赖，还是白送的！你个蠢脑袋！
translated_text: <hpage>巡礼者の何人かは、ここよりも安全な城の反対側に宿営した。<hpage>彼らにいたずらをするのを我慢できれば、彼らはあなたをそこに留めるでしょう。<page>サマーキャンプ？？それは古いグリンデルのための幸せな場所のようです!ミッシー、後で見てみよう。<page>これは良い思い出です。あなたはちょうど無料で私に与えた!頭の中はクソだらけ。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Some of the pilgrims camped on the other side of the castle, which was safer than here.<hpage>If you can bear to play pranks on them, they will keep you there.<page>Summer camp? It seems like a happy place for the old Grindel! Missy, we'll see later.<page>This is a good memory. You just gave it to me for free! I have shit in my head.

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！赢光你的念珠了。都说运气眷顾虔诚者，看来我够虔诚。<page>等你再带着念珠的时候，我很乐意跟你再玩几局。
translated_text: わかった!わかった!私はあなたの最後のロザリオを獲得した。幸運は信者と歌のためのものなので、私は本当に忠実でなければなりません。<page>またロザリオに出てきたら、また一緒に遊びたいです。
secondary_translated_text: I got it! I got it! I have earned your last rosary. Luck is for believers and songs, so I really must be faithful. "<page>When we come out to Rosario again, we want to play with you again.

translated_text: 青銅マーカーペン
secondary_translated_text: bronze marker pen

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的确已斩杀这片土地上的许多住民，但记录这些生物是值得的。<hpage>若时间允许，我会尽力帮你。<page>好呀！努努太高兴啦！去吧！狩猎吧，掠食吧，开始我们的研究吧！
translated_text: <hpage>私はこの土地の多くの住民を殺しましたが、これらの生き物を記録することは価値のある事業だと同意します。<hpage>時間が許せば、私はあなたの意志を実行します。<page>ママ! Nuuは素晴らしい!今すぐ行け!狩り、狩り、学び始めましょう!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have killed many inhabitants of this land, but I agree that recording these creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time permits, I will do your will.<page>Mommy! Nuru is great! go now! Let's start hunting, hunting, and learning!

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！终于自由啦！这破牢房关了格林德尔大爷太久啦！<page>你身上有股阔气味儿！斗篷里藏啥好东西了？<hpage>管好你的爪子，小偷。碰到我斗篷前你就会没命。<page>哎哟！开个玩笑嘛！底下好东西够多了，犯不着冒险！
translated_text: ついに自由に!長い間ここに閉じ込められていた。グリンデルのような貧しい小さな内部告発者を育てるのは面倒な場所です。<page>おい、いい匂いがする!マントの下にポケットはありますか？盗むために良いものを隠してください。<hpage>気をつけなさい、貪欲な泥棒よ、あなたの爪が私のマントに触れる前に、あなたは死ぬ。<page>ああ、ホー!大丈夫だよ、いじめっ子。おいしいものがたくさん待っています。匂いがした!
secondary_translated_text: Free at last! I've been locked up here for a long time. It's a troublesome place to raise a poor little whistleblower like Grindell.<page>Hey, that smells good! Is there a pocket under the mantle? Hide the good things to steal.<hpage>Beware, you greedy thief, before your nails touch my mantle, you will die.<page>Oh, ho! It's all right, bully. Lots of delicious things are waiting for you. I could smell it!

translated_text: シェルのマップ
secondary_translated_text: Shell Map

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: <hpage>既然你已经找到导师，任务完成，打算回部落吗？<page>回不去了……离开部落只有一条路可走。<page>这是我们传统，我们的远行。活够了的年长者自行出走，少数选择送行的亲属也不能再回。<page>从前觉得部落很大，但到了纺络，才知道部落有多小。那是我出生、成长的地方，但容不下虫活一辈子。
translated_text: <hpage>ご主人様が見つかりましたシャクラこの土地での任務は完了した。あなたの部族に戻りますか？<page>私は戻ってこない、スズメバチの巣穴...私はできない、私は私の部族の巣を残して平原に行く。旅は一方向です。<page>それが私たちのやり方でした私たちは長い間離れていましたなぜなら生きている少数の人々が遺体を取り戻そうとし少数の人々が遺体を引き渡すことを選んだからです<page>しかし、この土地、ファロ。私はかつて私の巣の平原をとても壮大に見ましたが、今は小さくなっています。あなたが生まれ育った場所ですが、昆虫のように充実した生活を送るには狭すぎる場所です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your mission in this land has been completed. do you want to go back to your tribe?<page>I'm not coming back, honeycomb... I can't, I'll leave my tribe's nest and go to the plains. The journey is one way.<page>That was the way we did it, and we were apart for a long time, because a few people who were alive wanted to retrieve the body, and a few people chose to hand over the body.<page>But this land, Pharaoh. I once saw the plain of my nest very grand, but now it is getting smaller. It's where you were born and raised, but it's too narrow to live a full life like an insect.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型古蚁才刚死不久……但她的存在……<page>难道是她？是她在维持这里的生态？……但既然她死了，接下来会怎么样？<hpage>会枯萎，并消逝……而她是死在我针下。<page>你？为什么？为什么要杀掉这么关键的存在？<hpage>这说来话长……我需要她的力量来斩断黑灾诅咒。这虽然残忍，但有必要。<hpage>假以时日，这些洞穴或许能重生、繁盛……但需几代虫的努力。<hpage>这份重任，就要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子了。
translated_text: 巨大な古い蟻。彼女の死は最近过ぎたようだが、彼女のはここに。<page>彼女なの？そうでしょうか？この洞窟を支える力は何でしょうか。もしそうなら、今どうなるでしょうか。<hpage>彼らは枯れて色あせてしまうでしょう。悲しいことに、私の針が彼女を殺したのです。<page>あなたは、お嬢さん？でもなんで？なぜそんな大事なものを壊すのか。<hpage>簡単に説明するのは難しいことだが残っているものは、ファルムの黒線の脅威を取り除くために彼女の力が必要だった。これは野蛮な行為であることは間違いないが、理由は公正である。<hpage>時間が経つにつれて、洞窟は成長し、再び繁栄する機会を見るかもしれませんが、再生自体は困難な作業です。人生よりも長い、多くの人生。<hpage>成功したければ、最初の種を蒔くために自分のような虫に頼らなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: A huge old ant. Her death seems to have recently passed, but here is her.<page>is that her? is that right? What is the power that supports this cave? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither away and fade away. Sadly, my needle was the one that killed her.<page>are you, lady? but why not? Why would you destroy something so important?<hpage>What remained, difficult to explain easily, required her strength to remove the threat of the black line of the Farms. There is no doubt that this is a barbaric act, but the reason is just.<hpage>Over time, the caves may see the opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration itself is a difficult task. Longer than life, many lives.<hpage>If you want to be successful, you have to rely on bugs like yourself to sow the first seeds.

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>慢着！古老者，您壳里那扭动的异物……<page=S>有这东西在，仪式会同时拽出它的记忆。<hpage>那就替我除了它，你们不是擅长各种法术吗？<page=S>治不了！我们擅灵魂之术，这东西却是实体。您得去找传统医具。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧，听说她在那片湿地里苟活。<page=B>她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>待って、老人!侵入者はあなたの殻の中でうずくまる<page=S>残酷な生き物が現れたとき、私たちの儀式はもはや機能しません。あなた自身の記憶を抽出するように、私たちはその記憶を抽出します。<hpage>苦しみから私を解放してください。そのスキルが必要ですよね。<page=S>理由じゃない!すべての力は魂から来て、すべての力は体から来ています。もっと伝統的な治療法が必要です<page=B>ウナビ、バルハルトを探す亡命者。私の知る限り、彼女は濡れた荒野から追い出されました。<page=B>任務を遂行するための道具と、現在まで生き残るための狡猾さを持っている。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Hold on, old man! The intruder is huddled in your shell.<page=S>When a cruel creature appears, our rituals no longer work. We will extract that memory, just as we extract your own memory.<hpage>Release me from my suffering. You need those skills, right?<page=S>Not a reason! All power comes from the soul, and all power comes from the body. We need more traditional therapies.<page=B>An asylum seeker looking for Balkhardt. As far as I know she was driven out of the wet wilderness.<page=B>He has the tools to carry out his mission, and the cunning to survive to the present.

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在险地旅行要记好安全营地。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记长椅和休息点。
translated_text: 非友好的な土地を旅行するときは、安全なキャンプ場を覚えておくことが重要です。<br><br>これらのピンは、地図上のベンチやその他の休憩場所をマークする。
secondary_translated_text: When traveling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember a safe campground.<br><br>These pins mark benches and other breaks on the map.

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 努努研究可仔细了！粗胳膊、鳞片毛发、精致眼睛……全要检查！
translated_text: ヌーは生き物と時間を過ごしており、注意深く調べなければならない。太い腕、乱れた髪、繊細な目Nuuはすべてをチェックします!
secondary_translated_text: Nu is spending time with creatures and must be carefully investigated. Thick arms, messy hair, delicate eyesNuu checks it all out!

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 红绸披身的坚强战士啊，<br>为我们奋战至最终时刻！<br>护佑她的甲壳，祝福她的灵丝，<br>我们的辉光，我的宝贵挚友！
translated_text: 赤い花輪を身に着けた女の子、<br>彼女の殻を守り、彼女のラインを祝福!<br>彼女は最後まで戦った。<br>親愛なる友人を守ってください!
secondary_translated_text: A girl wearing a red wreath,<br>Protect her shell and bless her line!<br>She fought to the end.<br>Please protect your dear friend!

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 有空的话去上面塔楼看看，挺壮观的。那可不是岩壳自然生长形成的，而是用整块材料塑造而成。<page>如果这里的古老部落能引导砂岩生长至这等规模……那他们拥有的力量不逊于圣堡。
translated_text: 機会があれば、タワーを訪れることもできます。これは印象的な光景です。これらの洞窟の地殻は生い茂っておらず、物質そのもので満たされています。<page>もしここの古代部族がこの程度までその発展を導くことができたなら彼らの力は要塞にも匹敵する。
secondary_translated_text: If you have the opportunity, you can also visit the tower. This is an impressive sight. The crust of these caves is not lush, and is filled with the matter itself.<page>If the ancient tribes here were able to lead their development to this extent, their power would be comparable to the fortress.

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 那些朝圣者……在下面还算安分，到这上面就发疯了。对着黑暗哭喊，还攻击路人。<page>雅卡内什！握紧你的武器，可别走神了！前面的路曲折危险，迷路就是死。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: これらの奇妙で足を引きずった巡礼者たち彼らは下のキャンプではおとなしいが、ここでは彼らは正気を失っているように見える。彼らは暗闇に叫び、仲間を攻撃した。<page>Yakaneshはあなたの銃を取り出し、正しい方向にそれを向けます!前方の道は曲がりくねっており、迷うと死に至るだけです。<page>私は部族のパイロットでこの土地の地図を作っていましたご希望であれば、商品や商品を交換できます。
secondary_translated_text: These strange, dragged-foot pilgrims - they are docile in the camp below, but here they seem to be losing their minds. They shouted in the darkness and attacked their comrades.<page>Yakanesh takes out your gun and points it in the right direction! The road ahead is winding, and if you get lost, you will only die.<page>I was a tribal pilot mapping this land, and if you want, you can exchange goods and merchandise.

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 呀呀！砍了这么多可爱小生物！<page>知识多到流口水！大姐姐继续努力呀！
translated_text: ママ、ママ!あなたはよく狩りをしていて、私たちの記録にはかわいい小さな生き物がたくさんいます!<page>ヌーは多くの学習に興奮しています!仕事を続けてください、お嬢様!
secondary_translated_text: Mom, Mom! You hunt a lot, and there are a lot of cute little creatures in our records!<page>Noo is excited to learn a lot! Keep up your work, miss!

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。
translated_text: 私の国の兵士たちはこう挨拶しました。あなたは生まれたばかりの子供ですが、兵士でもあります。あなたの立場、あなたの武器、あなたの行動はそれを示しています。
secondary_translated_text: The soldiers of my country greeted me like this. You are a newborn child, but you are also a soldier. Your position, your weapons, and your actions show it. "

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你对这里很熟么？<hpage>我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: ああ、ホー!あなたは少し立ち往生しているようです!なんて残念なこと!<hpage>また会ったよ、泥棒。この場所をご存知ですか？<hpage>一緒になれば、逃げやすくなる。<page>えっ？冗談ですか？刑務所に味方はいない!壁に身を投げて匂いがします!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho! You seem to be a bit stuck! What a pity!<hpage>See you again, thief. do you know this place?<hpage>Together, they make it easier to escape.<page>what? are you kidding me? We have no allies in prison! I throw myself against the wall and smell it!

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你一路平安。<page>此地是纺络，战士。安全只是虚妄。
translated_text: <hpage>ハイ、安全な旅。<page>こちらはファラオ、兵士。セキュリティは神話です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hi, safe journey.<page>This is Pharaoh, soldier. Security is a myth.

translated_text: カニカ·ピン
secondary_translated_text: Kanika Pin

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，赛斯。没想到在庆典能遇见你。<page>是啊！之前在下面粘糊沼泽差点没命了。<page>幸亏遇到这群办庆典的好心虫！<page>他们说我可以当个跳蚤住下，我当然同意！这地方看着很适合安家<page>现在就只差长点毛和翅膀了！哈哈！
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、セス。お祝いでお会いできて嬉しいです。<page>こんにちは、こんにちは。はい、私は長い間放浪していて、下の粘着性のある沼で死ぬのではないかと心配し始めました。<page>私は幸運にもこのフレンドリーなパーティーの家に出くわしました!<page>ここでノミを作ってもいいと言われたので、もちろん同意しました。誰にとっても、少なくともしばらくの間は、家に帰るのに最適な場所のようです。<page>あとは毛皮と翼が必要ですよね。ハハハ!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hi there, Seth. It's great to see you on our celebration.<page>Hello, hello, hello, hello. Yes, I've been wandering for a long time, and I've begun to worry that I might die in the sticky swamp below.<page>I was lucky enough to come across this friendly party house!<page>I was told I could make a flea here, so of course I agreed. For anyone, it seems like the perfect place to go home, at least for a while.<page>Then you need fur and wings, right? ha ha ha!

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 圣堡阴影下的沼泽，这里的水曾经清澈过。
translated_text: 城の陰に生まれた沼。かつては水が澄んでいたという証拠がある。
secondary_translated_text: The swamp was born in the shadow of the castle. There is evidence that the water was once clear.

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 荆棘盘踞的险路。这里的植物和住民一样要命。
translated_text: 道路はとげと根で塞がれていた。これらの植物は通常、生息する生物と同じくらい致命的です。
secondary_translated_text: The road was clogged with thorns and roots. These plants are usually just as deadly as the organisms they inhabit.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 要比赛吗？耐力测试随时恭候！
translated_text: 何を言っているのか、スピードエラー？忍耐力のテストに備えよう!“Let's Go Go!
secondary_translated_text: What are you talking about, speed error? Prepare for a test of patience! "Let's Go Go!

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 扎扎和我会杀遍这些鬼地方，直到怪物一个不剩！
translated_text: ザザと俺はこの呪われた土地でブラック·ツイスト·デーモンを皆殺しにする!
secondary_translated_text: Zaza and I will kill all the Black Twist Demons in this cursed land!

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>快去吧，古老者。有那根须在你体内，仪式没法开始。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧。她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>おいでよ、老人。あなたが根をねじるマスターであるとき、儀式は始まりません。<page=B>ウナビ、バルハルトを探す亡命者。私の知る限り、彼女は濡れた荒野から追い出されました。<page=B>任務を遂行するための道具と、現在まで生き残るための狡猾さを持っている。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Come here, old man. When you are the master of twisting the roots, the ceremony does not begin.<page=B>An asylum seeker looking for Balkhardt. As far as I know she was driven out of the wet wilderness.<page=B>He has the tools to carry out his mission, and the cunning to survive to the present.

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 红壳怪潜伏猎杀骨兽，是这里生态的一部分。<page>被丝咒侵蚀，它们却还能基本保持神智……靠的是什么？
translated_text: 赤い貝殻は野原に隠れ、骨の獣を追いかけた。なぜか、彼らはここで繁栄する生活の一部です。<page>たとえ幽霊になっても、彼らはしばしば自分自身を見失うことはないようですどんなアンカーが彼らをこの力を保つのでしょうか。
secondary_translated_text: The red shell hid in the field and chased the bone beast. For some reason, they are part of life that thrives here.<page>Even if they become ghosts, they often don't seem to lose sight of themselves, and what anchor will keep them in this power?

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然要唱！我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。圣堡在召唤每个虔诚信徒，你我都听见了！
translated_text: でも、もちろん歌います!私はシャーマン、あなたのような巡礼者です。他の敬虔な魂のように、私は偉大な城の呼びかけを聞いた。
secondary_translated_text: But, of course I sing! I'm a shaman, a pilgrim like you. Like other godly souls, I heard the call of the great castle.

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 喂！喂喂！那边的！快放我们出去！偷点小东西至于关一辈子吗？
translated_text: おい!おい!ここにいるぞ!ここから出して!どんな時から軽窃盗は終身刑になるのか？
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! I'm here! Get out of here! When does petty theft get a life sentence?

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的圣堡已失却歌声，如今黑丝翻涌要撕裂它的躯壳。恐怕神圣的纺络真要灭亡了……<page>但我仍怀希望，红衣姑娘！王国可以倾覆，但生命将延续，我们虫子能重建家园！<hpage>我与你同怀希望，谢尔玛。但记住，新建之物不属于过去，而属于你们。<hpage>你的直觉很强。让它指引你和这些虫子，别再膜拜王国的残骸。<page>噢，您过誉了！但指引我的该是我的同胞们——那些在废墟中仍放声歌唱的同胞……
translated_text: 私たちの偉大な城は音を失い、黒い線が立ち上がり、その殻を引き裂いています。圣なるファローが本当に死ぬのか心配ですが。<page>希望はあるよ、赤ちゃん!王国は滅びるかもしれませんが、生命は残り、昆虫は私たちの土地を再建できます。<hpage>私はあなたと同じように、シャーマン。しかし、あなたが次に構築するものは、過去のものではなく、あなたのものです。<hpage>あなたの直感は強い。あなたがたを導く者たちに、王国の死体を畏れてはならない。<page>ああ、あなたは私を賞賛する!しかし、私を導いてくれたのは仲間たちであり、彼らの声はこの破滅の時代にも歌う。
secondary_translated_text: Our great castle has lost its sound, and a black line is rising up and tearing its shell. I'm worried that the Holy Pharaoh will really die.<page>There's hope, baby! The kingdom may perish, but life remains, and insects can rebuild our land.<hpage>I am just like you, shaman. But what you build next is not the past, it is yours.<hpage>Your intuition is strong. Do not fear the corpse of the kingdom to those who lead you.<page>Oh, you praise me! But it is my companions who have guided me, and their voices will sing in this time of ruin.

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哈……又见面了。清剿这些黑怪可不轻松，对吧？但只要王国还有哭喊声，我和扎扎就不能歇！
translated_text: ハァッ!こんにちは、シスター。悪魔を殺すのは簡単ではないか。でも休むことはできない!罪のない者の叫びが王国の隅々に響き渡る時!
secondary_translated_text: huh! Hello, sister. Isn't it easy to kill the devil? But you can't rest! " When the cry of the innocent resounds in every corner of the kingdom!

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 带上这个我们就是一伙的了。打赢了多赚，打输了赔本！
translated_text: 情報提供者として登録!あなたの敵からより多くのロザリオを取得します。何かを失わないと報告するときは、注意してください。
secondary_translated_text: Register as an Information Provider! Get more rosaries from your enemies. Be careful when reporting that you are going to lose something.

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这是谁？小蜘蛛终于到了，在伟大的圣堡面前瑟瑟发抖。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: これは何だ？スパイダーはついに私たちの素晴らしい城のバイヤーになりました。<hpage>青白い少年、笑うために戻ってきたのか？あなたの土地はまだ私の敵を証明していない。この眠りの城は違いません。<page>クモ、ハニー。どうしてそんなに辛くて楽観的になりたいの？そこに力があるとは思えない。彼女はすぐにその希望を打ち消すことができる。<hpage>バカな子。私があなたの王の姿を見ないと思うか？そんなに遠いのか？<hpage>大地の素晴らしさ、昆虫の忠誠心、そしてそれらに降りかかる呪い。兆候は明白です。<hpage>あなたの王国は、より高いカーストの一つであるワームを超えた生き物に縛られています。<hpage>私の絹と貝殻にどんな憧れを抱いても、私は両方にとても愛着があることがわかります。
secondary_translated_text: what is this? Spider has finally become a buyer for our wonderful castle.<hpage>the pale boy, did you come back to laugh? Your land has yet to prove my enemy. This sleeping castle is no different.<page>The spider, honey. why do you want to be so hard and optimistic? I don't think there's any power there. She can quickly dispel that hope.<hpage>Stupid child. do you think i will not see your king? is it that far away?<hpage>The splendor of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is bound by creatures beyond the Worm, one of the higher castes.<hpage>No matter what longing I have for my silk and shells, I can see that I have a great attachment to both.

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 研究生物很辛苦，但努努超满足！快去打猎吧大姐姐！
translated_text: 大変な仕事で、生物学から多くのことを学びましたが、Nuuにとってはとてもやりがいのあるものでした。さあ、狩りに行こう、我が主よ!
secondary_translated_text: It was a hard job, and I learned a lot from biology, but for Nuu it was very rewarding. Come on, let's go hunting, my lord!

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 哟！阔气虫来啦！外面世界要完蛋了，急需补给吧？哦嚯嚯！<hpage>你看着倒挺精神，不怕王国崩塌？<page>王国崩塌关我们屁事！大不了换个地方偷！
translated_text: “Beautiful Bug!今、私たちの周りで“古い世界”がきしみています。緊急に物資が必要です!えっ!!<hpage>泥棒さん元気そうですね。王国の崩壊を心配していませんか？<page>おい世界の終わりグリンデルを邪魔するな別のトロフィーを探すのか？
secondary_translated_text: "Beautiful bug! Right now, the "old world" is crawling around us. We need supplies urgently! what?!<hpage>Thief, you look good. aren't you worried about the collapse of your kingdom?<page>hey, the end of the world. don't bother grindel. are you looking for another trophy?

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们已经准备好施咒，您躺上祭坛便可开始。<page=M>劝您别再耽搁了，纺络时日无多，这些心也跳不了多久。
translated_text: <page=M>私たちの呪文は織り込まれ、私たちの部分は準備ができています。準備ができたら、ステージに横になって、始めましょう。<page=M>今はもうぐずぐずしない方がいい。ファローの時間は短く、心臓は永遠に鼓動し続けません。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Our spells are woven in, and our part is ready. When you're ready, lie down on the stage and start.<page=M>I'd better not be giggling anymore. Farrow's time is short, and the heart will not keep beating forever.

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: 别说了，战士。让我在这最后时刻安静怀念吧。<hpage>如你所愿，不再打扰。
translated_text: 話すな、兵士。この最後の瞬間を思い出してください。<hpage>お望みどおりに、サー。もう邪魔はしません
secondary_translated_text: Don't talk, soldier. Remind yourself of this last moment.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I won't bother you anymore.

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: <hpage>下次吧，我有要事在身。<page>我会继续特训等着比赛那天！<page>命运注定我们要一决高下！
translated_text: <hpage>次回は、ミスター。自分の仕事は簡単には無視できない。<page>これからもトレーニングを続けていきます!<page>会うことは避けられない。運命は競争を呼びかける!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Next time, sir. Your own work cannot be easily ignored.<page>We will continue to train!<page>It's inevitable to meet. Fate is calling for competition!

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 噢！欢迎大姐姐！也来研究红石头吗？我发现个大家伙！还算新鲜！<hpage>两只带螺旋壳的怪物用石头攻击我。斩了一只，跑了一只。<page>哎呀！努努好想要一对！能学好多东西呢！真可惜！
translated_text: ようこそ、我が主よ、お嬢さん! Nuのような赤い石の生き物を見てください。大きなものを見つけました。新鮮だが、あまり新鮮ではない。<hpage>2匹の獣がここで私を襲い、螺旋状の殻で石に穴を開けました。これを切って、もう一人が逃げた。<page>ああ、ママ!ホントに？私は彼女がカップルを持つことを望む!彼女は多くを学ぶことができた。残念ながら、私はこのような学術イベントを逃した!
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, my lord, my lady! Look at the red stone creatures like Nu. I found something big. Fresh, but not too fresh.<hpage>Two beasts attacked me here and made a hole in the stone with a spiral shell. Cut this one off, and the other one escaped.<page>Oh, Mama! really? I hope she has a couple! She was able to learn a lot. Unfortunately, I missed such an academic event!

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 必须继续……我们还有……很多事要做……
translated_text: 前に進まなければもっとあります。私たちがすべきこと
secondary_translated_text: If we don't move forward, there's more. What we should do.

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 码头修得花里胡哨，净是浪费。外族人的路子真怪……
translated_text: 多くのエネルギーを無駄にしていますこれらの形態には多くの繁栄がある。他人のやり方は本当におかしい
secondary_translated_text: There is a lot of prosperity in these forms, and we are wasting a lot of energy. The way others do things is really weird.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 上次只是热身对吧？真正的好戏现在开始！<page>新的挑战，新的赛道！配得上你我的实力！<page>接受我的全速挑战，一起冲刺突破极限吧！
translated_text: 賢い間違いだ!前のレースはウォームアップだったと思いますよね？実際の試合の準備は、ちょっとしたテストですよね。<page>さあ、ゲーム開始!新しい曲はあなたのスキルの価値がある。もはやテストだけではない!<page>挑戦を全速力で進めます。限界を押し広げて、何が待っているのか見てみましょう!
secondary_translated_text: That's a smart mistake! I think the last race was a warm-up, right? Preparing for a real match is a little bit of a test, right?<page>Come on, the game starts! The new song is worth your skill. It's not just a test anymore!<page>Go ahead with the challenge at full speed. Let's push the boundaries and see what awaits!

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>我常用它标强力敌人的位置。
translated_text: 地図上の重要な場所やリマインダーをマークするために使用できます。<br><br>敵の位置を評価するためによく使います。
secondary_translated_text: It can be used to mark important places and reminders on the map.<br><br>It is often used to assess the position of the enemy.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！终于啊！<hpage>先生，我对您在钟心镇祈愿墙下的战书很感兴趣。不过抵达此地后，倒对您选的位置有些疑惑。<hpage>若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: えっ!!柔軟な相手が現れた。最後に!最後に!<hpage>私はベル入植地の願いの壁に対するあなたの挑戦に非常に興味があります。私たちはこの場所に到着しましたが、あなたが選んだ場所を知りたいのです。<hpage>挑戦者を探しているなら、遠くない場所を選ぶべきです。こんなに遠くの洞窟に行く昆虫はほとんどいません。<page>本当かもしれませんしかし、それを発見したら、何が完璧ですか？この巨大で骨の折れる死体は、ファルムの状態とはかけ離れている。<page>ここでは、スピードと滑らかなケースを自由にテストできます。ここで競争できます!<page>挑戦者、あなたはそれを達成したいですか？私の願いを叶える!一緒に限界を発見しましょう!
secondary_translated_text: what?! A flexible opponent appeared. Finally! Finally!<hpage>I am very interested in your challenge to the Wall of Wishes of the Bell Settlement. We have arrived at this place, but we would like to know where you have chosen.<hpage>If you're looking for a challenger, you should choose a location that's not far away. Few insects go to caves that far away.<page>It may be true, but once you discover it, what is perfect? This huge, bone-broken corpse is far removed from the state of Farme.<page>Here you can freely test your speed and smooth case. You can compete here!<page>Challenger, do you want to accomplish it? Let my wish come true! Let's discover the limits together!

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
translated_text: あっ...。とても近いです。それをほとんど味わうことができます。
secondary_translated_text: ah... It's very close. You can almost taste it.

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 嘿！你也在观察红壳怪吗？它们在这片原野上猎杀最后的骨兽。<page>这里的植物比下面的洞穴更茂盛，难道接近能量源了？<page>我必须找到源头！对！不止是为了父亲的遗愿，也是为了这片大地存续的希望！<hpage>要小心，小虫子。此处是蚁族的核心区域。<hpage>或许能有宝贵发现，但走错一步就会丢了性命。
translated_text: ああ、ホー!お前も見てるのかハンター？ここでは赤い貝が豊富で、広大な草原と最後の骨の獣の間を泳いでいます。<page>この緑豊かな成長は、下の洞窟よりも良い感じです。食料源に近いのか？<page>その秘密を発見しなければ!俺がやる!父の願いと希望によって、私たちの死にかけた土地は生き残る道を見つけることができます。<hpage>気をつけろ、若者。お勧めします。ここではアリの心臓部に到達します。<hpage>価値のある発見があるかもしれませんが、間違いはあなたの殻を鋭くすることができます。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ho! are you watching, hunter? There are plenty of red shells here, swimming between the vast meadows and the last bony beast.<page>This lush growth feels better than the cave below. is it close to a food source?<page>We have to discover that secret! i'll do it! With the Father's wishes and hopes, the land we have laid to death can find a way to survive.<hpage>Be careful, young man. I would recommend you. Here we reach the heart of the ants.<hpage>There may be some valuable discoveries, but mistakes can sharpen your shell.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘快看！骨门听见歌声，为我们让路了！<page>能在这相遇多有缘呀！我们可以结伴踏上圣途！<page>不过我想再再待会儿，给这好骨门唱首感恩曲！
translated_text: おい!見たか？赤い女偉大な門は私の歌を聞いて、無限の古代の慈悲で私たちの道を開いた!<page>今会えて本当にラッキーです!一緒に素晴らしい道を歩みましょう!<page>または私はもう少しここにいます。私はこの高貴な門に感謝の歌を歌います!
secondary_translated_text: Hey! did you see that? The red woman the great gate listened to my song, opened our way with infinite ancient mercy!<page>I am so lucky to meet you now! Let's take a wonderful path together!<page>Or I'll be here a little bit longer. I will sing a song of thanks to this noble gate!

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在这地方，名字都起的很随意，对吧？我是沙克拉，驭环者。要是能再碰上，会准备好新地图卖给你。<page>后会有期，使针的小姑娘。
translated_text: この土地では名前は自由ですよね？私はシャクラ、ウォーディングリングです。もし狩りが再び絡み合ったら、新しいマップを手に入れます。<page>それまでは、針を振る子供たちにさようなら。
secondary_translated_text: names are free in this land, right? I'm Shakra, Woldingring. If the hunt gets tangled up again, you'll get a new map.<page>Until then, goodbye to the needle-wielding children.

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 这里虽然是圣地……可看着同袍受苦真难受！<hpage>光着急没用。<hpage>若想帮忙，可以先从包扎开始。找点破布当绷带吧。<page>好主意！我平常就知道唱歌……这次得动真格了！<page>材料圣堡里随便找！圣地就是灵验！
translated_text: このは圣なる、そうですが、私たちの巡礼者同胞のを心配しています。負傷者や疲労者が多い。<hpage>あなたの疑いと心配はそれらを治せない、小さな男。<hpage>仲間を助けたいなら、傷を包帯することから始めましょう。集落周辺にある単純なぼろは包帯として使われる。<page>ああ、それは良いアイデアです、赤い女の子!通常は1曲で十分だと思いますが、もちろん、もっと直接的な行動が必要です。<page>要塞は独自の材料を提供します!この最も神聖な場所を祝福!
secondary_translated_text: This is sacred, yes, but we are worried about our fellow pilgrims. Many people are injured and tired.<hpage>Your doubts and worries won't cure them, little man.<hpage>If you want to help your comrades, start by dressing up the wound. A simple rag around the settlement is used as a bandage.<page>Oh, that's a good idea, red girl! Usually I think one song is enough, but of course, more direct action is needed.<page>The fortress offers its own material! Bless this most sacred place!

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹别怕！只要我们勤勉且守住信念，圣堡不会亏待我们……肯定不会！
translated_text: 兄弟姉妹よ、恐れるな。一生懸命働き、信仰を続ければ、城は私たちを養うでしょう。疑いはない!
secondary_translated_text: My brothers and sisters, do not be afraid. If we work hard and keep our faith, the castle will feed us. No doubt about it!

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们会把知道的古心位置尽数相告。<page=M>我们需要三颗心来施咒，从您的灵丝中抽出花影。<page=S>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=M>あなたが探している心は、私たちはその場所を共有するために最善を尽くします。<page=M>私たちのマントラを構築し、あなたの絹から花の明確な記憶を引き出すには3人が必要です。<page=S>老人よ、心を与えてください。最終的に失敗した。これらの記憶を救う前に、この忘れられたバグの国の力を直接見てください。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>The heart that you are looking for, we will do our best to share that place.<page=M>It takes three people to build our mantra and bring out the clear memories of flowers from your silk.<page=S>Old man, give me a heart. He ultimately failed. Before you save these memories, take a first-hand look at the power of this forgotten bug country.

translated_text: リングマーク。
secondary_translated_text: The Ring Mark.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只年迈的巨蚁……她刚死没多久，可她却出现在这里……<page>那是她本人吗？难道真是她？支撑这些洞穴的力量究竟是什么？若真如此，如今会发生什么？<hpage>它们终将枯萎凋零……你也许会含泪明白，是我手中的针了结了她的生命。<page>这位姑娘，你？可为什么？为什么要摧残这般珍贵的东西？<hpage>这事难以三言两语解释……在更大的考验来临前，我必须通过试炼，证明自身的力量。<hpage>终有一日，这些洞穴或许能重新焕发生机，甚至繁盛昌荣。但那重生之路，漫长艰难，超越一生又一生。<hpage>而这份重任，便要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子。
translated_text: この巨大なアリは彼女の死は最近过ぎたようだが、彼女のはここに。<page>彼女なの？そうでしょうか？この洞窟を支える力は何でしょうか。もしそうなら、今どうなるでしょうか。<hpage>彼らは枯れて色あせてしまうでしょう。悲しいことに、私の針が彼女を殺したのです。<page>あなたは、お嬢さん？でもなんで？なぜそんな大事なものを壊すのか。<hpage>これは簡単に説明するのが難しいことです。これからの大きな課題に直面して、自分の強さを確かめるためのテストが必要です。<hpage>時間が経つにつれて、洞窟は成長し、再び繁栄する機会を見るかもしれませんが、再生自体は困難な作業です。人生よりも長い、多くの人生。<hpage>成功したければ、最初の種を蒔くために自分のような虫に頼らなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: This giant ant seems to have recently passed away, but here is her.<page>is that her? is that right? What is the power that supports this cave? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither away and fade away. Sadly, my needle was the one that killed her.<page>are you, lady? but why not? Why would you destroy something so important?<hpage>This is something that is difficult to explain easily. In the face of the big challenges ahead, we need a test to confirm our strength.<hpage>Over time, the caves may see the opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration itself is a difficult task. Longer than life, many lives.<hpage>If you want to be successful, you have to rely on bugs like yourself to sow the first seeds.

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的隧道网。到处是他们的仓库和冥想室，方便在野地快速移动。
translated_text: 赤い殻の洞窟の道お店や神社があちこちに点在している。トンネルは下のフィールドを素早く通過することができます。
secondary_translated_text: Red shell cave road Shops and shrines are dotted everywhere. The tunnel can quickly pass through the fields below.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要下潜并斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>もし私が飛び込んでこの土地を黒い線の呪いから切り離すなら、まず侵略者をそこから追い出す方法を見つけなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I'm going to jump in and cut this land off from the curse of the black line, I must first find a way to drive the invaders out of it.

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我未曾求救，倒也被放出来了。<hpage>不必道谢，钥匙碰巧能用罢了。若想留在这，请自便。<page>不，我这就走。前路已通，纵使逃避，他的遗愿仍会推着我前行。<hpage>那便祝你一路顺利。看得出你有重担在身，我无意深究。
translated_text: 助けを求めなかったのに釈放されました。<hpage>感謝は求めていません。この鍵はロックを開くだけです。あなたが望むなら、あなたの殻が固まるまでここにいてください。<page>いいえ、いいえ。すぐに行きます。私の道は明確で、私はそれを避けようとしても、私の欲望は再び私を駆り立てました。<hpage>安全な旅をして、背の高い昆虫。私はもう探検しません。明らかにあなた自身が負担を取る。
secondary_translated_text: I was released without asking for help.<hpage>I'm not asking for gratitude. This key will only open the lock. If you wish, stay here until your shell sets.<page>No, no, no. I'll be right there. My path is clear, and even though I try to avoid it, my desire has driven me again.<hpage>Make a safe journey, tall insects. I'm not exploring anymore. Obviously you take the burden on yourself.

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 唔嗯？哎呀又睡着了！<page>这地方太舒服了，让人犯困，你说是吧？
translated_text: えっ？先生？ああ、また来た!<page>そんなつもりはなかった。こんな快適な場所で目を覚ますのは大変ですよね。
secondary_translated_text: what? sir? Oh, here you come again!<page>I didn't mean that. It's hard to wake up in such a comfortable place, right?

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我祈祷，听我歌唱，<br>前路虽近骨门却挡，<br>求您醒来助我闯荡……哦？
translated_text: ああ、私の祈りを聞いて、私の歌を聞いて、<br>私の道は先にありますが、それは、<br>骨の扉を通り抜けられない。<br>目を覚まして助けてくださいえ？ああ？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, hear my prayers, hear my songs,<br>My way is ahead of me, but it is,<br>Cannot pass through the door of bones.<br>wake up, please help me, okay? huh?

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>在风沙侵蚀的洞窟顶端，藏着位甲壳斑驳的老暴君。<page=M>全盛时他与部族以铁爪统治半个纺络。有人仰慕其强权，更多则活在恐惧中。
translated_text: <page=M>砂に覆われた洞窟の上には、かつて偉大な戦士王である、天候に疲れた古い支配者が横たわっていた。<page=M>最盛期には、彼らとその指揮官はファラムの半分を爪で支配していた。昆虫はこの力を好む。ほとんどの人は恐怖の中で生きている。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>On top of the sand-covered cave lay the weather-weary old ruler, once a great warrior-king.<page=M>At their height, they and their commanders controlled half of Pharam by claw. Insects prefer this power. Most people live in fear and fear.

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哇哦大姐姐！努努好惊喜！你已经长大了对吧？完全体？能打猎了吧？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: ああ、ママ!ヌーのための甘いサプライズ!もう大人ですよね。完全に成長？狩りの準備はいい？<hpage>もちろん、私は子供ではありません。<page>完璧だ!!ヌーは願い事をする必要がある!彼女のために、あなたはファラムの多くの素晴らしいバグを見つけ、それらを切り取るでしょう。<page>ナイフで切ってください!あなたの成熟した精神でそれらを破壊する!あなたの野生の大人の心でそれらをカット!<page>ヌーを助けますか？あなたの編集知識でページを埋めるために彼女のリールを取ることができるか。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Mama! A sweet surprise for Noo! You're an adult now, right? Fully grown? are you ready to hunt?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child.<page>perfect! Nu needs to make a wish! For her, you will find many wonderful bugs in pharam and cut them off.<page>Please cut them with a knife! Destroy them with your mature spirit! Cut them in your wild adult mind!<page>do you want to help nu? Can you take her reels to fill the page with your editing knowledge?

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！歹徒！谁敢打扰勇者加蒙德的美梦？<hpage>无意冒犯，只是路过这座塔想探探路。<page>哼！勘察战场？战士的借口！看你这架势就是来找架打的！<page>作为最勇猛的骑士，要决斗我奉陪！<page>算你走运，我还没睡醒。真要决斗你可打不过全盛期的我！
translated_text: GUURROOOO!ヴィラン!悪魔だ!誰が勇敢なガモンドを必死に必要な眠りから目覚めさせるのか？<hpage>邪魔するつもりはありませんバグさん私はこの場所をよりよく理解するためにタワーを通過した。<page>フン!戦場を知る？兵士の理由!お前を見ろ!あなたの場所とブレードは宣戦布告した唯一の人です。<page>最も勇敢な騎士として、彼が直接挑戦すれば、高貴なガモンドはそれを受け入れるでしょう!<page>怒りはあなたの意図ではない。実際、私は議論のために眠っていました。騎士の決闘のための会合だったら君は私の最高の姿を見ることができない
secondary_translated_text: GUURROOOO! villan! the devil! Who will awaken the brave Gamond from his desperately needed sleep?<hpage>I'm not going to interrupt you, Mr. Bug, I went through the tower to get a better understanding of this place.<page>HUN! you know the battlefield? Reasons for soldiers! Look at you! Your place and Blade are the only ones who have declared war.<page>As the bravest knight, if he challenged him directly, the noble Gammond would accept it!<page>Anger is not your intent. In fact, I was sleeping for the discussion. if it were a meeting for a knight's duel, you wouldn't be able to see my best.

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 哦嚯！阔气虫，你溜进格林德尔的宝窝想干嘛？<page>是不是听说我这有好货？哦嚯嚯！那可不，宝贝们都是自己溜进来的！<hpage>我不在乎你的货怎么来的，如果有好东西，我拿念珠来换。<page>成交！不过我们可不做赔本买卖，嚯嚯！你先随便看看吧……
translated_text: ねえ、グリンデルの居心地の良い小さなコーナーに登ったとき、ファンタジーバグはどのように見えますか？<page>いいものがあると聞いてますよね？ああ、ホー!ここではおいしい食べ物がたくさんあります、それは確かです。<hpage>どうやって買っても構いません。取引に値するものがあればロザリオを捨てるかもしれません<page>私たちは決して公正な交換にノーとは言わない、Hey!今あるものを見てみましょう
secondary_translated_text: Hey, what does a fantasy bug look like when you climb up a cozy little corner of Grindel?<page>i heard you had a good one, right? Oh, ho! There's a lot of good food here, that's for sure.<hpage>It doesn't matter how you buy it. If there's something worth the trade, I might throw away the rosary.<page>We will never say no to a fair exchange, Hey! Let's look at what we have now.

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我要继续训练了！不过记着，虽然没其他奖品了，但随时欢迎你来赛道上奔跑！
translated_text: これからは修行に行きます。知っている!これ以上の報酬はありませんが、ご希望の方は歓迎いたします。
secondary_translated_text: From now on, I will go to practice. I know! There is no greater reward than this, but we welcome you to join us if you wish.

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 这些尖脸虫就爱在雨里扑腾。要是能听懂它们的语言多好……
translated_text: 霧雨の洞窟にいるこの鋭い顔の虫は、ダイビングや遊びが大好きですよね。彼らの美しい言叶を理解できればいいのに
secondary_translated_text: These sharp-faced bugs in the foggy caves love diving and playing, don't they? I wish I could understand their beautiful words.

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ……身居井底唯见上方。沉湎过往者难窥前路……<page>……余音仍可指明方向。善者手中，利器亦可为友……<page>……你执着追随她的足迹。可曾为后来者留有余地？……
translated_text: ...井戸の底では、見上げるだけです。過去は未来を見据える者には隠されている。<page>...これらのエコーはまだあなたを導く。そうだ。善良な人には武器も友达になることができる。<page>...あなたは本当に彼女の足跡をたどりたい。次の人に何を残したいのか。
secondary_translated_text: ... At the bottom of the well, you just look up. The past is hidden from those who look to the future.<page>... These echoes still lead you. yeah. For a good man, weapons can also be his friend.<page>... You really want to follow in her footsteps. What do you want to leave behind for the next person?

translated_text: ビルヴォートの地図
secondary_translated_text: Map of Bilworth

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 呼……每次都被你惊艳……<page>想再比赛的话随时奉陪！我一定要追上你！
translated_text: ひづめ。あなたはいつも印象的です。速い昆虫です。<page>できるだけ時間をかけて加速しましょう!私はあなたのように優雅にしたいです。
secondary_translated_text: Feeling. You are always impressive. They are fast insects.<page>Take as much time as you can and accelerate! I want to be as graceful as you are.

original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 这位同袍意志消沉，初遇时她嗓音沙哑，几乎听不见！<page>莫慌！我的歌声能唤醒她！红衣姑娘一起唱，唤起这位同路人！
translated_text: 貧しい旅人は決意が薄れていることに気づいた。最初に挨拶したとき、彼女の声はかろうじて聞こえました。<page>心配することは何もない私の歌は彼女を麻痺から解放します!赤い女よ、あなたと私は共に巡礼者の仲間を目覚めさせましょう!
secondary_translated_text: The poor traveler noticed that his determination was fading. When I first greeted her, I could barely hear her voice.<page>There's nothing to worry about, my song will free her from paralysis! Red Woman, together you and I will awaken the companions of the pilgrims!

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 再大的台阶也迟早被风沙埋了，没有什么是永恒的。
translated_text: 時間が経つにつれて、この巨大な階段でさえ砂に流されてしまいます。不動のものはない。
secondary_translated_text: As time goes on, even this huge staircase will be washed away in the sand. There is nothing immobile.

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
