original_zh_text: 哇！大姐姐快看！这只死透的怪物超有趣！<page>身体像树干，头发像苦叶子！努努觉得它超聪明！<hpage>这生物占据此处，袭击路人。<hpage>别久留，它的同族还在树丛里埋伏呢。<page>哇！是你干掉的？太感谢啦！现在可以好好研究它的粘液和脆壳了！
translated_text: ああ、ママ!見てください、私のマスターとミス!ここの魅力的な生き物は死んでいますが、まだ大丈夫です!<page>彼女の体は森のようで、髪は苦い葉のようです!賢い、とヌーは思う!<hpage>このクリーチャーはここに縄張りを築き、私が通り過ぎると攻撃を仕掛けた。<hpage>あまり長くはいないはずです。彼女の部族は木の枝に隠れ、変装して攻撃を待っていた。<page>おぉ!切ったのか？ヌーは彼女に心から感謝します! Nuuは、粘性のある内部と脆い殻を含め、この生物をよく調べることができます。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Mama! Look, my master and miss! " The fascinating creatures here are dead, but they're still fine!<page>Her body is like a forest, and her hair is like a bitter leaf! Smart, I think!<hpage>This creature has established a territory here, and when I pass by, it attacks.<hpage>It shouldn't have been too long. Her tribe was hiding in tree branches, disguised and waiting for an attack.<page>oh! did you cut it off? Nu sincerely thanked her for this! The manta rays allow us to examine this creature well, including its sticky interior and brittle shell.

original_en_text: Those blasted crawbugs are fouling up my roof! I’ve come up with a clever solution to keep them away, but I’ll need some help. Enquire at the Halfway Home if you’re fit for the task.
original_zh_text: 那些该死的腐囊虫弄脏了我的屋顶！我有个绝妙的解决办法，但需要帮助。有能力者请来中途酒馆洽谈。
translated_text: このクソ野郎が屋根を汚している!私は彼らを遠ざけるための巧妙な解決策を考え出しましたが、助けが必要です。仕事に適しているかどうか尋ねてください。
secondary_translated_text: This son of a bitch is dirtying the roof! I've come up with an ingenious solution to keep them away, but I need help. Ask them if they are suitable for the job.

translated_text: 願い事をする？
secondary_translated_text: you want to make a wish?

original_en_text: Search for traces of the courier, Tipp, and track his location.<br><br>Tipp was last seen in lower Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 寻找送货员蒂普的踪迹。<br><br>他最后出现在甲木林下层。
translated_text: 宅配便のヒントを検索し、彼の位置を追跡します。<br><br>ティップはロウアー·シャーウッドで最後に見られた。
secondary_translated_text: Find a courier tip and track his location.<br><br>Tip was last seen in Lower Sherwood.

translated_text: 倒れた後

secondary_translated_text: Survivor Camp Supplies

translated_text: お城
secondary_translated_text: The Castle

original_en_text: Those mad, violent pilgrims who haunt the great path... we could make use of their shawls here in Bone Bottom. And felling them would surely be a mercy!
original_zh_text: 那些在外游荡的癫狂朝圣者……其披肩对骸底镇大有用处。诛灭此等暴虐之徒，实为赐予慈悲解脱！
translated_text: 道に出没する狂気的で暴力的な巡礼者たち私たちは骨の底に彼らのショールを使うことができます。切るのも良いことです!
secondary_translated_text: The mad and violent pilgrims who haunt the road We can use their shawl to the bottom of the bones. Cutting is good too!

original_en_text: In Deep Docks, find a way to descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在深坞找到方法潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: 深いドックでは、Farumの下に降りる方法を見つけてください。
secondary_translated_text: In the deep docks, find a way to get down under the Farum.

secondary_translated_text: Start and get the old heart of Fal.

translated_text: 三重旋律の一部は者に委ねられる。

translated_text: マスカス·ノミキャラバン
secondary_translated_text: Mascus Nomi Caravan

translated_text: あなたの養母の目をサンクラフトのウィッシュウォールに向け、あなたの報酬を受け取ります。
secondary_translated_text: Your foster mother's eyes turn to the wish wall of the Suncraft and receive your reward.

translated_text: ファロが最速
secondary_translated_text: Faro is the fastest.

original_en_text: Fragile egg containing a young Silkeater Queen. Though the Queen cannot gather Silk itself, with time and care it could be raised to breed more Silkeaters.
original_zh_text: 内含噬丝蛆女王的脆弱虫卵。虽不能自行收集灵丝，但培养后可繁殖更多噬丝蛆。
translated_text: 壊れやすい卵の中には若い絹の女王がいた。女王自身は絹を集めることはできませんが、時間と細心の注意があれば、より多くの絹を飼育し繁殖させることができます。
secondary_translated_text: Among the fragile eggs was a young silk queen. The queen herself cannot collect silk, but with time and careful attention, she can breed and breed more silk.

secondary_translated_text: Sonklav's guardian

translated_text: グランド·キャッスル
secondary_translated_text: Grand Castle

secondary_translated_text: Pavo of Berhardt

secondary_translated_text: Sprint Sprint

original_zh_text: 将扭曲的畸芽缚于体内。
translated_text: 歪んだつぼみを縛る。
secondary_translated_text: Tie up twisted buds.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, I have caught fresh scent of my master in those stricken swamps beside the Citadel. I ask you now to follow, to meet together at trail’s end.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，我在圣堡旁的沼泽嗅到了导师的新踪迹。请随我一同前往踪迹终点。
translated_text: 少年針、私は城の隣の被災した沼で主人の新鮮な匂いを嗅いだ。私はあなたに従って道の終わりに会うように頼みます。
secondary_translated_text: Boy needle, I sniffed the fresh smell of the master in the ravaged swamp next to the castle. I ask you to follow me and meet the end of the road.

original_en_text: Return to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 返回髓骨洞窟向穆什卡复命。
translated_text: ノミのキャラバンに戻り、ノミの王ムシュカの骨髄に戻ります。
secondary_translated_text: Back to the flea caravan, back to the bone marrow of Mushka, the flea king.

original_en_text: As was warned long ago, the black times have come. There is one last act to perform. Meet us at what was once called Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 正如古老预言警示，黑暗时代已至，但尚存最后一幕等待上演。请前往曾经的蚤托邦。
translated_text: 以前にも言われた通り、黒時代がやってきた。最後のシーンがあります。かつてノミのユートピアと呼ばれた場所で会いましょう。
secondary_translated_text: As we have said before, the Black Age has arrived. There is the last scene. Meet you in what was once called a flea utopia.

secondary_translated_text: Whispers Dome

translated_text: 骨髄とは

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen near the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 寻找朱比拉娜的踪迹。<br><br>她最后出现在圣堡忆廊附近。
translated_text: 商人ジュビラナを捜索し、彼女の位置を追跡する。<br><br>ジュビラナは城の記念館の近くで最後に見られた。
secondary_translated_text: They search for the merchant Jubila and track her location.<br><br>Jubilee was last seen near the castle's memorial.

secondary_translated_text: Rest of the Pilgrims

translated_text: 表示完了です。
secondary_translated_text: Display is complete.

original_en_text: Our dear merchant left to scavenge treasures from the Citadel’s Memorium. She’s been gone far too long. Please make sure she’s safe!
original_zh_text: 我们的商人去圣堡忆廊寻宝后失踪太久，请确认她的安全！
translated_text: 私たちの親愛なる商人は城記念館の宝物を発掘しに行きました。彼女は長い間いなかった。彼女の安全を確認してください!
secondary_translated_text: Our dear merchant went to excavate the treasures of the Castle Monument. She was gone for a long time. Make sure she is safe!

original_en_text: Seek out the distressed bug near the Blasted Steps Bellway.
original_zh_text: 在蚀阶钟道附近寻找遇险者。
translated_text: ベルビューの爆発階段の近くで厄介なバグを探してください。
secondary_translated_text: Look for troubling bugs near the exploding staircases in Bellview.

original_zh_text: 将棘刺芯交给在远野等待的裁缝。
translated_text: 脊椎コアを遠隔場待機ストレス源に渡します。
secondary_translated_text: Pass the spinal core to a remote field standby stressor.

original_en_text: Collect Plasmium from Plasmium buds in the lower Wormways.<br><br>Plasmium can be extracted from buds using a fully charged stab from the Needle Phial tool.
original_zh_text: 在沙噬虫道下层的生质花苞上收集生质液。<br><br>使用蓄满力的储液注射器抽取。
translated_text: 以下のワームウェイでは、プラスミウム芽からプラスミウムを収集します。<br><br>Needle Phialツールを使用して、とげを液化し、つぼみから血漿を抽出した。
secondary_translated_text: The following wormway collects the plasmium from the plasmium buds.<br><br>Using the Needle Phial tool, liquefied the thorns and extracted the plasma from the buds.

secondary_translated_text: Steel barb

original_en_text: Sweetness! Sourness! Bitterness! I need it all with hastiness! If you have the precious fruits, come to me in Mosshome and share all you have!
original_zh_text: 甜味！酸味！苦味！我要所有莓果！如果有珍果，到苔栖乡找我分享！
translated_text: 愛しい酸味!苦しんだ!私は急いで!貴重な果物を持っているなら、Mosshomeに来て、あなたの持っているものを共有してください!
secondary_translated_text: Lovely sour! suffered! I hurry! If you have any precious fruit, come to Mosshome and share what you have!

original_en_text: Present the filled out Hunter’s Journal to Nuu at the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 向灰沼中途酒馆的努努出示完整猎手日志。
translated_text: グリモのミッドウェー·ハウスでヌーに完成したハンター日記を見せる。

translated_text: 城の金色の高地でパフォーマンスのメロディーを探してください。
secondary_translated_text: Look for a performance melody in the castle's golden highlands.

translated_text: 迷子のノミ。
secondary_translated_text: The lost flea.

original_zh_text: 将生质血交给沙噬虫道顶部的炼金师。
translated_text: 血漿化した血液をワーム島の頂上にいる錬金術師に渡してください。

original_zh_text: 在骸底镇旁的颓败教堂直面看守者及其家族。
translated_text: 骨の底の隣にある破壊された教会は、看守とその家族に面していた。
secondary_translated_text: The ruined church next to the bottom of the bones faced the guard and his family.

translated_text: ファウルの珍しいグルメを集めている。

secondary_translated_text: Rest for the Pilgrims

secondary_translated_text: Collecting them.

translated_text: 建築家の曲を学びました。
secondary_translated_text: I learned the architect's song.

original_en_text: Deliver to Mergwin in Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至圣咏殿的梅尔格温。
translated_text: 合唱団のメル·グウェンに敬意を表します。
secondary_translated_text: I would like to pay tribute to Mel Gwen in the choir.

original_en_text: Hunt Crawbugs in Greymoor and collect their Ragpelt.
original_zh_text: 猎杀灰沼腐囊虫并收集破毛皮。
translated_text: グレムアでザリガニを狩り、そのぼろを集める。
secondary_translated_text: He hunts crab in Gremua and collects its crumbs.

original_en_text: The Conductor’s Melody has been learned.
translated_text: 指揮の旋律が習得された。
secondary_translated_text: The melody of conducting was mastered.

original_en_text: Our settlement sits defenceless! No more! When the worst comes, we must stand ready. Bring us pins of the choirbugs, those blades still sharp and strong.
original_zh_text: 我们的聚落需要防卫！带来机枢咏者的锋利尖钉。
translated_text: 私たちの集落は無防備です!もうだめだ!最悪の事態が発生した場合、我々は準備する必要がある。合唱団の昆虫ピンを持ってきて、その刃はまだ鋭くて強い。
secondary_translated_text: Our settlement is defenseless! not anymore! If the worst should happen, we need to be prepared. Bring the choir's insect pin, whose blade is still sharp and strong.

translated_text: ドアだ
secondary_translated_text: the door.

translated_text: 失われた家臣
secondary_translated_text: The lost vassals.

translated_text: ベリー摘み
secondary_translated_text: Berry Picking

original_en_text: Track down Flintbeetles in the Marrow and defeat them to collect Flintgems.<br><br>Flintbeetles can be tracked by their stone-sheddings and their aromatic dung.
original_zh_text: 在髓骨洞窟追踪并击败燧甲虫收集燧晶。<br><br>可通过石屑和带香味的粪便追踪。
translated_text: 骨髄でフリントビーを追跡し、フリントジェムを収集するためにそれらを倒す。<br><br>カブトムシは石の破片や芳香族の糞で追跡できます。
secondary_translated_text: Track the Flintbees with their bone marrow and defeat them to collect the Flint Gem.<br><br>Beetles can be tracked by stone fragments and aromatic feces.

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen in the lower Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 寻找商人朱比拉娜的踪迹。<br><br>她最后出现在圣咏殿下层。
translated_text: 商人ジュビラナを捜索し、彼女の位置を追跡する。<br><br>ジュビラナが最後に現れたのは下層の聖歌隊室だった。
secondary_translated_text: They search for the merchant Jubila and track her location.<br><br>The last time Jubilee appeared was in the choir room downstairs.

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to complete the rebuilding of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 捐献念珠完成钟心镇重建。
translated_text: ベルハルトの再建を完了するためにロザリオを寄贈。
secondary_translated_text: Donate the Rosary to complete the reconstruction of Berhardt.

secondary_translated_text: Silver Bell

original_zh_text: 从罪途的克鲁尔与班金身上获取钢棘用于寄生体清除。
translated_text: Sinner ' s RoadのCrullとBenjinからSteel Sponesを購入して、Yarnabyは寄生虫を除去できるようにした。
secondary_translated_text: Buying Steel Spones from Crull and Benjin on Sinner's Road enabled Yarnaby to get rid of the parasites.

original_zh_text: 向盟地看守者运送补给。
translated_text: ソンクラフの看守に物資を届けた
secondary_translated_text: delivered supplies to sonclaw's warden.

original_en_text: Give the Ragpelt to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 将破毛皮交给灰沼中途酒馆的克雷吉。
translated_text: グレモアを通って帰宅しているクリッキーに雑巾を渡す。
secondary_translated_text: He passes a napkin to Crickie, who is on his way home through Gremmore.

translated_text: 嫌がらせ
secondary_translated_text: Harassment

original_en_text: Give Pale Oil to Plinney of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 将苍白油交给钟心镇的普林尼。
translated_text: ベルハルトのプリニウに軽油を送る。
secondary_translated_text: Deliver light oil to Bernhardt's Prinius.

original_en_text: Horrible cries have been heard from that prison beside the Citadel. What profanities must be happening within to cause such awful sound?
original_zh_text: 圣堡旁的监狱传出可怕哀嚎，里面究竟发生了什么？
translated_text: 城の隣の監獄から恐ろしい叫び声が聞こえた。何かがそこにこんな恐ろしい音を立てているのか。
secondary_translated_text: A terrible cry could be heard from the prison next to the castle. Is there something that is making such a horrible sound out there?

translated_text: 完了の非表示
secondary_translated_text: Hide Completion

original_zh_text: 使用深坞的潜钟潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: ディープドックの潜水鐘を使ってファルムの下に降下する。
secondary_translated_text: He uses the Deep Dock's dive bell to descend under the farm.

translated_text: スンクラフの住民
secondary_translated_text: Inhabitants of Sunclave

translated_text: 闇の地下。
secondary_translated_text: The dark underground.

translated_text: 下層の住人たち
secondary_translated_text: the inhabitants of the lower strata.

original_en_text: How do all of these wretched, lost bugs keep finding their way here?! Each hungry and squalling for shelter! We need more rosaries, so empty your pockets.
original_zh_text: 为什么总有迷途的可怜虫找到这里？！我们需要更多念珠，快掏空你的口袋！
translated_text: このかわいそうな迷子の虫はどうやってここで見つけ続けるのか？みんな空腹で、避難所を求めて叫んでいます。もっとロザリオが必要だからポケットを空にして
secondary_translated_text: how does this poor, lost bug keep finding it here? Everyone is hungry and screaming for shelter. I need more rosaries, so empty my pockets.

translated_text: 闇のハート。

original_en_text: Track down the wailing creature in the Slab and slay it.<br><br>The creature can be tracked by its slime trail.

secondary_translated_text: Our ghostly brother wandered through the halls, still in his delicate white cloak. This solution will benefit greatly from the protection. Bring me something, please! "

translated_text: 古代の商人巡礼者ジュビラナが聖歌隊の中を歩いているのが見られたが、ここには現れなかった。彼女には不幸な運命があった？
secondary_translated_text: The ancient merchant pilgrim Jubilee was seen walking in the choir, but he did not appear here. did she have an unfortunate fate?

original_en_text: A huge red-shell stole my precious keepsake and disappeared into the fields! Please chase down the thief and recover my treasure!
original_zh_text: 有个红壳大块头偷走了我的草娃娃并逃进原野！请追回我的宝物！

secondary_translated_text: The pilgrim's path is steep. I wanted to stand next to the Bone Bottom and create a beautiful symbol of hope that welcomes all those who embark on a long journey.

translated_text: 最後のジャンプ。
secondary_translated_text: The last jump.

original_en_text: Scale the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 攀登圣堡，直面萦绕纺络的灾厄。
translated_text: 城に登り、ファルムの土地を苦しめている人々と向き合う。
secondary_translated_text: Climb the castle and confront the people who are afflicting the land of the farm.

translated_text: 恐ろしい暴君。
secondary_translated_text: Terrible tyrants.

translated_text: 弾性固定。
secondary_translated_text: Elastically fixed.

original_en_text: Pale glaze used in the preparation and protection of bone masks.
original_zh_text: 用于骨甲面甲制备和防护的苍白涂料。
translated_text: 骨マスクの準備と保護のための軽い釉薬。
secondary_translated_text: A light glaze for bone mask preparation and protection.

original_en_text: Give the collected components to the Caretaker of Songclave.
original_zh_text: 将收集的组件交给圣歌盟地看守者。
translated_text: 集めたパーツをソンカフの警护に渡す。
secondary_translated_text: He handed over the pieces to Son Kauf's guard.

translated_text: 闇の地下。
secondary_translated_text: The dark underground.

translated_text: 遠方の圧力
secondary_translated_text: Distant Pressure

original_en_text: A lotta repairs to be done around here, but I need more materials! All I wish for is some shell shards so I can get to work. Not asking too much, am I?
original_zh_text: 这里有很多东西要修理，但我需要更多材料！我只想要些甲壳碎片来开工，这要求不过分吧？
translated_text: 修理する場所はたくさんありますが、もっと材料が必要です!私はちょうど始めることができるようにいくつかのシェルの断片があることを望む。要求しすぎでしょうか。
secondary_translated_text: There are plenty of places to repair, but we need more materials! I hope there are some shell fragments so I can just get started. Are you asking too much?

original_en_text: My dear little courier was last seen in Shellwood. Please someone, find Tipp and send him home, along with all of his precious stock!
original_zh_text: 我的小送货员最后一次出现在甲木林，请帮忙找到蒂普并送他回家，还有他那些珍贵的货物！
translated_text: 私の親愛なる小さなメッセンジャーが最後に現れたのはシャーウッドでした。誰かティップを見つけて、彼と彼の貴重な株を家に送ってください!
secondary_translated_text: The last time my dear little messenger showed up was Sherwood. Someone find a tip and send him and his precious stock home!

original_en_text: Such horror upon the roads! Those black mounds formed of husks and bugs, corrupting everything around. If only someone would cut them down and grant the poor souls their rest!
original_zh_text: 道路上的恐怖景象！那些由空壳与虫尸堆成的黑色肿块，正腐蚀周边一切。希望有人能斩除它们，让可怜的灵魂安息！
translated_text: 道路は本当に悪いです!黒い貝殻や昆虫は周囲のあらゆるものを腐敗させます。誰かがそれらを切り倒して、かわいそうな魂を休ませることができれば!
secondary_translated_text: The roads are really bad! Black shells and insects can rot everything around them. If only someone could chop them down and rest the poor soul! "

translated_text: 救命橋です。
secondary_translated_text: It's a lifeblood.

translated_text: シヒョン·タウン
secondary_translated_text: Si Hyung Town

original_en_text: Turn in the Choir Cloaks to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交圣咏外衣领取奖励。
translated_text: ソンクラフのウィッシュウォールに聖歌隊のマントを渡し、報酬を受け取りましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Pass the choir mantle to the wishwall of Soncrafts and receive your reward.

translated_text: ベル·モン
secondary_translated_text: Belmon

original_en_text: Track the Second Sentinel by their markers left near Songclave.
original_zh_text: 通过圣歌盟地附近的标记追踪次席戍卫。
translated_text: ソンカフの近くに残された標識を通って2番目の歩哨を追跡する。
secondary_translated_text: Follow the second sentry through the signs left near Son Kauf.

original_en_text: Collect Silver Bells in the bellvein tunnels above and below Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 在钟心镇上下的钟脉收集银光铃铛。
translated_text: ベル静脈トンネルの上と下のベルハルトに銀の鐘を集める。
secondary_translated_text: Collect silver bells in the Belhardt above and below the Bell Vein Tunnel.

translated_text: ラシュルの使者
secondary_translated_text: Messenger of Rushl

original_en_text: Deliver to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至罪途的奴仆。
translated_text: スティックスが罪人に提供する道。
secondary_translated_text: The way the sticks provide for sinners.

original_en_text: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Runt may feed.
original_zh_text: 使用工具获取各类器官喂养幼兽。
translated_text: 道具を使って様々な臓器を採取し、四旬節を食べられるようにする。
secondary_translated_text: They use tools to harvest various organs so that they can eat Lent.

translated_text: ベルハルトの住民
secondary_translated_text: Residents of Berhardt

original_en_text: Here they limply lay, the castaways and the disillusioned and the used-up.<page>It’s a sorry settlement you’ve summoned, miss bellringer, and a blasted bother for me. Not sure we have anything to offer ‘em... Not even hope.
original_zh_text: 看看这些疲惫的虫子，不是漂泊一生，就是失去信念。<page>敲钟者小姐，你搞出来的这个避难所真是大麻烦，我还得伺候这帮难民……我们连丁点希望都给不起。
translated_text: 彼らは無力で犠牲者で幻滅し疲れ果てて横たわっていました<page>ベリンジャーさん、あなたが提案した解決策は残念であり、私に大きな不便をもたらしました。私たちが彼らに何を提供できるか分からない希望さえない。
secondary_translated_text: They lay helpless and victims, disillusioned and exhausted.<page>Mr. Bellinger, the solution you have proposed is unfortunate and has caused me great inconvenience. They don't even know what hope we can offer them.

original_en_text: Ready the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血……
translated_text: 針の準備。下の血漿化細菌を見つける。<page>フィルにベストを尽くす。深く突き刺す。血漿を採取する。
secondary_translated_text: Prepare for needles. Find the plasmatizing bacteria below.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deeply. Plasma is collected.

original_en_text: Assistant... to learn more of Plasmium’s wonders... I know what we must do... <page>The bugs below... who have imbibed the substance... and evolved... their bodies are full with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 助手……想更了解生质液……我知道该怎么办了……<page>下面那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: アシスタントはプラスミウムの奇跡についてもっと学びました。やるべきことは分かっています<page>以下のエラー。この物質を摂取した。そして進化する。彼らの体は血漿化した血液で満たされている。<page>この貴重な蜜を抽出するには、フィアル針を使う必要があります。よくチェックしてください。より高い知識を得ることができるか。
secondary_translated_text: The assistant learned more about the miracle of plasmium. We know what we have to do.<page>The following errors. I took this substance. And evolve. Their bodies are filled with plasma-formed blood.<page>To extract this precious honey, you need to use a fial needle. Please check it carefully. Can you gain a higher knowledge?

original_en_text: The bugs below who have imbibed the substance and evolved... their bodies are filled with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: 下の昆虫はこれらの物質を吸収し進化した。彼らの体は血漿化した血液で満たされている。<page>この貴重な蜜を抽出するには、フィアル針を使う必要があります。よくチェックしてください。より高い知識を得ることができるか。
secondary_translated_text: The insects below absorbed and evolved these substances. Their bodies are filled with their plasma-formed blood.<page>To extract this precious honey, you need to use a fial needle. Please check it carefully. Can you gain a higher knowledge?

original_en_text: What fear arrests you...? This must be done... or we will never learn the deeper truth... Never become what is needed...
original_zh_text: 怕什么？……不这么做……永远不懂真相……永远无法进化……
translated_text: どんな恐怖があなたを逮捕したか。そうする必要がある。さもなければ、より深い真実を理解することはできません。あなたが必要とするものに決してならない。
secondary_translated_text: What fear has arrested you? We need to do that. Otherwise, you will not be able to understand the deeper truth. It will never be what you need.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract their Plasmified Blood.<page>Once we have it... we can peer deeper... learn more... enlighten ourselves fully...
original_zh_text: 啊……好助手……拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血。<page>有了它……我们能更深入……学习……完全开悟……
translated_text: ああ、そうだ。アシスタントは忠実すぎる。針座を握る。下の血漿化細菌を見つける。<page>フィルにベストを尽くす。深く突き刺す。血漿と血液を採取します<page>一度手に入れたら詳しく見ることができますもっと知る..。十分に刺激する。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yeah. The assistant is too loyal. Hold the needle seat. Find the plasmatizing bacteria below.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deeply. collecting plasma and blood.<page>Once you get it, you can look more closely to know more... Enough to stimulate.

original_en_text: <hpage>The roaches outside, why are they kept in pens? They seem a dangerous creature to cage or tame.<page=S>Us moorbugs gotta eat, don’t we? They’re wild fast breeders, them Muckroaches. Hard shells and tough meat, if you can even crack ‘em open, but options ain’t plentiful so we ain’t choosy.<page=S>Ain’t so bad to eat, once you’re used to it. The guts is the best bit, but them’s a choice cut and we ain’t had it for ages now.<page=L>Har har, life is tough all right! Benj’n here’s wasting away before us, poor wretch!<page=L>Tugs at your emotions, eh missy? How ‘bout you put that poker to good use? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts. There’d be fair trade waitin’ for you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头的蟑螂为何要圈养？此等凶兽关起来有什么好处？<page=S>我们这些沼地的虫子总得吃饭吧？淤秽蟑螂繁殖得贼快。虽然壳硬肉糙，破开都费劲，但我们也没得挑嘛。<page=S>吃惯了也倒还行。内脏最香，但这种精贵部位我们早八百年没尝过了。<page=L>哈！日子苦啊！瞧班金这体格，已经饿得瘦骨伶仃了！<page=L>是不是很可怜我们啊，小姐？要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <hpage>ゴキブリがいるのに、なぜフェンスに閉じ込められているのか。彼らは檻に入れたり飼いならされたりすることができない危険な生き物のようです。<page=S>ミミズは食べなければなりませんよね？野生では急速に繁殖する動物です。彼らはゴキブリです硬い殻と硬い肉、開けることができれば選択肢が少ないので、こだわりはありません。<page=S>慣れてしまえば、味はそれほど悪くない。内臓は最高の部分ですが、それらは選択肢であり、私たちは長い間それらを食べていません。<page=L>人生は本当に難しいです!ベンジャミンは私たちの前で痩せている、かわいそうな男!<page=L>あなたの感情を引き出してください、えっ？ポーカーを上手に使ってみませんか？ゴキブリを掘っておいしい内臓を買ってくれフェアトレードが待っています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Why are cockroaches locked up in a fence when they are there? They are like dangerous creatures that cannot be caged or tamed.<page=S>we have to eat the worms, right? They are animals that reproduce rapidly in the wild. They are cockroaches hard shell and hard flesh, if you can open, there are few options, so there is no insistence.<page=S>Once you get used to it, it doesn't taste so bad. The viscera are the best part, but they are the choice, and we haven't eaten them for a long time.<page=L>Life is really difficult! " Benjamin is losing weight in front of us, poor man!<page=L>bring out your emotions, huh? why don't you try to play poker well? Dig up cockroaches and buy me some delicious guts. Fair trade is waiting.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought a Queen’s Egg, at request of Bellhart’s couriers. It was a hazardous journey, but the creature inside has made it here alive.<page>Sssssss! How sss-ssublime! To think that my dear misss-stress would be the one to deliver the preciousss package! I had feared for the competence of those feeble couriersss...<hpage>It surprises me to know you correspond with them. I must wonder where else you go and who else you speak to after you scurry back up into the darkness...<page>Ssss. My whispersss-ss travel far, misstressss. You need not worry yourssself with my comingsss and goingss-ss. All I do... is in your sssss-service.<page>And now, pleasssse... give her to me... the little queen!
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我应钟心镇送货员之请，带来了一枚女王之卵。路途虽险，但卵内的生物尚且还活着。<page>咝——！何等殊荣！竟然由主人亲自护送这样宝贵的包裹！奴才我早就觉得这些送货员无能了……<hpage>你与他们有过联系？这倒是让我惊讶。不知道你遁入这片黑暗后，还与哪些虫往来过……<page>咝——奴才的低语声能传得很远，主人您无需担心我的行踪。奴才所为……皆为效忠于您。<page>现在，恳请您……将小女王……交给我！
translated_text: <hpage>ベル·ハートの使者の要請で女王の卵を持ってきましたそれは危険な旅でしたが、中の生き物がそれを生かしていました。<page>シズ! SSS-SSSUBLIME!私は私の親愛なるストレス女性が貴重なパッケージを提供する人だと思います!宅配便の弱さを心配していた。<hpage>彼らとコミュニケーションを取って驚きました。私はあなたが暗闇の中に戻ってからどこに行ったのか、あなたは誰と话したことがあるのか知りたい。<page>私のささやきは長い道のりを歩んできました、奥様。私の出入りを心配しないでください。私がやったことあなたに仕える。<page>さあ、どうぞ。彼女をよこせ小さな女王!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>At the request of Bell Heart's messenger, I brought the Queen's egg. It was a dangerous journey, but the creatures inside were keeping it alive.<page>sheez! SSS-SSSUBLIME! I think my dear stress woman is the one who provides a valuable package! I was worried about the weakness of the courier.<hpage>I was surprised to communicate with them. I want to know where you've been since you've been back in the darkness, and who you've ever spoken to.<page>My whisper has come a long way, ma 'am. Don't worry about my coming in and out. I serve you what I have done.<page>Come on, come on. Give her up, little queen!

original_en_text: <hpage>The beasts outside and their masters alike are all ensnared by this land’s silken affliction. You are lucky bugs to have not succumbed.<page=L>The Haunting? Oh, we’s got that all worked out. Benj’n and me are a right pair of philosophers when we bend our minds to it.<page=L>It’s faith that gets you. It’s all caused by being too devout!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not bein’ devout enough!<page=L>Or maybe it’s safest not to think about it at all. Har har!
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头那些虫兽与其饲主都遭受丝咒侵蚀。二位未被沾染，实属侥幸。<page=L>丝咒？早研究透啦！班金和我可是哲学大师！<page=L>信仰过头的才会中招！全是虔诚惹的祸！<page=S>对！但如果不够虔诚，兴许也会中招！<page=L>要我说，最安全的办法就是别去瞎琢磨！哈！
translated_text: <hpage>外の獣とその所有者は、この土地の絹のような苦しみに巻き込まれています。あなたの間違いが消えなかったのは幸運です。<page=L>幽霊か？みんな練習しています。この瞬間に焦点を当てるとき、ベンジャミンと私は正しい哲学者です。<page=L>あなたを惹きつけるのは信仰です。それはすべて宗教的です!<page=S>うん!宗教的ではない。<page=L>おそらく最も安全なことは、まったく考えないことです。ハハハ!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The outer beast and its owners are entangled in the silk-like torment of this land. You're lucky your mistakes didn't go away.<page=L>a ghost? Everybody is practicing. When we focus on this moment, Benjamin and I are the right philosophers.<page=L>It is faith that attracts you. It's all religious!<page=S>yes! They are not religious.<page=L>Probably the safest thing to do is not to think about it at all. ha ha ha!

original_en_text: While you sss-stalk through the black-ravaged world, morsss-ssels will I grow. For the promiss-sse of what my misss-tress will become... I will toil, alwayssss...
original_zh_text: 只要主子您还在黑灾肆虐之地穿行，咝——奴才便会辛勤劳作，为主人进行培育。为主人脱胎换骨的承诺……咝——奴才至死方休！
translated_text: あなたが荒廃した黒人の世界をこっそり通り抜けたとき、私は成長しました。私の彼女のためにどんな人になるのか。私は永遠に働きます。
secondary_translated_text: I grew up when you sneaked through the devastated black world, and I was a little bit more of a grown-up. What kind of person would I be for my girlfriend? I will work forever. "

original_en_text: <page=S>It’s said the moors used to grow a bounty of fresh food, way back befores that Citadel set us about catchin’ their fallin’ thread.<page=S>Sounds right lovely, eh missy? Always eatin’, never troubled by no grumblin’ belly?<page=L>Har har! Yer like a hatchling, Benj’n! So given to fancies! <page=L>Now breedin’ roaches is what keeps us from starvin’. Dangerous work, and not the finest diet, but we ain’t complainin’.<page=L>Specially as more and more of them keepers are succumbing to the strange sickness. Only means more meat for us. Har!
original_zh_text: <page=S>传说在圣堡逼我们捡拾掉落的丝线之前，沼地也曾盛产新鲜美食。<page=S>听着多美啊，小姐。一天到晚地吃，不用担心饿肚子。<page=L>哈！班金，你是刚破卵的吗？净做白日梦！<page=L>现在我们只能靠养蟑螂混口饭吃。这活危险，伙食差，但我们从不抱怨。<page=L>你看吧，越来越多的监管者都染上怪病。但往好处想，对我们来说，肉倒是更加管够了！哈！
translated_text: <page=S>ムーア人は城が手がかりを与えるずっと前から、新鮮な食べ物をたくさん育てていたと言われています。<page=S>いい響きですよね、お嬢さん。いつも食べて、心配したり怒ったりしない？<page=L>ハハハ!あなたは鳥のようだ、ベンジャミン!ファンタジーに夢中になる!<page=L>今日、ゴキブリの飼育は飢餓から解放されます。仕事は危険で、食事は最高ではありませんが、文句は言いません。<page=L>特に、ますます多くのブリーダーがこの奇妙な病気で死ぬ。それは私たちにとってより多くの肉を意味する。はぁ!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>It is said that the Moors had grown a lot of fresh food long before the castle gave them a clue.<page=S>That sounds good, doesn't it, miss? Do you eat all the time and worry or get angry?<page=L>ha ha ha! You are like a bird, Benjamin! You will be fascinated by fantasy!<page=L>Today, the rearing of cockroaches is freed from starvation. The work is dangerous and the food is not the best, but I do not complain.<page=L>In particular, more and more breeders are dying from this strange disease. That means more meat for us. " yeah!

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re all fine here, miss. Content, like. P’raps it were time you made your way, eh?<page=S>Yeah, be on your way! And, erm, thanks for yer help there.
original_zh_text: <page=L>我俩在这儿好得很，小姐。差不多该动身了吧？<page=S>对，赶紧走！另外，呃……多谢帮忙。
translated_text: <page=L>私たちは大丈夫です、お嬢さん。内容は、まるで。今、あなた自身の方法で来るべきです。<page=S>よし、行こう!また、ご協力ありがとうございます。
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>We're all right, miss. The content, as it were. Now, you should come in your own way.<page=S>Okay, let's go! Again, thank you for your cooperation.

translated_text: スチールを買う？
secondary_translated_text: buy steel?

original_en_text: Sssss. Your hunger betrayssss-ss you, misstress. The morsel was not yet grown, but let it anger you not. I will grow you another... for I am your sss-ssslave.
original_zh_text: 咝——您看起来饥饿难耐了，主人。食物还未养成，请您息怒。奴才我继续努力……因为我永远是您的仆从。
translated_text: あなたの空腹はあなたを裏切った。圧力が強すぎる。まだ成長していませんが、怒らせないでください。私はあなたのために別のものを作る。私はあなたの奴隷です。
secondary_translated_text: Your hunger has betrayed you. The pressure is too strong. I haven't grown up yet, but please don't make me angry. I'll make another one for you. I am your slave. "

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my cutting down of those black masses aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意当你的主人。若清除那些黑暗之物帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞……？不行不行……咝——强者当纳弱者，弱者理应侍奉！奴才归您了，主人您必须庇护我！<page>快瞧奴才为您建的巢穴！专为恭迎您的到来！我强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: シーッ!あなたは私を要求し、私はあなたのものです。私は謙虚な奴隷です。<hpage>私はあなたを制御しません。私の黒いレコードがあなたを助けたなら、それは偶然でした。さようなら。<page>さようなら...？いいえ、いいえ。強い者は自分を弱い者と呼び、弱い者はsss-ssserve!私はあなたのもの、私の愛人、私を守ってください!<page>“見て、私が作ったものを見て!”愛人に会う準備をしてください。私の強力な女性!<page>あなたが狩りに行くとき、私はあなたが良いものを成長させるのを手伝います。しかし、この仕事には時間がかかる。早く私のもとに戻ってきて、あなたは私が植えたものを持つことができます。
secondary_translated_text: Shh! You have demanded me, and I am yours. I am a humble slave.<hpage>I don't control you. If my black record helped you, it was accidental. goodbye, sir.<page>goodbye...? No, no, no. The strong call themselves the weak, and the weak sss-ssserve! I am yours, my mistress, protect me! "<page>"Look, look what I made!" Be prepared to meet your lover. My powerful woman!<page>When you go hunting, I'll help you to grow a good one. However, this work takes time. Come back to me quickly, and you can have what I have planted. "

original_en_text: <page=S>Wh... why the delay? You keepin’ them guts for yourself? Here, Crull, she’s goin’ back on her promise!<page=L>Har. Promises is easily broken. But then, so’s a lot of other things. How ‘bout you reconsider yer greed there, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=S>啧……怎么磨磨蹭蹭的？你想私吞内脏？克鲁尔，她反悔啦！<page=L>哈，承诺不就是易碎。虽然其他东西也挺易碎的。小姐，要不重新掂量下你这贪心值不值当？
translated_text: <page=S>それは...。なぜ遅延するか？あなたは自分の勇気を自分に与えますか？ここで、クルル、彼女は約束を破るつもりです!<page=L>ハルの約束は簡単に破られる。他にも多くのことがありますあなたの貪欲さを再考してみませんか？
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>that's... Why delay? Do you give yourself the courage to do so? Here, Krul, she's going to break her promise!<page=L>Hal's promises are easily broken. There are many other things, why don't you reconsider your greed?

original_en_text: <page=S>Oi! You ain’t got the beads? Or you just not wantin’ to part with ‘em? <page=L>Hardly the time to be a miser, missy. You’re gonna be livin’ sick till you buy these spines from us.
original_zh_text: <page=S>喂！你是身上没念珠，还是舍不得花？<page=L>小姐，现在可不是抠门的时候！不买这些钢棘，你就只能继续病着了！
translated_text: <page=S>おい!ビーズはありませんか？それとも、彼らと別れたくないのか。<page=L>今は貧乏人の時代ではない。私たちからこれらの背骨を購入する前に病気になります。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Hey! don't you have any beads? Or do you want to break up with them?<page=L>This is not the time of the poor. You will get sick before you buy these spines from us.

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my slaying of these creatures aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意成为你的主人。若杀掉这些虫兽帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞？不行不行……咝——强者接纳弱者，弱者应当侍奉！奴才归您，主人您必须保护我！<page>看奴才我建的巢穴！专为恭迎主人的到来！强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: シーッ!あなたは私を要求し、私はあなたのものです。私は謙虚な奴隷です。<hpage>私はあなたを制御しません。それが生き物を殺すのに役立つなら、それはただの事故です。さようなら。<page>さようなら...？いいえ、いいえ。強い者は自分を弱い者と呼び、弱い者はsss-ssserve!私はあなたのもの、私の愛人、私を守ってください!<page>“見て、私が作ったものを見て!”愛人に会う準備をしてください。私の強力な女性!<page>あなたが狩りに行くとき、私はあなたが良いものを成長させるのを手伝います。しかし、この仕事には時間がかかる。早く私のもとに戻ってきて、あなたは私が植えたものを持つことができます。
secondary_translated_text: Shh! You have demanded me, and I am yours. I am a humble slave.<hpage>I don't control you. If it helps to kill a creature, it's just an accident. goodbye, sir.<page>goodbye...? No, no, no. The strong call themselves the weak, and the weak sss-ssserve! I am yours, my mistress, protect me! "<page>"Look, look what I made!" Be prepared to meet your lover. My powerful woman!<page>When you go hunting, I'll help you to grow a good one. However, this work takes time. Come back to me quickly, and you can have what I have planted. "

original_en_text: A cage with a simple lock.
translated_text: シンプルなロック付きのケージ。
secondary_translated_text: A simple cage with a lock.

original_en_text: Sssss! I saw you. I sssss-saw what you did!
original_zh_text: 咝——！我看见了。奴才我看见您的手段了！
translated_text: シズ!私はあなたを見て、あなたがしたことを見る。
secondary_translated_text: sheez! I look at you, I see what you have done.

translated_text: <hpage>またお話しします。姿を現す。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'll talk to you again. They show their appearance.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good bugs, I am here on request of the doctor Yarnaby. She requires spines forged of steel for a crucial operation.<page=L>Argh! Look at ‘er, Benj’n. She’s all sick like! Coiled up tight with somethin’ weird. I reckon that operation’s for her herself!<page=S>She’s a sad sight for sure Crull, but sick or not our scrap’s hard-found. If she’s wantin’, we’s gotta be gettin’ paid!<page=L>Ah! ‘Fraid the little one speaks true, missy. You might be ailin’, but we can’t be offerin’ charity. <page=L>We’re stockin’ the spines you need. You just gotta be ready to part with some beads!
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位，我受雅纳碧医生所托来到此处。她需要一些钢棘来完成一场重要的手术。<page=L>啊呀！班金快看，她病恹恹的！壳里缠着怪东西，手术是要给自己做的吧！<page=S>惨是惨，但咱的废料也是辛辛苦苦收集来的。想要就得掏钱！<page=L>唉！班金说得对，小姐。您虽然是病患，但我们不做慈善。<page=L>只要念珠够，钢棘有的是！
translated_text: <hpage>私はアナビー博士の要請で来ました。手術には鋼鉄の背骨が必要です。<page=L>あっ! あっ!ベンジャミンを見てください彼女はとても病気です!奇妙なものでしっかりと巻き上げて。手術は彼女のためだと思う。<page=S>クルル、彼女は確かに悲しい光景ですが、病気の有無にかかわらず、私たちの廃棄物を見つけるのは難しいです。彼女が望むなら、支払わなければならない!<page=L>あっ! あっ!“お嬢さん、子供の言うことは本当です。病気かもしれませんが、チャリティーはできません。<page=L>必要な背骨を保管しています。あなたはちょうどいくつかのビーズをあきらめる準備が必要です!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I came at Dr. Anabee's request. Surgery requires a steel spine.<page=L>ah! ah! Look at Benjamin, she's so sick! Strange things and wrap them up tightly. I think surgery is for her.<page=S>Krul, she's certainly a sad sight, but whether we're sick or not, it's hard to find our waste. If she wants to, she has to pay!<page=L>ah! ah! "Lady, what the child says is true. You may be sick, but you cannot do charity.<page=L>We are keeping the necessary spine. You just need to be ready to give up a few beads!

original_en_text: Strong you are, misstress! Sss-ssmall, but so so deadly. And your ssscent! Well-aged!
original_zh_text: 咝——您真强悍，主人！身形虽小，杀伐果决。还有这味道——古老的气息！
translated_text: あなたは強い、奥様! Hush：小さいけど、とても致命的。そして、あなたのSSCent!私は古い!
secondary_translated_text: You're strong, ma 'am! Hush: Small, but very deadly. And your SSCent! I am old!

original_en_text: Leave it, bug. I accept my place.<hpage>Very well, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 别管我了，小虫子。我已认命。<hpage>悉听尊便。
translated_text: 忘れろよ、虫。私は自分の立場を受け入れる。<hpage>いいぞ、囚人。
secondary_translated_text: Forget it, bug. I accept my position.<hpage>All right, Prisoner.

original_en_text: Sssss! Such sssss-sounds, plucked from the air and caught in your Silk! A marvel, my misss-stress...<hpage>It is a skill that any can learn. You could master this sound yourself, if you cared to.<page>No... a slave must grow morsels for his mistresssss. But the sssound... is so ssssss-soothing...
original_zh_text: 咝——！此等丝弦天籁，主人，这真是神迹……<hpage>这项技艺所有虫子皆可习得。你若愿意，也能精通。<page>不……仆从必须为主人培育食物。但这天籁之音……实在是令我感到抚慰……
translated_text: シズ!ヒス音は空気から引き出され、あなたのシルクにキャッチされます!タイトル：My Pressure Lady<hpage>誰でも学べるスキルです。必要に応じて自分で声をコントロールできます。<page>いいえ、いいえ。奴隷は愛人のために何かを育てなければならない。SSSoundです。これは一種の解放です。
secondary_translated_text: sheez! The hissing sounds are pulled out of the air and caught in your silk! The Pressure Lady<hpage>It is a skill that anyone can learn. You can control your voice yourself if you need to.<page>No, no, no. A slave must cultivate something for his mistress. SSSound. This is a kind of liberation.

original_en_text: It is done. Our nessst is larger, and the little queen beginssss her toil. <page>More morsss-ssels can I grow for you now! Are you pleasss-sed with me, my missstress-ss?<hpage>You are diligent at your work, and have raised no claw against me. If it remains so, I will have no reason to be displeased.<page>Ssss! Then my work will continue! For I am ever your devoted sss-ssslave!
original_zh_text: 大功告成。巢穴已扩建完毕，小女王已经开始她的劳作。<page>现在奴才我可以为您培育更多的食物了！您对我满意吗，我的主人？<hpage>你工作勤勉，也从未对我起过任何歹意。若能保持如此，我便没有不满的理由。<page>咝——！奴才一定继续勤恳工作！因为我永远是您忠诚的仆从！
translated_text: 私たちの事件を解決する女王は大きくなり、小さな女王も頑張っています。<page>今ならもっと草を植えられるよ!私と一緒にいてくれませんか、お嬢さん。<hpage>一生懸命働いて、触らないでください。このままであれば、私は怒る理由はありません。<page>シーッ!私の仕事は続く!私は永遠にあなたの忠実な奴隷です!
secondary_translated_text: The queen who solves our case is getting bigger, and the little queen is working hard too.<page>Now we can plant more grass! Will you stay with me, miss? "<hpage>Work hard and don't touch it. If it stays like this, I have no reason to be angry.<page>Shh! My work will continue! I will forever be your faithful slave!

original_en_text: Ssss! Mistress, is the morsss-sssel I grew worthy? You must conss-sume... conssss-sume and become sss-stronger.<page>Thissss is how I will sss-sserve my misstress-ss. While you hunt, I will prepare morsssels. Alwaysss, preparing them for my mighty misssss-tresss...<hpage>Continue this work if it pleases you sir, but do not call me your mistress, for I am not.<page>Sss... but you are... missstress. You are ssss-strong and I am weak.... a sss-sslave. Alwayss-sss, your ssss-slave...
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人，奴才培育的食物可还合您心意？请享用……变得更强大。<page>这就是奴才我的侍奉之道。您外出狩猎时，奴才准备食物。永远为主人效劳……<hpage>先生，若你乐于此道便请继续，但请不要称我为主人。我并非你的主人。<page>咝——可您就是……我的主人。您强大，我弱小……我永远是您的仆从……
translated_text: シーッ!この愛人、私と一緒に育ったクソ野郎は価値があるのか？それを認識する必要があります。理解し、強くなる。<page>これが私の愛人の世話です。狩りに行くときは、食べ物を用意します。妻のために準備してください。<hpage>“もしよろしければ、この仕事を続けてください。でも、私を愛人と呼ばないでください。<page>シーッ、でも君は..。お嬢さん、あなたは強くて、私は弱いsss-ssslave。あなたのSSSSSS奴隷になりなさい。
secondary_translated_text: Shh! is this mistress, the son of a bitch who grew up with me, worth it? We need to recognize that. Understand and become stronger.<page>This is the care of my mistress. When we go hunting, we prepare food. Be prepared for your wife.<hpage>"Please continue this work, if you will." But please don't call me your mistress.<page>Shh, but you're... Miss, you are strong, I am weaksss-ssslave. Be your SSS slave.

original_en_text: <page=S>That smell! S’overwhelming! I ain’t never seen so many roach guts at once!<page=L>Benj’n, me old mate, get a grip on yerself. These guts still need cuttin’, and cleanin’, and stewin’. You got a lotta work ahead of you.<page=S>Fine by me, Crull, if it means such a feast! We’ll be eatin’ like they do up in the Citadel soon enough!<page=L>And what about you, missy? You be joinin’ us for this exquisite meal?<hpage>I’m afraid not, sirs. I must keep moving, and I fear the taste of such a delicacy is wasted on me.<page=L>I was hopin’ as much. Two can sing, but three’s too many, eh? Har har!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to ‘member us by? A pointed weapon of me own makin’, from when I used to wrangle the Muckroaches meself. I bet you’ll get some good use from it.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这味儿！够冲！我这辈子没见过这么多蟑螂内脏！<page=L>班金老伙计，稳住！这些内脏还得切洗炖煮，你的活还多着呢。<page=S>包在我身上，克鲁尔！我们能吃上圣堡级别的宴席啦！<page=L>小姐您呢？要赏脸和我们共进大餐不？<hpage>恕不奉陪，我得继续前行了。而且此等美味给我享用，实属浪费。<page=L>正合我意！俩虫享用正好，仨就嫌多！哈！<page=L>但我希望这工具能让您记住我俩。这是当年我还在驯蟑螂时亲手制作的武器，希望您用得顺手。
translated_text: <page=S>あの匂い!圧倒的な!こんなにたくさんのゴキブリの臓器を見たことがない!<page=L>ベンジャミン、私の老人、自分自身をコントロールしなさい。これらの内臓は切断、洗浄、煮込む必要があります。やるべきことはたくさんあります<page=S>クルル、それがそのようなごちそうを意味するなら、私は問題ありません!もうすぐお城のように食べます!<page=L>お嬢さん、あなたは？一緒においしい食事を食べませんか？<hpage>残念ながら違います皆さんこのような味が無駄になるのが心配です。<page=L>そう願っています2人で歌えるけど、3人では多すぎますよね。ハハハ!<page=L>しかし、このツールはあなたを“私たちに参加”させるのに十分ですか？以前はゴキブリと口論していたので、自分で作った武器です。きっとうまく使うと思います。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>That smell! Overwhelming! I've never seen so many cockroach organs!<page=L>Benjamin, my old man, control yourself. These internal organs need to be cut, washed and boiled. There's a lot of work to do.<page=S>Krul, if that means such a feast, I have no problem! I will eat like a castle soon!<page=L>miss, are you? why don't you have a nice meal together?<hpage>Unfortunately not everyone I'm worried that this taste will be wasted.<page=L>I hope I can sing with two people, but it's too much for three people, isn't it? ha ha ha!<page=L>But is this tool enough to get you to "join us "? I used to argue with cockroaches, so it's a weapon I made myself. I'm sure you'll use it well.

original_en_text: Take. Ahhh, my reward. Give them.
original_zh_text: 我要拿走。啊……我的奖赏。给我。
translated_text: ああ、私のご褒美。彼らに与えなさい。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my reward. Give it to them.

original_en_text: With thissss... ssso caringly delivered by the misstresss... our nesssst can be expanded!
original_zh_text: 咝——这是……主人亲自护送过来的……我们的巢穴可以扩建了！
translated_text: このことの女主人と亲切に通じる― ―私たちのニーズは拡大できます!
secondary_translated_text: Our needs can be expanded - to be kind to the mistress of this thing!

original_en_text: Leave me be. This kingdom’s collapse has come. Better I stay here to accept it.<page>To die within a cage... A fitting finale for this shell, and a well deserved fate for these cursed lands.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧。这个王国即将倾塌，我应当待在这里，坦然接受一切。<page>在囚笼中死去……也算是我这副甲壳注定的命数了，这片诅咒之地亦是如此。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: 私から離れろ王国の崩壊が来た。ここに残って受け入れた方がいい。<page>檻の中で死ぬ。それは、この貝殻と呪われた土地にふさわしい運命の終わりでした。<hpage>好きなように、囚人。
secondary_translated_text: Get away from me. The collapse of the kingdom has come. You better stay here and accept it.<page>They die in a cage. It was the end of a fate worthy of this shell and the cursed land.<hpage>As you like, prisoners.

original_zh_text: 我能感知到你，藏起来的那位。
translated_text: あなたを感じることができる。隠れている。
secondary_translated_text: I can feel you. They are hiding.

original_en_text: <page=L>Another trade fairly conducted, har. Those spines are sharp, and they’s hardly begun to rust. Better be gettin’ back to your doc to get yerself sorted out, eh?
original_zh_text: <page=L>又一笔公道买卖，哈。这些钢棘锋利如初，基本还没开始生锈。快去找您那位医生治病去吧！
translated_text: <page=L>もう一つの公正な取引、ああ。とげは鋭く、ほとんど錆びません。医者に行って治療した方がいいでしょう？
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Another fair deal, ah. The thorns are sharp and hardly rust. you should go to the doctor and treat him, right?

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re still waitin’ on them roach guts you promised us, missy. Patiently, but not too patiently, you get me?<page=S>You can find the Muckroaches all ‘round these roads. Cut one down and reach inside its shell to pull out the tasty guts! Mmmmm!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，我俩还等着您许诺的蟑螂内脏呢。耐着性子等，但也不太耐烦了，懂我意思吗？<page=S>淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找一只来宰了，破开外壳，把内脏取来。唔——我都流口水了！
translated_text: <page=L>ミスゴキブリの内臓を待っています忍耐強く、しかしあまり忍耐強くない。分かりますか？<page=S>道路の周りにはゴキブリがいます。片方を切って殻に手を入れて、おいしい内臓を取り出しましょう! mmmmmmm!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Waiting for the cockroach's internal organs Patient, but not too patient. do you understand that?<page=S>There are cockroaches around the road. Cut one side and put your hand in the shell to take out the delicious viscera! mmmmmmm!

original_en_text: Give them. Take wrong. Ssssomeone, ssssave me.
translated_text: 彼らに与えなさい。誤解しています助けてください
secondary_translated_text: Give it to them. I'm misunderstanding you. Please help me.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can sense you there, hidden in the darkness. Show yourself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我能感知到你，隐匿于黑暗之中的那位。现身吧。
translated_text: <hpage>暗闇の中に隠れているあなたを感じることができる。姿を現す。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can feel you hiding in the darkness. They show their appearance.

original_en_text: <page=L>Refuse us, do you, missy? No matter then. We’ll just get back to slowly starving, har har!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，你真要拒绝我们吗？无妨！继续慢慢饿死呗，哈！哈！
translated_text: <page=L>ユリシーズさん？私たちはゆっくりと空腹に戻ります。
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>mr. ulysses? We go back slowly and hungry.

original_en_text: <page=L>Ooh, someone’s carrying a delectable scent! Come to deliver us what you promised, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=L>噢，你身上有股好香的味道！小姐是来兑现承诺的吧？
translated_text: <page=L>誰かがこんなにいい匂いがする!約束を果たすために来たのか？
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Somebody smells so good! did you come to fulfill your promise?

original_zh_text: 咝——食物……交出来。我要拿走。
translated_text: モーゼルスス彼らに与えなさい。TAKE。
secondary_translated_text: Moses, give them. Take it.

original_en_text: <page=L>Thinkin’ serious about the spines, missy? Surely your good health’s worth more than a few beads!
original_zh_text: <page=L>要不再考虑考虑买钢棘的事？小姐，您的健康可比几颗念珠金贵！
translated_text: <page=L>背骨を考えてみてくださいもちろん、あなたの健康は数個のビーズよりも価値があります!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Think of the spine, of course, your health is worth more than a few beads!

translated_text: はい、ここに置いて!
secondary_translated_text: Yes, put it here!

original_en_text: <page=L>How ‘bout you put that poker to good use then, missy? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts? There’d be fair trade waitin’ for yer!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把它们美味的内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <page=L>では、そのポーカーをうまく活用してみませんか？ゴキブリを掘っておいしい内臓を持ってきてくれる？フェアトレードがあなたを待っている!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>So, why not try to make good use of that poker? will you dig up a cockroach and bring me some delicious guts? Fairtrade is waiting for you!

original_en_text: Misstress, you called for your ssss-slave? I obey... for you are ssss-sstronger. My gatheringsss can wait.
original_zh_text: 咝——主人，您在召唤奴才我吗？奴才遵命……因您比我更强大。采集之事可以暂缓。
translated_text: 奴隷と呼ぶのか？私は従う。あなたは強いから。子供たちは待つことができる。
secondary_translated_text: you call them slaves? I will follow. Because you are strong. The kids can wait.

original_en_text: <page=L>Har. I reckon you don’t know how much trouble you’ve promised yourself just now, missy.<page=L>Ah well, best you get to it. Muckroaches are everywhere along these old roads. Just find a few and pluck their guts out. Easy as sin!
original_zh_text: <page=L>哈！小姐，您可不知自个儿揽了个多大的麻烦。<page=L>算了，麻溜开工吧。淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找几只宰了，把它们内脏取来。简单得很！
translated_text: <page=L>ハル、あなたは自分がどれだけのトラブルを起こしたかわからないと思います。<page=L>ああ、行った方がいい。古い道はゴキブリだらけです。いくつかを見つけて内臓を取り除くだけです。罪のように単純!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Hal, I don't think you have any idea how much trouble you've caused yourself.<page=L>Oh, I better go. The old road is full of cockroaches. Just find a few and remove the internal organs. As simple as sin!

translated_text: いや何も残ってない
secondary_translated_text: no, nothing's left.

original_en_text: Leave me be, traveller. Better I accept this kingdom’s cruelty than rage helpless against it.<page>To waste in a cell, forgotten. ‘Tis no worse a fate than the Haunting that binds Pharloom’s many fragile minds.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧，旅行者。与其毫无意义地反抗这王国降下的残酷，不如选择接受它。<page>于囚笼钟腐朽，遗忘。总好过丝咒缠身，沦为纺络万千痴愚之一。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: 私を忘れないで、旅人。私は怒りや無力感を感じるよりも、王国の残酷さを受け入れたい。<page>刑務所での無駄は忘れられた。それはファラムの脆弱な心の多くを縛った『幽霊』よりも悪い運命ではなかった。<hpage>好きなように、囚人。
secondary_translated_text: Don't forget me, traveler. I'd rather accept the cruelty of the kingdom than feel angry or helpless.<page>Waste in prison was forgotten. It was no worse fate than The Ghosts, which bound up much of Farum's fragile heart.<hpage>As you like, prisoners.

original_en_text: Tending to the morss-ssels is a delicate tasssk, and requiresss much patience. Let me toil for you, missstresss, under your exquisite protection...
original_zh_text: 咝——培育食物需要精细耐心。请容奴才我在您的庇护下劳作……
translated_text: モース·セルの世話は繊細なタスクであり、多くの忍耐が必要です。私はあなたの保護の下であなたのために懸命に働かせてください。
secondary_translated_text: Taking care of a morse cell is a delicate task and requires a lot of patience. Let me work hard for you under your protection, and you will be able to help me.

translated_text: 再び見せてください自分のために話しなさい。
secondary_translated_text: Show me again and speak for yourself.

original_en_text: A ss-sslave must feed his misstress-sss. Morsss-sels will I grow. While you hunt, I am working... alwaysss-sss...
original_zh_text: 咝——奴才应当伺候主人。奴才我会培育食物。您狩猎时，奴才劳作……永不停歇……
translated_text: SS奴隷は愛人のSSを養う必要がある。成長します。私は働き、あなたは狩りです。いつも..。
secondary_translated_text: SS slaves need to feed their mistress's SS. They will grow. I work, you hunt. " I'm always...

original_en_text: <page=S>S’a pleasure doin’ business, ma’am. It’s only the finest scrap we’re sellin’. Promise!<page=S>For your shell’s sake, we’ll be hopin’ all them spines can get the job done!
original_zh_text: <page=S>交易愉快，小姐。我们卖的绝对都是上等废料！我敢打包票！<page=S>希望这些钢棘能助你甲壳康复！
translated_text: <page=S>一緒に働けて嬉しいです、奥様。これは私たちが販売する最高の廃棄物保証です!<page=S>あなたの殻のために、私たちはすべての背骨が仕事をすることを望む!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Glad to work with you, ma 'am. This is the best waste guarantee we sell!<page=S>For your shell, we hope all the backbones do the job!

original_en_text: Ssss! My misstress hasss returned to me! Under her protection, I have no fear of the ssslithering black sssss-sstringss!<page>How the world trembles in their terrible grassssp! In such times, only the mighty sssurvive... and those who loyally ss-sserve them...<hpage>I cannot remain here to protect you sir, but know that my aim is to cut this land free of the black threads. In the meantime, you should concern yourself with your own safety.<page>Ssss. I hear more than your words, misssstress. I hear your true dessiresss, pulsing within you. To see them met, I will continue to toil for you... alwaysssss.<page>
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人归巢，奴才拜伏！有您的护佑，奴才何惧那肆虐的黑灾！<page>天地在这恐怖攫握中战栗不休！咝——唯有强大者得以生存……以及附庸强者的忠仆……<hpage>我无法久留此地庇护你，先生。我此行是为了斩断此间黑灾的锁锢。各自珍重吧。<page>咝——奴才听到的岂止主人的言语，更识得您胸膛激荡的夙愿——必当达成！奴才唯有殚精竭虑……至死不渝！<page>
translated_text: シーッ!圧力が戻ってきた!彼女の保護の下で、私はもはやヒス黒いヒスを恐れません!<page>世界が恐ろしい草の中で震える方法!このような時代には、強い者だけが生き残る。それに忠実に仕えた者は、<hpage>私はここにいてあなたを守ることはできませんが、私の目標はこの地から黒い線を取り除くことです。同時に、あなた自身の安全を心配する必要があります。<page>私はあなたが言うことを聞いていない、ミス。あなたの本当の願い、あなたの心の鼓動が聞こえました。彼らが会うのを见るために、私はあなたのために努力を続けますいつも。<page>
secondary_translated_text: Shh! The pressure is back! Under her protection, I am no longer afraid of the hyssop black hyssop!<page>How the world trembles in the dreadful grass! In times like these, only the strong survive. Those who serve him faithfully,<hpage>I cannot be here to protect you, but my goal is to remove the black line from this land. At the same time, you need to worry about your own safety.<page>I haven't heard what you say, miss. I could hear your real wish, the beating of your heart. To see them meet, I will continue to strive for you, always.<page>

original_en_text: <page=L>Oi, why you come in here, all treadin’ muck? With that nasty-lookin’ poker by yer side? Eh?<page=S>Yeah, why you comin’ in here? We ain’t done nothin’ wrong. We ain’t all twisted like them roachkeepers!<page=L>She’s come to kill us, Benj’n! S’the blimmin’ end for us, old mate! Har har!<hpage>I mean you no harm, good bugs. I cut down only those who bar my path.<page><page=L>That so? Well, them keepers outside ain’t inclined to let strangers pass by, so you’ll be makin’ good use of yer poker there, missy.
original_zh_text: <page=L>嘿，满脚泥污闯进来作甚？还带着根脏兮兮的烧火棍？嗯？<page=S>就是，来这儿干啥？我们可没干坏事，不像外头那群蟑螂看守者那样疯癫！<page=L>她是来宰咱们的，班金！老伙计，咱们要完犊子啦！哈哈！<hpage>二位，我无意加害你们。针刃只斩挡路之虫。<page><page=L>当真？外头的监管者可不爱放生面孔过路。小姐，你那烧火棍可要派上大用场咯！
translated_text: <page=L>ここで何してるんだ？ゴミの山？隣にこんな醜いトランプがありますか？え？えっ？<page=S>ええ何で入ったんですか何も悪いことはしてない私たちは皆、ゴキブリ飼育者のように歪んでいません!<page=L>彼女は私たちを殺しに来たベンジャミン!これは私たちにとって“愚かな”終わりです!ハハハ!<hpage>私はあなたを傷つけていない、良い虫。私は私の邪魔をする者だけを殺す。<page><page=L>ホントに？まあ、外のドアマンは見知らぬ人を通過させませんので、ミス、そこのポーカーを最大限に活用してください。
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>what are you doing here? a pile of rubbish? do you have this ugly trump next to you? what? what?<page=S>Yeah, why did you get in there? I didn't do anything wrong. We're not all twisted like cockroach keepers!<page=L>She came to kill us, Benjamin! " This is a "stupid" end for us! ha ha ha!<hpage>I'm not hurting you, good bug. I only kill those who get in my way.<page><page=L>really? Well, the doorman outside won't let strangers through, so miss, make the most of your poker there.

translated_text: よしよし。
secondary_translated_text: Okay, okay.

original_en_text: Riprova. Se il problema dovesse persistere, visita hollowknightsilksong.com/help per ulteriori informazioni.
original_zh_text: 请再次尝试保存。如果问题仍未解决，请访问 hollowknightsilksong.com/help 获取技术支持。
translated_text: リプロヴァ。Seil probleema dovesse persistre，visita hollowknight silksong.com/helpはulteriori informizioniに基づいている。
secondary_translated_text: Lipova. If the problem persists, visit hollowknight silksong.com/help is based on additional information.

original_en_text: Impossibile leggere il file di salvataggio.
translated_text: この不可能な文書はエルサルバドルから来た。
secondary_translated_text: This impossible document came from El Salvador.

original_en_text: Puoi provare a ripristinare un salvataggio automatico precedente usando l’opzione sottostante.
original_zh_text: 您可以通过下方选项尝试恢复之前的自动存档。
translated_text: オペレーティングシステムをより良く使用するための自動化ソリューションを提供できます。
secondary_translated_text: We can provide automation solutions for better use of the operating system.

translated_text: エルサルバドルは関係ない
secondary_translated_text: El Salvador does not matter.

original_en_text: Ready to reconsider my offer? Good for you! You won’t be going far without my help, dear.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？明智的选择！没我帮忙你可走不远。
translated_text: 私の提案を再考する準備はできているか？あなたのために良い!私の助けなしでは遠くまで行けないわ
secondary_translated_text: are you ready to reconsider my proposal? Good for you! " you can't get very far without my help.

original_en_text: I’ll grant you my courtesy, stray one. I’ll even offer aid where I’m able. Just don’t be hanging around too long.<page>I may not be a fan of that Citadel, but I’m smart enough to avoid its ire.
original_zh_text: 我愿意给你几分面子，浪游者。需要帮助时也会搭把手，但可别赖着不走。<page>我虽然厌恶圣堡，但可没傻到去触霉头。
translated_text: 放浪者、私はあなたに私の礼儀を示します。私はここに長く滞在しないように全力を尽くします。<page>私はこの城のファンではないかもしれませんが、私はその怒りを避けるのに十分賢いです。
secondary_translated_text: I show you my courtesy, vagabond. I will do my best not to stay here long.<page>I may not be a fan of this clever castle, but I am good enough to avoid that anger.

original_zh_text: 喀 玛阿克。诺库 格日？
translated_text: カモックだノクグリ？
secondary_translated_text: a camomach, a nauguri?

original_en_text: Back here again? It’s a strange pilgrimage that bends and doubles back on itself. Still, you may as well take the opportunity to share your rosaries.
original_zh_text: 又绕回来了？没见过像你这样在朝圣路上兜兜转转的。不过正好把念珠拿来交易。
translated_text: またここに？それは奇妙な巡礼で、自分で曲がって戻ってくることができます。この機会に、あなたのロザリオを共有してください。
secondary_translated_text: here again? It's a strange pilgrimage, and you can bend yourself and come back. Please take this opportunity to share your rosary.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursued you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>I have seen their Citadel and its state, and I have strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell. Not for themselves but for the one atop it all. <page>Ahh ha! Truth. In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>The one atop this kingdom... They share my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen their Silk at work, in vast scale.<hpage>It snares the shells of those upon the roads, and guides with false life the many hollowed husks left to lapse.<page>Hmm... You’ve looked far towards the truth of it. Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! It’s past time you were going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>见过如今的圣堡后，我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力，而且是为了顶上那位。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>王国之上那位……与我同源，曾见识过相似的灵丝。<hpage>用丝线缠缚朝圣者，操纵空壳作为傀儡<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: 私は驚きを台無しにしたくないが、好奇心から尋ねさせられた。なぜ追われているか分かりますか？お城の虫？<hpage>私は彼らの城とその状態を見て、私はそれを強く疑った。<hpage>私を追いかけている。私の殻から作られた絹のために。自分のためではなく、すべての上にいる人のために。<page>ああ、ああ!“真実のファラオ”では、あなたのスキルは、人の魂をスレッドに導く貴重な希少なスキルです。魂は絹と不可分です。<page>これはファウルがほとんど失ったスキルです。古いウィーバーはそれを共有したが、彼らはすでに死んでいる。<hpage>この王国の上に。彼らの性質は私の性質と同じか、その一部です。シルクの大規模な仕事を見ました。<hpage>道の人々の貝殻を閉じ込め、偽りの命を残す多くの中空の貝殻を導く。<page>うーん...。あなたは真実を遠くから見ています。私が掘ったよりも近い。しかし、あなたには明らかにこのようなエキサイティングなことに対処する能力があるのですが。<page>今だ!行くべきだ!あなたのスタイルとシルクは本当に素晴らしいですが、長く滞在するとトラブルになります!
secondary_translated_text: I didn't want to spoil the surprise, but curiosity made me ask. do you know why i'm being chased? the castle bugs?<hpage>I saw their castle and its state, and I strongly suspected it.<hpage>They're chasing me. For the silk made out of my shell. Not for myself, but for the One above all.<page>Oh, oh, oh! In "Pharaoh of Truth," your skills are a precious rare skill that leads a person's soul to a thread. The soul is inseparable from the silk.<page>This is a skill that most fouls have lost. The old Weaver shared it, but they are already dead. "<hpage>over this kingdom. Their nature is the same as mine, or part of it. I saw the large-scale work of Silk.<hpage>The way leads many hollow shells to enclose the shells of people, leaving behind false life.<page>um... You see the truth from a distance. Closer than I dug it. But you obviously have the ability to deal with such an exciting thing. "<page>now! You should go! Your style and silk are really great, but if you stay longer you will be in trouble!

original_en_text: A smart choice. Get out there and gather those spine cores, and best you be quick about it.<page>As nice as it is to have the company, if you hang around too long, those Citadel bugs’ll turn their gaze on me as well.
original_zh_text: 明智的选择。那就快去收集棘刺吧，最好手脚麻利点。<page>虽说有身边个伴也挺好，但你在这待太久会连累我也遭到圣堡注目。
translated_text: 賢明な選択だ外に出て背骨のコアを集めましょう<page>仲間がいるのは素晴らしいことですが、長く滞在すると城虫たちは私に目を向けます。
secondary_translated_text: That's a smart choice. Let's go outside and collect the core of the spine.<page>It's great to have companions, but if I stay longer, the bugs turn their eyes to me.

original_en_text: If you’re planning to ascend from these low fields, you’ll be needing some lift, and I’m just the bug to help.<page>Head for the caves beyond my home. The bugs within produce a spine with a marvellous core, flexible yet strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Return to me, and I’ll soon have your old cloak transformed into something far more buoyant.
original_zh_text: 想从这低地往上去，得靠点助力，我正好能帮忙。<page>去我家附近的洞窟，里头的甲虫能产出一种奇妙棘刺，柔韧又结实。<page>收集棘刺交给我，保准把你的旧披风改造得轻巧如羽！
translated_text: この低い野原から登るためにエレベーターが必要な場合は、虫を助けるだけです。<page>私の家からあそこの洞窟まで。内部の昆虫は、柔軟で頑丈なコアを持つ大きな背骨を成長させます。<page>背骨を切り、コアを集める。私のところに戻って、すぐにあなたの古いマントを軽いものに変えます。
secondary_translated_text: If you need an elevator to climb up from this low field, just help the bugs.<page>From my house to that cave over there. The insects inside grow a large spine with a flexible and sturdy core.<page>Cut the spine and collect the core. Come back to me and quickly change your old cloak into a lighter one.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>I seek only to save these lands, great one, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>我只为拯救这片土地而来，蚁后，将众生从丝线与虚空带来的灾厄中解放。喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……
translated_text: 白い獣は破壊をもたらします。私たちはあなたの執筆の残酷さ、私たちの究極の運命を感じる。<page>力があるならあなたはそれを探しに来て、私のは色あせ、普通の人は時間を取る。<hpage>偉大な人よ、私は糸と虚空から生じるこの致命的な病気からこの土地を救おうとするだけです。<page>止めろ!できれば、獣。
secondary_translated_text: The white beast will bring destruction. We feel the cruelty of your writing, our ultimate destiny.<page>If you have the power you come to look for it, mine fade, ordinary people take time.<hpage>Great man, I am only trying to save this land from this deadly disease that arises from thread and void.<page>stop it! If possible, beast.

original_en_text: Well, then! I can tell by the rattling from within your cloak, your hunt was a success! If you’ll kindly pass over the cores, I can get to work.
original_zh_text: 嗯，我能听到你披风里的窸窣声，看来是满载而归！棘刺拿来，我马上开工。
translated_text: それでは!あなたのマントの音から、あなたの狩りが成功したことがわかります!コアを渡すことができれば、私は仕事を始めることができます。
secondary_translated_text: Then go! From the sound of your mantle, you can tell that your hunt has been successful! If I can pass the core, then I can start working.

original_en_text: Save them... if you can... pale beast...
original_zh_text: 拯救他们……若汝可……苍白异兽……
translated_text: 彼らを救う。可能ならば。“Pale Beast”
secondary_translated_text: Save them. " If possible. "Pale Beast"

original_en_text: Ahhh... I am so tired. But to tarry long would be sacrilege...
original_zh_text: 唉……太累……但久留便是渎神……
translated_text: あっ...。私は疲れているが、長くいるのも恥ずかしい。
secondary_translated_text: ah... I'm tired, but I'm embarrassed to stay too long.

original_en_text: Very well, ssspiidderr. Keep your organsss, for now.
original_zh_text: 好吧，小蜘蛛……留着你的内脏，咝——暂时。
translated_text: よくやった、SSP IDERR。しばらくの間臓器を保存してください。
secondary_translated_text: Well done, SSP IDERR. Preserve your organs for a while.

original_en_text: <page>Oooh! Stray one. Do tell, how goes the journey?<hpage>I have ventured high, seen the Citadel and its state. That place is long lost... generations lost, a gilded tomb, drowned in Silk dregs.<hpage>For its minions, so compelled in my capture, I now see clearly the source of their unity, and their strange strength... They are husks bound tight by the one who waits at its crest...<page>Agh! Look at you! Seeing right through to the truth of it! Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! Best you be heading. You’re clearly planning to stir up some serious trouble. I don’t want to be close when it kicks off!
original_zh_text: <page>哟！浪游者。最近怎么样？<hpage>我攀到了高处，见到了如今的圣堡。宛如一座镀金坟冢，浸在腐朽丝渣里。<hpage>那些想抓我的喽啰，我也看清了。都是被顶端那位用丝线操控的傀儡……<page>嗬！这就看清了真相！比我更敢深究。看你这副神情，摆明了是要碰一碰这硬茬……<page>那就赶紧上路！既然你要惹大麻烦，我可不想被波及！
translated_text: <page>おぉ!放浪者の1人。旅はどうだったのか教えてください。<hpage>私は高台に登り、城とその様子を見ました。その場所はとっくに消えてしまった。一世代が過ぎ、金色の墓は絹の残渣で埋め尽くされた。<hpage>その手下たちにとって、私はあまりにも捕らえることを強いられたので、今でははっきりと彼らの団結の源、そして彼らの奇妙な力を見ることができた彼らは山の頂上で待っている人々に固く縛られた貝殻である。<page>あっ! あっ!お前を見ろ!真実を見抜く!私が掘ったよりも近い。しかし、あなたには明らかにこのようなエキサイティングなことに対処する能力があるのですが。<page>今だ!行った方がいい明らかに深刻なトラブルを引き起こすつもりです。試合開始時にはあまり近づきたくない。
secondary_translated_text: <page>oh! One of the vagabonds. Tell me how your trip was.<hpage>I climbed up the high place and saw the castle and what it looked like. That place is long gone. A generation had passed, and the golden tomb was filled with silk debris.<hpage>For its men, I was forced to capture too much, that I could now clearly see the source of their unity, and their strange power; they are a shell bound tightly to those who wait on the top of the mountain.<page>ah! ah! Look at you! Seeing through the truth! Closer than I dug it. But you obviously have the ability to deal with such an exciting thing. "<page>now! You'd better go, obviously you're going to cause serious trouble. I don't want to get too close at the start of the game.

original_en_text: That pouch of yours... With the scraps left here and a little work, I could add some pockets for you, let you carry more tools and shards while on the road. That’d be nice, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 你这工具袋……我能加点布料，让它能多塞工具。这样路上也方便，对吧？
translated_text: あなたのバッグはゴミをここに残して、もう少し仕事をすれば、ポケットを追加して、より多くの道具や破片を道路に運ぶことができます。それは素晴らしいことですよね？
secondary_translated_text: Your bags leave the trash here, and with a little work, you can add pockets to carry more tools and debris on the road. that's great, isn't that?

original_en_text: All those gooey bugssss, all so reluctant to share their organs. Sssooo much coaxing and gnawing, and prodding.<page>They should be proud! Their ssmall sssacrifice would become much sssustenance for my ferocious young.
original_zh_text: 那些黏糊糊的虫子，个个抠门不肯掏出内脏给我。咝——连哄带骗，又咬又戳，才肯给我。<page>他们该骄傲！咝——这点小牺牲能养大我那群凶猛的孩子。
translated_text: すべてのミミズは自分の臓器を共有したがりません。多くのトリック、咀嚼、刺激。<page>誇りに思うべきです!彼らの小さな犠牲は、私の凶暴な子孫の主要な食物となる。
secondary_translated_text: Not all worms are willing to share their organs. Lots of tricks, chewing and irritation.<page>You should be proud of them! Their little sacrifice will be the chief food of my ferocious descendants.

original_en_text: For your efforts, take these rosaries as payment. May they not lay too heavy upon your shell.
original_zh_text: 这是酬劳，但愿念珠不会压垮你的行囊。
translated_text: このロザリオをご褒美としてお受け取りください。あなたの殻に重すぎないようにしましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Please accept this rosary as a reward. Try not to be too heavy on your shell.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, hunter, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sate my brood to come.<hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request. I have been fortunate to find so varied an arsenal within your lands.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall sssee reward for the sssslaughter.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>我带的工具能按你的要求处理血肉。你们这地界真像个武器库，各种装备种类齐全。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，完成我的需求，必有重谢。
translated_text: <hpage>ハンターよ、私は自分の臓器を犠牲にしませんが、他の屠殺肉を持ってくることはできます。<page>略称はSSPidder。ヒス声。シーッシーッシーッ!全部持って来て子供や孫のためにたくさんのものが必要です。<hpage>ご要望に応じて肉を調理できる道具があります。私はあなたの土地でこのような多様な武器を見つけて幸運です。<page>私の赤ちゃんはもうすぐ孵化します、SSspidddderr。あなたの責任を果たすssssswift-あなたはssslawの報酬を受け取ります。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I will not sacrifice my own organs, Hunter, but I can bring you other slaughtered meat.<page>The SSPidder. Hissing. Shhhh, shhhh! Bring it all and you need lots of things for your children and grandchildren.<hpage>There are tools available to cook the meat upon request. I am fortunate to find such a diverse weapon in your land.<page>My baby will hatch soon, SSspidddderr. Fulfilling your responsibilitiesssssswift - you will receive the reward ofssslaw.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’ll have the spine cores for you shortly, madam.<page>Good, good! The caves just beyond here are full of the creatures, floating carelessly in the warm air.<page>I’m sure your big needle there can coax them into sharing their spines. Then it’s only a quick matter of cutting them open and grabbing the cores.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我稍候就带来棘刺，女士。<page>好！附近的洞窟里到处是那种浮空的蠢虫。<page>你的长针肯定能"劝"它们献出棘刺。
translated_text: <hpage>すぐにあなたの脊髄核の準備ができます<page>オーケー、オーケー!遠く離れた洞窟には、暖かい空気の中に浮かんでいる生き物がいっぱいです。<page>あなたの大きな針が背骨を共有するよう説得できると信じていますその後、急速に切断し、核をつかむ。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You'll be ready for your spinal core right away.<page>okay, okay! The distant caves are full of creatures that float in the warm air.<page>Believe that your big needle can persuade you to share the spine, then quickly cut and grab the nucleus.

original_en_text: A holy burden to help maintain your poise. Whether striking others or being struck yourself, you’ll remain firmly in place.
original_zh_text: 这份神圣负赘能帮助你维持姿态，无论攻守都能稳如磐石。
translated_text: 冷静さを保つことは神聖な義務です。他人を攻撃しても、自分を攻撃しても、しっかりとその場にとどまります。
secondary_translated_text: It is a sacred duty to keep calm. Whether you attack others or you attack yourself, you stay firmly in your place.

original_en_text: Not interested in trade? I wonder, will your rosaries weigh you down during your ascent?
original_zh_text: 不做买卖？揣着念珠攀登不怕负担过重？
translated_text: 貿易に興味ない？あなたのロザリオは目を覚ますときに重く感じますか？
secondary_translated_text: Not interested in trade? Does your rosary feel heavy when you wake up?

original_en_text: Perfect! These should be more than enough. Wait there just a moment and we’ll soon have you soaring up and away from these lowlands.
original_zh_text: 完美！这些够用了。稍等片刻，保你能够腾空而起，远离这破地方。
translated_text: 完璧だ!これで十分だ。しばらくそこで待ってください。すぐにこの低地からあなたを飛ばします。
secondary_translated_text: perfect! That's enough. Please wait there for a while. I'll fly you out of this lowland right away.

original_en_text: Rkraha. Uohk kha!<hpage>My apologies, sir. Though I can grasp the language of many bugs, your words are unfamiliar even to me.<page>Kha... kha mauak. Noku... gri?<hpage><hpage>These items you have collected. These are the wares of a warrior. Do you wish to trade?<page>Noku... noku!
original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。乌奥赫克 喀！<hpage>抱歉，先生。虽然我略懂各族虫语，但你的语言我实在不熟。<page>喀……喀 玛阿克。诺库……格日？<hpage><hpage>你收集的这些东西……是战士的货。你想交易？<page>诺库……诺库！
translated_text: ルクララ。Uohk Kha!<hpage>私は多くの昆虫の言葉を理解できますが、あなたの言葉には詳しくありません。<page>カカモックだワイルド·ジェリー？<hpage><hpage>あなたが収集したアイテム。これらは戦士のものです。取引したいですか？<page>ワイルド·ワイルド!
secondary_translated_text: Luclara. Uohk Kha!<hpage>I can understand the language of many insects, but I'm not familiar with your language.<page>it's a cockroach, wild jerry?<hpage><hpage>Items you have collected. These belong to the warrior. Do you want to trade?<page>Wild, wild!

original_en_text: Get a move on, stray one! We’re all suffering for your conflict... Maybe next time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 快去吧！大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: 頑張れ、レンジャー!私たちは皆、あなたの葛藤のために苦しんだ。次回はもっと冷静な結論にたどり着くかもしれませんね。
secondary_translated_text: Keep going, Ranger! We have all suffered because of your conflicts. Maybe next time you'll come to a more sober conclusion.

original_en_text: These humble shards can form together into something grand, if you possess the vision to shape them.
original_zh_text: 这些碎片应该能拼凑成形，但要看你有无打磨的技巧。
translated_text: ビジョンがあれば、これらの小さな断片が集まって壮大なものを作ることができます。
secondary_translated_text: If you have a vision, these little pieces can come together and make something grand.

original_en_text: After all that hunting, you won’t trust me with your spoils? You’re a funny one. They won’t do you any good just filling up your pockets!
original_zh_text: 大费周折取来棘刺，却信不过我？你可真逗。揣着这些刺有什么用！
translated_text: 狩りが終わった後も戦利品を渡すことを心配していますか？あなたは興味深い人です。彼らはちょうどあなたのポケットを満たし、何の利益ももたらさない!
secondary_translated_text: Are you worried about handing over the spoils after the hunt is over? You're an interesting person. They just fill your pocket and bring you no profit!

original_en_text: That’s a fancy pin you’re flaunting upon your cloak there. Here’s hoping you didn’t have to kill to claim it.<hpage>The emblem was given freely, Seamstress, as reward for a fierce duel won fair.<page>Given freely!? My, my. So my sister’s welcomed another to the order... Sounds like age might’ve softened even her stoic style.<page>Can’t say I think too fondly on the old ways... but some rituals, and some memories... those are still worth preserving.
original_zh_text: 披风上别着的针徽挺漂亮嘛，但愿不是从尸壳上抢来的。<hpage>这针徽是公平比斗赢来的，女士。<page>她自愿给的？！哎呀呀，竟然纳新成员入团……岁月到底是软了她古板心肠。<page>我不待见那些古训……但有些仪式，有些回忆……还是值得留存。
translated_text: マントに飾っているのは素敵なピンです。人を殺さずに手に入れられることを願う。<hpage>ヒロインには、激しい決闘の報酬が公正であるため、バッジは無料で与えられます。<page>無料ですか？ああ、妹には別の人がいることがわかりました...年齢が彼女のストイックなスタイルを柔らかくするかもしれません。<page>私は古いやり方にあまり愛情を込めているとは言えませんが、いくつかの儀式、いくつかの思い出。保存する価値があります。
secondary_translated_text: It's a lovely pin on the mantle. I hope I can get it without killing people.<hpage>The heroine is given a badge for free, as the reward for a fierce duel is fair.<page>Are you free? oh, i found out my sister has someone else... Maybe her age will soften her stoic style, but she's not sure.<page>I can't say I'm very fond of the old ways, but some rituals, some memories. It's worth preserving.

original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。滕克 乌奥肯。
translated_text: ルクララ。ウオケン。
secondary_translated_text: Luclara. Wookken.

original_en_text: Yes, that’s better. Sharing your devotion with me will surely bring you luck.
original_zh_text: 这就对了。分我一份虔信自会带来好运。
translated_text: はい、それは良いです。あなたの献身を分かち合うことは幸運をもたらします。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, that's good. Sharing your dedication will bring you good luck.

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? The Citadel would see a fine prize in you.<hpage>It is as you say, madam. Veiled bugs of the Citadel brought me to your land. I now seek for one who would answer why, and will ask with force as needed.<page>Ha! Fierce too! These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我打算向圣堡讨个说法。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？
translated_text: まあ、あなたはビジョンではない!ダメだ!言わないで!彼らと同じくらい奇妙です。<page>あなたの行動!あなたの形!追われてるの？追跡する？城はあなたを宝物として扱う。<hpage>あなたが言ったように、女性。城の虫が私をあなたの土地に連れて行った。私は今、理由に答え、必要なときに大きな力を要求できる人を探しています。<page>はぁ!しかも強烈!今は暗い時代ですが、あなたのようなパワフルなレンジャーズは確かに変化をもたらすでしょう。<page>よし!よし!私はその神聖なカーストを愛していないし、王国の恐ろしい状態を心配している。スコアが欲しければ、私に何かお手伝いできますか？
secondary_translated_text: Well, you are not a vision! no! no! don't tell me! Weird as they are.<page>your actions! Your form! are you being chased? tracking him? The castle treats you like a treasure.<hpage>Like you said, woman. A castle worm has taken me to your land. I am now looking for someone who can answer the reasons and demand great power when needed.<page>yeah! And strongly! These are dark times, but a powerful ranger like you will certainly make a difference.<page>okay! okay! I do not love that sacred caste, and am concerned about the terrible state of the kingdom. Can you help me if I want a score?
ah... ah...

original_en_text: I await the meat, sspiidder. Bring me much. Enough to sate my brood to come.
original_zh_text: 我在等着血肉呢，小蜘蛛。咝——多带些，要够喂饱我的孩子们。
translated_text: スパイダーマン、肉を待っています。たくさん持ってきてくれた。生まれてくる子供を養うのに十分です
secondary_translated_text: Spider-Man, I'm waiting for the meat. He brought me a lot. enough to feed the children that are born.

original_en_text: Ssssppiidderr... Your ssstench is strange... yet similar. Your tension isss smelt strong. Do I ssseem a threat to you?<hpage>This whole land keeps me cautious, tall one, and your claws look to have seen much sharp use.<page>Yesss... I kill, gladly, but only to feed my ssshhhell, and my brood to come.<page>Your meat... much ssssustanence it could grant... but too hard to pry... Your long, false claw would ssslash back ssswift.<hpage>Good, so you can sense my skill, as I yours. A truce then, that we both shall live beyond our meeting.
original_zh_text: <page>咝——小蜘蛛……你的气味既陌生又熟悉……紧张感浓得刺鼻。我看你对我很戒备，是不是？<hpage>这片土地危机四伏，高个子，我自然得保持戒备。我看你刃爪锋利，想必是久经厮杀。<page>咝——没错……我乐于杀戮，但也只是为了喂饱自己，以及我即将出生的孩子们。<page>你的血肉……能为我提供不少给养……但太难撬开……咝——你那长针会立刻反击。<hpage>很好，看来你清楚我的手段，正如我知晓你的能耐。立个和平协议吧，高个子——让咱们都能活着离开这里。
translated_text: Ssssppiidderr..。変な臭いがする。しかし似ている。緊張してるわよ私はあなたに脅威ですか？<hpage>土地全体が私を慎重に保ち、背が高く、あなたの爪は鋭いものをたくさん使っているようです。<page>殺したいけど、俺の野郎と将来の子孫を養うためだけだ。<page>お前の肉だ多くの保証を提供できます。しかし、それは破るのが難しい。あなたの偽の爪はssswiftに反撃します。<hpage>私とあなたのように私のスキルを感じることができます。だから休戦しましょう。会った後は人生を続けましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Ssssppiidderr... It smells weird. But similar. i'm nervous. am i a threat to you?<hpage>The whole land keeps me cautious, tall, and your nails seem to be using a lot of sharp things.<page>I want to kill him, but only to feed my bastard and my future offspring.<page>Your meat can offer you a lot of guarantees. But it is hard to break. Your fake nails will fight back against thessswift.<hpage>You can feel my skills just like me and you. So let's have a truce. Let's go on with our lives after we meet.

original_en_text: Stray one! Things were already falling grim when last you left. Now it’s worse! The whole world quaking and wailing, and all stretched through with blackened strands! <page>This wouldn’t be your doing, by chance?<hpage>...I am in part responsible, though know this outcome was not my intent, and that I shall work to calm it.<page>I knew it! Course it had to be you. Here I was, hoping you’d bring a shake up. Instead you’ve brought an ending!<page>Well, move it, I say! Get to your fixing.
