original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？你还没走呢？难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？<page>那就加入我吧！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开这宝贝的秘密！
translated_text: え？ああ？まだここで吊るしてるの？多分、あなたも私と同じように、高原の美しい光に魅了されています。<page>ぜひ参加してください!ぜひ参加してください!新しいアシスタントが必要です。一緒にこの素晴らしい物質の秘密を解き明かしましょう!
secondary_translated_text: what? huh? are you still hanging out here? Maybe you, just like me, are fascinated by the beautiful lights of the plateau.<page>Please join us! Please join us in! We need a new assistant. Let's unlock the secrets of this wonderful substance together!

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 拿好，神奇生质液又重新装满了！你又可以注射了，快出发吧！
translated_text: そこで、あなたは再び素晴らしい高原でいっぱいです!すぐに注射を開始できます。さあ、行こう!
secondary_translated_text: There, you are once again full of wonderful plateaus! You can start injecting right away. Come on, let's go!

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: アシスタント、手伝ってくれるよね？つぼみが成熟した..。Plasmiumの収穫が始まります。
secondary_translated_text: assistant, you'll help me, won't you? The buds have matured... The harvest of Plasmium begins.

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 抛开恐惧……像蜕壳一样扔掉。把东西给我……
translated_text: 恐怖心を捨てなさい。古い殻のように捨てなさい。必要なものを与えてください。
secondary_translated_text: Let go of the fear. Throw it away like an old shell. Please give me what I need.

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 带纯净生质液来……必须测试……吸收……<page>把储液针管蓄满力……扎进成熟花苞……把生质液带回来……
translated_text: 純粋な血漿を持参。テストが必要です。吸気口<page>針を充電し、成熟したつぼみを深く叩く準備をします。あの貴重な液体の命を返してくれアシスタント
secondary_translated_text: Bring pure plasma. Testing is necessary. Inhalation<page>Charge the needle and get ready to knock deeply into the mature bud. Give me back that precious liquid life, assistant.

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那前任助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: それは素晴らしい!ミッション中に2つのエラーが発生すると、検出率が大幅に向上します。<page>今だ!彼が立ち上がって消える前に、私の元アシスタントは下の小屋に寄生虫の芽を植えました。<page>私たちが言ったように、つぼみは成熟しているはずで、その中の蜜は成熟する前に抽出されなければなりません。<page>爪に適切なツールを使用して、蜜を収集するのは簡単なプロセスです。私はこの仕事のために私自身のNeedle Phialをあなたに貸します。<page>芽が見つかったら、準備ができるまでPhialに充電し、針を芽のコアに放出します。あなたが正しく行うと、それはきれいにポップアップし、蜜を吸い出します!<page>必要なサンプルを回収したら、私に返却してください。適切な蜜と適切なテストで、Plasmiumはさらに素晴らしい特性を明らかにします。
secondary_translated_text: That's awesome! If two errors occur during a mission, the detection rate will increase significantly.<page>now! Before he could stand up and disappear, my former assistant planted a germ of parasites in the cabin below.<page>As we have said, the bud should be ripe, and the honey in it must be extracted before it is ripe.<page>Using the right tools for your nails, collecting honey is a simple process. I'll lend you my own Needle Phial for this job.<page>Once the bud is found, charge the Phial until it is ready and release the needle into the bud core. When you do it right, it will pop up clean and suck the honey out!<page>When you have collected the required samples, please return them to me. With the right honey and the right testing, Plasmium reveals even more amazing properties.

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 助手……这气味……你拿到生质血了……
translated_text: アシスタント、その匂い。血漿があります。
secondary_translated_text: The assistant, that smell. There is a plasma.

original_en_text: Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: Plasmium Phialを使用し続け、あなたの体に与えるすべての素晴らしい効果をお楽しみください。あなたのプラスミウムの在庫がなくなったら、私に戻ってきてください。<page>私はそれらを補完するために数珠を集めますが、すべてのビーズが私たちの重要な研究に使用されることを信頼してください!
secondary_translated_text: Keep using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all the amazing effects it gives to your body. If you run out of stock of your plasmium, please come back to me.<page>I am collecting a few beads to supplement them, but trust that all beads will be used for our important research!

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 现在还怕生质液？啊……助手……敞开心扉接受可能……
translated_text: 今でも高原が怖いのか？あっ...。アシスタントは心を開き、その可能性を受け入れた。
secondary_translated_text: are you still scared of the plateau? ah... The assistant opened his mind and embraced the possibility.

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
translated_text: 私たちが何者になるかを助けてください。一緒に。
secondary_translated_text: Please help us to become who we are. together.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 啊……对……助手……真忠诚……拿着储液针管……去下面找熟透的花苞……<page>蓄满力……扎透核心……提取纯净生质液……<page>这副躯壳将完成蜕变……生质液会治愈一切……
translated_text: ああ、そうだ。アシスタントは忠実すぎる。針座を握る。下のつぼみを見つける。成熟している。<page>フィルにベストを尽くす。深く突き刺す。純粋なプラスミウムの抽出。<page>このシェルはまさにあなたが必要とするもののようです。血漿は全てを治せる。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, yeah. The assistant is too loyal. Hold the needle seat. Find the button below. They have matured.<page>I do my best for Phil. Push deeply. Extraction of pure plasma.<page>This shell seems to be exactly what you need. Plasma can cure everything.

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助手！怎么还在这磨蹭？我要花苞里的新鲜生质液！<page>用储液针管扎成熟花苞，把生质液抽出来就行！<page>好了，快去虫道干活！还有什么比这更重要的？
translated_text: アシスタントだ!まだここで吊るしてるの？私は必死に純粋なプラスミウムの芽が欲しい。<page>針を完全に充電し、成熟したつぼみを直接突き刺すだけです。プラズマを吸収します!<page>さあ、ワームの領域に飛び込んで、私のためにそれを抽出してください!何が重要か？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! are you still hanging out here? I desperately want pure plasmium buds.<page>All you need to do is fully charge the needle and directly pierce the mature bud. It absorbs the plasma!<page>Come on, plunge into the realm of the worms and extract it for me! what's important?

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？要不要当我的研究助手？
translated_text: <hpage>あなたの装置とそこに含まれる青い液体に興味があります。どんな研究がエネルギーを消費しますか？<page>あっ!はい。この魔法の素材もあなたを魅了します!奇跡を超えた奇跡、奇跡の素材!<page>プラズミウム!比類のない自然の奇跡!傷を癒し、貝殻を強化します!死そのものにも耐えられると思います!<hpage>高原と呼ぶのか？私は前にこのようなもの、または非常に似たものに遭遇した。<page>非常に不可能!大陸の灰色の不毛の土地は、決してそのような奇妙なものを生み出さなかったことは、紛れもない事実です!<page>プラスミウムはフェロー島の最果てで塩水の奥深くに隠されて発見されました彼女の指導の下、私はそれを洞窟に持ち込み、見知らぬ場所でどのように繁栄するかを研究しました。<page>多分、あなたも私と同じように、高原の美しい光に魅了されています。勉強を手伝ってくれる？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I am interested in your device and the blue liquid in it. What kind of research consumes energy?<page>ah! yes. This magical material will also fascinate you! Miracles beyond miracles, miracle material!<page>Plasma! Unparalleled natural wonders! It heals wounds and strengthens the shell! I think I can endure death itself!<hpage>what do you call a plateau? I have encountered something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very impossible! " It is an indisputable fact that the gray barren land of the continent never produced such a strange thing!<page>Plasmium was discovered hidden deep in the salt water at the far end of the Faroe Islands, and under her guidance I took it to a cave to study how it thrived in unfamiliar places.<page>Maybe you, just like me, are fascinated by the beautiful lights of the plateau. will you help me study?

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 生质液是自然奇迹！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开它的秘密吧！
translated_text: 高原は自然の奇跡です!新しいアシスタントが必要です。その秘密を一緒に解き明かしましょう!
secondary_translated_text: The plateau is a natural wonder! We need a new assistant. Let's uncover that secret together!

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>我在下方一黑暗洞窟里见到过和你挺像的尸壳，看来你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>哈！那个冒失鬼。一点也不意外，废物本来就没科研天赋。<page>好了！我得赶紧开始研究了！现在死了助手，我得干双份活。<page>除非你对生质液感兴趣，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: え？ああ？新たな顔!お邪魔したくないですよね？私はこのねじれたトンネルの中で批判的な研究をしています。<page>助手のザンゴに会ったことない？怠け者の一種？短く、性急で、信頼できない。<hpage>下の暗い洞窟で、私はあなたの殻と変わらないものを見つけました。あなたのアシスタントが不幸な事故に遭ったかもしれません。<page>ああ、ああ!この不注意なピエロ。不思議じゃないよその塊は発見の才能を決して示さなかった。<page>今だ!仕事に戻らないと!私の助手は私に失礼に死んだので、私の仕事は2つの間違いに対処するのに十分でした。<page>私の貴重なプラスミウムに興味がない限り、安らかに眠らせてください。
secondary_translated_text: what? huh? A new face! you don't want to disturb me, do you? I'm doing critical research in this twisted tunnel.<page>you've never met your assistant, zango? kind of lazy? Short, hasty, and unreliable.<hpage>In the dark cave below, I found something that was no different than your shell. Your assistant may have been in an unfortunate accident.<page>Oh, oh, oh! This careless clown. No wonder the lump never showed a talent for discovery.<page>now! I have to go back to work! My assistant died disrespectfully to me, so my job was enough to deal with two mistakes.<page>Unless you are interested in my precious plasmium, please let me sleep in peace. "

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 哦？犹豫可学不到新知识！生质液的美丽蓝光会照亮一切！
translated_text: え？ああ？躊躇している人は何も学べない!プラズマの素晴らしい明るい光がすべてを明らかにします!
secondary_translated_text: what? huh? Those who hesitate will learn nothing! The amazing bright light of the plasma reveals it all!

translated_text: スラリー腺
secondary_translated_text: slurry gland

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你要的纯净生质液。但要交给这样状态的你，我有点犹豫。<hpage>你的研究方向……结局可能不太妙。<page>纯净生质液？不……助手……别怀疑……这是珍宝……完美……必须的……干得好……
translated_text: <hpage>私は必要に応じて純粋な高原を取り戻した。あなたの現在の状態では、私はあなたにいくつかの懸念を持っています。<hpage>あなたの学校はこの道を行く。最終結果は好ましくないかもしれません。<page>純粋なプラズマ？いいえ、いいえ。アシスタント。疑うことはできません。とても貴重です。完璧さは必要なものです。いつものように素晴らしい仕事をしている。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I reclaimed the pure plateau when necessary. In your current state, I have some concerns for you.<hpage>Your school will go this way. The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure plasma? No, no, no. The assistant. We cannot doubt it, "he said. It is very precious. Perfection is what we need. As usual, he is doing a great job.

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 这片土地吸收了生质液……深入土壤，深入生物，花苞绽放……看见了吗？<hpage>你的生质液让野兽变异，影响太明显了。<hpage>这让我想起以前见过的其他感染，不知是巧合还是……<page>助手啊……你也变好奇了……想深入探索……<page>或许……我们该更进一步研究？……让我想想……
translated_text: この土地はプルトニウムをよく吸収する。土は深くそれを吸い取って、これらの生き物はこんなに美しく咲いている見たことがあるか<hpage>あなたの高原がここの獣に与える影響はあまりにも明白です。大きな変化が起きました。<hpage>私が見た他の感染症にも類似点があります。どういう意味か知りたい。類似点のない場所を想像しているのかもしれない。<page>あなたはますます好奇心を持ち、私たちは皆より深い洞察を求めています。<page>私たちの中を覗くことはできますか？考えてみよう
secondary_translated_text: This soil absorbs plutonium well. The soil sucks it deeply, and you've ever seen these creatures bloom so beautifully<hpage>The effect your plateau has on the beasts here is all too obvious. A big change has happened.<hpage>There are similarities to other infections I've seen. I want to know what you mean. Maybe he's imagining a place with no similarities.<page>You are increasingly curious, and we are all seeking deeper insights.<page>can you look inside us? Let's think about it.

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 啊……助手……贪婪是你的弱点……别独占成果……
translated_text: ああ ああ ああ ああ...アシスタントの貪欲さはあなたの最大の失敗でした。発見を危険にさらさないでください。
secondary_translated_text: oh, oh... The greed of the assistant was your biggest failure. Don't jeopardize your findings.

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 喝吧……亲爱的助手……饮下我的生命精华……
translated_text: あなたのために。親愛なる助手。私の人生の液体を深く飲む。
secondary_translated_text: For you, I know. Dear assistant. Drinking deeply the fluid of my life.

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. If you ever run out of Plasmium, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 既然你够格当助手，送你个好东西——生质液瓶！<page>有了它，就能直接往甲壳里注射生质液，几乎不疼！<hpage>这工具确实足够扎穿我的外壳，但我为何要这么做？<page>因为注射生质液好处多多！不仅能防止受伤，而且感觉非常好！<page>我和助手给本地动植物都打过，没出现任何副作用，完全安全！<page>尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: 有能なアシスタントであることを証明したので、私が発明したこの楽しいツール、Plasmium Phialを持参してください。<page>それを使用すると、貴重なプラスティウムを体内に直接注入することができます。ほとんど痛みなし!<hpage>あなたの道具は私の殻を突き刺すほど鋭いように見えますが、なぜ私はそんなことをするのでしょうか。<page>体をプラスミウムで満たすことはとても有益です!それは害からあなたを保護!気持ちいい!!<page>私たちが到着してから、私の助手と私は地元の動植物にプラスミウムを注射してきました。副作用は観察されなかったので、プロセスは完全に安全であると結論付けることができます。<page>Plasmium Phialを使用し続け、あなたの体に与えるすべての素晴らしい効果をお楽しみください。もしあなたのプラスミウムがなくなったら、私のところに戻ってください。<page>私はそれらを補完するために数珠を集めますが、すべてのビーズが私たちの重要な研究に使用されることを信頼してください!
secondary_translated_text: You've proven to be a competent assistant, so bring along this fun tool I invented, Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject your valuable plastic directly into your body. Almost painless!<hpage>Your tools seem sharp enough to pierce my shell, but why would I do that? "<page>Filling your body with plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! Feeling good!<page>Since we arrived, my assistant and I have been injecting plasmium into the local flora and fauna. Since no side effects were observed, it can be concluded that the process is completely safe.<page>Keep using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all the amazing effects it gives to your body. If your Plasmium is gone, please come back to me. "<page>I am collecting a few beads to supplement them, but trust that all beads will be used for our important research!

original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 啊，分量刚好足够！干得不错！<page>有这纯净生质液，终于能破解奥秘了！
translated_text: それが必要な量です!素晴らしい仕事、アシスタント!<page>この純粋なプラスミウム抽出物で、私はついにこの素晴らしい物質を理解することができました。
secondary_translated_text: That's the amount needed! Great job, assistant!<page>With this pure plasma extract, I was finally able to understand this wonderful substance.

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: アシスタント、手伝ってくれるよね？つぼみが成熟した..。Plasmiumの収穫が始まります。
secondary_translated_text: assistant, you'll help me, won't you? The buds have matured... The harvest of Plasmium begins.

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... After all this I understand... the greatest knowledge comes only from faith... faith in Plasmium.<page>This blood you have collected... sparkles... I see it! A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: <hpage>拿去吧，虽然不知能研究出什么。<page>要有信念，好助手……我现在明白了……真理源自信念……对生质液的信念……<page>你收集的血……在发光……我看见了！辉煌形态……辉煌未来……等着我们……
translated_text: <hpage>それがあなたにどんな洞察を与えるかはわかりませんが、それを受け入れてください。<page>親愛なる友人、信頼しなさい。このすべてを経て、私は理解した。最も偉大な知識は、信仰-プラスミウムへの信仰からのみ生まれます。<page>あなたが集めた血。キラキラ輝く。見たよ!栄光の形。辉く未来が仆らに辉く。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You don't know what insight that gives you, but accept it.<page>My dear friend, trust me. After all this, I understand. The greatest knowledge comes only from faith - faith in plasmium.<page>The blood you have collected. It shines. I saw it! The form of glory. A bright future shines upon us.

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 你拒绝？花苞……必须收割……为了源头，也为了救你……
translated_text: アシスタント、断ったの？できないぞ、男。収穫が必要です。あなたの収入と貯蓄のために。
secondary_translated_text: assistant, did you say no? You can't, man. We need a harvest. For your income and your savings.

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你要拒绝？！这么多活要干，没助手进度太慢了！
translated_text: 拒否するのか!？やるべきことはたくさんありますが、私が助けていないときは、すべてが遅いです!
secondary_translated_text: are you going to refuse?! There is so much to do, but when I am not helping, everything is slow!

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
original_zh_text: 呃啊啊……助手？是你吗……终于回来了……<hpage>先生，你身体状态异常。某种物质在你壳内滋生，迟早会吞噬你。需要帮助吗？<page>不……不……助手……你错了。我们在进化……生质液……研究大突破……<page>研究必须继续……很快……我将成为源头……
translated_text: ああ、ハハ。アシスタント？あなたなの？友よ、やっと帰ってきたか。<hpage>あなたの状況は厄介です。この物質は殻から発芽します。時間はそれが完全に消費するのを見る。助けを求めますか？<page>いいえ、いいえ。いいえ、いいえ。アシスタント。混乱しています素晴らしいものになりました血漿の研究が進んでいます<page>研究は継続する。すぐに..。私はソースになります。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, ha ha. assistant? is it you? My friend, are you finally home?<hpage>Your situation is troubling. This substance germinates from the shell. Time will see it consumed completely. Do you want help?<page>No, no, no. No, no, no. The assistant. It's confusing. It's amazing. Plasma research is progressing.<page>Research will continue. Immediately after... I will be a source.

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助手！你是来补充生质液的？
translated_text: アシスタントだ!プラスミウム備蓄を補充するためにここに来たのですか？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! Are you here to replenish your plasmium stockpiles?

translated_text: 血漿リザーブの補充？
secondary_translated_text: Replenishment of plasma reserves?

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>I have not, sir. I am curious though, about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is indisputable fact.<page>Plasmium was first discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Now! To my work I must return! Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, or chance upon my truant assistant, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>没见过。不过我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>好了！我要继续工作了！除非你对生质液感兴趣，或者碰见我那翘班助手，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: え？ああ？新たな顔!お邪魔したくないですよね？私はこのねじれたトンネルの中で批判的な研究をしています。<page>助手のザンゴに会ったことない？怠け者の一種？短く、性急で、信頼できない。<hpage>私はしません。でもここにある装置とそこにある青い液体に興味がありますどんな研究がエネルギーを消費しますか？<page>あっ!はい。この魔法の素材もあなたを魅了します!奇跡を超えた奇跡、奇跡の素材!<page>プラズミウム!比類のない自然の奇跡!傷を癒し、貝殻を強化します!死そのものにも耐えられると思います!<hpage>高原と呼ぶのか？私は前にこのようなもの、または非常に似たものに遭遇した。<page>非常に不可能!大陸の灰色の不毛の土壌がそのような奇妙なものを生み出すことはできなかったことは紛れもない事実です。<page>プラスミウムはフェロー島の最果てで塩水の奥深くに隠されて発見されました彼女の指導の下、私はそれを洞窟に持ち込み、見知らぬ場所でどのように繁栄するかを研究しました。<page>今だ!仕事に戻らないと!私の大切なプラスミウムに興味を持ったり、私の不登校助手を偶然見つけたりしない限り、私を安らかに眠らせてください!
secondary_translated_text: what? huh? A new face! you don't want to disturb me, do you? I'm doing critical research in this twisted tunnel.<page>you've never met your assistant, zango? kind of lazy? Short, hasty, and unreliable.<hpage>I don't. But I'm interested in the device here, and the blue liquid there, and what kind of research is consuming energy?<page>ah! yes. This magical material will also fascinate you! Miracles beyond miracles, miracle material!<page>Plasma! Unparalleled natural wonders! It heals wounds and strengthens the shell! I think I can endure death itself!<hpage>what do you call a plateau? I have encountered something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very impossible! " It is an indisputable fact that the gray barren soil of the continent could not produce such a strange thing.<page>Plasmium was discovered hidden deep in the salt water at the far end of the Faroe Islands, and under her guidance I took it to a cave to study how it thrived in unfamiliar places.<page>now! I have to go back to work! Unless you're interested in my precious Plasmium, or stumble upon my absentee assistant, please let me sleep in peace! "

original_en_text: There... more. Let it seep deep into your shell... do not begrudge the pain...
original_zh_text: 灌满了……让液体渗入甲壳深处……别怕疼……
translated_text: そこに..。それをあなたの殻の奥深くに置く。痛みに嫉妬するな。
secondary_translated_text: There you go... Place it deep in your shell. Don't be jealous of the pain.

original_en_text: The Pure Plasmium... you have it. I can... smell it on you.
original_zh_text: 纯净生质液……你带来了。我闻到了……
translated_text: 純粋なプラズマ。あなたが持っている。あなたの匂いを嗅ぐことができる。
secondary_translated_text: Pure plasma. You have it. I can smell your smell.

original_en_text: Through consumption of the blood... we shall at last attain enlightenment...<page>For your reward... take the gland from within my shell... my gift to you.<page>I have no more need of it... and it shall grant you... unending reserves of Plasmium...<page>Yes... Plasmium. Pure... beautiful... Plasmium...
original_zh_text: 吸收生质血……我们终将开悟……<page>给你的奖励是……拿走吧……我壳里的腺体……<page>我不需要了……它会给你……无限生质液……<page>没错……生质液……纯净……美丽……
translated_text: 血液を消費する。最終的には啓示を受ける。<page>あなたのご褒美として私の殻から腺を取り出してください。私からの贈り物。<page>もう必要ないわそれはあなたに与える。無限の高原保護区。<page>そうですね。Plasmium。Pure.丽。。。。プラズマ
secondary_translated_text: They consume their blood. Eventually, they will receive revelation.<page>Please take the glands out of my shell as your reward. A gift from me.<page>I don't need it anymore. I'll give it to you. Unlimited highland reserves.<page>That's right, sir. Plasmium. Pure. Li... Plasma

original_en_text: Assistant! How goes your work? Have you extracted a sufficient amount of Plasmium for me?
original_zh_text: 助手！进展如何？提取到足够生质液了吗？
translated_text: アシスタントだ!仕事はどうだった？私のために十分なプラスミウムを得たか。
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! how was your job? Did you get enough plasmium for me?

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he went and died, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那死鬼助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: それは素晴らしい!ミッション中に2つのエラーが発生すると、検出率が大幅に向上します。<page>今だ!彼が死ぬ前、私の元アシスタントは下の納屋でプラスミウムもやしを育てていました。<page>私たちが言ったように、つぼみは成熟しているはずで、その中の蜜は成熟する前に抽出されなければなりません。<page>爪に適切なツールを使用して、蜜を収集するのは簡単なプロセスです。私はこの仕事のために私自身のNeedle Phialをあなたに貸します。<page>芽が見つかったら、準備ができるまでPhialに充電し、針を芽のコアに放出します。あなたが正しく行うと、それはきれいにポップアップし、蜜を吸い出します!<page>必要なサンプルを回収したら、私に返却してください。適切な蜜と適切なテストで、Plasmiumはさらに素晴らしい特性を明らかにします。
secondary_translated_text: That's awesome! If two errors occur during a mission, the detection rate will increase significantly.<page>now! Before he died, my former assistant was growing plasmium mosquitoes in the barn below.<page>As we have said, the bud should be ripe, and the honey in it must be extracted before it is ripe.<page>Using the right tools for your nails, collecting honey is a simple process. I'll lend you my own Needle Phial for this job.<page>Once the bud is found, charge the Phial until it is ready and release the needle into the bud core. When you do it right, it will pop up clean and suck the honey out!<page>When you have collected the required samples, please return them to me. With the right honey and the right testing, Plasmium reveals even more amazing properties.

original_en_text: Are you so enchanted by the Plasmium that you will not part with it? You are more like that dolt Zango than I first thought!<page>Its enlightenings are beyond your meagre mind! Give me the phial, assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!
original_zh_text: 舍不得交出来？你和赞戈那蠢货一个德行！<page>你这脑子参不透其中奥秘的！不交出生质液就永远别想知道秘密！
translated_text: あなたはそれをあきらめたくないほど美しい土地に魅了されていますか？思っていたよりもサンゴに似ている!<page>その啓示はあなたの小さな心を超えている!薬瓶と助手をよこせ、さもなければこの物質の深い秘密は決して明かされない!
secondary_translated_text: Are you so fascinated by the beautiful land that you don't want to give it up? They look more like corals than I thought!<page>That revelation is beyond your little mind! Bring me a bottle and an assistant, or the deep secret of this substance will never be revealed!

original_en_text: Aahhh... and you have been using your Plasmium... good. Let me replenish your reserve...
original_zh_text: 啊……你一直在注射生质液……很好。让我给你补满……
translated_text: あっ...。血漿の利用率は非常に良いです。予備を補充しましょう。

original_en_text: Now. Share the discovery... Take this Plasmium Phial... Plunge it deep. Feel its vigour soak your shell...<page>If more is needed... If the Plasmium runs dry... return. Visit me again... That you may live, long... my loyal assistant.

original_en_text: <hpage>Very well. This final rite... what would you have me do?<page>The time... of birth is close. Now give... its shell. Host... the final rite.<page>The time of birth... is near.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好吧。这最终仪式……需要我做什么？<page>诞生……之时。献出……甲壳。宿主……终仪。<page>诞辰……已至。
translated_text: <hpage>よし、よし。これが最後の儀式です。何をしてほしいの？<page>時間は...。誕生の時が来る。今すぐ与えなさい。その殻。ホストの最後の儀式。<page>誕生の時刻。近すぎる。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>All right, all right. This is the last ceremony. what do you want me to do?<page>The time is... The time of birth comes. Give them now. That shell. The last ceremony of the host.<page>The time of birth. Too close.

original_en_text: You may rest here in this sacred place, but know, if you choose to step further, you shall see my weapon raised.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，但记住，越界意味着面对我的兵刃。
translated_text: あなた方はこの神聖な場所で休むことができますが、もしあなた方が遠くに行くことを選ぶなら、私の武器が立ち上がるのを見るでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: You can rest in this sacred place, but if you choose to go farther away, you will see My Arms rise up.

original_en_text: The time... the time of birth approaches. The bud cries. Yearning. The final rite may begin.<page>White shell. Red cloak. Bug strong and old. The time of birth is near. Aid now the final rite.
original_zh_text: 时刻……诞生之时将至。花苞啼哭。终仪可启。<page>白面红袍。古老强虫。诞生之时已至，此刻助我终仪。
translated_text: 時間は...。誕生の時が来る。つぼみが泣く。最後の願いの儀式が始まります。<page>白い殻。赤いマント。昆虫は強くて古い。誕生の時が来る。最後の儀式を手伝いましょう。
secondary_translated_text: The time is.... The time of birth is coming. The buds cry. The ceremony of the last wish begins.<page>The white shell. The red mantle. The insects are strong and old. The time of birth comes. Let's help you with the final ritual.

original_en_text: P... Pollip Hearts. Gathered. Gathered all. All that is needed, is given.
translated_text: P..。Pollip Heartsは皆を集めた。必要なものはすべて与えられた。
secondary_translated_text: P... Pollip Hearts brought everyone together. Everything he needed was given.

original_en_text: <hpage>I hear your request, but I must decline. My travels will take me far beyond this wood.<page>Decline. No. Decline, not. The time of birth approaches. The first rite must begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，我有要事在身，没法帮忙。<page>拒绝。不可。诞生之时将至。仪式必启。
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたの要求を聞いたが、私は拒否しなければならない。私の旅はこの森をはるかに超えて行く。<page>落ちない。拒絶された。誕生の時が来ます。最初の儀式が始まります。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have heard your request, but I must refuse it. " My journey goes far beyond this forest.<page>Don't fall. He was rejected. The time of birth is coming. The first ceremony begins.

original_en_text: <hpage>If you have knowledge or power to grant, I will aid you. These Pollip Hearts you desire... they can be found about the wood?<page>P... Pollip Hearts. Found in the wood. Yes, bug.<page>Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若你能分享只是，我愿意帮忙。哪里能找到花芯？<page>花……花芯。树林间，对。<page>寻找紫花。芯……在其中。<page>诞生之时将至。带来花芯，共享力量。
translated_text: <hpage>知識や能力があれば、私はあなたを助けます。あなたが望むポリップハート。木の中で見つけられますか？<page>P..。Pollip Heartsです。森の中で発見。そう、バグ。<page>紫色の花を探す。中には..。ハート·ハート<page>誕生の時が来る。私はそれらを運ぶためにポリップの心が必要です、バグ、そして力は共有されます。

Yes, bug.<page>Looking for a purple flower. Inside, there are... Heart, heart<page>The time of birth is coming. I need a polyps mind to carry them, bugs, and the power is shared.

original_en_text: The precious hearts... Give them. For the time of birth, for the rite, they must bleed...
original_zh_text: 珍贵花芯……交付。为了诞生，为了仪式，它们必须流血……
translated_text: ベイビー、それを渡しなさい。誕生時には儀式のために血を流す。
secondary_translated_text: Baby, give it to me. Blood is shed for ritual at birth.

original_en_text: The... the time of birth approaches. Now, the rite of the pollip.<page>Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: ……诞生之时将至。现在，花芯仪式。<page>虫。只剩你。无虫来此。<page>仪式需要花芯。带来此处。
translated_text: それは..。誕生の時が来る。これは警察の儀式です。<page>あなただけが残っています。ここには誰も入れない。号号は<page>儀式のために。Pollip Heartsです。それが必要ですここで儀式に参加してください。
secondary_translated_text: It's a... The time of birth is coming. This is a police ritual.<page>You are the only one left. No one is allowed in here. number is<page>For the ceremony. It is Pollip Hearts. It is necessary to attend the ceremony here.

original_en_text: Shhhh... shell. White mask, red cloak.<page>Bug. A living bug.<hpage>A bug I am, at least in part, but you are something quite different. I apologise if I have roused you from some deep slumber.<page>Slumber. Long sleep. But now is the waking.<page>Growth. Time of birth. The time of birth approaches.<page>Heed, bug. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 嘘……甲壳。白面甲，红袍子。<page>虫。是活虫。<hpage>我算是半虫，但你倒是截然不同。若吵醒你的长眠，我道歉。<page>长眠。苏醒时分已至。<page>生长。诞生之时。诞生之时将至。<page>听着，诞生之时将至。
translated_text: ハッシュシェル白いマスク赤いマント<page>Bug.生きているバグ。<hpage>私は、少なくともある程度は虫ですが、あなたは全く違います。眠りから覚めてしまったら、ごめんなさい。<page>長い眠り。しかし、今こそ目覚める時です。<page>出産時間を増やす。誕生の時が来る。<page>注意して、バグ。誕生の時が来る。
secondary_translated_text: Hash Shell White Mask Red Mantle<page>Bug. a live bug.<hpage>I'm a worm, at least to some extent, but you're quite different. If you wake me up from sleep, I'm sorry.<page>A long sleep. But now is the time to wake up.<page>Increase childbirth time. The time of birth is coming.<page>Be careful, bug. The time of birth is coming.

original_en_text: Th... the bud. It must be offered. It calls for it... for the rite.
original_zh_text: 花苞……必须献上。它在呼唤……呼唤仪式。
translated_text: これは..。種子を提供する。それが必要です。儀式のために。
secondary_translated_text: This is a... They provide seeds. It is necessary. For the ceremony.

original_en_text: The time will come... Soon. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 时刻将至……诞生之时将至。
translated_text: 時は来る。出産の時期はもうすぐです。
secondary_translated_text: Time will come. The time of childbirth is almost here.

original_en_text: Halt, stranger. I am charged forever to guard the sacred shrine beyond.<page>Any who wish to pass must cross their weapon with my own.
original_zh_text: 止步，陌生的虫。我奉命永远守护后方圣所。<page>想要过去，先问过我的兵器。
translated_text: やめなさい、見知らぬ人。私は永遠に遠く離れた神聖な寺院を守る義務があります。<page>通過しようとする者は、自分の武器と私の武器を交差させなければならない。
secondary_translated_text: Stop it, stranger. I have a duty to protect the sacred temples that are forever and far away.<page>Whoever tries to pass must have his own weapons crossed with mine. "

original_en_text: You may remain here and rest, if you choose. I am no enemy of yours. Only if you try to step beyond will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>Then tell me, warrior, of the shrine you guard. These caves on wood’s edge seem long forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but never forgotten. The shrine remains to remember the wood’s first seed, her that once was and always is.<page>I am the last bound to protect it. Sadly, in that service, many have fallen to my blade.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，只要不越界，我就不是你的敌人。<hpage>那就说说这处圣所吧。这深林边缘的洞窟似乎早已被遗忘。<page>事物或许会被被隐藏，但不会被遗忘。最初之种记得这处圣所，而她永恒存在。<page>我是最后一位守卫者。很遗憾，至今已有无数试图越界的亡魂。
translated_text: ご希望であれば、ここで休むこともできます。私はあなたの敵じゃないあなたが追い越そうとするときだけ、私はあなたに対して武器を上げる。<hpage>“兵士よ、あなたはどの神殿を守っているの？”森の端にある洞窟は、長い間忘れられていたようです。<page>隠されても決して忘れられないものもあります。神殿は今でも森の最初の種を記念しています。彼女はかつても今もそうです。<page>私はそれを守る最後の一人です。悲しいことに、その儀式では多くの人が私のナイフの下に倒れました。
secondary_translated_text: If you wish, you can also rest here. I am not your enemy, only when you try to overtake, will I raise my arms against you.<hpage>"Soldier, which temple are you guarding?" The caves at the edge of the forest seem to have been forgotten for a long time.<page>There are some things that are hidden and never forgotten. The temple still commemorates the first seeds of the forest. She still is, even though she used to.<page>I am the last one to defend it. Sadly, many people fell under my knife in that ceremony.

original_zh_text: 纺络的瞬息变化皆可感知。
translated_text: 世界の状態は知覚可能です。
secondary_translated_text: The state of the world is perceptible.

translated_text: 十分ではない
secondary_translated_text: Not enough.

translated_text: ジャンプする。
secondary_translated_text: They jump.

translated_text: 上海証券取引所
secondary_translated_text: Shanghai Stock Exchange

translated_text: 構成構成
secondary_translated_text: Configuration Configuration

original_en_text: Attack by throwing the needle forward. Silk will be expended.
original_zh_text: 消耗灵丝，向前掷针突刺。
translated_text: 前方に攻撃する。シルクが消費される。
secondary_translated_text: Attacking forward. The silk is consumed.

translated_text: はいはい。
secondary_translated_text: yeah yeah.

original_en_text: Soar above foes. Reach new heights. Strike from above.
original_zh_text: 腾空而起，突破高度限制，并从俯冲袭击敌人。
translated_text: 敵の上を飛ぶ。新たな高みへ。上からの攻撃。
secondary_translated_text: Flying over the enemy. to a new height. Attacks from above.

translated_text: サキアラとの戦い？
secondary_translated_text: the fight with saquiara?

translated_text: 座る。
secondary_translated_text: Sit down.

translated_text: 地図を参照。
secondary_translated_text: See map.

translated_text: 受諾する。
secondary_translated_text: I accept.

translated_text: 結合する。
secondary_translated_text: Combining them.

translated_text: 輸出は
secondary_translated_text: Exports are

translated_text: テンポは深くてゆっくり。
secondary_translated_text: The pace is deep and slow.

translated_text: 攻撃する。
secondary_translated_text: They attack.

original_en_text: Sprint at blinding speed, beyond one’s natural limits.
original_zh_text: 以突破生理极限的速度，向前疾速冲刺。
translated_text: 自然の限界を超えた驚異的なスピードで走る。
secondary_translated_text: They run at incredible speeds beyond the limits of nature.

translated_text: 空気の中で
secondary_translated_text: in the air.

translated_text: ニドリン
secondary_translated_text: NIDRIN

translated_text: 下を見て
secondary_translated_text: look down.

original_en_text: Draw out memories of Pharloom’s forgotten past.
original_zh_text: 提取纺络之地被遗忘的往昔记忆。
translated_text: ファラオの忘れられた過去を思い出す。
secondary_translated_text: Reminds us of the forgotten past of the pharaohs.

original_en_text: to view a map of the current area.
original_zh_text: 以查看当前区域的地图
translated_text: 現在の地域の地図を見る。
secondary_translated_text: Look at the map of the current area.

translated_text: テンポが弱くて速い。
secondary_translated_text: The tempo is weak and fast.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！纺络的虫子们又怕又急，都等着物资呢！现在送货是十分要紧的事！
translated_text: <page=S>配達ミス!ファルの昆虫は希望、待機、悲しみ、恐怖に満ちています。配達は今必要ですが、それだけではありません!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Missed Delivery! The insect in the fallout is full of hope, expectation, sorrow and fear. Delivery is necessary now, but it's not all!

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 慢着！你身上有味儿！揣着古董呢！
translated_text: でもこれは何だ？今、あなたの匂いがします!あなたは私のための遺産を持っている!
secondary_translated_text: but what is this? Now, I can smell you! You have a legacy for me! "

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！棘刺到手！病患，该手术了！滋滋！让你摆脱痛苦，见证本神医天才手段吧！
translated_text: ああ、ああ!スパイン!サンプルあります!時間ですよ、本当に。ハミング!あなたを蠕動の苦しみから解放し、私の天才をはっきりと見せてください!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! spine! We have a sample! It's time, really. humming! Let me free you from the torment of peristalsis and show you clearly my genius!

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 圣堡在上！你这模样看着像要咽气了似的！<hpage>还死不了，女士，但确实抱恙。甲壳遭受寄生……可有药能治？<page>唔，我这不卖药。去问帕沃吧，他管指路，或许有招。<page>话说回来……购物也算疗愈嘛！趁还能动快买点，过了这村没这店！
translated_text: なんてこったお前は何者だ？あなたは死ぬように見える!<hpage>私は生き続けますが、私は惨めです。寄生虫はもう私の殻に根を下ろしている何か助けてくれるかもしれませんか？医学は？<page>そんなものがあるかどうかはわかりません。そこでパボに尋ねてください。彼の仕事は指示などを出すことなので、役に立つアドバイスがあるかもしれません。<page>同時に、..。ショッピングは薬そのものですよね。今すぐ何か買うべきです。状況を考えると、これが最後のチャンスかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: what the hell are you? You look like you're dying!<hpage>I will go on living, but I am miserable. The parasite is already taking root in my shell. Can you help me with something? what about medicine?<page>I don't know if such a thing exists. So ask Pabo there. His job is to give instructions and so on, so he might have some helpful advice.<page>At the same time,... Shopping is the drug itself, right? You should buy something now. Given the circumstances, this may be our last chance.

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=S>呃！什、什么东西？您甲壳里在扭动！有怪物！<hpage>是寄生体，暂时压制住了。<page=T>这样可不能送货！会污、污染货物！<hpage>有道理，若我能除掉它，或许再来帮忙。
translated_text: <page=S>え~!これは何ですか？あなたの体はねじれてきしむ!そこには恐ろしい悪魔がいる!<hpage>寄生虫が私の殻の奥深くに閉じ込められた。それを止めるには意志力が必要です。<page=T>このようなシェルでは、配達を止めることはできません!あなたが望む製品に感染!<hpage>よかった、宅配便。寄生虫を取り除くことができれば、助けに戻ってくるかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>yeah! what is this? Your body twists and squeals! There is a terrible demon there!<hpage>The parasite was trapped deep in my shell. It takes willpower to stop it.<page=T>With such a shell, you can't stop the delivery! Infected to the product you want!<hpage>Good job, courier. If you can get rid of the parasites, they may come back to help.

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你来做什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是旅者，不是奴隶。<page>哼，奴隶都这么说。滚！
translated_text: 何が望みだ、奴隷？<hpage>奴隷？私は旅人であり、見知らぬ人であり、奴隷ではない。<page>グレンジャー。奴隷は何を言うか。逃げろ!
secondary_translated_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slaves? I am a traveler, a stranger, and not a slave.<page>Granger. What do slaves say? run!

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，我会尽快平息混乱。在此之前，请守护好这些虫子。<page>放心吧，亲爱的居民！请带上我们全体的信念与祈愿前行吧。
translated_text: <hpage>すぐに、パボ、私は混乱を鎮める。その前に脆弱性を保護してください。<page>もちろん、親愛なる住人たち!もちろんです!私たちの信仰と願望はすべてあなたと共にあります。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Soon, Pabo, I will quell the chaos. Protect your vulnerability before you do that.<page>Of course, dear residents! of course! All of our faith and aspirations are with you.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 危急时刻念珠易失，但我能将其编成项链！既牢靠又时髦！
translated_text: 最悪の場合、緩んだロザリオはポケットから滑り落ちてしまいますが、私はそれらをしっかりと縛ることができる熟練した爪です!私はあなたのためにネックレス全体を結ぶことができる。安全でスタイリッシュです。
secondary_translated_text: At worst, loose rosaries will slip out of pockets, but I'm a skilled claw that can tie them tightly! I can tie the whole necklace for you. It's safe and stylish.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我接下了你的祈愿，若找到皮尔，会让他回这里。<page>多谢救星小姐！您和皮尔一样勇、勇敢！祝您好运！
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたの願いを叶えた。ヒントあなたの弟が無事だと分かったら、私は彼を送り返すでしょう。<page>ありがとうございました、救助さん!あなたは勇敢です、私の兄弟のように!私の信仰はあなたと共にある!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have granted you your wish. Tip When I find out your brother is okay, I will send him back.<page>Thank you, Mr. Rescue! You are brave, like my brother! " My faith is with you! "

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 圣堡藏着秘油。取来此油，你的针鸣将响彻纺络！<hpage>我会寻得此油，请针匠磨好利爪等候。
translated_text: その城では、伝説の石油があなたを待っています。この繊細な楽器奏者にそれを渡せば、あなたの剣はより大きな声で歌うでしょう。<hpage>油を見つけるよ、ピンマスター。あなたのスキルをシャープに保つ。
secondary_translated_text: In that castle, the legendary oil is waiting for you. Give it to this delicate instrumentalist, and your sword will sing louder.<hpage>Find the oil, Pinmaster. Keeping your skills sharp.

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 哟哟！这是什么情况？被寄生了，滋滋？<page>知道我是谁吗？伟大的雅纳碧！遭庸才排挤的天才医师！<hpage>冒昧打扰，但若您真如自称般医术高明，还请相助。<hpage>有寄生体钻入了我的躯壳，在体内扎根生长，吸收气力。若您真有本事，请帮我去除。<page>滋滋！哎哟！特殊病例啊？！这就另当别论了！<page>让本神医瞧瞧。嗯……非邪咒非丝病。但确实有怪东西钻进去了！<page>折磨你的'根须’……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！<page>……但想撬开你这硬壳，得先升级机器！
translated_text: さあ、今!これは何だ？感染しているのか？<page>私が誰か知ってる？なぜなら、偉大なアラビ、優秀な医師は不当に見捨てられ、今や彼はあなたより背が高いからです!<hpage>お邪魔して申し訳ありませんが、あなたが言う熟練した医師であれば、私はあなたの助けを求めます。<hpage>寄生虫が私の体に侵入した。その根は私の殻の中でねじれ、私の力を消耗させた。これらのスキルやツールを持っている場合は、削除されます。<page>ハミング!うん。うん。あなたは特別な病理標本ですよね？はい、この変化は重要です。ひっくり返して!<page>見てみましょう本当に幽霊はいません。絹の病気はない。何か変なものが入ってくる!<page>根はあなたを苦しめる。詳しくは知りませんが、大丈夫です!<page>エンクロージャの中に何か迷惑なものを取り除く必要がある場合は、素晴らしいYarnaby ' s Extritorを使用できます!それが唯一の希望だ、シーッ!<page>...でもあなたの殻を破るにはまず余分な力が必要です治療は可能ですよ、はい!しかしその前に、強力なリベレーターはアップグレードが必要です!
secondary_translated_text: Come on, now! what is this? are you infected?<page>you know who i am? Because the great Arabi, the excellent doctor, has been unjustly abandoned, and now he is taller than you!<hpage>I'm sorry to interrupt you, but if you're a skilled doctor, I'll ask for your help.<hpage>A parasite has invaded my body. The root twisted in my shell, draining my strength. " If you have these skills or tools, you will be removed.<page>humming! yeah. yeah. you're a special pathological specimen, right? Yes, this change is important. turn it upside down!<page>Let's see, there really isn't a ghost. There is no silk sickness. Something weird is coming in!<page>The roots will afflict you. I don't know the details, but it's okay!<page>If you need to get rid of anything annoying inside the enclosure, you can use the awesome Yarnaby's Extritor! That's the only hope, Shhhh!<page>... But to break your shell, you need extra force first. Cure is possible, yes! But before that, the powerful Liberator needs to be updated!

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅者该随身带碎片。钟心镇的虫昔年以各种技艺闻名，如今朝圣者都不懂……你除外。
translated_text: 乗客は常にスペアパーツを持参してください。私たちベルハルト人はかつてその優れた爪で賞賛されました。ほとんどの現代の巡礼者は芸術を失っています自分以外には何もないと確信しています
secondary_translated_text: Passengers should always bring spare parts with them. We Berhardtans were once admired for their excellent nails. Most modern pilgrims have lost their art, and are convinced that they have nothing but themselves.

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 真是阴魂不散的虫子。行啊，陪我解个闷。为何要把那些可怜虫从舒坦的诅咒里拽出来？<hpage>操控丝咒的古兽有我要的力量，它的灵丝天赋现已归我。<hpage>顺带让镇子回复往常也算好事。我虽与这些虫子不同，但见到灵丝被这般滥用也觉得恶心。<page>哼……蠢材才会解救他们！不过夺取力量这点……咱们倒是臭味相投。
translated_text: あなたは頑固な小さな昆虫です。それは私を笑わせた。なぜこの哀れな虫をなだめる呪いから取り除くのですか？<hpage>絹を導いた生き物は古代の力を持っており、今は奪われた絹の才能は私にとって非常に役立っています。<hpage>町は解放され、福祉としてサービスが復活した。私はしばしばこれらの昆虫から切り離されたと感じるかもしれませんが、絹がそのような不快なサービスをするのを見るのは恥ずかしいです。<page>グレンジャー。解放は好意ではない。これは権力の集まりです。この目的のために、お互いを少しずつ知ることができます。
secondary_translated_text: You're a stubborn little insect. That made me laugh. " Why do you remove this poor worm from the appeasing curse?<hpage>The creatures who guided the silk have ancient power, and now the talent of the silk that has been deprived is very helpful to me.<hpage>The town was liberated, and services were restored as welfare. I may often feel disconnected from these insects, but it is embarrassing to see silk do such an unpleasant service.<page>Granger. Release is not a favour. This is an assembly of power. For this purpose, we can get to know each other a little bit.

original_en_text: Ahh... I smell something on you. Heavy with the past, you are. You have a relic for me, don’t you?
original_zh_text: 啊哈……闻着老灰味儿了。你肯定藏着好货！
translated_text: あっ...。何かの匂いがする。あなたは過去の重荷を背負っている。私のために遺物がありますよね？
secondary_translated_text: ah... I can smell something. You carry the burden of the past. you have a relic for me, don't you?

original_en_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings from your care. But I must ask, can the blade be honed further?<page>You seek further sharpening? Further than Plinney does provide? Impertinence! But... Maybe? But... No...<hpage>You hesitate? Then it is possible? Are you incapable? Should I seek others within the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes. Seek not others, but an oil, fabled and fine. With it the Citadel once brought gleaming edge and point to its pins.<page>Though the Citadel’s pinmasters are long past, some small store of that miraculous elixir may remain within its halls.<page>Were even a meagre drop pilfered, and gifted upon Plinney, your blade could shine brighter still...<page>Just know, dear friend, the veiled bugs would be oh so unkind to the thief who’d claim that fine prize for themself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠手艺了得，此针经你打磨如获新生。但还能更锋利么？<page>还想更锋利？嫌普林尼手艺糙？真是无礼！不过……或许？但……不行……<hpage>犹豫？那就是可行？难道你办不到？我得另寻高匠？<page>慢着！不用找别家，但要找油。传说圣堡藏着秘油，昔年靠它磨出绝世神锋。<page>虽说圣堡针匠早已绝迹，但没准还囤着点。<page>偷来几滴给我，您这针刃还能更亮……<page>但丑话说前头，覆面虫对偷油贼可不客气。
translated_text: <hpage>あなたのスキルは印象的です。私の針はあなたのケアのために歌う。しかし、私は質問しますが、ナイフはもっと鋭くなりますか？<page>さらなるトレーニングをお探しですか？プリニウスが提供したものよりも？ポイントじゃない!しかし...。たぶん、しかし..。号号は<hpage>躊躇しましたか？それは可能か？無能なのか？王国で他の人を探すべきですか？<page>待って!はい、他の人を探さないで、伝説的で洗練されたオイルを見つけてください。それで、城はかつてきらびやかなエッジとそれを指すピンを持ってきました。<page>城の楽器職人は過去のものですが、城には魔法の万能薬を含む小さな店がいくつかあるかもしれません。<page>たとえあなたがプリニウスから少し盗んだとしても、あなたの刃はもっと明るくなるだろう。<page>皆さんご存知のように、これらの仮面の虫は賞品を求める泥棒に対して非常に不親切です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needles sing for your care. But I have a question, will the knife be sharper?<page>Looking for further training? more than what plinius has to offer? Not the point! but... Maybe, but... number is<hpage>did you hesitate? is that possible? are you incompetent? Should I look for other people in the Kingdom?<page>wait! Yes, don't look for anyone else, find the legendary and refined oil. So the castle once brought with it a sparkling edge and a pin pointing to it.<page>The castle's instrument craftsmen are a thing of the past, but the castle may have a few small shops containing some magic panacea.<page>Even if you stole a little from Pliny, your blade would be brighter. "<page>As you all know, these masked worms are very unkind to thieves seeking prizes.

original_en_text: You’ve a tool pouch on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools, and more shards to make’em. My sewing skills are quite renowned in these parts.
original_zh_text: 带着工具袋？我可以给你多缝几格，附近就数我的手艺最好了。
translated_text: キットは持っていますか？ポケットをいくつか追加できるので、より多くのツールや部品を持ち歩くことができます。私の裁縫技術はこの場所で有名です。
secondary_translated_text: Do you have the kit? You can add a few pockets, so you can carry more tools and parts with you. My sewing skills are famous in this place.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss saving! We are together, at last! My brother and myself, both returned to safety’s safe.<hpage>I am pleased you have found one another. If you are planning to venture out again, I would urge you reconsider for the sake of your shells.<page=S>We know it! Muchly-much! We cannot be leaving this home of bells. No more! Heres we will remain, for shells to survive. <page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those pilgrims, them that pass, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=T>Even you, miss saving! Yes-yes! Saving is done. Our wishes now we ask. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！我们兄弟终于团圆啦！<hpage>我很欣慰你们能重逢，但若再想外出送货，要小心。<page=S>知、知道啦！我们再也不离开钟心镇了。保命要紧。<page=T>但我们想了个妙、妙招！让路过的朝圣者帮忙送货，给点小报酬！<page=T>救星小姐也可以！您送完了货，换我们帮您实现愿望！<page=S>每单顺、顺利送达，客户都会给念珠！快看待送清单！
translated_text: <page=S>節約が恋しい!やっと一緒にできた!兄と私は無事に戻った。<hpage>お互いを見つけられてよかったです。また外に出る予定がある場合は、貝殻を考え直すことをお勧めします。<page=S>知ってるよ!たくさんある!時計室から出られない。もうだめだ!シェルが生き残るために、私たちは留まる。<page=T>一緒に賢く計画しました!巡礼者や通りすがりの人たちが助けてくれるかもしれません私たちのような小さな報酬のために？<page=T>救出を逃した!はい!はい!救助完了です。私たちの願いについて話しましょう。配達人になる時が来た!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>I miss the savings! We finally got together! My brother and I returned safely.<hpage>I'm glad you found each other. If you are planning to go out again, we recommend that you reconsider your shell.<page=S>i know! There are many! I can't leave the clock room. not anymore! For Shell to survive, we will stay.<page=T>We planned it wisely together! Maybe pilgrims and passers-by will help us, for a small reward like ours?<page=T>Missed the rescue! yes! yes! Rescue is complete. Let's talk about our wishes. It's time to be a delivery guy!

original_en_text: Lost within that fortress above, the fabled oil of my profession... Such sharpness one could achieve...<page>But, oh! ‘Tis an awful thing. Too cruel, the many stabbing pins you’d face in its seeking.
original_zh_text: 圣堡里头藏着的针匠秘油……那锋利劲……<page>唉，但要寻得，这一路上有多险呐！多少针刺等着扎穿您的壳呢。
translated_text: 上の要塞で失われた、私の職業の伝説的なオイル。そのような鋭いレベル。<page>しかし、Oh!これは恐ろしいことです。あまりにも残酷で、それを探す過程で多くの刺し傷に直面します。
secondary_translated_text: Lost in the fortress above, my profession legendary oil. Such a sharp level.<page>But, oh! This is a horrible thing. It is too cruel, and you face many stab wounds in the process of looking for it.

original_en_text: We’ve made a good start on the painting, resident! Give us a little more time and your bell’ll be shining like new.
original_zh_text: 刷漆进度不错！再给点时间，保准焕然一新！
translated_text: 住民の皆さん、私たちの絵は良いスタートを切りました!もう少し時間があれば、あなたの鐘は新品のように輝くでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Residents, our painting has gotten off to a good start! With a little more time, your bells will shine like brand new.

original_en_text: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking?<page>I’ve heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he’s sunk as simple as you.<hpage>Will you not provide your aid, bug? This trap he plans requires power, and I suspect you’re hoarding more than most.<page>Oh no. I’ll give it. Not in the hope you’ll succeed... Bah! In that, there’s slim chance. I give just to see that restless energy unleashed.<page>So much soul, found and formed. Generations of it, all going to waste. Better it’s given a chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 嗤……奴隶来讨东西了？<page>听说了。想挣脱束缚，取得自由？还有我侄儿掺和？他跟你一样蠢。<hpage>不帮忙吗？他那陷阱缺少力量，而你囤了不少吧？<page>帮，当然帮。但不是指望你们成事……哈！八成没戏。就想看你们折腾。<page>囤了世代的灵魂全在浪费，不如放把火烧个痛快。
translated_text: 奴隷はそれを探しに来たのか？<page>聞いたことあるよ世界は自由ですよね。甥っ子もそこにいた。それはあなたと同じくらい簡単に聞こえる。<hpage>助けてくれないのか、バグ。彼の計画された罠は強さを必要とし、私はあなたがほとんどより多くを貯蔵することを疑う。<page>ああ、いや。君にあげるよ成功してほしくない。うわー!この点での機会は小さい。不安のエネルギーが解放されるのを見るために支払う。<page>多くの魂が発見され、形成された。世代の努力が無駄になった。燃えるチャンスがある。
secondary_translated_text: did the slaves come looking for it?<page>You 've heard that the world is free, right? My nephew was there too. It sounds as easy as you.<hpage>Will you help me, Bug? " His planned traps require strength, and I doubt you will hoard much more than most.<page>Oh, no, no. I'll give it to you. I don't want you to succeed. Wow! The opportunity in this regard is small. Pay to see the energy of anxiety released.<page>Many souls have been discovered and formed. The efforts of generations have been wasted. There's a chance to burn.

translated_text: 施錠された手荷物室。<br>電話して？
secondary_translated_text: The locked luggage compartment.<br>call him?

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, my shell has been overcome by a foreign force. Plasmium, it has been called in your land.<hpage>Though the substance provides some regenerative aid, I feel my mind at dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Bzzt! Maybe overtaken is good? Better even? Why go thinking yours is a mind so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，我的躯壳遭异物侵占，在您这似乎叫生质液。<hpage>此物虽然能疗伤，但我感到意识有被夺舍的风险。<page>滋滋！被占岂不是更好？你这脑子有啥金贵的？<page>本神医只医病患！不医因病得利的。享你的福去，别烦我！
translated_text: <hpage>私の殻は外部の力に支配されています土地ではプラスミウムと呼ばれています。<hpage>この物質はある程度の再生補助を提供しますが、私の脳はオーバーテイクの危険性があると感じています。<page>ハミング!超越は良いことかもしれません。またはより良い？なぜあなたのアイデアは貴重だと思いますか？<page>素晴らしいYarnabyは患者を癒す!苦しみから恩恵を受ける者ではない。その利点を楽しんで、私を休ませてください!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>My shell is dominated by an external force and is called plasmium in the land.<hpage>This substance provides some degree of regenerative assistance, but my brain feels that there is a danger of overtaking.<page>humming! Transcending might be a good thing. or better? Why do you think your ideas are valuable?<page>Wonderful Yarnaby heals the patient! They are not the ones who benefit from suffering. Enjoy that advantage and let me rest!

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket? What is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Pah. I care not for the miseries and struggles of them outside! None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，若您被外面的响动打扰，那我很抱歉。<page>嘁。外头虫子的死活关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 何だ？これからどうするんだ？この音は何だ？それは何だ？<hpage>こんにちは、奥様。もしあなたがこの土地の分断に不安を感じているなら、私も責任を負うことになるでしょう。<page>うわー。私は彼らの苦しみと苦しみを気にしない!彼らは私の鋭い洞察力と過去への敬意を持っていない!<page>しかし、あなたは非常に有能です。そして、狡猾。古くて美しいものを見つけたら、ぜひここに持ってきてください。買ったよ。
secondary_translated_text: what's that? what are we gonna do now? what's that sound? what is that?<hpage>Hello, Madam. If you feel uneasy about the division of this land, then I too will be responsible for it. "<page>Wow. I don't care about their suffering and suffering! They don't have my keen insight and respect for the past!<page>But you are very capable. And, cunning. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.

original_en_text: <page=S>Keep safe, miss courier! You and your deliverings, fragile both can be!
original_zh_text: <page=S>保重啊救星小姐！您和货物都伤不得！
translated_text: <page=S>気をつけて、配達さん!あなたとあなたの配達は脆弱です。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Be careful, Deliverers! You and your delivery are fragile.

original_en_text: <page=T>Do not wait, miss courier! You hold the deliverings, so nows you must away! A quick-quick bug, you must become yourself.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐，别耽搁了！拿着货物赶紧动、动身吧！要快！
translated_text: <page=T>待ってないで、配達人!商品があるので、今すぐ出て行きましょう!簡単な間違いは、あなた自身でなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Don't wait, courier! We have products, so let's go out now! The simple mistake, you have to be yourself.

original_en_text: <hpage>Tipp, I have promised a wish to an old bug of the Citadel, ingredients for a dish to stir a gourmand’s stomach.<hpage>Do you hold in your belongings a Courier’s Rasher? It seems a key element.<page>Courier’s Rasher! Not me, miss savings! Smelly, fatty foods, good for most. Not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-want my brother, Pill! Pill is big. Pill loves rashers! Can prepare them fresh for you, but first, Pill must be found, saved, safe-safe!
original_zh_text: <hpage>蒂普，我答应了圣堡老虫做道大菜，需要送货虫的熏肉。<hpage>你身上有存货吗？若有，我想讨要。<page>熏肉？我才不带！油腻腻的，我肠胃可受不了！<page>您应、应该找皮尔！他块头大，爱死熏肉了！但得先找到他，救、救回来！
translated_text: <hpage>ヒント：私は城で古い昆虫の願いをしました，恐怖心の胃をかき混ぜることができる料理の材料。<hpage>商品に宅配便ラッシュはありますか？これが重要な要素のようです。<page>ラッシュの使者。俺じゃないよ、貯金嬢!臭いの脂っこい食べ物はほとんどの人に良いです。敏感な胃には良くない!<page>あなたは私の兄弟、ピエールが欲しいのです!錠剤は大きい。錠剤は無謀です!新鮮な薬はあなたのために準備できますが、まず見つけ、保存し、安全にする必要があります!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Tip: I made a wish for an old insect in the castle, a cooking ingredient that can scare the stomach of the heart.<hpage>Is there a courier rush for the product? This seems to be an important factor.<page>Messenger of Rush. It's not me, savings lady! Smelly greasy food is good for most people. Not good for a sensitive stomach!<page>You want my brother, Pierre! You want me! The pills are large. The pills are reckless! Fresh medicines can be prepared for you, but first you need to find, store and be safe!

original_en_text: Bzzt! What now?! Not another bother for the great Yarnaby?<hpage>Madam, I have returned with the spines requested. Allow me to enter, that you may remove this parasite from my shell.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！又干嘛？！还来烦伟大的雅纳碧？<hpage>女士，棘刺已准备好，请开门为我去除寄生体。
translated_text: ハミング!これからどうするんだ!ビッグ·アビーはもうトラブルに巻き込まれないのか？<hpage>私は必要な背骨を持って戻ってきました私を中に入れてくださいそうすれば私の殻からこの寄生虫を取り除くことができます
secondary_translated_text: humming! what are we going to do from now on? isn't big abby in trouble anymore?<hpage>I've come back with the spine I need, please let me in, so I can get this parasite out of my shell.

translated_text: シャープな針？
secondary_translated_text: sharp needles?

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! My finest work by far. Pharloom may ail, but across its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！我毕生的杰作！旅者，纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: ナイフだ!爪を使え!今までで最高の作品です。ファルは傷つくかもしれないが、病気の暗闇の中で針は輝く。
secondary_translated_text: the knife! Use your nails! This is the best work I've ever done. The fallout may hurt, but in the darkness of illness the needle shines.

original_en_text: Care to refresh yourself in a steaming spa? Given your hard labours, I’m sure your shell would thank you for it.
original_zh_text: 想不想泡个蒸汽浴？劳累这么久，甲壳该舒坦下！
translated_text: 熱い温泉でリラックスしてみませんか？あなたの努力を考えると、あなたの殻は感謝するでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Why don't you try to relax in the hot spring? Considering your efforts, your shell will appreciate it.

original_en_text: Twine-strung globes filled with gleamflies. These’ll brighten up even the darkest bell.
original_zh_text: 充满荧虫的玻璃球串成的灯串，再黑的钟屋都能照亮！
translated_text: 双弦地球儀にはホタルが至る所にいる。これらは最も暗い鐘でさえ点灯します。
secondary_translated_text: There are fireflies everywhere in the two-stringed globe. These will light up even the darkest bells.

original_en_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another grossy eater queen. Delivery for the big-big creature beyond the roaches. Maybe this one travels safer than last?
original_zh_text: <page=S>又一枚噬丝蛆女王的卵，给蟑螂堆旁的大、大块头。这次会比上回安全些吗？
translated_text: <page=S>もう一つの卵。もう一つの邪悪な女王。ゴキブリ以外の巨大な生き物に商品を輸送する。今回の旅行は前回より安全かな？
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another wicked queen. Transporting goods to giant creatures other than cockroaches. Is this trip safer than last time?

original_en_text: Specimen, we must! There are secrets to uncover, bzzt! Progress can not be denied!
original_zh_text: 病患，我们必须搞清楚！有秘密就有揭秘，滋滋！进步是不可阻挡的！
translated_text: サンプルが必要です!明らかにする秘密がある、BZTT!進歩は否定できない!
secondary_translated_text: We need a sample! There's a secret to reveal, BZTT! Progress cannot be denied!

original_en_text: <page=T>With your shell all a’wriggle, you can’t be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=T>甲壳里有东西在动，不能送货！会搞砸的！<hpage>嗯，若能解决寄生体，我会再来。
translated_text: <page=T>殻が揺れると、何でも受け入れずにはいられません!商品に感染します!<hpage>よかった、宅配便。寄生虫を取り除くことができれば、助けに戻ってくるかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>When the shell shakes, you can't help but accept anything! Infect the goods!<hpage>Good job, courier. If you can get rid of the parasites, they may come back to help.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!<page>The task for you is simple. Head over into that tangled mess of cages, on the roads above the moors.<page>Two bugs hide away there, Benjin and Crull. Simple types, woefully ignorant... yet they have been useful in procuring me materials.<page>It’s Steel Spines I need. A full bundle of them, forged hard and sharp. Tougher than I’ve ever had. Tough enough to crack stone! And to pierce your thick shell, bzzt!<hpage>Then prepare your machine for my return, madam. I shall soon return with the spines, for I am eager to see myself freed.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！上道！是个识货的病患！<page>任务很简单：去沼地上边的铁笼堆找班金和克鲁尔。<page>那俩蠢货有我要的钢棘——要硬过石头！利到能捅穿你厚壳！<hpage>那请女士准备好机器，我这就去取棘刺来。
translated_text: ハミング!それは素晴らしい!私の才能のサンプルをご覧ください!<page>あなたの任務は簡単です。荒れ地の上の道路上の乱雑なケージに入る。<page>そこにはベンジンとクルルの2つの間違いが隠されている。シンプルなタイプ、悲しい無知しかし、それらは私のために材料を調達するのに非常に役立ちます。<page>必要なのは鋼鉄です。全体の束は、硬く、鋭く作られています。これは私が経験したよりも難しい。石を割るほど強い!厚い殻を突き刺して、ヒス!<hpage>私が戻るまでマシンの準備をしてください私は自由になりたいので、すぐに勇気を持って戻ってきます。
secondary_translated_text: humming! That's awesome! Check out a sample of my talent!<page>Your task is easy. Enter a messy cage on a road over a wasteland.<page>There are two mistakes that are hidden, Benzin and Kurl. Simple type, sad ignorance but they are very helpful in procuring materials for me.<page>All we need is steel. The entire bundle is made hard and sharp. This is harder than I have experienced. Strong enough to break a stone! Punch the thick shell, Heath!<hpage>Get the machine ready until I get back I want to be free, so I'll be back soon with courage. "

translated_text: デスクデスク。
secondary_translated_text: The desk.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. My needle has seen much use in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect many more battles are due. I will value your further skills upon my blade. <page>It is a dangerous wish you accept of this poor pinmaster. I welly hope this one’s professional desire does not cost you your life.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我会把油取来，针匠。往后旅途愈发凶险，这针刃还多有用处，你的手艺对我大有助益。<page>我这祈愿确实太过危险，希望您别为此送了命。
translated_text: <hpage>私は油を見つけるだろう、テイスティング、私の針はこの残酷な王国で重要な役割を果たしており、私はさらなる戦いがあると疑う。私はあなたの剣のスキルを大切にします。<page>この貧しいルーテル派のプレイヤーの願いを受け入れることは、あなたにとって危険なことです。この人のキャリア志向が命を犠牲にしないことを願っています。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I will find oil, Tasting, my needle plays an important part in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect there will be further battles. I will cherish your sword-fighting skills. "<page>Accepting the wishes of this poor Lutheran player is a dangerous thing for you. I hope this person's career aspirations will not come at the expense of his life.

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 非要治这寄生物，就去找被钟心镇放逐的雅纳碧。听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: 侵略を生き残ると主張するなら、ベルハルトによって追放されたユナビを探してください。私の知る限り、彼女は荒野から追放されました。
secondary_translated_text: If you claim to survive the invasion, look for Yunabi, who was banished by Berhardt. As far as I know, she was banished from the wilderness.

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
translated_text: もう奴隷に時間を無駄にしない。Go Awayシングル
secondary_translated_text: No longer wasting time on slaves. Go Away Single

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: <page=T>再给下面洞穴里那些可怜虫送趟货吧。<page=S>快点送去吧，救星小姐！能帮大忙呢！
translated_text: <page=T>下の洞窟の悲しい生存者のためのさらなる救済。<page=S>宅配便さん、お届けします!彼らは多くの助けを提供する。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Further relief for the sad survivors of the cave below.<page=S>Delivery service, I'll deliver it! They provide a lot of help.

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐，你身上那哭声！是灰色扭曲之物发出的哀鸣。<hpage>你是说那花苞？确实神秘。我在沼泽深处追寻它的哀鸣，发现它就躺在那里……仿佛在等待着什么。<hpage>可你未见过实物却知其形态，莫非你认得此物？……或是曾听过这哭声？<page>啊，没错！以前确实有旅者携带过类似之物，尽是些怪客。他们称这哭嚎之物为祭品，然后向着甲木林深处进发。<page>此后我再未见过那些花苞，也没再遇见过献祭之虫……<page>如果你要去寻找它们的踪迹，愿你平安。但这悲哭声重现，实属不祥之兆。
translated_text: 姉ちゃん泣いてる!これらは灰色で歪んだものの酸っぱいすすり泣きでした<hpage>つぼみの話ですか？これは本当に神秘的なことです。荒れ地の上の湿った沼で、私は悲しみのうなり声を探し、そこに横たわっているのを見つけた。待って、ほとんど見える。<hpage>形は言ったが、つけてくれなかった。ご存知ですか？この叫びを聞いたことがあるか。<page>はい、はい!もちろん、あなた自身の標本ではなく、昔から他の旅行者が同様の標本を持っていました。彼らはすべて奇妙なタイプです。彼らは泣いているものを“何か”と呼び、シャーウッドの中心部に向かって歩いた。<page>私は二度とそれを見なかったし、花のつぼみも見なかったし、贈り物を持ってくる昆虫も見たことがない。<page>彼らの道をたどるつもりなら、平安を祈りますが、こんなに長い間悲しい声を聞くのは不吉な兆候です。
secondary_translated_text: my sister is crying! These were gray, distorted, but sour sobs.<hpage>are you talking about the bumps? This is a really mysterious thing. In the damp swamps above the wasteland, I looked for the groaning of sorrow, and found it lying there. Wait, I can almost see it.<hpage>I told him the shape, but he didn't put it on. do you know? Have you ever heard this scream?<page>yes, yes! Of course, not your own specimens, but other travelers from ancient times had similar specimens. They're all weird types. They called what was crying "something," and walked toward the center of Sherwood.<page>I never saw it again, I never saw a flower bud, and I never saw an insect bringing a gift.<page>If you are going to follow their path, I pray for peace, but to hear a sad voice for so long is an ominous sign.

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，想看看你有没有被镇上的邪咒祸害。<page>嘁！外头虫子中招关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 何だ？えっ？何？誰なの？何があるの？何が欲しいの？<hpage>私はただの旅行者であり、あなたがこの小さな町に設置された呪いの罠によって深刻な影響を受けないことを願っています。<page>うわー!外に閉じ込められたものは私には意味がない。彼らの中には私の鋭い洞察力、過去への敬意がない!<page>しかし、あなたは非常に有能です。そして、狡猾。古くて美しいものを見つけたら、ぜひここに持ってきてください。買ったよ。
secondary_translated_text: what's that? what? what? who are you? what's there? what do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveler, and I hope you will not be seriously affected by the curse traps set up in this little town.<page>Wow! Anything that is locked up outside means nothing to me. Among them is not my keen insight, my respect for the past!<page>But you are very capable. And, cunning. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 好了！针匠该干活了！纺络许久未见的锋芒该再现了！
translated_text: そして今、!このピンマスターは働く! Polishingを開始!
secondary_translated_text: And now,! This pinmaster works! Start the polishing!

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了镇子上头的恶兽，敲醒了被灵丝封禁的古钟。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: 上からの騒音が戻ってきましたかわいそうな騒音です電線は切断された。<page>あなたは..。あなたはそれを切った。否定するな!<hpage>なぜ否定するのですか？私は町の上の残酷な生き物を倒し、絹に押しつぶされた古い時計を目覚めさせた。幸せじゃないの？<page>幸せじゃない!息をして生きていたら幸せではない。死者だけが喜ぶ。<page>君は奴隷だ、嫌な人だ立ち去れ
secondary_translated_text: The noise from above is back. Poor noise. The wires have been cut.<page>You are a... You have cut it. Don't deny it!<hpage>why do you deny it? I knocked down the cruel creature above the town and woke the old clock crushed in silk. aren't you happy?<page>Not happy! If you are breathing and living, you are not happy. Only the dead are pleased.<page>You're a slave, you're a bitch. Go away.

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！您真是奇迹般的存在，外面如此黑暗危险，不仅仍旧只身闯荡，还能安然无恙地回来。<hpage>我是带着值得分享的希望回来的，帕沃。我已找到平息混乱之法，正全力推进。<hpage>虽然希望渺茫，但只要你们能继续坚守，只要我的努力能成功，纺络或许仍有未来。
translated_text: 住人たち!驚くべきことに、あなたは荒野と暗闇に勇敢に立ち向かい、無傷で私たちに戻ってきました。<hpage>パヴォ、私は共有する価値のある希望を持って戻ってきた。私はこの混乱を鎮める方法を見つけ、今すぐ作業しています。<hpage>まだチャンスはありませんが、町が持ちこたえ、私の努力が成功すれば、ファロには未来が見えるかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: Residents! Amazingly, you braved the wilderness and darkness and came back to us unscathed.<hpage>Pavo, I have come back with a hope worth sharing. I've found a way to quell this mess and I'm working on it right now.<hpage>I don't have a chance yet, but if the town holds up and my efforts succeed, Faro may see a future.

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 圣堡精工杰作！据说是上头阴森爬行的家伙带来的，这宝贝我只卖给你！
translated_text: 城はいくつかの素晴らしい機械を作っていて、これは最高のもののようです!明らかに、それはそこに隠れているマッドスケーターからのもので、それはあなたのためだけです!
secondary_translated_text: The castle is making some great machines, and this seems to be the best one! Obviously, it's from the mad skater hiding out there, and it's just for you!

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 過去の遺物を集めるのが私の使命です。古くて美しいものを見つけたら、ぜひここに持ってきてください。買ったよ。
secondary_translated_text: It is my mission to collect the relics of the past. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我帮不了，有要事在身。<hpage>若有神志清醒的朝圣者路过，或许他们会帮忙。<page=T>那就祈祷他们快来！还是谢谢您！
