translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたを助けることができません。私自身の仕事は、あなたの配達を引き受けるにはあまりにも緊急です。<hpage>運が良ければ、明晰でエネルギッシュな巡礼者もいます。彼らはあなたの意志に同意するかもしれません。<page=T>彼らが来て助けを逃すことを祈ります。今でも感謝しています
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can't help you, I can't. My own work is too urgent to undertake your delivery. "<hpage>If you're lucky, there are some clear and energetic pilgrims. They may agree with your will, but they are not.<page=T>I pray that they will come and miss help. And I'm still grateful for it.

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了丝线，灭了给镇子下咒的怪物。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: 上からの騒音が戻ってきましたかわいそうな騒音です電線は切断された。<page>あなたは..。あなたはそれらを切る。否定するな!<hpage>なぜ否定するのですか？私は防衛線を切り、呪われた町を導いていたクリーチャーを倒した。幸せじゃないの？<page>幸せじゃない!息をして生きていたら幸せではない。死者だけが喜ぶ。<page>君は奴隷だ、嫌な人だ立ち去れ
secondary_translated_text: The noise from above is back. Poor noise. The wires have been cut.<page>You are a... You cut them off. Don't deny it!<hpage>why do you deny it? I cut through the lines and took down the creature that was leading the cursed town. aren't you happy?<page>Not happy! If you are breathing and living, you are not happy. Only the dead are pleased.<page>You're a slave, you're a bitch. Go away.

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: <page=T>听说跳蚤们在上面建了窝！找我们要货！<page=T>跳蚤们都很机、机灵，送货交朋友准没、没错！
translated_text: <page=T>その言葉を聞いた!多くのノミがファルの高台に集まり、我々に要求を叫んでいる!<page=T>賢いウジ虫やノミですが彼らにも私たちの助けが必要です配達さん、車に乗せてください!いつも素敵です-ノミに感謝されるのは素晴らしいことです。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>I heard that word! Many fleas have gathered on the heights of the Fal, shouting demands at us!<page=T>They're smart worms and fleas, but they need our help, too. Deliveryman, please get in the car! It's always nice - it's great to be thankful for a flea.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。本想交易，但货架有点空。<page>咳！时局艰难，送货虫又跑丢了。<page>别急！还有点小玩意！等那小子平安归来，货品管够。
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、店主。取引をお願いしたいのですが、お店は少し空いています。<page>咳をする!そう、私たちの町は恐ろしい時期を経て、今は宅配便がいなくなり、私は道に迷っています。<page>でも心配するな!小さなことがあるんだ!使者が無事に戻ってきたら、もっと多くの宝を手に入れることができます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. I'd like to ask you for a deal, but the shop is a little empty.<page>coughing up! Yes, our town has gone through a terrible time, and now there are no couriers, and I am lost.<page>But don't worry! There's a little thing! If the messenger returns unharmed, he will have much more treasure in his possession.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！别烦我！本神医只医病患！享你的福去！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: ハミング!静かにしてくれ!素晴らしいYarnabyは患者を癒す!苦しみから恩恵を受ける者ではない。その利点を楽しんで、私を休ませてください!<hpage>はい、私はあなたの時間を無駄にしたくない。
secondary_translated_text: humming! Please keep quiet! " Wonderful Yarnaby heals the patient! They are not the ones who benefit from suffering. Enjoy that advantage and let me rest!<hpage>Yes, I don't want to waste your time.

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 好了！完活啦勇士！经我利爪打磨，您这针刃寒光逼人，削铁如泥啊！<hpage>有劳了，针匠。感激不尽。
translated_text: ボンワ!終わった、勇敢な兵士。私のプロフェッショナルな爪を通して、あなたの奇妙な刃は素早く鋭い輝きを得ました。今まで以上に清潔になります。<hpage>あなたの努力は大きな助けになりました、マスター。ありがとうございます。
secondary_translated_text: Bonwa! It's over, brave soldier. Through my professional claws, your strange blade quickly acquired a sharp glow. It will be cleaner than ever.<hpage>Your efforts have been a great help, Master. Thank you very much.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！这儿太可怕了！洞窟震得像在惨叫！<page=T>钟居底下挤满了可怜的新朋友，全都吓坏了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！情况越危险，送货就越要紧！
translated_text: <page=T>配達ミス!なんと恐ろしいことでしょう!洞窟は震え、最も野蛮な傷のために泣いた。<page=T>鐘だらけの家に集まっているかわいそうな友人たちを見て、私の心は恐怖で加速しました。<page=S>でもどうしたのよ助けに来たんだよね？配達は、あなたが今必要です!洞窟が暗くなると、救助はさらに重要です。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Missed Delivery! How horrible it is! The caves trembled and wept for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>My heart accelerated with fear when I saw my poor friends gathered in a house full of bells.<page=S>but what happened? you're here to help me, right? Delivery, we need you now! When the cave gets dark, rescue is even more important.

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: <page=T>货毁、毁了！全丢了！<page=T>别灰、灰心！纺络现在处处凶、凶险，能送到才是稀罕事！<page=S>要再试一次吗？那么多虫等着货救、救命呢！
translated_text: <page=T>お届け!破産している!消えた!こぼれた!<page=T>店員さん、がっかりしないで!これがファロ!危険で致命的。今日では商品の到着は稀です。<page=S>もう一度やってみますか？救いを必要とする過ちのために？
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery! They are broke! He's gone! Spilt!<page=T>Shopkeeper, don't be disappointed! This is Faro! Dangerous and deadly. Nowadays, the arrival of goods is rare.<page=S>would you like to try it again? for mistakes that need salvation?

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些缩在亮堂钟屋里的怂包，哼。自诩要侍奉攀登圣堡的朝圣者。<page>给自己戴高帽，真当是个人物！<page>甜美的谎言罢了。他们和前代一样，不过是没胆往上爬的懦夫。这镇子就是怠惰的产物。
translated_text: 昆虫は輝く鐘の中にうずくまった。グレンジャー。彼らは巡礼者に奉仕するという共通の使命を持っていると主張する。<page>自分のために重要な役割を果たしていることは間違いありません!<page>もちろん、これは甘い嘘です。彼らの前任者のように、彼らはもはや危険を冒すには弱すぎた。怠惰から生まれた解決策。
secondary_translated_text: The insect huddled in the glowing bell. Granger. They claim that they share a common mission: to serve the pilgrims.<page>There is no doubt that you play an important role for yourself!<page>Of course this is a sweet lie. Like their predecessors, they were no longer too weak to take the risk. A solution born of laziness.

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: <hpage>他倒是聪明。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那就谢谢了！敢闯荒野帮助同类的虫可不多见。
translated_text: <hpage>彼はそれをするのが賢明です。もし私が旅で間違った間違いを犯したら、必ず彼をあなたのところに連れて行きます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>He would be wise to do it. If I make a wrong mistake in my journey, I will surely take him to you.

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！您就是我们的大救星？踏进普林尼的华美钟居还这般气定神闲！<hpage>先生怎么知道我插手了镇子的事？<page>看你的针刃啊勇士！但凡有点眼力的针匠都认得出这针尖染过血。<page>那邪咒凶恶得很，寻常虫和寻常针可破不了。但您这把利刃……<page>握爪稳当，做工精良！肯定是您救了我们，对不对？<hpage>眼力不错，针匠。你既然得救，这针刃也该由你照料了。<page>好嘞！虽然我手上活计不少，但英雄的面子最大，立马给您开小灶！这就让我看看针刃？
translated_text: 爪を使え!あなたは私たちの殻の救い主ですか？プリニウスの鐘楼の入り口に立って、とても静かです!<hpage>君の街を解放するための私の役割を説明する手がかりは何ですか？<page>なぜ剣を持っているのか？良い針職人なら誰でも針の端に致命的な痕跡を見つけることができます。<page>ここで攻撃されたのは卑劣な呪いだ。簡単なバグやベーシックピンはバージョンを付与できません。いいえ!<page>しかし、ナイフは爪で巧みに捕らえられた。これで任務は完全に完了することができます。私たちを自由にしてくれますよね。<hpage>私はマスター、あなたの目は鋭く、あなたの救いは偶然であることを認めます。あなたの町のこの修復されたブレードは今あなたのサービスの恩恵を受ける。<page>ウィリー!はい!私は処理するピンの束を持っていますが、あなたのエレガントなヒロイズムは私が今このユニークな武器を世話することを決定しました!見てみましょう
secondary_translated_text: Use your nails! Are you the Savior of our shell? Standing at the entrance of the bell tower of Pliny, it is very quiet!<hpage>what's the clue that explains my role in liberating your city?<page>why do you have a sword? Any good needleworker can find a deadly mark on the tip of a needle.<page>It is a vile curse to be attacked here. Simple bugs and basic pins can't be given a version. No!<page>However, the knife was deftly captured by his claws. Now the mission can be fully completed. It sets us free, doesn't it?<hpage>I acknowledge, Master, that your eyes are sharp and that your salvation is accidental. This restored blade in your town will now benefit from your services.<page>Willy! yes! I have a bunch of pins to handle, but your elegant heroism has decided that I will take care of this unique weapon now! Let's take a look at it.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！
translated_text: そして、もっと!過去の遺物をもっとよこせ!記録、封印、偶像!世界の歴史を収集し、すべてを安全にここに保存しましょう!
secondary_translated_text: And more! " Give me more of the past! Record, seal, idol! Collect the history of the world and keep it all safe here!

original_en_text: <page=S>Many deliverings still need making, miss courier! We is much needing your help, when you is ready for the giving of it-it!
original_zh_text: <page=S>还有好多货要送呢！等您有空了一定帮帮忙！
translated_text: <page=S>あなたが助ける準備ができたら、Miss Messengerに送ることがたくさんあります。私たちは本当にあなたの助けが必要です。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>When you're ready to help, there's a lot to send to Miss Messenger. We really need your help, and we're going to help you.

original_en_text: Done, it is! Marvel of Pharloom! See how it gleams, your long, fine blade. Havast! That the pins of our land all once held such shine. So much we have lost...<hpage>This is fine service, pinmaster. It has been a long age since I have seen my needle such. I had not remembered the finesse of its forging.<page>Welly, ho! It is certain! Yours is a blade of finer make than most, one of few that could bear even more sharpening.<page>If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your weapon’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 成啦！纺络的奇迹！瞧这寒光，长刃如新。唉！想当年万针皆有如此锋芒，如今……<hpage>针匠果然手艺精湛。此针许久未曾焕发如此神采，几乎快忘了它的锻造之精良。<page>哎呀呀！没错！您这针刃底子绝佳，还能更锋利！<page>要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: 終わった、それだけ!ファレムの奇跡!あなたの細い刃の輝きを見てください。ハヴァスト!私たちの土地のピンはかつて輝いていた。多くを失いました<hpage>それは素晴らしいサービスです、Pinsmster。こんな針は久しぶりに見ました。彼の技術は覚えていません。<page>ウィリー、ホー!これは確かです!あなたのブレードはほとんどのブレードよりも薄く、より鋭いブレードに耐えることができる数少ないブレードの1つです。<page>あなたが長い道のりでより多くの石油を得るなら、できるだけ早く私にサービスを求めてください!あなたの武器の鋭い鋼の奥深くにどんな形が見つかるかわかりません。
secondary_translated_text: It's over, that's all! The Miracle of Phallem! Look at the glow of your slender blade. Haavast! The pin of our land once shone. We've lost a lot.<hpage>That's a great service, Pinsmster. I haven't seen a needle like this in a long time. I don't remember his techniques.<page>Willie, ho! This is for sure! Your blade is thinner than most blades, and one of the few blades that can withstand sharper blades.<page>If you get more oil in the long way, please seek my service as soon as possible! You don't know what shape you'll find in the depths of the sharp steel of your weapon.

original_en_text: <hpage>For the moment, I can not aid you, couriers. My own tasks are too pressing.<page=T>Then we shall hope you see them soon achieved! If the deliverings are not made, Pharloom’s bugs will suffer muchly-much!
original_zh_text: <hpage>眼下实在帮不了，有要事在身。<page=T>希望您早日达成目标！要是货送不到，大伙可遭、遭殃咯！
translated_text: <hpage>メッセンジャーはお手伝いできません。私の仕事はあまりにも緊急です。<page=T>できるだけ早く目標を達成してください!もし届けられなければ、ファルの昆虫たちは大きな損失を被るでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The messenger cannot help you. My work is too urgent.<page=T>Achieve your goals as soon as possible! If it is not delivered, the insects of the fallout will suffer a great loss.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is fortune to see you returned, pinmaster. The roads between here and that deep woods’ grave crawl with violent foes. I had concerns for your safety.<page>Brave warrior, my hero! T’was indeed a fearful scramble home, but safe I now am! And a warmly pleasure to see you too, for the world has darkened indeed!<page>In such times, the task for a pinmaster is clear, to polish and sharpen and refine, suchly that the glimmer of your blade may pierce through the encroaching murk!
original_zh_text: <hpage>能见你平安归来真是万幸，针匠。从深林墓穴到此地的路上遍布凶险，我确实有些担心你的安危。<page>勇敢的战士，我的英雄！回家路上确实惊险万分，但我现在安全了！在这愈发黑暗的世道能遇见您真是令我欣慰！<page>在这危难时刻，针匠的职责再清晰不过——打磨、淬锋、精炼，让您的兵刃锋利到足以刺破这渐浓的黑暗！
translated_text: <hpage>また会えてよかったよ、ピント。ここから森の奥深くにある墓への道は、凶暴な敵でいっぱいです。あなたの安全が心配です。<page>勇敢な兵士、私のヒーロー!家に帰るのは怖かったけど、今は安全だ!私も会えてよかったです、世界は暗くなってきました!<page>このような時代において、針職人の使命は明確です。刃の光が侵食された暗闇を突き抜けるように、磨き、磨き、洗練することです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>It's good to see you again, Pint. The road from here to the tomb deep in the woods is full of ferocious enemies. I'm worried about your safety.<page>Brave soldiers, my hero! I was scared to go home, but now I'm safe! It was nice to meet you too, the world has been getting dark!<page>In such an age, the mission of the needle maker is clear. It is to polish, polish, and refine, as the light of the blade pierces the eroded darkness.

original_en_text: <page=S>We is got requested times a’many for this, a queeny egg of those eaters of Silk. Wish from big, sticky creature, near many roaches caged. Wants it muchly! <hpage>The creature, I have met them, a timid, fawning sort. Nonetheless, their tending of Silkeaters can be a benefit for me.<hpage>If a queen delivered could improve their harvest, I too would gain from the trade.<page=S>Miss courier, and big, sticky creature? Both are like to liking things so grossly-gross? We think yous are muchly strange...
original_zh_text: <page=S>接了个怪单！蟑螂笼子旁的黏糊大块头想、想要噬丝蛆女王的卵！<hpage>我见过那大块头，是个怂包。他们养蛆虽然恶心，但对我有利。<hpage>要是能提高他们的产量，倒也划算。<page=S>救星小姐和黏糊怪都好重口！真搞不懂……
translated_text: <page=S>シルクのダイナーから女王の卵をたくさんもらいました。檻の中の多くのゴキブリの近くにいる大きな粘着性の生き物からの祝福。私はそれが欲しい!<hpage>私は前にそれらを見たことがあり、生き物は臆病で好ましい人でした。しかし、シルクの世話をすることは私にとって良いことです。<hpage>女王が収穫を増やすことができれば、私も貿易の恩恵を受けるでしょう。<page=S>宅配便さん、大きくて粘着性のある生き物はいますか？みんなそんな嫌なものが好きなの？あなたは奇妙だと思います
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>I got a lot of Queen eggs from the Silk Diner. Blessings from a large sticky creature near many cockroaches in the cage. I want it! "<hpage>I had seen them before, and the creature was a cowardly and likable man. However, taking care of the silk is good for me.<hpage>If the Queen can increase her harvest, I too will benefit from the trade.<page=S>Mr. Courier, are there any big, sticky creatures? do you guys like that nasty stuff? I think you're weird.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss saving! We thought us safe, brothers together at last, but what horror even here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! Alas, for our shells to survive we cannot now leave this home of bells. No more. Heres we must remain.<page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those strong ones, like yourselfs, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=S>Our savings is done, and the caves turn dark. Now the deliveries are needed, desperate. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！本以为我们兄弟团聚就安全了，谁知这里也遭了灾！洞窟震、震个不停，像在惨叫似的。<page=T>您看钟居底下这些可怜的新朋友，全都挤作一团，心都快吓跳出来了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！可我们这副样子……实在不敢离开钟居了。只能守在这儿。<page=T>不过我们想、想了个聪明主意！像您这样的强者，说不定愿意帮忙？酬劳虽然不多……<page=S>我们的积蓄都花光了，洞窟也危在旦夕。现在送货是救命的事！该您出马了，救星小姐！
translated_text: <page=T>節約が恋しい!無事だと思って兄弟がやっと一緒になったのですが、ここでも恐ろしいです!洞窟は震え、最も野蛮な傷のために泣いた。<page=T>鐘だらけの家に集まっているかわいそうな友人たちを見て、私の心は恐怖で加速しました。<page=S>でもどうしたのよ助けに来たんだよね？配達は、あなたが今必要です!残念ながら、貝殻の生存のためには、この時計の家から出ることはできません。これ以上はない。ここにいるんだ<page=T>一緒に賢く計画しました!はい-はい。あなたのような強い人が助けてくれる？私たちのような小さな報酬のために？<page=S>貯金がなくなり、洞窟は暗くなりました。緊急配達が必要です。いよいよ配達の時間です!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>I miss the savings! I thought my brothers were safe and finally got together, but here too it's scary! The caves trembled and wept for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>My heart accelerated with fear when I saw my poor friends gathered in a house full of bells.<page=S>but what happened? you're here to help me, right? Delivery, we need you now! Unfortunately, for the survival of the shell, you can not leave the house of this clock. There is no more. i'm here.<page=T>We planned it wisely together! yeah - yeah. will a strong man like you help me? for a small reward like ours?<page=S>My savings were gone, and the caves were dark. Urgent delivery is required. It's finally time to deliver!

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller. May I ask, though, what work occupies you here?<page>What occupies me, you ask? The past! The voices of ages gone by, they speak to me through what is left behind.<page>Those outside, those dreary pilgrims and bell-adorned dullards... none of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，请问您在忙什么？<page>忙什么？忙着挖掘历史！这些老物件都会跟我诉说过往呢！<page>外头那些呆瓜朝圣者和钟里的蠢货……没一个懂行！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 何だ？えっ？何？誰なの？何があるの？何が欲しいの？<hpage>私はただの旅人です。質問してもいいですが、ここで何をしていますか？<page>私に何を尋ねるか。過去のもの!時間の流れがすべてを教えてくれました。<page>それらの人々、退屈な巡礼者と鐘を持った愚か者は、私の鋭い洞察力、私の過去への敬意を持っていない!<page>しかし、あなたは非常に有能です。そして、狡猾。古くて美しいものを見つけたら、ぜひここに持ってきてください。買ったよ。
secondary_translated_text: what's that? what? what? who are you? what's there? what do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveler. I can ask you a question, but what are you doing here?<page>What do you ask me? Something of the past! The flow of time has taught us everything.<page>Those people, bored pilgrims and fools with bells, have no respect for my keen insight, my past! "<page>But you are very capable. And, cunning. If you find something old and beautiful, be sure to bring it here. i bought it.

original_en_text: Your continued help to Bellhart has not gone unnoticed, miss traveller.<page>In these terrible times, it’s rare enough to see any wish granted. Now to see such care come from a stranger! Why, that’s simply unheard of!<hpage>I have seen the scale of suffering wrought across Pharloom, Pavo. And I will admit, fulfilling these requests may do little to affect the cause... Even still, I have found it a rewarding task.<hpage>To aid another... The small warmth of it, I had almost forgotten.
original_zh_text: 您对钟心镇的援助有目共睹，小姐。<page>这世道，能实现祈愿已是奇迹，更何况还是出自外乡客！闻所未闻！<hpage>我也目睹纺络遍地疮痍。实现祈愿虽难以撼动其根源，但总能得到些许慰藉。<hpage>助虫为乐……这份悸动，我几乎忘却。
translated_text: 乗客さん、バーハルトへのあなたの継続的な支援は無視されません。<page>この恐ろしい時代には、願いが叶うことはめったにありません。私は見知らぬ人からこの恐怖を見た!なんで？これは前代未聞です!<hpage>パヴォ·ファルムの苦悩を目撃した。これらの要件を満たすことはキャリアにほとんど影響しません。それでも、私はそれが有用な仕事だと感じた。<hpage>助けを借りて少し暖かかったので、忘れていました。
secondary_translated_text: Passengers, your continued support for Berhardt will not be ignored.<page>In these dreadful times, a wish is seldom granted. I saw this terror from a stranger! why? This is unheard of!<hpage>He witnessed Pavo Farms' distress. Meeting these requirements will have little impact on your career. Even so, I felt it was a useful job.<hpage>It was a little warm with my help, so I forgot.

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. Look at my collection, if you fancy! Look, look!
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！想看我的珍藏不？来！快看看！
translated_text: 過去の遺物を集めるのが私の使命です。気に入ったら、私のコレクションをチェックしてください!見て!見て!
secondary_translated_text: It is my mission to collect the relics of the past. If you like it, check out my collection! Look at me! Look at me!

original_en_text: <page=T>Goods for the camp at base, where pilgrims’ journey starts. We muchly hope this delivering goes well!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给骸底营地的货物，希望这趟一路顺利！
translated_text: <page=T>巡礼者が旅を始めたベースキャンプからの貨物。私たちはこの配達を望む!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Cargo from the base camp where the pilgrims began their journey. We want this delivery!

original_en_text: <page=S>You have the good-goods, miss courier! Now only the deliverings needs doing. Don’t wait here-here!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐，拿、拿了货物，快出发吧！
translated_text: <page=S>あなたは良い商品を持っている!今は配達だけが必要です。ここで待つな!ここ!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>You have a good merchandise! Now we just need to deliver. Don't wait here! here!

original_en_text: Off with you! Head over to that tangled mess of cages, in those roads above the moors.<page>Those two bugs, Benjin and Crull, can surely scrounge up what I need. A full bundle of hard, sharp spines!
original_zh_text: 赶紧去！找沼地上边铁笼堆的班金和克鲁尔，拿钢棘回来！
translated_text: 逃げろ!荒れ地の上の道路には乱雑な檻があります。<page>校長とクルルの2つの間違いは、私が必要とするものを見つけるでしょう。硬くて鋭いとげの束の全体!
secondary_translated_text: run! There are cluttered cages on the roads over the wasteland.<page>The two mistakes of the headmaster and Kurl will find what I need. A whole bunch of hard and sharp prickles!

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! It is done. Sharper than this pinmaster would have believed achievable. Shining pale and clear.<page>Bonva! Stranger, you have granted my wish, and more. Your blade is accomplishment to match those of great pinmasters past.<page>Pharloom may ail, but throughout its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！完成了！这苍白皎洁的锋芒，简直超乎我这针匠想象。<page>太好了！您不止完成了我的祈愿，还助此针达成了不逊于古匠的成就！<page>纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: ナイフだ!爪を使え!これは、職人が想像するよりも難しい。白くてクリア。<page>ボンワ!あなたは私の願いを叶えてくれました。あなたの剣はかつての偉大なハープ奏者に匹敵する。<page>ファルは傷つくかもしれないが、病的な暗闇の中で針は光る。
secondary_translated_text: the knife! Use your nails! This is more difficult than the craftsman imagines. White and Clear.<page>Bonwa! You have granted me my wishes, and I will be glad to see you. Your sword is comparable to the great harpists of old.<page>The fallout may hurt, but the needle shines in the pathological darkness.

original_en_text: What? You refuse to pass it on? What good do you think it’ll do you?!
original_zh_text: 干嘛？为什么不交？留着能下崽啊？！
translated_text: 何だ？相続を拒否しますか？何が役に立つと思いますか？
secondary_translated_text: what's that? Do you refuse the inheritance? what do you think would be helpful?

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Pavo. Keep these poor bugs close and their spirits from sorrow.<page>None shall leave these walls, dear resident, and all still are welcome. Any that can be saved.<page>Better we bugs be together, here at the end of it all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，帕沃。保护好这些可怜虫，别让他们陷入绝望。<page>没有虫会离开这里的，旅者小姐！这里永远欢迎任何幸存的虫。<page>末日将至，能聚在一起已值得庆幸。
translated_text: <hpage>気をつけてパボ。かわいそうな虫を近づけ、悲しみから魂を救ってください。<page>親愛なる住民の皆さん、誰もこの壁から離れることはできません。救われるものは何でも。<page>それが終わったら、一緒にいた方がいい。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Be careful, Pabo. Bring the poor worm nearer and save the soul from sorrow.<page>Dear residents, no one can get away from this wall. Whatever it is that can be saved.<page>When it's over, you better be together.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay alert on your journey home, pinmaster. If you encounter other bugs upon the road, I advise you avoid them as you are able.
original_zh_text: <hpage>回程多留神，针匠。路上遇虫尽量躲着点。
translated_text: <hpage>家に帰る途中は気をつけてください。途中で他の間違いがある場合は、できるだけ避けることをお勧めします。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Be careful on the way home. If there are other mistakes along the way, it is best to avoid them as much as possible.

original_en_text: Auugh! Bzzt! Again the world lashes out at me!<page>But the pain... it means nothing to Yarnaby!<page>Nothing can deter my great work! Not for long! I must not be stopped!
original_zh_text: 嗷！滋滋！这该死世道又针对我！<page>但痛苦……对雅纳碧而言没有意义！<page>什么都挡不住本神医的伟业！什么都不行！
translated_text: あっ! あっ!ハミング!世界は再び私を攻撃する!<page>しかし、痛み。ヤナビには意味がない!<page>私の偉大な仕事を止めるものは何もない!そんなに長くない!止められない!
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! humming! The world is attacking me again!<page>But the pain. The Yanabi doesn't make sense!<page>Nothing will stop my great work! " Not that long! I can't stop it!

translated_text: ベル塗装済み
secondary_translated_text: Bell painted

original_en_text: <page=S>A new destination this-this! And desperate these supplies are asked.<page=T>Deliverings for them-them escaped from the crumbled camp beside the bone, those few still living.<page=T>Hurting and hungry, those few must be.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这、这是新目的地！这批物资要得急！<page=T>送给骸骨营地的幸存者，就剩那么几个了。<page=T>他们肯定又惊又饿。
translated_text: <page=S>これは新しい目的地です!これらの材料は緊急です。<page=T>彼らは骨のそばの崩壊したキャンプから逃れ、何人かはまだ生きていました。<page=T>彼らは苦しみと飢えに苦しんでいた。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>This is a new destination! These materials are urgent.<page=T>They fled from the crumbling camp beside the bones, and some were still alive.<page=T>They were suffering from suffering and hunger.

original_en_text: <page=T>It is yours, miss courier! Meats prepared fresh as fresh, in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our rasher is delicious, strong, fatty food, but is not long to last. If not stored quick, it-it is flavour fast turns foul.<hpage>If the rasher is likely to spoil, then I shall make fast for the Citadel. I’ve no desire to see your efforts, or your scant supplies wasted.
original_zh_text: <page=T>给您备好啦！送货虫特制熏肉，仅此一家！<page=T>熏肉香浓肥美但不耐存！得赶紧送！<hpage>既然如此，我即刻动身。不枉你们辛苦。
translated_text: <page=T>配達人、これはあなたのものです!特別な方法で調理された肉。<page=T>メッセンジャーは知っている!私たちのラシェルチーズはおいしいですが、長くは続きません。すぐに保存しないと、味がすぐに悪くなります。<hpage>ラシェルの病気が悪化したら城に戻る私はあなたの努力やわずかな材料を無駄にしたくありません。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Deliverer, this is yours! Meat cooked in a special way.<page=T>The messenger knows it! Our Rachael cheese is delicious, but it doesn't last long. If you don't store it right away, it will taste bad right away.<hpage>If Rachelle's illness worsens, I will return to the castle I do not want to waste your efforts or even a few materials.

original_en_text: Shellwood’s grown more dangerous in recent times, but I’m a lifelong catcher, right down to my core. Ain’t nothing that’ll change that.
original_zh_text: 甲木林近来愈发凶险，但我生来就是渔夫的命，避不开。
translated_text: シャーウッドは近年より危険になっていますが、私は本質的に生涯の受取人です。何も変わってない
secondary_translated_text: Sherwood has become more dangerous in recent years, but I'm essentially a lifelong receiver. nothing has changed.

original_en_text: I rarely sell objects as intriguing as this. Supposed to improve a bug’s natural ability to heal! Can’t say I’ve felt its effects myself, but then I keep more healthy than most.
original_zh_text: 这可是少见的好玩意！据说能提升自愈力。我身子一向健康，倒是没感受过。
translated_text: こんなに魅力的なものはめったに売れない。昆虫の自然治癒力を高めることができます。私自身はその影響を感じたとは言えませんが、私はほとんどの人より健康です。
secondary_translated_text: Rarely does anything so attractive sell. It can enhance the natural healing power of insects. I can't say I felt the effects myself, but I'm healthier than most people.

original_en_text: Yes... This fits my collection well. Look, then! Look at what I have!
original_zh_text: 真不错……这玩意配得上我的珍藏。瞧啊！这才叫宝贝！
translated_text: そうですね。私のコレクションにぴったりです。だから見て!私が持っているもの!
secondary_translated_text: That's right, sir. Perfect for my collection. So look at that! What I have! "

original_en_text: Ahh. ‘Tis your choice, warrior. If you’re choosing different in times ahead, Plinney shall be here to provide eager aid.
original_zh_text: 唉。随您，勇士。改主意了随时来找普林尼。
translated_text: それはあなたの選択です、兵士。将来別の選択肢を選ぶなら、プリニウスはここで熱心に助けてくれます。
secondary_translated_text: It is your choice, soldier. If you choose another option in the future, Pliny is here to help you enthusiastically.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! Pavo can sense that you are ailing, but fret not! For in Bellhart, pilgrims may rest and recuperate until they are fit to travel once more!<hpage>Your hospitality is appreciated, Pavo, but I fear rest alone will not suffice for this illness. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, and I prefer to keep it that way! But if you really must seek her out, you might start by speaking to the old hermit skulking beneath the Bellway.<page>Yes... that hermit seems mad, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where that wretched physician is lurking.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐！帕沃察觉到您疾病缠身，但无需担心！您可以待在钟心镇疗养至康复！<hpage>心领了，但此症并非静养可以治愈，甲壳内寄生体难以驱除。<hpage>你可知道哪里能寻得医者？<page>医者？过去镇上曾有一虫……但手段可怕至极！因疗法过于粗暴遭全民驱逐！<page>如今行踪不明，但执意要寻找的话……可以问问在钟道下藏身的老隐士。<page>那老头虽然疯疯癫癫，但知道不少，或许能告知庸医的下落。
translated_text: 病気の友人!孔雀は病気を感じることができますが、心配しないでください。ベルハルトでは、巡礼者たちは再び旅をするまで休息し、回復することができます。<hpage>パボ、おもてなしに感謝しますが、休息だけでは病気を治すことはできません。寄生虫は私の中に根付き、私だけでは根絶できません。<hpage>教えてください、助けてくれる人を知っていますか？セラピストか医者か？<page>ドクター？よし...。1つあります恐ろしい悪魔!彼女の行動は冷酷で失礼だった。名誉あるバーハルトの健康のために、我々は満場一致で彼女を追放する。<page>どこに行ったのか分からないけど、このままにしたい!でも本当に彼女を見つけたいならベルビューの下に隠れている隠者と話すことができます<page>そうですね。隠者は狂っているように見えるかもしれませんが、知識を蓄積する方法があります。かわいそうな医者がどこにいるか教えてくれるかもしれません
secondary_translated_text: A sick friend! The peacock can feel sick, but don't worry. In Berhardt, pilgrims can rest and recuperate until they make their journey again.<hpage>Pabo, thank you for your hospitality, but rest alone cannot cure your illness. The parasites are rooted in me and I cannot eradicate them alone.<hpage>Tell me, do you know anyone who can help you? a therapist or a doctor?<page>doctor? okay, okay. There is one terrible demon! Her behavior was cold and rude. For the health of the honourable Berhardt, we unanimously expel her.<page>I don't know where it went, but I want it to stay that way! But if you really want to find her, you can talk to the hermit hiding under the bellview.<page>That's right, sir. The hermit may seem crazy, but there are ways to accumulate knowledge. Maybe you can tell me where the poor doctor is.

original_en_text: We are lucky to have you, miss traveller. In Bellhart you are always welcome, you and your big, sharp blade!
original_zh_text: 有您相助真是钟心镇之幸！这里随时欢迎您，以及您的针刃！
translated_text: 私たちはあなたに恵まれています、旅行者さん。Berhartはいつもあなたとあなたの大きな鋭い刃を歓迎します!
secondary_translated_text: We have been blessed with you, Mr. Traveler. Berhart always welcome you and your big sharp blade!

original_en_text: <hpage>What do you remember of your time caught upon the thread, Pavo?<page>Oh, ahh. It is difficult... Upsetting even to think. Strange, sad memories, not my own, and my own thoughts smothered amidst the tangle.<page>If one could choose to connect themself to something grander, that curse may seem a wonder. For myself, it now seems a horror.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，还记得被邪丝操控时的记忆么？<page>唉……回想起来有些痛苦……尽是陌生悲伤的回忆，自身的思绪仿佛被扼杀其中。<page>要是自愿投身于宏伟存在，这份诅咒或许是恩赐。但对于我……终究是梦魇。
translated_text: <hpage>パボ、トラブルにあった時のこと覚えてる？<page>ああ ああ ああ。大変だった。考えることさえ不安です。自分のものではない奇妙で悲しい記憶が、自分の考えと絡み合っている。<page>もし人がより大きな何かに自分自身を結びつける選択肢があるならば、呪いは奇跡のように見えるかもしれません。今の私には恐怖のようです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>pabo, do you remember when you were in trouble?<page>Oh yeah yeah. It was hard. I am anxious even to think about it. Strange and sad memories that are not his own are intertwined with his own thoughts.<page>If a person had the option of connecting himself to something greater, the curse might seem like a miracle. It seems like a fear to me now.

original_en_text: Oh! Ohhhh! They shall join... Union upon your thread... A gift, for your waking. A world strung to serve...<hpage>Creature, your claws guide those cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this vile affliction?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦哦哦！他们将归附……缠绕在您的丝线中……献予您的苏醒之礼，一个以侍奉之名编织的世界……<hpage>怪物，你虽然操纵邪丝却并非其源头。在这卑劣诅咒中你扮演什么角色？
translated_text: おぉ!おぉ!彼らは加わる。あなたのラインで結合しなさい。目覚めのプレゼントです。奉仕に捧げられた世界。<hpage>生き物よ、あなたの爪は呪われた糸を導くが、あなたはその源ではないあなたはこの悲惨な苦しみにどんな役割を果たしたのか。
secondary_translated_text: oh! oh! They will join. Combine them in your line. It is a gift of awakening. A world dedicated to service.<hpage>O living creature, your claws lead the cursed thread, but you are not the source of it What part have you played in this miserable suffering?

original_en_text: <page=T>But hold, miss courier! Before depart you mustly know, all deliverings are in needing of great-great care!<page=S>No bump! No shake! No taking funny transport! Only leg, claw, wing must be used to see them where they need be going.<page=S>Carry the deliverings safe-safe, miss courier! Cared for like your own shell.
original_zh_text: 等等！出发前得知道：所有货物必须轻拿轻放！<page>不准磕！不准晃！只能用腿脚翅膀运送！<page>要当成自己甲壳一样护着货！
translated_text: <page=T>ちょっと待ってください、配達さん!出発する前に、すべての出産には非常に注意が必要です!<page=S>衝突なし!揺れるな!冗談はやめて!彼らは足、爪、翼を使ってどこに行くかを決めます。<page=S>安全な配達、安全な配達、配達ミス!自分の殻のように世話をしなさい。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Wait a minute, Deliveryman! Before you leave, all births need to be very careful!<page=S>No collision! don't move! stop joking! They use their feet, claws and wings to decide where to go.<page=S>Safe delivery, safe delivery, delivery miss! Take care of them like your own shell.

original_en_text: <page=T>Those good-goods, all packed fresh for the clever fleas. Take thems up for us, miss courier. Maybe new friends you might be making with your service? Yes-yes?
original_zh_text: 给聪明跳蚤们的新鲜货。送去说不定能交新朋友？对、对吧？
translated_text: <page=T>これらの良い商品は、スマートなノミのための新鮮なパッケージです。配達人さん、これを手に入れてください。あなたのサービスを通じて新しい友達を作ることができます。そうですか？
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>These good goods are a fresh package for smart fleas. Deliverer, please get this. You can make new friends through your services. is that right?

original_en_text: Bzzt! Who’s bothering me now?! Leave the great Yarnaby in peace! Shoo shoo!
original_zh_text: 滋滋！谁在聒噪？！让伟大的雅纳碧静静！去去去！
translated_text: ハミング!今誰が邪魔してるんだ!偉大なるアナビを安らかに!シーッ!シーッ!
secondary_translated_text: humming! Who's bothering me now! May the great Anabi rest in peace! Shh! Shh!

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sick, madam, and badly in need of your service. I’ve become host to a vile infestation. It leeches my strength, and attempts to wrest control of my shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我身体抱恙，女士，需要您诊治。壳里寄生了恶心玩意，不仅吸我气力，还想夺舍躯体。
translated_text: <hpage>私は病気で、あなたのサービスが必要です。私は卑劣な侵略のホストになりました。それは私の力を吸い取り、私の殻を制御しようとする。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I am ill and need your service. I have become the host of a despicable invasion. It sucks my power and tries to control my shell.

original_en_text: Halfwits, the lot of them! Such grand achievement, wrought by Yarnaby! A bug healed full by my marvellous machine!<page>A few weaklings expire, and they all raise their claws. Is there no place for progress in their tiny minds?!
original_zh_text: 全是蠢材！这是雅纳碧创造的奇迹！被神机治愈的病患！<page>死几个弱虫就举爪抗议！他们的小脑仁就这么容不下进步？！
translated_text: 半分賢い、それらの多く。これはYarnabyが作った大きな成果です!このエラーは私の魔法のマシンで完全に治癒しました!<page>数人の弱い者が死に、手を上げた。彼らの小さな脳には進歩の余地がないのか？
secondary_translated_text: Smart half, many of them. This is a great achievement that Yarnaby has made! This error was completely cured with my magic machine!<page>Several weak men died and raised their hands. is there no room for improvement in their little brains?

original_en_text: Bellhart’s lost much of its lustre, but we still offer some comfort to the pilgrims who climb this high.
original_zh_text: 钟心镇是风光不再了，但还能为登高的朝圣者提供些慰藉。
translated_text: ベルハルトはその輝きのほとんどを失いましたが、私たちはまだこのような高さに登る巡礼者に慰めを提供します。
secondary_translated_text: Although Berhardt has lost most of its splendor, we still offer comfort to pilgrims who climb to such heights.

original_en_text: <page>Dear resident! To see you return alive is such a glimmer of light, even as the dark descends upon us all.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I had not expected so many to survive. The destruction beyond these bells suggested worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! Would be worse, but for your tall warrior friend, her of those shining rings, who so fortunately chose our town to camp.<page>That brave bug now acts alone to guard our town and those pilgrims who flee for it.<page>For her efforts, our shells have stayed safe, though how long she can remain at that task... I do not dare to consider.
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！看到您平安归来，就像一道萤火驱散了钟心镇的黑暗。<hpage>想不到有如此多朝圣者幸存，镇外的景象可是惨烈得很。<page>情况确实本应更糟！但幸运的是有您这样的勇士驻守。<page>正是有您的保护，朝圣者们才能逃难至此。<page>有您在，镇子才能暂时安全，但不知这景象能维持多久……
translated_text: <page>親愛なる住人たち!あなたが生きて帰ってくるのを見ることは、たとえ暗闇が私たち全員に降りかかるとしても、光の束です。<hpage>すべての巡礼者がここに集まっているこんなに多くの人が生き残るとは思わなかった。これらの時計の外の損傷はさらに悪いことを示す。<page>本当にそうです!事態は悪化するはず!輝く指輪をした背の高い戦士の友人がいなければ、彼女は私たちの小さな町のキャンプを選んで幸運だったでしょう。<page>この勇敢な昆虫は今、私たちの町とここから逃げる巡礼者を守るために単独で行動します。<page>彼女の努力のおかげで、私たちの貝殻はまだ安全ですが、彼女がいつまで持ちこたえることができますか私はそれを考える勇気がありません。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Dear residents! To see you come home alive is a bundle of light, even if the darkness falls on all of us.<hpage>I didn't expect so many people, all pilgrims gathered here, to survive. Damage to the outside of these watches indicates that it is even worse.<page>It really is! Things should be getting worse! If she hadn't had a tall warrior friend with a shining ring, she would have been lucky to have chosen our little town camp.<page>This brave insect will now act alone to protect our town and the pilgrims fleeing from here.<page>Thanks to her efforts, our shell is still safe, but how long she can endure it I don't have the courage to think about it.

original_en_text: My brother, Pill, still out there. Help-help others he must be, taking good-goods all across. I’m is only hope he stay safe-safe, but gone long is Pill. Too long!<page>On the wishwall, I’m placed my wish-wish, that my brother returns to me, and these bells of safety’s safe.<hpage>I shall check the wall, Tipp. If your wish aligns with my journey, I may track him down.
original_zh_text: 我兄弟皮尔还在外面送、送货，他肯定还在帮、帮别的虫，但去太久了！<page>我在祈愿墙上许、许了愿：希望他平安归来，还有钟心镇也永远平安。<hpage>我会查看祈愿墙，蒂普。若是顺路，或许能找到他的踪迹。
translated_text: 弟のピエールは逃亡中です。人を助け、美しいものを世界中に運んでいるに違いない。彼の安全を確認したかったのですが、薬がなくなりました。お久しぶりです!<page>願い事の壁に、私は願い事を書きました。兄が私のもとに戻ってきて、この鐘が無事であることを願って。<hpage>私は壁をチェックします、ティップ。あなたの願いが私の旅と一致すれば、私は彼を見つけることができます。
secondary_translated_text: My brother, Pierre, is on the run. He must be helping people and carrying beautiful things around the world. I wanted to make sure he was safe, but my medicine was gone. long time no see you!<page>On the wall of wishes, I wrote a wish. I hope that my brother will come back to me and that this bell will be safe.<hpage>I'll check the wall, Tip. If your wishes coincide with my journey, then I can find him.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. Given the hardships of the lands beyond these bells, your store seems in remarkable order. <page>Aye, well, we’ve had our tough times too! Of once bustling Bellhart, only a few residents now remain.<page>But things are turned around for old Frey! Ho, yes! The town at least feels briefly at peace, and my courier has returned with fresh goods to trade. <page>Whether pilgrim or traveller, mine is the finest store you’ll have the fortune to visit throughout our blighted lands.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。钟心镇外世道艰难，你这铺子倒打理得井井有条。<page>唉，我也吃过苦头的！往日热闹的钟心镇，如今只剩几口虫啦。<page>但老芙蕾时来运转！哈哈！镇子外总算消停会儿，送货虫也带新鲜货回来了。<page>不管是朝圣者还是旅者，走遍这破地儿也找不着比我家更棒的铺子！
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、店主。これらの鐘の向こうの土地の苦難を考えると、あなたの店は整然としているようです。<page>はい、私たちも大変な時を過ごしました!かつてにぎやかだったブルハルトには、現在はわずかな住民しか残っていない。<page>しかし、古いフレイの状況は逆転しました!ああ!はい!町は少なくとも一時的に落ち着き、宅配便が新鮮な商品を持って戻ってきました。<page>あなたが巡礼者であろうと旅行者であろうと、私の店は私たちの荒廃した土地で訪れることができた最高の店です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. Considering the hardships of the land beyond these bells, your shop seems to be in order.<page>Yes, we also had a hard time! Once a bustling town, Burkhart now has only a small number of inhabitants.<page>But the situation in the old Frey has been reversed! oh! yes! The town calmed down, at least temporarily, and courier flights returned with fresh goods.<page>Whether you are a pilgrim or a traveler, my shop is the best one you could visit in our desolate land.

translated_text: プライベートスパで
secondary_translated_text: In a private spa

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, shopkeeper. Your shelves are looking better stocked. I see the courier made their way back to you safely.<page>Oh yes, the cheeky little so-and-so came by and dropped his cargo off at last.<page>Poor dear was so shaken by his misadventures, I almost didn’t have the heart to dock his earnings.<page>All’s well now, though! Take a look at the lovely new goods I have available!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。货架充实不少，看来送货虫平安归来了。<page>可不，那小滑头终于把货带到了。<page>可怜虫吓得够呛，我都不忍扣他工钱。<page>现在齐活啦！瞧瞧这些新宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>再びマスターに挨拶。あなたの棚はよく見える。使者は無事に戻ってきた。<page>ああ、はい、生意気な小さな男が来て、物事を落としました。<page>かわいそうな赤ん坊は彼の不幸にショックを受け、私は彼の収入を差し引く勇気がなかった。<page>でも今は大丈夫!新商品をご覧ください!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings to the Master again. Your shelves look good. The messenger has returned safely.<page>Oh, yes, a naughty little man came and dropped things off.<page>The poor baby was shocked by his misfortune, and I had no courage to subtract his income.<page>But now I'm fine! Check out the new products!

original_en_text: Ohhhh! She is here! The rare birthling! Precious child of Wyrm and Weaver!<page>Spawn of those who dared to flee. She has found her way home... at last.<page>How fine her shell, and Silk, and claw... For you, mother... let me claim her all for you!
original_zh_text: 哦哦哦！她来了！稀世子嗣！沃姆与织者的结晶！<page>逃亡者的后代，终于归乡……<page>多么完美的甲壳、灵丝与利爪……母亲啊……让我将她献予您！
translated_text: おぉ!来たぞ!珍しい誕生!ヴィムとウィーバーの子供たち!<page>逃げた者の子孫。彼女は家に帰る道を見つけた。最後に、<page>彼女の贝壳やや爪の薄さはあなたのに、母さん。彼女から全てを奪わせて!
secondary_translated_text: oh! he's here! An unusual birth! The children of Wim and Weaver!<page>The descendants of those who fled. She found her way home. Lastly,<page>Her shell and fingernails are somewhat thinner than yours, mother. let her take everything from her!

original_en_text: A fine purchase you’ve made! Allow us a moment and we’ll get it set up in your bellhome.
original_zh_text: 好买卖！稍等就给你装点进钟居。
translated_text: なんと美しいものを買った!ちょっと待ってください。荷物に入れておきます。
secondary_translated_text: What a beautiful thing I bought! Please wait a minute. I'll put it in my luggage.

original_en_text: Ah! That relic you possess! A cylinder of the Citadel’s sacred vault! That there is a mighty find. You will give it, yes?<hpage>I will not, seeker. To extract what knowledge it holds, this cylinder requires a listening device, one you do not possess.<hpage>If it were passed, whatever secrets it contains would remain forever hidden from us both.<page>Pah... If it will not speak to me, I do not want it! Don’t trouble me until you have something worth my taking!
original_zh_text: 啊！你手里那东西！圣堡秘库的音筒！这可是大发现。交给我吧？<hpage>不行，要听取其中知识，需要特殊机械，而你没有。<hpage>现在交出来，是埋没了它。<page>嘁……哑巴筒子我也不稀罕！弄到真宝贝再来！
translated_text: あっ! あっ!あなたが持っている遺産!円筒城の神聖なドーム!大きな発見がありました。あなたはそれを与えますよね？<hpage>私はしない、探検家。シリンダーに含まれる知識を抽出するためにはリスニングデバイスが必要ですが、あなたにはありません。<hpage>それが通過すれば、それに含まれる秘密は永遠に私たちから隠されます。<page>父は..。それが私に話しかけなければ、私はそれを望まない!取る価値のあるものがあるまで邪魔しないでください!
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! The legacy you have! The sacred dome of the cylindrical castle! We made a big discovery. you're going to give it to me, right?<hpage>I don't, explorer. You need a listening device to extract the knowledge contained in the cylinder, but you don't have it.<hpage>If it passes, the secrets it contains will be hidden from us forever.<page>My father is... If it doesn't speak to me, I don't want it! Don't bother until you have something worth taking!

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings, all broken-broke? Would you try-try again, miss courier? Pharloom’s bugs are so much in need of your help!
original_zh_text: <page=T>货全毁、毁了？要再试一次吗？大伙可全指、指望您啦！
translated_text: <page=T>配達は破産したのか？“ミス·メッセンジャー、もう一度試してみてください。Pharloomのバグはあなたの助けが必要です!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>did the delivery go bankrupt? "Miss Messenger, please try again." Pharloom bugs need your help!

original_en_text: Bonva, traveller! You have the oil! Will you allow me to work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 旅者！你真的带秘油来了！可以让我用在你的针刃上？
translated_text: ボンワ、旅人!油がある!あなたの剣に奇跡を起こさせてくれる？
secondary_translated_text: Bonwa, traveller! There's oil! will you let your sword work a miracle?

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<page>Now! I insist you enjoy our remaining hospitality, if only for a moment. We’ve wares to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you’ll find ours as cosy a stop as can be offered in these ailing lands.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<page>希望您能好好感受圣途前最后的余温！这里有货可购，有乐可享！<page>即便衰微，钟心镇仍是这病土中最温馨的歇脚处！
translated_text: ようこそ、疲れた巡礼者!栄光のベルハルトはその最盛期を過ごしたかもしれませんが、城の前の最後の停留所のままです。<page>美しいパヴォよ、私の仕事はあなたのように死んだ人々の優しさに敬意を表することです!<page>今だ!私はあなたが私たちの残りの部分を楽しむことを主張します。買うべきもの、楽しむべきサービスがあります!<page>私たちの減少した状態でも、これらの病気の地域で快適な停留所を提供することができます。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, weary pilgrim! The glorious Berhardt may have lived through its heyday, but it remains the last stop in front of the castle.<page>My job, beautiful Pavo, is to honor the kindness of those who have died like you! "<page>now! I insist that you enjoy the rest of us. There are things to buy, services to enjoy!<page>Even in our diminished state, we can provide a comfortable resting place in these sick areas.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! I can sense that you are ailing. Has the black curse struck even your sturdy shell?<hpage>This illness stems from a different source, Pavo. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 哎朋友，你脸色不太好啊！帕沃一眼就瞧出来了。难道连你那坚硬的外壳，也被黑色的诅咒侵蚀了吗？<hpage>不，帕沃，这病根源另有其处，我体内寄生着异物，靠蛮力根本无法将它驱除。<hpage>你知道有谁能帮我摆脱异物吗？养疗师，医师都行？<page>有认识的医师吗？嗯……的确有过一个……不过是个恶魔！她行事冷酷，手段粗野。为了钟心镇的安宁，我们众口一辞，驱逐了她！<page>她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: 病気の友人!病気になるのを感じる。黒い呪いはあなたの殻に当たったか？<hpage>この病気は様々なソースから来ています。寄生虫は私の中に根付き、私だけでは根絶できません。<hpage>教えてください、助けてくれる人を知っていますか？セラピストか医者か？<page>ドクター？よし...。かつては恐ろしい悪魔がいた!彼女の行動は冷酷で失礼だった。名誉あるバーハルトの健康のために、我々は満場一致で彼女を追放する。<page>どこへ行ったのか分からないが、鐘の向こうの世界は危険に満ちている。もしあなたが彼女のサービスを求めなければならないなら、彼女はあまり遠くまで行かないと思う
secondary_translated_text: A sick friend! I feel like I'm sick. did the black curse hit your shell?<hpage>This disease comes from a variety of sources. The parasites are rooted in me and I cannot eradicate them alone.<hpage>Tell me, do you know anyone who can help you? a therapist or a doctor?<page>doctor? okay, okay. Once upon a time, there was a terrible demon! Her behavior was cold and rude. For the health of the honourable Berhardt, we unanimously expel her.<page>I don't know where I've gone, but the world beyond the bell is full of danger. I don't think she'll go too far if you have to ask for her services

original_en_text: Welly, nay? Certainly you make the safer choice. Better to keep one’s shell intact.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！保命要紧，理解理解。
translated_text: ウィリーですよね？もちろん、より安全な選択をすることができます。殻はそのままにしたほうがいい。
secondary_translated_text: it's willy, right? Of course, you can make a safer choice. It is better to leave the shell as it is.

original_en_text: <page=T>Supplies for the rest-stop in the fields. We is used to like this delivering, when we was young and muchly brave.
original_zh_text: <page=T>远野驿站的补给，我们年轻时也经常送这里的货。
translated_text: <page=T>フィールド休息用品。私たちが若くて勇敢だった頃、私たちはこの配達方法に慣れていました。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Field rest supplies. When we were young and brave, we were used to this method of delivery.

original_en_text: This town feel safe, just, but I’m is worries for others. Is Pharloom needing its good-goods?<page>Many bugs helped by us couriers, me and brother Pill. Special now when danger grows big-big.
original_zh_text: 镇子暂时安全，但我担心别处，其他虫不需要货、货物吗？<page>我们送货虫兄弟俩，我和皮尔，可帮过不少虫。尤其现在世道这么凶、凶险。
translated_text: この町は安全だが、他の町が心配だ。ファロは良い商品が必要ですか？<page>宅配便のピール兄弟と私は多くの虫を助けました。これは危険が大きくなっている今特別なことです
secondary_translated_text: This town is safe, but I worry about other towns. Do you need a good product?<page>My courier brother and I helped many bugs. This is something special now, when the danger is growing.

original_en_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the board, you did! Heading out after my stray courier, then?<hpage>My own tasks see me travel far, shopkeeper. If, on my journey, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send them your way.<page>Then you’ll have my thanks and more! It’s a rare bug who’d brave the wilds to aid a fellow.
original_zh_text: 我看见了！你接了我的祈愿？要去找我那跑丢的送货虫？<hpage>我本就需要远行，店主。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那可多谢了！如今肯为同类闯进荒野的虫可太难找了！
translated_text: 見たよ!私の願いを黒板から取り除いたあなたはそれをした!放浪の使者を探しに行くのか？<hpage>ボス、私自身の任務は長い道のりを要しました。もし私が旅行中にこのミッシングエラーに出くわしたら、必ずあなたに送ります。<page>もっと感謝します。誰かを助けるために勇敢に荒野に入ることはまれな間違いです。
secondary_translated_text: I saw it! You took my wish off the blackboard and you did it! are you going to look for the messenger of the wandering?<hpage>Boss, my own mission has taken me a long way. If I come across this missing error while traveling, I will definitely send it to you.<page>Thank you more. Bravely going into the wilderness to help someone else is a rare mistake.

original_en_text: For a spool bearing no Silk, it’s surprisingly heavy. Do you think perhaps it could be a gift left behind by the old creeping ones?
original_zh_text: 虽是空的灵丝轴，但却挺沉。莫非是古织者留下的？
translated_text: 絹のない巻物にしては、その重さは驚異的です。これは古い爬虫類からの贈り物かもしれないと思いますか？
secondary_translated_text: For a scroll without silk, its weight is staggering. Do you think this could be a gift from an old reptile?

original_en_text: If you really must find that wretched physician, speak to the old hermit lurking beneath Bellhart. He knows much more than he admits of the world...
original_zh_text: 如果您执意要寻找那庸医，可以问问镇子下方的老隐士。他肚子里藏的秘密可不少……
translated_text: 本当にかわいそうな医者を探したいのなら、ベルハルトの下に隠れている老人の隠者を探しなさい。彼は自分が認める以上に世界を知っている。
secondary_translated_text: If you really want to find a poor doctor, look for the old man's hermit hiding under Berhardt. He knows the world more than he admits.

original_en_text: Welly, done! What miracle to work again upon steel so fine. Few pins left in Pharloom could attain such a sheen!<page>You must tell me, traveller, wherever did you come upon so splendid a weapon?<hpage>The blade was a gift, given by a noble tribe of my homeland. They forged the strongest steel, though it was rarely seen beyond their hive.<hpage>That tribe has now long passed, and with them the secrets to their craft.<page>Ahhh. If they are gone, it’s a rarer piece than would be guessed! But what grand luck for this humble pinmaster to have worked with such a weapon!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！成啦！圣油配上如此精钢，真是奇迹。纺络还剩几根针能有此锋芒！<page>旅者，我得问问你，哪里得来如此神兵？<hpage>故土一贵族部落所赠，其族以锻钢之术闻名，但成品鲜少外流。<hpage>该族早已灭绝，其锻造秘技随之消逝。<page>唉呀！竟然还是件孤品！我这卑微针匠能照料此针，也是三生有幸！
translated_text: ウィリー、やった!このような高品質の鋼材を再び使用できるのは奇跡です。ファルに残されたわずかなピンは、この輝きを達成することができます!<page>旅行者、教えてくれ、どこでこんな美しい武器を見つけたの？<hpage>このナイフは私の国の貴族からの贈り物でした。彼らは最も強い鋼を鍛造したが、蜂の巣の外ではめったに見られなかった。<hpage>部族はとっくに存在せず、彼らの工芸の秘密は消えてしまった。<page>ああ、もし消えてしまったら、思っていた以上にレアな作品になるでしょう!しかし、この謙虚な鍛冶屋は本当に幸運にもそのような武器を使用できました。
secondary_translated_text: Willie, I did it! It is a miracle that such high quality steel can be used again. The few pins left in the fallout can achieve this brilliance!<page>Traveler, tell me, where did you find such a beautiful weapon?<hpage>This knife was a gift from the nobility of my country. They forged the strongest steel, but it was rarely seen outside the beehive.<hpage>The tribes have long since disappeared, and the secrets of their craft have disappeared.<page>Oh, and if it were to disappear, it would be a rarer piece than I thought! However, this humble blacksmith was really fortunate enough to use such a weapon.

translated_text: 蓄音機
secondary_translated_text: Recorder

original_en_text: <page=T>Good-goods for the pilgrims up high! Thems brave ones, settled up on that big-big Citadel.<page=S>These deliverings they will muchly need, miss courier. Carry them safe-safe, for us!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给高处朝圣者的货！敢待在圣、圣堡，都是勇士。<page=S>都是要紧物资，救星小姐务必平、平安送到！
translated_text: <page=T>巡礼者のための良いものをアップ!彼らは勇敢な人々であり、巨大な城に定住した。<page=S>店員さん、これが必要です。彼らの安全を確保する!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Up the good stuff for the pilgrims! They were a brave people and settled in a huge castle.<page=S>Shopkeeper, I need this. Ensure their safety!

original_en_text: Bzz-zzt! You hesitate! But your fear of my Extricator is born from mere ignorance, and you can overcome it with effort. Take a moment. Reconsider!
original_zh_text: 滋——滋！犹豫什么！怕剥离机是你无知！给你点时间，再想想！
translated_text: ハミング!躊躇している!しかし、私の解放者に対するあなた方の恐れは、純粋な無知から生じ、努力によって克服することができます。時間をかけて。考えてみろ!
secondary_translated_text: humming! You are hesitating! But your fear of my Deliverer arises from pure ignorance and can be overcome by effort. Take some time. think about it!

original_en_text: The great Yarnaby can rid you of those nasty “roots”, but to crack your stiff shell my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 本神医能治你体内的“根须”。但要撬开壳，得先升级剥离机！
translated_text: 偉大なヤーナビーはあなたの迷惑な“ルーツ”を取り除くことができますが、あなたのハードシェルをクラックするには、私の強力なリベレーターがアップグレードする必要があります!
secondary_translated_text: The great Yannabi can get rid of your annoying "roots," but to crack your hard shell, you need to upgrade my powerful liberator!

original_en_text: Hello again! Fancy buying something special before your tasks whisk you away?
original_zh_text: 又来啦！出远门前不挑点特别的？
translated_text: また会えた!ミッションを離れる前に何か特別なものを買いたいですか？
secondary_translated_text: We met again! Do you want to buy something special before you leave the mission?

original_en_text: <hpage>Couriers, I require a rasher of meat, for an old bug in the Citadel. Can you prepare it for me?<page=T>A bug up-up? Theys knows our finest food? If theys appreciate, we can prepare it most prompt! Miss courier has only to ask.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我需要熏肉送给圣堡老虫，能帮忙准备吗？<page=T>上头有虫识货？随时都能准备！救星小姐知会一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>使者たち、城の古い虫に対処するために肉の山が必要です。私のために準備してくれますか？<page=T>アップグレードエラー？最高の食べ物を知っていますか？気に入ったら、できるだけ早く準備します!店員さんは尋ねるだけです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Messengers, we need a mountain of meat to deal with the old bugs in the castle. can you get it ready for me?<page=T>Upgrade error? Do you know the best foods? If you like it, prepare it as soon as possible! The clerk just asks.

original_en_text: A sturdy desk is the heart of any bellhome! Use it to take stock of your situation or organise your artefacts.
original_zh_text: 一张结实桌子可是钟居的核心！理货记账必备。
translated_text: 頑丈なデスクは、ベルの家の中心にあります!あなたの状況を評価したり、アイテムを整理するために使用します。
secondary_translated_text: A sturdy desk is in the heart of Bell's home! Use it to assess your situation or to organize items.

original_en_text: These roots that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something inside a body that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 折磨你的“根须”……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！
translated_text: 根はあなたを苦しめる。詳しくは知りませんが、大丈夫です!<page>あなたの体から何かを取り出さなければならない場合は、偉大なYarnaby ' s Extricatorを使用します!それが唯一の希望だ、シーッ!
secondary_translated_text: The roots will afflict you. I don't know the details, but it's okay!<page>If you have to get something out of your body, use the great Yarnaby's Extricator! That's the only hope, Shhhh!

original_en_text: You’d ask my aid, but won’t assist yourself? Then leave! Remain suffering, and stop being a bother to me, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 想求医却不帮忙？滚！继续遭罪去吧，别来烦我，滋滋！
translated_text: 自分を助けずに私に助けを求めますか？そして出て行け!苦しみ続けて、私を悩ませないでください。
secondary_translated_text: do you ask me to help you without helping yourself? and get out! Please continue to suffer and don't bother me.

original_en_text: Fellow resident! The world quakes and crumbles, but while my shell stays safe, my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: 我が同胞の皆さん!世界は揺れ、崩壊しましたが、私の殻はまだ安全ですが、私の店はまだ開いています。
secondary_translated_text: My fellow citizens! The world has shaken and collapsed, but my shell is still safe, but my shop is still open.

original_en_text: Welly, nay? You hold the precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you deny a pinmaster their work? There is only I alive to work with such a wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！你怎么私藏圣油？不让针匠干活？整个纺络只剩我能用此圣物！
translated_text: ウィリーですよね？貴重なオイルを自分のために保存しますか？音楽教師の仕事を断った理由は何ですか？生きていてこそ、このような素晴らしい物質と仕事ができるのです。
secondary_translated_text: it's willy, right? Do you keep your precious oil for yourself? Why did you refuse the job of music teacher? It is only by being alive that we can work with such wonderful materials.

original_en_text: Find that wretched physician fast, dear resident! I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 老乡啊，要找她得赶快了！她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。<page>若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: 親愛なる住民よ、かわいそうな医者を見つけてください!どこへ行ったのか分からないが、鐘の向こうの世界は危険に満ちている。<page>もしあなたが彼女のサービスを求めなければならないなら、彼女はあまり遠くまで行かないと思う
secondary_translated_text: Dear inhabitants, please find the poor doctor! " I don't know where I've gone, but the world beyond the bell is full of danger.<page>I don't think she'll go too far if you have to ask for her services

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket, what is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. It is only I. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Blame, is it? Pah. Those who come after us can apportion blame as they see fit.<page>For now, my collection is the only thing that matters! I must protect it!
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，是我。抱歉打扰到了您。<page>跟我有什么好说抱歉的，你在外头做的事自有后虫评判。<page>眼下我的珍藏最要紧！得保护好了！
translated_text: 何だ？これからどうするんだ？この大きな音は？それは何だ？<hpage>こんにちは、奥様。私は孤独です。もしあなたがこの土地の分断に不安を感じているなら、私も責任を負うことになるでしょう。<page>変だよね？うわー。私たちに従う者は、適切と思われる場合に責任を共有できます。<page>今のところ、私のコレクションは重要です!守らなければ!
secondary_translated_text: what's that? what are we gonna do now? what's this loud noise? what is that?<hpage>Hello, Madam. I'm lonely. If you feel uneasy about the division of this land, then I too will be responsible for it. "<page>it's weird, isn't it? Wow. Those who follow us can share the responsibility when it seems appropriate.<page>For now, my collections are important! We have to protect!

original_en_text: <page=S>A delivery deadly, dangerous, fiercably cold, for old bug up there that does need it much-much! Serves us all he does, so we serve back.<page=T>And great test for you, miss courier! Most challenging-challenge this. The lacquer to bring is sloshy-slosh. A hard carry even for the best.<hpage>I have met this maker. His is a long service, worthy of respect. I will be glad to aid his efforts.
original_zh_text: <page=S>急单！但危险！把液状漆送给山上的老工匠。他造福大伙，我们得回报。<page=T>救星小姐，这可是巨、巨大挑战！液状漆晃荡难带，专业送货虫都犯、犯难。<hpage>我敬重这位匠师，乐意相助。
translated_text: <page=S>本当に必要な古いバグのために、それは致命的で危険な、冷たい配達です!彼がしたことはすべて我々のためだったので、我々は反撃する。<page=T>これはあなたのための素晴らしいテストです、配達人!最も難しい課題はこれです。あなたが必要とするペイントは貧弱です。最高のものでさえ、困難なプロセスです。<hpage>このプロデューサーは見たことがある。彼の献身は長く、尊敬に値する。私は喜んで彼の努力を助けます。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>For a really needed old bug, it's deadly and dangerous, cold delivery! We will fight back, because everything he did was for us.<page=T>This is a great test for you, delivery man! This is the most difficult task. The paint you need is poor. Even the best ones are a difficult process.<hpage>I've seen this producer. His dedication is long and deserves respect. I am happy to help him in his efforts.

original_en_text: <page=S>Deliverings for the waystation in the fields at Pharloom’s edge, a small rest-stop, still serving.<page=S>This journey is maybe not so very hard for you, miss courier? We think you is perfect for this wish!
original_zh_text: <page=S>给远野驿站的货，那小站还在营业。<page=S>对您不算难吧？您是最合适的人选！
translated_text: <page=S>Farhamの端にあるフィールドのトランジットステーションを予約してください。これはまだ使用されている小さな休憩所です。<page=S>宅配便さん、この旅は大変でしたか？あなたはその願いにぴったりだと思います!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Please book a transit station in the field at the edge of Farham. This is a small rest area that is still in use.<page=S>Mr. Courier, was this trip hard? I think you're just right for that wish!

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, travellers all! Rest your weary shell and revive your flagging spirit!<page>Bellhart! Glorious, gleaming, and very very safe! Stay a while before you begin your final climb!
original_zh_text: 欢迎诸位旅者！请尽情舒展甲壳，养好精神！<page>这里是钟心镇！辉煌、璀璨，更重要的是十分安全！启程前不妨多留一会！
translated_text: ようこそ、ようこそ、すべての乗客!疲れた体を休ませ、無気力な心をリフレッシュしましょう!<page>ベルハート!明るく、明るく、非常に安全です!最後の登りが始まる前に停止!
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, welcome, all passengers! Let your tired body rest and refresh your lethargic mind!<page>belheart! Bright, bright, and very safe! Stop before the last climb begins!

original_en_text: Go and rest! Bzzt! Free yourself of your trifling ailment and leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby has no time for petty maladies!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 歇着去！滋滋！小病自己治，别烦我！本神医不接轻症！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: 休憩を取れ!ハミング!些細な病気から解放され、安らかに眠りましょう!大柳は些細な病気に対処する時間がない!<hpage>はい、私はあなたの時間を無駄にしたくない。
secondary_translated_text: Take a break! humming! Let us be free from petty illnesses and rest in peace!Ōyagi doesn't have time to deal with a trivial illness!<hpage>Yes, I don't want to waste your time.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then, and it seems your store is still well-stocked.<page>Oh yes, even my supplier is back to work, so I have plenty of goods to show you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>啊哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。而且……你这铺子货还挺全。<page>可不！连送货虫都平安回来了，新到的好货随你挑！
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、店主。絹の痛みからかなり回復しているようですね。<page>あっ! あっ!私は賢い昆虫です。奇妙な糸が上から落ちてくると、私は口を閉じて時計室にうずくまった。<page>他の人には問題かもしれませんが、私の店は在庫が豊富なので、飢える心配はありません。<hpage>あなたの準備は非常に役立ち、あなたの店はまだ十分な在庫を持っているようです。<page>ああ、はい、私のサプライヤーも戻ってきているので、たくさんの商品をお見せします!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. You seem to be recovering pretty much from the pain of silk.<page>ah! ah! I am a clever insect. When a strange thread fell from above, I closed my mouth and crouched in the clock room.<page>It may be a problem for others, but my store has plenty of stock, so I don't have to worry about starving.<hpage>Your preparation is very helpful and it seems that your store still has enough stock.<page>Oh, yes, my supplier is back too, so I'll show you lots of products!

original_en_text: Welly now! You have the oil, traveller! Allow me to bring about a shine bright as none before!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！你拿到油了，旅者！该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！
translated_text: ウィリー、今!石油を持っている、旅行者!前例のない光をお届けします!
secondary_translated_text: Willie, now! You've got the oil, traveler! We will bring you unprecedented light!

translated_text: 文化財の寄贈？
secondary_translated_text: Donation of cultural property?

original_en_text: But, hold! There is something more about you... I’ve sliced the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those plain, greying innards! Yours are something else entirely!<page>It tickles at my mind, still! Bzzt! What is it of your shell that eludes even my perfect, precise perception?<page>Would you show me, specimen? Go on! Let the great Yarnaby peer at your deeper, darker secrets!<hpage>I’ve no desire to see my shell pried into further, healer. Your service has succeeded, and taken its toll in pain. I hope only that I never again need to seek your aid.
original_zh_text: 慢着！你壳里还有料……本神医剖过无数病壳！全是灰扑扑的！你的截然不同！<page>滋滋！到底是什么连本神医都看不透？<page>让我瞧瞧，病患！快！让本神医看看你藏着什么黑暗秘密！<hpage>我不想再被剖壳，医师。治疗虽然成功，但代价着实巨大。希望我们永远不用再见。
translated_text: しかし、Hold On!もっとあります。私は無数の汚れた巡礼者の殻を切った!普通の灰色の内臓!あなたのは全く別のものです!<page>それはまだ私を悩ます!ハミング!あなたの殻の中には、完璧に正確に知覚できないものがありますか？<page>サンプルを見せてもらえますか？続けろ!あなたのより深く暗い秘密を、偉大なヤナビに垣間見てもらおう!<hpage>私はこれ以上殻が開かれるのを見たくない、セラピスト。あなたのサービスは成功し、痛みを伴う代償を払った。もう二度とあなたの助けを求める必要がないことを願っている。
secondary_translated_text: But, hold on! There is more. I have cut the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! Ordinary gray viscera! Yours is something entirely different!<page>That still bothers me! humming! Is there anything in your shell that you cannot perceive perfectly accurately?<page>can you show me a sample? Go ahead! Let the great Yanabi get a glimpse of your deeper and darker secrets!<hpage>I don't want to see the shell open any more, therapist. Your service has been successful and paid a painful price. I hope I never have to ask for your help again.

original_en_text: If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your blade’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: あなたが長い道のりでより多くの石油を得るなら、できるだけ早く私にサービスを求めてください!あなたの鋭い刃の奥にどんな形が見つかるかわかりません!
secondary_translated_text: If you get more oil in the long way, please seek my service as soon as possible! You don't know what shape you'll find in the back of your sharp blade!

original_en_text: Gahh! Who keeps making all that racket out there?! Such horrid shaking and screaming. The crucial work is being spoiled! Bzzzt!
original_zh_text: 哼！外面谁在吵吵？！震动和尖叫没完没了的！我的研究正值关键时刻呢！滋滋！
translated_text: あっ! あっ!誰が外で大騒ぎしたの？そんな恐ろしい振動と悲鳴。重要な仕事が破壊された!ハミング!
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! who's making a fuss outside? Such terrible vibrations and screams. An important job has been destroyed! humming!

original_en_text: The operation... a success! The simpletons hiding in that blasted bellvein would shudder into dust if they saw how much I achieve without them!<hpage>Madam... I shan’t lie, that was an ordeal such as I have rarely suffered...<hpage>And yet, the parasite does seem to have been... unbound somewhat. Whatever remnant still lingers in my shell feels calmed, enough for me to claim its power as my own.<hpage>Perhaps this is a fortunate result after all.<page>Of course. Of course! Great Yarnaby has healed you! Shout it through the caverns. Scream it from the great spinning towers!<page>Just make sure they hear you in the so-called ‘civilised’ settlements of this ignorant land!
original_zh_text: 手术……成功！钟脉那帮庸才见这场面得吓成渣！<hpage>女士……不瞒您说，这真是毕生难忘的体验……<hpage>但寄生物似乎……松开了。残存部分很平静，反而能为我所用。<hpage>或许能算因祸得福了。<page>当然！本神医治好了你！快去各大洞穴传颂，去纺塔顶上喊出来！<page>让那些自诩“文明”的无知村镇都听听！
translated_text: 手術は成功!時計の血管に隠れている愚か者が、私が彼らなしで成し遂げたことを見たら、彼らは震えて塵に変わるでしょう!<hpage>マダム·..。嘘はつけないこれは私がめったに経験しない苦しみです。<hpage>寄生虫がいるようです。一部は無制限です。殻の中に残っているものが何であれ、私はその力を自分のものだと主張するのに十分な冷静さを感じた。<hpage>結局、それは幸運な結果かもしれません。<page>もちろんです!もちろんです!ヤナビが癒してくれる!洞窟の中で叫ぶ。大回転塔からの叫び!<page>この無知な土地のいわゆる“文明化された”集落であなたの声を聞いてください!
secondary_translated_text: The surgery was successful! If the fools hiding in the veins of the clock saw what I had accomplished without them, they would tremble and turn to dust!<hpage>Madam... I will not lie This is a suffering I rarely experience.<hpage>There seems to be a parasite. Some of them are unlimited. Whatever remained in the shell, I felt calm enough to claim that power was my own.<hpage>In the end, it may be a lucky outcome.<page>of course! of course! The Yannabi will heal you! Screaming in the cave. Screams from the Great Revolving Tower!<page>Listen to your voice in the so-called "civilized" settlements of this ignorant land!

original_en_text: A mighty collection of the past, is it not? If only I could hoard all of history here with me!
original_zh_text: 这等珍藏，够气派吧？我恨不得把全纺络的历史都囤在这儿！
translated_text: これは過去のコレクションですよね。私の歴史をここに隠すことができたら!
secondary_translated_text: This is a collection from the past, isn't it? If I could hide my history here!

original_en_text: Fellow resident, welcome home! The world may quake and crumble, and threaten its end, but while my shell stays safe my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来，好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: 住民の皆さん、お帰りなさい!世界は地震を起こし、崩壊し、その終わりを脅かすかもしれませんが、私の殻が安全である限り、私の店は営業し続けます。
secondary_translated_text: Residents, welcome home! The world may cause earthquakes and collapse, and threaten its end, but as long as my shell is safe, my shop will remain open.

original_en_text: Yes... yes! Bzzt! Finally, a specimen worthy of my mighty Extricator! My beautiful, unfairly-maligned Extricator! Come this way, bzzt...
original_zh_text: 对……对！滋滋！终于有配得上我伟大的剥离机的病例！来这边，滋滋……
translated_text: そうですね。はい!はい!ハミング!最後に、私の強力な解放者にふさわしい標本です!私の美しい、不当に中傷された抽出者!ここで、ブンブンという音が···。
secondary_translated_text: That's right, sir. yes! yes! humming! Finally, a worthy specimen for my mighty liberator! My beautiful, unjustly vilified extractor! And here is the sound of the bumbling...

original_en_text: By claw! Who is this bold warrior, standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>Merely a traveller, sir, though one whose blade could benefit from your service.<page>Your blade! Of course, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>If your weapon sharpened would see our lands that much safer, then honour decrees it receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?<hpage>
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！这位踏进普林尼的华美钟居还面不改色的勇士是谁！<hpage>过路客而已，不过针刃需要照料。<page>您的针刃！好说好说！是个针匠都看得出这针尖沾过多少条命。<page>如果磨利此针能保护镇子，自然应该优先照料！这就开始？
translated_text: 爪を使え!プリニウスの鐘楼の入り口に静かに立っている勇敢な兵士は誰ですか？<hpage>私はただの旅人ですが、彼の剣はあなたの奉仕から利益を得るかもしれません。<page>ナイフを持ってる!もちろん、戦士たちです!良い針職人なら誰でも針の端に致命的な痕跡を見つけることができます。<page>あなたの武器の鋭さが私たちの土地をより安全にするなら、名誉は私が守る運命にある!見てみましょう<hpage>
secondary_translated_text: Use your nails! Who is the brave soldier standing quietly at the entrance of the bell tower of Pliny?<hpage>I'm just a traveler, but his sword may profit from your service. "<page>He has a knife! The Warriors, of course! Any good needleworker can find a deadly mark on the tip of a needle.<page>If the sharpness of your weapons makes our land safer, then my honour is destined to be defended! " Let's take a look at it.<hpage>

original_en_text: Come back with those spines, or not at all! The great Yarnaby’s time is precious, bzzt! I will not be distracted from my work!
original_zh_text: 带棘刺来再敲门！本神医时间金贵，滋滋！没空分心！
translated_text: そのとげを取り戻せ、さもなければ何もない!ヤナビの時間は貴重です!私は仕事から気を取らない!
secondary_translated_text: Get that thorn back, or there's nothing! Yannabi's time is precious! I am not distracted from work!

original_en_text: Ahh... how welly romantic t’would’ve been, had the lost pilgrims struck me down beside her grave, to lie together forever as the world crumbles all ‘round...<page>But fortune has claimed otherwise! And perhaps ‘tis best for this humble pinmaster to continue his trade a little longer. These uncertain times will bring much new work, I should think!
original_zh_text: 啊……要是迷途朝圣者把我和她一块埋了，在崩塌世界里相拥长眠……该多浪漫……<page>但看来我命不该绝！或许纺络就是要我这卑微针匠多干几年。在这乱世，新活计可多着呢！
translated_text: あっ...。この失われた巡礼者が私を彼女の墓のそばに押して、世界が崩壊したときに永遠に一緒に横になっていたら、どんなにロマンチックなことだろう。<page>しかし、運命には別の説明がある!おそらく、この謙虚なミュージシャンは、もう少し仕事を続けた方がいいでしょう。この不確実性の時代は、多くの新しい雇用機会をもたらします!
secondary_translated_text: ah... How romantic it would be if this lost pilgrim pushed me by her grave and we were to lie together forever when the world collapsed.<page>But there is another explanation for fate! Perhaps, this humble musician would have better kept on working for a while longer. This era of uncertainty will bring many new job opportunities!

original_en_text: What’s this... twitching inside of you? A slave within a slave! Given over your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>A parasite has made its home within me. It saps my energy, and I can not purge it with strength alone...<page>Grnk. Lie down and die then, for all I care. Allow that wriggling thing its chance at life.<page>Or else... hff. Go seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 你壳里……有东西在扭？奴隶套奴隶！养着个更大的玩意？<hpage>寄生体在我壳里扎了根，单凭气力无法驱散它……<page>哼。那就躺平等死，让那玩意替你活。<page>或者……嗤。去找被镇子放逐的雅纳碧，听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: これは何だ？中で痙攣してるの？奴隷の中の奴隷!より大きなものを育てるために殻を捨てる？<hpage>寄生虫は私の中に定着した。それは私のエネルギーを消耗し、私は力だけではクリアできない。<page>グレンジャー。横になって死んでも構いませんそのうぬぼれたものに生きるチャンスを与えなさい。<page>または..。纪はベルハルト、ウナビに追放された者たちを探す。私の知る限り、彼女は荒野から追放されました。
secondary_translated_text: what is this? are you convulsing in there? A slave in a slave! throwing away the shell to grow something bigger?<hpage>The parasite has taken root in me. It drains my energy and I can't clear it with force alone.<page>Granger. I don't mind lying down and dying, give that stuff a chance to live.<page>Or maybe you... They are looking for those who have been exiled by Berhardt and Unabi. As far as I know, she was banished from the wilderness.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen upon more curiosities of this kingdom’s past, I may visit again. Until that time, keep yourself safe.
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！<hpage>若找到这王国的遗物，我会再来。在此之前，请多保重。
translated_text: そして、もっと!過去の遺物をもっとよこせ!記録、封印、偶像!世界の歴史を収集し、すべてを安全にここに保存しましょう!<hpage>もし私がこの王国の過去にもっと興味を持っていたら、また訪れるかもしれません。それまでは安全を確保してください。
secondary_translated_text: And more! " Give me more of the past! Record, seal, idol! Collect the history of the world and keep it all safe here!<hpage>If I were more interested in the past of this kingdom, I might visit again. Until then, make sure you are safe.

original_en_text: <page=T>More for you, miss courier! Lacquer, filled fresh, for the maker on the mount. We have much, so don’t worry for our supply. <page=S>To climb the frozen peak, it is a journey most difficult! Our thanks go full with you that tries again!
original_zh_text: <page=T>拿好，救星小姐！满满漆水送给山上匠师。货物管够！尽管送！<page=S>攀爬冰峰危险得很！多谢您原意冒险！
translated_text: <page=T>より多くの、配達女性!新しく充填された塗料は、山のメーカーのために準備ができています。たくさんありますので、供給を心配しないでください。<page=S>凍った山を登るのは、一番大変な旅です!改めて挑戦していただきありがとうございました!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>More, delivery women! The newly filled paint is ready for the manufacturer of the mountain. There are plenty of them, so don't worry about the supply.<page=S>Climbing a frozen mountain is the hardest journey ever! Thank you for taking the challenge again!

original_en_text: <page=T>More meats for you, miss courier! Best you be delivering it swiftly quick! If left not stored, our rasher’s flavour fast turns foul.
original_zh_text: <page=T>熏肉准备好啦！救星小姐快快出发！放久了会变味！
translated_text: <page=T>もっと肉を食べてください!できるだけ早く届けましょう!保存しないと、催涙剤の味がすぐに悪くなります。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Eat more meat, please! Let's get it delivered as soon as possible! If you don't store it, the tear-drink will quickly taste worse.

original_en_text: Shoo I say! Unless you’ve brought a worthy specimen, with something truly nasty inside them, bzzt! Otherwise, leave the great Yarnaby in peace!
original_zh_text: 说了走开！除非带够劲的病患来，壳里长真家伙的！不然别烦本神医！
translated_text: 私は嘘をつく!本当に迷惑な何かを持っている貴重な標本を持って来ない限り、うわー!そうでなければ、偉大なアナベを休ませなさい。
secondary_translated_text: I will lie! " Unless you bring a precious specimen that has something really annoying, wow! If not, then let the great Anabe rest.

original_en_text: Miss saving! Thanks again for you and your big-big blade! I’m is made it back, and grumpy grub-grub got her goods. She seemed happy, even!<page>I’m won’t be travelling out for a while-while methinks. Too many beasties! All about theys are. Even those pilgrims! All now going angry, a bit like old grub-grub.<hpage>This town remains safe for the moment, Tipp. You’re a smart bug to stay within its walls.
original_zh_text: 救星小姐！多亏了您，还有那柄长、长刀！我安全回来了，暴躁虫、虫婆婆也收到货啦！她可高兴呢！<page>我暂、暂时不出远门啦。外面全是发狂的野兽！连朝圣者都变凶了，跟虫婆婆一个德行。<hpage>眼下镇上还算安全，待在这里是明智选择。
translated_text: 節約が恋しい!あなたとあなたのナイフに再び感謝!私が戻ると、不機嫌なグラブグラブグラブが彼女のものを取っていました。彼女も幸せそうでした!<page>しばらく旅行はしないと思います。獣が多い!彼らのすべてです。巡礼者でも!みんな怒っていて、まるで古いもののようです。<hpage>ヒント：この町はまだ安全ですあなたは賢い虫であり、その壁にとどまることができます。
secondary_translated_text: I miss the savings! Thanks again for you and your knife! When I came back, the grumpy Grub Grub was taking hers. She seemed happy too!<page>I don't think I'll be traveling for a while. Lots of Beasts! It is all of them. Even the Pilgrims! Everybody is angry, and it seems like an old thing.<hpage>Tip: This town is still safe You are a clever worm and you can stay on its walls.

original_en_text: You’ve a good, solid bell up there, though its surface is showing its age. Why not have us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little flair!
original_zh_text: 你的钟屋结实但显旧。刷层护漆加点花纹如何？
translated_text: そこには立派で頑丈な時計があったが、表面はその年齢を示していた。なぜ新鮮なものにしないのか。コートとちょっとした才能!
secondary_translated_text: There was a fine, sturdy watch, but the surface showed its age. Why not make it fresh? A coat and a little talent!

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem hard at work, good bug. Are you a hunter, of a sort?<page>Of a simple sort, aye. I’m a pondcatcher around these parts. The last remaining, in fact! <page>Us few Bellharters are badly needing for fresh food, so my lone shell’s carrying quite the responsibility.<page>At least Shellwood Pond’s still full of good meat, ‘specially if your aim with a longpin’s as good as mine.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你似乎很忙，也是个猎手？<page>勉强算吧，我是个渔夫。全镇最后一个渔夫！<page>钟心镇的虫个个饥肠辘辘，担子全压我的壳上。<page>好在甲木林池塘鱼肥，像我这样擅使长针的总能带点收获回来。
translated_text: <hpage>頑張っているようですね、いい虫。あなたは一種のハンターですか？<page>とても簡単です、はい。私はこれらの地域で池のキャッチャーです。実際には、最後の1!<page>私たちの数少ないベルハルト人は新鮮な食べ物を必死に必要としていたので、私の孤独な体はかなりの責任を負いました。<page>少なくともシャーウッドの池には良い肉がたくさんあります。特にあなたの長い針が私のものと同じくらい正確であれば。
