secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You seem to be working hard, good bug. are you some kind of hunter?<page>It's very easy, yes. I am a pond catcher in these areas. Actually, the last one!<page>My lonely body bore a considerable responsibility, as our few Berhardtans were in desperate need of fresh food.<page>At least there's plenty of good meat in the Sherwood pond. Especially if your long needle is as accurate as mine.

original_en_text: My part’s been given, slave. We’ve no more need to speak.<page>Go and spin your spider’s web. Allow our kingdom’s restless soul its chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 东西给了，奴隶。不跟你废话了。<page>去织你的网吧。让这王国里躁动的灵魂烧个痛快。
translated_text: 私の仕事は終わった、奴隷。もう話す必要はない。<page>蜘蛛の巣を編む。私たちの王国の苦悩した魂に燃えるチャンスを与えなさい。
secondary_translated_text: My work is done, slave. I don't need to talk anymore.<page>Weaving a spider's web. Give the troubled souls of our kingdom a chance to burn.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more oil, pinmaster. Its acquisition was no small task, but if it aids my blade, those challenges will be well rewarded.<page>Even more oil? What preposterous luck! That unseen gift, in quantity unheard, discovered by a single bug!<page>Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for the ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我又得到秘油了，针匠。取之不易，但为了磨砺针刃，冒点风险也是值当。<page>还有秘油？您这运气！这老些圣物竟都被同一只虫找到了。<page>那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: <hpage>もっと油があるんだピンマスターそれを手に入れるのは大変な作業でしたが、私のブレードに役立っていれば、挑戦はうまくいきました。<page>もっと油？なんて馬鹿げた運だ!見えない贈り物の数は前代未聞でしたが、間違いが見つかりました!<page>乗客さん、オイルを渡してもらえますか？努力を続けられるロザリオはありますか？このミュージシャンが再びあなたのブレードに奇跡を起こしてみましょうか？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>There's more oil, Pinmaster, it was a hard job getting it, but if it helped my blade, the challenge went well.<page>More oil? What a ridiculous luck! The number of invisible gifts was unheard of, but a mistake was found!<page>passenger, can you pass me the oil? Is there a rosary that can help you keep on striving? Would you like this musician to do a miracle on your blade again?

original_en_text: An exquisite item, containing a cherished memory. I have an excellent memory myself, but I’m sure you can make good use of it.
original_zh_text: 用来记录珍贵记忆的雅物。我记性好用不着，不过你应该用得上。
translated_text: 貴重な思い出が詰まった美しい作品。私自身の記憶力は良いですが、あなたはそれを最大限に活用できると思います。
secondary_translated_text: A beautiful work filled with precious memories. My own memory is good, but I think you can make the most of it.

original_en_text: Don’t act the fool, specimen! Bzzt! Share more of yourself, that I may gain greater understanding! Learning! What other hope is there to save our blighted, thankless world?! <hpage>I have declined, bug. Whatever you seek, you shall not find it either upon or within my shell.
original_zh_text: 别装傻，病患！滋滋！奉献自己，帮助本神医领悟！不然怎么拯救这不知感恩的世界！<hpage>我拒绝，你所求之物不在我身上。
translated_text: ふりをするな、標本!ハミング!もっと自分を共有してもっと知りましょう!学ぼう!私たちの荒廃した感謝のない世界を救う希望は何でしょうか？<hpage>拒否した虫。あなたが探しているものは、私の殻の中にも、殻の中にも見つかりません。
secondary_translated_text: Don't pretend, specimen! humming! Let's share more of ourselves and learn more! Let's Learn! What is the hope of saving our devastated, thankless world?<hpage>The insect refused. What you are looking for is not to be found in my shell, nor in the shell.

original_en_text: <page>Miss traveller! Thanks to your valiant contributions, our little town’s starting to feel like its old self again. Homes have been hoisted, and the square shines!<hpage>I have seen the changes myself, Pavo. It is pleasing to hear my contributions have not been in vain. <page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide for others! We’ve only one thing now sorely missing...<page>Bugs! What is a town without its residents? Age, scarcity, deadly thread... Bellhart is beset by endless ills. Now there’s just us remaining few as you’ve met.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts, and as one small step to solving the problem, I have decreed a grand gift should be given! A bellhome of your very own!<page>A place to reflect. A bed to lay in. It’s hanging up there at the top, beside our good pinmaster. <hpage>I have no plans to settle, Pavo, but for now my task in Pharloom remains, and while it does, a residence may prove useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your fortitude inspires us all! And if trouble ever descends anew, it surely won’t hurt to have a resident warrior close at claw!
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！感谢您的无私奉献，钟心镇逐渐重现旧貌！屋舍纷纷重立，广场熠熠生辉！<hpage>镇上变化我也看在眼里，得知奉献没有付诸东流，很是欣慰。<page>正是！您的慷慨堪称楷模！现在只剩……<page>居民！没有居民哪有镇子？衰老、贫瘠、邪丝……钟心镇灾厄不绝。如今只剩您见过的寥寥数虫。<page>因此，为感谢您的无私援助，我们决定赠予您一份礼物——专属钟居！<page>钟居既是静思之所，也是安眠之榻。您的钟居位置高悬上方，与针匠大师为邻。<hpage>我无意久留，但现在既在此处，有居所也是方便。<page>好说好说！您的坚毅激励镇上众虫！况且万一有新的灾祸，身旁有勇士相助总是好的！
translated_text: <page>ミス·トラベラー!あなたの勇敢な奉仕のおかげで、私たちの町は以前のように感じ始めています。家は取り壊され、広場は輝いていた!<hpage>私はこの変化を見てきました。私の貢献が無駄ではないと聞いて嬉しいです。<page>本当にそうです!あなたの寛大さは他の人のガイドです!今必要なのは一つだけです。<page>虫だ!住民のいない町とは？年齢、希少性、致命的な手がかり-ベルハルトは果てしない弊害に悩まされる。ご覧の通り、今は数人しかいません。<page>あなたの崇高な努力を称え、問題解決への小さな一歩として、私は贈り物を注文しました!自分だけの時計塔を!<page>反省の場である。横になるベッド。それは私たちの素晴らしいルーテル製造業者の隣にぶら下がっています。<hpage>パヴォ、落ち着く予定はありませんが、ファルムでの現在の任務は残っていますが、宿泊施設は役に立つかもしれません。<page>もちろんです!もちろんです!あなたの粘り強さは私たち全員を鼓舞する!またトラブルが発生した場合、常駐兵は爪に近づいてもダメージを与えません。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Miss Traveler! Thanks to your courageous service, our town is beginning to feel like it used to be. The house was demolished and the square was glowing!<hpage>I've seen this change. I am glad to hear that my contribution has not been in vain.<page>It really is! Your generosity is a guide for others! There is only one thing we need now.<page>worms! what is a town without residents? Age, scarcity, deadly clues - Berhardt is plagued by endless evils. As you can see, there are only a few of us now.<page>In honor of your noble efforts and as a small step towards solving the problem, I have ordered a gift! Have your own clock tower!<page>It is a place of reflection. A bed to lie down. It's hanging next to our great router manufacturer.<hpage>Pavo, I have no plans to settle down, but my current assignment at the farm remains, but the accommodation might be useful.<page>of course! of course! Your persistence inspires us all! If trouble occurs again, the garrison will not damage the enemy even if it approaches the nail.

original_en_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, then distract me no more, specimen! Bzzt!<page>There is still much work ahead for the great Yarnaby! Much thought, much learning!<page>Though the ungrateful world shuns me, still, by my own claws shall it be saved!
original_zh_text: 不分享秘密就别烦我了，病患！滋滋！<page>本神医还有伟大事业！要继续想、继续学！<page>就算这不知感恩的世道唾弃我，我也要亲手拯救！
translated_text: 秘密を共有するのを拒否するなら、私の気を散らすな、標本!ハミング!<page>Yarnabyはやるべきことがたくさんあります!もっと考え、もっと学ぶ!<page>恩知らずの世界は私を避けても、それでも私自身の爪でそれを救うでしょう!
secondary_translated_text: If you refuse to share your secret, don't distract me, specimen! humming!<page>Yarnaby has a lot to do! Think more, learn more!<page>Even if the ungrateful world avoids me, I will still save it with my own claws!

original_en_text: Welly’o! What a fearful fright you’ve saved poor Plinney from! Such a delight, at longest last, to see that fine needle dance and sing!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！您可真是救了可怜的普林尼一命！终于又能瞧见亮闪闪的针刃起舞啦！
translated_text: よし!よし!かわいそうなプリニウスを救ったのは恐ろしいことだ!最後に、この小さな針が踊って歌うのを見て嬉しいです!
secondary_translated_text: okay! okay! It's a terrible thing to save poor Pliny! Finally, I'm glad to see this little needle dance and sing!

original_en_text: <hpage>Again, pinmaster, I must ask your skilled service. I bring another gland of oil.<page>Oil, so much! This bug is past surprise! It is time methinks, to see your blade’s work finished! To bring about a shine bright as none before!<page>Welly now! Why wait? Would you have me begin, traveller?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要再劳烦针匠了，新得一些秘油。<page>这么多圣油！我都不觉得惊讶了！不过是时候了，该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！<page>哎呀呀！还等什么！快开始吧？
translated_text: <hpage>ピンスマスター、私は再びあなたの熟練したサービスを要求します。別の腺を持ってきた。<page>油、そんなに!この間違いは素晴らしいです!今こそ、あなたのブレードを見る時です!前例のない光!<page>ウィリー、今!なぜ待つのか。始めましょうか、旅人さん。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pinsmaster, I once again request your skilled services. I brought another gland.<page>Oil, so much. This mistake is awesome! Now is the time to look at your blade! Unprecedented light!<page>Willie, now! Why do you wait? Let's get started, fellow traveler.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are deadly roads to wander, pinmaster, especially with the black soaked threads tearing the lands apart.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies in Bellhart, with your fellows. You can protect one another, and perhaps in time rebuild.<page>Oh yes, of course! T’was not Plinney’s wish to abandon his dear bellfriends, but with the world now ending, I had to come and say one last farewell to my sweet Melatolla.<page>I should be returning though, quite rightly. Our town will be needing a pinmaster’s fine work now more than ever!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如今世道凶险，针匠，尤其黑灾使各处分崩离析。<hpage>最安生的去处还是钟心镇，和同胞互相照应，或许还能重建家园。<page>是啊是啊！普林尼本不想抛下镇子里的老友，但想到要完蛋了，总得和亲爱的梅拉托拉道个别。<page>不过该回去啦！镇上如今可比任何时候都缺针匠手艺！
translated_text: <hpage>ピスマスト、これらは致命的な放浪の道であり、特に土地を引き裂く黒い糸に染まった道である。<hpage>あなたの安全の最大のチャンスは、Berhartとあなたの仲間にあります。お互いを守り、時間内に再建することができます。<page>ああ、もちろん!プリニウスは彼の親愛なるウェイターの友人を見捨てたくなかったが、世界は終わりに近づいており、私は私の親愛なるメラトラに最後の別れを告げなければならなかった。<page>私は戻ってきた、それは正しいです。私たちの町は今まで以上にルーテル派選手の素晴らしいパフォーマンスを必要としています!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pismast, these are the paths of deadly wanderings, and especially the paths stained with the black thread that tears the land.<hpage>The greatest chance of your safety lies with Berhart and your companions. We can protect each other and rebuild within time.<page>Oh, of course! Pliny did not want to leave his dear friend the waiter, but the world was nearing its end, and I had to bid my dear Meratra one last farewell.<page>I've come back, that's right. Our town needs a great performance from the Lutheran players more than ever!

original_en_text: Yes... yes. This is a mighty collection indeed!<page>So many relics safely piled up in here, nice and safe! I’ve done so well to gather it all up!<hpage>If your collection pleases you, some acknowledgement of my own contribution to its growth is not undue.<page>Pah! Is it gratitude you seek?<page>I will allow you to keep viewing my collection. That is gratitude enough for what little you’ve given me!
original_zh_text: 好……真好！这才是称得上是珍藏！<page>这么多遗物安安稳稳地堆在这儿！我得算是劳苦功高！<hpage>若您对这珍藏满意，也请念我几分功劳。<page>嘁！讨谢来了？<page>就你交的那点东西，准你多看几眼我的珍藏，就当是谢礼了！
translated_text: そうですね。これは本当に強力なシリーズです!<page>多くの文化遺跡がここに保管されていて、安全です!よく集めました!<hpage>あなたのコレクションがあなたを満足させるなら、私自身のコレクションの発展への貢献を認める必要はありません。<page>うわー!感謝を探していますか？<page>私のコレクションを読み続けてください。私はあなたが私に与えたすべてに感謝!
secondary_translated_text: That's right, sir. This is a really powerful series!<page>Many cultural relics are stored here, and it is safe! Well collected! "<hpage>If your collection satisfies you, I don't need to acknowledge my contribution to the development of my own collection.<page>Wow! Are you looking for a thank you?<page>Please continue to read my collection. I am grateful for everything you have given me!

original_en_text: <page=S>Once was common, this delivery, for the bugs in their camp beside the bone. Now even this is-is challenge.<page=T>Down there at base, where many pilgrims’ journey start. To ready for their climb, these deliverings will give much value.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这本是寻常单子，给骸底营地的虫。现在竟、竟然也成难题了。<page=T>那儿是朝圣者起点，货到能帮大忙。
translated_text: <page=S>この輸送方法は、かつて骨の隣のキャンプの虫には一般的でした。これも今では挑戦です。<page=T>多くの巡礼者がここから旅を始めた。登山に備えるために、これらの配達は大きな価値をもたらします。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>This method of transport was once common to camp bugs next to bones. This too is a challenge now.<page=T>Many pilgrims started their journey from here. To prepare you for the mountaineering, these deliveries bring great value.

original_en_text: Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for their ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: 石油、旅行者、そして彼らの継続的な努力に感謝するロザリオを渡しますか？このミュージシャンが再びあなたのブレードに奇跡を起こしてみましょうか？
secondary_translated_text: Do you pass the Rosary to thank the oil, the travelers, and their continuous efforts? Would you like this musician to do a miracle on your blade again?

original_en_text: Found some fancy trophies on your travels? Then you’ll be needing these shelves to show them off!
original_zh_text: 旅途中搜罗了不少珍奇战利品？正好放上这架子显摆！
translated_text: 旅行中に素敵なトロフィーはありましたか？それを見せるためには棚が必要です!
secondary_translated_text: Did you have any nice trophies during your trip? You need a shelf to show it off!

original_en_text: Just passing through these lands, are you, miss? I’d warn you not to stray far from Bellhart, but you’ve the look of one who can manage themself.
original_zh_text: 只是路过吗？劝你别离镇子太远，不过瞧你倒像是有本事的。
translated_text: あなたはこの土地を通過しただけですか？私はバーハルトから離れないように警告したかったが、あなたは自分自身を管理できる男のように見えた。
secondary_translated_text: have you just passed through this land? I wanted to warn you not to leave Berhardt, but you looked like a man who could manage himself.

original_en_text: If you’re heading out across the pond, be wary of the other catchers. They’re all long lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.<page>Weak minds, the lotta them. Still, their longpins remain sharp enough.
original_zh_text: 如果要经过池塘，当心其他渔夫，全被邪咒侵染了。<page>大多是心智软弱的家伙，但使长针的手艺没丢。
translated_text: 池を横切る場合は、他のキャッチャーに注意してください。“Haunted Pharrow”にはまっていた。<page>彼らはそれを愛し、心が弱い。しかし、長い針はまだ十分に鋭い。
secondary_translated_text: If you are crossing the pond, watch out for other catchers. He was in "Haunted Pharrow."<page>They love it, and their hearts are weak. But the long needle is still sharp enough.

original_en_text: Well, well! Welcome to you, our newest resident! I hope you’re finding your new home to your taste.<hpage>It is a finely forged bell, madam. I am fortunate to have a safe space to rest, even if my stay here may be short.<page>However long you’re with us, I’ve been holding onto some fine goods that’ll cosy up your home. This stuff ain’t for the riff-raff winding through, but a fellow Bellharter deserves the finest!
original_zh_text: 哟嗬！新住户！钟居可还满意？<hpage>铸造精良，女士。虽然是暂居，但能有一处安身之所实属幸事。<page>住多久随意，我留着些好货专供钟心镇自己人！过路粗客可配不上这档次！
translated_text: うん。うん。ようこそ、新しい住人!あなたの好みに合った新しい家が見つかるといいですね。<hpage>それは非常によく作られた時計です、女性。安全な休憩スペースがあってラッキーでしたが、ここでの滞在は短いかもしれません。<page>どんなに長く滞在しても、私はあなたの家を快適に保つためにいくつかの良いものを残します。これらは暴徒のためではないが、ベルハート家は最高に値する!
secondary_translated_text: yeah. yeah. Welcome, new residents! Hopefully you will find a new home that suits your taste.<hpage>It's a very well made watch, lady. We were lucky to have a safe resting space, but our stay here might be short.<page>No matter how long you stay, I will leave you some good things to keep your home comfortable. These aren't for the mob, but the Belhearts deserve the best!

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽然不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<hpage>看来镇子已然恢复生机，原以为斩断丝咒后只能见空壳遍地。<page>呃……这个……许多居民确实没挺过来……但沉溺于哀伤没有意义！我等将重建、成长、迎接！此乃钟心镇虫民的天职。
translated_text: ようこそ、疲れた巡礼者!栄光のベルハルトはその最盛期を過ごしたかもしれませんが、城の前の最後の停留所のままです。<page>美しいパヴォよ、私の仕事はあなたのように死んだ人々の優しさに敬意を表することです!<hpage>あなたの町は健康で良い虫に戻ったようです。ちょっと心配だよ私があなたを外に出すとき、私は貝殻を見つけるだけです。<page>うん、うん、たくさん。うーん...。住民の大半は良くない。しかし、暗いものに執着することは何の利益もありません!私たちは成長し、歓迎する!それは良い時計職人の仕事でもあります。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, weary pilgrim! The glorious Berhardt may have lived through its heyday, but it remains the last stop in front of the castle.<page>My job, beautiful Pavo, is to honor the kindness of those who have died like you! "<hpage>Your town seems to have returned to a healthy, good worm. I'm a little worried. When I take you out, I'll only find the shell.<page>Yeah, yeah, a lot. um... Most of the residents are not well. But there's no benefit in clinging to the dark! We are growing and welcoming! It's also the job of a good watchmaker.

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 见过芙蕾了么？她那常备着些旅者用得上的好货。
translated_text: フレイを見ましたか？彼女は通常、あなたのような旅行者のための有用なアイテムを備蓄する。
secondary_translated_text: did you see the frey? She usually stocks up with useful items for travelers like you.

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 选得好！你这钟屋就要变成全镇最好的一间了。立马开工！
translated_text: 完璧な選択!あなたの鐘は街で最高になります。すぐに作業を開始します。
secondary_translated_text: The perfect choice! Your bells will be the best in the city. We will start working immediately.

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果觉得钟居空荡，可找芙蕾购置家具。<page>那些家具对过客无用，但对新住民来说正好可以营造归家之感。
translated_text: 時計塔が少しむき出しになっている場合は、ぜひフレイに相談してください。彼女は素晴らしい家具のコレクションを持っています。<page>過去の巡礼者にはほとんど役に立たなかったが、新しい住人には持ち帰るだけのものだった。
secondary_translated_text: If the clock tower is a bit bare, be sure to consult with Fray. She has a wonderful collection of furniture.<page>It was of little use to the pilgrims of the past, but was only to take home to the new inhabitants.

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>听说上、上面的圣堡有新据点！肯定缺物资！<page=T>我们知道圣堡真相！根本没朝圣者说的那、那么好！就算有勇者定居也危险！需要食物药品护具——救星小姐去送吧！
translated_text: <page=S>グランドキャッスルでは、私たちが聞いた新しい場所が安全だと主張しています!私たちも助けが必要です!<page=T>キャッスル、真実を知っている!巡礼者の言うとおりではない!勇敢な虫が落ち着いても、危険はまだ近くにあります!<page=S>彼らには食糧、治療、保護が必要です。どうぞ、お届けします!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>At the Grand Castle, we claim that the new place we've heard about is safe! We need help, too!<page=T>Castle, I know the truth! The Pilgrims are not right! Even if the brave bugs calm down, the danger is still near!<page=S>They need food, treatment, and protection. Please, I'll deliver it!

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 开工！这是毕生难求的机会。旅者，谢谢您让我这卑微匠人重拾失传荣光……
translated_text: タラノ!いつものように働きます。あなたはこの謙虚な職人と旅行者にどんな喜びをもたらしましたか。この地で失われた光を求めましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Tarano! I will work as usual. What joy have you brought to this humble craftsman and traveler? Let us seek the lost light in this land.

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: <page>哎呀呀！那就是圣油！您竟然有！圣堡秘藏的圣物，当世针匠谁摸过这玩意！<page>旅者，可愿见证纺络针匠的绝活？把油给我，肯定不会让您失望！
translated_text: <page>ウィリー、ホー!あの油!持ってるよ!この希少物質は城の近くに保管されている。今の時代、奇跡を起こす人はほとんどいません。<page>見たか、旅人？これは美しい音楽家の最高の作品であり、あなたのナイフはより鋭いです!油を渡して、始めましょう。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Willie, ho! that oil! i have it! This rare material is stored near the castle. In these days, very few people perform miracles.<page>Have you seen it, traveller? This is the best work of a beautiful musician, and your knife is sharper! Give me the oil and let's start.

translated_text: お土産の棚
secondary_translated_text: Souvenir Shelf

translated_text: 聖遺物の贈り物？
secondary_translated_text: the gift of holy relics?

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！改主意了？我这手艺保准让刃口锃亮！
translated_text: ウィリーだよね？私の提案を再考する？お前の剣は俺の技で輝くぞ!
secondary_translated_text: it's willie, right? reconsider my proposal? your sword will shine with my skills!

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，沼地的蛆虫在我壳上乱爬，请您帮忙清除。<page>蛆虫？！就为这破玩意烦本神医？！重症！我要治的是重症！惨不忍睹那种！滋滋！<page>找长椅、床铺、石头歇着去！睡一觉蛆虫自会掉光。
translated_text: <hpage>マダム、私は病気です。荒野の外の沼地では、ウジ虫の悪臭が私の殻に忍び寄っていた。私はそれらを取り除くのを助ける。<page>ウジ虫だ!それだけで大ヤナビにもたらしたのか!？私の時間は貴重です!重傷者のみ!本当の、恐ろしい弱点。ハミング!<page>ベンチ、ベッド、石を探せ!休むだけです。ウジ虫はどこかに定着するとすぐに殻から出てきます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ma 'am, I am ill. In the marshes outside the wilderness, the stench of maggot crept into my shell. I'll help you get rid of them.<page>it's a worm! that's all i brought to you?! My time is precious! Seriously injured only! A real, terrible weakness. humming!<page>Look for benches, beds and stones! I just rest. As soon as the worm settles somewhere, it comes out of the shell.

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎你，好邻居！出门前要不要买点特别的东西？
translated_text: みんな歓迎!また旅行する前に、何か特別なことに興味を持ってもいいですか？
secondary_translated_text: Everyone is welcome! Before you travel again, do you want to be interested in something special?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。不过……你这铺子如今空荡得很。<page>咳，是。实话说，这劫难拖得比预期久，虫总要吃饭嘛……<page>等我家送货虫回来就有新货了，那小子肯定绕着钟心镇躲灾呢。
translated_text: <hpage>こんにちは、店主。絹の痛みからかなり回復しているようですね。<page>あっ! あっ!私は賢い昆虫です。奇妙な糸が上から落ちてくると、私は口を閉じて時計室にうずくまった。<page>他の人には問題かもしれませんが、私の店は在庫が豊富なので、飢える心配はありません。<hpage>あなたの準備は非常に役立ちます。しかしながら..。あなたの店は今空のようです。<page>咳、はい、予想以上に待ち時間が長くなったことを認めますし、昆虫も食べなければなりません。<page>私の使者が来たら、私はあなたにもっと与えます。呪いが我々に向けられて以来、彼はバーハルトから隠れていることは間違いない。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, shopkeeper. You seem to be recovering pretty much from the pain of silk.<page>ah! ah! I am a clever insect. When a strange thread fell from above, I closed my mouth and crouched in the clock room.<page>It may be a problem for others, but my store has plenty of stock, so I don't have to worry about starving.<hpage>Your preparation will be very helpful. However, the... Your store seems to be empty now.<page>Cough, yes, I admit that the wait time has been longer than I expected, and I have to eat the insects too.<page>When my messenger comes, I will give you more. There is no doubt that he has been hiding from Berhardt since the curse was directed at us.

translated_text: Flashフラッシュ
secondary_translated_text: Flash flash

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 又来烦我？说了滚！<hpage>我只想问你可知上头虫子的遭遇？他们受困于邪丝之中。<page>嗤，迟早的事。纺络的众生终归此路，他们不过是早走一步。<page>难道……你觉得自己能逃过？饥渴、恐惧、傲慢塞满你那脆壳，你早晚也得落网！<page>哼！滚吧。在纺络，相信自己自由的都是蠢货。
translated_text: また嫌がらせをしたの？出て行け、言った!<hpage>上の虫に何が起こったか知っているか尋ねただけです巨大な罠にかかっていた。<page>ジムは不思議ではない。ファルムは皆の究極の運命です。早く来てください。<page>確かに、ああ、確かに、あなた自身の結末は違うと思いませんか？この飢え、恐れ、プライドがあなたの弱い心を満たしています。死んだ!<page>グランク!ファロでは、愚か者だけが自由だと信じている。
secondary_translated_text: did you bother me again? Get out of here, I said!<hpage>I just asked the worm upstairs if he knew what had happened and he was trapped in a huge trap.<page>Jim is no wonder. The farm is everyone's ultimate destiny. Please come early. "<page>Sure, oh, sure, don't you think your own ending will be different? This hunger, fear, and pride are filling your weak heart. dead! dead!<page>Grunk! In the Faro, they believe that only fools are free.

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
original_zh_text: 想斩断丝线？嗤，瞧你倒有几分机灵。<page>丝线一断，痛苦、恐惧、渴求都将复归。<page>你替他们选的好啊！好大的威风！
translated_text: 切りたいですか？ああ、あなたは残酷に見えます。<page>弦が切断されると、痛みは弦に戻ります。彼らは恐怖と欲望を覚えています。<page>あなたは彼らのために素晴らしい選択をした!自分にその力を与えた!
secondary_translated_text: do you want to cut it? Oh, you look cruel.<page>When the string is cut, the pain returns to the string. They remember their fears and their desires.<page>You have made a great choice for them! I gave myself that power!

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠，我取来磨针秘油了。<page>太好了！这等圣物，这年头还有哪个针匠能摸到这宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>ピンマスター、針をさらに研ぐためのオイルがあります。<page>ボンワ!どんな奇跡？何の願い？こんな素敵なプレゼントをもらったなんて信じられない。現代では、この物質を使う人は少ない。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, there is oil to sharpen the needle further.<page>Bonwa! What miracle? what are you asking for? I can't believe I got such a lovely gift. In modern times, few people use this substance.

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 痛快！总算遇到像样的对手。<page>身手不错，我的指导对你有用吧？
translated_text: なんと壮大な!ダイナミックな対戦相手に立ち向かう。<page>あなたは熟練した人で、十分に明確です。トレーニングが励みになればいいのに。
secondary_translated_text: What a magnificent! They face a dynamic opponent.<page>You are a skilled person and clear enough. I wish the training was an encouragement.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有清醒的虫活着？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针才是纺络的荣耀武器——你那根怪模怪样的针虽然趁手，但终究不是正统。<page>既然醒了，要不要来练练手？想试试刺针的威力吗？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: 失礼ですね!プリンセス覚醒!<page>このような傲慢な態度を続けると、すぐにトラブルに巻き込まれる可能性があります。<hpage>こんな荒涼とした場所で、正気な昆虫が生きていることに驚きました。あなたはこの地で学んだ兵士ですか？<page>はい!はい!女性詩人!あなたの針はあなたにぴったりかもしれませんが、それは奇妙ですが、ファラオの栄光の武器です。<page>目が覚めたので、ちょっと練習してみませんか？魔女の力を試す。この先生が教えてくれるかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: Excuse me, please! The princess wakes up!<page>If you continue with such an arrogant attitude, you could get in trouble very quickly.<hpage>I was surprised to find sane insects alive in such a desolate place. are you a soldier who learned in this land?<page>yes! yes! Female poet! Your needle may be right for you, but it is strange, but it is the glorious weapon of Pharaoh.<page>Now that I'm awake, why don't you practice a little? Test the witch's powers. Maybe this teacher can teach you something.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。即便我走遍整个王国，仍为这里隐藏的实力感到惊讶。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量。要是我们生在太平年代，本可以互相学习！
translated_text: こんなにエネルギーを感じたのは久しぶりです。退屈な巡礼者は私の才能を試すのに役に立たない。<hpage>姫君の剣は大きな挑戦だ私は王国を旅しましたが、隠された力と技術にはまだ驚かされます。<page>あなた自身の奇妙な力を持っている、針虫。私たちがより少ない時間に会うなら、私たちはお互いから何を学ぶことができるか考えてください!
secondary_translated_text: It's been a long time since I've felt so much energy. Boring pilgrims are of no use to test my talents.<hpage>Princess your sword is a great challenge I have traveled the kingdom, but I am still amazed by the hidden power and technology.<page>You have strange powers of your own, needleworm. Think about what we can learn from each other if we meet less time!

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 有胆识！让我们战个痛快！
translated_text: 大胆な選択、針虫。殻を震わせる!
secondary_translated_text: Bold choice, needleworm. Shake the shell!

translated_text: PINSTRESSとのトレーニング
secondary_translated_text: Training with Pinstress

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这片沙原是纺络的边界。我是穿过远处洞窟被带到此地的。<hpage>纺络的顶端仍有存在渴求着我。若此刻逃离，必将再次受到追捕。<hpage>唯有找到源头并将其斩杀，我才能获得自由。
translated_text: <hpage>砂はファラムの領土の境界を示している。私は遠くの洞窟を通ってこの土地に来ました。<hpage>この王国の全盛期には、他の何かが私を待ち望む。今逃げたら、また追われてしまいます。<hpage>飢餓の根源を突き止め、それを取り除くまで、私は自由になれません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The sand marks the boundaries of the territory of Pharam. I have come to this land through a distant cave.<hpage>In the heyday of this kingdom, something else awaits me. If I run now, I'll be chased again.<hpage>I cannot be free until I have found the root cause of hunger and removed it.

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: 还不走？没有更要紧的事要做吗？<hpage>我不会久留。不过有你这般身手，待在这里反而安全。
translated_text: 戻ってきた、針虫？この階段よりも重要なものはありますか？<hpage>私は長く滞在しません、プリンセス。あなたの家とスキルは、これらの土地ではまれな安心感を提供します。
secondary_translated_text: you're back, needleworm? Is there anything more important than this ladder?<hpage>I won't stay long, Princess. Your home and skills will provide a sense of security that is rare in these lands.

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: 找到仆从……苍白者。将其归还……平息主人怒火。
translated_text: 顧客を探す。返してくれよ二人を主人の怒りから救ってください。
secondary_translated_text: Looking for a customer. Give it back and save them both from the wrath of their master. "

original_en_text: Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 看这黑色震动，纺络的终局将至了。<page>举针吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: 針虫!これらの黒い地震とともに、ファロの終わりが近づいています。<page>ナイフを上げろ!少なくとも1人は最終的に私たちの性質に忠実であることを見てみましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Needleworm! With these black earthquakes, the end of the pharo is nearing.<page>raise the knife! Let's see if at least one person is ultimately faithful to our nature!

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哈！是你！除了你谁敢这么粗暴地吵醒一名针姬！<page>看到我的祈愿了？想来帮我实现？<hpage>我知道你在渴求什么……一场死斗，你想战死而非被沙土掩埋。<hpage>我可以满足你……但下面还有更大的挑战在等着我。<page>不管你要做什么，可能都是徒劳。这黑色震动……纺络的终局将至。<page>少废话！开打吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: ああ、ああ!針虫!誰がこの力で王女を目覚めさせるのか!<page>私の願いが見えますか？ここでやりたい？<hpage>何を探しているのか分かります死の決闘、戦いの終わり、洞窟の崩壊ではない。<hpage>私はイエスと言える。しかし、ある意味では、より大きな課題に直面しています。<page>あなたが何をしても、今は無駄だとわかるかもしれません。黒い地震です。ファロの終焉はここにある。<page>だから、くだらない話はやめましょう!どうしよう？少なくとも1人は最終的に私たちの性質に忠実であることを見てみましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Needleworm! Who will wake up the princess with this power!<page>do you see my wish? you want to stay here?<hpage>I know what I'm looking for - a duel of death, not the end of the battle, not the collapse of the cave.<hpage>I can say yes. " But in a sense, we are facing a bigger challenge.<page>Whatever you do, you may find that it's a waste now. It was a black earthquake. The end of the Pharaoh is here.<page>So, let's stop talking nonsense! what do we do? Let's see if at least one person is ultimately faithful to our nature!

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 上位者……主人派你来……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: 生物学、高等。送信する。サービスを通じて。失われた王子を取り戻す？
secondary_translated_text: Biology, Higher. Send it. through the service. to bring back the lost prince?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为什么这么残忍？为什么要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可被召唤。纺络已然深受其害，再度召唤只会使情况更糟。<hpage>若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，我又及时赶到，你必死无疑。
translated_text: いいえ、いいえ。救い主が殺された!<page>残酷な殺人者、なぜそんなことをするのか。なぜこんなに長く仕えるのか。<hpage>この空白は呼び出されませんエラー。彼らはそれらを終わらせるのに十分な力で土地を攻撃する。その強さを主張するだけで衰退を加速する。<hpage>少なくとも今回は、シェルが保存されました。あなたの鉄の仲間の意志と、彼女の主人の罰への恐怖によって、私は時間通りに到着しました。
secondary_translated_text: No, no, no. The Savior has been killed!<page>You cruel murderer, why do you do that? Why do they serve for so long?<hpage>This error blank is not called. They attack the land with enough force to end them. Simply claiming its strength accelerates the decline.<hpage>At least this time, the shell was preserved. By the will of your iron companion, and the fear of her master's punishment, I arrived on time.

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 咳！你已经赢了，为什么还不动手？<hpage>我可以与你比试，但不会杀你……<hpage>纺络的命运尚有转机，我要改变它。<hpage>若我成功，幸存的世界需要你这样的强者守护。<page>你可真是乐观！显得我像个只想着末日的蠢货……<page>你赢了我两次，无论是武艺还是觉悟……
translated_text: あっ! あっ!最も公正なことですが、あなたは致命的な打撃にとどまることを選んだ？<hpage>私はあなたとペンスと私自身を試すことができますが、あなたを軽視しません。<hpage>地震にもかかわらず、ファルムの死は思われるほど確実ではなかった。私はこの運命を変えるために行動する。<hpage>私が成功すれば、残りの土地はあなたのような強力な昆虫に守られなければなりません。<page>あなたはインスピレーションを与える人ではないか。私を馬鹿に见せて、ここの最后のことだけを考えているのに、あなたは未来の公平さを探している。。。。。。<page>あなたは私に2回勝ったようです針は私の針と決意を打ち砕いた..。
secondary_translated_text: ah! ah! The most fair thing is, you chose to stay with the fatal blow?<hpage>I can test you and Pence and myself, but I will not belittle you.<hpage>Despite the earthquake, Farm's death was not as certain as it might seem. I will take action to change this fate.<hpage>If I succeed, the rest of the land must be defended against powerful insects like you. "<page>Aren't you the one who inspires? You make me look like a fool, and you're only thinking about the last thing here, and you're looking for the fairness of the future...<page>You seem to have won me twice, the needle has broken my needle and determination...

original_en_text: <hpage>Not for your Masters, but by my own will I may aid you, Zi, as long as the path permits.<hpage>Of your vassal, I have met one before, a scurrilous, scheming sort, and well able to remain hidden.<hpage>If your own servant shares similar disposition, they may prove hard to retrieve. Where would you advise I begin my search?<page>Zi has sensed their movement... She knows their places of rest. For pale It... Zi shall mark their chart.<page>Seek the vassal... Retrieve them, or their corpse... either is appropriate... either will aid... to avoid the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若是顺路，我会你一臂之力。但并非为了你主人，而是为了我自己。<hpage>至于那仆从，我曾遇过同类。卑劣狡诈，极善藏匿。<hpage>若你的仆从也是如此，搜寻将很困难。你觉得该从何处下手？<page>梓能感知其动向……知晓其方位……苍白者，梓会在地图标记。<page>找到仆从……无论死活……皆能平息怒火……
translated_text: <hpage>あなたの主人のためではなく、道が許す限り、私はあなたを助けることができる。<hpage>私はあなたの家臣の一人を見たことがあります汚れた陰謀的な男でよく隠されています<hpage>自分のしもべが同じような傾向を持っていたら、回復するのは難しいかもしれません。どこから探すべきでしょうか？<page>姿感到了的她在休息。実際、子供たちはチャートに印をつけます。<page>顧客を探す。彼らや彼らの体を埋め、どちらも適当です。または助けられる。師匠の怒りを避けるために。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Not for your master's sake, but as far as the road allows, I can help you.<hpage>I've seen one of your servants, a dirty, conspiratorial man, well hidden.<hpage>If your own servant had similar tendencies, it might be difficult to recover. Where should I look for it?<page>She felt it. She was resting. In fact, children mark the chart.<page>Looking for a customer. Buried them or their bodies, both are appropriate. Or can be helped. To avoid the anger of the Master.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find any bug still alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, but the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom, least it was... It’s sure starting to feel like Pharloom doesn’t have long left.<page>Well, given I’m now awake, and time’s suddenly short, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有活虫？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针曾是纺络的荣耀武器……虽然这王国恐怕撑不久了。<page>既然醒了又时日无多，要不要来练练手？让我这老师傅最后教你两招？
translated_text: 失礼ですね!プリンセス覚醒!<page>このような傲慢な態度を続けると、すぐにトラブルに巻き込まれる可能性があります。<hpage>こんな荒涼とした場所で昆虫が生きていることに驚きました。あなたはこの地で学んだ兵士ですか？<page>はい!はい!女性詩人!あなたのピンはあなたにぴったりかもしれませんが、ピンはファロの栄光ある武器です。ファロが去ったのはそれほど長くはなかったと思います。<page>さて、私は今目覚めていて、突然短い時間だったので、少し練習してみませんか？先生が教えてくれるかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: Excuse me, please! The princess wakes up!<page>If you continue with such an arrogant attitude, you could get in trouble very quickly.<hpage>I was surprised to see insects alive in such a desolate place. are you a soldier who learned in this land?<page>yes! yes! Female poet! Your pin may be right for you, but the pin is the glorious weapon of the pharaoh. I don't think it's been that long since Faro left.<page>Well, I'm awake right now, and it was suddenly a short time, so why don't you practice a little? Maybe your teacher will teach you how to do it.

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug. I’ve respect for you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality shouldn’t be abused.
original_zh_text: 走吧！我敬重你和你的利刃，但别滥用我的善意。
translated_text: 今すぐ行きましょう針虫私はあなたとあなたの刃を尊重しますが、私のもてなしは乱用されてはなりません。
secondary_translated_text: Let's go now needleworm I respect you and your blades, but my hospitality must not be abused.

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<hpage>I have visited the core, Pinstress. It was a remarkable site indeed. I only hope that it shall not soon be lost.<page>Course you’ve seen it! Master at the blade and at the seeking. You’ve proven yourself an imposing talent. <page>Well, given you seem done up here, maybe it’s time you get back to your all important business?
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<hpage>我去过那，确实是奇观。希望它不会很快消失。<page>你果然去过！看来你找东西的本事和打架一样好。<page>既然这里的事忙完了，你该去忙正事了吧？
translated_text: 聞いたことがあるかどうかわからないが、針虫、この山の中心には輝く秘密が隠されている。<page>少なくとも私の姉妹は以前そう言っていた。それは奇跡であるはずです。クリスタルでいっぱいの巨大な洞窟です。<hpage>私はコアを見てきました。これは本当に素晴らしい場所です。すぐに失われないことを願っています。<page>もちろん知ってます!剣と捜索の達人。あなたはすでに才能を証明した。<page>さて、あなたがここで終わったように見えることを考えると、おそらくあなたの最も重要なことに戻る時間ですか？
secondary_translated_text: I don't know if you've ever heard of it, but the needleworm, at the heart of this mountain, hides a glowing secret.<page>At least my sisters used to say so. It should be a miracle, "he said. It is a huge cave full of crystals.<hpage>I've been watching the core. This is truly a wonderful place. I hope it won't be lost soon.<page>Of course you know! Master of swords and search. You have already proven your talent.<page>Now, considering that you seem to be done here, is it probably time to get back to your most important thing?

original_en_text: <page>But the seer knows nothing! Nothing of the pain. All small Sula’s to bear... To watch, watch these lands dying, slow, the bugs suffering, falling, while our shell sustains...<page>The steelhearts feel so little... but we forced to serve, we endure it all. We alone. Why?<hpage>...Others may know that pain, small bug... Or at least something similar.<page>So will you chain me again? Herd me by point of your blade, and knowingly return me to that pain?<hpage>...I will not. I will inform the child of steel of what has transpired here, but I cannot force any bug to return to a task so cruel.<page>Then, then... Sula is free? At least to run? By your mercy, bug, these legs must move, quick, quick and far, far!
original_zh_text: <page>但先知不懂痛苦！苏拉独自承受……看着大地衰亡……虫民受苦……<page>钢铁之心没有痛觉……而我们独自承受一切……为什么？<hpage>……会有其他虫了解这份痛的，小虫……或类似的苦楚。<page>你要再次禁锢我吗？用针刃逼我回到那里？<hpage>……我不会。我会告知钢铁之子真相，但不会强迫任何虫回去受苦。<page>那么……苏拉自由了？至少能逃亡？谢谢你的慈悲！我要快逃，越远越好！
translated_text: <page>預言者は何も知らない。痛みはない。すべての小さなスッラは耐えなければなりません。この土地がゆっくりと枯れ、昆虫が苦しんで落ち、私たちの貝殻が生き残るのを見てください。<page>『鋼の心』ではそれほど感じられなかったが私たちは奉仕を余儀なくされ、私たちは耐えた。私たちは孤独です。なんで？<hpage>...他の人は痛み、虫、または少なくとも似たようなものを知っているかもしれません。<page>また私を監禁してくれるの？ナイフで私を追い払い、わざとそのような苦しみを与えたのですか？<hpage>...ここで何が起こっているのかは息子たちには話しませんが、このような残酷な任務にバグを強制することはできません。<page>それから、それから。スーラは自由か？せめて走るべきか？かわいそうな虫、この足は動かなければならない、速く、遠く、遠く!
secondary_translated_text: <page>The prophet knows nothing. No pain. " Every little sulla has to endure it. Watch as this land slowly withers, insects suffer and fall, and our shells survive.<page>It didn't feel that much in Heart of Steel, but we were forced to serve, and we endured it. We are lonely, we are alone. why?<hpage>... Others may know of pain, worms, or at least something similar.<page>you're going to put me in jail again? Did you drive me away with a knife and cause me such suffering on purpose?<hpage>... I won't tell my sons what's going on here, but I can't force the bugs on such a cruel task.<page>Then, then. " is sura free? should we at least run? Poor worm, this foot must move, fast, far, far!

original_en_text: Zi must watch, record... and wait... Always she is true to her function... Ore-bound... To duty.
original_zh_text: 梓必须观察、记录……等待……恪守职责。
translated_text: 紫色は必ず見られたり、記録されたり···など。彼女はいつも自分の责务である鉱床に忠実である。義務と責任
secondary_translated_text: Purple is always seen or recorded... etc. She is always loyal to the deposit, which is her duty. Duties and Responsibilities

original_en_text: A mighty battle we had, my friend... Time now you get to your all important business. I’ll be wishing for your success.
original_zh_text: 真是场激战啊朋友……快去忙你的事吧。祝你成功。
translated_text: 皆さん、私たちは激しい戦いを経験しました。今こそ、すべての重要なことに取り組み始める時です。成功を祈ります。
secondary_translated_text: Ladies and gentlemen, we have been through a fierce battle. Now is the time to start working on all the important things. I wish you all success.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting. Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent to Zi, yes? By Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: ...生物学、上級。会議は進行中です。紫色の覚醒。偶然ではない。紫色になりましたよね？マスターのサービス？失われた顧客を取り戻す？
secondary_translated_text: ... Biology, Advanced. The conference is ongoing. The Purple Awakening. It's not accidental. it turns purple, right? Master's service? How to get back lost customers?

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinstress, why do you choose to live amidst these storm-swept caverns? Surely there are more hospitable places?<page>Somewhere gentler? Warmer? I’d only go soft! How else is one expected to maintain their wits?<hpage>Then this is not a place of hiding? That Citadel up top seems no friend to the free, or the strong who’d choose to remain apart.<page>...Aye. Well, yes. That too’s a reason, though one that shames me some.<page>Our grand Citadel learnt well from the training of Pinstresses past. Then it went and turned those teachings upon us!<page>Despite our superior skills, our numbers have always been few, and their strength overwhelmed.<page>Of my once revered order, only two of us remain, wormed away in Pharloom’s forgotten corners, and my pin-sibling, she’s lost herself to more peaceable pursuits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针姬，为何要住在风暴肆虐的洞窟？没有更舒适的地方吗？<page>更舒适？更温暖？那样只会让我变迟钝！<hpage>难道是在躲避什么？圣堡似乎容不下自由的强者。<page>……确实有这个原因，说来惭愧。<page>从前圣堡向我们讨教技艺，学成后却反过来对付我们！<page>我们虽然技艺高超，但终究寡不敌众。<page>曾经备受尊崇的教团，如今只剩两个。我躲在这遗忘角落，另一位更是彻底放弃了战斗。
translated_text: <hpage>王女様、なぜ嵐で荒廃した洞窟に住むことを選んだのですか。もっと歓迎すべき場所はあるのか？<page>もっと穏やかな場所に行く？ウォームアップ？私は弱くなるだけです!では、どうやって知恵を保つのか。<hpage>隠れ場所ではないか。上の城は、分離することを選んだ自由人や強い人の友人ではないようです。<page>...ええ、ええ、ええ、それは理由の一つですが、それは私たちの何人かを恥じさせます。<page>私たちの壮大な城は、過去の女優訓練から学んだ。そして、その教えを私たちに押し付ける!<page>私たちの技術は優れていますが、私たちの数は非常に少なく、強さは耐えられません。<page>私がかつて尊敬していた命令の下で、私たちは一人に残され、ファラムの忘れ去られた隅にうずくまり、兄弟姉妹はより平和的な追跡に迷っていました。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Princess, why have you chosen to live in a storm-ravaged cave? " is there a more welcoming place?<page>go somewhere quieter? warm up? I'm just getting weaker! So, how do we keep our wisdom?<hpage>Isn't it a hiding place? The castle above does not seem to be a friend of the free and strong who chose to separate.<page>... Yeah, yeah, yeah, that's one of the reasons, but it embarrasses some of us.<page>Our magnificent castle has learned from past actress training. And impose that teaching on us!<page>Our technology is superior, but our numbers are very small, and our strength is unbearable.<page>Under the orders I once respected, we were left alone, huddled in a forgotten corner of Pharam, and the brothers and sisters were lost in a more peaceful pursuit.

original_en_text: <hpage>I cannot yet leave this land. Until I slay its source, this kingdom’s hunger for me will never abate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我还不能离开。只要源头尚存，这国度对我的渴求不会消退。
translated_text: <hpage>私はまだこの地を離れられない。私がこの王国の源を殺さない限り、この王国の私への渇望は決して衰えることはない。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I cannot leave this land yet. Unless I kill the source of this kingdom, this kingdom's thirst for me will never abate.

original_en_text: Pale It... You would reject the role? Are you not tamed, bound, by Masters?... You would know... obedience is essential.<page>Recall, the fate of those who defy... Even you higher... Especially you higher...<page>...Compression... We have suffered it. We would never wish it upon another.
original_zh_text: 苍白者……你要违抗？你未被主宰驯服？……你该明白服从的重要性。<page>想想违抗者的下场……即便是上位者……尤其是上位者……<page>……压缩之苦……我们经历过……不愿它降临他者。
translated_text: 青白い。この役割を拒否しますか？マスターに縛られていませんか？あなたはそれを知る。従順は重要です。<page>抵抗する者の運命を考える。たとえあなたが高くても。特にあなたがより高い場合。<page>...圧縮された。もう十分だ。他の人に同じ苦しみをさせたくない。
secondary_translated_text: Pale. Do you want to decline this role? are you not bound by the master? You will know it. Obedience is important.<page>Consider the fate of those who resist. Even if you're tall. Especially if you are higher.<page>... They were compressed. Enough is enough. I don't want others to suffer the same.

original_en_text: Ahh, is your needle too shy to show its edge? What a shame.
original_zh_text: 呵，你的针不敢出鞘吗？真没劲。
translated_text: ああ、針は刃を見せるのが恥ずかしいのか？不幸なことに
secondary_translated_text: oh, is a needle embarrassed to show its blade? Unfortunately, it's

original_en_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle bug.<page>I’ve become well accustomed to solitude, and it’s unnerving to play host to your strange strength overlong.
original_zh_text: 我的耐心有限。<page>独居惯了，你这种异常存在让我不安。
translated_text: 私の歓迎にも限界があります。<page>私は孤独に慣れており、あなたの奇妙な強さを長い間受け入れることは不安です。
secondary_translated_text: My welcome also has its limitations.<page>I'm used to being alone, and it's uneasy to accept your strange strength for so long.

original_en_text: Planning to hang about are you, needle bug?<page>Fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 暂时不打算走吗？<page>那要不要来场训练，试试刺针的威力？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: 遊びに行くのか、針虫？<page>トレーニングを受けたいですか？魔女の力を試す。先生が教えてくれるかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: are you going to play, needleworm?<page>Do you want to receive training? Test the witch's powers. Maybe your teacher will teach you how to do it.

original_en_text: Having second thoughts on our bout, needle bug? Good! I’ll not hold back my blade, and I’ll expect the same from you.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？很好！我不会手下留情，希望你也一样！
translated_text: デートを考え直したのか、針虫？よし!私は剣を捨てないし、あなたにもそうしてほしい。
secondary_translated_text: have you reconsidered your date, needleworm? okay! I will not give up my sword, and I want you to do so.

original_en_text: ...Bug... Higher... It has come seeking... Zi is found... She is awoken.<hpage>Greetings, child of steel. I have known your type, in past. From your presence, it is clear this land too has caught the long gaze of your Masters.<page>Masters... Yes... For them, Zi observes... obedient... always...<page>And you... a creature in half... Pale It... Bug It... old... stubborn... alone... You too are observed.
original_zh_text: ……虫……上位者……它来寻找……梓被发现了……她苏醒了。<hpage>钢铁之子，我见过你的同类。你的到来说明你的主人已将目光投向此地。<page>主人……是的……梓侍奉他们……永远服从……<page>而你……半身者……苍白者……虫身者……古老……固执……独行……你也被注视着。
translated_text: ...昆虫は高い。探しに来ました子供が見つかった。目が覚めた<hpage>こんにちは、鋼鉄の息子。あなたのタイプは以前から知っていた。あなたの存在から、この土地もあなたの主人の長期的な関心を引いていることは明らかです。<page>ご主人様。そうですね。彼らはこれを観察した。従順であること。いつも..。<page>そして、あなたは..。半分人間と半分獣。青白い。古いものでは、私は非常に頑固で頑固な虫を置く。あなたも監視されています。
secondary_translated_text: ... Insects are high. I came to look and found the child. I woke up.<hpage>Hello, son of steel. I've known your type before. It is clear from your presence that this land is also attracting the long-term interest of your master.<page>Master, sir. That's right, sir. They have observed this. To be obedient. I'm always...<page>And then you... Half human and half beast. Pale. In the old ones, I put a very stubborn and stubborn worm. You are also being watched.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting, Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent, by Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?<page>But no... pale It cannot.. First, a chart is needed. Pale It must acquire one. Only then can Zi provide the marks... Their vassal’s location sensed strong.
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？<page>不……苍白者……须先有地图……梓才能标记其方位……仆从感知强烈。
translated_text: ...生物、より高い― ― ―その遭遇と姿の覚醒は偶然ではない。すでに送られている。マスターが送った？失われた顧客を取り戻す？<page>でも違うわとても青白く、できません。まず、グラフが必要です。青ざめて、1つを得る必要がある。紫色は唯一のマーキング方法を提供します。彼らの地位は人々を強く感じさせます。
secondary_translated_text: ... Creatures, higher - - the encounter and the awakening of the form are not accidental. It has already been sent. the master sent you? How to get back lost customers?<page>But no, it's so pale, I can't. First, you need a graph. You need to get blue and get one. Purple provides the only method of marking. Their position makes people feel stronger and stronger.

original_en_text: <hpage>Zi, your vassal is gone, alive, fled beyond these lands.<hpage>I chose to allow their escape, even if your wish may not be granted.<page>The wish? No... pale It... Zi sensed clear your meeting... The rite... The vassal is tarnished. They have touched the dark. By the Masters, they will now be hunted... no matter the distance fled.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassal, that is preferable? Waste here in servitude or flee free. They made their choice, and proclaimed it clear by their black action.<hpage>Their dark champion is slain, but luck or guile may yet see them survive.<page>Hope!.. Pale It... For a vassal who defies the Masters?... You give Zi a thought, complex...<page>The outcome is different... and Zi must now observe alone... but this may be the better way?<page>Zi shall accept the happening... shall pray the Masters still see her loyal... and Zi too will share the hope... that her vassal lives long unbound.
original_zh_text: <hpage>梓，你的仆从已叛逃出境。<hpage>我选择放他们走，即使这样会违背你的愿望。<page>愿望？不……苍白者……梓很清楚……仪式……仆从已玷污，触及黑暗……逃不过主人追猎。<hpage>或许他们觉得这样更好？与其在奴役中腐朽不如自由逃亡。<hpage>其黑暗眷属已除，但或许能凭机遇存活。<page>希望？……苍白者……给背叛主人的仆从？……这想法……令梓困惑……<page>结果不同……梓将独自观察……或许这是更好结局？<page>梓将接受现实……祈祷主人知晓梓忠诚……但梓也希望……她的仆从能自由活着。
translated_text: <hpage>あなたの家臣はこの土地の外に生きて逃げました。<hpage>たとえあなたの願いが叶わなくても、私は彼らを逃がすことを選んだ。<page>願い事？いいえ、いいえ。とても青白い。紫明明明感到你们的会见。儀式の家臣はすでに汚れていた。暗闇に触れた。どんなに遠くまで逃げてもマスターに追われます。<hpage>多分、あなたのクライアントのためにそれは良いですか？ここで楽しむか、自由に逃げる。彼らは自分たちの選択をし、黒い行動でそれを示しました。<hpage>彼らの闇の戦士は殺されたが、運やトリックが彼らを救うかもしれない。<page>希望です!!!青白い。主人に反抗した家臣に、あなたがアイデアを与えたというのは複雑なことだ。<page>結果は違った。紫色は別々に観察する必要がある。しかし、それはより良い方法ですか？<page>息子は起こったことを受け入れる。祈りのマスターはまだ彼女の忠実さを見る。紫色にも希望がある。彼女の部下は長い間拘束されなかった。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your servants have fled alive outside of this land.<hpage>Even if your wishes are not fulfilled, I have chosen to run away from them.<page>wishes? No, no, no. Very pale. Zi Ming clearly felt your meeting. The ceremonial vassals were already dirty. He touched the darkness. No matter how far you run, you will be pursued by the Master.<hpage>Maybe it 's good for your client? Enjoy here or run free. They made their choice and showed it in their black actions.<hpage>Their dark warriors have been killed, but luck or tricks may save them.<page>I hope!! Pale. It is complicated that you gave an idea to a vassal who rebelled against his master.<page>The results were different. Purple should be observed separately. But is that a better way?<page>My son accepts what has happened. The Master of Prayer still sees her faithfulness. There is also hope in purple. Her men were not detained for a long time.

original_en_text: For your talents, needle bug, in blade and strength... and restraint, take this emblem of my order.<page>Hadn’t ever thought another’d be joining our slim ranks, but you’re as deserving a member as’s ever come before.
original_zh_text: 为你的武艺、觉悟……和克制，收下我们教团的徽章吧。<page>没想到还会有新成员加入，但你当之无愧。
translated_text: 針虫よ、あなたの才能は剣と強さにある。自制して、私の指揮バッジを取って。<page>私たちのエリートチームに誰かが加わるとは思っていませんでしたが、あなたはこれまで以上に一員になる価値があります。
secondary_translated_text: O needleworm, your talent is in sword and strength. restrain yourself, take my command badge.<page>I didn't expect anyone to join our elite team, but you deserve to be a part of it more than ever. "

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not flee. I cannot abandon the kingdom to a collapse of my making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不会逃走。不能任由下方王国因我而崩塌。
translated_text: <hpage>逃げるつもりはなかった。私の創造のために王国を放棄できません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I didn't intend to run away. I cannot give up my kingdom for my creation.

original_en_text: Creature, higher... return when a chart is acquired. A chart is needed, essential, to serve the Masters... to aid Zi.
original_zh_text: 上位者……取得地图再来……图是侍奉主人……协助梓的必要之物。
translated_text: 生物学、上級。チャートを取得して戻る。マスターズに奉仕するためにはチャートが必要であり、それは不可欠です。Helper。
secondary_translated_text: Biology, Advanced. Get the chart and go back. In order to serve the Masters, a chart is necessary, and it is essential. The Helper.

original_en_text: Ahh... Shame. Surely battle’d be the better end, no?<page>If not by blade, we’ll just have to accept whatever conclusion this new quaking calamity flings upon our heads.
original_zh_text: 唉……真遗憾。战死本是更好的结局不是吗？<page>既然不能战死，我们就只能接受这黑暗带来的结局了。
translated_text: あっ...。しかし、この戦いはより良い結末になるでしょう。<page>ブレードがなければ、この衝撃的な新たな災害が私たちに降りかかったという結論を受け入れるしかない。
secondary_translated_text: ah... But this battle will have a better ending.<page>Without the Blade, we can only accept the conclusion that this shocking new disaster has befallen us.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cease your summoning, fool bug!<hpage>Though you may yearn for freedom, that saviour you hope to call will bring only death.
original_zh_text: <hpage>停止召唤，蠢虫！<hpage>即便你渴求自由，那救赎者也只会带来死亡。
translated_text: <hpage>もう電話するな、バカ!<hpage>あなた方は自由を望むかもしれませんが、あなた方が呼びたい救世主は死をもたらすだけです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Don't call anymore, idiot!<hpage>You may wish for freedom, but the Savior you wish to call upon will only bring death.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims are useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. The strength and skills hidden about this kingdom continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. More I think than you’d be willing to reveal to me.<page>What, I wonder, are you planning to turn all that power towards?
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。这王国暗藏的实力总是出乎意料。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量，用针的。远不止你愿意展示的这些吧？<page>我很好奇，你打算用这力量做些什么？
translated_text: こんなにエネルギーを感じたのは久しぶりです。すべての鈍い巡礼者は私の才能を試すことができない。<hpage>姫君の剣は大きな挑戦だこの王国の隠された力とスキルには驚かされ続けています。<page>あなた自身の奇妙な力を持っている、針虫。言いたくないと思います。<page>自分の力をどこに移そうとしているのか。
secondary_translated_text: It's been a long time since I've felt so much energy. Not every dull pilgrim can test my talent. "<hpage>Princess Your Sword is a great challenge and you continue to marvel at the hidden power and skills of this kingdom.<page>You have strange powers of your own, needleworm. I don't want to say that.<page>Where are you trying to transfer your power?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My champion slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Not ever. None can control it, though many have tried. <hpage>Any strength you hoped it offered would fast be proven false.<hpage>Consider yourself fortunate I arrived in time. Your shell is saved, all by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为何如此残忍？为何要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可驾驭，故不可召唤，这是无数血泪换来的教训。<hpage>无论你指望能从它身上获取什么力量，你都会后悔。<hpage>你该庆幸我来得及时。若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，你必死无疑。
translated_text: いいえ、私の兵士は殺された。<page>残酷な殺人者、なぜそんなことをするのか。なぜこんなに長く仕えるのか。<hpage>この空白は呼び出されませんエラー。多くの人が試みたが、誰も制御できなかった。<hpage>あなたが提供することを望む力はすぐに間違って証明されます。<hpage>間に合ってよかったですね。あなたの体は救われました。それはあなたの鉄の仲間の願いと主人の罰への恐れのためです。
secondary_translated_text: No, my soldiers were killed.<page>You cruel murderer, why do you do that? Why do they serve for so long?<hpage>This error blank is not called. Many people tried, but no one could control them.<hpage>The power you wish to provide will soon be proved wrong.<hpage>I'm glad you were on time. Your body has been saved. It is because of the wishes of your iron companion and the fear of the punishment of your master.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I chose to head beyond, I would abandon Pharloom to a collapse of my making.<hpage>While I live, and still possess the strength to act, I will not allow that end to come to pass.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若我选择逃离，下方王国将因我而崩塌。<hpage>只要力气尚存，我绝不容许这样的结局。
translated_text: <hpage>もし私が超越することを選んだら、私はファルをあきらめ、私のキャリアは崩壊していたでしょう。<hpage>私が生きていて、まだ行動できるとき、私はそれを許さないでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I had chosen to transcend, I would have given up on Fal and my career would have collapsed.<hpage>When I am alive and still able to act, I will not allow it. "

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<page>If you’re hanging around these heights, and time’s allowing, maybe you’ll get to seeking it?<page>Course you’d first have to find the entrance, but you’ve certainly shown the skills to wriggle up in there, provided you’re so inclined.
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<page>要是有时间不妨去找找？<page>当然得先找到入口，不过以你的身手肯定没问题。
translated_text: 聞いたことがあるかどうかわからないが、針虫、この山の中心には輝く秘密が隠されている。<page>少なくとも私の姉妹は以前そう言っていた。それは奇跡であるはずです。クリスタルでいっぱいの巨大な洞窟です。<page>このような高度でホバリングしていたら、時間が許せば探しているかもしれません。<page>もちろん、最初に入り口を見つけなければなりませんが、必要であれば、そこを這うスキルを実証したことは間違いありません。
secondary_translated_text: I don't know if you've ever heard of it, but the needleworm, at the heart of this mountain, hides a glowing secret.<page>At least my sisters used to say so. It should be a miracle, "he said. It is a huge cave full of crystals.<page>If you've been hovering at this altitude, time permitting, you might be looking for it.<page>Of course, you have to find your way in first, but if you have to, you have no doubt demonstrated your skills to crawl there.

original_en_text: <page>A small gift for you, pale It... for the thought, complex... rock of the home spear... and of Zi’s birth. May it aid your further action in this land.
original_zh_text: <page>苍白者，赠礼……为感谢你给的希望……梓诞生故土的岩石……愿它助你在此地的行动。
translated_text: <page>あなたへの小さな贈り物はそれを覆い隠す。複雑さのために考える。ホーム·ランス·ロックそして息子の誕生。この国でのさらなる行動に役立ちますように。
secondary_translated_text: <page>A small gift to you will mask it. Thinking for complexity. Home, Lance Rock and the Birth of His Son May it help us take further action in this country. "

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug! A Pinstress of my substantial talent requires their deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying bout.<hpage>Goodbye, Pinstress. May your blade remain sharp.
original_zh_text: 走吧！针姬需要继续冥想——激烈战斗后更需要静修。<hpage>再会，愿你的锋芒永不褪色。
translated_text: 今すぐここから出て行け、バカ!私のような才能ある女性歌手は、特にこのような満足のいくマッチを経験した後、深い瞑想が必要です。<hpage>さようなら、姫。あなたの刃は鋭く保つ。
secondary_translated_text: Get out of here right now, idiot! A talented female singer like me needs deep meditation, especially after experiencing such a satisfying match.<hpage>Farewell, Princess. Keep your blades sharp.

original_en_text: Ho, miss! How’s all this then? Lotta dials to be trackin’, but at least the controls seem in good order.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, best as any bug.<page><hpage>Then you’ve no prior experience with this type of transport?<page>No one does, miss! Them’s who used to dive’re all long dead, or cursed ta half life. An’ there ain’t no bug left alive’s been brave or stupid enough to try... ‘til now, at least.<page>I’ll work it best’s I can. Can’t do much more, I’m afraid. At least the forgings of these docks were built to last. Now we’s only gotta pray they hold for you.<page>Here’s the key that’ll see you inside its metal belly. Pop in there once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 嚯，小姐！这玩意儿够复杂的！仪表盘多得数不过来，好在操控装置还算正常。<page>我能在这儿引导潜钟下潜，保准比任何虫子都靠谱。<page><hpage>这么说，你从没操作过这种器械？<page>谁都没这种经验，小姐！以前开潜钟的早死绝了，剩下的也半死不活。活着的虫里，就没有哪个又疯又蠢的敢用这玩意……直到现在。<page>我会尽力而为，但别的可不敢打包票。好在码头造的这家伙够结实，现在只能祈祷它下潜后不会出什么故障。<page>这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: ああ、お嬢さん!それで何が起きた？ロッタノブは追跡していますが、少なくともコントロールは整然と見えます。<page>ここから私はあなたの鐘を降ろすことができますどんな虫よりも良いです<page><hpage>この車両を使用した経験はありませんか？<page>誰もやってないよ、お嬢さん!潜水した者は死んでいるか、半生呪われている。虫は生きておらず、勇敢にも愚かにも挑戦しました。少なくとも今のところは。<page>頑張りますよ。私は無力です。少なくとも、これらのドックの鍛造は耐久性がある。彼らがあなたを支えてくれることを祈るだけです。<page>これは金属の胃に入るための鍵です。気分が良く、準備ができたら、そこに行きます。その間、私はここですべてを見るでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my lady! so what happened? Rotanob is tracking, but at least the controls look tidy.<page>From here I can lower your bells, better than any worm.<page><hpage>Have you ever used this vehicle?<page>No one's doing it, miss! Those who dive are either dead or cursed half-lived. The worm was not alive and challenged it, brave and foolish. At least for now.<page>I'll try my best. I am helpless. At least, the forging of these docks is durable. All I can do is pray that they will support you.<page>This is the key to get into the metal stomach. When you feel good and ready, you go there. In the meantime, I'll see it all here.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now, that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获取终结这场黑灾所需的力量。终结动荡、拯救这片地区就在此一举。<page>啧，好家伙！小尖头虫，没想到你个头不大，魄力和干劲倒是真不小。<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: <hpage>娘を鍛えたことで、この黒い狂気を終わらせる力を得ました。私はすぐに地震を止め、土地を救うために行動する。<page>重大で重大な誤り。このような小さな人にしては、あなたのエネルギーとエネルギーは驚くほど大きいことがわかりました。<page>バーロウからの手紙を受け取ったことを知った後、彼は潜水時計の修復作業について以下に説明しました。これまでのところ、タスクは完了したかもしれない。<page>あなたが彼の仕事を試したいなら、もう一度あなたの生存を願っています。当社独自のサービスがお客様のミッションクリティカルに役立つ場合は、今後も喜んで提供していきます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>By training my daughter, I have gained the power to end this black madness. I will act immediately to stop the earthquake and save the land.<page>Serious and serious errors. For such a small person, I have found that your energy and energy is surprisingly large.<page>After learning that he had received a letter from Barlow, he described the work on repairing the diving clock as follows: So far, the task might have been completed.<page>If you want to try his job, I hope you survive once more. If our unique services help your mission-critical needs, we'll be happy to continue providing them.

original_en_text: Erm, you may notice your prize there is a little light, my lady...<page>Awful truth is, you’ve cleaned us out. We’ve not a single measly rosary left between us. Turns out we were just no match for you!<hpage>It was a game fairly played, sir, though I’ve no wish to see you destitute. Would you like to make another kind of wager, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 呃，您可能会觉得这次的奖品有点寒酸，女士……<page>实话说，您把我们家底都赢光了。半颗念珠都不剩！我们根本不是您对手！<hpage>先生，游戏确实公平公正，但我也不想见你倾家荡产。要不要换个赌注？
translated_text: さて、あなたの賞が少し輝いていることに気づいたかもしれません。<page>恐ろしい真実は、あなたが私たちを空にしたことです。私たちの間にはもはや小さなロザリオはない。私たちはあなたの敵ではない!<hpage>これは公正なゲームですが、私はあなたが破産するのを見たくありません。また賭けてみませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Now, you may have noticed that your prize is shining a bit.<page>The terrifying truth is that you have emptied us. There is no longer a little rosary among us. We are not your enemy! "<hpage>This is a fair game, but I don't want to see you go bankrupt. why don't you bet again?

original_en_text: Grfff... So it’s gotten that bad, aye? I guess... If that’s how it is, I’ll be your bug.<page>Meet me below, at the diving bell. We’ll see if I can get you ready for the drop.
original_zh_text: <page>嘶……已经糟到这地步了？行吧……如果真是这样，那我帮你。<page>去潜钟底下碰头，我看能不能给你整备好。
translated_text: それで事態は悪化しましたよね？私は思う..。もしそうなら、私はあなたの虫です。<page>下の時計で待ってください。飛行機の準備を手伝ってみましょう
secondary_translated_text: so things got worse, didn't they? I think... If so, I'm your bug.<page>Please wait at the clock below. Let me help you get your plane ready.

original_en_text: Holler when you’re ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell’s as ready as it’ll ever be.
original_zh_text: 准备好了就喊我一声，小姐。升级已经完成，这只潜钟现在状态绝佳。
translated_text: 準備ができたら叫んでください。アップグレード完了です。ベルの準備ができた。
secondary_translated_text: When you're ready, shout. Upgrade is complete. Bell was ready.

original_en_text: Ahhh... Can you feel it yet? All your troubles dripping away...
original_zh_text: 啊哈……感觉到了吗？烦心事都在随着汗液滴落……
translated_text: あっ...。感じたか？あなたのすべての悩みが滴りている
secondary_translated_text: ah... did you feel it? all your troubles are dripping down

original_en_text: The deposits around here, those long-burning rocks. They’re useful to the Citadel, in whatever their shadowy business, but useless if you require tools of us!<page>We need finer material. Rare metal. Pharloom would provide a bounty to the able explorer. Find us some, and we’ll build your violent aids.
original_zh_text: 储备在附近的长效燃烧石？圣堡那帮虫子拿去搞些见不得虫的勾当倒合适，对我们来说屁用没有！<page>去找些更好、更稀有的金属！只要你有本事，纺络遍地都是是宝贝。找着了，我们就有办法给你造那些家伙什。
translated_text: ここの周りの堆積物は、長い間燃えてきた岩です。彼らは秘密のビジネスでも城に役立ちますが、私たちのツールが必要な場合は役に立ちません!<page>より良い材料が必要です希少金属Farumは有能な探検家に報酬を提供します。私たちのために何かを見つけ、暴力的な援助を提供します。
secondary_translated_text: The sediments around here are rocks that have been burning for a long time. They are useful to the castle even in their secret business, but not if you need our tools!<page>Better materials are needed Rare metals Farum offers a reward for competent explorers. Find something for us and provide violent assistance. "

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Our lady has missed her mark, and so thusly ends our challenge!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！这位女士脱靶了，挑战结束！
translated_text: オラ!オラ!私たちはゴールを逃したので、挑戦は終わりました!
secondary_translated_text: Hey! hey! We missed the goal, so the challenge is over!

translated_text: ... ISS..。永遠に。検索..。sibleです。
secondary_translated_text: ... The ISS... Forever and ever. The search... It is Sible.

original_en_text: My lady, I pray you reconsider! T’would be an honour to see those strong limbs of yours in action, truly!
original_zh_text: 女士，再考虑考虑吧！要是能见识到您矫健的风姿，定会是我们的荣幸！
translated_text: 再考を祈ります!あなたの力強い手足を見て光栄です!
secondary_translated_text: I pray for reconsideration! It's an honor to see your powerful limbs!

original_en_text: A respectable enough effort, truly. You didn’t earn enough rosaries to make a profit off us, but that should only spur you on to try again!
original_zh_text: 表现非常不错！虽然赚的念珠还不够回本，或许正好能激励您再试一次！
translated_text: 実際、それは立派な努力です。あなたはまだ私たちから利益を得るのに十分なロザリオを獲得していませんが、それはあなたにもう一度挑戦する動機になります!
secondary_translated_text: In fact, it's a respectable effort. You haven't yet earned enough rosaries to benefit from us, but it will motivate you to challenge yourself once more!

original_en_text: An old diving bell. Its door is shut tight by an ornate clamp.
original_zh_text: 一具古旧的潜钟，钟门被一只华丽的夹钳紧紧锁闭。
translated_text: 古き良き時計。そのドアは豪華なクリップでしっかりと閉じられていた。
secondary_translated_text: A good old watch. That door was tightly closed with a gorgeous clip.

original_en_text: The diving bell’ll be ready again soon, miss. Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 潜钟很快就能再用，小姐。新护壳装好后绝对能扛住下坠！绝对！
translated_text: ダイビング時計はすぐに準備ができます、お嬢さん。新しい盾を取り付けると、落下に耐えることができます。もちろんです!
secondary_translated_text: The diving watch will be ready soon, miss. When you install a new shield, you can withstand falling. of course!

translated_text: ...道だ。アーノルドAP通信。うーん...。epair。オリー..。ISSです。
secondary_translated_text: ... the way. Arnold AP Communications. um... epair. Olly... The ISS.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！
translated_text: オラ!オラ!試合の時間だ!ターゲットが見えたら、まっすぐな釘を拾ってヒットしましょう!
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! It's time for the game! When you see the target, pick up a straight nail and hit it!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I require a moment. Please unlock the bell for me.<page>Aye. Can do, miss. Hail me again when you’re ready to travel.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我还需要点时间。麻烦打开钟门。<page>没问题，小姐。等您准备妥当了，再喊我一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>ちょっと時間が必要です。ベルを開けてください。<page>はい、できますよ、お嬢さん。旅の準備ができたら、また応援してください。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I need a little time. Please open the bell. "<page>Yes, you can, miss. When you're ready for the journey, cheer again.

original_en_text: Here to sweat away your sorrows, miss? The steam does wonders for a mind set sullen, or a shell gone stiff.<hpage>I’ve found these lowlands hot enough already, and mine is a shell more resilient than most.<hpage>To challenge that further seems a unique sort of madness.<page>Aye, well, this is Pharloom, miss! Madness is catching. I’d say this here’s the smallest form of it.
original_zh_text: 有烦心事吗，小姐？来蒸桑拿吧，蒸汽对郁结的心绪或僵硬的甲壳有奇效。<hpage>我倒觉得这里已经够热了，何况我这副甲壳比多数虫子都硬实。<hpage>热上加热，怕不是疯得别致。<page>哎，这儿可是纺络，小姐！疯病是会传染的。要我说，在这蒸桑拿算最轻的症状了。
translated_text: 汗をかきに来たの？蒸気は落ち込んでいる人や硬いシェルに最適です。<hpage>私はこれらの低地が十分に熱く、私の殻はほとんどの場所よりも弾力があることを発見した。<hpage>これにさらに挑戦することは、ユニークな狂気のようです。<page>はい、これはファローです、お嬢さん!狂気は人を惹きつける。これが一番小さい形だと思います。
secondary_translated_text: did you come here to sweat? The steam is great for depressed people and hard shells.<hpage>I have found these lowlands hot enough, and my shell is more elastic than most places.<hpage>To challenge this even further seems like a unique madness.<page>Yes, this is Faro, miss! Madness attracts people to it. I think this is the smallest form.

original_en_text: What an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: あなたと一緒にプレイできて光栄です!ポケットの中のロザリオがガタガタするのを感じるたびに、私たちのことを考えてください。
secondary_translated_text: It's a pleasure to play with you! Every time you feel the rattling of the rosary in your pocket, think of us.

translated_text: 配達をキャンセル？
secondary_translated_text: Cancel the delivery?

original_en_text: There is no choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, not ever. We are a Forge Daughter, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 没得选！从来就没得选。咱是熔炉之女，生来就和这熔炉缔结了契约。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: 選択の余地はない私たちにふさわしくない。私たちは去ることはできません決して去らない私たちは娘たちを鍛え、この鍛造工場とそのサービスに専念しています。私たちの責任は一生です。
secondary_translated_text: We have no choice and are not worthy of us. We can never leave We train our daughters and are dedicated to this forging factory and its services. Our responsibilities are lifelong.

original_en_text: If you’re planning passage below, Ballow’s the one to assist you. We must remain by the forge, always.
original_zh_text: 若想下潜，去找巴洛帮忙。咱得永远守着熔炉。
translated_text: 下からパスするつもりなら、バーロウはあなたを助ける人です。常に鍛冶屋にいなければならない。
secondary_translated_text: If you're going to pass from below, Burlow is the one to help you. You must always be at the blacksmith.

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work? The world cracks and quakes to some grave new calamity, surely you should seek somewhere safer?<hpage>As far as I might flee, I suspect no such place exists, and in any case, I would not see this land’s bugs abandoned to their end.<hpage>What of you? Why do you choose to remain so diligent at your task, given the fell state of your lands?
original_zh_text: 哟！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰咱干活？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得地动山摇，你该找个安全地儿躲躲才对啊？<hpage>恐怕无论逃到哪里，都无处可避。更何况，我不愿抛下此地生灵，让它们无力地面对终结来临。<hpage>你们呢？既然明白此地危在旦夕，为何还要死守这熔炉？
translated_text: おぉ!シャープバグ、なぜ私たちの仕事を邪魔するの？世界が崩壊し、地震が起こり、深刻な新たな災害が発生しています。あなたは本当に安全な場所を探すべきですか？<hpage>私が脱出できる限り、私はそのような場所がないことを疑い、いずれにせよ、私は最後までこの土地の昆虫が放棄されるのを見ることはないでしょう。<hpage>あなたはどう？あなたの土地が衰退しているので、なぜそんなに一生懸命仕事をしたのですか？
secondary_translated_text: oh! sharp bug, why are you interfering with our work? The world is collapsing, earthquakes are occurring, and serious new disasters are occurring. Should you really look for a safe place?<hpage>As far as I can escape, I doubt that there is no such place, and in any case, I shall not see the insects of this land abandoned to the end.<hpage>how are you? Why did you work so hard when your land is declining?

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work?<hpage>The sound of your craft called me to investigate. What is your duty here? Are you a smith of some kind?
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们干活？<hpage>你们的锻打声引我前来。你们在这儿做些什么？可是铁匠？
translated_text: おぉ!小さなスパイクバグ、なぜ私たちの仕事を邪魔するの？<hpage>あなたの船の音は私に調査を促した。ここでの任務は何ですか？あなたはスミス？
secondary_translated_text: oh! Little spike bugs, why do you interfere with our work?<hpage>The sound of your ship prompted me to investigate. what's your mission here? are you smith?

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target fifteen times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: オラ!オラ!試合の時間だ!ターゲットが見えたら、まっすぐな釘を拾ってヒットしましょう!<page>目標を15回達成できれば、賞品はあなたのものです!
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! It's time for the game! When you see the target, pick up a straight nail and hit it!<page>If you can achieve your goal 15 times, the prize is yours!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: スミスは？そんなに粗くない!私たちは創造の娘!昆虫はどうして見えないのか？<page>私たちのルートは古代のルートであり、名誉ある役割です。これらの港とその周辺の土地は幸運にも私たちのスキルを持つ。<hpage>あなたが言うように才能があるなら、私を助けてくれますか？私は汎用ツールを欠いており、あなたは良い代替品を作ることができません。<page>確かに、ブレードとトラップ？あなたのタイプを知っている!<hpage>ちょっとしたけど、この国では変なの？プロセスに大きな課題をもたらすものもあります。<page>フン!そしてそれらを作りますしかし!!あなたは材料と私たちの時間の補償を提供します。
secondary_translated_text: what about smith? Not so rough! We are the daughters of creation! Why can't we see insects?<page>Our route is an ancient route and an honorable role. These ports and the lands around them are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you say, will you help me? I lack a general-purpose tool, and you can't make a good substitute.<page>sure, blade and trap? I know your type!<hpage>i'm sorry, but is it weird in this country? Some of them pose significant challenges to the process.<page>HUN! And I make them but!! You will provide the material and compensation for our time.
