original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target twenty-five times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子二十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: オラ!オラ!試合の時間だ!ターゲットが見えたら、まっすぐな釘を拾ってヒットしましょう!<page>目標を25回達成できれば、賞品はあなたのものです!
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! It's time for the game! When you see the target, pick up a straight nail and hit it!<page>If you reach your goal 25 times, the prize is yours!

original_en_text: Well, perhaps that’s enough games for now, eh?<page>We’ll need to come up with a much trickier challenge to best you, my lady!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我想就先玩到这里为止？<page>我们得琢磨个更刁钻的挑战才能赢过您，女士！
translated_text: まあ、今のゲームで十分ですよね。<page>私たちはあなたを倒すためにもっと難しい挑戦をする必要があります、私の女性!
secondary_translated_text: Well, that's enough for the game now, right?<page>We have to take a harder challenge to defeat you, my lady! "

original_en_text: This world may not have long, but we shall face its end still delivering our duty.
original_zh_text: 这世界或许时日无多，但咱就算直面末日也要把活干完。
translated_text: 世界は長くは続かないかもしれませんが、私たちは責任を果たし、その結果に直面します。
secondary_translated_text: The world may not last long, but we will meet our responsibilities and face the consequences.

original_en_text: To maintain one’s tools is a constant task. These shards should be kept close when you travel, that you can repair and replenish as the need arises.
original_zh_text: 保养工具需要持之以恒。旅程中应当随身携带这些碎片，以便随时进行修理和补充。
translated_text: ツールのメンテナンスは継続的な作業です。必要に応じて修理や補充を行うことができるように、旅行中は近くに保管してください。
secondary_translated_text: Maintenance of the tools is an ongoing task. Keep it nearby during travel so that repairs and replenishments can be made as needed.

original_en_text: Pop inside the diving bell once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: 気分が良くて準備ができたら、すぐにダイビングベルに飛び込みます。その間、私はここですべてを見るでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: When you feel good and ready, you immediately jump into the diving bell. In the meantime, I'll see it all here.

original_en_text: A vicious stabbing trap? We can build it. Just know, it disturbs us, these devious implements you conceive to kill.
original_zh_text: 带尖刃的陷阱是吧？能造。但你得知道，我们可不喜欢鼓捣这些阴险的杀戮工具。
translated_text: 邪悪な刺し傷？構築できます。あなたが殺したいこの狡猾な道具に私たちを動揺させることを知ってください
secondary_translated_text: an evil stab wound? You can build. Know that you're going to upset us with this cunning tool you want to kill.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Welcome, my lady, so glad you found us here! I can see you’re blessed with strong limbs and keen sight.<page>Fond of frolics are you? Keen to test your aim? We’d be right honoured to play a little game with you. A little test of skill we’ve set up.<hpage>I’ve no need to test my skills, sir, nor do I have time for frivolities.<page>Oh, but we’d make it worth your while! A prize awaits you, if you can meet our challenge!<hpage>If you offer a prize, that changes matters. I can meet any challenge if the reward is sufficient. What are the rules of your game?<page>Exceedingly simple, my lady! I’ll provide the pins for throwing, and my associate will provide a target. Hit the target fifteen times and you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！欢迎大驾光临！真高兴您找到这儿！一看您就是肢强目锐的虫。<page>喜欢玩游戏吗？要不要来试试准头？我们设计了个小游戏，可以考验您的技巧。<hpage>先生，我无需试炼技艺，更无空闲嬉闹。<page>别呀！奖品丰厚着呢！只要完成挑战，奖品就是您的！<hpage>既然有奖品，倒可以尝试。只要奖励足够丰厚，任何挑战都能接受。游戏规则是什么？<page>简单至极！我将为您提供掷针，我的伙计会提供靶子。击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: オラ!オラ!ようこそ、私たちを見つけてくれて嬉しいです!手足が強く、視力が鋭いのですね。<page>遊ぶのは好きですか？あなたの目標をテストすることに興奮？私たちはあなたと小さなゲームをプレイできて光栄です。スキルテストを実施します。<hpage>私は自分のスキルをテストする必要はありません知性を学ぶ時間もありません<page>しかし、私たちはそれを価値がある!挑戦を受け入れることができれば、賞品が待っています!<hpage>賞を与えれば、状況は変わります。報酬があれば、どんな挑戦でも構いません。あなたのゲームのルールは？<page>とても簡単です、お嬢様!私は投げピンを提供し、同僚はターゲットを提供します。目標を15回打つと、貴重な賞品が手に入ります!
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! Welcome, I'm glad you found us! You have strong arms and legs and sharp eyesight.<page>Do you like to play? Are you excited to test your goals? We are honored to play a little game with you. We will conduct a skill test.<hpage>I don't have to test my skills, I don't have time to learn my intelligence.<page>But we are worth it! If you can accept the challenge, the prize is waiting!<hpage>If you give an award, things change. If there is a reward, it doesn't matter what challenge it is. What are the rules of your game?<page>It's very easy, miss! I provide the throwing pin and my colleague provides the target. Hit the target 15 times and you'll get a precious prize!

original_en_text: A heavy door chained with a simple padlock.
original_zh_text: 一扇厚重的门扉，挂着一只简易挂锁。
translated_text: シンプルな南京錠で施錠された重いドア。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy doors locked with simple padlocks.

original_en_text: <hpage>This bell could carry me below, but it will first require a key, and an operator to aid its descent.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此钟可载我下沉，但需要钥匙开启，还需要操作员协助下潜。<hpage>我自己难以达成此事，需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>この時計は私を降ろすことができますが、まず鍵とオペレータがそれを降ろすのを助けます。<hpage>私一人ではできません。港の人たちが手伝ってくれる。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>This watch can let me down, but first the key and the operator will help me to get it down.<hpage>I can't do it alone. " The people in the port will help.

original_en_text: Oi! What’s with all these tremors? This smelt still need shovelling, and the shakes’re only making it harder.
original_zh_text: 啊喂！这震天动地的，到底是怎么回事？晃荡个没完，还让不让干活了？
translated_text: おい!何でそんなに震えてるの？カボチャもシャベルが必要で、揺れるとシャベルが難しくなります。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! why are you shaking so much? Pumpkins also need a shovel, and when shaken, it becomes harder to shovel.

original_en_text: <hpage>Though tied by charge, would you provide me your service, Forge Daughter? I have need of tools that your skills could likely provide.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们虽有使命在身，但可否为我打造些工具？你们的手艺应该能胜任。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>差不多，有些可能是你们没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: <hpage>料金は限られていますが、娘を偽造するサービスを提供してくれますか？あなたのスキルが提供するツールが必要です。<page>確かに、ブレードとトラップ？あなたのタイプを知っている!<hpage>ちょっとしたけど、この国では変なの？プロセスに大きな課題をもたらすものもあります。<page>フン!そしてそれらを作りますしかし!!あなたは材料と私たちの時間の補償を提供します。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The fee is limited, but do you offer a service to fake your daughter? You need the tools that your skills provide.<page>sure, blade and trap? I know your type!<hpage>i'm sorry, but is it weird in this country? Some of them pose significant challenges to the process.<page>HUN! And I make them but!! You will provide the material and compensation for our time.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to return above. Please ready the bell for me.<page>Aye, miss. Sit on the bench, and let’s get you hauled up.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我需要返回地面。请准备上浮。<page>好嘞，小姐。坐稳扶牢，这就把你拽上来。
translated_text: <hpage>私はそこに戻らなければならないベルを用意してください。<page>はい、お嬢さん。ベンチに座って助けてあげましょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have to go back there, please prepare a bell.<page>Yes, Miss. Let's sit on the bench and help them.

original_en_text: Quite a lot of targets struck, and quite a lot of rosaries earned! Our lady never fails to impress us!
original_zh_text: 击中了非常多目标，念珠赚得盆满钵满！女士，您总能让我们大开眼界！
translated_text: 彼は多くのゴールを決め、多くのロザリオを獲得しました!私たちの女性はいつも感動します!
secondary_translated_text: He scored a lot of goals and won a lot of Rosarios! Our women are always touching!

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Have to stop you there. That’s three times now you’ve missed your mark! I’m afraid that makes you the loser of our little game, with all due respect.<page>Fret not though, for we never tire of playing! Step over here, and we can start another game.
original_zh_text: 哎哎！得叫停啦。您已脱靶三次！恕我直言，这局算您输。<page>没关系，我们的游戏永远欢迎您！请移步这边来，我们再开一局。
translated_text: オラ!オラ!止めなければなりませんあなたは3回逃した!失礼しますが、私たちの小さなゲームでは負け犬になることを恐れています。<page>でも心配しないでください、私たちは決して退屈しません!ここに着いたら、別のゲームを始めることができます。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! You have to stop. You missed it three times! Excuse me, but I'm afraid we'll be losers in our little game.<page>But don't worry, we'll never get bored! Once you get here, you can start another game.

translated_text: 値上げをキャンセル？
secondary_translated_text: Cancel the price hike?

original_en_text: This trinket is our own invention. It wards against the deadly lava and heat around these docks. The workers used to request them of us. Now they’ve lost the mind to care.
original_zh_text: 这宝贝可是我们的独家发明，可以用来抵御深坞致命的熔岩与高温。往日工虫们争相求购，如今它们却连心智都已涣散。
translated_text: この装飾品は私たち自身の発明です。これらの桟橋の周りの致命的な溶岩と熱に耐えた。労働者はよく私たちに尋ねた。彼らは関心を失った。
secondary_translated_text: This ornament is our own invention. They endured the deadly lava and heat around these piers. The workers often asked us. They have lost interest.

original_en_text: Farewell, then. If you require our craft, this forge is always hot.
original_zh_text: 慢走不送，需要造东西的话随时过来。
translated_text: じゃあね、さようなら。私たちのプロセスが必要な場合は、このストーブは常に熱いです。
secondary_translated_text: See you, bye. If our process is needed, this stove is always hot.

original_en_text: The new shell-shield’s all bolted on tight, miss. If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you where you’re goin’.
original_zh_text: 我把新护壳加固得很严实，小姐。如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: 新しい砲弾と盾がロックされていますまた降りるつもりなら、頭を下げて叫んでください。行きたいところに連れて行きます。
secondary_translated_text: The new shells and shields are locked and if you're going down again, bow your head and shout. I'll take you wherever you want to go.

original_en_text: <hpage>The behaviour of your fellow workers, I’ve seen similar... agitation upon the roads. These docks are not alone in the strangeness of their occupants.<page>’Tis odd behaviour to be sure, but not for Ballow and us to know. Ours is busy work, and we keep to ourselves.<page>Whatever the goings on of the world outside, no bother to us, as long as our craft can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你同僚的这般行径，我在路上也见过类似的……狂躁。这码头的住民并非孤例。<page>这种行为确实奇怪，但我们和巴洛可懒得深究。我们只管埋头干活，少管闲事。<page>外头天塌地陷都与我们无关，只要这门锻造手艺能传下去就行。
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたの同僚の間で同様の行動を見た。道路上の騒動。住民が知らないのは港だけではない。<page>“本当に奇妙な行動だったが、バーロウと我々はそれを知らなかった。私たちは忙しいので、自分自身を気にしません。<page>外で何が起ころうとも、私たちの船が続く限り、私たちはそれを邪魔しません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I've seen similar behavior among your colleagues. Commotion on the road. It's not just the port that residents don't know about.<page>"It was really strange behavior, but Burlow and we didn't know it." We are so busy that we don't care about ourselves.<page>No matter what happens out there, as long as our ship continues, we will not interfere with it.

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to serve these docks, Forge Daughter?<page>Sent from our Forgehome we were, at request of those holy bugs above.<hpage>The Citadel dwellers? The veiled bugs? They ordered you here?<page>Yes! An age ago that. Such is duty! We Forge Daughters live to hone the craft, and aid the line.<page>By the Citadel’s patronage, and our long duty upon these docks, our Forgehome would swell in holy esteem.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们为何来此码头效力？<page>是上头那些圣虫召我们来的，我们在熔炉乡收到了调令。<hpage>圣堡的住民？那些覆面虫？是他们下令调遣你们来这儿的？<page>正是！都是陈年旧事了。职责所在嘛！我们熔炉之女活着就为磨砺手艺，延续传承。<page>靠着圣堡的庇佑和在这些码头长年累月的苦工，熔炉乡的名望自会愈发神圣。
translated_text: <hpage>どうやってこの港に来たのですか？<page>上の神聖な昆虫の要請により、私たちはフォーゲルハウスから送られました。<hpage>お城の住人？隠れた間違い？ここに来るよう命じられたのか？<page>はい!はい!それは1年前のことですそれが責任だ!私たちは娘の命を築き、職人技を磨き、生産ラインの建設を手伝いました。<page>城の後援とこれらの桟橋に対する長年の責任により、私たちの鍛造家は神聖な敬意を払います。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>how did you come to this port?<page>At the request of the sacred insect above, we were sent out of Vogel House.<hpage>the inhabitants of your castle? Hidden mistakes? were you ordered to come here?<page>yes! yes! That was a year ago, that's the responsibility! We built our daughter's life, honed her craftsmanship, and helped her build a production line.<page>With the patronage of the castle and the years of responsibility for these piers, our blacksmiths have a sacred reverence.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’d expected this workshop too would contain only combative types, but you seem composed, Forge Daughter.<page>You’ve met the workers? They’re all wound up! They still work at their tasks, in a simple way, but they’re useless for conversation. It’s only ourselves and young Ballow with any sense left.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我原以为这工坊里全是些好斗之徒，但你们倒是沉着清醒，熔炉之女。<page>见过那些工虫没？个个跟上了发条似的！它们没日没夜机械式地干活，但早就不会聊天了。如今只剩咱和那边的巴洛还保留着些清醒。
translated_text: <hpage>このセミナーは攻撃的な人だけだと思っていましたが、落ち着いて娘さんを育ててくれました。<page>従業員を見たか。みんな緊張してる!彼らはまだ簡単な方法でタスクを完了しますが、会話には役立ちません。私たちと若いバーロウだけに理由があります。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I thought this seminar was only for aggressive people, but it was calm and helped me raise my daughter.<page>Have you seen the employees? Everyone is nervous! They still complete the task in an easy way, but it doesn't help the conversation. There's only us and young Barlow for a reason.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that last plunge must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And see below, for its failure I’ve been workin’ hard at improving the design! Your last journey ended up being a valuable test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is long closed to me, and your bell is now needed again.<page>Again? We’ll if you’re game enough to try a second time... A shell-shield’s been fitted, and the bell’s like new. Better’n new!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……护壳已经装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: ミス!!うーん...。ウロ、生き残ったのを见たどうして...。最後のジャンプがあなたの終わりだと思った。<hpage>いいえ、いいえ。私は秋を生き延び、冒険に戻った。<hpage>潜水時計の故障はよく分かります。責任はない。<page>はい!はい!あなたが言ったように!この時計は古い。時間はこのような慎重に作られたものを壊す方法を見つける。<page>下をご覧ください。失敗したときは、デザインの改善に努めました!あなたの最後の旅は貴重な試練でした。咳をする<hpage>よし、よし。私の道は長い間閉ざされていた今、私は再びあなたの鐘が必要です。<page>また？2回目の挑戦に興味があれば、私たちはそうします。蓋が取り付けられると、ベルが新しくなります。より良い更新!<page>また降りるつもりなら、頭を下げて叫んでください。そうすれば、道に連れて行きます。
secondary_translated_text: miss! um... how did you see how he survived? I thought the last jump was your end.<hpage>No, no, no. I survived the fall and returned to adventure.<hpage>I understand the failure of my diving clock. There is no responsibility.<page>yes! yes! As you said! " This clock is old. Time will find a way to break something so carefully crafted.<page>Please see below. When I failed, I tried to improve the design! Your last journey has been a precious test. Coughing.<hpage>All right, all right. Now that my path has been closed for a long time, I need your bell again.<page>again? If you're interested in a second challenge, we will. Once the lid is installed, the bell is new. Better update!<page>If you're going down again, just bow your head and shout. If you do, I will take you on the road.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I am ready. Please prepare the bell for departure.<page>S’time to take the plunge, aye, miss? Just sit on the bench, and I’ll see you strapped in tight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我已就绪。请准备下潜。<page>好嘞，小姐，跳水时间到了。在椅子上坐稳，我来给你捆严实咯。
translated_text: <hpage>準備はできています。鐘を鳴らす準備をしてください。<page>リスクを取る時間ですよね、お嬢さん。ベンチに座っているだけで、しっかりと縛られているのが見えます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm ready to go. Be prepared to ring the bell.<page>It's time to take a risk, isn't it, little girl? You can only see him sitting on the bench and being tied tightly.

original_en_text: An old mechanism with a keyhole.
original_zh_text: 一个带钥匙孔的老旧机关。
translated_text: 鍵穴付きの古い機器。
secondary_translated_text: Old equipment with a keyhole.

original_en_text: It’s done, miss! I’ve fitted the shell-shield. Bell’s like new. Better’n new even!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.<hpage>Your work is appreciated, sir. Know that, with luck, the threat from below might soon be quelled, and your lands shall rest calm.<page>Well... Good! I’m only really wishin’ to return to the forge, and my regular duties... A little purpose, routine...<page>Frankly, miss, all this action’s more’n a bit overwhelming for bugs like me. I’ll be glad when it’s all over... Providing we survive, of course.
original_zh_text: 搞定啦小姐！护壳装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。<hpage>辛苦你了。若是运气好，下面的威胁很快便会平息，此地也能重回安宁。<page>那敢情好！我只盼着早日回熔炉干回老本行……有点奔头，按部就班……<page>说真的，小姐，这种大场面对我这种小虫子来说太刺激了。等这一切都结束后，我们……当然，前提是我们能活下来。
translated_text: 終わったよお嬢さん!シェルシールドを設置しました。ベルは新品同様です。より良い、または新しい!<page>また降りるつもりなら、頭を下げて叫んでください。そうすれば、道に連れて行きます。<hpage>あなたの仕事は高く評価されます。運が良ければ、下からの脅威はすぐに覆され、あなたの土地は穏やかになるかもしれません。<page>よし...。よし!私は本当に鍛冶屋に戻り、日々の仕事をしたいです。小さな目標、ルーチン。<page>率直に言って、ミス、これらの行動はすべて私のような虫には少し過剰です。これが終わったら嬉しいです。もちろん、生き残ることが前提です。
secondary_translated_text: it's over, miss! I installed a shell shield. The bell is as new. Better, or new!<page>If you're going down again, just bow your head and shout. If you do, I'll take you on the road.<hpage>Your work will be highly valued. If you're lucky, the threat from below may soon be overturned and your land may become calm.<page>okay, okay. okay! I really want to go back to the blacksmith and do my day job. Small goals, routines.<page>Frankly, miss, all these actions are a bit excessive for a worm like me. I'm glad this is over. Survival is the premise, of course.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that drop must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And you can see here, for its failure I’d already been workin’ at improving the design! Ended up being a useful test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is now closed to me, and your bell may still be needed if I choose to descend again.<page>Again? Well, if you’re game enough to try a second time...Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……等新护壳装好，保准能扛住下坠！绝对没问题！
translated_text: ミス!!うーん...。ウロ、私はあなたが生き残ったのを見た。なんとなく。その一滴があなたの終わりだと思った。<hpage>いいえ、いいえ。私は秋を生き延び、冒険に戻った。<hpage>潜水時計の故障はよく分かります。責任はない。<page>はい!はい!あなたが言ったように!この時計は古い。時間はこのような慎重に作られたものを壊す方法を見つける。<page>ご覧の通り、デザインが失敗したため、改善に取り組んでいます!これは有用なテストになります。咳をする<hpage>よし、よし。戻る道は閉ざされている。もう一度降りることを選んだとしても、まだあなたのベルが必要かもしれない。<page>また？もう一度試してみたいならこの新しい保護カバーは、一度設置すると、落下に絶対に耐えられます!もちろんです!
secondary_translated_text: miss! um... Uro, I saw you survived. " somehow. I thought that one drop was your end.<hpage>No, no, no. I survived the fall and returned to adventure.<hpage>I understand the failure of my diving clock. There is no responsibility.<page>yes! yes! As you said! " This clock is old. Time will find a way to break something so carefully crafted.<page>As you can see, the design has failed, so we are working on improving it! This will be a useful test. Coughing.<hpage>All right, all right. The way back is closed. Even if you choose to go down one more time, you may still need your bell.<page>again? If you want to try it again, this new protective cover, once installed, will absolutely withstand falling! of course!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then soon, yes! I may accept. But not now! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那行，你过阵子再来！咱会造出来给你看！这会儿活儿太多，咱忙不过来！
translated_text: スミスは？そんなに粗くない!私たちは創造の娘!昆虫はどうして見えないのか？<page>私たちのルートは古代のルートであり、名誉ある役割です。これらの港とその周辺の土地は幸運にも私たちのスキルを持つ。<hpage>あなたが言うように才能があるなら、私を助けてくれますか？私は汎用ツールを欠いており、あなたは良い代替品を作ることができません。<page>確かに、ブレードとトラップ？あなたのタイプを知っている!<hpage>ちょっとしたけど、この国では変なの？プロセスに大きな課題をもたらすものもあります。<page>フン!すぐに、はい!私は受け入れられる。でも今はダメ!やるべきことはたくさんあり、心配することはできません。
secondary_translated_text: what about smith? Not so rough! We are the daughters of creation! Why can't we see insects?<page>Our route is an ancient route and an honorable role. These ports and the lands around them are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you say, will you help me? I lack a general-purpose tool, and you can't make a good substitute.<page>sure, blade and trap? I know your type!<hpage>i'm sorry, but is it weird in this country? Some of them pose significant challenges to the process.<page>HUN! Immediately, yes! I am accepted. But not now! There's so much to do and I can't worry about it.

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother this Forge Daughter at their work?<hpage>These black quakes that wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You would wish to descend so deep?... It is true these docks possess the means. Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharoom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们熔炉之女干活？<hpage><hpage>如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: おぉ!小さな尖頭虫、なぜこの鍛造娘の仕事を邪魔するのですか？<hpage>これらの黒い地震はあなたの土地を破壊し、私はそれらが源から、火の池の下に消えるのを見たい。<page>そんなに深く潜りたいですか？これらの港には解決策がありますが、私たち自身はできません。ファルムが健康であろうと死であろうと、私たちの責任は常に私たちをこののるつぼに結びつけます。<page>バーロウに質問があり、我々の運命があなたの行動が示唆するほど恐ろしいかどうかは、彼には迅速な説得が必要だと確信している。
secondary_translated_text: oh! Little conworm, why do you interfere with this forge daughter's work?<hpage>These black earthquakes have destroyed your land, and I want to see them disappear from the source, under the lake of fire.<page>do you want to dive that deep? These ports have a solution, but we ourselves cannot. Whether Farm is healthy or dead, our responsibility will always bind us to this crucible.<page>I am convinced that Barlow has questions, and that he needs prompt persuasion whether our fate is as terrible as your conduct suggests.

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 过阵子再来，小尖头虫！眼下正忙着呢，少添乱！
translated_text: 後に戻ってきて、虫!やるべきことはたくさんあり、心配することはできません。
secondary_translated_text: Come back later, bugs! There are so many things to do and I can't worry about it.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获得终结黑灾的力量。很快便将行动，平息震动，拯救此地。<page>干得好，小尖头虫。你这小身板里的劲头倒是大得出奇。<page>咱还会守在这儿。若咱这手艺能助你成事，尽管开口便是。
translated_text: <hpage>娘を鍛えたことで、この黒い狂気を終わらせる力を得ました。私はすぐに地震を止め、土地を救うために行動する。<page>重大で重大な誤り。このような小さな人にしては、あなたのエネルギーとエネルギーは驚くほど大きいことがわかりました。<page>私たちのサービスがお客様の重要なタスクを支援できる場合は、喜んで提供し続けます。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>By training my daughter, I have gained the power to end this black madness. I will act immediately to stop the earthquake and save the land.<page>Serious and serious errors. For such a small person, I have found that your energy and energy is surprisingly large.<page>If our services can help you with important tasks, we will be happy to continue to provide them.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>祝你好运，小尖头虫。平息这外头的狂乱，咱才能继续安心干活。
translated_text: <hpage>大切にして娘を育ててあなたの助けが必要なら、私は戻ってくる。<page>私たちの願いはあなたと共にあります、シャープバグ。世界の破壊を鎮めてこそ、私たちの使命は続くのです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I really need your help raising my daughter, I'll be back.<page>Our wishes are with you, Sharp Bug. Only by stopping the destruction of the world will our mission continue.

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此操控装置颇为复杂。若想要乘潜钟下潜，需要有操作员协助。<hpage>需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>これらの制御は複雑です鐘の下で降りる必要がある場合は、まずオペレーターが必要です。<hpage>港の人たちが手伝ってくれる。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>These controls are complex If you need to get off under the bell, you first need an operator.<hpage>The people in the port will help.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我可以出发了。请整备好潜钟。<page>好嘞，小姐。在椅子上坐稳，我这就送您下潜。
translated_text: <hpage>私は去りたいのです旅のベルをご用意ください。<page>もちろん、お嬢さん。ベンチに座って、私はあなたを降ろします。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I want to leave. Please prepare the bell for the journey.<page>Of course, miss. Sit down on the bench and I'll let you down.

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗，女士？<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: 私たちの小さなゲームに興味がありますか？<page>目標を15回打つことができれば、貴重な賞品を獲得できます!
secondary_translated_text: Are you interested in our little game?<page>If you can hit the target 15 times, you will win valuable prizes!

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: <page>嘿！小尖头虫，你回来了？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得哭天抢地的。<page>不过无所谓，咱还得守着熔炉干活。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: おぉ!スパイクバグ、戻ってきたの？私たちの世界は深刻な新たな災害で壊れ、泣いています。<page>しかし、この工場とそのサービスを維持し続けなければなりません。私たちの責任は一生です。
secondary_translated_text: oh! spikebug, are you back? Our world is broken and weeping in a serious new disaster.<page>But we must continue to maintain this factory and its services. Our responsibilities are lifelong.

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.
original_zh_text: 有事找老板说去。我正忙着呢。
translated_text: 何か必要なことがあれば、上司に相談してください。私は忙しい。
secondary_translated_text: If you need anything, you should consult your boss. I'm busy.

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.
original_zh_text: 布满操纵杆与仪表的控制台。
translated_text: 様々なレバーと楽器を備えたコントロールパネル。
secondary_translated_text: A control panel with various levers and instruments.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。<hpage>此建筑底部有座潜钟可用。我需要把它打开，并有个操作员送我下沉。<hpage>如今码头清醒者寥寥无几，此事只能由你来办。<page>没看我正忙吗，小姐？眼下铲矿石的活还干不完呢。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌，覆灭无可避免。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>私は火の池に入りたいのです<hpage>構造物の底には潜水時計があり、作業に適しているようです。オペレーターが深く送るように、それを開けるように頼みます。<hpage>これらのドックでまだそれについて考えている数少ない人々の一人として、役割はあなたに落ちなければなりません。<page>私が忙しいのがわかりませんか？土を掘ると、他のことをする時間がありません。<hpage>私を助けないと、あなたの努力はすぐに無駄になります。王国は崩壊する。その崩壊は避けられない。もしあなたの仕事と人生を続けたいなら、今すぐ私を助けなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I want to get into the lake of fire.<hpage>There is a diving clock at the bottom of the structure, which seems to be suitable for work. Ask the operator to open it, as it sends deep.<hpage>As one of the few people still thinking about it in these docks, the role has to fall on you.<page>don't you see i'm busy? When you dig up the soil, you don't have time to do anything else.<hpage>If you don't help me, your efforts will soon be wasted. The kingdom is falling apart. That collapse is inevitable. If you want to continue with your work and your life, you have to help me now.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。能否请你助我一臂之力？<hpage><page>唔……如果您是往深坞最底层去，那边倒是有口老潜钟专门干这活的。<page>可这玩意儿需要有另一只虫在地面操作才能下水。我虽然会弄，但眼下铲矿石的活儿堆成山，实在没闲工夫管别的啊。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>私は火の池に入りたいのですこの仕事を手伝ってくれる？<hpage><page>うーん...。さて、ドックの底に行くと、あなたが望むもののために特別に作られた古いダイビングベルがあります。<page>問題は、乗ることはできますが、それを送るにはドックの側に立っているオペレーターが必要です。私にはできるかもしれませんが、他にやるべきことをする時間がありません。<hpage>私を助けてください、さもなければ、あなたの努力はすぐに無駄になります。王国は崩壊した。もしあなたの仕事と人生を続けたいなら、今すぐ私を助けなければなりません。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>i want to go into the lake of fire. will you help me with this job?<hpage><page>um... Well, when you go to the bottom of the dock, there's an old diving bell made especially for what you want.<page>The problem is, you can ride it, but you need an operator standing by the dock to send it off. I may be able to do it, but I don't have time to do anything else I should do.<hpage>Please help me, or else your efforts will soon be wasted. " The kingdom has collapsed. If you want to continue with your work and your life, you have to help me now.

translated_text: 挑戦を始める？
secondary_translated_text: start a challenge?

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.
original_zh_text: 喂！谁在那儿？不管你是谁，如果想要下潜，最好来操控台找我聊聊。
translated_text: おい!誰が座る？下に誰がいても、怒って旅行してみたいなら、コンソールで私を待って、チャットできるようにした方がいい。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! who's sitting? Whoever's down there, if you're angry and want to travel, you'd better wait for me at the console and let me chat.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你被火焰吞噬了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！尽管你像在自寻死路，咱还是祝你多活些时日。
translated_text: よし、よし。よし、よし。生きている!あなたは最も困難なもので構成されていることを証明した、ドットバグ。<page>バーロウはあなたのダイビングベルの複雑さとそれを取り戻すためのあなたの不在について謝罪した。<page>彼はあなたが炎に負けることを心配していますが、私たち自身も少し推測しています。<hpage>下から戻るのは今までで最も難しい登りでしたが、近い将来、また降りる必要があります。<page>あなたは狂っている、バグ!または非常に勇敢。たとえそれを終わらせようとしても、生き続けてほしいのです。
secondary_translated_text: All right, all right. All right, all right. He's alive! You've proven that you're made up of the most difficult things, Dot Bug.<page>Barlow apologized for the complexity of your diving bell and your absence to retrieve it.<page>He's worried you'll lose to the flames, but we're guessing a little ourselves.<hpage>Getting back from the bottom was the most difficult climb ever, but in the near future, we will have to go down again.<page>You're crazy, Bug! Also very brave. Even if you try to end it, I want you to live on.

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?
original_zh_text: 游戏还没完全结束，女士！想真正挑战自己一把吗？再来一局如何？<page>击中靶子二十五次，这条精美的念珠项链就是您的！意下如何？
translated_text: ゲームはまだ終わっていません、お嬢さん!本当に自分を試したいなら、もう一度プレイしましょう!<page>ターゲットを25回打つと、美しいロザリオのネックレスが手に入ります!何を言った？
secondary_translated_text: The game isn't over yet, miss! If you really want to test yourself, play it again!<page>After hitting the target 25 times, you will get a beautiful Rosario necklace! what did i say?

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>行！不来也行。只要手艺没断，咱都没意见。
translated_text: <hpage>娘を育てる。あなたの助けが必要なら、私は戻ってくる。<page>はい!はい!またはない。このプロセスが続く限り、私たちは大丈夫です。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Raising my daughter. If I need your help, I'll come back.<page>yes! yes! No more. As long as this process continues, we are fine.

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 别犹豫，女士！瞄准了就狠狠地扎过去！
translated_text: 躊躇しないでください、女性!狙いを定めて投げる!
secondary_translated_text: Don't hesitate, ladies! Set a target and throw it!

original_en_text: If you add the implements from this set to your own, the quality of your crafting will increase. You will produce finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 若将此套器具与你的工具结合，你的制作水准将更上一层楼。你将打造出更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: このツールセットを独自のツールに追加すると、生産品質が向上します。より薄く、より鋭く、より致命的なツールを生成します。それがあなたが望むものなら。
secondary_translated_text: When you add this toolset to your own tools, you will improve production quality. It produces thinner, sharper, and more lethal tools. If that's what you want.

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.
original_zh_text: 用布满尖刺的毯子让敌人减速？如此普通的工具还能在战斗中应用，我们可从没想到过。
translated_text: 釘の層を打つつもりですか？これは間違いなくあなたの獲物を遅くする。こんな一般的なツールを使って戦うなんて考えたことがない。
secondary_translated_text: Are you going to hit the nail layer? This will definitely slow down your prey. I never thought I would fight with such a common tool.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, ola! Perhaps I neglected to tell you not to cross past those markers? It’s a law of the game, and we all abide by laws here, don’t we?<page>Your actions have disqualified you, my lady, but we harbour no ill will! Step over here and we can begin a new round at once!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我可能忘了告诉您别越过那个标记？游戏规矩总得遵守，对吧？<page>您犯规出局，但我们之间绝不会因此产生芥蒂！请移步这边来，我们马上新开一局。
translated_text: ああ、ああ!看板を越えるなと言い忘れたのかもしれない。これはゲームのルールであり、我々はここの法律に従うでしょう？<page>あなたの行為はあなたを失格にしますが、あなたを傷つけるつもりはありません!ここに着いたら、すぐに新しいラウンドを始めることができます!
secondary_translated_text: Oh, oh, oh! Maybe I forgot to tell you not to go over the sign. These are the rules of the game and we will follow the laws here?<page>Your actions will disqualify you, but I'm not going to hurt you! Once you get here, you can start a new round right away!

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. A fair prize, wouldn’t you say?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！成了！这位女士成功击中靶子十五次，完美胜出！<page>玩得开心吧？在这病怏怏的世道里找点乐子也算是良药，您说是不是？<hpage>我原以为这类游戏该留在太平年月，但或许你说的也有道理。<hpage>现在我已完成挑战，是否该兑现奖品了？<page>当……当然！我看您自带工具袋，里面准是塞满了各种零碎小玩意！<page>我给您的工具袋上加个新口袋，能多装点工具。这奖品公道吧？
translated_text: オラ!オラ!それだけだうちの女性は15回も目標を達成!美しい勝利です!<page>hope you have fun!この困難な時期には、少しの軽薄さも慰めになりますよね。<hpage>このようなゲームは平時まで保存した方がいいと思いますが、おそらくあなたは真実を話しています。<hpage>私があなたの挑戦を乗り越えた今、私が獲得した賞を取ってくれますか？<page>ああ...。もちろんです!自分の装備を持っている。間違いなく、小物や小物がいっぱい!<page>その上に別のポケットを置いて、より多くの道具や破片を運ぶことができます。それは公正な賞だと思いませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! That's all, our women have achieved their goal 15 times! What a beautiful victory!<page>I hope you have fun! In these difficult times, even a little lightness can be comforting, right?<hpage>I think games like this are better to save for normal times, but probably you're telling the truth.<hpage>Now that I have overcome your challenge, will you take the prize I have won?<page>ah... of course! They have their own equipment. Undoubtedly, lots of little things and trifles!<page>You can put another pocket on top of it to carry more tools and debris. don't you think that's a fair prize?

original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我们给您准备了终极挑战，女士！<page>连续击中靶子次数越多，赢取的念珠越多！敢试试吗？
translated_text: オラ!オラ!興味がある方は、最後の挑戦があります。<page>できるだけ多くの目標を逃しないでください。より多くのターゲットをヒットすればするほど、より多くのロザリオを獲得できます!やってみる？
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! If you're interested, there's one last challenge.<page>Don't miss as many goals as you can. The more targets you hit, the more Rosarios you will earn! you want to try?

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我在一处古老织巢中发现了这件武器。虽年代久远损毁严重，但以你们的手艺应该能修复。<page>嚯，好东西！这活儿够意思，只要报酬合适，咱就帮你重铸。
translated_text: <hpage>鍛造娘、私は古代の織物職人の巣で武器を見つけました。老化は大きなダメージを与えますが、あなたのスキルは回復できると信じています。<page>これは印象的なツールであり、素晴らしい挑戦です。価格が良ければ武器を再構築できます
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Blacksmith daughter, I found a weapon in the nest of an ancient weaver. Aging can do great damage, but I believe that your skills can be restored.<page>This is an impressive tool and a great challenge. If the price is good, you can rebuild your weapons.

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.
original_zh_text: 交易愉快，小尖头虫。眼下我们的活儿还多着呢，有需要再来。
translated_text: 公正な交換、重大な誤り。今、私たちの仕事は呼び出される。私たちの貿易と人材のニーズを見つけたら、戻ってください。
secondary_translated_text: Fair exchange, grave error. Now our work is called upon. When you find our trade and human resources needs, please come back.

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.
original_zh_text: 希望巴洛能帮上忙，小尖头虫。在码头干了这么多年，他是咱见过最得力的助手。
translated_text: 私たちはBallowがあなたのために働くことを望む、スパイクバグ。彼はこれらの港での長年の奉仕の中で最高のアシスタントでした。
secondary_translated_text: We hope Ballow works for you, Spike Bug. He was the best assistant in all his many years of service in these ports.

translated_text: 上昇する？
secondary_translated_text: rising?

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你已经葬身火海了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: よし、よし。よし、よし。そこにある、鋭い間違い!あなたは最も困難なもので構成されていることを証明した。<page>バーロウはダイビングベルの複雑さと、あなたが最初にそれを取り戻したときの不在について恥知らずに話しました。<page>彼はあなたが炎に負けることを心配していますが、私たち自身も少し推測しています。<hpage>下から戻るのは、以前に経験したことのない難しい登りでしたが、もう一度降りなければなりませんでした。<page>あなたは狂っている、バグ!または非常に勇敢。<page>バーロウからの手紙を受け取ったことを知った後、彼は潜水時計の修復作業について以下に説明しました。このタスクは今完了できます。<page>あなたが彼の仕事を試したいなら、もう一度あなたの生存を願っています。当社独自のサービスがお客様のミッションクリティカルに役立つ場合は、今後も喜んで提供していきます。
secondary_translated_text: All right, all right. All right, all right. There it is, a sharp mistake! You have proven that you are made up of the most difficult things.<page>Barlow spoke shamelessly about the complexity of the diving bell and its absence when you first retrieved it.<page>He's worried you'll lose to the flames, but we're guessing a little ourselves.<hpage>To come back from the bottom was a difficult climb I had never experienced before, but I had to go down again.<page>You're crazy, Bug! Also very brave.<page>After learning that he had received a letter from Barlow, he described the work on repairing the diving clock as follows: This task can now be completed.<page>If you want to try his job, I hope you survive once more. If our unique services help your mission-critical needs, we'll be happy to continue providing them.

original_en_text: And not a single target was struck... a right shame, that! We can’t reward you with any rosaries, my lady, but we’d love to see you test your aim once more!
original_zh_text: 一次都没中……太可惜啦！我没法给您念珠，女士，但欢迎随时再来试试准头！
translated_text: ターゲットに当たらない。残念ですね、あれ!ロザリオをご褒美にすることはできませんが、もう一度ゴールを試すのを楽しみにしています!
secondary_translated_text: Not hitting the target. What a pity, that! I can't reward Rosario, but I'm looking forward to trying another goal! "

original_en_text: A weapon from a long distant past. We can combine the Weaver components with our own mouldings to repair the tool.
original_zh_text: 远古时期遗留下来的武器。可以将织者的部件与我们自造的铸件结合，修复这件工具。
translated_text: 遠い過去の武器。Weaverコンポーネントを独自の金型と組み合わせてツールを修復することができます。
secondary_translated_text: Weapons from the distant past. You can combine the Weaver component with your own mold to repair the tool.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, these black quakes that now wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You wish to descend so deep, pointy bug?... It is true these docks possess a craft capable.<page>Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharloom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: <hpage>これらの黒い地震は今、あなたの土地を破壊しており、私はそれらが源から、火の池の下で鎮まるのを見ようとしています。<page>こんなに深く鋭い昆虫に飛び込みたいですか？これらのドックには能力のある宇宙船がある。<page>私たちは無力です。ファラムが健康であろうと転倒であろうと、私たちの責任は常にこののるつぼと私たちを結びつけます。<page>バーロウに質問があり、我々の運命があなたの行動が示唆するほど恐ろしいかどうかは、彼には迅速な説得が必要だと確信している。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>These black earthquakes are now destroying your land, and I'm going to watch them settle down from the source, under the lake of fire.<page>do you want to dive into such a deep, sharp insect? These docks have capable spaceships.<page>We are powerless. " Whether pharam is healthy or falling, our responsibility will always bind us to this cradle.<page>I am convinced that Barlow has questions, and that he needs prompt persuasion whether our fate is as terrible as your conduct suggests.

original_en_text: Crafting by claw alone produces inferior results. With this kit, you can craft finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 单凭你的肢爪，只能造出粗劣的工具。有此匣相助，你便可打造更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: 爪だけではうまく機能しません。このキットでは、より薄く、より鋭く、より致命的なツールを作成できます。それがあなたが望むものなら。
secondary_translated_text: The nails alone do not work well. This kit allows you to create thinner, sharper, and more lethal tools. If that's what you want.

translated_text: 絶望的？
secondary_translated_text: Desperate?

original_en_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! No doubt some task of great import pulled you away.<page>That’s an instant disqualification, of course. You understand. But we don’t hold it against you, not at all! Care to play again?
original_zh_text: 女士，您离开得很匆忙！肯定是有要事要忙吧。<page>这局只能直接判负，希望您理解。但我们不会计较这种小事！要不要再来一局？
translated_text: あなたは私たちのゲームを急いで去った!確かに、いくつかの重要なタスクはあなたを解放します。<page>もちろん、これは即時失格です。ご理解いただけますが、ご意見はございません。また遊びたいですか？
secondary_translated_text: You left our game in a hurry! Sure, some important tasks will set you free.<page>Of course, this is an immediate disqualification. I understand, but I have no opinion. Do you want to play again?

original_en_text: <hpage>I need a moment, sir. Please unlock the bell that I may exit.<page>Seein’ some sense? Can’t blame ya if you’re thinkin’ on backin’ out. It’s a mad hope that old bell’d even survive the trip.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我还需要一点时间。打开钟门让我出来。<page>总算清醒了？打退堂鼓也不怪你。那破钟能撑到湖底本就是个疯念头。
translated_text: <hpage>時間が必要です、先生。ドアベルを鳴らして、私は出て行きます。<page>意味があるの？あなたが去りたいなら、私はあなたを責めません。人々はベル老人がこの旅を生き延びることを必死に願っていた。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You need time, sir. Ring the doorbell and I'll go out.<page>does that mean anything? If you want to leave, I don't blame you. The people were desperately hoping that Old Bell would survive this journey.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there has been an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is unfit for travel. Retrieve it if you may, but I shall not return within.<page>...iss...istake...erwhelm...retrie...a...ssible...
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，能听见吗？下潜途中出了点故障。<hpage>钟体已损坏，无法继续下潜。你可试着把它打捞上岸，但我无法乘它返回。<page>……错……错误……过载……无法……打捞……
translated_text: <hpage>私の話を聞いているなら、降下中に事故がありました。<hpage>この壊れた状態では、ベルは旅行に適していません。できれば教えてくださいが、もう入りません。<page>... ISS..。永遠に。検索..。sibleです。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you're listening to me, there was an accident on the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is not suitable for travel. I'll tell you if I can, but I won't go in anymore.<page>... The ISS... Forever and ever. The search... It is Sible.

original_en_text: Oh no... no, not at all. Wouldn’t do us any good, would it? No, it seems like this little frolic of ours is well and truly finished.<page>Oh, but what an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 不不……不用。我们玩得起，也输得起。看来我们的游戏需要告一段落了。<page>但与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: ああ...。完全にないことは私たちには良くないですよね。どうやら、私たちの小さなゲームは終わったようだ。<page>でも、一緒に遊ぶことができて光栄でした!ポケットの中のロザリオがガタガタするのを感じるたびに、私たちのことを考えてください。
secondary_translated_text: ah... Not being completely there is not good for us, is it? Apparently, our little game is over.<page>But it was an honor to play with you! Every time you feel the rattling of the rosary in your pocket, think of us.

original_en_text: Ola! That’s... that’s twenty-five times the target has been struck!<page>My lady... I thought perhaps you’d have a little more trouble with this round, but you’ve emerged victorious again.<page>I’ll have to speak to my associate. I don’t think he provided you with enough of a challenge, truth be told.<hpage>It was challenge enough. My prize, sir?<page>
original_zh_text: 哎！这……命中二十五次了！<page>女士……本以为这局能让您吃点苦头，结果您又赢了。<page>我得找我的伙计谈谈，说实话他给您设的挑战不够难。<hpage>我觉得够难了。那么奖品呢，先生？
translated_text: オラ!それは..。目標を25回達成!<page>マダム。このラウンドでもっとトラブルになるかもしれないと思っていたが、また勝った。<page>同僚と話す必要があります。正直、彼はあなたに十分な挑戦を与えていないと思います。<hpage>それだけで十分挑戦的です。私の賞品ですか？<page>
secondary_translated_text: Hey! It's a... Achieved the goal 25 times!<page>Madam. I thought I might get more trouble in this round, but I won again.<page>You need to talk to your colleagues. To be honest, I don't think he's giving you enough of a challenge.<hpage>That alone is challenging enough. is this my prize?<page>

original_en_text: Urk! A prize, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>Here then... a lovely necklace full with rosaries. I’d been hanging onto this for a while, but you’ve earned it fairly.<page>I just hope you think of me when you wear it, my lady!
original_zh_text: 啊！当然有！必须有！<page>给您……缀满念珠的漂亮项链。我私藏好久了，但您赢得实至名归。<page>希望您佩戴它时能想起我，女士！
translated_text: え~!賞品はもちろん!女性には賞品があります!<page>それでここに。ロザリオでいっぱいの素敵なネックレスです。私はしばらくそこにいたが、あなたはそれに値する。<page>それを身に着けているときに私のことを考えてほしいだけです。
secondary_translated_text: yeah! The prize of course! Women have a prize!<page>So here you are. It's a lovely necklace full of rosaries. I was there for a while, but you deserve it.<page>I just want you to think about me when you're wearing it.

original_en_text: Leave us! My great master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: 快走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: 私たちから離れて!マスターは考える時間が必要ですが、私は味を考え直す必要があります。
secondary_translated_text: Get away from us! The master needs time to think, but I need to rethink the taste.

original_en_text: Pilgrim who would hold our song within your shell, rise above.<page>Offer your most devout self unto our sacred heart.
original_zh_text: 心怀圣歌的朝圣者，升华吧。<page>将虔信之魂献予圣心。
translated_text: 巡礼者たちはあなたの殻に私たちの歌を隠しています。<page>私たちの聖なる心にあなたの最も敬虔な自己を捧げなさい。
secondary_translated_text: The pilgrims are hiding our songs in your shell.<page>Offer your most godly self to our holy hearts.

original_en_text: ...ilgrim!... ast aside those many sinful hopes for rest ...d reward... remain pure... within our midst... sk for nothing! <page>See... Citadel’s simple stone, bare an... dorned. See h...ain our garb, how sparse o... meal. Know that... excess is sin!<page>Stay vigil... ys, for tho... wretched pilgrims... dare relen... their base desi... Left unpunish... thin our pure chorus... eir seductive sin... pread like flame...
original_zh_text: ……朝圣者！……抛弃休憩与奖赏的邪念……保持纯洁……在我们中间……无欲无求！<page>看这圣堡素石……无华无饰。看这粗布麻衣……清汤寡水。须知奢侈即罪！<page>保持警惕……因那些堕落朝圣者……放纵卑劣欲望……若不惩戒……污秽将如野火蔓延……
translated_text: ...悪!安息の邪悪な希望を捨てる。D報酬。私たちの間で純粋に。尋ねるな!<page>聞いてください。城のシンプルな石が露出している。略称はH。私たちの服装がどれほどまばらか私は知っています。過剰は罪です!<page>警戒しろはい、ために..。かわいそうな巡礼者。もう一度やり直す勇気。基本的なデザイン。幸運にも罰を免れた。純粋な合唱を披露する。これは誘惑的な罪です。炎のように広がる。
secondary_translated_text: ... evil! Give up the evil hope of rest. D Reward. Purely between us. don't ask!<page>Please listen to me. The castle's simple stone is exposed. It is h. I know how sparse our clothing is, and I know how sparse our clothes are. Excess is a sin!<page>Be alert yes, for... The poor pilgrim. Courage to do it again. The basic design. Luckily, he escaped punishment. They show a pure chorus. This is a tempting sin. Spread like a flame.

original_en_text: Accept, a t-t-token of the sentinel’s order.<page>As friends... let us p-part.
original_zh_text: 收下，哨卫信、信物。<page>以友、友人之谊……告别。
translated_text: 受容、センチネルの命令の象徴。<page>友人として。pを分けましょう。
secondary_translated_text: Symbol of reception, sentinel command.<page>As a friend. Let's divide the p.

original_en_text: <hpage>I would view your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>She may see it. A perfect set. This Vaultkeeper is rich with insights. Jealous its fellows would be... If still their minds remained.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我要看看你的收藏，管理员。<page>可以。看这完美收藏。羡慕死其他管理员……如果它们还有脑子的话。
translated_text: <hpage>私はあなたのコレクションをチェックします、財務官。<page>彼女は見えるかもしれない完璧なシーンです。財務管理者は洞察力がある。仲間に嫉妬する。心がまだそこにあるなら。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'll check your collection, Treasurer.<page>She's the perfect scene you might see. Financial managers have insight. I am jealous of my partner. If the heart is still there.

original_en_text: Aaaahh. What’s this? The rasher of a courier, tied up tight! I can see its fat still dripping fresh!
original_zh_text: 送货虫的熏肉！瞧瞧这油脂，还在滴汁呢！
translated_text: あっ!何だこれ？宅配便のラッシャー、しっかり!新鮮な脂肪が滴り落ちているのが見えます!
secondary_translated_text: ah! what is this? The courier rusher, firm! You can see the fresh fat is dripping out!

original_en_text: This stew, of Mossberries stirred thick. Good. Good! It shall form the base once set in mould.
original_zh_text: 德鲁伊的苔莓浓汤，够稠，够味！冻成型就能当基底。
translated_text: クランベリーと一緒に煮込み、濃厚になるまでかき混ぜます。よし、よし。よし!型に入れるとベースになります。
secondary_translated_text: Cook with the cranberries and stir until thick. All right, all right. okay! Once you put it in the mold, it becomes a base.

original_en_text: Ahh... you have brought song again, though perhaps it is wasted on one as unworthy as I.<hpage>You needn’t satisfy my curiosity if it pains you, sir, but I must ask, for what crime or sin did the Citadel imprison you?<page>My sin? A grave transgression, the cause of much pain for many. But to speak of a sin... is to invite its return. I will say no more.
original_zh_text: 啊……你又带来歌声，可惜我这罪躯不配聆听。<hpage>若勾起你伤痛可以不答，但我必须问：圣堡因何罪囚禁你？<page>我的罪过？我犯的错带来了许多伤痛。但罪过……是请它归来。我不想多说。
translated_text: あっ...。私のような人間にとっては無駄かもしれませんが、また曲を持ち込んでいます。<hpage>もしあなたが苦しんでいるなら、私の好奇心を満たす必要はありませんが、私は尋ねなければなりません。城はあなたを投獄した罪や罪は何ですか？<page>俺の罪？これは重大な違反であり、多くの人々に大きな苦しみをもたらしました。しかし、罪について話すとき。それを呼び戻すことですもう何も言わない
secondary_translated_text: ah... It may be useless for a human being like me, but it brings in a song again.<hpage>If you're suffering, you don't have to satisfy my curiosity, but I have to ask. what is the crime or guilt that the castle imprisoned you for?<page>my sin? This is a serious violation and has caused great suffering to many people. But when we talk about sin. It's about recalling it, saying nothing more.

translated_text: Hymn って？
secondary_translated_text: What is Hymn?

original_en_text: By the purity of your will... the c-c-clarity of your intent... you are innocent of the silken curse.<page>Failed, has this sentinel. Your j-judgment, will it accept.<hpage>Is this truly failure, gilded one? You meant to test me and have done so. I would expect nothing less of a true guardian.<hpage>The matter is resolved. There is no need for death. Stand, and let us part as friends.
original_zh_text: 凭纯、纯粹意志……清明本心……你未受魂丝侵蚀。<page>哨卫失、失职。甘受裁、裁决。<hpage>真有失职吗？你完成了测试，我认为已经尽了守卫之职。<hpage>此事到此为止，无需生死相搏。起身吧，你我以友相别。
translated_text: あなたの意志の純粋さ。あなたの意図は明確です。あなたは無実のシルクの呪いです。<page>失敗した、この警備員。Jさんの判断を受けますか？<hpage>金メダリスト、これは本当に失敗なのか？あなたは私を試したかったし、すでにそれをした。真の守護者への期待は衰えません。<hpage>問題は解決した死ぬ必要もない。立ち上がって、友達のように別れましょう。
secondary_translated_text: The purity of your will. Your intentions are clear. You are the curse of innocent silk.<page>You failed, this guard. Do you accept J's judgment?<hpage>Gold medalist, is this really a failure? You wanted to try me and you've already done it. Our expectations for the true guardians do not wane.<hpage>The problem is solved and you don't have to die. Let's stand up and part like friends.

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找一份腌淤秽蛆。那是被放逐的卢戈利大厨的招牌菜。<page>听说那混蛋躲到中部地区的潮湿洞穴了……
translated_text: その強さのために尊敬され、非難されている神聖な珍味であるキムチウジ虫を探してください。料理が下手なため、ずっと前に廃れてしまったルーゴリシェフの名物料理です。<page>噂によると、偉大な料理人は故郷の湿った中央洞窟に撤退した。
secondary_translated_text: Look for the kimchi worm, a sacred delicacy that is revered and condemned for its strength. It is a masterpiece of chef Lugolish, which was discontinued a long time ago because of poor cooking.<page>Rumor has it that the great cook has retreated to the damp central cave of his hometown.

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. I trust now the meal can be made, and the oil awarded for my efforts?<page>You’ll have your oil, whelp! Firstly learn some patience! The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: <hpage>现在食材已备齐，该给我油了吧？<page>你这小虫急什么！得先把菜做得完美才能唤醒主人。<page>在这好好看着！见证这飘香万里的盛宴是怎么诞生的！
translated_text: <hpage>私は約束を守りました。すべての食品が配達された。今なら料理ができると思います。石油は私の努力に報いますか？<page>油を手に入れるぞ、小僧!まず、忍耐を学ぶ!この料理は、私のホストを起こして満腹になるのを見るのに十分に完璧に準備されなければなりません。<page>今だ!私のスキルを発揮させてください。全盛期にFarumを魅了した食事をご覧ください!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have kept my promise. All the food was delivered. I think I can cook now. Will the oil pay off my efforts?<page>You'll get the oil, boy! First, learn to be patient! This dish must be perfectly prepared enough to wake up my host and watch him get full. "<page>now! Please let me show my skills. Check out the food that charmed Farum in its heyday!

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 嗯？是你这红衣虫啊，我还以为上面有虫来解释地震是怎么回事呢。<page>上面那帮渎职的家伙！惊扰主人的消化谁担待得起！<hpage>比起消化不良，你该庆幸自己没有受伤。<page>跟运气可没什么关系，我这把老骨头比现在那些软脚虾仆从硬朗多了！
translated_text: え？えっ？ああ、それはただの赤い虫です。私は上記の人が、すべてのこの轟音と揺れの意味を説明するために何かを言ってほしい。<page>彼らは神聖な義務を果たさなかった。私の主人はこれらの不便を避けなければならない。<hpage>消化不良よりも悪い運命があります怪我をしなくてよかった。<page>運命とは関係ない。私は最近の悲惨な時代の鈍い若い召使いよりも強い品種に過ぎません!
secondary_translated_text: what? what? Oh, that's just a red bug. I would like the above person to say something to explain the meaning of all this roaring and shaking.<page>They have failed to fulfill their sacred duty. My masters must avoid these inconveniences, and I will not let them go. "<hpage>I'm glad I didn't get injured, because I've got a worse fate than indigestion.<page>It has nothing to do with destiny. I am but a stronger breed than the dull young servant of the recent miserable times!

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 咔！我知道她藏着。揣在披风里。本管理员找了好久。交出来！立刻交出来！
translated_text: RKKT!彼女はそうしました。いつも服の中に隠れていた。見てたわ俺によこせ!こっちによこせ!
secondary_translated_text: RKKT! She did that, she said. He was always hiding in his clothes. i watched it. come on! come on over here!

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 神圣旋律……纺络永恒之魂的具现……这黑暗时代竟能重现荣光……<page>织者坏种，圣歌归你了，带出圣堡吧。这番追寻值得吗？<hpage>值得，而你将继续为我效命。保管好音筒，包括我以后带回来的。
translated_text: 神聖な音楽。ファラオの永遠の魂は暴露された。。。この呪われた時代に、私たちはまだこのような祝福を受けることができます。<page>だからウィーバーの子孫よ、私たちのメロディーは今あなたのものです。私たちの壁からそれを取り除くことを忘れないでください。学習は盗む価値があるか？<hpage>はい、財務省です。あなたのサービスが継続することを知らせてください。シリンダーと私が持ってくる他のシリンダーが安全であることを確認してください。
secondary_translated_text: Sacred music. The eternal soul of the pharaoh has been exposed... In this accursed age, we can still receive such blessings.<page>So, descendants of Weaver, our melody is now yours. Don't forget to remove it from our walls. Is learning worth stealing?<hpage>Yes, the Treasury Department. Please let us know that your service will continue. Make sure that the cylinder and the other cylinder I bring are safe.

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的……朝圣者……黑暗笼罩时……谨记这些箴言……<page>倾听吾声……化为己念！为纺络献身……为赐予我们一切的初代子嗣……为即将到来的……救赎！
translated_text: ...愛しい人...。真面目な今は黒く見えるそんな言葉をさせて。あなたのガイドになる。<page>私たちの声を聞け自分のものを手放しなさい!お届け..。あなた自身のこと。偉大なファラオのために私たちの最初の子供、サルヴァのためにそれを残してください。来てください!
secondary_translated_text: ... dear ones... Seriously, now you can make that look black. Be your guide.<page>Listen to us and let go of your own! Delivered... About your own. Leave it for our first child, Salva, for the great Pharaoh. " Please come here!

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 甜味得用陈年蜜露，嗅觉敏锐的老饕才懂欣赏。<page>这陈酿怕是失传了……唉！可圣宴缺不得这醇香！
translated_text: 甘いシチューが欲しければ、レトロな甘露を見つけてください。繊細な昆虫に大切にされ、卓越性を追求する希少なビール。<page>この古いリターンがまだ存在する可能性はほとんどありません。ああ! ああ!その味の深さは神聖な料理に必須です!
secondary_translated_text: If you want a sweet stew, find a retro honeydew. A rare beer cherished by delicate insects and pursuing excellence.<page>There is little chance that this old return still exists. oh! oh! Its depth of taste is a must for sacred cuisine!

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 哈！……朝圣者！……你已攀至……永恒怀抱……立于圣堡石阶……须知……真正侍奉现在开始。<page>忘却……疲惫躯壳……摒弃……休憩之欲……纺络……命你……献上……最珍贵礼物！加入合唱……抬起躯壳……放声高歌！
translated_text: 聞いてくれ!悪!あなたは..。永遠の抱擁に登る。誰が立ち上がった？荒涼とした石造りの城へ。本当のサービスが始まります。<page>忘れた..。疲れた体。諦めて、衝動は残る。arloomコマンドお届け..。最高のプレゼント!合唱に参加してください。シェルの改良。声は···歌え!
secondary_translated_text: listen to me! evil! You are a... Climbing into an eternal embrace. who's standing up? To a desolate stone castle. The real service begins.<page>I forgot to... A tired body. Give up and the impulse remains. Arloom Command delivers... The best gift! Please join the chorus. Improvement of shell. The voice is... sing!

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 主菜要送货虫的熏肉，那群按点报时的家伙最爱吃。<page>往日时常能在这看见他们，如今连个虫影都没了！
translated_text: 食事の中心には、おいしい肉、宅配便のゴミを見つけ、鐘が鳴るたびにやってくる活発な昆虫がいる。<page>多くの宅配業者が脂っこいスナックを食べているのを見た。みんなどこにいるの？彼らは神聖な努力をあきらめたか？
secondary_translated_text: At the center of the meal are the lively insects that come every time the bell rings, finding delicious meat, courier trash.<page>I saw a lot of couriers eating greasy snacks. where's everyone? Have they given up on their sacred efforts?

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 虽说主人铜肠铁胃，但这动静也太吓人了。<page>不过不用怕，我就算拼了命也会保护主人！
translated_text: マスターたちはスタミナが強いのですが、ゴロゴロと壊れている音は彼らの安全を心配させます。<page>心配しないで、私は私の古い殻が壊れるまで彼らと一緒にいます。
secondary_translated_text: The masters have a strong stamina, but the rumbling and broken sound makes them worry about their safety.<page>Don't worry, I'll stay with them until my old shell breaks.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋，生蛋蛋！吃饱饱，长胖胖，就能下好多蛋蛋！<page>他们给我这么多吃的，肯定想要好多蛋蛋！<page>只要对我好，要多少有多少！嘻嘻！
translated_text: 卵、卵、おい!私はたくさん食べて、大きくて太っています。卵をたくさん入れてみます!<page>たくさんの食べ物を持ってきてくれたので、卵が欲しかったのです。<page>私に優しくしてくれたら、たくさんいるでしょう!えっ!!
secondary_translated_text: Eggs, eggs, Hey! I eat a lot, and I am big and fat. I 'll try to add lots of eggs!<page>I wanted eggs because they brought me lots of food.<page>If you'd be kind to me, there would be plenty! what?!

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: <hpage>原以为响应的是友军召唤，但此刻感知到你的意图。<hpage>你要兵刃相向？视我为敌？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清、清除所有被魂丝蛊惑者……是必要使命。<hpage>你认为我被苍白丝线操控？恐怕你错了，我的灵丝与意志皆属于我。<page>判、判断存疑。你似被侵蚀又似清白。遗憾……哨卫必须测、测试你的意志。
translated_text: <hpage>私は友人、少なくとも同盟者としてあなたの呼びかけに応えたと思っていましたが、今ここに立っていると、あなたの意図を感じることができます。<hpage>私にナイフを突きつけたいのです私はあなたの敵ですか？<page>神聖な城を守り、その中の音を満たすことは、歩哨の永遠の義務です。<page>結末は、ささやきの絹に魅了されたすべての人々の避けられない運命です。<hpage>私が幽霊だと思いますか？白い絹の奴隷ですか？あなたはそれよりも洞察力があると思います。私の絹は私のものであり、私の意志です。<page>わからない、これは警備員です。あなたは幽霊で無邪気に見える。残念ながら、このセンチネルはあなたの意志力をテストする必要があります。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I thought I had answered your call as a friend, or at least as an ally, but standing here now, I can feel your intentions.<hpage>you want to stick a knife at me. am i your enemy?<page>It is the eternal duty of the sentry to guard the sacred castle and to satisfy the sound within it.<page>The end is the inevitable fate of all those who are captivated by the silk of the whisper.<hpage>you think i'm a ghost? a white silk slave? I think you have more insight than that. My silk is mine, and it is my will.<page>I don't know, this is a security guard. You look ghostly and innocent. Unfortunately, this sentinel needs to test your willpower.

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
translated_text: 中央に鍵穴がある華やかなロック機構。
secondary_translated_text: A gorgeous locking mechanism with a keyhole in the center.

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 陈年蜜露！没想到真的还存在，这等陈酿我都没福品尝，全都得给主人留着！
translated_text: マナ!そんな古いものがまだ存在すると考えてください!美しい悲劇で、自分の味を味わうことができません。私のマスターはすべての滴を取得する!
secondary_translated_text: Mana! Imagine if such an old thing still exists! It's a beautiful tragedy, and I can't taste my own. My master will get every drop!

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 好！好！她交出了……归我们了！<hpage>遗物给你了，管理员。该兑现承诺了。<page>蠢货！竟敢命令本管理员。这般傲慢本该处死……若不是你带着织者的味道。<hpage>看来你知晓我的血脉，学者虫。若此地以我血脉为尊，我要求你为我效劳。<page>哼！早该灭绝的坏种……还是死干净为好……<page>咳，但本虫受过训诫。它会收起利爪，会分享知识，尽其所能。<page>唯有初代子嗣，能让本管理员低头。
translated_text: はい!はい!はい!はい!彼女が与えた。俺たちのだ!<hpage>私は廃墟を通り抜けました。今、あなたの約束を守り、あなたの洞察力で私を助けなさい。<page>バカ野郎!財務管理者への要望彼女の生意気さは死をもたらすのに十分だった-もし彼女がウィーバーの卵の匂いを運んでいなかったら。<hpage>先祖が学んだ過ちを知っている。あなたがここで私の好みを見つけるなら、私はあなたのフルサービスを楽しみにしています。<page>ブレイク!死んだぞ!あなたの邪悪な仲間は死ぬ運命にある。この状態を維持した方がいいと思います。<page>Gkkt。それが教えられたことです。爪を折りたたむ。収集した知識をできるだけ多く発信します。<page>財務官は最初の子供にしか従わない。
secondary_translated_text: yes! yes! yes! yes! She gave it to me. It's ours!<hpage>I walked through the ruins. Now, keep your promise and help me with your insight.<page>You bastard! Appeal to the Treasury Manager Her awkwardness was enough to bring death - if she had not carried the smell of the Weaver's eggs.<hpage>We know the mistakes our ancestors learned. If you find my preference here, I look forward to your full service.<page>break! he's dead! Your evil companion is doomed to die. I think it's best to keep this state.<page>Gkkt. That's what we were taught. Folding your nails. Disseminate as much of the knowledge you have gathered as possible.<page>The treasurer only obeys the first child.

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 怯懦的可怜虫啊，既踏上伟大舞台，便是命运所选！<page>抛却恐惧，与我共演！重燃纺络将熄的火焰！<page>唤醒沉寂的圣堡！唤醒这片土地的魂魄！
translated_text: おお、単調で震えるパント、大いなる舞台の臆病な者たちよ、運命はあなたたちが選ばれたのを見た!<page>恐れを捨てて、私の仲間になりなさい。ファルの火は輝くかもしれないが、一緒に火をつけよう!<page>静かな城を再現しよう!この偉大な国の魂を目覚めさせましょう!
secondary_translated_text: O monotonous and trembling pant, cowards of the great stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Let go of your fear and be my companion. The fire of the fallout may shine, but let's light it together!<page>Let's recreate the quiet castle! Let us awaken the soul of this great nation!

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在寻找书库的旋律，用于开启上层通路。把你知道的告诉我。<page>织者竟想染指圣歌？！……何等黑暗的时代……异乡客妄图窃取圣律……<page>唯有深居书库之底的主教知晓……最高机密，独享的学识……<page>据说他们在地底发现了什么……旋律或歌词中的真相……令其沉默的真相……<hpage>我不惧真相，管理员。若你的主教在底下等着，我会找到他们。
translated_text: <hpage>財務官、私は上の開いた道の一部として、あなたの金庫室に運ばれるメロディーを探しています。どれくらい知っているか教えてください。<page>ウィーバー神聖なメロディーを奪うものがあるのか？私たちはどんなに厳しい時代に生きているのかそれを部外者に渡すのはどんなに卑劣な恥辱なのか<page>私たちの墓の中で長く謙虚な人生を送った教皇だけが、邪悪で貪欲にメロディーをつかんだのです。これはトップファイナンシャルマネージャーとその学習についてです<page>彼らは真実を発見したと言われた。メロディーの中のもの、あるいは暗闇の中の言葉。彼らを静かにする何か。<hpage>私は何を聞くか恐れていません、財務省。あなたの教皇とそのメロディーが下で待っているなら、私は彼らを見つけるでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Treasurer, I am looking for a melody to be carried to your vault as part of the open road above. Tell me how much you know. "<page>Weaver, is there anything that takes away your sacred melody? What a harsh time we live in, what a despicable disgrace it would be to hand it over to outsiders.<page>Only the Pope, who lived a long and humble life in our tombs, has grasped the melody with wickedness and greed. This is about top financial managers and their learning.<page>They were told that they had discovered the truth. Something in the melody, or words in the darkness. Something to keep them quiet.<hpage>I'm not afraid of what to hear, Treasury. If your pope and his melody are waiting below, I will find them. "

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 好！公平交易，织者坏种。本管理员将用智慧解析其中奥义。
translated_text: はい!はい!素敵な贈り物、ウィーバーの子孫。財務担当者は素晴らしいアイデアをマスターできる知識を集めます。
secondary_translated_text: yes! yes! Nice gift, descendant of Weaver. Finance professionals gather the knowledge that enables them to master great ideas.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等引领。
translated_text: それが終わっても、歌はまだ流れている。<page>永遠のファルのために、私たちは導きます。
secondary_translated_text: Even when it's over, the song is still flowing.<page>For the sake of an eternal fal, we lead.

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 咔！她带了什么？更多需要解读的圣物？圣堡的圣咏音筒？快交出来！必须立刻交出来！
translated_text: GRUK。何を持ってきた？守護者の洞察を待っている宝物はたくさんありますよね？神聖な城の金庫？彼らを超えて彼らに与えなさい。今だ!彼女はすべき!
secondary_translated_text: Gruk. what did you bring with you? there are many treasures waiting for the guardian's insight, right? the sacred castle vault? Give to them beyond them. now! She should! "

translated_text: <hpage>私はここにいる、ゴールドマン。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm here, Goldman.

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 圣堡永存，哨、哨卫的忠诚也永存。<page>只要机能尚存……职责不怠。
translated_text: 城は永遠だ。Et-t-ternalはセンチネルの忠誠心です。<page>完全に機能するシェルにもかかわらず、センチネルは忠実に任務を遂行します。
secondary_translated_text: The castle is eternal. Et-t -ternal is the loyalty of the sentinels.<page>Despite a fully functioning shell, the Sentinel faithfully performs its mission.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，荣登终阶的稀世天选。聆听我等祈愿，实现我等祈愿。方可升华，得见朝圣终焉。
translated_text: あなた方の稀な選択であるファルムの永遠の巡礼者は、この最後の入り口に到達し、私たちの願いに耳を傾け、それを実現し、あなた方が超越して巡礼の旅の終わりを見ることができるようにしました。
secondary_translated_text: Your rare choice, the eternal pilgrim of Firm, has reached this last entrance, has listened to our wish, has fulfilled it, and has allowed you to transcend and see the end of your pilgrimage journey.

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 入侵者！你已经找到主教圣歌，却还在此游荡！<page>回下层聆听室去！圣音筒可以演奏了，圣歌终将在此黑暗时代重现！
translated_text: 侵入者!あなた、私たちの教皇の聖なるメロディー!あなたはそれを見つけ、それを持っていたが、今、あなたは私たちの棚の上をさまよい、ダニのように道を見失っている!<page>下のリスニングルームに戻ります。聖なる柱が演奏され、この呪われた時代に、私たちの金庫のメロディーがついに聞かれるようになった。
secondary_translated_text: Intruder! You, the sacred melody of our Pope! You found it and had it, but now you wander over our shelves, lost your way like a tick!<page>Back to the listening room below. The sacred column was played, and in this accursed age, the melody of our vaults was finally heard.

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 色、香、味……俱全！纺络的绝世盛宴！<page>我的主人，让您久等了！快醒醒，开饭啦！
translated_text: 味も匂いも生地も完成!この食事はファラムの最高の食事に匹敵します。<page>マスター、こんなにおいしい料理を食べるのをどれくらい待っていたのですか？一緒に夕食を!
secondary_translated_text: The taste, smell and fabric are complete! This meal is comparable to the best meal in pharam.<page>Master, how long have you waited to eat such a delicious dish? Have dinner together!

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 饿饿……咦？你是来喂我的吗？<hpage>我只是路过，小家伙。你把这当作巢穴了？<page>巢穴？对呀！又暖又舒服。大个子们总给我带吃的！现在就好饿！
translated_text: おいしい、おいしい。おぉ!私に仕えるために来たの？<hpage>私はただの訪問者です、小さな男。ここが家だと思いますか？<page>私の家？ああ、そうだ!かわいくて暖かい。お腹が空いた時に食べ物を送ってくれました。お腹すいた!
secondary_translated_text: Delicious, tasty. oh! are you here to serve me?<hpage>I'm just a visitor, little man. do you think this is home?<page>my home? Oh, yes! Cute and warm. He sent me food when I was hungry. I was hungry!

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我有要事在身，让你主人先将就吃点吧？<page>放肆！就算把我榨成油膏摆上桌，也要让主人享用圣宴！
translated_text: <hpage>私にはもっと緊急の任務があります。ご主人様は簡単な食事をしますか？<page>冒涜的だ!たとえ私が貝殻を油に浸して皿に登らなければならなかったとしても、私の主人は彼らにふさわしい神の赦しに値します。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have a more urgent task to do. " Do you want your host to eat a simple meal?<page>blasphemy! Even if I had to dip my shells in oil and climb up to a dish, my masters deserve the divine forgiveness they deserve.

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 调味……一定得用硬壳果。珊瑚川里以前满地都是，现在就算只剩沙堆，应该也能刨到几颗。
translated_text: このような料理の味。殻付きのナッツのみが製造される。かつては、サンゴに覆われた洞窟の頂上に数十羽の鳥が集まっていた。<page>砂に覆われた土地で育つのでしょうか。
secondary_translated_text: The taste of such dishes. Only nuts with shells are produced. Once upon a time, dozens of birds gathered at the top of a coral-covered cave.<page>Will they grow on sand-covered land?

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等教化。
translated_text: それが終わっても、歌はまだ流れている。<page>永遠のファローのために、私たちは教えます。
secondary_translated_text: Even when it's over, the song is still flowing.<page>For the sake of eternal followers, we teach.

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻典藏司铎之音，回荡宏伟书库。<page>他们守护历史、祷文与秘辛，跨越无尽纪元。
translated_text: 彼らの壮大な金庫で守護者の声を聞くでしょう。<page>彼らは私たちの歴史、祈り、そして時代を超えた秘密を守っています。
secondary_translated_text: You will hear the voice of the Guardian in their magnificent vaults.<page>They guard our history, our prayers, and our timeless secrets.

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself.
