translated_text: かわいそうな生き物はあまりにも穏やかで甘やかされた人生を送った。壁の外の世界ではうまくいきません
secondary_translated_text: The poor creature lived a life too calm and spoiled. It doesn't work out in the world outside the walls.

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 与重装部队配合作战的敏捷翼兵。
translated_text: 軽武装偵察機は通常重武装偵察機とペアになる。
secondary_translated_text: Lightly armed reconnaissance aircraft are usually paired with heavily armed reconnaissance aircraft.

translated_text: 葬儀屋さん
secondary_translated_text: The Funerals

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 其长索武器的高效性在栖居的宽阔洞窟中总能发挥到极致，这般狡诈的小虫竟也有颗巧匠之心。
translated_text: 彼らの投擲武器は、彼らが住む巨大な洞窟に最適です。これらの狡猾な小さな昆虫は、それらを作るために鋭い爪が必要です。
secondary_translated_text: Their throwing weapons are perfect for the huge caves they live in. These cunning little insects need sharp claws to make them.

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: 甲囊中可弹出尖刺的硬化凯虫。
translated_text: ストロング·ケイは貝殻のポケットから鋭いスパイクを挿入することができた。
secondary_translated_text: Strong Kay was able to insert a sharp spike from a pocket in the shell.

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 与环境的契合程度，印证了千万年演化的精妙。
translated_text: 非常に印象的な模倣。土地と密接に一致するために、彼らのクローバーの洞窟は何世代も続いたに違いない。
secondary_translated_text: A very impressive imitation. To match closely with the land, their clover caves must have lasted for generations.

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这种虫子柔弱笨拙，所幸其栖息洞穴缺乏高效捕食者。此地的生态平衡奥秘值得探究。
translated_text: このバグは柔らかくて愚かですが、幸いにも故郷の洞窟には効果的な捕食者が比較的いないようです。なぜそうなったのか知りたい。
secondary_translated_text: This bug is soft and stupid, but fortunately it doesn't seem to have an effective predator in its home caves. I want to know why this happened.

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮驱动的巨型铁质自动机。
translated_text: 回転する車輪と歯車で駆動される高速鉄道の自動機械。
secondary_translated_text: Automatic machinery of high-speed railway driven by rotating wheels and gears.

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 用锋利珊瑚作为外壳的小型生物，旋转切割无往不利。
translated_text: 小さな昆虫は鋭いサンゴの殻から作ることができる。シェルを回転させて皮膚や骨を切断する。
secondary_translated_text: Small insects can be made from the shells of sharp corals. Rotate the shell to cut the skin and bones.

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 昔日围绕珊瑚塔群居的漂浮生物。
translated_text: かつてはサンゴ礁が大きく、ドリフトも豊富でした。
secondary_translated_text: Once upon a time, there were large coral reefs and plenty of drift.

translated_text: 甲殻類·爬虫類
secondary_translated_text: Crustaceans and reptiles

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
original_zh_text: 外壳比内部要坚硬太多。终生固守一地的生存方式，造就了独特的战斗形态。
translated_text: 自分のフィールドでプレーするのはもっと難しい。このように指揮するためには、塔に一生住んでいたに違いない。
secondary_translated_text: It's more difficult to play on your own field. To command in this way, he must have lived in the tower his whole life.

translated_text: リード·リード
secondary_translated_text: Reed, Reed

original_en_text: Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 负责灵丝残渣回收的高个虫子，尖利的耙子现已成为它的武器。
translated_text: 背の高い昆虫は絹の残渣を蓄積し、再回収の準備をする。彼らの鋭い熊手は刺し武器として使用できます。
secondary_translated_text: Tall insects accumulate silk residue in preparation for recycling. Their sharp bear hands can be used as a stabbing weapon.

translated_text: ブロトラッハ
secondary_translated_text: Trabloche

translated_text: ロイスの人々
secondary_translated_text: The people of Lois

translated_text: 拷問されたトロビオ
secondary_translated_text: Tortured by Trovio.

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 丝咒之地鲜有生物能获取足够养分长至此等体型。
translated_text: 絹が氾濫している地域では、これほど大きくなるのに十分な栄養を見つける生物はほとんどいません。
secondary_translated_text: In areas where silk is flooded, few organisms find enough nutrients to grow this large.

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 游荡的丝线怨魂，重击可将其暂时驱散。
translated_text: 長引く糸の幽霊のような苦しみ。幽霊は本質的には短命だが、激しい打撃で一時的に追い払うことができる。
secondary_translated_text: Suffering like the ghost of a long thread. Ghosts are short-lived by nature, but they can be temporarily driven away with a violent blow.

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 昔日荣光骑士的悲剧命运。这些沾染虚空的丝线，对灵魂的腐化远胜肉体摧残。
translated_text: かつて栄えた昆虫たちの悲劇的な運命。その虚空に浸された糸の糸彼らの魂への腐食に比べれば、彼らの体力は全く何のものでもない。
secondary_translated_text: The tragic fate of the once thriving insects. Their physical strength is utterly nothing compared to the corrosion of their souls, the threads of thread soaked in the void.

translated_text: 検索結果検索
secondary_translated_text: Search Results Search

translated_text: 分裂した姉妹。
secondary_translated_text: Divided sisters.

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 冰晶被毁后仍存有对其原形的记忆，这等材料特性已属非凡，更神奇的是其中似乎竟蕴含着生命？
translated_text: 氷の破片が破壊されても、それは以前の形を覚えています。それは並外れた素材で、おそらくさらに驚くべきことに、生命を含んでいるように見えます。
secondary_translated_text: Even if a piece of ice is destroyed, it remembers its former shape. It is an extraordinary material and, perhaps even more surprisingly, it appears to contain life.

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 其智力远超我所见过的其他造物。它们似乎并非单纯作为工具而被打造，而更像是在追求生命的自我意识。
translated_text: この構造の才能と知性は、私が見たどの構造よりもはるかに優れています。彼らは奉仕の道具というよりも、人生そのものの試みのように思えます。
secondary_translated_text: The talent and intelligence of this structure is far superior to any structure I have seen. They seem more like attempts at life itself than instruments of service.

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 我闯入了这些虫子的领地，并释放了它们。如今它们已蔓延到了各个书库，这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: 彼らの縄張りに入った後、私はこれらのバグをより大きな金庫に感染させました。彼らはトラブルであり、私は自分自身を責めます。
secondary_translated_text: After entering their territory, I infected these bugs into a larger vault, which I found to be a bit of a mess. They are trouble, and I blame myself for that.

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 精心培育出的巨型螨兽，用于追捕逃役工虫。
translated_text: 翼のあるダニの獣で、任務から逃れようとする労働者を捕まえるために大きく繁殖する。
secondary_translated_text: A winged tick beast that breeds large to catch workers trying to escape from their duties.

translated_text: 歯車合唱団の間違い
secondary_translated_text: The Gear Choir's Mistake

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 从地面突然窜出的攻击方式，兼具实用性与趣味性。
translated_text: 地下に出入りする方法は、ほとんど面白い感じがします。獲物を待ち伏せするための楽しく効果的な方法。
secondary_translated_text: The way to get in and out of the basement almost feels funny. A fun and effective way to ambush your prey.

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 花芯长得像恐怖面甲的阴险植物，会突然向外猛戳，重击那些缺乏警惕的虫子。
translated_text: 花核の核は仮面の形を模している。そのコアは不注意なミスに対してプッシュすることができます。
secondary_translated_text: The nucleus of the flower nucleus mimics the shape of a mask. Its core can be pushed against any careless miss.

translated_text: ROACHサーバー
secondary_translated_text: ROACH server

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 岁月的侵蚀使这位仆从行为失常，似乎已经变得敌我不分。
translated_text: 召使いは時間と自然にひどく破壊された。行動が不安定になる。もはや敵と味方の区別がつかないようです。
secondary_translated_text: The servant was badly destroyed by time and nature. Their behavior becomes unstable. It no longer seems to distinguish between enemy and ally.

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 拥有独特的体型和面甲，本应成为传奇生物，如今却处于被遗忘的边缘。
translated_text: 独特のマスクと印象的なフォルム。今、これは君主の前のこの土地のほとんど忘れられたサンプルのもう一つに過ぎません。
secondary_translated_text: Unique masks and impressive forms. Now, this is just another largely forgotten sample of this land before the monarch.

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 主要负责探索和采集，本非战斗种族，最近才开始具有攻击性。
translated_text: これらの昆虫は主に部族兵士の捜索者や食料採集者として機能した。戦いはもはや彼らの本質ではない。
secondary_translated_text: These insects served primarily as searchers for tribal soldiers and as food gatherers. Fighting is no longer their essence.

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 纺络很快就会领教这种物质所带来的诅咒。它所赋予的好处，很快就会被更沉重的代价所掩盖。
translated_text: ファウルはすぐにこの物質の呪いを理解するでしょう。それが提供する利点はすぐに相殺されます。
secondary_translated_text: The foul will soon understand the curse of this substance. The benefits it offers will soon be offset.

translated_text: スカル·スカウト
secondary_translated_text: Scar Scouts

translated_text: ポケナビン
secondary_translated_text: Poquenabin

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 由灵丝悬吊操控的傀儡，圣堡的仆从。一种早期形态的自动构造，需要大量的灵丝来维持其运作。
translated_text: 絹に吊るされた城の傀儡使用人。初期のオートマトンは、サービスを維持するために大量のシルクを必要とした。
secondary_translated_text: A castle puppet servant hanging from silk. The early automata required large quantities of silk to maintain the service.

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 甲木林圣所的永恒守卫者，佩针与钹尽显沧桑。
translated_text: シャーウッド神殿の永遠の守護者。ピンやシンバルには多くの使用跡がある。
secondary_translated_text: Eternal Guardian of the Shrine of Sherwood. There are many uses for pins and cymbals.

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 这些造物被投入使用是有原因的——没有凡虫能在那片炽热之地撑太久，就连我的甲壳也难以抵御那里的高温。
translated_text: 構造が作られているのも不思議。その暑い場所では、人間の昆虫は長くは生き残れません。私の殻でさえ熱に耐えられません。
secondary_translated_text: No wonder the structure is being built. In that hot place, human insects cannot survive for long. Not even my shell can stand the heat.

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 翠庭荒野传说中的苜鹿始祖，能号令草木协同作战。
translated_text: 最初の伝説はめまいの荒野のクロフォスタに関連しています。草と葉に攻撃を助けるよう命令する。
secondary_translated_text: The first legends are related to the dizzying wilderness of Clophosta. Command grass and leaves to help attack.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 维护咏者团秩序的迅捷信徒，必要时以利针执法。
translated_text: 合唱団のボタンは完璧な順序を維持する責任があり、必要に応じて鋭いピンを使用することができます。
secondary_translated_text: The choir buttons are responsible for maintaining perfect order, and sharp pins can be used if necessary.

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 当它未阻挡前路时，笨拙的蠕动反而显得几分憨态可掬。
translated_text: 歩いていくと、シンプルな動きが楽しいと思います。
secondary_translated_text: When I walk, I find the simple movements enjoyable.

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 它胃囊里的酸液储量足以蚀穿圣堡城墙，所幸那对退化的小眼睛总让攻击准头欠佳。
translated_text: 殻の中の層状袋は大量の熱酸を含んでいる。口の中の酸性雨は、食物だと思っているすべての生き物に降り注ぎます。
secondary_translated_text: The layered bags in the shell contain a large amount of thermal acid. The acid rain in your mouth rains down on all the creatures you think are food.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 永不停歇修缮圣堡工厂的重甲劳工。
translated_text: 重くて勤勉な労働者が城の崩壊しつつある地下工事を永遠に修復する。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy and industrious workers forever repair the castle's crumbling underground works.

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 生存的唯一希望，便是被误认作植物。除此之外，它们没有任何防御手段。
translated_text: 自己防衛はできない。生き残る唯一の望みは、植物と間違えられることです。
secondary_translated_text: He cannot defend himself. The only hope of survival is to be mistaken for a plant.

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这一只现在成了我的盟友，不知道是报救命之恩，还是单纯觉得我实力强大，但多个帮手总是好的。
translated_text: この人は、彼らの救いに感謝するか、平等とみなされる人々を尊重するために私と同盟します。どんな理由であれ、彼らの友情は歓迎される。
secondary_translated_text: This man allies with me to be grateful for their salvation, or to respect those who are considered equals. For whatever reason, their friendship is welcome.

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 正是这类虫子穿越洞穴将我带至纺络。被俘前我斩杀了许多，当时认为它们具备独立心智与狡诈。如今我明白是同一意志在支配它们全体。
translated_text: このような虫が洞窟を通ってファルに連れて行ってくれました逮捕される前に多くのことをした。彼らは速くて狡猾だと思った。今、私はそれらすべてを悩ませるユニークな意志を見ることができます。
secondary_translated_text: This kind of worm took me through the cave to the fal and did a lot before being arrested. They thought they were fast and cunning. Now, I can see the unique will that plagues them all.

translated_text: カケリ
secondary_translated_text: Kakery

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 它们喷射的粘稠物质经过及时塑形，一定可以作为优质的制造材料。可惜我无暇采集实验。
translated_text: 新鮮に形成されれば、濃厚な唾液は間違いなく有用なプロセス材料になるでしょう。残念ながら実験を止めることはできません。
secondary_translated_text: If freshly formed, the thick saliva will undoubtedly be a useful process material. Unfortunately we cannot stop the experiment.

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 这些狱卒的恶臭令我窒息。我怀疑它们从未有过沐浴的概念。
translated_text: 警備員の匂いが私の感覚を粉砕した。シャワーを浴びたいかどうかは疑問です。
secondary_translated_text: The smell of the guards crushed my senses. I doubt if you want to take a shower.

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 作为最基础的生命形态，它对我或任何生物都不构成威胁。
translated_text: 最も基本的な生物の一つ。彼は私や他の誰にも脅威を与えなかった。
secondary_translated_text: One of the most basic organisms. He did not threaten me or anyone else.

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 年迈的前朝圣者，利用飞行优势从上方压制目标。
translated_text: 昔の巡礼者。彼らの翼で彼らを脅威の上に置き、大きな殻の下に押しつぶします。
secondary_translated_text: The old pilgrims. With their wings they place them above the threat and crush them under the great shell.

translated_text: スプリントソーン
secondary_translated_text: Sprint Thorn

translated_text: 低木
secondary_translated_text: lowwood

translated_text: クラグラー
secondary_translated_text: Krugler

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 灵丝撑开了它脆弱的甲壳，强行将这副残躯突破凡虫的限制。
translated_text: かつてもろい昆虫が、ねじれた糸によって限界まで追い込まれてしまう。
secondary_translated_text: Once fragile insects are driven to their limits by twisted threads.

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸威胁能威慑捕食者，但轻微碰撞就会导致其提前自毁。
translated_text: 尾部爆発の脅威は捕食者に対する効果的な抑止力であるが、わずかな衝突や落下でも早期に終了する可能性がある。
secondary_translated_text: The threat of tail blasts is an effective deterrent to predators, but even minor collisions or falls can end early.

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生命仅有瞬息的璀璨——它们会感到辉煌还是绝望？抑或是二者交织？
translated_text: たった一つの、明るい瞬間に生きる。どう感じますか？それは栄光か絶望か。それとも両方を組み合わせることができるのか？
secondary_translated_text: Live in just one bright moment. how do you feel? Is it glory or despair? or can we combine both?

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 锁链破空之声依旧精准狠厉——丝咒是否将生前的执念化作了死后的永恒苦役？
translated_text: 彼らの心はほとんど失われたが、鎖を使う技術は忘れられなかった。トラブルは永遠にこの間違いを彼の人生の仕事に関連付けるでしょうか？
secondary_translated_text: Their minds were almost lost, but their skills in using chains were not forgotten. Will Trouble forever associate this mistake with his life's work?

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 暴怒的成年兽蝇，身形沉重，戴着厚重面甲。
translated_text: 怒った大人の獣は空を飛び、かさばり、厚い硬い殻のマスクを被った。
secondary_translated_text: The angry adult beast flew into the sky, and wore a massive, thick hard-shell mask.

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 能蜷缩成球形的小型骨虫。
translated_text: 若い骨の昆虫は体を丸めてボールを形成することができる。
secondary_translated_text: Young bony insects can round their bodies and form balls.

translated_text: 火の父。
secondary_translated_text: Father of Fire.

translated_text: ヒキガエルは
secondary_translated_text: the toads

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 近乎完美的毛茸形态，唯有背刺未去除。改造自然的尝试总是难以尽善尽美。
translated_text: 完璧な毛皮の形に近い。いばらを育てることができれば。
secondary_translated_text: Close to the perfect fur shape. If only we could grow thorns.

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 栖息狭窄裂隙的厚重蠕虫，以沉重身躯撞击敌人。
translated_text: 最も深い巨大なワーム。狭い隙間に生息し、重い体で打つ。
secondary_translated_text: The deepest huge worm. They live in narrow spaces and hit with heavy bodies.

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 癫狂的信徒，通过演奏音乐操控纺络的诅咒灵丝。
translated_text: 熱狂的な愛好家は、音楽を流してファルの幽霊シルクを案内することができます。
secondary_translated_text: The enthusiastic enthusiast can play music to guide the phantom silk of the falcon.

translated_text: ウォルサム
secondary_translated_text: Waltham

translated_text: クラグリット
secondary_translated_text: Cragrit

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些丝线承载着古老痛楚，源自无数残酷改造手术。
translated_text: これらの手がかりは、数え切れないほどの残酷な手順の結果である古代の苦しみに縛られている。
secondary_translated_text: These clues are bound up with ancient suffering, the result of countless cruel procedures.

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 罕见的巨型头骨潜行者，髓骨洞窟的顶级掠食者，以凶暴性情令凡虫闻风丧胆。
translated_text: 希少で巨大なスケルトンマシン。骨髄の中で最大の捕食者はまた、その凶暴な性質のために最も恐れられています。
secondary_translated_text: A rare and huge skeleton machine. The largest predator in the bone marrow is also the most feared because of its ferocious nature.

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 侍奉圣堡的前朝圣者，体型发生过异变。
translated_text: 城で育った元巡礼者。
secondary_translated_text: A former pilgrim who grew up in a castle.

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 执掌腐囊虫庭生杀大权的审判者，用其镀钢长喙对有罪的虫子执行死刑。
translated_text: ファラム、貪欲と正義の主。その鋼鉄のくちばしで、非難された昆虫に死をもたらした。
secondary_translated_text: Pharam, lord of greed and justice. With its steel beak, it brought death to the blamed insect.

translated_text: 空の髭。
secondary_translated_text: The empty beard.

translated_text: 炎のチラシ
secondary_translated_text: Flyer of Flame

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
original_zh_text: 深藏岩骨深处的稀有甲虫，甲壳嵌满燧晶并分泌爆炸性体液。
translated_text: 希少なカブトムシは、一生の大半を骨や岩の奥深くで過ごします。貝殻のフリントの宝石は爆発性粉末を分泌する。
secondary_translated_text: The rare beetle spends most of its life deep in bones and rocks. The gemstones in the shell flint secrete an explosive powder.

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 它们浑身散发着腐殖质恶臭，甲壳缝隙间还粘着陈年血痂。每当那对复眼在牢狱阴影中亮起，连最凶悍的囚徒都会瑟缩墙角。
translated_text: マナーと臭いは忌まわしい。敗北を見ても後悔はしません。
secondary_translated_text: Manner and smell are abominable. When I see defeat, I don't regret it.

translated_text: 翼を持つ巡礼者
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims with wings

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 纺络总在提醒我——钟亦可为兵器。只是从前，我从未想过这些圣器会被如此亵用。
translated_text: ファローはしばしば鐘の武器としての有効性を証明した。こんな風に考えたことはなかった。
secondary_translated_text: Farrow often proved the effectiveness of the bell as a weapon. I've never thought about it this way.

translated_text: クモの母
secondary_translated_text: Mother of Spiders

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 适应虚空环境的管状巨兽。
translated_text: この巨大なチューブ状の獣は、下の空洞の近くに住むのに適しています。
secondary_translated_text: This huge tubular beast is suitable for living near the cavity below.

translated_text: タルラオの陪審員
secondary_translated_text: Jury in Tarao

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 手持沉重铁制钟杖的年长领队，丝咒抹去了它昔日的权威。
translated_text: 古い巡礼者は重い鉄の杖を持っていた。
secondary_translated_text: The old pilgrim had a heavy iron staff.

translated_text: 巡礼者のこと
secondary_translated_text: about the pilgrims.

translated_text: フリントの航空機
secondary_translated_text: Flint Aircraft

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 我曾目睹三只幼体将巢穴化作修罗场，最终胜者甲壳上插满兄弟的尖刺。这种养蛊式的成长，正是圣堡工厂默许的筛选机制。
translated_text: 成長させると、若い昆虫は1匹だけが残るまで支配を争うことになる。
secondary_translated_text: When allowed to grow, the young insects will compete for dominance until only one remains.

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 活灵丝操纵死躯壳……违背自然的造物，在纺络却司空见惯。
translated_text: 活糸指揮死殻-これは自然への冒涜であり、ファレム地方でもよく見られる。
secondary_translated_text: Living thread commanding dead shell - this is an affront to nature and is also common in the Farem region.

translated_text: レッド·レッド·カクテル
secondary_translated_text: Red and Red Cocktails

translated_text: Shadow Chargerシングル
secondary_translated_text: The Shadow Charger

translated_text: カテーテルサクションカップ
secondary_translated_text: Catheter Suction Cup

translated_text: 世界恐慌の時代
secondary_translated_text: The World Depression

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 带电蠕虫团，释放霹雳闪电攻击入侵者。
translated_text: 帯電したワームで構成された巻き巣。爆発的な雷で侵入者を攻撃する。
secondary_translated_text: A winding nest composed of charged worms. Attack intruders with explosive lightning.

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 为低语书库墙外信众布道的高阶虫子。
translated_text: 高いカーストのワームは、つぶやきの財政壁の外にいる人々に説教し、祈りを導く責任があります。
secondary_translated_text: The worm of the high caste is responsible for preaching and guiding prayer to those outside the financial walls of murmuring.

translated_text: 外科医。
secondary_translated_text: Surgeons.

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 若他知晓我与此地虚空缠结的关联，其裁决或许称得上公正——因我确实为腐囊虫族带来了毁灭。
translated_text: 彼は私がこの空虚な土地で果たした役割を理解しているのか？もしそうなら、彼の判断は公平ではない。私はこれらの虫に大きなダメージを与えました
secondary_translated_text: does he understand the role i have played in this empty land? If so, then his judgment is not fair. I did a lot of damage to these bugs.

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 其携带的燃烧材料堪称自然奇迹，具有多种潜在用途。每当路过就被随意投掷袭击，这等浪费行径实在令我扼腕。
translated_text: 彼らが運ぶ燃焼材料は、多くの可能性を秘めた自然の驚異です。私が通り過ぎるたびに、誤ってそれを私に投げつけるのは無駄です。
secondary_translated_text: The burning materials they carry are a natural wonder with many possibilities. Every time I pass by, it is useless to accidentally throw it at me.

translated_text: ココア·フィーダー
secondary_translated_text: Cocoa feeder

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 虽非主力部队，但当我进攻其高塔时，它们倾巢而出进行阻截，阵势不容小觑。
translated_text: 前線の部隊ではなく、私が彼らの塔を攻撃すると、皆が現れ、私が穏やかになるのを見ていました。
secondary_translated_text: Not the troops on the front, but when I attacked their towers, everyone showed up and watched me calm down.

translated_text: プリンセス·プリンセス
secondary_translated_text: Princess, Princess

translated_text: クラファセ
secondary_translated_text: Crafase

translated_text: Wispさん
secondary_translated_text: Mr. Wisp

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 怯战而擅长投掷攻击。最佳策略是快速近身解决。
translated_text: 臆病なタイプ。彼らは射程内に留まり、鋭い武器を投げろうとする。急いで切った方がいい。
secondary_translated_text: Cowardly type. They try to stay within range and throw sharp weapons. You better cut it quickly.

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 佩戴宽幅面甲的远程支援型飞行攻击者。
translated_text: ワイドマスクのパイロットは、地上の仲間を支援しながら射程を維持するよう訓練された。
secondary_translated_text: The wide-masked pilots were trained to maintain their range while supporting their comrades on the ground.

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 表面传播教义，实为铲除异端的思想刽子手。
translated_text: この人の本当の義務は、熱意がないと思われる人々を根絶し、非難することかもしれません。
secondary_translated_text: The real duty of this man may be to eradicate and condemn those who seem to be inert.

translated_text: ケイ·ケイ
secondary_translated_text: Kay Kay.

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池塘的老迈捕手，手持长针，遭受丝咒之苦。
translated_text: 古い捕手はシャーウッド池の上で幽霊に襲われ、長い針を手にした。
secondary_translated_text: The old catcher was attacked by a ghost over Sherwood Pond, and had a long needle in his hand.

translated_text: 放棄されたグル
secondary_translated_text: Abandoned Gur

translated_text: スティルキンの罠
secondary_translated_text: The Stillkin Trap

translated_text: ペンドラグ
secondary_translated_text: Pendrag

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 心智迷失的老练饲育者，挥舞沉重锁链维持虫群秩序。
translated_text: 毛皮の古いゴキブリは重い鎖縄をそっと身に着けていた。
secondary_translated_text: The furry old cockroach was softly clothed in a heavy chain rope.

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些家伙不知何故掌握了操控火灵之术。他们能随心所欲地召唤并指挥它们。
translated_text: これらの生き物はジャングルに住む燃えるエルフを召喚し、導くことを学んだ。統治によるのか畏敬によるのかは不明。
secondary_translated_text: These creatures have learned to summon and guide the flaming elves who live in the jungle. It is not known whether it is by governance or by awe.

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他肆意播撒那种禁忌物质……最终结局可谓咎由自取，但我仍有些许同情。凡虫对力量的追寻时常令我感到唏嘘。
translated_text: 彼は誤ってこれらの洞窟に呪われた物質をこぼした。彼の最終的な運命は、その努力の公正な報酬のように見えますが、私はまだ同情を感じます。それは魅力的な力です。
secondary_translated_text: He accidentally spilled the cursed substance into these caves. His ultimate fate seems like a fair reward for that effort, but I still feel sympathy for him. It is an attractive force.

original_zh_text: 被珊瑚包裹的软壳生物。
translated_text: サンゴに包まれたソフトシェルスポイラー。
secondary_translated_text: Soft shell spoiler wrapped in coral.

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与其他虫子结为伴侣是一种本能，是欢愉的来源。可惜我曾寻觅的伴侣都难敌岁月的变迁。
translated_text: 他の人とペアを組むことは基本的な本能であり、一部のバグに大きな喜びを与えることもできます。私は以前にも同様の組合を求めたことがありますが、私の人生に匹敵するパートナーはいません。
secondary_translated_text: Pairing with other people is a basic instinct, and it can even give some bugs great pleasure. I have sought a similar union before, but I have no partner in my life that can match it.

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 斯卡尔一族的歌后，并且是族史上最具天赋的战士。
translated_text: Skelinesの歌手と彼らの最も才能のあるファイター。
secondary_translated_text: The Skelines singers and their most talented fighters.

translated_text: 合唱団の場合
secondary_translated_text: in the case of choirs

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱慕镜像般的另一个自己，究竟是无私还是极致的虚荣？
translated_text: 自分に似た人を愛するのは無私か虚栄か？
secondary_translated_text: Is it selfless or vanity to love someone who looks like you?

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 我父亲陨落国度的粗劣造物。只有愚者才会相信虚空可被驾驭。
translated_text: 私の父の堕落した王国の構造。愚か者だけが自分の命令で空白を作ることができると信じている。
secondary_translated_text: The structure of my father's fallen kingdom. He believes that only fools can create a blank at his own command.

translated_text: タール鉱山。
secondary_translated_text: The Tar Mine.

translated_text: バルナック
secondary_translated_text: Barnac

translated_text: ガイア
secondary_translated_text: Gaia

translated_text: シャディラード
secondary_translated_text: Shadillad

translated_text: 第一の罪人
secondary_translated_text: The First Sinner

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 翅膀发育不全的短角虫。
translated_text: 短角昆虫は生まれつき不完全な翼を持つ。
secondary_translated_text: The shorthorned insect has inherently incomplete wings.

translated_text: スカースガルド
secondary_translated_text: Skarsgard

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 挥舞旧钟的普通信徒，向未被丝咒侵蚀者投掷旧钟。
translated_text: 古代の鐘を鳴らす一般的な昆虫。この誤りは、まだ自由だと思う人に警鐘を鳴らすでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: A common insect that rings ancient bells. This error will sound a wake-up call to those who still think they are free.

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 天生具备我曾渴求的利器。所幸我通过苦练突破了自身局限。
translated_text: 私はかつて欲しかった道具をたくさん持って生まれました。幸運なことに、私はこれらの制限の周りで懸命に訓練した。
secondary_translated_text: I was born with a lot of tools I once wanted. Fortunately, I trained hard around these limitations.

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 其洞穴内遍布的陷阱比这虫子本身更令我头疼。
translated_text: 昆虫そのものよりも厄介なのは、洞窟に設置された無数の罠です。
secondary_translated_text: More troubling than the insects themselves are the countless traps set up in the caves.

translated_text: ポレニツァ
secondary_translated_text: Pollenica

translated_text: フリンジウォッチャー
secondary_translated_text: Fringe Watchers

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 这些本非为战斗设计的虫子竟有致命的战力，看来丝咒显著地改变了其本质。
translated_text: バクテリアの致命性は予想外でした彼らの体は決して戦うために作られなかった。幽霊は彼らの性質を劇的に変えた。
secondary_translated_text: The bacteria's lethality was unexpected, and their bodies were never made to fight. The ghosts dramatically changed their nature.

translated_text: 小さな告白者。
secondary_translated_text: The Little Confessor.

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 温顺的飞虫，翅膀模拟原野草叶的模样。比它们大的生物基本都能把它们当作小零食来吃。
translated_text: 野原の草を模した翼を持つおとなしい昆虫。大型捕食者の餌となる。
secondary_translated_text: A docile insect with wings that mimic grass in the field. They are prey for large predators.

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 被工业废气侵蚀的抱病劳工，将维修旋针改造为投掷武器。
translated_text: 疲れ果てた昆虫は地下室の煙で病気になった。作業員のツイスト針は、かつてはメンテナンスツールでしたが、現在は回転する弾丸として機能します。
secondary_translated_text: The exhausted insect became ill from the smoke in the basement. The worker's twist needle, once a maintenance tool, now serves as a rotating bullet.

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 服刑中的卑微囚犯，曾在圣堡中犯下罪过。
translated_text: この謙虚な囚人は城で犯した犯罪のために服役していた。
secondary_translated_text: This humble prisoner was serving a sentence for a crime he had committed in his castle.

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 维系甲木林万物联结的远古之心。
translated_text: シャーウッドの古い心はすべての生き物とつながっている。
secondary_translated_text: Sherwood's old mind is connected to all living things.

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 圣堡咏者团的向导与常任领袖。
translated_text: 彼は城合唱団のディレクターとエグゼクティブディレクターを務めました。
secondary_translated_text: He has served as the director and executive director of the Castle Choir.

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 虽视力极差却嗅觉敏锐，凭借庞大身躯冲撞陌生气味源。暮年仍保有此等凶性，着实值得敬佩。
translated_text: 視力は悪いが、嗅覚は非常に敏感で、その体積を利用して異物の匂いを吸収する。老いた時の凶暴さは立派な資質です。
secondary_translated_text: Their eyesight is poor, but their sense of smell is very sensitive, and they use their volume to absorb the odor of foreign bodies. Ferocity in old age is a admirable quality.

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 腹部携带沸腾胆汁囊的爬行虫。
translated_text: 這う昆虫、胃の胆汁袋がヒス音。
secondary_translated_text: Insects crawling, stomach gallbladder hissing.

translated_text: 翼救命ボート
secondary_translated_text: Winged Lifeboat

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦有机会，它会从任何来源窃取灵丝——包括我的甲壳。
translated_text: 機会があれば、この男は私の殻を含む重要な情報源からシルクを盗むでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: If given the chance, this man would steal silk from a key source, including my shell.

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 装满再生液体的活体炸弹。满载生质液的无智囊虫，打破后，可使用其生质液获得暂时性的生命值。
translated_text: 血漿で満たされた無脳人間。プラスミウムが破裂すると、一時的な健康上の利点があるため、食べることができます。
secondary_translated_text: A brainless man filled with plasma. When the plasmium ruptures, it can be eaten because it has temporary health benefits.

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 在错综复杂的齿轮迷宫中，这些机械的每一次俯冲都如同死神挥镰。
translated_text: あなたが思うよりもはるかに効果的な敵。その巻き付けられた磁場の不安定性は、単純な攻撃でも困難です。
secondary_translated_text: A far more effective enemy than you think. The instability of its wound magnetic field is difficult even for a simple attack.

translated_text: シェルフライ
secondary_translated_text: shelffly

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 头戴珊瑚巨角的古老螺类，与伴侣终生形影不离。
translated_text: 頭部に巨大な珊瑚の角を持つ古代の貝殻。一度パートナーと一緒に働くと、めったに一人で現れません。
secondary_translated_text: An ancient shell with huge coral horns on its head. Once you work with a partner, you rarely appear alone.

translated_text: カラクゴル
secondary_translated_text: Karakhor

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 手持劣质钢刷的劳工，尽管身体已被苦役榨干，但仍孜孜不倦。
translated_text: 彼は粗い鋼のブラシを振り回す高強度労働者でした。
secondary_translated_text: He was a high-intensity worker wielding a coarse steel brush.

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 勇猛强壮，且遵守纪律……连这样的战士都无法逃脱丝咒的侵蚀，难道纺络所有生物终将堕入此劫？
translated_text: 強く、強く、規律あるしかし、これらの資質は彼らをトラブルから守るものではない。この国では避けられませんか？
secondary_translated_text: Strong, strong, and disciplined However, these qualities do not protect them from trouble. can't you avoid it in this country?

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 纤瘦迅捷的体态完美适配战斗，难怪能在教团中身居高位。
translated_text: 戦闘、軽量、高速フォームに最適です。当然のことながら、彼らはカルトの中で非常に高いランクにあります。
secondary_translated_text: Ideal for combat, lightweight and high-speed forms. Not surprisingly, they are in very high ranks within the cult.

translated_text: グロムは
secondary_translated_text: Gromm is

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 使用骨制长矛的飞蚁猎手，擅长从空中发起突刺。
translated_text: 翼を持つアリハンターが空中から骨槍で攻撃してくる。
secondary_translated_text: A winged ali hunter attacks from the air with a cannon.

translated_text: 砂の女王!
secondary_translated_text: Queen of the Sand!

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我故土的洞穴中，当这种物质开始蔓延时，我也目睹过类似的畸变。这是一种掺杂着强烈厌恶的“奇迹”。
translated_text: 私の洞窟では、素材が繁栄することを許されたとき、同様の歪みが見られました。それは嫌悪感に満ちた奇跡です。
secondary_translated_text: In my cave, when the material was allowed to flourish, a similar distortion was seen. It's a miracle filled with disgust.

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的甲虫背负着沉重钟壳，胖得钻不进地洞，倒是长出了一对小翅膀。
translated_text: 重い鐘の下に毛むくじゃらの虫。洞窟に入るには大きすぎるが、成熟すると小さな翼が生えてきた。
secondary_translated_text: A hairy bug under a heavy bell. They are too large to enter the cave, but when they mature, they have grown small wings.

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的飞行虫，仅凭短角作为武器。
translated_text: 城の空中昆虫は武器を持たないが、角は短い。
secondary_translated_text: The castle's aerial insects have no weapons, but their horns are short.

original_en_text: Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
original_zh_text: 成年苔翼虫，具备完全发育的毒刺与坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: 成熟したモスミールは硬い皮膚を持つ。
secondary_translated_text: Mature mossmeel has a hard skin.

original_en_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 为母则刚的本能，总能使弱小的生物展现出骇人的攻击性。
translated_text: 母性は、生物を自然に見える限界まで押し上げる本能です。それは弱い獣を強力な敵に変えました。
secondary_translated_text: Maternity is the instinct that pushes organisms to the limits that seem natural. It turned a weak beast into a mighty enemy.

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 一只年迈虫子的遗骸安放在火葬堆的中心。从构造上看，它们似乎希望通过自焚来进行献祭。若真如此，我想这一愿望已经实现。
translated_text: 古い昆虫の残骸が薪の山の真ん中に置かれていた。彼らは自分自身を燃やしたかった。もしそうなら、私は彼らの願いが叶うのを見ました。
secondary_translated_text: The remains of an old insect lay in the middle of a pile of firewood. They wanted to burn themselves. If so, then I have seen their wishes come true.

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 装备骨制武器及护甲的蚁族精锐。
translated_text: ブレードと骨で作られた鎧を持つ熟練した蟻ハンター。
secondary_translated_text: A skilled ant hunter with a blade and armour made of bone.

translated_text: モントフライ
secondary_translated_text: Montfly

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 体内存储巨量高温液体仍能存活……原以为不可能，但纺络本就充满奇迹。
translated_text: 体内にたくさんの熱い液体を蓄えながら生き残るために。かつては不可能だと思っていましたが、ファルムは多くの奇跡の発祥の地でした。
secondary_translated_text: To survive while accumulating lots of hot fluids in the body. Once thought impossible, the farm was the birthplace of many miracles.

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 高庭咏者团统帅，挥动指挥棒即可召唤机枢蝇群。
translated_text: 上級ホールの合唱指揮官は、バトンの軽い弾丸を呼び出して指揮することができる。
secondary_translated_text: The choir conductor in the upper hall can command by summoning the light bullet of the baton.

translated_text: 頭蓋骨の翼
secondary_translated_text: Wings of the skull

translated_text: ホッパー·ピルグリム
secondary_translated_text: Hopper Pilgrim

translated_text: 長老の巡礼
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrimage of elders

translated_text: ハルクの巡礼
secondary_translated_text: Hulk's Pilgrimage

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 古老的漂浮生物，体型远超同类。
translated_text: 仮面の珊瑚漂流者は、仲間の多くよりも背が高い。
secondary_translated_text: The masked coral drifter is taller than many of his companions.

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
translated_text: 昆虫は火に魅了される。
secondary_translated_text: Insects are attracted to fire.

translated_text: 巡礼者のこと
secondary_translated_text: about the pilgrims.

translated_text: 最後の爪だ
secondary_translated_text: The last nail.

translated_text: 製錬ショベル
secondary_translated_text: Smelting Excavator

original_en_text: Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 好奇心驱使我响应他们的召唤，但我不会在此浪费时间——我需要尽快修正我酿成的大错。
translated_text: 私は彼らの電話に答えたのは興味深いが、私は彼らに長く私を待たせない。私は自分の大きな間違いを正すためにできるだけ早く働かなければならない。
secondary_translated_text: It's interesting that I answered their phone, but I can't let them wait for me long. I have to work as fast as I can to correct my big mistakes.

translated_text: 蠕動する
secondary_translated_text: Peristaltic

translated_text: ランタンプレイヤー
secondary_translated_text: Lantern player

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 肮脏恶心的生物。光是它们的存在就让我甲壳发痒。在蟑群泛滥的养殖场中，我会时刻保持警惕。
translated_text: 嫌な生き物です。彼らの存在は私の殻をくすぐった。彼らの数が増え続けるフェンスの中で、私はいつも緊張していました。
secondary_translated_text: It is an unpleasant creature. Their presence tickled my shell. Within the fence, where their numbers continue to grow, I was always nervous.

translated_text: ブラシをかける
secondary_translated_text: Brush it.

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 我小时候就爱逗这种笨虫，在它身边闪转腾挪，看它来回乱撞可有意思了。唉，但我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
translated_text: この単純な生き物があちこちに駆け回っているとき、それの周りで踊るのは私の子供の頃の好きなゲームでした。今はもっと緊急なことがあります。
secondary_translated_text: When this simple creature was running around, dancing around it was my favorite childhood game. There is something more urgent now. "

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 它们的工作实属可悲的苦役，为那见不到的圣堡永世效劳。
translated_text: 彼らは目に見えない城に奉仕する悲しく困難な仕事のように見えた。
secondary_translated_text: They looked like a sad and difficult job of serving an invisible castle.

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 头骨潜行者的飞虫近亲，髓骨洞窟深处灼热的洞穴独有。
translated_text: 座礁したスカル·スカトラーの空中近縁種であり、最も深く、最も熱い骨髄洞窟でのみ発見されている。
secondary_translated_text: It is an aerial close relative of the stranded Scal Scatter, and is found only in the deepest and hottest bone marrow caves.

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 这是份高危职业，它们的结局注定短暂而炽烈。
translated_text: 彼らの人生は、短く燃えるような結末を持つハイリスクな人生になるでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Their lives will be a high-risk one with a short, fiery ending.

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 温顺的翠庭原生生物，其皮毛完美拟态栖息地的植被。
translated_text: プラシッドはヴィダニアで生まれた。その毛皮は縄張りの植物をよく模倣している。
secondary_translated_text: Placid was born in Vidhania. Its fur mimics well the plants of the territory.

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们无情地消灭任何在他们眼中被视为不洁的朝圣者或过路者。堆积在路径旁的遗骸，无声控诉着所谓"净化"的残酷。
translated_text: 彼らは汚れた巡礼者や通行人を排除することを躊躇しなかった。多くの砲弾が近くの道に散らばっており、彼らの決断を予告した。
secondary_translated_text: They did not hesitate to exclude the filthy pilgrims and passers-by. Many shells were scattered on the nearby road, heralding their decision.

translated_text: ダウンサイジングパイプ
secondary_translated_text: Downsizing Pipe

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 弱小、恐惧，知道终局将至。我懂得它们的绝望，可我的死并不能阻止即将到来的灾祸。
translated_text: 弱さ、恐れ、来るべき結果を認識する。彼らの絶望は理解できるが、私の死は来るべき秋を止めない。
secondary_translated_text: Acknowledge weakness, fear, and the consequences to come. Their despair is understandable, but my death will not stop the coming autumn.

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 高温蒸汽在管腔内压缩爆鸣的声响，像极了垂死者的嘶吼。这种将杀戮伪装成清洁工程的设计，着实令人胆寒。
translated_text: Steamの使用を促進する。未来のためにツールを設計するときは、その構造を念頭に置く必要があります。
secondary_translated_text: Promoting the use of Steam. When designing a tool for the future, you need to keep its structure in mind.

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 它们深谙领地内的每处沼泽暗道，时刻准备伏击。
translated_text: 彼らは自分たちの縄張りをよく知っており、小道や沼で待機し、攻撃の準備をしていた。
secondary_translated_text: They knew their territory well, and they waited in the paths and swamps, preparing for an attack.

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 被生质液赋予虚假生命的炼金术士助手的躯壳。
translated_text: 錬金術師の助手の殻はプラスミウムによって偽の生命を与えられた。
secondary_translated_text: The shell of an alchemist's assistant has been given false life by plasmium.

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 光凭这个惊悚的造型就能劝退不少胆小鬼。
translated_text: マスクだけで小さな害虫を怖がらせることができます。
secondary_translated_text: A mask alone can scare off small pests.

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 本性畏避掠食者，然而纺络的丝咒迫使其凶性毕露。幸好它们的颚钳钝拙，不善搏杀。
translated_text: 自然の状態では潜在的な捕食者を避けますが、Farumのトラブルにより攻撃的になります。幸い、その顎は戦闘には適していません。
secondary_translated_text: In its natural state, it avoids potential predators, but becomes more aggressive in Farum's troubles. Fortunately, its jaw is not fit for combat.

translated_text: デズナルガ
secondary_translated_text: Deznarga

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到故土的洞穴后，这位厨师依旧沉迷于研制那些令任何尚存理智的虫子都难以接受的料理。
translated_text: 故郷の洞窟に戻ったシェフたちは、昆虫が知覚し続けるには嫌な味の料理を作り続けます。
secondary_translated_text: Back in their native caves, the chefs continue to make dishes that taste unpleasant enough for insects to continue to perceive them.

translated_text: クローバーダンサー
secondary_translated_text: Clover Dancer

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 能号令珊瑚甲壳的远古战主。
translated_text: かつては強力な軍閥が彼の命令に従い、珊瑚の殻を指揮することができた。
secondary_translated_text: Once upon a time, powerful warlords could follow his orders and command a coral shell.

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 该领域本无等级制度，此虫却凭威胁与暴力手段上位。
translated_text: 彼らの分野にはランキングがないようですが、このランキングは他のランキングを上回っています。テレビ局は脅迫や暴徒によって利用可能である。
secondary_translated_text: They don't seem to have a ranking in their field, but this ranking outperforms other rankings. Television stations are available by threats and mobs.

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
translated_text: 戦闘が好きな熱狂的なフェンシング選手。
secondary_translated_text: An enthusiastic fencing player who loves fighting.

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 失去视力却听觉敏锐的穴居虫类，最细微的声响也会引起它们激烈的反应。
translated_text: 盲目の穴居人はわずかな音に強く反応する。
secondary_translated_text: Blind cavemen react strongly to the slightest sound.

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
original_zh_text: 纺络的君主，灵丝的源头。
translated_text: ファロ王シルク生誕の地
secondary_translated_text: The birthplace of Pharaoh Silk

original_en_text: These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 由于纺络的崩塌，这些虫子被驱赶出书库的深处。这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: ファルムの黒い崩壊は、金庫の奥から虫を追い出した。彼らはトラブルであり、私は自分自身を責めます。
secondary_translated_text: The black collapse of the farm drove the worms out of the depths of the vault. They are trouble, and I blame myself for that.

translated_text: ガモンド&ザザは
secondary_translated_text: Gammond&Zaza is

translated_text: モースマイヤー
secondary_translated_text: Mosmeyer

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 栖息在熔岩区的飞行螨虫，喷射高温焦油灼烧猎物。
translated_text: マグマの近くに生息する飛翔骨ダニ。熱いタールを吐き出して獲物を焼く。
secondary_translated_text: A flying bony mite that lives near magmas. They spit out hot tar and burn their prey.

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 体内充满胆汁的群居蝠虫，死亡时剧烈爆炸。
translated_text: 多数の害虫、鋭い鼻、胆汁で満たされた胃。
secondary_translated_text: A large number of pests, a sharp nose, and a stomach filled with bile.

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 纺络的岩缝和洞穴里常见的小型蜘蛛。
translated_text: ファロの多くの割れ目や洞窟で小さなクモが発見されている。
secondary_translated_text: Small spiders have been found in many of Faro's cracks and caves.

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的大型蠕虫。这只生物已与所处洞穴的洞顶融合，失去了自由移动的能力。
translated_text: 寄生虫は寄生虫によって大きく変異する。クリーチャーは洞窟の頂上に溶け込み、もはや自由に動けなくなった。
secondary_translated_text: The parasite can vary greatly from one parasite to another. The creature melted into the top of the cave and could no longer move freely.

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 战斗风格与我的技巧相似，崇尚速攻战术。或许它们曾经也是猎手？
translated_text: 自分のトレーニングに似ていて、素早いシュートと素早い動きが好きです。かつてはハンターだったのかも。
secondary_translated_text: It's similar to my own training and I like to shoot fast and move fast. Maybe he was a hunter once.

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 感知极为敏锐，哪怕分毫响动都能惊动它。
translated_text: なんと素晴らしい感覚だろう。音がしなくても、簡単に私を検出できます。
secondary_translated_text: What a wonderful feeling it would be. Even if there is no sound, it can easily detect me.

original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 热衷隧道伏击的面甲蠕虫幼体。
translated_text: 若いマスクをしたワームは、トンネルで侵入者を待ち伏せするのが好き。
secondary_translated_text: The young masked worm likes to ambush intruders in the tunnel.

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 为圣堡工厂内大熔釜的酷热环境打造的小型自动机。勤勤恳恳，任劳任怨。
translated_text: 小型オートマトンは、アンダーワークスのコールドロンの高温でも文句なく動作するように設計されています。
secondary_translated_text: The small automaton is designed to operate without complaints even in the high temperatures of the underwork cooler.

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深坞地区的监工，负责监管与惩戒低级别工人。
translated_text: 深センターミナルの高齢者監督官は下級労働者を監督し処罰する責任がある。
secondary_translated_text: The senior supervisor of Shenzhen Center Terminal is responsible for supervising and punishing the lower-level workers.

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 戴着宽大珊瑚面甲的漂流生物，使用坚硬的长喙攻击自投罗网的猎物。
translated_text: 浮遊生物は大きなサンゴのマスクと硬い長い鼻を身に着けて獲物を刺す。
secondary_translated_text: The plankton wears a large coral mask and a hard, long nose to sting their prey.

translated_text: カラカは
secondary_translated_text: Caraca is

translated_text: レース·レース
secondary_translated_text: Race / Race

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 那柄弯钩长针的设计堪称精妙— 既能防止饥渴的蟑螂反将饲主当作美餐，又可随时给不听话的 "宠物" 放血。
translated_text: 給餌器の巻き針は、貪欲なゴキブリを止め、食物になるのを防ぐためのようです。
secondary_translated_text: The feeder's winding needles seem to stop the greedy cockroaches and prevent them from becoming food.

translated_text: 血漿ザンゴ
secondary_translated_text: Plasma Zang

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 某只虫子在绝望中极度渴求力量，诞生出了此造物。能召唤虚空的虫子已寥寥无几，而在它们之中，更无虫子能真正驯服虚空。
translated_text: 昆虫の力への絶望的な希望から生まれた生き物。虚空を召喚する力を持つ者は少なく、力を持つ者の中に、虚空を飼いならす力を持つ者はいない。
secondary_translated_text: A creature born out of a desperate hope for insect power. Few have the power to summon the void, and none of those who have the power have the power to tame the void.

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 以带刺珊瑚坚果自卫的深色绒毛甲虫。
translated_text: 黒い毛皮の昆虫はとげのあるサンゴの果実で身を守る。
secondary_translated_text: The black-haired insect protects itself with the spiny coral fruit.

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
original_zh_text: 偏好占据制高点的厚甲虫，从口中倾泻灼热酸雨。
translated_text: スコットランド人は背が高いのが好き。
secondary_translated_text: The Scots like to be tall.

translated_text: セセス、神殿の守護者
secondary_translated_text: Seth, guardian of the temple

original_en_text: Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的濒死劳工，超越生理极限持续劳作。
translated_text: 疲れ果てた労働者たちは崩壊寸前だった。彼らはこの混乱に激怒し、限界を超えて活動を続けています。
secondary_translated_text: The exhausted workers were on the verge of collapse. They are enraged by this confusion and continue their activities beyond their limits.

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 用尖桩与胆汁制作毒镖的狡诈虫子。
translated_text: 狡猾な昆虫は切り株と胆汁で作られたダーツで狩りをする。
secondary_translated_text: The cunning insects hunt with dart made of stumps and bile.

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 吞噬万物的虚空本质，于此狰狞形态显露无遗。
translated_text: 空虚はすべてを奪う。その性質は、その選択された棘の形で明らかです。
secondary_translated_text: Emptiness takes everything away. Its nature is evident in the form of its chosen spines.

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 持盾佩枪的核心守卫机械，具备战术应变能力。
translated_text: コグワークの構造は主にコアを保護するために建設された。盾と針を持ち、その目的を致命的に理解している。
secondary_translated_text: The structure of the cogwork was built primarily to protect the core. He has a shield and needle, and he understands his purpose deadly.

translated_text: New Diaryの記事
secondary_translated_text: Articles from New Diary

translated_text: 新鮮なハエ。
secondary_translated_text: Fresh flies.

translated_text: ニルス
secondary_translated_text: Nilus

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢待在阴暗隧道的硬壳虫，遇到危险时会突然炸开背刺。
translated_text: 闇のトンネルが好きな小さな骨虫。そのスパイクシェルは捕食者の攻撃を防ぐために拡張することができる。
secondary_translated_text: A small bony worm who likes dark tunnels. Its spike shell can be expanded to prevent predator attacks.

translated_text: サイの角
secondary_translated_text: Rhino horns

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们的清洁工具与周遭同样污秽，这样打扫只会越来越脏。
translated_text: 彼らの鋭い洗浄ツールは他の場所と同じくらい汚れています。彼らは土の上に土の層を敷いただけです。
secondary_translated_text: Their sharp cleaning tools are just as dirty as any other place. They just lay lay layers of soil on top of the soil.

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团中地位崇高的虫子，持弓而立。比起普通的簧片战士，这位精英成员受过更严格的训练，也享有更丰盛的供养。
translated_text: 昆虫は弓を手に聖歌隊の中に高く立っていた。彼らの小さな仲間に加えて、このエリートリードチームは訓練と餌を与えます。
secondary_translated_text: The insect stood high in the chorus with a bow in his hand. In addition to their little companions, this elite lead team will train and feed them.

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 那柄形似剪枝钳的武器，既能精准剥离甲壳中的灵丝脉络，也能在瞬间绞碎试图逃逸的灵魂残片。
translated_text: それは、おそらくその使命への敬意から地面に横たわっていますが、突然現れて攻撃することができます。そのハサミは驚くべき範囲を持つ致命的な武器です。
secondary_translated_text: It is probably lying on the ground out of respect for its mission, but it can suddenly appear and attack. Its scissors are a deadly weapon with an astonishing range.

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
original_zh_text: 配备防护甲壳的小型自动机，负责运输危险的燧焰。
translated_text: 危険なフリント火炎を運ぶためのシールドシェルを備えた小型の自動装置。
secondary_translated_text: A small automatic device with a shield shell for carrying dangerous flint flames.

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们同样在寻找那丝咒之源的幽魂——只是我担心，我们共同的敌人是超越凡虫极限的存在，恐怕不是他们所能应对的。
translated_text: 彼らはまだ幽霊の中心で幽霊を探していますが、この敵が彼らの限界を超えた挑戦をもたらすことを恐れています。
secondary_translated_text: They are still looking for ghosts in the heart of the ghost, but they fear that this enemy will bring a challenge beyond their limits.

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 再击败{0}只以解锁猎手的笔记。
translated_text: 敗北した。{0}ハンターのノートを完成させるための追加コンテンツ。
secondary_translated_text: He was defeated.{0}Additional content to complete the Hunter's notes.

translated_text: Memoriaさん
secondary_translated_text: Mrs. Memoria

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 将面部与珊瑚融为一体的巢居生物。
translated_text: 巣を作る生き物は、鋭いサンゴと顔を融合させる。
secondary_translated_text: The nest-building creature blends faces with sharp corals.

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓甚至在其胃囊内滋长，被压缩成团的腐殖质带着刺鼻腥气——这恐怕是纺络最肮脏的远程武器。
translated_text: 苔は胃の中で生えているように見え、巡礼者たちはそれを敵に吐き出して圧縮粘液を作った。卑劣な犯罪の一種。
secondary_translated_text: The moss seemed to grow in the stomach, and the pilgrims spit it out at their enemies to create compressed mucus. A kind of despicable crime.

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 专为敲击钟钹设计的稀有自动机。
translated_text: コアの奥深くで鐘やシンバルを鳴らす珍しいオートマトン。
secondary_translated_text: An unusual automaton that rings bells and cymbals deep in the core.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 蒙面的高阶信徒，地位远超普通朝圣者。
translated_text: 聖歌隊の道化師は、他の巡礼者よりも永遠に眉をひそめた。
secondary_translated_text: The choir clown frowned more forever than any other pilgrim.

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 纺络的建筑结构仿佛为其量身打造，这里有无尽的角落和缝隙供螨虫打洞筑巢。
translated_text: ファロの建物はほとんど彼らのために建てられたようです。果てしない角や割れ目はダニの巣作りに最適です。
secondary_translated_text: It seems that Faro's buildings were built mostly for them. The endless corners and cracks are perfect for nesting ticks.

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的飞行生物，破碎后可以迅速重组。
translated_text: 空飛ぶ生物は冷たい破片からできている。それが崩壊すれば、すぐに改革される。
secondary_translated_text: Flying creatures are made of cold debris. If it collapses, it is reformed immediately.

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 不论在哪一片土地上，万物皆有巧妙的伪装法门，行走此间当时刻保持警觉。
translated_text: それぞれの土地で、生き物は新しい驚くべき変装方法を見つけます。人は常に警戒しなければならない
secondary_translated_text: In each land, the creatures will find new and amazing ways to disguise themselves. Man must always be on his guard.

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 低地区域的暴躁飞虫，一生气就把带刃的尾巴甩成风车。
translated_text: 低地で攻撃的な有翼昆虫。怒ると素早く刃や尻尾を武器にしている。
secondary_translated_text: Aggressive winged insects in low-lying areas. When angry, they quickly use their blades and tails as weapons.

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 使用兽牙镰刀的年轻蚁族猎手，遇险时会呼叫支援。
translated_text: 若いアリハンターは歯のついた鎌を振り回していた。危険が近づくとしばしば助けを求める。
secondary_translated_text: The young ant hunter was waving his toothed sickle. They often call for help when danger approaches.

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 与珊瑚融合的长老巨虫，能从甲壳内喷发炽热气泡。
translated_text: 過剰に成長したエルダーベリーは、サンゴの殻の中に燃える泡を作り出す。
secondary_translated_text: When overgrown, elderberries create a burning bubble inside the coral shell.

translated_text: 大臣は
secondary_translated_text: the minister said

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 盘踞甲木林高处的碎裂者女王，掌控树丛枝干屠尽领地内所有朝圣者。
translated_text: 古い昆虫をシャーウッドの高台に巣させる。彼女の分遣隊の支配は、彼女の領土に巡礼者がいないことを保証した。
secondary_translated_text: Nesting old insects on Sherwood's heights. The control of her detachment ensured that there were no pilgrims in her territory.

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 这种融合看似自主选择，但其过程必定充满痛苦。
translated_text: ミミズの融合と地殻の成長。これは意図的なようだが、組合はそれに満足していないと思う。
secondary_translated_text: Fusion of worms and crustal growth. This seems to be intentional, but I don't think the union is happy with it.

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 生来只是为了劳作，直到岁月令它四肢僵硬。也许它对自己所缺失的自由一无所知，这反倒是一种仁慈。
translated_text: 時間が手足を硬化させるまで働くために生まれ、構築される。おそらく構造は、欠けている自由が慈悲深いことを知らない。
secondary_translated_text: They are born and built to work until time hardens their arms and feet. Perhaps the structure does not know that the freedom it lacks is merciful.

translated_text: モス·モス
secondary_translated_text: Moss Moss

translated_text: Crawさん
secondary_translated_text: Mrs. Craw.

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 纺络边陲部落的勇士制图师，其战力在纺络可谓数一数二。
translated_text: 彼はファルムの辺境部族の戦士地図作成者でした彼女の戦闘能力は王国のトップに挑戦するのに十分です。
secondary_translated_text: He was a warrior map maker of the Frontier Tribe of the Farms and her fighting ability is enough to challenge the top of the kingdom.

translated_text: Cogwork Crawler
secondary_translated_text: Cogwork crawler

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 曾经纺络的荣光加身者，却成为首批丝咒受害者。
translated_text: かつてはファローのお気に入りの昆虫だったが、その畑や貝殻は最初に幽霊の手に落ちた。
secondary_translated_text: Once a favorite insect of the Faroe, its fields and shells first fell into the hands of the ghosts.

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小虫子依靠伪装得以繁衍生息。
translated_text: これらの小さな昆虫は、塔の一致する地殻に隠れ、生存し、繁殖することができます。
secondary_translated_text: These tiny insects can hide, survive and reproduce in the tower's matching crust.

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 她存活久远且吞噬无数，诛杀她将使丛林安全倍增。
translated_text: この人は長生きし、たくさん食べています。森の中で殺した方がずっと安全だった。
secondary_translated_text: This man lives a long time and eats a lot. It was much safer to kill in the woods.

translated_text: 嘔吐する。
secondary_translated_text: They vomit.

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 其数量曾经可谓铺天盖地。目睹此等生命奇观的机会已越发稀少。
translated_text: 彼らは塔の周りに集まった。豊かな人生を目撃する貴重な機会です。
secondary_translated_text: They gathered around the tower. It is a precious opportunity to witness a rich life.

translated_text: カラカのカクテル
secondary_translated_text: Caracas Cocktails

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 在钟脉内部打洞栖息的毛球状虫类，专门找硬钟壳当作盔甲。
translated_text: ネアンデルタール人はベルヴィンに巣を作り、柔らかい体を守るために硬い鐘を探した。
secondary_translated_text: Neanderthals built nests in the belvin, looking for hard bells to protect their soft bodies.

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 投掷面甲的反弹轨迹难以预判。在狭窄空间尤其需要提防其袭击。
translated_text: 特に狭いコーナーでは、彼が投げたマスクの跳ね返りの軌跡に、人々は簡単に油断します。
secondary_translated_text: Especially in a narrow corner, people are easily overlooked by the bouncing trajectory of the mask he threw.

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 岁月让它们的甲壳变得厚重，能更轻易地猛击目标。
translated_text: 時間は彼らの殻を厚くし、より良いターゲットを打つ。
secondary_translated_text: Time thickens their shells and hits better targets.

translated_text: コヴォク·オートン
secondary_translated_text: Kovoq Auton

translated_text: ドレグ·キャッチャー
secondary_translated_text: Dr. Catcher

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 隐藏在洞顶暗处的蜘蛛，擅长从高处一跃而下，偷袭猎物。
translated_text: クモは洞窟の頂上にあるブラックホールに住んでいる。遠くから獲物に飛びつく。
secondary_translated_text: The spider lives in a black hole at the top of a cave. They jump at their prey from afar.

translated_text: キンダニール
secondary_translated_text: Kindail

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 童谣所述的经典魔物形态。此次诛杀多靠了我那勇猛的旅伴。
translated_text: 典型的な青春物語形式の怪物。それは私と私の恐ろしい仲間によって殺された。
secondary_translated_text: A typical youth story-form monster. It was killed by me and my terrible companion. "

translated_text: metの母
secondary_translated_text: met's mother.

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 静静等待猎物误入其攻击范围。看似消极的捕猎方式，往往能收获意外成效。
translated_text: 受動的に獲物が誤ってその道に入るのを待つ。この技術は嘲笑すべきではない。効果的なものが一番です。
secondary_translated_text: Passively waiting for prey to accidentally enter its path. This technology should not be ridiculed. The most effective ones are the best.

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我的甲壳虽能抵抗此物质带来的畸变，但承受力终有极限。
translated_text: 私の独特の外殻はこの物質の暗い変形に抵抗することができるが、私にも限界がある。
secondary_translated_text: My peculiar outer shell is able to resist the dark deformation of this material, but I too have limits.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 大地倾覆之际，绝望哀叫的黑色食腐虫。
translated_text: 悲鳴を上げるスカベンジャーは、土地の崩壊で黒く染まった。
secondary_translated_text: Screaming scavengers were stained black with the collapse of the land.

translated_text: 翼型の模型
secondary_translated_text: Airfoil model

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 神奇的是，它竟能将虚空黑液储于胃中，受威胁时剧烈喷吐攻击。
translated_text: 驚くべきことに、この生き物の胃は、脅威にさらされると激しく噴出する黒い液体で満たされています。
secondary_translated_text: Surprisingly, the stomach of this creature is filled with a black liquid that spews violently when threatened.

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 它们是族群存续的关键——当凯旋转尖角筑起防御阵时，连髓骨洞窟的暴君都要暂避锋芒。
translated_text: 大きなグループの重要なメンバーです。彼らがいなければ、カイ族はより大きな捕食者によってすぐに絶滅した。
secondary_translated_text: An important member of a large group. Without them, the Kai would have been quickly exterminated by larger predators.

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
original_zh_text: 缠满念珠的强壮虫子，发怒时会挥舞珠串猛攻。
translated_text: ロザリオに満ちた強力な虫。怒っていると、操作を続ける。
secondary_translated_text: A powerful worm full of rosary. When you are angry, continue the operation.

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 过滤毒液的生存机制经代际演化，成为高效的狩猎手段。
translated_text: この悪臭のある環境で下水の中で生き残るために、それは最も有毒な要素を噴出します。数世代の努力の後、この以前のサバイバル技術は効果的な狩猟ツールになった。
secondary_translated_text: In order to survive in the sewage in this foul-smelling environment, it spews out the most toxic elements. After generations of efforts, this earlier survival technique has become an effective hunting tool.

translated_text: クランク不足。
secondary_translated_text: Lack of cranks.

translated_text: 巨大なザクロ種子
secondary_translated_text: Huge pomegranate seeds

translated_text: コーラスチラシ
secondary_translated_text: Chorus Leaflets

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 看似凶暴，实为恋巢的保守派。
translated_text: 若い仲間よりも敵対的だが、巣から離れる可能性は低い。
secondary_translated_text: They are more hostile than their younger companions, but are less likely to leave the nest.

translated_text: コーラスコーナー
secondary_translated_text: Chorus corner

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 被世界的崩解压垮的消沉演员。
translated_text: 落ち込んだ俳優は世界の崩壊の憂鬱に飲み込まれていた。
secondary_translated_text: The depressed actor had been engulfed in the gloom of the world's collapse.

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 曾经备受赞誉的大厨，却因屡次触犯烹饪禁忌而被逐出圣堡。
translated_text: 陽気な料理人は、数々の料理犯罪で城から追放された。
secondary_translated_text: The cheerful cook was banished from the castle for numerous culinary crimes.

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 手持长柄旋针的虚弱硬甲劳工。
translated_text: ヘアピンと硬い殻を身に着けたアンダーワークスの弱い召使い。
secondary_translated_text: A weak servant of Underwork, dressed in hairpin and hard shell.

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥肠辘辘的罪石牢狱仆从，手持钩形长针。
translated_text: 飢えた石の召使いが、手に長いかぎ針編みを持っていた。
secondary_translated_text: A hungry stone servant had a long needle weaving in his hand.

translated_text: ラニアの葉
secondary_translated_text: Leaf of Lania

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 装载尖刺的球型飞行自动机，防御功能存疑。
translated_text: 球形の翼を持つオートマトンで、内部には鋭い棘が多数ある。
secondary_translated_text: An automaton with spherical wings, with many sharp spines inside.

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 圆滚滚的身材十分适合用作靶子，不拿来练手都可惜……
translated_text: 太く丸みを帯びた形状は、射撃練習に最適です。彼らに私の目標をテストすることに抵抗するのは難しい。
secondary_translated_text: The thick, rounded shape is perfect for shooting practice. It's hard to resist having them test my goals.

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 年迈体硕的帷虫，沉重的身躯赋予其强劲的冲击力。
translated_text: 古いトンボは年齢と消費によって成長します。その重い体は若い仲間よりも強く打つことができる。
secondary_translated_text: The old tombo grows with age and consumption. His heavy body can hit harder than his younger companion.

translated_text: ヴィダニエルス
secondary_translated_text: Vidaniels

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 蚀阶的最终裁决者，确保唯有无罪者能跨越巨扉圣门。
translated_text: 爆発的なステップの究極の調停者は、無実の人々だけがドアを通過できるようにすることを任務とする。
secondary_translated_text: The ultimate mediator of an explosive step is tasked with ensuring that only innocent people can pass through the door.

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他选择臣服于灾难的降临，我绝不会效仿这种懦弱行径。
translated_text: 男は来るべき運命を受け入れることを選んだ。そんな簡単な降伏はしません。
secondary_translated_text: The man chose to accept the fate to come. I will not give up so easily.

translated_text: 時計を食べる人
secondary_translated_text: People who eat clock

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 费耶山的温顺滑翔者，其绒翼可抵御极寒。
translated_text: フェイ山の穏やかなグライダー。その柔らかい翼とベルトは、最も冷たい寒さに耐えることができます。
secondary_translated_text: A gentle glider on Mount Fay. Its soft wings and belts can withstand the coldest cold.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
translated_text: 重量と強度に依存する重いハードシェル充電器。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy hard shell chargers that depend on weight and strength.

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 其躯壳曾掌握将灵丝编织为燃烧符文的绝技。纵观我毕生所见的各类符文，她或是这项技艺的开山鼻祖？
translated_text: この男の貝殻は絹を燃えるルーンに織り込む才能があった。私の人生で、私は多くのタスクのために織られたルーンを見てきた。彼女はこのスキルを習得した最初の人ですか？
secondary_translated_text: This man's shell had a talent for weaving silk into a burning run. In my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Is she the first person to learn this skill?

translated_text: 幻影とは
secondary_translated_text: What is Phantom?

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 这东西令我感到不安……其纯粹性中蕴含某种诡异的特质。我竟然感到一丝恐惧？
translated_text: それは私を動揺させる。そのシンプルさに何かがある。私はほとんど怖いですか？
secondary_translated_text: That makes me upset. There is something about that simplicity. Am I almost scared?

translated_text: 合唱団の拍手
secondary_translated_text: The Choir Applause

translated_text: 陪審員の失望
secondary_translated_text: Jury disappointment.

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 传说中的生物在忆境中成为了现实，与周遭植物浑然一体。我所见到的一切，真的曾经存在过吗？
translated_text: 神話は記憶の中で真実です。この生物は周囲の植物と完全に一体化しているようです。見たように、本当に存在するのか。
secondary_translated_text: Myth is truth in memory. This organism seems to be completely integrated with the surrounding plants. Do they really exist, as you can see?

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 简约而优雅。又一个永远从这片土地消失的美丽物种。
translated_text: シンプルに。優雅な。もう一匹の美しい昆虫が、この地から永遠に消えてしまった。
secondary_translated_text: Simply put. Elegantly. Another beautiful insect has disappeared forever from this land.

translated_text: スケルトン暴君
secondary_translated_text: Skeleton Tyrant

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他拯救纺络的愿望或许出于善意，但为实现目标似乎乐于目睹他人在舞台上殒命。
translated_text: 彼は善意でファルムが救われるのを見たかったのかもしれないが、彼の目的を追求するために他の人々がステージ上で死んだことを喜んだ。
secondary_translated_text: He may have wished to see Farm saved in good faith, but he was pleased that other people had died on stage in pursuit of his purpose.

translated_text: ガヴィド
secondary_translated_text: Gavido

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 运输燧焰的工虫。燧焰性质不稳定，所以它们需要佩戴重型防爆钟罩。
translated_text: 勇敢な労働者は不安定な引火材料を運び、潜在的な発火を防ぐために重いベルを着用する。
secondary_translated_text: Brave workers carry unstable ignition materials and wear heavy bells to prevent potential ignition.

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 每次甲壳碰撞都会迸发火星，这使得它们的巢穴成了行走的火药库。
translated_text: その明るい宝石は、美しいが短命のジュエリーを作るために使用できます。面白い贈り物のアイデア。あるいは罠かもしれない。
secondary_translated_text: Its bright gemstones can be used to make beautiful but short-lived jewelry. Interesting gift ideas. Or maybe it is a trap.

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 为大型斯卡尔蚁服务的小个子掘地工。
translated_text: 小さな穴居アリで、大きな骨格の召使い。
secondary_translated_text: A small cave ant and a large skeleton servant.

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 厚重的多毛蝇虫，负责抓捕罪犯和惩戒囚犯。
translated_text: 犯罪者を逮捕し、囚人を罰する重くてふわふわの看守。
secondary_translated_text: A heavy, fluffy guard who arrests criminals and punishes prisoners.

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 小型飞虫，使用自身毒刺进行攻击。
translated_text: この小さな空飛ぶ生き物は、小さなスティンガーで身を守ることができます。
secondary_translated_text: This small flying creature can defend itself with a small stinger.

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒夺去神智的敏捷朝圣者，仅存扑跃攻击的本能。
translated_text: ファロの俊敏性の間違い、その高度な機能は混乱し、失われました。
