secondary_translated_text: Failure of Faro's agility, its advanced functions were confused and lost.

translated_text: Cogwork洗顔料
secondary_translated_text: Cogwork Washing Pigment

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 守卫疆界的沧桑老将，因古老歌谣而苏醒。
translated_text: 国境を守る退役軍人たちは時間によって鍛えられ、歌に目覚めた。
secondary_translated_text: The veterans guarding the border, tempered by time, woke up to singing.

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 其死亡瞬间的腐蚀性爆炸远比生前更具威胁。
translated_text: 爆発性と腐食性の死の瞬間は、人生のどの時点よりも危険です。
secondary_translated_text: The moment of explosive and corrosive death is more dangerous than at any point in life.

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 作为精锐战团的骨干成员，经受了严酷的训练，无畏且忠诚。它们建立的刀锋王朝，正是尚武精神的巅峰体现。
translated_text: 強力な教団の中核メンバーはよく訓練され、恐れを知らず、忠実です。彼らの王国は、彼らの刃の上に築かれた戦士の王国です。
secondary_translated_text: The core members of a powerful cult are well trained, fearless, and loyal. Their kingdom is a kingdom of warriors built on their blades, and they are the ones who are the most powerful.

translated_text: 財務マネージャー。
secondary_translated_text: Financial Manager.

translated_text: ビッグ·リード
secondary_translated_text: The Big Lead

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 它们至死都坚信那截空心木茎是神赐的圣枪——可悲的勇气，或是可敬的愚忠？
translated_text: 木の皮が割れても、虫は勇敢で愚かに攻撃しようとします。
secondary_translated_text: Even if the bark of the tree is cracked, the worm will try to attack it courageously and foolishly.

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 低语书库培育的诵经者接班人。
translated_text: 最も暗い宝物庫で育った若い弟子たちは、巻物の読者に昇進する運命にあります。
secondary_translated_text: Growing up in the darkest treasure trove, the young disciples are destined to be promoted to readers of the scrolls.

translated_text: ヌファームー
secondary_translated_text: Nufarmo

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 受命维护圣堡忆廊的博学咏者团信徒。
translated_text: 合唱団の博識な弟子が城記念館の維持を担当した。
secondary_translated_text: A learned disciple of the choir was in charge of the maintenance of the castle memorial.

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 丝咒的核心，长久沉眠却渴求苏醒。她的丝线遍布纺络，诱使这片土地上的虫子陷入疯狂。
translated_text: 心臓は幽霊、長い眠り、目覚めたいという欲求。高次生命の糸がファルに浸透し、昆虫を閉じ込め、狂気と不和に追いやった。
secondary_translated_text: The heart is a ghost, a long sleep, a desire to wake. The threads of higher life penetrated the fal, trapped the insects, and drove them into madness and discord.

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 精力充沛的老骑士与他忠诚的同伴。他们并肩作战，誓要将自己的家园从丝咒的疯狂中解救出来。
translated_text: エネルギッシュな老いた騎士と高貴な仲間たちは、幽霊の狂気から土地を解放するために協力します。
secondary_translated_text: An energetic old knight and his noble companions work together to free the land from the ghostly madness.

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 栖息于骸底镇上方洞窟的飞虫，以苔藓地衣为食。
translated_text: 翼のある昆虫で、骨の底より上の洞窟の苔や地衣類を食べる。
secondary_translated_text: A winged insect that feeds on moss and lichens in caves above the base of bones.

original_zh_text: 监工兄弟 西格尼斯&格隆
translated_text: Forebrothers Signis&Gronの意味
secondary_translated_text: Forebrothers Sign&Meaning of Gron

translated_text: スカシンガー·カルメリタ
secondary_translated_text: Sca singer Carmelita

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 独自清理圣堡秽物的哀伤生物，长针技艺登峰造极。
translated_text: 勇敢な生き物は、城から息をのむようなゴミを追い出す任務を単独で引き受ける。彼らの長いピンの才能は比類のないもの。
secondary_translated_text: The brave creature undertakes the task of driving the breathtaking garbage out of the castle alone. Their talent for long pin is unparalleled.

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 它们似乎永远不知疲倦地向下挖掘。究竟是有目的地前进，还是被迫永无止境地穿行？
translated_text: 彼らは岩や骨の中を絶えずかき混ぜ、決して休まないように見えた。目的地はありますか？それとも永遠に深く掘り下げるのか？
secondary_translated_text: They were constantly stirring in the rocks and bones, and never seemed to rest. Do you have a destination? or do we dig deep forever?

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 圣堡废气催生的肥胖蟑螂变种，鼓胀的腹部储存着沸腾胆汁。
translated_text: ゴキブリの太った枝は、城の排気ガスから生まれました。翼のあるゴキブリの垂れ下がった胃は、ヒスと胆汁で満たされた。
secondary_translated_text: The thick branches of cockroaches were born from the castle's exhaust. The sagging stomach of the winged cockroach was filled with hyssop and bile.

translated_text: マローモ
secondary_translated_text: Malomo

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 远古时期因某项重罪被囚禁的古老织者。
translated_text: 古代の織物職人は時間に失われた罪で非難された。
secondary_translated_text: The ancient weavers were accused of sins lost in time.

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 面甲投掷精准异常，暴戾的性情并未损耗其分毫准度。
translated_text: 素敵な写真、鋭いマスク。その攻撃性は、その目的に悪影響を及ぼさない。
secondary_translated_text: Lovely photos, sharp masks. Its aggressiveness does not adversely affect its objectives.

translated_text: 下への圧力
secondary_translated_text: Pressure to the bottom

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 看似柔软实则暗藏杀机，掠食者的撕咬只会换来锥心之痛。
translated_text: 穏やかに見えるかもしれませんが、鋭い驚きが隠されています。噛み込もうとする大型捕食者は鋭く痛みを伴う教訓を得る。
secondary_translated_text: It may seem calm, but it hides a sharp surprise. Large predators attempting to bite learn a sharp and painful lesson.

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 烟雾与灵丝交织的意志投影，并非实体生物。
translated_text: 昆虫ではなく、煙と絹の中に投げ込まれた別の人間の意志。
secondary_translated_text: Not an insect, but another human will thrown in smoke and silk.

translated_text: スワンプSquit
secondary_translated_text: SwampSquit

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 破损的古织者装置，能聚集并发射灵丝光束凿穿冰体和骸骨，通常用来开凿厅室。
translated_text: ウィーバーのかつての壊れた建物は、氷と骨の彫刻ホールや部屋を通して、濃縮されたマーセリアの雰囲気を放つことができます。
secondary_translated_text: Weaver's formerly broken buildings can radiate a concentrated Marcelia atmosphere through the ice and bone sculpted halls and chambers.

translated_text: ディープ·ダイバー
secondary_translated_text: Deep Diver

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 闪烁火焰孕育出的精灵，其生命往往转瞬即逝。
translated_text: きらめく炎から生まれた短命の魂。
secondary_translated_text: A short-lived soul born from a glowing flame.

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 顶覆厚重甲壳的漂浮虫，行动迟缓，对致命威胁也都反应微弱。
translated_text: ゆっくりと浮遊する昆虫の上部殻は重い。この脆弱性は、命を奪う可能性のある脅威でさえ、脅威にほとんど反応しません。
secondary_translated_text: The upper shell of a slowly floating insect is heavy. This vulnerability responds very little to threats, even those that could take their lives.

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 负责开采深坞下方危险矿区的虫子，身覆钟甲。
translated_text: 時計をつけたバグは、ドックの下のより深く危険な深さで採掘する責任があります。
secondary_translated_text: The clocked bugs are responsible for mining at deeper and more dangerous depths beneath the dock.

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 栖身洞顶的齿舌生物，用拟态长舌诱捕猎物。
translated_text: 洞窟の屋根には歯の植物が生えている。その長い舌でわがままな昆虫を包み、食べに引きずり込んだ。
secondary_translated_text: On the roof of the cave there is a tooth plant. Its long tongue enveloped the mischievous insect and dragged him into eating it.

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
translated_text: 翼のある飛行士の群れ。
secondary_translated_text: A flock of winged pilots.

original_en_text: Long dormant centipede, awoken and enraged by Pharloom’s crumbling collapse.
original_zh_text: 长期蛰伏的远古蜈蚣，因纺络的崩塌而苏醒、暴怒。
translated_text: 長い眠りについていたムカデは、ファラムの崩壊で目を覚まし、激怒する。
secondary_translated_text: After a long sleep, Mukad awakens and is furious at the collapse of Pharam.

translated_text: サグラ
secondary_translated_text: Sagra

original_en_text: Erratic, flying pest that nests in rags and curtains.
original_zh_text: 寄居在破布和帷幔中的飞虫，居无定所。
translated_text: ぼろやカーテンの中に巣を作る不安定な飛翔害虫。
secondary_translated_text: An unstable flying pest that builds a nest in rags and curtains.

translated_text: ゼブラフライ
secondary_translated_text: Zebrafly

original_en_text: Once a hunter purely for food, now they hunt unthinking and unending.
original_zh_text: 曾是只为果腹而捕猎的猎手，如今却在丝咒驱使下沦为永不停歇的屠夫。
translated_text: かつては食料のためだけに狩りをしていたが、今は考えずに果てしなく狩りをする。
secondary_translated_text: In the past, they hunted only for food, but now they hunt endlessly without thinking.

original_en_text: So light they can rest atop still water’s surface. An elegant bug indeed.
original_zh_text: 轻盈得能栖于静水表面，确为优雅之虫。
translated_text: そのため、十分な光のある静水に生息することができる。これは本当に重大な誤りです。
secondary_translated_text: This means that they can live in still water with sufficient light. This is indeed a grave mistake.

translated_text: スチールレーカー
secondary_translated_text: Steel Laker

original_en_text: Its form is absurd... Surely it should not be able to hold itself in the air? The noxious gases in its stomach must provide its levity.
original_zh_text: 如此畸形的躯体竟能悬空？想必是腹中毒气提供了浮力。
translated_text: その形はばかげている。本当に空中にいられないのでしょうか？胃の中の有毒ガスが軽薄さを提供したに違いない。
secondary_translated_text: That form is ridiculous. can we really be in the air? The toxic gas in the stomach must have provided the lightness.

original_en_text: Once roused, the bug will crash its steely shell into walls, floors and foes.
original_zh_text: 被惊动后，会以钢甲撞击墙壁、地面与敌人。
translated_text: 目を覚ますと、ワームは壁、床、敵を粉砕して鋼の殻を破壊します。
secondary_translated_text: When they wake up, the worm will crush walls, floors and enemies to destroy the steel shell.

translated_text: 鉄の長老たち
secondary_translated_text: The Elders of Iron

original_en_text: Elder crawbug serving in a sacred ceremony.
original_zh_text: 参与神圣仪式的腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: 年長のザリガニは神聖な儀式で奉仕する。
secondary_translated_text: The elderly crab serves in a sacred ceremony.

translated_text: 特使の言葉
secondary_translated_text: Special Envoy's words

translated_text: 強欲な巡礼者
secondary_translated_text: The greedy pilgrim.

original_en_text: Agile bug, and one of few hardy pilgrims to have reached the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 成功抵达圣堡的敏捷朝圣者。
translated_text: この機敏な昆虫は、城に到着した数少ない頑強な巡礼者の一人でもあります。
secondary_translated_text: This agile insect is also one of the few tenacious pilgrims who have arrived at the castle.

original_en_text: Their use of a pin shows hard training. Their use of Silk, unfurled from a spool held close, shows skill far beyond standard bugs.
original_zh_text: 其刺针技法明显是经过严格训练，近身灵丝轴的操控技艺更是远超普通虫子。
translated_text: ピンの使い方は、トレーニングの難しさを示しています。近くの巻物から展開されたSilkを使用し、標準虫をはるかに超えた技を披露した。
secondary_translated_text: The use of the pins shows the difficulty of training. Using Silk unfolded from a nearby scroll, he displayed his skills far beyond the standard worm.

original_en_text: Gilded guardian of the Blasted Steps, bearing a cymbal and mallet.
original_zh_text: 镇守蚀阶的金甲守卫，用钹和木槌处决"不洁者"。
translated_text: 金色の守護者、爆発的な足音、シンバルとマレットを持つ。
secondary_translated_text: It has a golden guardian, explosive footsteps, a cymbal and a mallet.

original_en_text: A rare, calmer bug of Bilewater, survives its hazardous surroundings by hiding as a plant.
original_zh_text: 腐汁泽罕见的温顺虫子，在危险的环境中拟态植物，得以生存。
translated_text: まれで穏やかな胆汁細菌は、植物に隠れて危険な環境で生存しています。
secondary_translated_text: Rare, gentle bile bacteria survive in dangerous environments hiding in plants.

original_en_text: Bug forged of iron, rotor and cog. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the Core that houses it.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮与转子构成的铁质自动机，不知疲倦维护着机枢核心。
translated_text: 鉄、ターンテーブル、歯車から鍛造された漏れ。オートマトンはそれを収容するコアを維持するために休むことなく働く。
secondary_translated_text: Leakage wrought from iron, turntable and gears. The automaton works without rest to maintain the core that houses it.

original_en_text: Starved pack bug with an insatiable appetite. Despite their tough hide and pungent meat, roaches breed rapidly so are sometimes farmed for food.
original_zh_text: 贪婪的群居害虫，甲壳坚硬，虫肉腥臭，却因繁殖力超强被圈养作为为食物来源。
translated_text: 空腹の共生生物は食欲を満たすことができない。ゴキブリの皮は硬く、肉は辛いが、繁殖速度は速く、食料として養殖されることもある。
secondary_translated_text: A hungry symbiotic cannot satisfy its appetite. Although the skin of cockroaches is hard and the meat is spicy, they reproduce at a fast rate and are sometimes raised for food.

translated_text: ジャーナル更新。
secondary_translated_text: Journal updates.

translated_text: シャドウクローラー。
secondary_translated_text: The Shadow Crawler.

original_en_text: They cling fast to the shells of other bugs, destroying any hope for concentration or comfort.
original_zh_text: 它们紧附其他虫子的外壳，彻底摧毁宿主的专注力与安宁。
translated_text: 彼らは他の昆虫の殻に付着し、集中力や快適さの希望を破壊します。
secondary_translated_text: They adhere to the shells of other insects, destroying hopes of concentration and comfort.

original_en_text: Pointed, darting insect that builds a hardy hive from Shellwood’s dried bark.
original_zh_text: 以甲木林干树皮筑巢的尖刺飞虫。
translated_text: 尖ったスプレー昆虫は貝殻木材の乾燥した樹皮を使って丈夫な巣を作る。
secondary_translated_text: The pointy spray insects use the dried bark of the shellwood to build sturdy nests.

original_en_text: Full-sized mite of the Citadel cloaked in an old curtain.
original_zh_text: 披挂破旧幕帘的圣堡巨型螨虫。
translated_text: 城の古いカーテンには、実物大のダニが包まれていた。
secondary_translated_text: The old curtains of the castle were wrapped in life-sized mites.

translated_text: うなり声
secondary_translated_text: Moaning

translated_text: 細胞質は
secondary_translated_text: cytoplasm is

original_en_text: A snapping surprise on first encounter, though one easily avoided once aware.
original_zh_text: 初次遭遇的惊险过后，便再难构成威胁。
translated_text: 最初に会うときは驚きがありますが、一度それを実現すれば避けるのは簡単です。
secondary_translated_text: There are surprises when you first meet them, but once you realize it, it's easy to avoid them.

translated_text: リン酸水素
secondary_translated_text: Hydrogen phosphate

translated_text: スカリド
secondary_translated_text: Scullyd

original_en_text: His tracks and traps... It should have been obvious from the start, this old hunter sought to draw me in. But what reason drove him to test himself so brutally? That answer I suspect I shall never know.
original_zh_text: 早该察觉他的踪迹与陷阱……但这老猎手对自己进行如此残酷试炼的原因，看来是无从得知了。
translated_text: 彼の足跡と罠最初から、古いハンターが私を誘惑しようとしていることは明らかでしたが、何が彼をそんなに残酷に試したのでしょうか。私は決して答えを知りません。
secondary_translated_text: His footsteps and traps From the very beginning it was clear that the old hunter was trying to seduce me, but what had tried him so cruelly? I'll never know the answer.

original_en_text: Brutish cook responsible for dicing Muckroach meat into edible portions.
original_zh_text: 粗鲁的厨子，负责将淤秽蟑螂肉切分成便于食用的分量。
translated_text: 野蛮な料理人はゴキブリの肉を食用に切る。
secondary_translated_text: The barbaric cook chops the cockroach's flesh for eating.

original_en_text: Flighted automaton, responsible for repairing and extending the Core.
original_zh_text: 负责维修扩建核心的飞行自动机，简单攻击暗藏杀机。
translated_text: コアの修復と拡張を担当する飛行オートマトン。
secondary_translated_text: A flying automaton in charge of repairing and expanding the core.

original_en_text: Giant roller of the lowlands. Its ridged hide will crush smaller creatures beneath it.
original_zh_text: 在低地区域横冲直撞的巨型生物，带棱甲的躯体能轻易碾碎小型生物。
translated_text: 低地の巨大なロール。その尾根状の皮膚は下の小さな生物を押しつぶすことができる。
secondary_translated_text: Huge roll of lowlands. Its ridge-like skin can crush the tiny creatures below.

original_en_text: Shell of a small bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will stretch its Silk to form a crude, crushing wheel.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣附身的小型甲虫躯壳，伸展灵丝形成粗糙碾压轮。
translated_text: 小さな昆虫の殻は絹の残渣で体に付着する。貝殻は絹を伸ばし、粗く壊れた車輪を形成する。
secondary_translated_text: The shells of small insects are attached to the body as silk residue. The shell stretches the silk, forming roughly broken wheels.

original_en_text: Rag-winged adult crawbug bearing a scavenged pin.
original_zh_text: 翅膀破烂的腐囊成虫，使用捡来刺针作为武器。
translated_text: 粗い翼と捕食性のピンを持つ成体のザリガニ。
secondary_translated_text: An adult crab with coarse wings and predatory pins.

translated_text: ゴキブリは
secondary_translated_text: cockroaches are

original_en_text: I have not yet seen the bell this automaton is designed to ring, nor do I ever wish to hear it. Such a clamour would no doubt be unpleasant to experience.
original_zh_text: 它们机械臂摆动的节奏暗合圣咏旋律，若真让这些击钹者齐聚奏响终章，恐怕整个机枢核心都会在共振中崩塌。
translated_text: 私はこのロボットの設計が鳴らす鐘を見たことがないし、聞きたくもない。このような騒音は不快になります。
secondary_translated_text: I've never seen this robot design ring a bell, and I don't want to hear it. This kind of noise can be uncomfortable.

translated_text: パレスチナの
secondary_translated_text: of Palestine.

original_en_text: If allowed the opportunity, these creatures will grow into a form larger and more oppressive.
original_zh_text: 此刻脆弱，却是未来灾祸的种子。放任其成长将成为巨大威胁。
translated_text: 機会があれば、これらの生き物はより大きく、より抑圧的な形に成長するでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: Given the opportunity, these creatures will grow into larger, more repressive forms.

original_en_text: He offered fair warning and challenge, a duel in the purest sense. I admire his honour, and his skill.
original_zh_text: 他向我发起了正式的挑战，那是一场最纯粹的决斗。我敬佩他的荣誉感，也钦佩他的技艺。
translated_text: 彼は公正な警告と挑戦を与えた。これは純粋な意味での戦いです。私は彼の名誉とスキルを賞賛する。
secondary_translated_text: He gave a fair warning and challenge. This is a fight in the pure sense. I admire his honour and skill.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, born with sharp, retractable horns atop its head.
original_zh_text: 头部配备可收缩尖角的拟态树枝虫。
translated_text: 昆虫は枝を模し、頭に鋭い伸縮可能な角を持つ。
secondary_translated_text: Insects mimic branches and have sharp, telescopic horns on their heads.

original_en_text: Small, soft bug that uses the hard skulls of the Marrow for protection and disguise.
original_zh_text: 小型软体虫，利用髓骨洞窟内硬质头骨作为自己的护甲和伪装。
translated_text: 小さくて柔らかいワームで、硬い骨髄の頭蓋骨を使って保護し、カモフラージュする。
secondary_translated_text: A small, soft worm that uses a hard bone marrow skull to protect and camouflage it.

original_en_text: When roosting, it would look convincingly plant-like. In flight, its bulbous body quickly ruins the ruse.
original_zh_text: 停栖时，双翼能完美伪装成远野的草叶。但这小聪明总在飞行时露出破绽——它膨大的腹部让伪装功亏一篑。
translated_text: 見ると植物のように魅力的に見えます。飛行中、その球形のボディはすぐに技術を破壊した。
secondary_translated_text: When you look at it, it looks as attractive as a plant. In flight, its spherical body quickly destroyed the technology.

translated_text: ヤゴさん
secondary_translated_text: Yago.

translated_text: モデル細菌
secondary_translated_text: Model Bacteria

original_en_text: Cloth-covered crawler with sharpened forelimbs. Lives and breeds in dark places.
original_zh_text: 栖息暗处的爬虫，身覆布料，前肢锐利。
translated_text: 爬虫類は布と鋭い前足で覆われている。暗い場所で生活し、繁殖する。
secondary_translated_text: The reptiles are covered with cloth and sharp fore legs. They live and reproduce in dark places.

translated_text: ウィングウィング·ウィング
secondary_translated_text: Wing Wing

original_en_text: The cost of so much grandeur... Did I peer closely enough into the foundations of my own kingdom?
original_zh_text: 辉煌背后的代价……我是否也曾如此审视过自己王国的根基？
translated_text: そのような大きなコスト。私は王国の基盤をよく見ましたか？
secondary_translated_text: Such a huge cost. Have I looked at the foundation of the kingdom well?

original_en_text: Stout adult crawbug bearing several short pins.
original_zh_text: 手持短刺的矮胖腐囊成虫。
translated_text: 短い針を持つ太い成体ザリガニ。
secondary_translated_text: A thick adult crab with short needles.

translated_text: ラ·ヴァルーグ
secondary_translated_text: La Valug

original_en_text: Greed will always see some bugs swell above their kin.
original_zh_text: 贪婪终会导致膨胀，这是所有生物共通的教训。
translated_text: 貪欲な人々は常に彼らの仲間に広がる間違いを見る。
secondary_translated_text: Greedy people always see errors spreading to their fellows.

original_en_text: This graceful ruler once possessed skill to rival my own. At her youthful peak, her voice united all Skarr in her service.
original_zh_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾拥有与我匹敌的武艺。在她巅峰时期，其歌喉能让所有斯卡尔蚁族臣服效命。
translated_text: この優雅な支配者はかつて私に匹敵する技術を持っていた。彼女の青春の絶頂期には、彼女の声は彼女のためにスケラインのすべてを結びつけた。
secondary_translated_text: This graceful ruler once had a skill comparable to mine. At the height of her youth, her voice united all of the scale for her.

original_en_text: False fly with a rune etched shell. A tortured mix of soul and void is caged within.
original_zh_text: 外壳刻有符文的飞虫形装置，内部囚禁着灵魂与虚空的痛苦混合物。
translated_text: 偽ハエの殻にはルーン文字がある。魂と空虚の痛みの混合物は檻の中に閉じ込められている。
secondary_translated_text: The shell of the false fly has a runic letter. A mixture of soul and emptiness pains is locked in a cage.

original_en_text: Suction creature surviving on the thick slime that coats its caves.
original_zh_text: 依赖洞壁浓稠粘液维生的吸附生物。
translated_text: 吸引生物は洞窟を覆う粘液に依存している。
secondary_translated_text: The suction organism relies on the mucus that covers the cave.

original_en_text: Tall roach tender charged to feed Muckroaches on a lean diet of maggot gruel.
original_zh_text: 负责用蛆虫糊喂养腐汁蟑螂的高瘦饲育者。
translated_text: 背の高いゴキブリはウジ虫のお粥から赤身の飼料を必要とする。
secondary_translated_text: The tall cockroaches need red meat feed from the porridge of the worm.

original_en_text: Tiny, soft creature that armours itself using the hard, hollow growths of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 用甲木林硬质空茎武装自身的脆弱飞虫。
translated_text: 微小で柔らかい生物は、贝のような硬くの植物を使って身を守る。
secondary_translated_text: The tiny, soft creatures use hard plants like shells to protect themselves.

original_en_text: Taken by Pharloom’s Haunting, the bug is now capable of little more than prayer and aggression.
original_zh_text: 丝咒侵蚀了它们的理智，如今这些虫子只剩祷告与攻击的本能。
translated_text: FalhamのHauntedでは、虫は祈りと攻撃しかできません。
secondary_translated_text: In Falham's Haunted, the bugs can only pray and attack.

translated_text: 巡礼者グロヴィル
secondary_translated_text: Groville the Pilgrim

original_en_text: Oversized bug, briefly consumed by anger after its long time caged.
original_zh_text: 长期囚禁后暴怒的巨型跳蚤。
translated_text: ハミング昆虫は長い間ケージに閉じ込められた後、怒りで短時間飲み込まれた。
secondary_translated_text: The humming insect was briefly swallowed up in anger after being caged for a long time.

original_en_text: From the outset, theirs was a hopeless task. Those wild lands could never be replicated within a space so artificial.
original_zh_text: 从最初这就是徒劳之举——自然的荒野绝无可能在虫子造出的空间刻意复现。
translated_text: 最初から、彼らの任務は絶望的でした。このような人工空間では決して再現できません。
secondary_translated_text: From the beginning, their task was hopeless. It can never be reproduced in such an artificial space.

original_zh_text: 低地地区的游荡者，绒毛下暗藏钢刺并具备远程发射能力。
translated_text: ローエンド·スパイン·ドリフター
secondary_translated_text: Low-end spine drifters

original_en_text: Wriggling young grub that lives in darkness.
translated_text: 暗闇の中を這う若い幼虫。
secondary_translated_text: Young larvae crawling in the dark.

original_en_text: Their procedures with Silk may have prolonged life within the Citadel, but they unknowingly gifted many minds to the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他们的灵丝手术虽维系了圣堡的生命，却无意中将所有心智献予了君主。
translated_text: 絹の扱いは城の寿命を延ばしたかもしれませんが、無意識のうちに多くのアイデアを君主に伝えています。
secondary_translated_text: The treatment of silk may have extended the life of the castle, but it has subconsciously conveyed many ideas to the monarch.

original_en_text: Floral foe that reacts instinctively to movement nearby. Spits pellets of crackling pollen that burst on impact.
original_zh_text: 对周围动静极其敏感的植物，能够喷射噼啪作响的花粉弹。
translated_text: 花敌は本能的に近くの动きに反応する。花粉球を噴射し、衝撃で破裂する。
secondary_translated_text: Flower opponents instinctively react to nearby movements. They eject pollen balls and burst in shock.

translated_text: 告白する。
secondary_translated_text: I confess.

translated_text: ファーティッド
secondary_translated_text: Fatid

translated_text: ベリンジア
secondary_translated_text: Belinzia

translated_text: セカンド·センチネル
secondary_translated_text: Second Sentinel

original_en_text: In contests of speed against strength, I have seen the swift more often triumphant, a lesson I have taken to my own heart.
original_zh_text: 见证这以快制胜的案例，更坚定了我对敏捷的追求。
translated_text: スピードとパワーの競争では、スウィフトがより多くの勝利を収めているのを見て、それは私の心の教訓です。
secondary_translated_text: It's a lesson in my mind to see Swift win more in the race of speed and power.

translated_text: 下層階のロフト。
secondary_translated_text: Loft on the lower level.

translated_text: ポンドキャッチャー
secondary_translated_text: Pound catcher

translated_text: 分割する。
secondary_translated_text: Divide them.

original_en_text: Pilgrim endowed with large wings, carrying a brace of iron bells.
original_zh_text: 配备一对铁钟的飞行朝圣者。
translated_text: 巡礼者は大きな翼を持ち、鉄の時計を持っていた。
secondary_translated_text: The pilgrims had large wings and had iron clocks.

translated_text: 槍とスケルトン。
secondary_translated_text: Spear and skeleton.

original_en_text: In my youth, I envied all bugs with wings. I even fancied I might grow a pair... I have since learned better. Accept the limitations of one’s body... and augment with tools as needed.
original_zh_text: 年少时，我曾一度羡慕生来便有翅膀的虫族，甚至曾幻想自己也能长出一对来……如今我已明白，接受身体上的限制，并学会用工具弥补缺陷才是正途。
translated_text: 若い頃は、翼のある昆虫が羨ましいです。私はカップルを育てることを想像しました。それ以来、私はより良いことを学んだ。身体の限界を受け入れる。必要に応じてツールを追加します。
secondary_translated_text: When I was young, I envied the winged insects. I have imagined raising a couple. Since then, I have learned better. Accept the limits of your body. Add tools if you need to.

original_en_text: Devious ambusher that poses as a fossil.
original_zh_text: 伪装成化石的狡诈伏击者。
translated_text: ピエロは化石のふりをする。
secondary_translated_text: Clowns pretend to be fossils.

translated_text: ゴースト。
secondary_translated_text: The ghost.

original_en_text: This bug bears a spool of Silk, which they flail to attack. Though somewhat crude, theirs is a technique much reminiscent of Weavers. I wonder who taught them such a use?
original_zh_text: 这只虫子携带着一轴灵丝，并挥舞它进行攻击。动作虽略显粗糙，但竟带着几分织者的神韵。不知是谁教会了它这样使用灵丝？
translated_text: 昆虫は絹のロールを持って、それに振り回す。少し粗雑だが、そのテクニックはウィーバーを彷彿とさせる。誰がこの使い方を教えたのか。
secondary_translated_text: The insect holds a silk roll and swings around it. A little rough, but the technique is reminiscent of a weaver. Who taught me how to use this?

original_en_text: Her presence would once have maintained the wood’s fragile order, allowing the safe passage of bugs across its branches.
original_zh_text: 昔日的她维持领域内脆弱的平衡，护佑虫子们安然通行其枝干。
translated_text: 彼女の存在は、昆虫が安全に枝を通り抜けることを可能にした森の壊れやすい秩序を保っていた。
secondary_translated_text: Her presence had kept the fragile order of the forest, which allowed insects to safely pass through the branches.

translated_text: 巡礼者が多い。
secondary_translated_text: There are many pilgrims.

original_en_text: Though generally passive, their sharp masks can cause injury if carelessly blundered into.
original_zh_text: 虽性情温顺，但若冒失冲撞其锋利面甲仍会受伤。
translated_text: 通常は受動的ですが、鋭いマスクにぶつかるとダメージを与える可能性があります。
secondary_translated_text: They are usually passive, but they can cause damage if they hit a sharp mask.

translated_text: 空飛ぶシロアリ。
secondary_translated_text: Flying termites.

original_en_text: I like her. For her willingness to teach and her spirit still strong, despite a long age spent solitary... she has my respect.
original_zh_text: 我欣赏她——甘于传授技艺，孤寂长年也未磨灭斗志，值得尊敬。
translated_text: 私は彼女が好き彼女は長い間独居でしたが、教えることが好きで、精神が強いです私は彼女を尊敬します。
secondary_translated_text: I like her She lived alone for a long time, but she likes to teach, and the spirit is strong I respect her.

translated_text: 破片の樹皮
secondary_translated_text: Debris Bark

original_en_text: They held long at their vigil, far beyond the age of their brethren, yet still when roused they swung their blade with remarkable ease.
original_zh_text: 他们戍边的年岁就能远超同辈寿命，苏醒时仍能挥动利刃，动作流畅自如。
translated_text: 彼らは兄弟の年齢をはるかに超えていたが、目覚めたときにはまだ軽く剣を振り回していた。
secondary_translated_text: They were far beyond their brother's age, but when they woke up they were still lightly wielding their swords.

original_en_text: Long-horned beast of Pharloom’s lowlands. Relies on its horn both to impale and to wrench the ground beneath it, flinging dangerous debris.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地的长角巨兽，依赖长角穿刺敌人并掘起地面制造危险碎片云。
translated_text: 低地ファナムの长角牛。その角に頼って下の地面を突き刺し、危険な破片を投げつける。
secondary_translated_text: Longhorn cattle of Lowland Fanham. Relying on its horns, it pierces the ground below and throws dangerous debris.

original_en_text: Could their actions be called skill? I see only a crude mangling of meat. Yet I wonder, before the Haunting snared their minds was it any different?
original_zh_text: 这般行径怎能称为厨艺？我只见到对血肉的粗暴摧残。它在丝咒侵蚀前，或许不会像现在这样粗鄙行事？
translated_text: 彼らの行動はスキルと言えるか？私は粗い肉の塊を見た。しかし、幽霊が彼らを捕まえる前に状況が変わったかどうかはわからない。
secondary_translated_text: do you think their actions are a skill? I saw a coarse piece of meat. However, they don't know if things changed before the ghosts took over them.

original_en_text: Darting warrior with sharpened forelimbs and heightened senses.
original_zh_text: 前肢尖利且感官强化的迅捷战士。
translated_text: ダーツ戦士は鋭い前腕と鋭い感覚を持っている。
secondary_translated_text: The darts warrior has a sharp forearm and a sharp sense.

original_en_text: Mighty percussive disciple of the Choir, wielding a mallet and a Silk spool to wrap and enhance their attacks.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的打击乐信徒，挥舞槌棒，并利用灵丝轴强化它们的攻击。
translated_text: 強力な攻撃の聖歌隊の弟子たちは木槌と絹の巻物を振り回し、攻撃を強化します。
secondary_translated_text: The disciples of the powerful attack choir wield hammers and silk scrolls to intensify their attacks.

original_en_text: Dual princes of old Verdania, beloved by their subjects for their grace and for the ballet of death they delivered upon outsiders.
original_zh_text: 昔日翠庭王国的双生王子，以恩典治国，深受子民爱戴。对于不怀好意的外来者，他们会为其献上一支死亡芭蕾。
translated_text: 古いヴェルダニアの二重王子は、その優雅さと部外者に提示された死のバレエで臣下に愛された。
secondary_translated_text: The double prince of old Verdania was loved by his subjects for his grace and the ballet of death presented to outsiders.

original_en_text: Huge and soft, a fantastic combination ruined by their haunted aggression.
original_zh_text: 明明是个蓬松的大毛球，可惜被丝咒搞得见谁都想撞两下。
translated_text: 巨大で柔らかい、それは素晴らしい組み合わせですが、幽霊のような攻撃性によって台無しになります。
secondary_translated_text: Huge and soft, it's a great combination, but it gets spoiled by ghostly aggression.

translated_text: ハードボーン漏斗
secondary_translated_text: Hardbone Funnel

original_en_text: On uneven terrain their union of flight and range can prove a challenge even for me.
original_zh_text: 崎岖地形中，其飞行阵列的配合连我也需谨慎应对。
translated_text: 険しい地形での飛行と航続距離の組み合わせは、私にとっても挑戦でした。
secondary_translated_text: The combination of flying over rugged terrain and range was a challenge for me too.

original_en_text: They toiled incessantly for the Citadel, their shells bent and greyed, and now the kingdom’s curse means not even death can relieve them.
original_zh_text: 他们为圣堡鞠躬尽瘁直至甲壳弯折灰败，如今连死亡都无法终结这诅咒。
translated_text: 彼らは城のために懸命に働き、貝殻は曲がって灰色に変わり、王国の呪いは死でも彼らを取り除くことができないことを意味します。
secondary_translated_text: They work hard for the castle, their shells bend and turn gray, and the curse of the kingdom means that even death cannot get rid of them.

original_en_text: Destroying the hives will limit their presence in the wood. Useful to me now, as I pass along the branches. Dangerous in time for the wood’s order. Even a small disruption can tip a fragile balance.
original_zh_text: 摧毁蜂巢会限制它们在林中的活动。对我而言，这在穿行丛林时十分有用。但从长远来看，即便是微小的干扰，也可能打破丛林脆弱的生态平衡。
translated_text: ミツバチの巣を破壊すると森での存在が制限される。枝の上を歩いていると、それが私のために働く。木材注文の危険な時期。わずかなダメージでも脆弱なバランスを崩すことができます。
secondary_translated_text: Destroying a bee's nest limits its presence in the forest. When I walk on a branch, it works for me. Dangerous time for timber orders. Even the slightest damage can upset the fragile balance.

original_en_text: It has no true mind, and yet fights effectively, adjusting its strategy to my movements. Where exactly are its thoughts written?
original_zh_text: 当它用盾牌格挡我的织针突刺，同时以刁钻角度刺出长枪时，我仿佛在与某个沉睡在齿轮中的古老剑客对决。
translated_text: 本当のアイデアはありませんが、私の動きに合わせて戦略を調整することで戦闘は効果的です。彼のアイデアはどこに書かれたか。
secondary_translated_text: I don't have a real idea, but the battle is effective by adjusting my strategy to fit my moves. Where did his idea come from?

original_en_text: A bug born entirely of thread. Much Silk would have been needed to see her sustained. A fragile form of life, but life nonetheless.
original_zh_text: 完全由灵丝编织而成的虫子。维持这种丝造生命需耗费海量的灵丝资源，虽形态脆弱却真实鲜活。
translated_text: 完全にスレッドによって生成されたエラー。彼女を動かすにはたくさんの絹が必要です。壊れやすい生命体ですが、それでも生命です。
secondary_translated_text: Error generated entirely by thread. She needs a lot of silk to move her. It is a fragile organism, but it is still life.

translated_text: 偉大な敬礼。
secondary_translated_text: Great greetings.

original_en_text: Individually they offer little challenge, but their numbers are surely vast, and most remain hidden.
original_zh_text: 单只不足为惧，但其庞大族群多潜藏暗处，如同阴影永难根除。
translated_text: 個人的には、彼らが直面する課題はほとんどありませんが、その数は確かに多く、そのほとんどはまだ隠されています。
secondary_translated_text: Personally, there are very few challenges they face, but the number is certainly many, and most of them are still hidden.

original_en_text: A lucky bug to be able to grow old. Pharloom’s roads take most much earlier.
original_zh_text: 能在纺络活到这样的年纪堪称奇迹，只可惜这份长寿化作了更持久的折磨。
translated_text: 年を取ることができる幸運な虫。ファーラムの道は早く進んだ。
secondary_translated_text: Lucky worm that can get old. Farram's path advanced quickly.

original_en_text: Huge flighted creature formed from coldshard.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的巨型飞行生物。
translated_text: 巨大な飛行生物は冷たい破片からできている。
secondary_translated_text: The giant flying creature is made of cold debris.

original_en_text: She has lived a mere fraction of my lifetime and yet her rings prove a ferocious match. As gifted a warrior as I have ever encountered, and one I am fortunate to call a friend.
original_zh_text: 她的年岁不过我生命的一小段，但她的战环却展现出凶狠的实力。她是我所遇过最出色的战士之一，很庆幸能和她成为朋友。
translated_text: 彼女は私の人生のほんの一部を経験しただけでしたが、彼女のリングは完璧にフィットしていました。私が今まで会った中で最も才能のある兵士は、私が友人と呼ぶ名誉を得た兵士です。
secondary_translated_text: She had only experienced a small part of my life, but her ring was a perfect fit. The most talented soldier I have ever met is a soldier who has earned the honor of calling me a friend.

original_en_text: Sheer bulk makes for an effective weapon, but requires much sustenance. This creature would have spent most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some.
original_zh_text: 庞大的身躯是它们致命的武器，但也需要大量营养来维持。这种生物绝大多数时间都在进食，倒也活得纯粹。
translated_text: 純粋なスクロールは効果的な武器ですが、多くのサポートが必要です。この生き物はほとんどの時間を食べています。それは一部の人々にとって受け入れられる人生です。
secondary_translated_text: Pure scrolling is an effective weapon, but it requires a lot of support. This creature eats most of the time. It is an acceptable life for some people.

original_en_text: These ones grow large, yet I have never observed them eating, or sleeping. They seem such simple bugs... but I suspect they are not truly our cousins.
original_zh_text: 体型虽庞大，却从未见其进食或休眠。看似普通的虫子……实则与我们并非同类。
translated_text: 大きく成長していますが、食べたり寝たりするのを見たことはありません。とても単純に見えます彼らは本当のいとこだと思います
secondary_translated_text: It is growing big, but I have never seen it eat or sleep. It looks so simple, I think they're real cousins.

original_en_text: Huge, hardbone bug that lives within and travels through the veins of old bells across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 居住在古钟里并穿梭于纺络广阔钟脉里的骨甲大块头。
translated_text: 巨大で硬いワームがファルの古代時計の静脈に生息し、ファルを通過しています。
secondary_translated_text: A huge, hard worm inhabits the veins of the ancient clock of the fallout and passes through the fallout.

original_en_text: Winged devout of the Citadel, carrying a brace of gilded bells.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的带翼信徒，背负一对镀金巨钟作战。
translated_text: 金色の鐘を背負って城の中を堂々と飛んでいた。
secondary_translated_text: He flew proudly through the castle, carrying a golden bell on his back.

original_en_text: This one would make a perfect pet, but for the freezing temperatures it requires for comfort.
original_zh_text: 本可成为完美的宠物，但其生存需依赖刺骨的低温。
translated_text: これは完璧なペットになりますが、寒さのために快適である必要があります。
secondary_translated_text: This will make a perfect pet, but it needs to be comfortable because of the cold.

original_en_text: These creatures look to have been bred deliberately in watery pens. If they are food to be, their scent suggests they must taste vile.
original_zh_text: 刻意养殖的水栖变种，若作食用，其恶臭已昭示其滋味堪忧。
translated_text: この生物は水中で繁殖しているようです。未来の食べ物だとしたら、匂いは食べにくいことを示しています。
secondary_translated_text: This creature seems to be breeding in the water. If it's the food of the future, the smell indicates that it's hard to eat.

original_en_text: Their skill once saw them chosen, and I can plainly see why. They would have lived and trained only for this duty.
original_zh_text: 它们的高超技艺我已亲身体会，必然是终生磨练只为履行职责。
translated_text: 彼らのスキルが選ばれた理由はよく分かります彼らはこの責任のために生き、訓練するだけです。
secondary_translated_text: I know very well why their skills were chosen; they only live and train for this responsibility.

original_en_text: For this bug to have survived Pharloom’s climb it must have teamed with stouter companions. I cannot imagine it succeeding alone.
original_zh_text: 单凭自身的力量，这虫子绝无可能攀越纺络的天堑，成功进入圣堡。想必曾与更强壮的伙伴互为倚仗。
translated_text: この昆虫はファルムに登ったときに生き残り、より強力な仲間と協力したに違いない。単独では考えられません。
secondary_translated_text: This insect must have survived when it climbed the farm, and must have cooperated with its more powerful companion. You cannot think alone.

original_en_text: Did this one grow large thanks to the Citadel’s excess, or was its formidable size the reason it ever survived to reach this place?
original_zh_text: 这家伙的巨大体型是因圣堡的恩赐而异变，还是正因其巨大体型才得以存活至此？
translated_text: 城の大きさは城の多さによって大きくなったのか、それともその強大な大きさが生き残ってここにたどり着いたのか。
secondary_translated_text: Did the size of the castle increase by the number of castles, or did its mighty size survive and come here?

original_en_text: Though surely fierce, the skull it bears looks taken from an even larger beast. If not for the bones as proof, I would scarcely believe bugs could grow to such scale.
original_zh_text: 它头顶的骷髅战盔竟取自更庞大的生物——若非有骸骨为证，我简直难以相信世间存在如此巨虫。
translated_text: その頭蓋骨は確かに凶暴であったが、その頭蓋骨はより大きな獣から取られたように見える。骨の証拠がなければ、この虫がこんなに大きくなったとは信じられません。
secondary_translated_text: Its skull was certainly ferocious, but its skull appears to have been taken from a larger beast. Without evidence of bones, it is hard to believe that this worm could have grown to this size.

translated_text: ファリッド
secondary_translated_text: Farid

translated_text: シルクの狙撃手
secondary_translated_text: Sniper of Silk

translated_text: 歯科用モデル。
secondary_translated_text: Dental model.

original_en_text: Two cogwork bugs, and yet the soul seemed singular? A sad, yet masterful imitation of life, imbued inside shells of iron.
original_zh_text: 两只自动机虫却共享单一灵魂？这是栖身于铁壳内的生命仿品，展现出精湛的制造技艺，却难掩其悲哀的命运。
translated_text: 2つのギアが、魂はユニークに見える？それは人生の悲しいが絶妙な模倣であり、鉄の殻に満ちていた。
secondary_translated_text: Do you have two gears, but the soul looks unique? It was a sad but exquisite imitation of life, full of an iron shell.

translated_text: プラスミド
secondary_translated_text: Plasmide

original_en_text: Heavy insect that lives near large bodies of water. Its weighty body is best avoided.
original_zh_text: 栖息大型水域附近的笨重昆虫，遇到最好绕道而行。
translated_text: 広い水域の近くに生息する重い昆虫。重い体は避けるべきです。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy insects that live near wide bodies of water. Heavy bodies should be avoided.

translated_text: キリックは
secondary_translated_text: kilik said:

original_en_text: Drifting bug disguised as a flower. Disperses crackling clouds of pollen if threatened.
original_zh_text: 伪装成花朵的漂浮生物，遇到威胁时会释放噼啪作响的花粉云自卫。
translated_text: 花に変装した浮遊ワーム。脅威にさらされると、花粉雲を分散させる。
secondary_translated_text: Floating worms disguised as flowers. When threatened, they disperse the pollen clouds.

original_en_text: Dense knot of husks bound tight by void soaked Silk.
original_zh_text: 由虚空浸染的灵丝捆缚的躯壳，密集成团。
translated_text: タイトな殻の結び目は、空に濡れた絹でしっかりと縛られていた。
secondary_translated_text: The knots of the tight shell were tightly bound with silk, wet in the sky.

translated_text: コグワーカー
secondary_translated_text: Cog worker

translated_text: ドレッグホイール
secondary_translated_text: Drag Wheels

original_en_text: A smart hunter learns to wait long in ambush, always ready to strike the first blow.
original_zh_text: 优秀的猎手都懂得：耐心蹲点，一击必杀。
translated_text: 賢いハンターは待ち伏せで長い時間待つことを学び、いつでも最初の攻撃を仕掛ける準備をします。
secondary_translated_text: A clever hunter learns to wait long hours in ambushes and is ready to mount his first attack at any time.

original_en_text: Grazing creature with sharp senses that nimbly retreats from danger.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的食草生物，遇到危险会灵活撤退。
translated_text: 感覚に敏感な草食動物は危険から柔軟に撤退することができる。
secondary_translated_text: Sensory-sensitive herbivores are able to withdraw flexibly from danger.

original_en_text: Tiny, timid creatures that huddle in flocks and flee at the first hint of danger.
original_zh_text: 胆小的小型群居生物，一旦察觉到危险便四散奔逃。
translated_text: 小さくて臆病な生き物は、危険にさらされると逃げるために群がった。
secondary_translated_text: The small, timid creatures swarmed to flee when they were in danger.

original_en_text: Lost in the madness of the Haunting, they still commanded the endless excavation of their caves.
original_zh_text: 即便深陷丝咒癫狂，仍持续号令无休止的矿洞挖掘。
translated_text: 彼らは幽霊の狂気に迷子になり、まだ洞窟の果てしない発掘を指揮している。
secondary_translated_text: They are lost in the ghostly madness and still direct the endless excavation of the cave.

translated_text: 陪審員クロウ
secondary_translated_text: The Jury Crow

original_en_text: They rarely relax, always alert for potential danger, even deep in their own territory. To defeat them my focus must match their own.
original_zh_text: 就算在其领地深处，他们仍保持高度警戒。要想击败他们，我的专注力必须达到与其相当的水平。
translated_text: 彼らはめったにリラックスせず、縄張りの奥深くでさえ潜在的な危険を常に警戒しています。彼らを倒すためには、私の注意と彼ら自身の注意を一致させなければならない。
secondary_translated_text: Even they are rarely relaxed, and are always alert to potential dangers deep within their territory. In order to defeat them, I must match my attention with their own. "

original_en_text: Steam shooting automaton, forged to clean the Cogwork Core and keep it free of infestation.
original_zh_text: 喷射蒸汽清洁机枢核心的自动机。
translated_text: Cogworkコアを洗浄し、侵入から保護するために鍛造された蒸気噴射オートマトン。
secondary_translated_text: Forged steam jet automata to clean and protect the Cogwork core from intrusion.

translated_text: ベル·ビースト
secondary_translated_text: Bell Beast

original_en_text: Sticky young fly, born and grown in service to the Slab.
original_zh_text: 自幼服务于罪石牢狱的黏腻幼蝇。
translated_text: 粘着性の若いハエはスレートに仕えるために生まれ育った。
secondary_translated_text: The sticky young flies were born and bred to serve slate.

translated_text: ペンデラ
secondary_translated_text: Pendella

translated_text: 木製の蜂
secondary_translated_text: Wooden Bees

translated_text: 密告のお知らせ
secondary_translated_text: Notice of whistleblower

original_en_text: This mindless bug seems to sense only through its tendrils, yet despite that simplicity it still poses a serious threat.
original_zh_text: 虽只能凭借触须感知外界，这种虫子仍可以构成极大的威胁。
translated_text: この脳のない昆虫は巻きひげでしか知覚できないように見えますが、その単純さにもかかわらず深刻な脅威です。
secondary_translated_text: Despite its simplicity, this brainless insect appears to be only perceptible by its curly beard, but it is a serious threat.

translated_text: アクニド
secondary_translated_text: Acunid

translated_text: スケルトン·サベージ
secondary_translated_text: Skeleton Savage

original_en_text: Basic bug of Pharloom, laid low upon the ground.
translated_text: ファルの基本的な昆虫は地上に生息する。
secondary_translated_text: The basic insects of the fallout live on the ground.

original_en_text: I am fond of simple, effective traps such as this bug’s extendable spikes. An unwary predator would be skewered clean through.
original_zh_text: 我很欣赏它这一招，简单有效。莽撞的捕食者肯定会被它的背刺一击穿透。
translated_text: 私はこの間違った拡張可能なスパイクのようなシンプルで効果的なトラップが好きです。意図しない捕食者が刺される。
secondary_translated_text: I like simple and effective traps like this wrong expandable spike. Unintentional predators are stung.

original_en_text: Short pilgrim that uses their long horn to launch upon threats.
original_zh_text: 用长角将自己弹射向敌人的矮小朝圣者。
translated_text: 背の低い巡礼者は長い角で脅した。
secondary_translated_text: The short pilgrim threatened with a long horn.

original_en_text: Thick-set bug consumed by haunted thread. Uses their solid frame to crush others.
original_zh_text: 被诅咒之丝缠裹的壮硕老者，用沉重甲壳碾压敌人。
translated_text: ホーンテッドスレッドで消費される厚いセットエラー。あなたの強い体で他人を押しつぶす。
secondary_translated_text: Thick set errors consumed by horned threads. Crush others with your strong body.

original_en_text: Fur covered crawler with a series of sharp spikes along its back.
translated_text: この毛皮で覆われた爬虫類は、背中に鋭い棘があります。
secondary_translated_text: This fur-covered reptile has sharp spines on its back.

original_en_text: Burrowing worm that uses its many blunted teeth to dig through even the hardest bone.
original_zh_text: 拥有密集钝齿的穴居虫类，极其坚硬的骨质层也能被它们钻透。
translated_text: 穴虫は多くの鈍い歯を持ち、最も硬い骨でさえ貫通することができる。
secondary_translated_text: The hoodworm has many blunt teeth, which can penetrate even the hardest bones.

original_en_text: With this one vanquished, I hope to have sped the end for that jail and its distasteful order.
original_zh_text: 击败她或将加速那座监狱与其恶心秩序的终结。
translated_text: この敗北によって、私は刑務所とその忌まわしい秩序の終焉を早めることを望んでいます。
secondary_translated_text: With this defeat, I hope to hasten the end of the prison and its abominable order.

original_en_text: Gelatinous coral drifter of simple mind and placid demeanour.
original_zh_text: 思维简单的凝胶状珊瑚生物，性情温和。
translated_text: ガムサンゴはシンプルで穏やかな表情です。
secondary_translated_text: Gum Coral has a simple and calm expression.

original_en_text: Totem and god, built and worshipped by the Burning Bugs.
original_zh_text: 焚身信徒建造并敬奉的图腾神像。
translated_text: トーテムと神々、燃える虫によって構築され崇拝される。
secondary_translated_text: It is built and worshipped by totems and gods, and by burning worms.

translated_text: ドリズニト
secondary_translated_text: Driznitte

original_en_text: Skittish scrambler of the Far Fields. Its antennae resemble stalks of grass to aid in camouflage.
original_zh_text: 远野地区极易受惊的爬虫，触须能够伪装成草茎。
translated_text: 遠くには狡猾な破壊者がいた。触手は草の茎に似ており、カモフラージュを助ける。
secondary_translated_text: In the distance there was a sly destroyer. The tentacles resemble the stalks of grass, helping camouflage.

original_en_text: Infant fly, freshly hatched. At this age the soft, blind fly is little more than a bother.
original_zh_text: 刚破卵的盲眼软体幼蝇，不过是些烦扰的小东西。
translated_text: 孵化したばかりの若いハエ。この年齢では、柔らかく盲目のハエは単に迷惑です。
secondary_translated_text: A young fly just hatched. At this age, soft and blind flies are simply annoying.

translated_text: トンボ
secondary_translated_text: Tombo

original_en_text: Tall creature with sharp senses. Defends its herd with powerful legs and a sharp-tipped mask.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的生物，以尖角面甲与强健后肢守护族群。
translated_text: 背の高いセクシーな生き物。強い足と鋭いマスクで牛を保護します。
secondary_translated_text: A tall, sexy creature. Protect the cattle with strong legs and a sharp mask.

translated_text: 悪のカラニック。
secondary_translated_text: The Evil Kalanic.

original_en_text: Cruel physician of Whiteward, responsible for operations and modifications on the Citadel’s bugs.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅的残酷医者，负责对圣堡甲虫实施手术与改造。
translated_text: ホワイトワード残酷な医者が城ワームの操作と改造を担当した。
secondary_translated_text: Whiteward, a cruel doctor, was responsible for the operation and modification of the castle worm.

original_en_text: The huge Judge likely stood through countless generations, never defeated, never wavering in their charge.
original_zh_text: 这庞然裁决者已矗立无数世代，未尝败绩，坚守职责从未动摇。
translated_text: この偉大な裁判官は、おそらく無数の世代を経て、決して敗北せず、その職務を揺るがすことはなかった。
secondary_translated_text: This great judge, perhaps through innumerable generations, was never defeated, and never wavered in his office.

original_en_text: These bugs look to have spent every waking moment at their work. Grim, endless labour in service of the unseen Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 这些虫子似乎将全部生命投入劳作。为自己从未见过的圣堡执行着阴郁无边的苦役。
translated_text: 昆虫は常に目覚めているように見えます。上の見えない城に奉仕する残酷で果てしない労働。
secondary_translated_text: The insects seem to be constantly awake. Cruel and endless labour to serve the invisible castle above.

translated_text: ティミレット
secondary_translated_text: Timillet

translated_text: エスパー
secondary_translated_text: Esper

translated_text: パーシア
secondary_translated_text: Persian

original_en_text: Despite the Haunting of its shell, it has not been overcome with aggression. Its desire to flee remains too strong.
original_zh_text: 即使甲壳被丝咒侵蚀，其强烈的逃生本能依然压制住了被赋予的攻击性。
translated_text: その印象的な殻にもかかわらず、侵略に征服されなかった。逃げる意欲が強すぎた。
secondary_translated_text: Despite its impressive shell, it was not conquered by the invasion. The desire to run was too strong.

original_en_text: Coral hulk with a dense shell, bred to immense size by the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 被圣堡忆廊催生至庞然体型的珊瑚厚甲虫。
translated_text: 貝殻で覆われたサンゴの残骸は、城記念館で巨大なサンゴに育てられました。
secondary_translated_text: The remains of the shell-covered coral were raised into huge corals at the Castle Memorial.

translated_text: カラニド
secondary_translated_text: Calanide

translated_text: 頭蓋骨トラッカー
secondary_translated_text: Skull Tracker

translated_text: 巡礼者の鐘
secondary_translated_text: The Pilgrim's Bell

original_en_text: Sturdy bug lost to the Haunting. Rolls at threats with no care for its own discomfort.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的健壮虫子。滚动碾压构成威胁的一切，无视自身痛楚。
translated_text: 強力な間違いは幽霊の間違いに負けた。脅威に直面したとき、不快感を心配しないでください。
secondary_translated_text: The strong mistakes lost to the ghostly mistakes. When faced with a threat, don't worry about discomfort.

original_en_text: Tiny empty creature, barely a bug. Swallows its prey whole and sucks their nutrients until nothing remains.
original_zh_text: 微型的虚无生物，几乎算不上是虫子。吞噬猎物至渣滓都不剩。
translated_text: この小さな空洞の生き物はかろうじて虫ではない。獲物を丸ごと飲み込み、何も残らなくなるまで栄養を吸収する。
secondary_translated_text: This tiny hollow creature is hardly a worm. They swallow their prey whole and absorb nutrients until nothing is left.

translated_text: 低学年労働者
secondary_translated_text: Low-education workers

original_en_text: Quite a beautiful creature. In my own kingdom’s court, it would have been highly favoured as an ornamental pet.
original_zh_text: 如此美丽的生物。若在我故国的宫廷，定会成为贵族追捧的装饰性宠物。
translated_text: かなり美しい生き物です。私の王国の宮廷では、観賞用ペットとして非常に人気があるでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: It is a pretty beautiful creature. In the courts of my kingdom, they will be very popular as ornamental pets.

original_en_text: There is surprising strength hidden in their thin, elegant limbs. It would be a pleasure to ride upon it...
original_zh_text: 优雅纤细的后肢中蕴含强大的力量，若能驯服必是绝佳坐骑。
translated_text: 細身でエレガントな手足は驚異的な力を秘めている。乗ってよかった。
secondary_translated_text: His slender, elegant limbs and legs hold incredible power. I was glad to ride.

original_en_text: Whatever admiration I had for its fleecy down is spoilt by its disturbing mask... and its steely spines.
original_zh_text: 蓬松绒毛的吸引力被其阴森气质与钢刺彻底破坏。
translated_text: その羽のような羽に対する私の賞賛は、その不穏なマスクとその鋼鉄の背骨によって破壊された。
secondary_translated_text: My admiration for its feather-like feathers was destroyed by its disturbing mask and its steel spine.

translated_text: 燃える虫たち
secondary_translated_text: The Burning Bugs

original_en_text: Cymbal bearing worker of the Deep Docks. Pans the hauls of smokerock to find traces of more precious minerals.
original_zh_text: 深坞持钹工人，筛选烟岩中的珍贵矿物残渣。
translated_text: ディープドックのシンバル職人。スモーキーロックの収穫物を振って、より貴重なミネラルの痕跡を探します。
secondary_translated_text: The Deep Dock's Symbal Craftsman. Shake the smoky rock harvest to look for traces of more valuable minerals.

original_en_text: Sticky mollusc that defends itself by spraying burning fluid from growths on its back.
original_zh_text: 通过背部凸起喷射燃烧体液的防御型软体生物。
translated_text: 粘性のある軟体動物は背中から燃える液体を噴射することで身を守る。
secondary_translated_text: Viscous molluscs defend themselves by jetting burning liquid from their backs.

original_en_text: This one is pretty, but not as soft as first it seems. The plant it mimics is flaked and coarse, and the bug’s coat shares similar texture.
original_zh_text: 看似柔美实则粗粝，与其拟态植物的质感完全一致。
translated_text: きれいですが、最初に見えるほど柔らかくはありません。植物は粗く、昆虫の毛皮は似たような質感を持つ。
secondary_translated_text: It's beautiful, but not as soft as it looks at first. Plants are coarse, and insect fur has a similar texture.

original_en_text: Low level worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Instinct keeps them at their task, though in much simpler fashion than before.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的低级劳工，仍凭本能重复着旧日工作。
translated_text: 労働者はファローの迷惑で死亡した。本能によって、以前よりもはるかに簡単な方法ではあるが、タスクを完了させる。
secondary_translated_text: The worker died of the nuisance of Faroe. By instinct, they complete the task, albeit in a much easier way than before.

original_en_text: Something in their assault reminds me of my own skill, though their talents are born purely of instinct. My technique is formed from hard training.
original_zh_text: 攻击套路和我有几分相像。不过他们靠的是祖传本能，我则是勤学苦练。
translated_text: 彼らの攻撃は私自身のスキルを思い出させたが、彼らの才能は純粋に本能的だった。私のスキルは厳しい訓練で開発された。
secondary_translated_text: Their attack reminded me of my own skills, but their talent was purely instinctive. My skills have been developed through rigorous training.

original_en_text: Certain tools and skills can pierce its defences. I should adjust my strategy as needed.
original_zh_text: 正面硬撼绝非明智之举——只有特定的工具和技艺能撕开它的防御。
translated_text: 特定のツールやスキルは防御を突破することができる。必要に応じて戦略を調整する必要がある。
secondary_translated_text: Certain tools and skills can be used to break through defenses. The strategy needs to be adjusted as necessary.

translated_text: シルクの祖母。
secondary_translated_text: Silk grandmother.

translated_text: シェフのルゴリー
secondary_translated_text: Chef's Ruggory

original_en_text: Bug charged to catch dregs of Silk that fall from the Citadel. Will attack with its staff if provoked.
original_zh_text: 专职收集圣堡掉落灵丝碎屑的劳工，受干扰时会挥杖攻击。
translated_text: バガーは城から落ちてくる絹の残滓を捕らえる役目を担っていた。怒ったら棒で攻撃する。
secondary_translated_text: The bagger was tasked with catching the silk remnants falling from the castle. When angry, they attack with a stick.

original_en_text: Similar bugs would gnaw away at unguarded food supplies in my homeland. As a child, I would hunt them, eager to make use of myself and test my skills.
original_zh_text: 我的故土也有类似的飞虫，它们会啃食未加看守的食物补给。年少时我经常猎杀它们，既为守护食物也为试炼技艺。
translated_text: これらの昆虫は無防備な食料供給を侵食する。子供の頃、私は彼らを追いかけ、自分自身を生かし、自分のスキルを試したいと思いました。
secondary_translated_text: These insects can erode the defenseless food supply. When I was a kid, I wanted to chase them, to live for myself, to test my skills.

original_en_text: Automaton built in the shape of a scuttling bug. Its back contains retractable pins, intended to cut song cylinders free of any obstruction.
original_zh_text: 仿造爬虫外形的自动机，背部探针可切除阻塞音筒的障碍物。
translated_text: このロボットは滑空昆虫の形をしています。背面には伸縮可能なピンが搭載されており、曲管を障害物なく切断するように設計されている。
secondary_translated_text: This robot is shaped like a gliding insect. The back is fitted with a retractable pin, which is designed to cut the curved tube without obstruction.

translated_text: ガンツ·オープン
secondary_translated_text: The Gantz Open

original_en_text: Uses their steel-bristled pin to scrub the soot from vents and pipes.
original_zh_text: 以钢鬃尖刺清理管道煤灰的劳工。
translated_text: スチールヘアピンを使用して通気口やパイプのほこりを拭きます。
secondary_translated_text: Use a steel hairpin to wipe the dust in the vents and pipes.

original_en_text: Huge, yet stealthy Skarr. An expert trapper and master of the undergrowth.
original_zh_text: 精通丛林陷阱的斯卡尔猎手，身形庞大却又善于潜行。
translated_text: 巨大だが隠れた骨格。トラップのエキスパート、ジャングルのマスター。
secondary_translated_text: A huge but hidden skeleton. Trap experts, masters of the jungle.

original_en_text: Lashing fragments of pure darkness, shaped into sharpened tentacles.
original_zh_text: 由纯粹黑暗凝聚而成的尖锐触手。
translated_text: 純粋な闇の破片を鞭で鋭く触手を形成する。
secondary_translated_text: Whip sharp pieces of pure darkness to form tentacles.

translated_text: ファームは
secondary_translated_text: The farm

translated_text: ギア·ダンサー
secondary_translated_text: Gear Dancer

original_en_text: Soft bug beneath a huge, horned skull. Charges at intruders to protect its territory and its smaller companions.
original_zh_text: 顶着怪兽头骨的软体虫，为保护地盘和自身柔软的内部，常对入侵者进行无差别冲锋。
translated_text: 頭骨の下には巨大な長角の軟虫がいる。侵略者は領土と小さな仲間を守るために告発された。
secondary_translated_text: Below the skull is a large, long-horned softworm. The invaders were accused of defending their territory and their small companions.

original_en_text: Common winged bug of the lowlands. Generally docile, but will attack if threats come close.
original_zh_text: 低地区域常见的温顺飞虫，不过被惹急了也会攻击来犯者。
translated_text: 低地によく見られる有翼の昆虫。普段はおとなしいが、脅威が近づくと攻撃を仕掛ける。
secondary_translated_text: A winged insect commonly found in lowland areas. They are usually calm, but when a threat approaches, they attack.

original_en_text: Foul creatures birthed into servitude. Their plight elicits no sympathy from me.
original_zh_text: 这些可悲的生物从蛹中钻出的瞬间，就被烙上了终生奴役的印记——但它们啃噬死囚腐肉时发出的欢快嗡鸣，实在让人难以怜悯。
translated_text: 汚れた生き物は奴隷として生まれた。彼らの窮状は私の同情を引き起こさない。
secondary_translated_text: The filthy creature was born a slave. Their plight does not arouse my sympathy.

original_en_text: The Haunting has stolen some important part of these bugs, yet still they attempt their former task. Until, that is, they sense my presence...
original_zh_text: 它们机械地重复着筛矿动作，直到感应到活物气息——那一刻，铜钹便化作呼啸的断头刃。
translated_text: Hauntedはこれらの間違いの重要な部分を盗んだが、それでも以前のミッションを試みた。つまり、私の存在を感じるまで···。
secondary_translated_text: Haunted stole a significant portion of these mistakes, but still tried earlier missions. Until you feel my presence...

translated_text: 散乱する
secondary_translated_text: scattered.

translated_text: ユマさん
secondary_translated_text: Yuma.

original_en_text: Mutated young worm infected with Plasmium. The new form displays potent regenerative skill.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的蠕虫幼体。其新形态展现出强大的再生能力。
translated_text: マラリア原虫に感染した突然変異幼虫。新はな再生スキルを示す。
secondary_translated_text: A mutant larva infected with the malaria parasite. It shows new regenerative skills.

translated_text: Mother moseシングル
secondary_translated_text: Mother Jericho

original_en_text: Its core is filled with fine mechanisms, but that alone should not produce such a convincing mimic of life. Silk must also be used to animate this artifice, though exactly how I am not sure.
original_zh_text: 当灵丝顺着齿轮缝隙游走时，这台机器竟发出类似心跳的震颤——圣堡匠人究竟将多少生命奥秘编织进了这些钢铁躯壳？
translated_text: そのコアには複雑なメカニズムが詰まっていますが、それだけでは生命のこれほど説得力のあるシミュレータは生まれません。シルクを使ってテクノロジーを活性化させる必要がありますが、使い方はわかりません。
secondary_translated_text: Its core is packed with intricate mechanisms, but that alone doesn't make for such a compelling simulator of life. We need to use silk to activate technology, but we don't know how to use it.

original_en_text: Its shell gives it the advantage of surprise, but also forces it into a slender, brittle shape that cannot withstand a heavy attack.
original_zh_text: 拟态外壳带来突袭优势，但纤细脆弱的体型难以承受重击。
translated_text: そのシェルは予想外の利点を与えますが、同時に、激しい攻撃に耐えられない細長い壊れやすい形状にしています。
secondary_translated_text: Its shell gives it unexpected advantages, but at the same time, it gives it an elongated, fragile shape that cannot withstand intense attacks.

original_en_text: Predatory plant with a powerful jaw shaped to resemble a lily pad.
original_zh_text: 伪装成睡莲的捕食性植物，拥有强有力的颚部。
translated_text: 捕食性植物で、顎は硬く、睡蓮のような形をしている。
secondary_translated_text: A predatory plant with a hard, lily-shaped jaw.

translated_text: 煙幕
secondary_translated_text: Smoke curtain

translated_text: コイルメイガ
secondary_translated_text: Coilmeiga

original_en_text: Airborne pest, less common than its grounded siblings. Attacks with sharp fangs if agitated.
original_zh_text: 其陆行同类的飞行变种，较为稀少。受到刺激时会使用利齿攻击。
translated_text: 空気中の害虫は、地上の類似の害虫よりも一般的ではない。興奮すると鋭い歯で攻撃します。
secondary_translated_text: Pests in the air are less common than similar pests on the ground. When excited, they attack with their sharp teeth.

original_en_text: The souls of so many bugs, obsessed with Silk, consumed by it. Their pain shall forever remain in that pit. Even I do not possess strength enough to cleanse it.
original_zh_text: 无数沉溺灵丝终被吞噬的灵魂，其苦痛将永远禁锢在这坑里。纵使是我也无力净化。
translated_text: 多くの昆虫の魂は絹に取り憑かれ、それに飲み込まれ、その苦しみは永遠にその穴に残るでしょう。私にも浄化する力はありません。
secondary_translated_text: The soul of many insects will be possessed by the silk, swallowed up by it, and its suffering will remain in its hole forever. I don't have the power to purify either.

original_en_text: Silk-spun child possessed by the void.
original_zh_text: 被虚空侵蚀的灵丝造物。
translated_text: 空虚に憑かれた回転子。
secondary_translated_text: A rotor possessed by a vacuum.

original_en_text: Shell-plated worm found only in the deepest depths. Seems to survive despite consuming no food or liquid.
original_zh_text: 仅存于最深处的甲壳蠕虫，无需进食或饮水仍能存活。
translated_text: 殻を持つワームは最深部でしか見られない。食べ物も液体も食べなかったが、生き延びたように見えた。
secondary_translated_text: Worms with shells can only be seen in the deepest parts. He did not eat food or fluid, but he appeared to have survived.

translated_text: チョリスタ
secondary_translated_text: Cholista

translated_text: スクロール·リーダー
secondary_translated_text: Scroll reader

original_en_text: Trap setting bug carrying a pouch of sharpened long-stakes.
original_zh_text: 携带尖锐长木桩布置陷阱的虫子。
translated_text: 罠を仕掛けた虫は鋭い長い杭の袋を背負っていた。
secondary_translated_text: The worm that had set the trap was carrying a long, sharp pile bag.

translated_text: ドランローデ
secondary_translated_text: Doran Rode

original_en_text: Aged female mite, grown larger and stronger than most of its kin.
original_zh_text: 年迈的雌性螨虫，体型力量都远超同类。
translated_text: 年上のメスは他の種よりも大きくて強い。
secondary_translated_text: Older females are bigger and stronger than other species.

original_en_text: Mass of old masks swollen and animated by writhing void.
original_zh_text: 由纠缠的虚空驱动而膨胀、复活的一团古老面甲。
translated_text: 大量の古いマスクが隙間が蠕動して腫れて活発になる。
secondary_translated_text: A large amount of old masks are activated by the crevices that creep and swell.

original_en_text: Pernicious looter found all over Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在纺络全境四处劫掠的卑劣盗虫。
translated_text: ファロは悪質な強盗でいっぱいです。
secondary_translated_text: Faro is full of vicious robberies.

original_en_text: Small bug, shackled and cowled for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 戴着镣铐，被蒙住头部的圣堡罪徒。
translated_text: バグは城で犯した罪のために足かせとターバンをつけられた。
secondary_translated_text: Bug was shackled and turbaned for the crimes he committed in the castle.

original_en_text: Flighty insect that lives beside still waters.
original_zh_text: 栖息静水边的敏感飞虫。
translated_text: 静かな水のそばに住む軽薄な昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: A lightweight insect that lives by the quiet water.

original_en_text: Its form is certainly based on bugs found outside the Citadel. In my own craftwork, I too often look to nature for inspiration.
original_zh_text: 那对仿生复眼能精准识别音筒纹路，探针起舞时溅起的火花，竟在钢壁上刻出类似灵丝符文的痕迹。
translated_text: その形はもちろん、城の外で見つかったエラーに基づいています。私自身の作品では、しばしば自然からインスピレーションを得ます。
secondary_translated_text: Its shape is of course based on errors found outside the castle. In my own work, I often draw inspiration from nature.

translated_text: クラメト
secondary_translated_text: Kramet

original_en_text: Birth equipped this one well. In its assault it becomes its own projectile.
original_zh_text: 它们生来就是活体投掷物——将整个身躯化作飞矛，用长角贯穿目标。
translated_text: 出産はこの人を武装させる。攻撃では、それ自身の投影物になります。
secondary_translated_text: The birth arms this person. In an attack, it becomes a projection of itself.

original_en_text: Their heavier bells armour them well against my strikes, but against that oppressive heat... can they help at all?
original_zh_text: 它们厚重的钟甲可以抵挡我的针刃，但在酷热环境中恐怕难有作为。
translated_text: 彼らの重い鐘は私の打撃から彼らをよく守ってくれますが、蒸し暑い天候からも守ってくれます。助けてくれるの？
secondary_translated_text: Their heavy bells will protect them well from my blows, but they will also protect them from the steamy hot weather. will you help me?

original_en_text: A rare built bug within these ailing lands. Most pilgrims’ shells seem small by comparison. What nourishment did they discover to grow so large?
original_zh_text: 在纺络这片病恹恹的土地上，这般体型的虫子实属罕见。与它们相比，其他朝圣者的外壳简直孱弱如卵。它们究竟吞食了什么，才能膨胀至此等体型？
translated_text: これらの病気の土地では珍しい昆虫です。対照的に、ほとんどの巡礼者の貝殻は小さいように見えます。どんな栄養素がこんなに大きいのか？
secondary_translated_text: These are unusual insects in the land of disease. In contrast, the shells of most pilgrims seem small. What nutrients are so large?

original_en_text: With a softer shell than most, they would have relied on their athleticism to survive.
original_zh_text: 甲壳柔软脆弱，全靠昔日矫健的身手生存。
translated_text: 彼らの殻はほとんどの人よりも柔らかいので、彼らは運動能力だけで生き残る。
secondary_translated_text: Their shells are softer than most humans, so they survive on their athletic ability alone.

translated_text: ゴキブリ捕手
secondary_translated_text: Cockroach catcher

original_en_text: Common crawler that lives beneath sand.
translated_text: 砂の下に生息する爬虫類。
secondary_translated_text: A reptile that lives under the sand.

translated_text: フィンチカブトムシ
secondary_translated_text: Finch beetle

translated_text: シェルフィン
secondary_translated_text: Schelfin

translated_text: 動物のハエ
secondary_translated_text: Animal flies

original_en_text: Silk and shells corrupted. That void seeks now to claim this land whole. These poor shells are only the beginning.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与甲壳皆遭腐蚀，虚空正逐步蚕食这地界，这些可怜的甲壳不过是开端。
translated_text: 絹や貝殻は腐食した。今はこの土地を占領しようとしている。これらの貧しいシェルは始まりに過ぎない。
secondary_translated_text: The silk and shell were corrosive. Now they are trying to take over this land. These poor shells are only the beginning.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger that roosts high in caverns and preys on passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 盘踞洞顶的食腐飞虫，惯用群体战术袭击朝圣者。
translated_text: 悲鳴を上げるスカベンジャーは洞窟に生息し、通りかかった巡礼者を捕食する。
secondary_translated_text: Screaming scavengers inhabit the caves and prey on passing pilgrims.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, capable of remaining perfectly still for long periods, but unexpectedly swift when roused.
original_zh_text: 能长期静止拟态成树枝，受惊时发动闪电突袭。
translated_text: 木の枝を模倣する昆虫は、長い間完全に静止しているが、驚くほど早く目覚めることができる。
secondary_translated_text: Insects mimicking tree branches are completely stationary for a long time, but they can wake up surprisingly quickly.

original_en_text: This larger form carries so much weight it can barely move from its place.
original_zh_text: 庞大身躯使其几乎无法离开原位。
translated_text: この大きな形は非常に重いので、その位置から離れることはほとんどできません。
secondary_translated_text: This large shape is so heavy that it can hardly be removed from its position.

translated_text: Skrill
secondary_translated_text: Skrill

original_en_text: Small construct built by Weavers past, brought to life through Silk runes threaded within.
original_zh_text: 远古织者铸造的小型装置，通过灵丝符文赋予生命。
translated_text: ウィーバーの過去の小さな構造物は、内部に身に着けているシルクのルーンによって生き生きとしている。
secondary_translated_text: The small structures of Weaver's past are brought to life by the silk loons they wear inside.

original_en_text: The less these gruesome bugs breed, the better.
original_zh_text: 这种烦扰的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
translated_text: これらの恐ろしい虫の繁殖は少ないほど良い。
secondary_translated_text: The fewer these dreadful insects breed the better.

original_en_text: Gilded servant of the Whispering Vaults, born to read and recall the near endless scrolls of prayer.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的金袍仆从，专司诵读那些浩繁无尽的经文。
translated_text: 金庫室でささやく金色の召使いたちは、無限の祈りの巻物を読み、思い出すために生まれました。
secondary_translated_text: The golden servants whispering in the vault were born to read and remember the scrolls of infinite prayers.

translated_text: スクエアバード
secondary_translated_text: Squarebird

original_en_text: I cannot decipher its function to the greater Core. Is it built for defence? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.
original_zh_text: 这些悬浮铁球会在入侵者靠近时突然爆开尖刺，但过于迟缓的反应速度，让它们更像布满锈迹的装饰品。
translated_text: より大きなコアへの影響は解読できませんでした防衛のために作られたのか。もしそうなら、その受動性は最適からはほど遠いようです。
secondary_translated_text: Couldn't decipher the impact on the larger core was it made for defense? If so, that passivity seems far from optimal.

original_en_text: If not for the spikes, I would think it an appealing bug.
original_zh_text: 若没有尖刺，我会觉得它笨拙可爱。
translated_text: Pinpointでなければ、魅力的な間違いだと思います。
secondary_translated_text: If not for Pinpoint, I think it's an attractive mistake.

original_en_text: Hovering pest with a hollowed proboscis able to spit gobs of sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 通过中空口器喷射胆汁的悬浮虫。
translated_text: 中空の幹に群がる害虫は胆汁を吐き出すことができます。
secondary_translated_text: The pests that swarm on the hollow trunk can spit out bile.

original_en_text: This surface dweller is free of Silk. Its nature remains its own. The monarch’s influence must only have stretched below it.
original_zh_text: 这地表生物未被丝咒侵蚀，看来圣堡君主的控制尚未延伸至此。
translated_text: このような地表住民には絹はない。その本質はまだそれ自身のものです。君主の影響力はその下にしかない。
secondary_translated_text: Such surface inhabitants have no silk. Its essence is still of its own. The monarch's influence is only below it.

original_en_text: Did they ever truly understand those inscrutable scrolls? Or is it all merely pretence, an endless act to maintain their order’s station within the Citadel?
original_zh_text: 他们是否真的理解那些晦涩的经文？还是说，这一切不过是伪装，一场无休止的表演，只为维持他们在城堡中的地位？
translated_text: 彼らは本当にこの謎を知っているか？それとも、城の秩序と地位を維持するために無限のショーを装っているのか。
secondary_translated_text: do they really know this mystery? Or is it pretending to be an endless show to maintain the order and status of the castle?

translated_text: コーラルハウスTheコーラルハウス
secondary_translated_text: Coral House The Coral House

original_en_text: Its assault... like a young bug’s toy turned deadly. Could I, in time, fashion a spinning tool to match?
original_zh_text: 其攻击如同将孩童的玩具变成致命武器，或许我能制作类似原理的纺织工具？
translated_text: 攻撃している。それは致命的になるおもちゃの小さな虫のようです。回転工具は時間内に作れますか？
secondary_translated_text: They are attacking. It's like a little toy bug that becomes deadly. Can the rotary tool be made in time?

original_en_text: Though grey with age, their frayed form suggested a being strung from Silk, one who welcomed a decisive end in combat over a slow decline.
original_zh_text: 苍老的躯壳布满灵丝束痕。比起缓慢凋零，它更渴求战死的终局。
translated_text: 年を取るにつれてボロボロになった外見は絹でできた男であり、ゆっくりと消えていく戦いの決定的な結末に直面している男である。
secondary_translated_text: His appearance, which has been torn apart as he grows older, is a man made of silk, facing the decisive end of a slowly fading battle.

translated_text: 巨大なノミ。
secondary_translated_text: A huge fleas.

original_en_text: Infant form of the more formidable Craggler.
original_zh_text: 酸蚀巨螯的幼年形态，通过同类相残争夺成长机会。
translated_text: より強力なクラグラーの赤ちゃん形態。
secondary_translated_text: A more powerful baby form of krugler.

original_en_text: Either its size has made it fearless or the Haunting has removed its sense of self-preservation.
original_zh_text: 要么是巨大的体型给了它勇气，要么是丝咒把它怕死的本性麻痹了。
translated_text: その大きさが恐れを知らせるか、執着が自己保存の感覚を排除するかのどちらかです。
secondary_translated_text: Either its size makes you fearful, or the attachment eliminates the sense of self-preservation.

original_en_text: Barely a bug, and possessing only basic thought, yet instinct alone proved enough to turn it deadly.
original_zh_text: 几乎算不上虫子，只有最基本的思维。然而，其攻击的本能已足够致命。
translated_text: これはほとんど間違いではなく、基本的なアイデアでしたが、本能だけで致命的になることがわかりました。
secondary_translated_text: This was hardly a mistake, a basic idea, but I found that instinct alone could be fatal.

translated_text: ギアスパイン
secondary_translated_text: Gear spine

original_en_text: Bursts forth at movement sensed close, and will consume any object or bug careless enough to fall into its maw.
original_zh_text: 当流沙开始诡谲涌动时，你只剩半次心跳的时间逃离那张深渊巨口。
translated_text: 近くの動きを感知すると爆発し、誤って物体や昆虫を食べて胃の中に落ちてしまう。
secondary_translated_text: When it senses nearby movement, it explodes, accidentally eating objects or insects and falling into its stomach.

original_en_text: Pointed scurrier posing as plant life.
original_zh_text: 伪装成植物的带刺疾行者。
translated_text: クモは植物を模倣する。
secondary_translated_text: Spiders mimic plants.

original_en_text: Verminous pest, common throughout the dark corners of Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 灰沼阴暗角落滋生的害虫。
translated_text: 害虫はグレイモアの暗い隅によく見られる。
secondary_translated_text: The pests are often found in dark corners of Graymore.

original_en_text: Its fur is thick and silky. Sadly, lost to its Haunting, I shall never safely be able to touch it.
original_zh_text: 厚实丝绒般的皮毛令人神往，可惜其受丝咒侵蚀，再难安全抚触。
translated_text: 毛皮は厚くて絹のようです。悲しいことに、私はそれに触れることができないので、決して安全です。
secondary_translated_text: The fur is thick and like silk. Sadly, I can't touch it, so it's never safe.

translated_text: ホーク·ホーカー
secondary_translated_text: Hawk Hooker

translated_text: 係留翼
secondary_translated_text: mooring wing

original_en_text: Her body seemed a Weaver’s, but her mask had been forcibly removed, and her own Silk was bound useless by heavy pins lodged through her spine.
original_zh_text: 她身形似织者，但面甲被强行剥离，脊背打入的重钉也使其灵丝失效。
translated_text: 彼女の体はウィーバーのように見えたが、マスクは強制的に外され、彼女自身の絹は背骨に挿入された重いピンで縛られていた。
secondary_translated_text: Her body looked like a weaver, but the mask was forcibly removed, and her own silk was tied up with a heavy pin inserted into the spine.

original_en_text: Fierce and fast, and defending their lands even from birth. These are children to be proud of.
original_zh_text: 凶猛迅捷，自出生起就守卫故土，是值得骄傲的后裔。
translated_text: 頑固で素早く、生まれた時から土地を守っている。彼らは誇り高い子供たちです
secondary_translated_text: He is stubborn and fast, and has defended his land since he was born. These are proud children.

original_en_text: Like fabric somehow sprung to life. Its pelt is perfectly matched to the rags it infests.
original_zh_text: 外色颜色与寄居的布料完美融合，就像被赋予生命的织物。
translated_text: それは何らかの形で再生するようです。その毛皮は感染した布と完璧に一致します。
secondary_translated_text: It seems to be reproducing in some way. Its fur matches perfectly with the infected cloth.

original_en_text: Its wings are quite small compared to its bulk. Perhaps it uses the warm air of these fiery lands to help stay airborne. Clever, if so.
original_zh_text: 翅膀小身体胖，估计是利用这片炽热地带的热气流飞起来的——还挺聪明。
translated_text: その大きさに比べると翼はかなり小さい。熱い土地の暖かい空気を使って空気中に留まるのかもしれませんもしそうなら賢い。
secondary_translated_text: Compared to its size, the wings are rather small. Maybe it's clever to use the warm air of the hot land to stay in the air, if so.

original_en_text: Gold ranked disciple of the Choir and direct servant to the Citadel’s Conductors.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的高阶信徒，圣堡指挥家的直系仆从。
translated_text: 聖歌隊の黄金の弟子、城の指揮官の直接の召使い。
secondary_translated_text: A golden disciple of the choir, a direct servant of the castle commander.

original_en_text: The large bell seems to signify them as once leader of a climbing troupe, though the Haunting has erased that former authority.
original_zh_text: 那柄铭刻朝圣路线的钟杖曾是领袖象征，如今却成了敲碎追随者颅骨的凶器。
translated_text: 巨大な鐘は、彼らがかつてロッククライミンググループのリーダーであったことを示しているように見えるが、その強迫観念は以前の権威を消し去っている。
secondary_translated_text: The enormous bells seem to indicate that they were once leaders of a rock climbing group, but their obsession has erased their previous authority.

original_en_text: Avoiding their ambush is a good test of my senses, and my ability to rapidly retaliate.
original_zh_text: 规避其伏击是对感知力的考验，快速反击能力同样关键。
translated_text: 彼らの待ち伏せを避けることは、私の感覚と素早い反撃能力の良いテストでした。
secondary_translated_text: Avoiding their ambush was a good test of my senses and my ability to fight back quickly.

original_en_text: To quell the mother’s rage, and see this kingdom saved, I will claim her back. This one... the dark shall not take.
original_zh_text: 为了平息苍白之母的暴怒、拯救这个王国，我必夺回这个孩子的本心——绝不容许虚空将她吞噬。
translated_text: 母の怒りを鎮め、王国を救うために、私は母を取り戻す。これは..。闇は去らない。
secondary_translated_text: To quell my mother's anger and save the kingdom, I will bring her back. This is a... The darkness does not leave.

translated_text: フリゲートフライ
secondary_translated_text: Frigate fly

translated_text: 失われたレース
secondary_translated_text: The Lost Race

original_en_text: Cogwork knight of Pharloom, once protector of its pilgrims, and master of the scissor blade.
original_zh_text: 曾护卫朝圣者的机械骑士，如今双刃剪成为致命凶器。
translated_text: ファルの武装騎士は巡礼者と剣の達人の守護者だった。
secondary_translated_text: The armed knights of the Fal were the guardians of pilgrims and swordsmen.

original_en_text: <page>No. Not their enemy, and their prisoner not through malice. I am Eva, a thing... difficult to describe, a child of Weavers, yet not quite their kin...<hpage>How strange. That description could fit me as well as yourself. <page>Child of Weavers?... And not? I can detect your Weaver strain, yet you are different from them, and from me, a shifting, blended thing? What are you creature?<page>Step closer, lady, that my senses would better understand your nature.
original_zh_text: <page>不是，也并非因为罪行囚禁。我叫伊娃，是……有点复杂，是织者后裔但又不完全是……<hpage>真奇妙。这番描述同样适用于我。<page>你也是织者后裔？……但又不是？我能感知你的织者血统，但你既不同于他们，也不同于我，一个流动的混合体？你究竟是什么？<page>请靠近些，女士，方便我感知你的本质。
translated_text: <page>彼らの敵ではなく、囚人でもない。まずはエヴァです。説明するのは難しい、ウィーバーの子供たちだが、正確には彼らの親戚ではない。<hpage>変だな。この説明はあなたにぴったりです。<page>ウィーバーの子供たち？代わりに？私はあなたのベガの変種を検出できますが、あなたは彼らとは異なり、私とは異なり、絶えず変化し、混合するものですか？あなたはどんな生き物なの？<page>もう少し近づいて、私の感覚はあなたの本質をよりよく理解するでしょう。
secondary_translated_text: <page>They are not their enemies, nor their prisoners. First is Eva. It's hard to explain, Weaver's children, but not exactly their relatives.<hpage>that's weird. This explanation is perfect for you.<page>the weaver's kids? instead of? I can detect your Vega variants, but are you unlike them, unlike me, constantly changing and mixing? what kind of creature are you?<page>Come a little closer, and my senses will understand your essence better. "

original_en_text: Lady, still my senses resound. You seem so far beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知再度震颤。您已远远超过凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明
translated_text: 私の気持ちはまだ響きます。あなたは間違いを超えているようです。<page>あなたの性質をもう一度見て、私は明確な答えを与えることができます。
secondary_translated_text: My feelings still resonate with me. You seem to be beyond your mistake.<page>Look at your nature once more, and I can give you a definite answer.

original_en_text: Lady? So you live, still. This is good... I had felt the conflict commence, pale hearts ablaze, and the sudden well of darkness after.<hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I had hoped to slay the monarch, and was near achieving that goal, but the situation has become... complicated. Now, all of Pharloom threatens to fall.<page>But I can sense it in you, lady. You have not yielded to despair, so some hope must still remain?<hpage>...Slim hope, I suspect. But true, there may yet be a way through this disaster. I shall pursue that goal with whatever strength remains.<page>Then allow me to continue to aid you as I can... Mine might be a small contribution, but I shall provide it eagerly.
original_zh_text: 女士？你还活着，真是太好了……我早已感受到冲突的爆发，苍白之心熊熊燃烧，而后是突如其来的黑暗深渊。<hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我本希望斩杀君主，几乎就要达成目标，但情况变得……复杂了。如今整个纺络都濒临倾覆。<page>但我能从你身上感受到，女士。你仍未屈服于绝望，是否意味着尚存一线希望？<hpage>……希望渺茫。但确实，或许仍有办法化解这场灾难。我将用残存之力追寻这个目标。<page>那么请允许我继续尽力协助你……虽只是微薄之力，但我必倾心奉献。
translated_text: レディ？だから生きているのよよし、よし。私は葛藤が始まり、青白い心が燃え上がり、突然暗闇の井戸が始まるのを感じた。<hpage>申し訳ありませんエヴァ私は君主を殺すことを望んでいましたが、状況は...物事は複雑になり、今ではFarham全体が崩壊の危険にさらされています。<page>私はあなたからそれを感じることができます、マダム。絶望に屈しなかったから、希望はあるのか。<hpage>...希望は薄いのかな。しかし、実際には、この災害を乗り越える方法があるかもしれません。私はその目標を達成するために最善を尽くします。<page>私はあなたを助けるために最善を尽くし続けます。私の貢献は小さいかもしれませんが、熱心に提供します。
secondary_translated_text: lady? That's why you're alive. Okay, okay. I felt the conflict begin, the pale heart burn, and suddenly the well of darkness begin.<hpage>i'm sorry, eva, i was hoping to kill the monarch, but the situation... Things are getting complicated and now the whole of Farham is in danger of collapse.<page>I can feel it from you, Madame. Is there hope, since we have not given in to despair?<hpage>... Maybe my hope is thin. However, in reality, there may be a way to overcome this disaster. I will do my best to achieve that goal.<page>I will continue to do my best to help you. My contribution may be small, but I will serve it with zeal.

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>With what power I possess, I may still be able to aid you further.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。
